Summary: Within walking distance of Disneyland parks.  Room was super clean.  Lighting in room is adequate.  Good counter space.  The sink is outside of the toilet/shower room, which I like.   Bed was not the most comfortable, but was ok, and I loved the pillows.  The people at the front desk were super nice, and helpful.  They stored our luggage both on check-in day, when we arrived early and our room was not ready but we wanted to go to the parks, and on check-out day, when it was time to check out but we  still had time to visit the parks before we needed to go to the airport.  This hotel is old but well maintained, and a good value for the price paid.  Two miner complaints; The toiletries were pretty low quality, and there is a bit of noise that comes from outside, d/t the door being
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Happiest Hotel Workers I've ever encountered
Summary: They had extra vacancy over the weekend and so they let us keep parking in their lot even after check out so we could go and walk to Downtown Disney. Excellent and genuinely happy/helpful staff. All for a reasonable price for Disneyland too!
Manager Response: Spiffybumble, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay with us and we appreciate the compliments to our friendly staff.  The location of the hotel is one of the best in the city!  Right across the street from the Disneyland theme parks, within about a 5 to 7 minute walk to the entrance of both parks.  Also within walking distance to the Downtown Disney Shopping center, the Gardenwalk shopping center, and all of the great restaurants the resort area has to offer.  We are not always able to offer parking after check out, technically the parking expires at 11:00AM on the day of departure.  When our staff notices the lot is not going to be full however, we are happy to let our guest keep the car here longer.  If we can help our guests save the $35 to park at Disney, that means they can buy an extra churro!  We hope we will become your new favorite place to stay and we will have the pleasure of seeing you time and time again.  Until next time we will be here ready to serve.

Summary: I’ve stayed in nearly every hotel within walking distance to Disney and this was by far the least comfortable. The bed was extremely uncomfortable, very hard, and it was topped with a sheet and paper thin blanket. It was so loud constantly had people running by and yelling or having loud conversations from 5am-11pm. We didn’t get any sleep during our stay. The room was comparable to Motel 6 and i wasn’t expecting it to be super nice but the pictures made it look much newer and nicer than it was. My only positive is that the hotel staff was great, super friendly and helpful when we needed additional things. The location was good but there are plenty of better choices around. Would recommend Hyatt House or Candy Cane Inn across the street.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were very happy with our stay at Castle inn and suites last week. The room was clean and the beds were comfortable. It was quiet there as well. I thought how they folded the towels was cute and unique. We had a refrigerator and a microwave that made things more convenient. A 7 minute walk to Disneyland. Staff was nice. Free parking was the best. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent location, clean and comfortable rooms, great staff.
Summary: Excellent location just across from the park with clean, comfortable rooms.   The staff is super nice and very helpful. For whatever reason, they actually care and want you to have nice stay.   Rooms are dated, but everything looks new and clean. It’s kind of like stepping out of a time machine into the 90’s.   Bed and pillows were fine. We slept well. It was pretty quiet.  We were in a family suite with 4 adults and 2 kids and had enough room for 2 strollers and all our luggage. Not spacious, but by no means cramped.   Room layout is a little weird with one bed and the bathroom in the front and 2 more beds in a back room. But it’s fine, it works.   What you’re getting here is a clean, well maintained room about a 15 min walk to the park. We will definitely consider staying here
Manager Response: none

Summary: Booked this hotel with my Disneyland tickets through Get Away Today. The hotel is 2 blocks away from the entrance of the park. No parking fee!! Rooms are nice. Would definitely stay here again.  They ask you wear a mask while coming inside to check in. Safety first!
Manager Response: none

Summary: An excellent value priced motel within walking distance to Disneyland. This is an old school motel. Drive right up to your room and park in front or below it. We stayed in a family suite and it was perfect for us. Two queen beds in one room and a king in the other. Everything was clean and in good working order. Nothing fancy, but that’s not what this place is about. This place is clean, a good value, and family friendly. Room had a fridge and microwave. So a quick stop to Ralph’s grocery allowed us to have cereal and other snacks in the room. Front desk was helpful with everything including change for the laundry room. Kids used the pool which I saw serviced by an outside company multiple times during our visit (it’s nice to know ph and chlorine levels are keeping it clean). I
Room tip: Request top floor to minimize noise.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We have always prided ourselves on taking care of our guests and our hotel to the best of our ability.  We are very happy to hear that you noticed the efforts of our staff when caring for the hotel.  The Family Suite is designed for our guests who need a little more space or are traveling with up to 6 people.  With a king bed and two queen beds, there is plenty of room for everyone.  The door between the rooms is nice to provide a little privacy if part of the group would like to sleep and the other part of the group would like to stay up and watch tv.  We are definitely one of the last hotels across from the Disneyland Resort to provide free parking for one vehicle per room.  We also offer free Wi Fi in the room.  Lastly, we are one of the only hotels that does not have "resort fees".  We try to pass all of these savings on to our guests, so they have more money to spend at Disneyland!  We hope you have found your new favorite place to stay and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This is our go to hotel every time we go to Disneyland. We always rent the family suite as the main room has a king bed with the bathroom and a door that closes to the other large room that has two queens and a sink. It is perfect for my family who bring their friends (teens). The accommodations are clean, staff is great and you cant beat the location and price point. They also provide discounts for repeat guests. I highly recommend the Castle Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We love to hear that we are your go-to hotel, and you home away from home when you visit the Disneyland Resort area.  We have always made a special effort to provide our guests with excellent customer service along with a pleasant and memorable experience.  The Family Suite is a great option for families or groups of up to 6 people.  The extra space gives everyone a little more room to spread out, 2 televisions make watching different shows a breeze, and with a refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker, it has all the comforts of home.  As one of the only hotels to offer free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there is no better value to be found in the area.  We are grateful for your recommendation, and we hope to see you and your family again soon!

Summary Heading: Great staff, love the double room for our family of 6
Summary: The staff was always very prompt and caring, incredibly professional. The double room was perfect for our family.  Some light water pressure in the morning with our shower, everything else was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Our staff is so thankful for your compliments, we have always made our guests our priority, and we will continue to provide the level of service you have come to expect.  If there is any concern for our maintenance staff, please let us know during your visit and we will have the matter addressed as quickly as possible.  We are very happy to hear the room was a perfect fit for you and your family.  We offer several different types of rooms, including suites that sleep up to 6 people in case you have a larger group next time.  As always, the hotel provides free parking for one vehicle per registered room, free Wi Fi in the room, and we do not charge a Resort Fee.  With all of these savings, the Castle Inn & Suites is the best choice of hotels within walking distance of the entrance of Disneyland.  We hope the next time you are in town, you come back and stay with us again!

Summary: We stayed at the Castle inn and suites on our week visit to Disneyland. We booked a family suite, and it was bigger than expected. Two queen beds, and 1 king bed in a separate room. 6 of us fit great!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  We are glad to hear you had a great time at the hotel and your room was a perfect fit.  The two bedroom Family Suite is the best way to accommodate 6 people.  1 King size bed, 2 Queen size beds, and a door between the two spaces for a little privacy.  With a separate sink in the back area with the two queen beds, it allows some of the party to continue to get ready to go to the parks if someone is still in the shower.  When you consider that the Castle Inn  & Suites still provides free parking for one vehicle on the nights of the reservation, free Wi Fi in the room, and No Resort Fees, there is not a better choice within walking distance of the entrance of the parks.  We hope the next time you are in town, you will come back and stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Castle Inn is a Good Value
Summary: An affordable and clean hotel within very easy walking distance to Disneyland’s entrance. This was the 4th time we’ve stayed at Castle Inn within the past 12 months.  We’ve rented multiple rooms for our adult family group and no one has had any complaints.  Yes it is an older hotel, but it’s clean, parking is included, and staff is friendly and helpful. As long time Disney park visitors, we’ve stayed at many of the local  hotels; this is now our first choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review!  4 visits in the last 12 months!  We are so happy to hear you and the rest of your party have all had such a great time staying with us.  We also appreciate that we have become your new first choice hotel when you visit the Disneyland Resort area.  Our staff genuinely appreciates your compliments, we have always strived to provide our guests with the best service possible.  We work hard to make sure all of our guests have a clean, safe, and comfortable experience when staying with us.  We are one of the only hotels to still offer free parking, free Wi Fi and No Resort Fees, and we will continue to provide our guests with the level of service you have come to expect.  We hope you are already looking forward to your next stay with us, we are definitely looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great location - family suite offer extra room and a little privacy.
Summary: The location is great. It’s a short walk to the parks. The family suite was perfect for us - gave some extra room and a little privacy. Parking is free - and they do not offer room cleaning while you stay. This didn’t bother us - we just used the space for sleeping. This was our second visit to this hotel - we would return.
Manager Response: Thanks for writing about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are happy to hear you already came back for a second visit to the hotel and we hope to see you again soon!  The location of the hotel is one of the best options if you are visiting the Disneyland Resort.  Within a 5 to 7 minute walk to the main entrance of both parks, all of the restaurants the area has to offer, and the entertainment in the area as well!  The Family Suite is definitely the best option if you need a little privacy or have a larger family.  The room can sleep up to 6 people comfortably, with 1 King bed in the front, 2 Queen beds in the back, and a door between the two spaces.  As one of the only hotels to continue to offer free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi in the room, and No Resort Fees, there is not a better value to be found in the area!  We hope your third visit is right around the corner!

Summary: A short walk to Disneyland. Castle Inn is very Family friendly. We booked three rooms for three different sized families. The Executive Suite was perfect for the family of six. We needed 2 cribs for babies and they were very helpful in accommodating our needs. They gave us connecting rooms and that was nice too. A nice place to stay! Staff was helpful and friendly. We hope to be back soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  As a family owned and operated hotel across the street from the Disneyland Resort, we know how important it is to our guests to have rooms close together.  We also offer several different room configurations for families of all sizes.  The Executive Suites are great for those families that just need a little more space.  With 2 Queen beds and a Sofa Bed all in one large room, they are just large enough to provide a larger family with a little more breathing room.  Every room has a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and a hair dryer. which makes the room feel a little more like home.  With free Parking free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, the hotel is a great value to all families who are planning to visit the Disneyland Resort.  We hope to see you again soon too!

Summary: Nice room and decent rates! We got the king size bed room and to our surprise there was two queen size beds in the room. They have a big bathroom, two sinks, fridge, and microwave! Definitely booking again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  It sounds like you had one of our Family Suites.  With one King bed and two Queen beds, there is plenty of room for the whole family to spread out and sleep comfortably.  With a door to divide the two spaces, there is enough separation to provide privacy when the kids need to sleep or someone wants to stay up late and watch TV.  The room also features a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker and a hair dryer.  When you consider the free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi in the room, and No Resort Fees, the savings by staying the Castle Inn & Suites are incredible.  We are happy to hear you are planning to come back, we hope it is very soon!

Summary: The stay was very excellent with an exceptionally friendly staff. Upon arrival we parked in the 15-Minute zone and our rent a car's battery had a faulty issue. The staff accommodated our issue and checked our luggage. The room was clean and even being a Smoking Room had no  odors to me and my mom enjoyed the ability to smoke comfortably before out Disney days. My only complaint would be that our room mini fridge was not very cold but, did hold temp fine and worked for our soda and snacks perfectly but some people may want a colder fridge. I do plan to stay at this hotel many more times in the future and look forward to those later stays.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Arrived at the hotel early around 9:00am due to our long haul flight from Australia and asked if we could leave our luggage (8 cases for 8 people) with reception until check in at 3pm. They did one better and allowed us to check into one of our rooms, the family 2 bedroom suite, which allowed us all to freshen up before going into Disneyland. Great service! We resumed check in later that evening and entered our queen room which is an older style of room with a toilet and shower, but then washbasins outside the bathroom in the main room. Different.  Our stay of 4 nights was comfortable but I think the beds should all be upgraded to King size now and the rooms upgraded.  The staff were still under strict Covid 19 rules but all appeared friendly and competent. This place is a
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star review of your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We really appreciate the feedback and are staff is very grateful for your compliments.  The health and safety of our guests and our staff is our top priority at this time.  The Family Suite is one of the best options for larger groups, or those families that would like a little more room to spread out.  With 1 King bed in the front area, and 2 Queen beds in the back, up to 6 people can share the room comfortably.  Regarding the layout of the restroom area in the Standard rooms, we know it can be hectic for everyone to get ready in the morning to go to Disneyland.  By placing the mirror and sink outside of the restroom area where the shower and toilet are located, it allows some guests to shower while the others are brushing their teeth, putting on makeup, styling their hair and so on.  Our staff is constantly working to maintain the property and keep our rooms up to the standards our guests have come to expect from the hotel.  We hope you come back and stay with us again the next time you and your family visit Disneyland for an even better experience!  looking forward to your next stay, thank you again for the kind review.

Summary: First off, the staff was very kind, courteous and helpful.  We arrived a few hours before check in time,they stored our backpacks for us so we could go to Disneyland before checking in to the hotel.  For a standard box postage fee, they mailed our souvenirs back home for us (if you have small items that fit in the USPS boxes they have, I highly recommend it).  Castle is a few blocks from Disney, CVS, restaurants outside Disney.    It was clean, everything was in working order.  Pool and hot tube were nice (especially in the rain).  It's not the most modern hotel, but had everything we needed for a 4 day trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are very happy to hear you had a great stay with us.  The hotel offers free luggage storage for our guests who arrive prior to check in, or if they need to store the luggage after checking out.  We keep the pool and hot tub open every day, rain or shine (unless there is lightning) from 8:00AM until 10:00PM.  A dip in the heated pool or a nice soak in the hot tub is the best way to unwind after a long day at Disneyland.  When you include the free parking, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there is no better place to stay across the street from the Disneyland Resort.  We are sincerely grateful to you for the compliments to our staff, we work hard to provide our guests the best service we can.  We hope the next time you are in town; you will come back and stay with us again.

Summary: Great location across the street from Disney (about 1.5 blocks to the park entrance). The room had 2 queen beds with great pillows, lobby was cute with the dragon window and suits of armor. Fast, friendly service at check in and when I went to buy soap for the laundry. Laundry room was clean with 3 washers and 3 dryers, coin operated (no chairs in there due to size, but table for folding). Had a positive stay and would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are very thankful for your compliments about the location, the amenities, and the Castle Theme of the hotel.  The stained glass window is one of the features that sets our hotel apart and makes for a memorable place to stay.  When it lights up at night, it is a warm welcome for our guests returning after a long day at Disneyland.  Our staff is always eager to please, and we work hard to provide our guests with the best level of customer service.  The coin operated laundry is available for use from 8:00am to 10:00pm every day.  Located right next to the pool area, it is very convenient for guests to relax while waiting for the cycle to finish.  While the location is one of the best reasons to stay with us, there are many other added values as well.  Free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi in the room, and No Resort Fees make the Castle Inn & Suites the perfect choice for families visiting the Disneyland Resort.  We hope the next time you are in town; you will come back and stay with us again!

Summary: This is a nice hotel within a 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Friendly staff and clean rooms. Keep in mind there are a lot of families staying with young kids, so it can be a bit noisy. Parking lot and grounds are lit up, which made it nice when walking back from the parks at night. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are glad to see that you enjoyed your visit to the hotel and you plan to stay with us again!  The location of the hotel is one of the best in the Disneyland Resort area.  Right in the middle of everything the area has to offer.  Within a few minutes' walk to the entrance of both Disneyland and California Adventures, but also within a few minutes' walk to all of the shopping, dining, and other entertainment options in the area.  Our friendly staff appreciates your kind words, and we will continue to make every effort to provide our guests with a safe, clean, and comfortable experience.  We hope you are already planning your next Disneyland vacation; we can't wait to see you again!

Summary: The rooms are nice & comfortable.  The beds were very comfortable and we had the best night's sleep of our whole trip.  We have stayed at the Castle Inn every time we've gone to Disneyland since 1996.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are honored to be your hotel of choice for nearly 30 years!  We appreciate your kind words about the cleanliness and comfort you have personally experienced during all of your stays at the hotel.  A few things that have not changed here, which seem to have changed at many other hotels in the area, is that we still offer free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi in the room, and we have No Resort Fees.  In other words, we have not created any additional charges for our guests.  The location of the hotel is one of the best in town, within walking distance to the entrances of both Disneyland Theme Parks, the Gardenwalk Shopping Center, the Anaheim Convention Center, and all of the shopping and dining options in the area!  We look forward to your next visit, and we hope to keep seeing you for the next 30 years!

Summary: The room was clean and the staff friendly. I loved how close it is to Disneyland. The parking is free which was a big plus for us. We were able to park our car there and walk to the Park. We enjoyed our stay and will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites and for sharing your story.  The Castle Inn & Suites is in a great location, as mentioned, within a short walk to the main entrance of both Disneyland and California Adventures.  We appreciate the compliments to our staff and the cleanliness of the hotel.  We work hard to provide all of our guests with the level of service you have come to know and expect.  We are one of the only hotels to continue to offer free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi in the room, and No Resort Fees during your stay.  We are glad to hear that you plan to come back and stay with us again, hopefully it is very soon!

Summary: The front desk was excellent! Asked for extra towels and coffee. It was brought to us in 5 minutes. Real close to the front entrance of Disneyland in which makes it a quick walk to the entrance to the parks!! Overall good experience!! Would recommend highly!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are happy to see that you had a great stay with us.  Our staff is very grateful to you for the compliments on the service you received.  We have always made customer service a top priority, and we strive to communicate among all of our staff to meet our guest's requests as soon as possible.  The location of the hotel just can't be beat! Right across from the Disneyland Resort, within a 5 minute walk to the entrances of both Disney parks.  The hotel is also within walking distance to the Anaheim Convention Center, the House of Blues, the Gardenwalk shopping center, and all of the great shopping and dining opportunities in the Resort area.  We appreciate your recommendation, and we hope you come back to see us again very soon!

Summary: I’m a little late on my review but fell sick shortly after our trip. Our stay at the Castle Inn was nothing short of amazing. The staff at this hotel were awesome. I encountered at least 4 different people and they were all very kind and gave great hospitality. Will definitely stay here again and the location is also a plus.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites and for writing a very kind review about your experience.  We are glad to hear you are feeling better.  We are genuinely grateful to you for the compliments to our staff.  We have always made every effort to provide out guests with the best experience possible and it is great to hear we did not disappoint!  We hope you were able to take advantage of the free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi in the room and were able to save because the hotel does not charge any Resort Fees.  We are happy to hear you plan to come back and stay with us again, hopefully it is very soon!

Summary: Overall the review is positive as the hotel room was clean and comfortable, and staff were very friendly and always willing to help. Location is great, walking distance to the Disney Parks. However the place is very run down and the photos taken for marketing are very well done to hide this. Eg. the pool is very small and in the middle of the car park. Bathroom was very old. However it was significantly cheaper than other surrounding options so if you don’t mind a ‘no frills’ experience then this place would suit well.
Manager Response: Hanna, thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites in Anaheim.  We appreciate the positive review of your experience with us.  The location is one of the best in the city, right across the street from the Disneyland Resort, within a 5 to 7 minute walk from the entrance of both parks.  Also within walking distance of all the other great things the Resort Area has to offer.  We appreciate all feedback from our guests, as helps make us aware of opportunities for improvement.  We are sincerely thankful for your kind words about the friendly staff as well.  We work hard to provide all of our guests with a positive and memorable experience.  As one of the only hotels in the resort area to offer free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi in the rooms, and No Resort Fees, there is no better value to be found.  We hope the next time you are in town, you will come back and see us again!

Summary: Our family has been staying at the Castle Inn and Suites since the mid 2000’s. It’s our Southern California home away from home. The ownership, president and management have always made us feel welcome, like true guests.  Marc Timanus, Front Office manager has always greeted us and assisted us with the warm welcome that you would expect from family.  Ragini and the rest of the management care about making the hotel stay comfortable and enjoyable.  We will continue to stay at the Castle Inn and Suites
Manager Response: Thank you for your very thoughtful and kind review about the Castle Inn & Suites.  We love to hear that we are your home away from home when you visit Southern California.  We have all worked tirelessly over the years to create a welcoming, friendly, and safe environment for all of our guests.  We are very grateful for your compliments to the hotel and we look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.   As an independently owned and operated hotel, we have the opportunity to provide our guests with a more personalized experience, which sets us apart from the many other hotels in the area.  Also, the Castle Inn & Suites is one of the only hotels to offer free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi in the room, and No Resort Fees.  With all these great values, and the service you have come to know and expect, there is no better choice in the area.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The staff was professional and helpful. We asked for a couple of blankets and they delivered them to our room within minutes. We  used the laundry facility as well as the pool and spa and those areas were also very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Our staff is very thankful for your kind words about the attention you received while staying with us.  We have always made our guests our top priority, and we will continue to provide the level of service you have come to know us for.  The guest laundry along with the pool is open every day from 8:00AM to 10:00PM.  The hotel also offers guests free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi in the room, and we do not charge a resort fee.  With all of these added values, and a location across from the Disneyland Resort, there is not a better choice for families visiting Disneyland.  We hope the next time you are planning your Disneyland Vacation, you will remember us and come stay at the Castle Inn & Suites again.

Summary Heading: Castle Inn and Suites, now known as Aiden's Castle.
Summary: We took our grandson who is 3 and he was beyond thrilled to be staying in a castle, or as he called it HIS CASTLE.  We could see the fireworks from our room which he loved and he loved being across from California Adventure. Covid restrictions were in place, but we were still able to get anything we needed - shampoo, towels, soap whatever we needed, we promptly got. We will definitely be going back to Castle Inn and look forward to it.
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We love to hear that your grandson loved staying at His Castle, we aim to please and are glad to hear we did not disappoint.  When on a Disneyland vacation, we want it to be memorable for our guests.  What could be more memorable than staying in a Castle?  As one of the only hotels across from the Disneyland parks to offer free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi in the rooms, and No Resort Fees, there is no better value to be found in the area.  Our staff appreciates the compliments on the quick delivery of any requested items.  Nothing brings us more joy than to hear our guests had a great time and plan to come back and stay with us again.  We hope to become your home away from home.  We look forward to seeing you again.  You will always be treated like royalty at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary Heading: Favorite Hotel to Utilize for Disneyland Vaca
Summary: My husband and I have used this hotel twice now and we love it. It is very conveniently located and one of the best deals in the area. Whenever we go visit Disneyland and California Adventure this is the place we choose over all the others. The staff is great, rooms are well kept and it's a perfect crashing spot after a long day in the parks. I would highly recommend this if you are people who rope drop and also close out the parks at night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We love to hear that you have stayed with us multiple times now, we hope to see you many more times in the future.  The location of the Castle Inn & Suites is definitely one of the best, right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort area.  Within a few minutes walk, guests can find anything they need.  From convenience stores for last minute items, to other shopping experiences, entertainment options like movie theaters and bowling alleys, practically any kind of restaurant, and of course the main entrances of both Disneyland and California Adventure.  We are so grateful to you for the compliments to our staff on the level of service you have received and the cleanliness of the rooms.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Sorry it took me a while to write this review, I totally forgot. We visited Disneyland for 3 days, very close by walking distance, our room was nice it was just me and my two adult kids. We got a room with 2 beds and a sofa bed. Good space We had a great time and we loved the location. The day that we check out the front desk person was nice enough to let us know that if we want to go shopping or eat somewhere we can leave our car in the parking lot at no charge since they had available extra parking that day, I don’t know if you guys know but most hotels will charge you extra to leave your car. Thank you again and we will be coming back. Sorry for taking so long to write my review
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  There is no need for an apology, we are very grateful for your kind words about the staff and the hotel itself.  The room type sounds like one of our Executive Mini Suites.  This room is great for a family or group of up to 6 people.  The 2 Queen beds and the Sofa bed are all in one large shared space, plenty of room for everyone to spread out.  When you include the free parking for one vehicle on the nights of the reservation, free Wi Fi in the room, and No Resort Fees, there is not a better choice for families visiting the Disneyland Resort area.  Parking is supposed to expire at check out time (11:00AM) on the date of departure, but when we anticipate having extra space we are happy to allow vehicles to park on site longer.  We are glad to hear you had a great time, and we hope to see you and your family again soon!

Summary: This is our 3rd stay at Castle Inn and Suites and the Hotel could not be more helpful to their guests. We reserved our rooms late for the beginning of the Christmas season at Disneyland and they were able to have 3 rooms for 6 guests despite the fact that they have suites and 6 of us could of been in one room. The staff is very pleasant and the housekeeping and maintenance staff go above and beyond to tend to the guests despite some covid restrictions still being in place. This is a 4 story Hotel with many rooms but you would never know it as it is extremely quiet and we only saw a few people at a time outside despite the Hotel being full. There is a nice pool and hot tub fenced area with a sitting area upstairs. There is a laundry room for guests to use too.Hotel has an
Manager Response: Peterpan4ever, thank you for taking the time to write a very kind review about your experience(s) at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We have always made the guest a top priority, and we appreciate the compliments to our staff about the treatment you received while staying with us.  We are especially happy to hear this was your 3rd stay with us!  While the hotel is 4 stories, we are still a small business and we try to provide our guests with a unique, comfortable, and memorable visit to the hotel.  The hotel is the perfect choice for a family planning to visit the Disneyland Resort.  Every hotel room has a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and a hair dryer.  All of the comforts of home, including free Wi Fi in the room.  As mentioned, the hotel also includes free parking for one vehicle per registered room during the nights of the reservation.  The Castle Inn & Suite is the only hotel across the street from the parks to include free parking, free Wi Fi, and to have No Resort Fees.  We will always try to take care of our guests, and booking with the hotel directly is always the best option.  The Executive Suite, or Mini-Suite is a great room type, 2 queen beds and a sofa bed, all in one oversized room.  We are already looking forward to seeing you again next summer!  We can't wait!

Summary: I won’t lie, the fact that there is no housekeeping option took us by surprise. I get the reasoning but having travelled a lot ‘post pandemic’ staying at dozens of hotels, this is the first hotel where I have experienced this. I would expect at least an option to request a room to be serviced. Reception desk were always available to deliver additional supplies and have trash removed and we found the staff very friendly. Masks are required to be worn when interacting with them inside. Ok that aside, the hotel is very convenient to access Disneyland and was the main motivation for staying here. That said, it’s about 15 minutes walk to the park entrance so if you intend returning to the hotel to rest and the go back to the park, you are adding an extra hour of walking each day and
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  There are many different approaches to the health and safety of guests and staff throughout the hospitality industry.  Our hotel has made health and safety a priority, so we have limited the contact between the guests and staff by cleaning and sanitizing rooms after checking out.  We are very grateful for your compliments to our staff, we stand ready to meet all of our guest requests for any amenities for the room, and we can also send staff to pick up any trash or used towels from the room during the visit.  The majority of our guests have stated the walk takes approximately 5 to 7 minutes from the hotel to the entrance.  All of the rooms in the hotel include a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker and a hair dryer.  The hotel also includes free Wi Fi along with the free parking for one vehicle per room.  On top of all these values, there are No Resort Fees, which provides even more savings for each guest!  We appreciate the feedback, and we will always use the information as an opportunity to improve our future guest's experience.  We hope the next time you are in town, you come back to stay with us again!

Summary: After coming back from the park late Wednesday night. My wife decided to shower. When grabbing a near by towel she noticed it was still damp and had several hairs on it. Called the front desk and the response was " we can bring more towels" no I am so sorry or anything else. We won't be coming back
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Our staff tries to go above and beyond to help make our guests happy.  A detailed report was made of the issue when it was brought to our attention.  The staff stated they had immediately apologized and attempted to resolve the issue right away, offering all new towels as replacements for the one towel which was reported to have a hair on it. After the one-night stay, at check out the following morning, the issue was again addressed, and the staff in the morning apologized for the incident.  We have since addressed this concern with our laundry, our housekeeping staff, our front desk staff, and our supervisors.  We will continue to make every effort to ensure this does not happen again.  We will use this as an opportunity to improve all of our future guest's experiences.  We are sorry to hear you will not return, and we wish you the best.

Summary: My Family and I stayed for 3 nights while we visited Disneyland and this Hotel was perfect! Everyone was friendly and helpful- I didn’t pass one person without them greeting me.  It is a few minutes to walk to the parks and there are tons of food options around- also a CVS and Walgreens down the block!  The whole property is super Clean and easy to Navigate- we will totally be staying here on our next trip!
Manager Response: Thanks for the Awesome Review!  We love hearing that our guests have had a great time and plan to come back and stay with us again!  The hotel is one of the best options for any family visiting the Disneyland Resort.  Right across the street, and located within walking distance to all of the great things the area has to offer.  From casual restaurants to fine dining, shopping experiences, convenience stores, the Anaheim Convention Center, the House of Blues, Movie theaters, and of course the entrances to both Disneyland theme parks.  We are right in the middle of it all.  When you include free parking, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there is not a better choice in town!  We are already looking forward to your next stay, we hope it is very soon!

Summary: This hotel served its purpose for us.  The room was very basic, but clean and had enough room for all of us.  We were on the second floor.  There are only two elevators, one at each end of the floor.  We were right in the middle, so it was quite a task to get everything from the car to the room initially.  No breakfast is offered, but we walked to a nearby Walgreens and got basic items to have in the room.  We walked to Disneyland every day and it took maybe 10-15 minutes.  It wasn't bad at all.  We arrived for our room about 3pm, so we had no trouble getting a parking space right where we wanted it.  The floors outside the room were a little angled, so be careful if you aren't sure footed.  We didn't have any issues.  We'd stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites and for providing us with a review of your experience at the hotel.  We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us.  One of the great features of staying at the Castle Inn & Suites is the location, right in the middle of everything.  There are shopping opportunities, convenience stores, coffee shops, restaurants, entertainment, and of course the entrance to both of the Disneyland theme parks right within a few minutes walk from the hotel.  The walkways have a slight pitch to allow any water from the rain to run off.  We are happy to hear you found the perfect parking spot for your vehicle.  The Castle Inn & Suites is one of the only hotels across the street from the Disneyland Resort to provide free parking for one vehicle per registered room.  WE also provide free Wi Fi in the rooms and we do Not charge a resort fee!  With all of this great value, we think it is the best choice for families visiting the Disneyland Resort area.  We are happy to hear you plan to come back and stay with us again, the sooner the better!

Summary: Great hotel, you can go walking to Disney within 10-15 minutes. Room was clean when I arrived but since covid they are still not cleaning rooms daily, only if you ask for something or after check out which I didn’t mind but some people may be bothered. There’s a pool and I think you can do your laundry there but I didn’t use this service. They keep our bags before check in and after check out as well. I was alone and felt safe. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Andrea, thank you for writing a review about the Castle Inn & Suites!  We appreciate all of your kind words about the hotel.  During this challenging time, we have limited the contact between our staff and our guests out of an abundance of caution.  However, we are still happy to provide guests with all of the amenities for the rooms by delivering the requests.  Upon arrival, our staff can remove any used towels or trash that may need to be taken out.  After checking out, our housekeeping staff cleans and sanitizes each room.  The hotel is definitely safe, we have staff on property 24 hours per day and overnight security.  We try to make every effort to provide our guests with a great experience and it is nice to see we did not disappoint.  We hope we will become your go-to hotel for all of your future Disneyland trips.  We are already looking forward to the next one and we hope you are too!

Summary: The hotel is about a 15 minute walk to Disneyland.  There are lots of restaurants nearby and corner stores if you forgot anything.  The hotel staff was friendly and helpful.  The hotel theme/decor is cute and fun!  The room itself was nice and had a microwave, fridge, and coffee maker.  My only real complaint is that the mattress was too firm for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for the perfect 5 out of 5 review!  We love hearing that you had a great stay, and our staff provided you with a great experience.  We work hard to provide each of our guests with a positive and memorable visit.  The location of the hotel is definitely one of the best reasons to choose the Castle Inn & Suites.  Located right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort, everything is within walking distance.  From convenience stores to clothing stores, fast food restaurants to fine dining, movie theaters, concert venues, and of course the entrance to both of the Disneyland theme parks.  We know that choosing the perfect mattress for all of our guests is not possible, some like a softer feel, some prefer a firmer mattress.  We tried to go with something in the middle to make most of our guests happy.  When you consider the hotel provides free parking for one vehicle on the nights of the reservation, free Wi Fi in the room, and does Not charge a resort fee, there is truly no better value in the city!  We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay here. The room was spacious (the two bed suite), the beds were comfortable, and it was an easy walk to the Disney parks. The staff were very friendly and accommodating. We appreciated the additional sink area outside of the bathroom. Since one of us had to do some work on the trip, also, we liked the desk area for our computer, in addition to a separate table, plus fridge and microwave.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of your experience here at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay with us!  The rooms were designed with guests' needs in mind.  Having a sink located outside of the restroom allows part of the group to continue getting ready, even if the restroom is being used for a shower.  This helps the whole group get to the Disneyland parks even quicker.  The desks are very useful and the hotel installed lamps that have an outlet in the base as well, perfect for plugging in a laptop.  With a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and a hair dryer, it is like having all of the comforts of home while you are on vacation.  We hope the next time you come to town, you will come back and stay with us again at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: We visited Disneyland on October 15, we arrived at 7:30 am and were able to pre-check in and was given a parking pass as it was too early to check in. The walk to Disneyland was only 2 blocks. The staff was very nice and friendly. Rooms were clean and beds were comfortable. Will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites and the great review of your stay!  While we are not always able to guarantee parking prior to check-in time, when it is available, we are happy to allow guests to park at the hotel.  We just ask to make sure the vehicle is registered, including the license plate number in order to receive a parking permit.  We provide free parking for one vehicle per registered room on the nights of the reservation, and parking expires at checkout time on the day of departure.  We appreciate the kind words about the cleanliness of the rooms, and we are looking forward to having you stay with us again soon.

Summary: Best places to be near the park, about 10/15 minute walk. Clean rooms, spacious for everyone, especially for group members with wheelchairs,Elevator accessible. Staff very welcoming and accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience here at the Castle Inn & Suites!  Our staff is all very attentive and experienced working with guests with mobility issues.  The hotel has several options for guests to book rooms that have accessible bathrooms with bars for restroom access or even "Roll In" showers for guests who are unable to use a tub.  We are so happy to see that you enjoyed your visit and received the type of service and experience we try to provide all of our guests.  One of the best reasons to choose the Castle Inn & Suites is the great location.  Right across the street from the Disneyland Resort and within walking distance to all of the great things the resort area has to offer.  We hope that we will become your go-to hotel when visiting Disneyland and we can't wait to see you again!

Summary Heading: Nice, Clean and quiet Hotel-less than 10 min walk to parks.
Summary: We booked Oct 9th-12th. The hotel rooms are clean and the atmosphere is calm and quiet. Walking distance to parks is less than 10 mins.  There's a smoking section outside in the grass area by the pool for those that smoke.  Don't leave your butts on the ground, there's a "ash tray pot" in that same area. 10 out of 10 and this will be my hotel for my Disney trips moving forward!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of the Castle Inn & Suites and the perfect 5 out of 5 score!  We are so happy to see that you had a great stay and we are proud to be your new Disney Trip Hotel!  We appreciate the word of caution to those guests that smoke, nearly every room in the hotel is non-smoking.  Therefore, if any guests would like to smoke we ask they do so away from the guest rooms as a courtesy to others.  Our housekeeping staff is always working hard to make sure the rooms are cleaned to the standards of the property.  We will pass on your compliments.  We hope you are planning to come back very soon, there is no place like Disneyland at Christmas Time....

Summary: Love this hotel and suites. Has all we need as a family to accommodate our trip. Hotel staffing super nice and the concierge always supportive in every way..  Big thanks to Mr Mark and Ms Brianna for their professional and courteous service
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We value each and every one of our guests and try to provide the best experience possible.  We are very lucky to have a team that truly cares about the guests and the hotel, and they go out of their way to make each guest feel like royalty.  When you include the free parking, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there is not a better choice in town!  We are happy to have you back in the hotel with us, we love seeing our repeat guests coming back to stay again and again.  We know you will be back again soon, and we will be ready to provide you the level of service you have come to expect.  See you real soon!

Summary: This was a very nice hotel. It was clean with parking for a truck. It was close enough to Disneyland to walk to. My daughter loved the idea of staying in a castle!!! The front desk staff was awesome and very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review of your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  What kid wouldn't want to feel like a princess when on a Disneyland vacation?  This is the perfect choice for a family looking for that special touch that makes a family vacation more memorable.  Our housekeeping staff appreciates the compliment regarding the cleanliness of your room.  Not only are the parking spaces large enough for a truck, but we include the parking for one vehicle on the nights of the reservation for free!  This has become exceedingly rare for hotels right across the street from the Disneyland Resort.  Our front desk staff is also very grateful for your kind words, we make each guest our priority when you come to stay with us.    We hope the next time you are in town, you will come back to see us again!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel Choice for D23 Expo
Summary: We stayed for 7 nights while we visited Disneyland and California Adventure and attended the D23 Expo. The room was large and very comfortable. The hotel was still following COVID-19 protocols as far as housekeeping. However we never waited more than 10 minutes for towel replacement and other consumables. The AC was very reliable and kept us cool when the temperature reached triple digits. We always stay at this hotel when we visit Disney and will continue to do so. Highly recommend them!
Manager Response: Thank you for coming back to stay with us again at the Castle Inn & Suites!  The D23 convention was a very busy time of year, with thousands of people coming to town not only for the convention, but also guests just visiting the Disneyland Resort.  Once the temperature crosses 100 degrees, it can make for a very long day.  Luckily, the Castle Inn & Suites is located halfway between both the Anaheim Convention Center and the entrance to the Disneyland theme parks.  No matter where you are going it is within walking distance!  The hotel has guests coming from all over the world, and we want to take every precaution to keep our staff and our guests as safe as possible.  There are so many great things to do and see in the area, not to mention all the great food, the Castle Inn & Suites is the perfect choice for anyone planning a trip to the area.  We couldn't ask for a better personal recommendation, and we can't wait to see you again at your home away from home!

Summary: Loved it! Room was clean, provided all the extras we needed. Only 2 blocks from the main gain at Disneyland and was very nicely priced. Walgreens, CVS Pharmacy and convenience store nearby along with restaurants.  Definitely will stay there again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  We love seeing that you had a great stay with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  There are so many convenience stores, shopping opportunities, restaurants, and entertainment options in the area, and everything thing is within walking distance from the hotel!  We appreciate the compliments on the cleanliness of the room and our housekeeping staff providing all of the requested items for your stay.  As one of the only hotels across the street from the Disneyland Resort to offer free parking, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there is no better choice for families visiting the Disneyland Resort Area.  We can't wait to see you back at the hotel again, come and see us very soon!

Summary Heading: Great good neighbor hotel for Disneyland
Summary: Stayed September 13-18, 2022. 10 minute walk to Disneyland. 2 queen beds, full bath, refrigerator. & single cup coffee maker. Spotless. All the staff warm, accommodating, & request taken care of quickly. Rooms didn’t have a safe, freezer or iron/board. However, they have lock boxes & freezer accommodations from the lobby area. They provided the iron & board upon request. They also accepted our Instacart order before our arrival. We used an ECV which was charged nightly in the lobby. At check out they have a loyalty program for returning guests which I plan to use in the future. We did not utilize their pool thus can’t comment on.
Manager Response: Thank you for a very complete review of your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  It truly brings us joy to hear you had a great stay with us and plan to come back again in the future.  Our staff works very hard to maintain the level of customer service our guests have come to expect, and we are very grateful to have such a great team.  Though each room does not have every amenity, we have developed solutions over time to help guests with most situations.  As mentioned, we can provide an iron and ironing board upon request and we have a freezer that we can store some guest items in if needed.  The hotel also offers the use of safe deposit boxes free of charge during the stay for our guests.  Thank you as well for the compliments on our housekeeping staff.  We aim to provide all of our guests a safe, clean, and comfortable experience when visiting the Disneyland Resort area.  With free parking, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, it is the best choice for anyone coming to visit the parks.  We hope we will become your home away from home whenever you are on a Disneyland vacation and we look forward to seeing you again very soon!

Summary: This hotel was adequate, given that we wanted to be close enough to walk to Disneyland.  The rooms were not clean, the decor was very outdated, and they didn't have any cleaning services available when we were there so I would advise to check other hotels if you want to have a more modern, clean experience.  Otherwise the staff were friendly and the pool area was well kept, although again, very outdated.  The whole hotel could use a bit of a renovation.  Felt safe and was close enough to walk.
Manager Response: Amanda R, thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  As a Castle, some of the decorations and designs were chosen to be within the medieval theme.  This would include a darker colored wood furniture and rich colored fabrics for the carpet, the walls, and linens.  However, the rooms have many modern amenities such as refrigerators, coffee makers, hair dryers, and microwaves.  The alarm clocks in the rooms were upgraded to a style which provides 2 additional outlets and 2 USB outlets for guests to charge their phones and other electronics on the nightstand.  We also added lamps with outlets in the base as we understand that charging laptops and electronics is a priority for our guests.  We appreciate your feedback regarding the hotel, and we will take it into account when we plan our next renovation.  We appreciate your compliments to the staff, and we hope you will come back to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Loved how close the hotel is to the Disneyland main gates. Only 2 blocks. Due to COVID the gift shop is closed. My room was on the 3rd floor with 2 queens. Nice big room including a microwave, mini fridge, bathtub and shower and a desk. There are a couple elevators which helped me lug my luggage. The AC is strong and kept the room nice and cool especially after hours and hours in the hot CA sun. Free parking. Swimming pool.   Next door on the corner is a strip mall with a souvenir store with great low prices, a pizza place, Mexican restaurant, cafe and Subway. Only a few minute walk. You can pick up or have food delivered.   I would stay here again next time I’m visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the very nice review about your experience here at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so happy to see you had a great stay and we appreciate the 5 out of 5 score!  The Gift Shop was an unfortunate casualty of the pandemic.  During the time when Disneyland was closed, the hotel was also closed.  Many small businesses in the area unfortunately were unable to remain open through such a challenging time.  However, things are starting to come around and we are very happy to have made it through so we can continue to serve our guests.  The amenities in the room make for a very comfortable stay, with everything you need to feel right at home.  With the excellent location of the hotel, there is no need to drive.  The hotel offers free parking, so once the vehicle is here, a guest can just walk to find anything they need.  From convenience stores to retail stores, take-out food to fine dining, and of course all of the great things available at the Disneyland Resort.  The hotel is also within walking distance for any guests visiting Anaheim on business.  We are very happy to hear you plan to come back again on your next trip, hopefully it is very soon!

Summary: We are grandparents who like to visit Disneyland annually by ourselves. We stayed at Castle Inn & Suites for the first time this week. We will definitely return to this property next year. The location is perfect for an easy walk to Disneyland. The room was clean, comfortable bed, great shower and air conditioning (a bit noisy at times, but did not interrupt sleep). Lots of nearby food options at Anaheim Gardenwalk and Downtown Disney. Friendly, helpful staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about the Castle Inn & Suites.  Our staff is genuinely grateful for the compliments and it means a lot to us to hear you enjoyed your stay.  The hotel is in a great location.  We are right across the street from the Disneyland Resort, and within an easy walk to the entrance of both parks.  Also, the hotel provides free parking, free Wi Fi, and does not charge a resort fee.  We aim to provide all of our guests a clean, safe and comfortable place to sleep.  We are happy to hear we provided that for you.  We are looking forward to next year and seeing your smiling face!

Summary Heading: Great hotel very close to Disneyland and Convention Center
Summary: The hotel rooms were clean and up to date, hotel staff was very kind, parking was easy, the walk to the entrance of Disney is short and convenient. I would definitely recommend this hotel for your Disiney trip or if you are going to the Anahiem Convention Center, which it is also very close to.
Manager Response: Samantha L, thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so happy to see that you enjoyed your visit.  We also appreciate the compliments to our staff.  They are what make the hotel special and we work hard to provide the level of service our guests have come to expect from us.  As mentioned the hotel location is right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort District, walking distance to the entrance of the parks, walking distance to the Convention Center, and also to the great shopping and dining opportunities the area has to offer.  We are grateful for your recommendation, and we hope you come back and stay with us again very soon!

Summary: This was my second stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. I like that it's affordable, close enough to Disneyland's main entrance to walk in 10 minutes or take an Uber that is only a few bucks. It is a little older,  but clean and comfortable! I like that it is family owned, it has a pool, the air works great, and it has all the amenities I need when traveling. This is definitely a Top Choice for me when I go to make plans for my next Disney trip!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  We love hearing back from our guests that they have come back to stay with us again!  We also love to hear we are your Top Choice when you come to Disneyland!  As a family owned and operated property, we are able to offer our guests a few added values that are not available everywhere else.  With free parking for one vehicle per registered room, free Wi Fi, and no Resort Fees, we think it is the best choice for all guests planning to visit the Disneyland Resort area.  Thanks again for all of your kind words, and we hope to see you very soon!

Summary: We stayed here for three nights while we visited the Disney parks.  We booked a family suite, one room had two double beds and a sink, the other room had a king bed.  The extra sink was handy as a family of 5. The rooms were basic, but adequate.  Sheets are pilling, but clean.  We didn't notice any surrounding noise, nights were quiet, and the fridge and microwave were great to have for breakfasts in the room and random snacks/drinks.  The vending machine close to our room was out of service, so stocking drinks was a must in the heat.  The rooms were oddly humid, considering how hot and dry it is.  The AC worked to cool the rooms to about 76, but you couldn't get it colder than that and it didn't take the humidity out of the air.  High touch surfaces were clean, but there was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a very thorough review of your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  The Family Suite is definitely one of the most comfortable ways to travel when staying near Disneyland.  With 2 Queen size beds in the back, and 1 King size bed in the front, it is a great room for up to 6 people to sleep comfortably.  During the weekend near Labor Day the area was going through a heat wave, and the humidity was higher than normal.  This could have an impact on the room.  Generally, the air conditioners work very well to cool off the rooms, we apologize if it was not as cold as you would have preferred.  If there is any issue during the stay, whether for maintenance, housekeeping, or something for our front desk agents, please feel free to contact us and we will have it taken care of right away.  We hope the next time you come to stay with us we will be able to exceed your expectations!

Summary Heading: Family Friendly Motel (Pros and Cons Review)
Summary: At Castle Inn & Suites, we stayed for 7 nights on the Third Floor in Double Queen room in August-September 2022. We enjoyed our stay here and would stay here again!  PROS: • Close to Disney theme park entrances (about a 15-minute leisurely walk) • Rooms are pretty spacious  • Roof offered two good-sized tables (one for dining and an extra for playing games or whatever) • Rooms and grounds were kept very clean • Comfortable Beds • Shower water was always hot (any time of day) • Friendly and helpful staff • Kid Friendly • Nice sized television • Mini Refrigerator, which held plenty of drinks and some food • Microwave was powerful • Hairdryer provided • Coffee Maker provided (it's not great, but it will do in a pinch.  The coffee seemed better than in most other motels/hotels I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a very thoughtful and complete review of the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate all of the kind words about the hotel location, the staff, and all of the amenities on the property.  We also appreciate you bringing some items to our attention that you feel we could improve upon.  As explained in the review, the hotel is focused on providing our guests with a very comfortable stay, and we hope to have everything a guest will need during a vacation.  This includes a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and a hair dryer in the room.  The hotel also provides the coin operated washers and dryers, a very conveniently located swimming pool area, and a sun deck in the pool area with a couple of tables and chairs.  The Castle Inn & Suites is one of the only hotels located across the street from Disneyland to continue to offer free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi in the room, and to not charge a resort fee.  The location of the hotel is also very tough to beat, within a 5 to 7 minute walk from the entrance of both parks.  The hotel is also less than a 10 minute walk from the Convention Center, and just a half block from the Gardenwalk Shopping center.  Though the gift shop is closed, it will not be permanent.  The hotel used to provide notepads and pens in the room, but out of an abundance of caution, all materials that cannot be sanitized have been removed.  Once we are on the right path again, those smaller touches will be brought back.  The alarm clocks are a great touch, with 2 outlets plus 2 USB charging ports, it is usually sufficient for all devices.  Just in case guests need additional outlets, as mentioned there are several spread throughout the room near the tables, desks, and even in the base of the lamp.  Again, we appreciate the feedback and we hope you come back and see us again very soon!

Summary: We spent the last weekend at castle inn and suites. It is a comfortable walk to the front entrance of Disneyland. I was happy to have a coffee maker and fridge in the room. For the price, you can't beat it! Shower was a little dated, but I did like that the vanity was outside the toilet/shower room (made for getting ready for the park easy!) We will definitely be staying again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your awesome review of the Castle Inn & Suites in Anaheim!  We are happy to see that you really enjoyed your stay at the hotel.  All of the rooms in the hotel feature a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and a hair dryer.  We want our guests to be as comfortable as possible.  The hotel has a great location, just a 5 to 7 minute walk from the Castle to the entrance.  When you consider the free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi in the room, and No Resort Fees, you definitely can't beat the value for the price!  The Castle Inn & Suites was designed with families in mind.  The sink outside of the bathroom definitely helps to get everyone ready and out the door, on their way to Disneyland as quickly as possible.  We are already looking forward to your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: Nice, helpful workers and pretty and comfortable hotel.
Summary: Had a great experience at this hotel. Everyone who worked there was super nice and helpful. The hotel was very pretty, the rooms were very comfortable (loved the beds). They also had a very nice pool and jacuzzi which is super fun!
Manager Response: AlejandraaX3624NX, we are so happy to hear you had a wonderful stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are very fortunate to have the best staff in town.  From the front desk, to the housekeeping and maintenance departments, everyone here is part of a family that truly cares about our guests and our hotel.  We appreciate your compliments about the appearance and the cleanliness of the hotel as well, we are always working to maintain and improve the property.  After a long hot day walking around the Disneyland parks, a swim to cool off or a nice long soak in the hot tub to soothe aching muscles is just what the doctor ordered.  The Castle Inn & Suites is one of the only hotels to still offer free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi in the room (fast enough to stream movies) and to also Not charge a Resort Fee.  All of these savings leave room in the budget for those Disney Souvenirs that are so important to families going to the parks.  We hope you will remember to come back and visit your kingdom the next time you visit Disneyland.  We are looking forward!

Summary: We had a great experience staying here during our August visit. Staff was very helpful and accommodating, and always had a smile on their face. Great location to Disneyland and many nearby stores and restaurants to walk to. The best part was their great pricing for a hotel so close to the park. Highly recommend to anyone on a budget, yet enjoys a great location and staff.
Manager Response: tnC8551XL, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay with us and we appreciate the compliments to our friendly staff.  The location of the hotel is one of the best in the city!  Right across the street from the Disneyland theme parks, within about a 5 to 7 minute walk to the entrance of both parks.  Also, within walking distance to the Downtown Disney Shopping center, the Gardenwalk shopping center, and all of the great restaurants the resort area has to offer.  As one of the only hotels across the street from the Disneyland Resort to offer free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi in the room, and No Resort Fees, there is truly not a better value in the city.  We genuinely appreciate your kind words about the front desk staff, we will always make our guests our top priority.  We hope the next time you come to town, you come back and see us again at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary Heading: A lot more like a motel than a hotel. Great location - wish it had better soundproofing.
Summary: Every time I come to Disneyland I stay at another hotel in search of the of the one I want to return to. While this spot was perfectly adequate... I'm going to need to keep searching. The most important thing to note is it's a lot more like a motel than a hotel. A previous reviewer said it's key to be honest about your expectations and if you are used to chain hotels or better, this likely won't cut it for you. If you're a budget traveler who doesn't mind a lack of frills, this is perfectly fine.  The good: the best part about this hotel is its location, 100 percent.  It is a short walk to Disneyland (8-10 minutes) and the importance of its proximity cannot be understated. It is also a half-block away from Walgreens, a very well-stocked CVS and a Starbucks: big plusses. Free
Manager Response: KazSeattle, thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Our hotel has been welcoming guests to the Disneyland Resort area for over 30 years, and for the most part our guests have a perfectly lovely experience.  We aim to provide our guests with the most value for their dollar that we possibly can.  When the hotel was constructed, it was designed to look like a Castle and therefore we have exterior corridors.  We understand that not every guest will find the hotel to be there home away from home, but we are glad to hear that overall you enjoyed the stay.  Most hotels across the street from the Disneyland Resort will be full of families who have children that are excited to go to Disneyland in the morning, and return to the hotel late in the evening.  If there is ever a concern about excessive noise, just contact the front desk and we will have our staff look into the matter right away.  During these challenging times, we are making every effort to keep our staff and our guests as safe as possible, this includes eliminating the touch point of housekeeping service on a daily basis.  We wish you all the success and happiness as you continue your journey to find the perfect hotel.  Thank you for staying with us along the way.

Summary: We stayed here for a Disneyland trip. Great location, close to stores and restaurants and a quick walk to Disney. The pool was great and the staff always went above and beyond for us! Will stay here again for our next trip!
Manager Response: TracymX7199LY, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay with us and we appreciate the compliments to our friendly staff.  The location of the hotel is one of the best in the city!  Right across the street from the Disneyland theme parks, within about a 5 to 7 minute walk to the entrance of both parks.  Also within walking distance to the Downtown Disney Shopping center, the Gardenwalk shopping center, and all of the great restaurants the resort area has to offer.  There is nothing like a cool dip in the pool or a relaxing soak in the hot tub after a long day walking around the Disneyland parks.  Our team members will always try to make each guest have a memorable and enjoyable experience when staying here.  We are glad to hear you plan to come back, we will be here waiting to help in any way we can.  Thank you

Summary Heading: My favorite and go-to place to stay!
Summary: While looking for hotels near Disneyland late last year for an anniversary trip, I came across this one and did some more research on it and it fit all of my requirements, based off of the website alone! I decided to book a room and stay in one early Feburary of this year and absolutely fell in love. Easy and accessable parking, cozy yet spacious rooms,7 minute walk from the parks, friendly and welcoming staff, and most importantly, I felt 100% safe. This is a mostly outdoor hotel, however, I wasn't nervous about my door locks, or even just walking around. There was always an employee in sight, even if they were far away and each one of them were so incredibly kind. With being a "new" adult, I've been having trouble finding secure locations to stay at but this one was no trouble
Manager Response: Parktravler3, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay with us and we appreciate the compliments to our friendly staff.  The location of the hotel is one of the best in the city!  Right across the street from the Disneyland theme parks, within about a 5 to 7 minute walk to the entrance of both parks.  Also within walking distance to the Downtown Disney Shopping center, the Gardenwalk shopping center, and all of the great restaurants the resort area has to offer.  When you throw in free parking, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there truly is not better value to be found in the entire Disneyland Resort. On top of all this, the hotel is very fortunate to have a team that cares about the property, and especially about the guests.  We are humbled to hear we are your favorite and go-to place to stay!  We couldn't ask for a higher compliment.  We are looking forward to seeing you again, we hope it is very soon!

Summary Heading: Really nice stay at an old favorite
Summary: Have stayed here numerous times before.  They certainly used the closure during the pandemic to refresh the place. New paint inside and out.  New carpet.  Maybe new fixtures.  Very comfortable stay at an old friend.
Manager Response: L9123GGjeffn, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay with us and we are so grateful to have our past guests coming back to stay with us again.  Things are finally starting to feel almost normal again.  The location of the hotel is one of the best in the city!  Right across the street from the Disneyland theme parks, within about a 5 to 7 minute walk to the entrance of both parks.  Also within walking distance to the Downtown Disney Shopping center, the Gardenwalk shopping center, and all of the great restaurants the resort area has to offer.  We try to take advantage of every opportunity to maintain and improve the property, our housekeeping and maintenance staff is glad you noticed!  We will keep up the hotel, you just keep coming back to see us again!

Summary: Great hotel! Friendly staff and clean rooms. Close walk to Disneyland resort (about 7 minutes). My only issue was since I have low vision (legally blind), I found the room to be dark. This isn’t a deal breaker and I would stay here again.
Manager Response: AmberD1772, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay with us and we appreciate the compliments to our friendly staff.  The location of the hotel is one of the best in the city!  Right across the street from the Disneyland theme parks, within about a 5 to 7 minute walk to the entrance of both parks.  Also within walking distance to the Downtown Disney Shopping center, the Gardenwalk shopping center, and all of the great restaurants the resort area has to offer.  Regarding the room, if there is ever something we can do to improve your stay, please do not hesitate to contact the front desk.  Perhaps a new location that had more natural light, or an additional lamp could make all the difference for you.  We are here to help in any way we can.  We look forward to the next time you will come back to stay with us again!

Summary: Overall good experience. We didn't spend much time in our room except to sleep as we were in the parks all day. The only downside to this hotel is housekeeping wasn't working a normal schedule so we had to ask for new towels from the front desk several times and had an excess of trash piling up near the end of our stay. However, these were just minor issues and didn't knock our overall experience. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  The Castle Inn & Suites is one of the best choices for families and groups of all sizes when visiting the Disneyland Parks.
