Our staff is always focused on providing the guests with a safe, clean, and comfortable place to stay when visiting the Disneyland Resort area.  During the current health pandemic, the health of our employees and our guests is paramount.  As such, the housekeeping staff will service and sanitize all rooms after check-out.  However, our staff is available to deliver any items requested for the room such as towels, soap, shampoo, etc.  We can also arrange to have the used towels, or the trash picked up during your stay so the items do not pile up in the room.  The hotel has staff on site 24 hours per day and we are happy to coordinate a delivery or pick up for whatever time is convenient for our guests.  We are glad you still had a great time when you came to visit, and we hope you come back and see us again very soon!

Summary: I stayed here with a friend to take a weekend trip to Disney, and I was so happy with the accommodations! It’s only about a 10 minute walk to the park from the hotel, everything was clean, and the staff were so kind and helpful. Plenty of parking at all times of day with tons to see and eat just walking distance away. I highly recommend for families or friends needing a quick distance to the parks!
Manager Response: Mahoogan, thank you for the wonderful review of your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We really appreciate you taking the time to write about your amazing experience at the hotel.  Our staff is genuinely grateful for the compliments, we have always made our guests the priority, and we will continue to provide the excellent service you have come to expect from us.  The hotel keeps a limit of one vehicle per registered room, this way we can provide enough spaces for all of our guests and do so free of charge!  Each room features a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and a hair dryer.  This helps to provide our guests with a very comfortable stay.  We hope we will become your home away from home whenever you are in town to visit the Disneyland Resort area.  Take care and we will see you soon!

Summary Heading: Location is great for Disney Land
Summary: Walking distance from Disney Land. Older hotel but very clean and good customer service. Price was decent as well……… Apparently trip advisor wants me to use 200 characters to say what I just said in 18. So, here is some more. I didn’t know this was going to be a homework assignment. The hotel gets a much better rating than trip advisor. If you want more people to use your service don’t be some damn picky.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review.  We were unaware of a minimum number of characters required for a review.  The first couple of sentences were very efficient and we appreciate all of your kind words.  The hotel has been welcoming guests for just over 30 years, and our staff is always trying to make sure to keep up the Castle to the standards our guests expect.  When you throw in free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, the price is even more attractive!  We are very thankful to you for the compliments on the customer service you experienced, and we hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: My wife and I took our 3.5yo to Disneyland for two days and stayed here. It’s nothing extravagant, but it is very clean, very quiet, and the staff was great. It’s about a 15 minute walk to Disneyland and we loved staying here!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review of your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We aim to provide our guests with the best value and the most comfortable, pleasant experience we can.  We are very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, and we appreciate the compliments to the staff.  The walk to the parks is super convenient, and when you throw in free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, it is the best option for any guest visiting the Disneyland resort area.  The Castle theme is perfect for families, especially with children.  We are already looking forward to your next visit, hope you are too!

Summary: Our family of 3 stayed there July 23rd- July 27th and we have zero complains! This hotel is just 2 short stoplights to the disneyland entrance. It has a walgreens, CVS, Starbucks, 7/11, ihop and soooo much more within walking distance. We literally walked all 3 park days to and from the hotel. There is no room service because of covid (literally majority of hotels are like this right now) BUT if you need absolutely ANYTHING they will bring it to your room so quickly. The hotel employees are all sooo kind and so very helpful. They made us feel at home. We cannot wait for our next trip, we will definitely be staying here again and we will be telling everyone about it as well. Thank you castle-inn for giving us such a great experience 🏰 🤍
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We love the Castle emoji with the heart!  All of our staff is sincerely grateful for your compliments, and we are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  The location of the hotel just can't be beat.  We are right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort area.  Everything is within walking distance.  Of course, the entrances of both Disneyland and California Adventure are close, but also things like the Gardenwalk Shopping Center, the Convention Center, a Movie Theater, Bowling Alley, Downtown Disney, and all of the restaurants and shopping opportunities as well!  It warms our hearts to hear we made you feel at home, we hope to become your favorite place to stay when you visit the parks.  We will always treat you like royalty at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: We've stayed here several times. We usually get a 2 Queen Room for a good price. Once you've stayed there, you can participate in their loyalty program for even better rates. They also have free parking and everyone is so friendly and helpful. Less than a ten minute walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Pxydst55, we thank you for your kind review of your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We definitely try to reward our guests who have stayed with us for coming back and staying with us again.  We like to think of the Castle as our guests' home away from home.  We are one of the only hotels located across the street from the Disneyland Resort to offer free parking for one vehicle per registered room, free Wi Fi, and to not charge a Resort Fee.  It is truly the best value of any hotel choices in Anaheim.  We are lucky to have a great team that is always waiting to provide the best service they can.  We hope you will continue to come back and visit us in the future!

Summary: We made reservations here due to pricing and location to Disneyland.  What we loved about it was the extremely friendly and courteous staff.  They were quick to explain how to get to the park and the restaurants around us.  Their gift shop did not survive the Pandemic, however no loss ( would be a great location for a coffee shop, just a hint). Anything we needed they had and brought it to the room promptly.  We did not use the pool so can only state it seemed small otherwise it was kept clean.  They had a laundry room by the pool.  We had n awesome stay and would book there again.
Manager Response: Ruth Ann, thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so glad to see that you had an awesome stay with us and we can't wait to see you again!  Our front desk staff is very grateful for your kind words, we work hard to make sure to provide all of our guests with a positive experience.  We are hoping to find the right fit for a new business to occupy the space where the gift shop used to be.  During this time, there are many other options within walking distance of the hotel.  There is a 7-11, Walgreens, CVS, Starbucks, and a Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf all within less than 5 minutes walk from the hotel.  When you include the free parking, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fee, there is no better value in the area!  We hope the next stay is even better than the last one!

Summary: This was a perfect location for our Disneyland visit. Lots of restaurants etc within walking distance and Disneyland is across the street so no need for shuttles. The family suite was perfect - allowed our daughter to sleep in while we got up and had coffee etc. The rooms aren’t super fancy but clean and have everything you need and most importantly, the beds were comfortable, we weren’t bothered by noise and the A/C worked well. If you’re looking for a resort with lots of activities this is probably not the one for you, but if you’re looking for a place to rest in between days at Disneyland it’s perfect. Also, we wanted to use our last day at Disneyland until 2pm but checkout is at 11 - they were great about letting us keep our car parked there until we were ready to leave (lot
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review of your stay with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We really appreciate the 5 out of 5 score, and to hear that we were a perfect location for your Disneyland visit.  The hotel is right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort area, within walking distance to everything the area has to offer.  From entertainment options like Disneyland and California Adventures, bowling alleys, a movie theater, the House of Blues, and so much more.  Also as mentioned there are many restaurants in the area, from a single slice of pizza to go to fine dining.  The Family Suite is definitely the most comfortable way for a guest to enjoy the hotel.  With one King bed in the front area and two Queen beds in the back, there is plenty of space to spread out.  As mentioned, the door between the rooms provides some privacy to guests can get up earlier or stay up later without disturbing the rest of the party.  We are not always able to accommodate vehicles after check-out time, but when we can, we do.  We are glad to hear this put the finishing touches on your stay.  The hotel always offers free parking for one vehicle on the nights of the reservation, free Wi Fi in the rooms, and we do not charge a resort fee.  We hope the next time you come to town, you will come back to see us again at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: We got the family suite (4 adults and one kid) everything was perfect for our plan, we just wanted a close hotel to Disneyland as we planned to spend most of our day there, super friendly staff very basic hotel but you can't beat distance and overall price no breakfast but free parking with security included, will definitely use it in the future.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  We really appreciate all of the kind words, especially about the staff.  We have always focused on our customer service, and it is great to hear we were able to meet or exceed your expectations!  As mentioned in the review, the hotel is in a great location.  Not only walking distance to the entrance of the Disneyland theme parks, but also the Gardenwalk shopping center, the Anaheim Convention Center, Downtown Disney, and all of the great restaurants the Disneyland Resort has to offer.  When you have a refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker in the room, there are a lot of opportunities to bring in any breakfast items.  In place of providing a continental breakfast, we have found that guests appreciate the free Parking, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees even more.  Thanks again for the great review, we hope we will become your favorite hotel to visit when you come to Disneyland!

Summary: We just got done spending 4 nights and I would not stay here again ! Thought my kids would be enamored with decor and castle theme but they werent impressed 🤪Room was old and dingy very outdated , the smell that came out of the drains was terrible , and the fridge was not cold and top rack was warm and ruined most of the food we planned to bring beyond frustrating  ! The beds felt old and could hear every spring and blankets were thin and old , shower curtain allowed tons of water out of shower and when you enter room they have only one regular coffee available and two bath towels so you immediately have to ask for supplies wasn’t impressed with staff either , check in process was different than most hotels and long but the clerk at check in was condescending when asked
Manager Response: Ashley H, while we are also disappointed to hear you did not have a great experience at the Castle Inn & Suites, we appreciate the feedback.  The hotel will use this as an opportunity to improve the overall experience for our future guests.   We would have appreciated an opportunity to address any or all of your concerns during the time you were staying with us.  Our staff works diligently every day to provide each of our guests with a positive experience, we are sure we could have helped improve your stay.  Each room is furnished with 4 sets of towels, though two of them are folded on a towel rack near the sink and two others are inside of the restroom.  In the past some of our guests only notice one of the areas or the other.  We are more than happy to deliver any items to the room that a guest may need such as extra towels, blankets, coffee, or any of the other in-room amenities.  The front desk is available 24 hours per day to help guests with any concerns.  One solution may have been to move to another location so we could have our maintenance and housekeeping staff enter the room to fix the issues you have reported.  We can help to coordinate the move at any time that may be convenient for the guest.  If we are made aware in the morning, we could set aside a new room that will be ready for you when you return to the hotel.  Even if it is late in the evening, the room will be ready and waiting for you.  While we understand you could have had a better experience, we hope you will understand that this was an anomaly, not the normal experience that our guests have.  We hope that you change your mind and decide to give the hotel another opportunity to provide you with a better experience in the future.  Our friendly staff will be waiting to welcome you back if you do!

Summary: I took this hotel for its cool looking castle theme but in the end except for the cool exteriors and the reception, the rest didn’t have much of a castle feeling unfortunately. The good point is that it’s right next to Disneyland so that is super practical!
Manager Response: Rafaelshumy, thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We think there are all kinds of things that make this hotel special.  The exterior of the hotel is shaped like a castle, and the theme is carried throughout the property.  There are gargoyles with eyes that light up, a stained-glass window with a knight fighting a dragon, a suit of armor, and all kinds of little touches that help this property stand out from the other square buildings on the street.  The interior of the rooms are not like one would find in a real castle, they would be to cold, there would be no amenities, and most likely no restroom.  Instead our hotel rooms are furnished with rich fabrics and dark furniture to provide the feel of a castle, yet with modern amenities.  Each room features a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker and a hair dryer.  When you include the free parking, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there is really no better value to be had near the Disneyland Resort.  We hope the next time you come back to visit, you will come and stay with us again and rediscover all of the things that make the Castle Inn & Suites unique!

Summary Heading: Absolutely perfect for our family of 4!
Summary: We booked two nights in a family suite with the sole purpose of visiting Disney. The staff were all incredibly friendly and the room was just what we needed. The kids (9 and 5) were in the back and had their own tv to watch cartoons when they inevitably woke up before us and we had our own so we could stay up later and not bother them.   The pool and two hot tubs were fantastic. We also utilized the guest laundry to dry our swim things so that we weren't traveling with wet clothes.   It was a short walk (10-15 minutes?) to Disney and also many restaurants close by.  At checkout I mentioned how we were going to the park for our last day and the manager told me since they weren't full we could leave our car in the lot.  It was incredibly kind and unexpected, and also greatly
Manager Response: Thanks for the fantastic review about your experience here at the Castle Inn & Suites!  Timing is everything, especially in the hotel industry, we are not always able to accommodate vehicles after guests check out as we may need the space for guests who are arriving that day.  However, when we anticipate having some extra space, we are happy to allow guests to keep the vehicle on property.  An empty parking lot doesn't do any of us any good.  The pool is definitely a bonus when visiting Disneyland. After a long day at the parks, guests can relax and cool off in the pool, soothe aching muscles in the hot tub, or use the children's wading pool if you have small children.  The Family Suite is the most comfortable way to stay, with 1 king bed and 2 queen size beds, there is plenty of space for the whole family to spread out.  As mentioned there are two televisions, one in each area.  The room also features a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker and a hair dryer.  Our friendly staff will be here waiting to help you again the next time you stay.  We hope it is very soon!

Summary: Room was good, very clean,  and staff was very friendly and eager to assist us. Walk was nice and not long at all. We were 4 women and felt very safe walking back and forth to Disneyland night and day!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so happy to hear you and your party loved your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We aim to provide all of our guests with a safe, clean, and comfortable place to stay when visiting the Disneyland area.  The area is very safe, well lit, and there are always people walking up and down the streets.  With a location so close to the entrance of the Disneyland theme parks, it makes it easy for guests to come and go from the parks and take breaks in the middle of the day if they choose.  Our staff is thankful for the kind words, we work hard to provide the best possible service for our guests, it makes it easy when we have such happy guests staying with us.  We hope you plan to come back to stay with us again soon!

Summary: Great room, very clean but they don’t do daily room cleaning due to Covid. Not a problem really but just don’t expect it. This is the second time we’ve stayed here and it’s really close to Disneyland which makes it a quick 7-10 minute walk which is great.
Manager Response: Sherpa, thank you for your review of the Castle Inn & Suites.  The health and safety of our staff and our guests is our highest priority.  As such, we have limited the contact point between the staff and the guests by having our housekeeping staff clean and sanitize the rooms only after each guest checks out.  However, our staff is available to deliver towels and toiletries to the room, or to pick up any used towels and trash from the room during your stay.  We are so happy to have you back at the hotel for a second time.  With the location, free parking, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, the Castle Inn & Suites is a great option for all families visiting Disneyland.  We really appreciate your review, and we hope you come back to stay with us very soon!

Summary Heading: What a Great Start to Our Vacation.
Summary: Walking up to the hotel I was pleasantly surprised by the stained glass windows and the overall appearance of the hotel. It isn’t a 5 star resort but as far as a hotel near Disneyland goes, it was perfect.  Now as far as the staff goes…they are the reason that this location gets 5 stars. We got there early after a long morning of travel (plane, train, and bus). We got there expecting to be allowed to drop off our luggage (something they will do if your room isn’t ready) but even though we were hours early, they allowed us to check in. They said they had a room ready so if we wanted to, we could check in. This was extremely nice and made the beginning of our vacation wonderful. Do not expect this to be normal as it could have been very lucky but the mere allowance of doing it was
Manager Response: Princepaprika, there is no better place for a "Prince" to stay than in a Castle!  Thank you for noticing the stained glass windows, the main one lights up in the evening and really helps bring the Castle to life.  Our staff thanks you for giving us the 5 out of 5 score.  The entire team at the hotel is truly what makes the Castle Inn & Suites different from any other hotel in the area.  All of the efforts from our staff are what provide our guests with the unique and positive experiences each and every day.  This is the magic of the hospitality industry.  While we are not able to offer all of our guests an early check in, when it is available, we are happy to allow guests to get into the room early.  We know that some guests travel from a long distance and may have been up for hours before they arrive to the hotel.  We are happy to hear this made the difference in your vacation, and we hope you come back and stay with us again soon!

Summary: I chose this place since it was the first time both of my kids would be doing a 2 day trip to California Adventure and Disneyland. The walk to and from the theme parks was a breeze. My kids didn't complain about the walk at the end of the night either. The staff is phenomenal. They are so kind and helpful. We were able to park early so we could walk to the park and not have to pay for parking. We received a free upgrade as well, which made a big difference for us. The room was nice and we were unable to hear anyone from other rooms. We stayed in the 2 bedroom suite and we couldn't hear the other room once the door was closed. Did I mention they don't charge for parking?!? One of the main reasons I chose this place to begin with. My kids and I will definitely be staying here for
Manager Response: Suzanne H., thank you for your kind review of your stay with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  It is great to hear you and your two kids had a great time at the hotel.  The two bedroom Family Suite is definitely the most comfortable way for a family to stay with us.  With one king size bed in the front area, then 2 queen size beds in the back, there is plenty of space for everyone to spread out and sleep comfortably.  They also have 2 televisions, which can really come in handy when different members of the family want to watch different programs.  Our staff genuinely appreciates your compliments.  We work hard to provide all of our guests with a great experience; we love to hear we did not disappoint.  The Castle Inn & Suites is one of the only properties within walking distance to offer free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi, and to not charge a Resort Fee.  These added values really separate the Castle from other options in the area.  We are glad to hear you and the kids will be back for a future stay with us, we hope to see you very soon!

Summary: We have now been to several hotels in the area, this one by far has been the best. No intrusions from staff. Staff very friendly when associating with the family. I will say this will more than likely be our first draft pick on the next visit.Fantastic job all around!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the 5 out of 5 review of your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so happy to hear you have found the best hotel for you and your family when visiting the Disneyland Resort area!  Our staff is very appreciative of your compliments, we will continue to do our best to provide you the service you have come to expect when staying with us.  As one of the only hotels across the street from the Disneyland Resort to offer free parking, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there truly is no better value to be found.  We are proud to be your first round draft pick for your next Disneyland Vacation!  We hope to see you soon!

Summary: This hotel is at a great location! Close to 7 Eleven, CVS, and Walgreens and a short walk to the parks. The castle theme is fun and staff takes extra precautions to sanitize and provide hand sanitizer. I will definitely make this hotel my go-to every time I go to the parks.
Manager Response: SarahM11327, thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your visit to the hotel!  The health and safety of our guests and our staff is our paramount during these challenging times.  All of our staff are provided with proper PPE, we use hospital grade chemicals to clean the rooms, there are hand sanitizer stations throughout the property, and we are happy to provide a little bottle of hand sanitizer to our guests by request.  The location of the hotel is one of the best in town, right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort area.  Not only are there the convenience stores and pharmacies in walking distance, but also the entrance of both Disneyland and California Adventure, Downtown Disney, the Anaheim Gardenwalk, and the Convention Center.  Nothing could make us happier to hear than you will make us your "go-to" hotel every time!  We are already looking forward to the next visit!

Summary: It was a very cute hotel. A short walk to Disney and a nice hot tub to enjoy after the parks. The rooms were very clean and comfy. I left my wallet after checkout and they contacted me very quickly to come back and get it and everything was there! Very pleased with my experience.
Manager Response: Jaelyn C, thanks for the Awesome Review!  We make every effort to contact our guests when a lost and found item is reported by housekeeping, this way we are able to return the item to the guest before they arrive back home.  There is nothing like a nice soak in the hot tub after a long day at the Disneyland Resort.  With free parking for one vehicle on the nights of the reservation, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there is no better value to be found across from the Disneyland Resort.  Our housekeeping staff appreciates your compliments on the cleanliness of the hotel, we hope the next time you are in town, you will come back to stay with us again too!

Summary: I had never been to California or Disneyland but I knew I wanted a hotel within walking distance of the parks. I also wanted to buy the Disneyland package so I chose one of the suggested hotels, Castle inn and suites. The theming on the outside was very cute and the location was perfect. It is a couple of blocks from the entrance to the parks, near many different restaurants, and has a Walgreens and Starbucks right on the corner. Check in was a breeze and everyone that we dealt with was very friendly. The room is dated but it had a bit of nostalgia to it. We had plenty of space, the room was clean, and the beds were comfortable. We didn't get to use the pool because we did the parks so much, but I saw a lot of families enjoying it. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Angela, thanks for the awesome 5 out of 5 review!  You couldn't have picked a better hotel for your vacation.  The Castle Inn & Suites is located in the middle of all of the action that makes up the Disneyland Resort Area.  From House of Blues, to AMC Movie Theater, the Disneyland and California Adventure theme parks, the Gardenwalk Shopping Center, Downtown Disneyland, or the Anaheim Convention Center, everything is within walking distance.  We thank you for the compliments, we want to make our guest experience as smooth and easy as possible.  The rooms were designed to evoke a feeling of being in a castle, with darker wood furniture and rich colored fabrics.  The rooms are very spacious and each one comes with a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker and a hair dryer.  The pool is heated and open from 8:00AM to 10:00PM every day.  There is a hot tub, a swimming pool, and a children's wading pool for small children as well.  Our friendly staff will be here to help you the next time you are in town.  Hopefully you make a second trip to California and Disneyland very soon!

Summary: This is a great option near Disneyland! It was clean and the service was excellent! The standard 2 queen room is spacious and includes a small fridge which is a huge plus for water bottles and snacks. The hotel is a short walk to Disneyland as well as CVS and parking was convenient. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.   Our housekeeping staff is very grateful for your compliments, we are always working to make sure our guests have a clean and comfortable place to sleep when staying with us.  Every room in the hotel has a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker and a hair dryer.  We also include free parking for one vehicle per registered room on the nights of the reservation, free Wi Fi in the room, and we do not charge a resort fee!  Our service for our guests is one of the things that sets us apart, we make the guest the priority in every situation.  We are happy to hear you will come and stay with us again, we hope it is very soon!

Summary: Booked a family suite for my kids double graduation trip that we were originally going to take in 2020.  We loved the family suite that gave us 2 bedrooms, ours had a king bed and the kids each had a queen.  Staff was great, very friendly, and they were taking all the necessary steps to stop the spread.  Hotel was very clean, had a nice little pool and hot tub.  Was a 10 minute walk to the parks and right around the corner from the garden walk which also has a bunch of good restaurants to choose from.  Free parking for 1 car and the staff kept the local transient population off the property, which is difficult because they seemed to be everywhere else you went.  If you go up to the 3rd or 4th floors you can see the fireworks from the parks as well.  I don't know when we'll go
Manager Response: Ashley, thank you for the great review!!  We try to carry the theme throughout the property.  From the lobby with a suit of armor and a shield, to the shape of the building, to the fabrics and colors selected for the guest rooms.  It really sets the Castle Inn apart from the other hotels in the area, and makes for a memorable experience for all of our guests.  Our staff has been trained to take all precautions when it comes to keeping everyone safe.  Our staff is so grateful for your kind words.  We have always placed our guests first, and we will continue to strive to meet or exceed your expectations on a future visit.  The location of the hotel is about as good as it gets.  Right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort area.  Within a short walk to the entrance of both Disney parks, the Downtown Disney District, the Anaheim Convention Center, and also the Gardenwalk shopping center.  When you throw in free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there is no better choice in the area.  We have always aimed to provide a safe, clean, and comfortable place for our guests to rest.  We will always be here for you when you decide to return.  Looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Hidden Gem! Short walk to Disneyland! Bring Strollers!
Summary: Just as the title stated, this was the first reaction my daughter gave. It’s a  nice clean, quiet hotel 2 blocks across from Disneyland. Parking is free for guests, they even allowed us to park for free on our checkout day! Our room was a two queen and sofa bed which easily accommodated my whole family and allowed me to sleep in my own bed! That’s 3 beds in one room! This place is a fraction the price of Disneyland hotel! Plenty of food around the corner if you’re up late! Overall very happy with our stay! P.S. bring back the gift shop! My kids are gift shop fanatics! Thanks guys! We will definitely consider this hotel again in the future!!!
Manager Response: BobaFanatics, thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We love that you called us a "Hidden Gem", the hotel is truly the best choice for families visiting the Disneyland Resort area.  Not only within walking distance to the gates of both Disneyland and California Adventures, but also conveniently located within walking distance to all of the shopping opportunities, entertainment options, and great restaurants that are located in and around Disneyland!  The hotel provides free parking for one vehicle per registered room on the nights of the reservation.  While we are not always able to allow guests to leave the vehicle after check-out, when we have the space we are happy to keep the car here.  If we are not able to keep the vehicle here, we do have an alternate parking solution nearby.  We would love to have a new gift shop tenant on property, unfortunately he went out of business during the pandemic.  We hope to find the right fit for the hotel soon.  Nex time you are in town, come back to the hidden gem you have found, we hope to be your new go-to hotel for Disney trips!

Summary: Our room was great. We had a Mini Suite on the 4th floor. The AC was a bit loud and some other loud humming noises were very present until late night. But, the room size and bathroom area was ideal - very spacious for the price. The personnel was excellent. We had a scooter with us - the personnel actually recommended we keep it stored and charged in their lobby (have stayed all up and down Harbor - no other hotel offers this and essentially they are put-out when we ask) and then each morning they pulled it out for us and each evening parked it again to charge overnight. They couldn't have been more kind and accommodating about it. We've stayed here before this last trip and we'll def stay here again. (Also i cannot believe someone gave a poor review because they were so tired
Manager Response: Maps256272, thank you so much for your kind review of the experience you had at the Castle Inn & Suites.  The Executive Suites are a great option for guests.  Located on the front of the property overlooking Harbor Blvd, the layout offers a little more space than the rooms with just 2 queen size beds.  With 2 queen beds plus a sofa bed all in one large, shared space, there is enough space for everyone to spread out.  This room type has a central air conditioning unit, we apologize if they are a little louder than the small wall units in other rooms, but they work very efficiently to cool such a large space.  Our staff has a lot of experience helping guests with mobility scooters, we have found it is much more convenient for our guests to leave them in a dedicated area than to take them into the rooms.  We are so thrilled to hear you received such great service during your stay, and you plan to come back and stay with us again!  We hope you are planning your next visit for a time in the near future!

Summary: This hotel among the closest to the gates, so an instant plus. Their service is also superb. We arrived after midnight and they delivered extra towels as requested. Finally, they offered to let us park at the hotel after checking out since they had the space available. Great value considering the service.
Manager Response: Passenger776725, it is very thoughtful of you to provide a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Our staff is at the front desk 24 hours per day waiting to assist guests.  Even if you arrive after midnight, your reservation is always guaranteed.  We thank you for the compliments on our service, we work hard to provide all of our guests with a great stay!  The location of the hotel is definitely one of the reasons guests choose to stay with us the first time, we hope you will be back to stay with us again and again in the future.  While we are not always able to provide parking after guests check out, the permit usually expires at check out time on the day of departure, when we have the space we are happy to allow the vehicle to remain on property.  As with most things in the hospitality industry, it is based upon availability.  Next time you are in town, we hope you come back and stay with us again!

Summary: When my husband decided to celebrate his 50th birthday at Disneyland, I wanted to find a hotel that would be nice, convenient, and fun. The Castle Inn was all those things, and we had a fantastic stay. The room was clean and very spacious, the staff was helpful, and we were only a short walk (10m) from Disney. The special castle decor fit into our plans perfectly! We definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Jessica, thank you for celebrating your husband's 50th birthday with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We remember when you checked in! We are so happy to hear you both enjoyed your stay at the hotel, your personal recommendation means a lot to us.  We always try to go the extra step to make sure our guests are comfortable and are happy to provide a room in a preferred location when available.  The Castle Inn & Suites is a family owned and family-oriented hotel.  Located right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort, everything you need is within a short walk.  All of the conveniences of shopping, dining, and entertainment right at your doorstep.  Our housekeeping and front desk staff is very thankful for your kind words.  We hope you come back to celebrate with us for your husband's 51st birthday too!

Summary: We have stayed at Castle Inn several times and have always enjoyed our stay. We really like the short walk to the Disney Parks. The staff was friendly and were very prompt with our requests. I will definitely return again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your many visits to the Castle Inn & Suites.  There is nothing that brings us more joy than to see our repeat guests coming back to visit their home away from home.  We are very grateful for your compliments, we make every effort to ensure our guests have a pleasant and memorable experience when they stay with us.  The location is definitely one of the great benefits of staying at our hotel.  Within walking distance to the entrances of the Disneyland parks, the Anaheim Convention Center, Downtown Disney shopping district and also the Gardenwalk shopping center.  When you also throw in free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there is just no better place to stay in the city!  We are looking forward to your next visit already!  Come back to see us soon.

Summary: We had 2 adults and 2 younger children. The Castle Inn and Suites is a little old but don't let that deter you. Our ground floor room was immaculate and easy parking right by our room. The location to Disneyland and "off property" dining is perfect. Cheesecake Factory, IHOP, P.f. chang's, and many other restaurants within 3-5 minute walk. Disneyland was 8 minutes from hotel entrance to front gate. This was really nice after a long day. No bus and no uber. Just a quick walk and we were in our room. We will be staying here again!
Manager Response: Alaskasupercub, thank you for that very honest and straight-forward review!  The Castle Inn & Suites has proudly been providing guests with a safe, clean, and comfortable place to rest for over 30 years.  We are always maintaining and improving the hotel experience for our guests.  From little things like new alarm clocks with built in outlets, to upgrading the Wi Fi in the entire hotel.  Which we still offer to all of our guests free of charge.  Our housekeeping staff is very happy to hear you enjoyed your room!  One thing a hotel can never change is the location, and we wouldn't trade ours for any other.  The perfect hotel location in the middle of the Disneyland Resort District.  Once you park the car, there is no need to drive again until you check out of the hotel.  So many restaurants, stores, and entertainment options are within a 5 to 10 minute walk from the entrance of the hotel.  Great to know you will be back, we can't wait to see you again!

Summary Heading: Castle Inn & Suites Location Location Location
Summary: This was my third stay in a year June 2021, January 2022 and my recent stay was from June 12 thru June 16, 2022. I stayed by myself and I felt very safe during my stay including walking back from the parks at night. Location makes walking to the parks so easy and convenient. Very easy to walk back to the hotel to rest. Reasonable rates especially for the location. The shower pressure was strong and the a/c unit worked quickly and efficiently which helped me cool down after a hot day at the parks. The staff is so friendly and helpful in person and on the phone. Plenty of parking and parking  stalls available for check in.Castle Inn continues to be my go to hotel and I recommend it to my family (who have also stayed there) and friends often.
Manager Response: Teresac02474UO, thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review of your experience here at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so happy to hear that you have found your new home away from home!  The location of the hotel is one of the best features, right across the street from the Disneyland Resort, within walking distance to both Disneyland and California Adventures!  With so many restaurants in walking distance, each visit you can try a new place to eat!  As one of the only hotels to include free parking for one vehicle per registered room, free Wi Fi, and to not charge a Resort Fee, we are proud to say the Castle Inn & Suites is one of the best values in the area!  We hope you come back and see us again 3 more times this year, and many more years to come.  A personal recommendation to your friends and family is the highest compliment we could ask for.  Hope to see you soon!

Summary: This hotel was just what we needed.  The staff was so accommodating and friendly.  No freezer in room but we asked front desk to store for some ice packs for us and they were happy to oblige.  Free parking and 10 min walk to front entrance of Disneyland.
Manager Response: JodiDarling, thank you for the kind review of your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Our friendly staff is always waiting to greet our guests, and to welcome back the familiar faces who have stayed with us in the past.  While the rooms do not have freezers, they do have refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, and hair dryers!  This helps to provide all of our guests with a very comfortable stay when visiting the Disneyland Resort area.  As one of the only hotels within walking distance to the entrance of the Disneyland parks to offer free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi, and to not charge a resort fee, there is truly not a better value to be found anywhere!  We are truly grateful for your compliments to our staff, and we can't wait to have you back at the Castle!

Summary: This was our first time staying at the Castle Inn and Suites and we will definitely be back! We were looking for a two bedroom suite since our kids are getting older and really need their own space while traveling. The family suite provided that. One room had a king bed with the bathroom. The other room was two queen beds with their own sink. Our children had their own bed each! Both rooms had a tv as well. Enough towels where we did not have to ask for more, as the hotel is being cautious still with Covid. The pool and hot tub area was open and so we got to swim the day we arrived. The castle theme even extended to the pool area with two towers that the kids enjoyed climbing up to and pretending to look over their kingdom😂. The walk to Disneyland the next couple of days was
Manager Response: RebeccaMH, thank you for the amazing review you shared about the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so happy to hear your kids have found a kingdom they can call home.  Our hotel has made the health and safety of our guests and our staff the top priority. Though cleanliness was always a focus for our staff, we have now enhanced our cleaning with hospital grade chemicals to sanitize the rooms after each guest checks out, provided additional training to our staff, and personal protective equipment for each of our employees to help keep everyone as safe as possible.  Our Castle theme extends throughout the property, including the pool area, the gargoyles throughout the property, the shields and even a full size suit of armor in the lobby!  We want all of our guests to feel like royalty when they are staying at the Castle Inn & Suites.  The Family Suite is definitely the best option for guests looking for a little more space to spread out.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your visit, and we hope you come back to survey your kingdom very soon!  See you in the fall!

Summary: A wonderful location, just in the middle between Disneyland entrance and Anaheim Convention center.  People at front desk are really nice and helpful. Free parking. The hotel is old but with good maintenance. Rooms are clean and comfortable. You have microwave, an small refrigerator, TV , free WiFi and it is located at a walking distance from Ihop, Denny’s, CVS and Wallgreens. Have been there before  and will go again
Manager Response: Crazas, thank you for writing about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your thoughtful and thorough review of the hotel.  It is so wonderful to have our guests returning to the hotel after all this time.  We have been welcoming guests to the hotel for over 30 years now, and we look forward to giving our guests a great experience for many more years to come!  We are very grateful for the staff, from the front desk providing our guests with great customer service to our housekeeping and maintenance taking great care of the property.  We all work together to make sure our guests have the best experience possible.  Every room is complete with all of the amenities mentioned, like a home away from home.  With free parking, free Wi Fi, and NO resort fees, there is truly no better value in the Disneyland area.  We are happy to hear you plan to visit again, we hope it is very soon!

Summary Heading: Great location and great value for money. Clean!
Summary: This hotel is a perfect location if you are in town for a convention or Disneyland. We walked to both very easily. Plenty of stores close by as well. The room was very clean. The staff was excellent and made sure we had everything we needed. If you have chance to stay there you will be happy with your choice
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  You are definitely right about the location, the hotel is perfectly situated between the entrance to the Disneyland theme parks and the Anaheim Convention Center.  We are right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort area.  There are also many shopping opportunities, entertainment options, and all of the great restaurants the area has to offer!  As one of the only hotels right across from Disneyland to offer free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there is no better value in the area.  We appreciate your compliments to our housekeeping staff about the cleanliness of your room, we make every effort to ensure our guests have a safe, clean and comfortable place to stay.  Our guests' experience is our top priority.  We hope you have an opportunity to come back and visit us very soon!

Summary: Rooms were clean.  Front desk very helpful and friendly.  I requested a few items to be brought to room and received them immediately.  Outside of hotel very clean.  A quiet and safe place to bring your family.
Manager Response: Lolamaya1969, thank you for the review of your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us!  Our staff has always made customer service and the guest experience a top priority.  We also appreciate you compliments about the cleanliness of the property, our housekeeping and maintenance staff are always working to maintain the standards of the hotel.  Our family friendly hotel is the perfect choice for those guests looking for a safe, clean and comfortable place to stay when visiting the Disneyland parks.  We hope we will become your home away from home when you come to town.  With free parking, free Wi Fi, and no Resort Fees, there is no better value to be found!  Come back and see us again soon!

Summary Heading: Perfect for a family that's going to be at the parks all day
Summary: Exactly what you need... A room that's a five minute walk from Disneyland and Disney California Adventure. Castle motif was nice for the 5 year old who was getting called princess all day. We literally showered and slept there. The water was warm and the rooms were quiet.
Manager Response: Mobile192442, thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We appreciate your compliments to the staff, customer service has always been very important to us.  We are so happy to hear that you and your princess enjoyed your royal vacation here at the hotel.  We hope it is the first of many family vacations to our hotel.  As one of the only hotels to continue to offer free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there is no better value for a family visiting the Disneyland parks.  The rooms all feature refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, and hair dyers as well.  The next time you come out to visit Disneyland, come back and stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Favorite place to stay for Disneyland!
Summary: Castle Inn & Suites is hands down my favorite hotel to stay at when going to Disneyland. The walk from the hotel to Disneyland esplanade is about 7-8 minutes, and this short walk makes all the difference at the end of a long day of walking 20,000+ steps around the parks. The staff is always so kind, professional and accommodating. The rooms have always been clean and well-kept. My main complaint about the rooms is a very limited number of outlets to charge phones. Another amazing thing is that parking is free! Can't recommend staying here enough!
Manager Response: LotusFarmer, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate that you have returned to visit the hotel throughout the years.  The short walk to the parks is one of the great benefits of staying with us, and if you need a break in the middle of the day, the hotel is close enough to come back and take a nap in the middle of the day.  We appreciate the compliments about our customer service, and about our housekeeping staff and the standard of service they provide.  If you have stayed recently, you may have noticed that we have added new alarm clocks in the rooms, which have 2 outlets plus 2 USB ports for guests to charge their phones near the beds.  This creates an additional 4 possible charging stations in one convenient location!  Thank you so much for the praise and the recommendation.   We hope to remain your home away from home when you are visiting the Disneyland Resort.  Looking forward to your next stay!

Summary: The staff at this hotel are very accommodating kind and friendly no matter what time of day or night it is. Marc the manager is great he obviously does a good job managing his staff because Sandy David Adrian and Jose were all amazing, very happy and upbeat!!  I definitely recommend this hotel to anybody with a family to stay  at this hotel they’re great!!
Manager Response: JenmaC67, thank you for your compliments about our staff.  We all very much appreciate the compliments and will make sure to mention your review to those team members who have had such an impact on your stay.  A personal recommendation is the highest compliment we could ask for.  Our focus as a property located across the street from Disneyland is always on the families visiting the parks.  However, we are also a great hotel for the business traveler with one of the fastest Wi Fi networks for hotels in the area.  Throw in free parking for one vehicle per room during the nights of the reservation, and no resort fees, and there is no better value in the area!  We hope you decide to come back and stay with us in the near future.  Thanks again for the great review!

Summary: We stay at Castle Inn and Suites every time we go to Disneyland and we never regret it! They have clean rooms, attentive staff, and NO hidden fees. They’ve helped accommodate our parking requests and consistently give us the best rate while also being a mere 10 minute walk from Disneyland. Highly recommend and we will continue to stay here.
Manager Response: Abbyk635, we love to hear that we are your preferred hotel to stay at when visiting the Disneyland Resort.  Our priority is always to provide our guests a safe clean, and comfortable place to rest.  Especially after those long 12 to 15 hour days at the parks, it is ideal to be close enough to get back to your hotel and rest up for the next day!  We always go the extra mile for our guests, and we accommodate requests whenever we can.  Generally we have to limit the parking to one vehicle per registered room, during the nights of the reservation.  Parking prior to arrival or after check out is subject to availability on the day of arrival.  We always provide our best available rate to our repeat guests, once you have developed a profile in our system, you now become part of a special group of people who get special pricing.  As each room features a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and hair dryer, it is like having a home away from home when visiting the Disneyland parks.  We are already looking forward to your next visit, we can't wait to see you again!

Summary Heading: Great low cost option. When visiting Disney Land
Summary: My wife and I decided we wanted to go to Disney. So we invited two other couples. We all shared one room and really liked the simplicity of the place. Its walking distance to many shops and restaurants. More importantly walking distance to Disneyland. The staff was very nice and the rooms clean. When we stayed (May1-4th) parking was very open and the elevator to our room was very helpful since we were on the 4th floor. Would definitely recommend, if you are going to the Disney parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  The location of the hotel is one of the best in town.  Right across the street from the Disneyland Resort, within a 5 to 7 minute walk to the gates of both theme parks.  We do try to keep it simple, we only charge our guests for the room they rent.  There are no Resort Fees, we provide free parking for one vehicle during the nights of the stay, and free Wi Fi in the rooms.  Our team of front desk and housekeeping staff is very appreciative of your compliments.  You picked a great time to visit, May is a beautiful time of year.  We usually have to keep a limit of one vehicle per room during times of high occupancy, and beginning on May the 4th, that was when the lot became full.  The location of the hotel is not just great for Disneyland.  We are also located within walking distance to the Anaheim Convention Center, the House of Blues, the Gardenwalk and Downtown Disney Shopping Centers, and within a short drive from the Anaheim Stadium and the Honda Center.  We hope you come back to Anaheim in the near future, and when you do, come back and see us again!

Summary: We stayed in 2 rooms with family members  next door, on April 25-29, 2022. What a perfect find! Within walking distance to Disneyland, even close enough for an afternoon rest. Very clean which is really important to us, even before Covid. It was quiet and felt safe. Our family members returned late one night and we were anticipating them but never heard a thing. If you need anything, staff is very helpful. We liked the "no housekeeping unless you need something policy." Did I say how clean it was? Also could park our car, complimentary throughout our stay. Lots of hotels now charge customers to park when they are renting a room! Only downside was the dark decor, but then I realized we have been in real castles in Europe, and they are often quite dark in the decor department too.
Manager Response: Slomamax2, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn  & Suites.  We are so happy that you found us!  If you are able to come back and stay with us again, contact the hotel directly and we will make sure to give you the best available rate.  As a family oriented hotel across the street from Disneyland, our focus is always on our guest's experience.  Our staff has made an extra effort to clean rooms to a higher standard.  The housekeeping department is very grateful for your compliments.  We are one of the only hotels across the street from Disneyland to continue to offer free parking for one vehicle per room, free WiFi, and to not charge a Resort Fee.  When designing the rooms, we did lean toward the darker furniture and richer colors in order to mimic the style of European castles.  Thank you so much for the recommendations, we hope we will see you very soon!

Summary: We stayed here 10 nights while visiting Disneyland and Knott’s Berry Farm. The location is FABULOUS!!!! Walk in to Disney was about 8 minutes. Front desk personnel were always very friendly and helpful. This is now our permanent hotel when visiting Disneyland or Knott’s.
Manager Response: Thanks for the 5 out of 5 review!! Nothing could make us happier than to hear you have found your home away from home while coming to visit the happiest place on earth.  We agree about the location, walking distance to all of the great things the Disneyland Resort has to offer.  From theme parks, to Downtown Disney, to the Gardenwalk shopping center and all of the restaurants and stores located in the Disneyland Resort area.  We all are sincerely grateful for your compliments.  We always make our guests our top priority.  With free parking for one vehicle per room on the nights of the reservation, free Wi Fi in the room, and No Resort Fee, there is no better value in the city!  We hope you come back for another visit in the near future!  See you real soon!

Summary: We were very happy with our 6 night stay in a family suite and will definitely be back. It was very nice to have the  extra sink/vanity area in the 2nd bedroom of the family suite.   The rooms were very clean, the beds and pillows were comfortable and service was outstanding. The couple of times when I requested more towels, they showed up almost immediately with them. Everyone we encountered was very friendly and helpful.   Easy walking distance to Disneyland, restaurants and convenience stores.
Manager Response: LvAdv, thank you for the great review!  The Family Suite is definitely the way to go when you have a larger family or are staying for an extended time.  With one king bed in the front, two queen beds in the back, and a door to separate the two areas, it really provides plenty of space for guests to spread out.  Having 2 televisions, one in each area, can also be a big benefit.  As mentioned the room layout is very convenient when everyone is trying to get ready for Disneyland.  A full bathroom, then a separate vanity area with a sink and mirror allows some guests to shave, brush their teeth, put on makeup, et cetera while the bathroom can be used for a shower.  Our housekeeping staff appreciates your compliments on the cleanliness of the room and the quick delivery of requested items.  Our front office staff is also grateful for your kind words.  We love having guests back in the hotel and we want to provide the best service we can.  We are so happy to hear you will definitely be back.  Hopefully it is very soon!

Summary: Really well placed for visit to Disneyland and served our purpose well for 3 night stay. About a 5 minute walk from the gates of Disneyland and plenty of eateries are close by for breakfast, an evening meal or a snack to go. Rooms well sized, with tv, air conditioning and bathroom.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your visit to the hotel!  The location of the property is definitely one of the best in the Disneyland Resort area.  As mentioned, about a 5 minute walk to the Disneyland parks, also within walking distance to the Anaheim Convention Center, and all of the shopping and dining opportunities the area has to offer.  All of the rooms on property also feature a refrigerator, microwave, and a coffee maker.  We hope you come back to visit the hotel very soon.  Your royal welcome will be waiting for you!

Summary: Once again the Castle Inn and Suites has outdone themselves with customer service and comfort. We always feel so at home there. We know whatever we need will be taken care of promptly. Everyone there is courteous, friendly, helpful, and efficient. Next year will be our 10th year staying there. I can't imagine ever staying anywhere else when we visit Disney!
Manager Response: HollyD153, thank you for your many visits to the Castle Inn & Suites, and for sharing your story.  The highest compliment we could ask for is our guests coming back to stay with us year after year.  We are so happy to be your home away from home, and you are welcome any time.  The staff is genuinely thankful for the compliments, we always make our guests the top priority, and we will continue to try to provide you the service you have come to expect from us.  We are already looking forward to your 10th year, and we hope to have many more to come!

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay for Disney Vacation
Summary: Great place to stay. The only reason I don’t give it 5 stars is the air conditioner unit in 422 is very loud at times and did wake me up a few times every night. They don’t offer breakfast, but I knew that up front. I also appreciate the letter they issue upon check in stating their cleaning policy. If you need items for your room you can pick them up at the front desk. The room is clean, great pillows. They also have pool and hot tub. Room has hair dryer, microwave and fridge.  This motel is close to the Disney Parks. Only have to cross the street twice to get to the park. Friendly and helpful staff. I will recommend this place to others and likely be back for my next Disney Trip.
Manager Response: Tee04, thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites in Anaheim!   We are glad to see that you enjoyed your visit.  We hope you come back to stay with us again very soon.  For any issue you experience please just let us know, and we will find a solution.  We have had our maintenance team check into the report regarding the noise, and we appreciate you bringing it to our attention.  We only regret that we were unable to take care of the issue during your visit.  In place of offering a continental breakfast, the hotel provides free parking for one vehicle on the nights of the reservation, free Wi Fi in the room, and we do not charge a Resort Fee like many hotels in the area.  As mentioned, each room includes a refrigerator, microwave, and a coffee maker.  We provide free coffee with the coffee maker in the room and the hotel is surrounded by restaurants.  We appreciate the compliments regarding the cleanliness of the room and the pillows.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Have stayed at Castle Inn the last 5 times we've visited Disneyland and it has been great every stay. Rooms are clean, comfortable and staff is always friendly. To top it off rates are affordable and directly across the street from the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of the Castle Inn & Suites in Anaheim.  We appreciate all of your compliments, and we are so happy to be part of your yearly trip.  We hope we have become your home away from home when you visit Disneyland.  As one of the only hotels across the street from the Disneyland Resort to offer free parking, free Wi Fi, and to not charge any Resort Fees, it is truly one of the best values to be found!  We hope that we will continue to see you here year after year.  Remember, you will always be treated like royalty at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary Heading: Has everything you could need, definitely recommend!
Summary: My sister and I stayed here until Saturday for our birthday California/Disney girl's trip! It was just a block away from Disneyland, so we felt safe walking back late at night as there were other families and Disney staff around. The hotel staff was very kind and knowledgeable, we were given all the information we could need at the beginning. The towels were folded into wonderful animal shapes and the beds were comfy! Rooms were spacious and quiet throughout the night.  When we requested towels, they were delivered right away and by a kind staff member, no matter the time! It was easy to call down to the front desk and ask questions, they were always willing to help. We liked having the sink outside of the bathroom as it made it easier for one of us to do makeup while the other
Manager Response: OGMaggie, thank you for the very thorough review of your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We appreciate all of your kind words about the hotel, and about the staff.  We are so lucky to have such helpful and friendly people that make up our team here.  As you had mentioned, the hotel is in a great location, right across the street from the Disneyland Resort and within walking distance to many shopping and dining opportunities.  On top of being close to the entrance of the parks, the hotel is surrounded by resarants and lots of shopping opportunities.   For more ideas on where to go and what to do, just stop by the front desk and we will be happy to help with suggestions.  There is a House of Blues located at the Gardenwalk that often has concerts, a bowling alley and movie theater are also located in the same shopping center.  The room layout was designed with families in mind, or multiple guests trying to get ready as efficiently as possible.  With an extended counter top and vanity area outside of the bathroom, it allows one person to get ready even if the restroom is occupied.  Our staff is happy to deliver items to the room, or our guests can pick up most of the items from the front desk if it is more convenient.  The restaurants on the corner next door to the hotel are great, and there are even more restaurants at the Gardenwalk shopping center and in Downtown Disneyland.  We are very grateful for your recommendation and we are excited for the next time you come to visit us!

Summary: This was our second stay at Castle Inn and Suites, needless to say we will be back! The beds are so comfortable we sleep like babies!! The location is perfect and only a 10 min walk to Disneyland and a short walk to CVS or Walgreens! The free parking is also a great! They will always be our first choice when planning a trip to Disneyland! Definetly recomand!
Manager Response: JosephcH3377VI, thank you for the great review!  Beds can be tough to get right for every guest, some guests want them a little softer, some like them a little firmer, we are so glad to hear they are perfect for you!  As for the location, we couldn't agree more.  Close enough to walk to both Disney parks, all of the restaurants in the Disneyland Resort area, and the local shopping areas as well.  The hotel is so close, that guests often take a break in the middle of the day to come back and rest up for all of the excitement that happens at night at the parks!  Not only does the hotel include free parking for one vehicle per room on the nights of the reservation, but free Wi Fi, and No Resort fees too!  We are happy to be your first choice when visiting the Disneyland Resort, we hope you come back to see us very soon!

Summary: I love everything about this hotel, the environment, the people, and everything that goes along with it. My boyfriend  I recently starting coming to disneyland more often and our go to is to always stay at Castle inn.
Manager Response: Mackenziecardoza, thank you so much for the kind review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so happy to have you as one of our repeat guests and we hope you come back to see us often.  The hotel location is fantastic, right across the street from the Disneyland Resort, within a 5 to 7 minute walk to both theme park entrances.  With free parking, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there is no better place to stay!  Our staff is what makes the hotel special, without them it would just be another Castle in Anaheim.  We all thank you for your compliments, and we hope you come back to see us very soon!

Summary: In November of 2021 we started planning a Disneyland trip for Christmas as we hadn’t been since before COVID. While looking for a hotel to stay at for the trip, I was focused on two things: cost and distance from the park. We ended up booking a room at Castle Inn & Suites for the first time - and we are glad we did!   The staff is super friendly and always willing to help with whatever you need. I was most impressed the great price for being a quick 10 minute walk to the gates of Disneyland - and that’s with two small kids and pushing a stroller - less than half a mile!   We had such a good trip - the Castle Inn & Suites and Disneyland - that we decided to become Magic Key Holders! They have a discount for Magic Key Holder and a Repeat Guest Discount!   10/10 would recommend!
Manager Response: DisneyMama16, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience here at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so grateful for the 10 out of 10 score and the perfect review.  The Castle Inn & Suites is a great place to visit for a Christmas Disneyland trip.  We are a family-oriented hotel right across the street from the Disneyland Resort.  The hotel offers refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, and hair dryers in every room.  This way our guests have all of the comforts of home while on a trip to the parks.  The location of the hotel is one of the best in Anaheim!  Across from the Disneyland Resort, within a 5 to 7 minute walk, but also within walking distance to all of the restaurants and shopping opportunities that the area has to offer.  We are always happy to extend the Magic Key Holder discount or a Repeat Guest discount to those of our guest who have already stayed with us before.  Now that you will be coming to the parks more often, we hope we will become your home away from home.  Looking forward to seeing you again very soon!

Summary: We did a girls trip April 14-16th, 4 of us with 2 rooms. From the time we arrived to when we left was A+ service. The staff here is just awesome, they try and help you out in every way they can. We arrived early so they checked us in and stored our luggage while we headed to Disney which is a 5-7 minute walk. When we returned that night quick check back for keys and received 2 adjoining rooms. The Inn was quiet at night and rooms were very clean.  The service here made our trip very nice. I would definitely stay here again!! Keep up the awesome service!
Manager Response: Thank you trvldog for a wonderful review!  Our staff is so grateful for your compliments and happy to hear we exceeded expectations with our service.  We definitely make our guests our priority and want to provide everyone with the best service possible!  As a hotel across the street from Disneyland, we know most guests are trying to maximize their time at the parks.  So, we offer free luggage storage for those guests that arrive early and are happy to hold luggage after checking out as well.  We are glad to hear you are definitely coming back to stay with us again.  We hope it is very soon!

Summary Heading: Good Budget stay close to park!
Summary: The castle inn and suites is a nice hotel. We are a family of 5 and stayed in a family suite. It was nice to have the kids in there own room with two beds and an extra sink.  The bathroom was fine. It is clean for the most part, a little dusty in places (lamps). The in room refrigerator was missing a foot, thus it rocked every time we open it. There was a small gap at the bottom of the door. Overall good place to stay that is a 10 minute walk to Disneyland and they have free parking which does fill up. Would stay again on my next visit!
Manager Response: Amandap532, thank you for taking the time to share your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so happy to see that you enjoyed your stay with us!  For any sort of maintenance concern, even something that is minor such as the foot of the refrigerator, please contact the front desk.  We have maintenance staff on duty to fix those sorts of issues to help make all of our guests have a safe, clean and comfortable stay.  We are one of the only hotels within walking distance to offer free parking.  As mentioned the parking can get full during busy times, so we have to keep a limit of one vehicle per room and parking expires at check out time on the day of departure.  Our staff appreciates the kind words about the hotel and we are looking forward to your next stay.  We hope to see you very soon!

Summary: We are HUGE Disney fans, so finding a place to stay that's not going to empty our wallet and is near the parks is always a challenge. This was our first time staying there and we stayed for 4 nights and we most DEFINITELY be back! The check in was SUPER easy and very friendly. Even with COVID, our requests for more towels, coffee, etc was super easy; even though the staff did not come into our room, which was totally fine. The pool / hot tub were open. The room was clean and comfortable. Our flight was later in the evening, so the hotel was able to hold our luggage until we left for our flight.   The best part of our stay was, obviously, the LOCATION (omg! SO close!) but I can't say enough about the staff! Very friendly, professional and quite welcoming. We are magic key
Manager Response: Teresadl2739UK, thank you so much for that amazing review and taking the time to share your experience!  Our staff is genuinely grateful for your compliments, we always make guest service our top priority.  It is easy when we have such happy and kind guests staying at the hotel to provide the level of service you have experienced.  Our hotel is a family oriented hotel, and we love seeing all of the happy families heading off to the parks to enjoy their Disney vacations.  As one of the only hotels across the street from the Disneyland Resort to offer Free Parking for one vehicle, Free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, the value just can't be beat!  We are so glad to hear we are going to be your home away from home when you visit the parks!  Remember, you will always be treated like royalty at the Castle Inn & Suites!  See you soon!

Summary: Stayed here a couple times, most recently March of 2022.  Rooms have a mini fridge and microwave. We don’t spend much time in the room, just a place to clean up and lay our heads down. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Very close to park 5-7 minutes walking.
Manager Response: Familymom2003, thank you so much for the 5 out of 5 review!  We are so grateful for all of our repeat guests coming back to stay with us now that the hotel is reopened.  We appreciate the compliments to the staff on the clean and comfortable rooms.  As one of the only hotels across the street from Disneyland to offer free parking for one vehicle per registered room, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, it is truly one of the best values to be found!  The location is another great feature of the hotel, across from Disneyland, within a short walk to the entrance of both parks, but also within walking distance to many shopping opportunities and restaurants.  We hope to continue to be your hotel of choice for the future.  Please let us know if we can be of any further assistance.  Thank you

Summary: This place is so close to Disney and has a very cute little theme! Staff was extremely nice. The building is older but staff was willing to go above and beyond! Great for families and Disney goers !!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review and the recommendation!  The Castle Inn theme really makes the hotel a memorable place to stay when visiting the Disneyland Resort.  Within a 5 to 7 minute walk to the gate, many shopping opportunities, and restaurants as well!  It is conveniently located for all families visiting the area for any reason.  Our staff is very thankful for your kind words, we will always try to provide the best possible service we can.  We hope you were able to take advantage of the free parking for one vehicle, and free Wi Fi during your visit.  As one of the only hotels to offer these values, as well as not charge a resort fee, there really is no better choice in the city!  We hope the next time you are in town, you will come back and stay with us again.

Summary: The staff was very friendly and professional. Were always available to answer any questions or concerns. I was very pleased with the overall service. Will be back for sure. Thank you Castle Inn & Suites!
Manager Response: RigoDav, thank you for sharing your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites and for the 5 out of 5 review!  We pride ourselves on our customer service, and we make every effort to provide the best possible service we can.  We are excited to hear that we did not disappoint!  We are so grateful for our staff, who make the hotel special for our guests.  As one of the only hotels across from the Disneyland Resort to offer free Parking for one vehicle, free WiFi, and to not charge a Resort Fee,  there really is not better value in town!  We are looking forward to the next time you come back and stay with us again!

Summary: Very friendly staff and clean comfortable rooms. We were able to early check in and head over to Disney with no problem. Very accommodating in that they will hold your luggage while you Goto the park after check out. Rooms were clean and very comfortable will Consider staying in the future! Also very walkable to the parks - under 15 minute walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for the amazing 5 out of 5 review of your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites!  The hotel offers free luggage storage prior to check in and after check out for our guests.  We understand that our guests want to maximize their time at the parks, and we want to help in every way we can.  We are grateful for the compliments to the staff on the cleanliness of the rooms, and the location of the hotel in proximity to the entrance of the Disneyland parks.  We hope the next time you are in town, you will come back and stay with us again at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: Our room was clean and very functional. The staff were accommodating for early arrival and changes in our stay. They made it easy. It was most pleasant to sit by the pool on a cool day and get some work done.
Manager Response: Myrnas422, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are happy to see you enjoyed your stay with us, and that the staff was able to accommodate an early check in.  While it is not always available, when it is possible, we gladly allow guests to check into the room early.  Working with the hotel directly for reservations gives us the best opportunity to make any necessary changes during a visit.  Our pool is open from 8:00AM to 10:00PM, and is heated for our guests convenience.  We hope you were also able to enjoy the free parking for one vehicle and free Wi Fi.  With No Resort Fees, the value of the hotel is tough to beat!  Next time you are in town, come back and see us again!
