Summary: We stayed at Castle Inn and Suites during our short Disneyland trip. The staff was beyond nice and accommodating. The rooms were clean! Definitely will stay again in the future and definitely recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!  Our staff always makes customer service a top priority, we are glad to see we exceeded expectations!  We appreciate the compliments to our housekeeping staff about the cleanliness of the rooms as well.  We hope that during your visit you were able to take advantage of the excellent location of the hotel, within walking distance to many shopping opportunities, restaurants, and of course  the entrance of the Disneyland parks.  With free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there is no better choice for families visiting Disneyland.  We are grateful for your recommendation, and to hear you will definitely be back to stay with us again!  We hope to see you very soon!

Summary: I've stayed at a few places inexpensive around Disneyland.  I will go back here from now on.  It's not fancy, but it's affordable, clean, and has free parking for one car.  The desk staff was quick and courteous.    The beds and bedding should be updated, but if you're just looking for a place to rest your head that's close to the park, this is a good choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the kind words about our staff, and about the convenience of staying here at the Castle Inn.  Our family-oriented hotel aims to be affordable, safe, clean, and comfortable for all of our guests arriving to the hotel.  We are always adding new features, updating the hotel, and amenities of the rooms.  We appreciate the feedback, and we will take it into consideration for future improvements.  Nothing makes us happier than to hear we will be your first choice for all of your future stays.  We are already looking forward to the next one!

Summary: We were here in October for our first Disneyland trip.  This hotel was very nice, had very friendly staff, and was an easy walk to the parks.  Many restaurants were in the area, plus Castle Inn was right by 2 drug store, which was convenient for picking up something we forgot.  And, despite my initial worry that the beds and pillows would be too soft, all 4 of us felt that was some of the best sleep of our lives.
Manager Response: Karislibrary, thank you for the great review of your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We appreciate the 5 out of 5 score, and the kind words about our staff!  The hotel is located right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort, within walking distance to both of the Disneyland parks, the Anaheim Convention Center, and many shopping opportunities.  Beds are often the most difficult thing to get right for everyone, and we are so happy to hear you found your perfect night sleep here!  Hopefully you will come back to stay with us again in the near future!

Summary: Just spent 6 nights here. Great location—10 minute walk to the front gates.  Starbucks, Walgreens, Subway, and pizza are all within 5 min walk. Very convenient for families.  We had a family suite that was great for our larger family. Room was probably a bit nicer than others we’ve stayed in on this street. Free parking for guests.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  The location of the hotel is one of the best in town!  Right across the street from the Disneyland Resort, within a few minutes' walk from the entrance of both Disneyland and California Adventures.  As mentioned, there are also many convenience stores within walking distance of the hotel, along with a shopping center called the Gardenwalk.  At the Gardenwalk and all along Harbor Blvd, there are many restaurants and entertainment options as well.  We are glad to see you enjoyed your stay with us, and we hope you return for another visit very soon.

Summary: A nice, clean room for a great price! Only about an 8 minute walk to Disneyland harbor side entrance.  The bed was firm yet compfy. A/c and heater worked great. The staff was super friendly! I’d definitely stay here again and recommend to others!
Manager Response: Shanen77, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are thankful for your compliments to our staff!  It is easy to be friendly when we have such great guests staying at the hotel.  We aim to please with a clean, safe, and comfortable stay for all of our guests.  Besides the great location, right across the street from Disneyland, we hope you were able to use the free Wi Fi and free parking for one vehicle as well.  With no resort fees, the Castle Inn & Suites is the best value in town!  Thank you for the recommendation, we can't wait to see you again!

Summary: Awesome service, great rooms & great location to Disneyland! Staff is awesome, friendly & helpful.  Room clean, good parking. Great painless check in and great check outs.  If you needed anything you just call & they will bring it to you.
Manager Response: Diane, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We try to make every effort to provide our guests with a easy, comfortable, and memorable place to stay when visiting the Disneyland parks.  We are happy to deliver any amenities to the room upon request, and to help our guests in any way we can.  The Castle Inn & Suites is one of the only hotels across the street from Disneyland to offer free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi, and to not charge a resort fee.  There is no better value to be found in the area!  We are already looking forward to your next stay.  Hopefully it is very soon!

Summary: Great, hotel, close to Disneyland, within walking distance to Disneyland.front gate, great staff, very helpful, and clean rooms  Very affordable, will stay there next trip. They do not charge for parking.
Manager Response: 201hanks, thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so happy to see that you enjoyed your visit to the hotel.  The hotel is in the heart of the Disneyland Resort area, within a 5 to 7 minute walk from the main gates of both Disneyland and California Adventures.  Also there are many restaurants within walking distances as well as various shopping opportunities.  We thank you for the compliments to the staff about our friendly customer service and the efforts made by our housekeeping staff to provide a clean and comfortable place to stay.  We are one of the only hotels to offer free parking for a limit of one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi, and to not charge a resort fee.  We hope the next time you are in town, you will come back to stay at the Castle Inn & Suites again!

Summary: My family and I stayed here for two nights while visiting Disneyland. The overall price was affordable and unmatched by surrounding hotels. The staff was helpful and kind. The room was clean, well taken care of and had a homey feeling. The castle aesthetic was adventurous for my kids and teenagers all while being very classy. I love that it was so close to the parks and downtown Disney. I would 100% recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay while in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Mrs_barretta, thank you for the awesome review!  We are so glad to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  As a family-oriented hotel our Castle theme really sets us apart from other options, and makes your stay even more memorable!  We appreciate your compliments to our staff, we will always try to make sure every guest has a great stay, and we are glad to see we did not disappoint.  Thank you for the recommendation, hopefully we will see you here at the hotel again very soon!

Summary: The only reason I’m giving a 3 is due to the location and proximity to the park. This was our first time staying here and it was for 5 nights. We visit Disneyland about 8 times a year and we thought we should give this place a shot.   During our first night, we woke up multiple times excited about dawn. Because of our excitement for going to the park? No. Because the beds were that uncomfortable. Just sitting down on the bed you could tell it was going to be a rough night. I tested out the floor and if the carpet didn’t feel dirty and slimy I would have slept there.   There is no soundproofing for the room. You hear every footstep going by. We were on the second floor and could hear people talking word for word on ground level outside about 20 yards away.   Next, the shower(s)
Manager Response: Corahrb, thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are sorry to hear you did not enjoy your visit to the hotel.  We appreciate the opportunity to address the concerns you have brought to our attention after checking out from the hotel.  We would have liked the chance to address them during your stay to improve your experience.  All of the mattresses on the property are Serta brand "Perfect Sleeper" mattresses.  They are a mid-firm mattress, and many of our guests experience a great night's sleep.  Mattresses can be difficult to provide a comfortable sleep for everybody, while some guests prefer a firm mattress, others prefer a softer feel.  If there are any concerns with the room, whether it is a maintenance issue or a housekeeping issue, please just contact the front desk and we will take care of it right away.  While we have had some guests report issues in rooms, our maintenance staff is generally able to fix whatever the issue is that is reported.  We hope you understand that we are making every effort to ensure our guests have a safe, clean, and comfortable experience.  If you decide to give us another shot, please just request a quiet location and we will be happy to try to meet your request.

Summary: The Castle Inn & Suites is a great place if you want to be within walking distance to Disneyland. They do not charge for parking, like some, and the rooms are clean. The front desk staff was awesome. We had to cut our trip a day short and they were caring and considerate and refunded us for the night not stayed. Walking to Disney was a snap too. Great place for the price. I only gave 4 stars because the gift shop was temporarily closed and there was no maid service, however they were very accommodating with extra towels. Hard to come back from a pandemic but they are doing a great job.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit to the hotel.  It is unfortunate that during the pandemic our gift shop went out of business.  We hope to have a new tenant in the space soon.  We are lucky to have a great location, walking distance to many convenience stores such as 7-11, Walgreen's, CVS, and a local liquor store.  Our housekeeping staff comes in to clean and sanitize every room after each guest checks out.  As mentioned, we are also on property to provide any requested items for our guests during the stay.  With free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi in the room, and no resort fees, there is no better choice for families visiting the parks!  We are glad to have your compliments on our efforts to come back from the pandemic.  We hope the next time you stay with us we can earn a 5 star review!

Summary: Nice hotel. Not the snazziest hotel, but it's location is amazing, the rooms were nice, and the staff were incredibly sweet. I will absolutely be back next year with my family. Can't beat having DisneyLand across the street.
Manager Response: Prygrin, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We aim to be the ideal hotel for families on vacation visiting the Disneyland Resort Area.  We provide rooms with refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, and hair dryers so our guests feel right at home when staying with us.  We also offer free parking, free Wi Fi, and do not charge a resort fee.  With these added values, there is no better place to stay across the street from the Disneyland Resort.  Everything is within walking distance, restaurants, shopping, and of course the entrance to both Disneyland and California Adventures.  We are so happy to hear you will be back to see us again next year, we will be here waiting for you!

Summary: Great hotel to stay in. The front desk staff was very friendly. They were very careful with cleaning everything they had touched prior to given it back to you. The rooms are nice, we had 3 adults and had plenty of room. The Castle Inn was just down the street from the entrance to the Disney parks, maybe a 10 minute walk to get there. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Our team has made many improvements since the pandemic began.  The health and safety of our guests and our staff is our top priority.  We have implemented new protocols at the front desk and also in the housekeeping department to ensure our guests have a safe, clean, and comfortable place to stay.  The location of the hotel is one of the best in town, walking distance to the main gates of both parks, many shopping opportunities, and also to the great restaurants in the area.  We appreciate your compliments to our staff, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The Castle Inn & Suites was a great choice if you're visiting Disneyland. It was less than a 5 minute walk from the park gates. The hotel itself was very clean, the rooms were very clean and decorated very very. The staff was friendly, patient and very accomodating. We had a few friends join our trip last minute and were able to change our room to a suite with ease and for a very reasonable price given the last second change.
Manager Response: Dianelisea, thank you for taking the time to write about your experience here at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We appreciate the perfect 5 out of 5 review!  Our staff is very appreciative of your kind words, we work hard to provide our guests with a memorable and pleasant experience.  Our front desk staff always makes the guest the priority, and we will bend over backwards to help guests find accommodations that work best for the group.  We are fortunate to have a housekeeping staff that has been trained to clean and disinfect rooms to ensure each guest has a clean and comfortable room.  We hope you were also able to use the free parking for one vehicle and free parking as well.  Next time you are in town, we hope you come back and see us again!

Summary: I'm a returning guest and I highly recommend staying at the Castle Inn & Suites in Anaheim. They are just a hop, skip away from Disneyland. The rooms were clean and the staff was very helpful and friendly. The overall theme of the hotel is charming. Will definitely stay again.  BTW. I was having trouble booking on a known travel site for a last-minute trip, so I decided to call the hotel directly. They were able to help me, got a great deal on multiple side-by-side rooms.
Manager Response: Susycc24, thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites, and also for your previous visits.  We love having our repeat guests back in the hotel!  It is finally starting to almost feel like normal when we see our guests coming back to see us again.  Our staff appreciates all of your kind words and compliments, we work hard to make sure all of our guests have a pleasant experience.  While those large sites have their place, we feel that booking directly always is the best practice.  We hope you come back to the hotel and see us again very soon!

Summary: I’m a Disneyland fanatic and have stayed at several good neighbor hotels, but now I always choose Castle. Fun theming, short walk to the parks, affordable and great customer service! I return every time!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, we are glad to see you enjoyed your stay!  We love having guests come back to see us time and time again.  We hope we have become your home away from home when you are visiting the Disneyland Resort area.  From the great location, to the great customer service, or the amazing values the hotel offers including free parking for one vehicle and free Wi Fi, there is no better choice than the Castle Inn & Suites for your Disney Vacation.  We are glad to hear you come back to stay with us every time!  We will keep striving to provide you the best experience we can each and every time you stay with us!

Summary Heading: Wonderful Experience! Clean, convenient, and reasonably priced.
Summary: My family and I stayed last week and were very happy with our stay. The rooms were clean. The staff were friendly and helpful. And it is only 2 blocks from Disneyland which is a huge plus! Highly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  Our housekeeping staff works hard to make sure all of our guests have a safe clean and comfortable place to stay when visiting the Disneyland parks.  Our front desk staff always makes our guests a top priority, and we are glad to see you received great customer service as well.  The location of the Castle Inn is one of the best in town, right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort area.  Everything is within walking distance and the hotel does not charge any extra fees.  We hope the next time you come to town, you will come back and stay with us again!

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites for 5 nights. It was great! We loved how close it is to Disneyland. We were able to walk to and from easily. The hotel is clean and the staff is super nice and accommodating. Definitely would suggest to others!
Manager Response: Thank you for the perfect 5 out of 5 review!  We are so happy to have guests back in the hotel, and to see you had a great stay with us!  Our staff is thankful for your kind words about the service you received and we will continue to strive to meet or exceed your expectations for a future stay.  We are lucky to have a dedicated housekeeping and maintenance staff that make sure the property is well kept and clean for our guests to enjoy.  Thank you for the recommendation to others.  We hope you will come back to stay with us again very soon!

Summary: we came on march 5 2022 and stayed until march 7 2022. check in was absolutely easy and we felt instantly welcome with the staff’s kindness! the lobby looks absolutely perfect with the medieval theming of the overall hotel! rooms were very clean and neat, our needs were met whenever we needed assistance! the distance is very reasonable from disneyland, saves you more of the aching pain from your feet. i recommend a stay at castle inn & suites! :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for review of your experience.  We couldn't ask for anything better than absolutely perfect!  We are glad to hear that the check in process was a breeze, and that our staff made your stay enjoyable.  We are genuinely grateful for your compliments regarding the customer service you experienced.  We hope while you were staying with us you were able to take advantage of the free parking and free Wi Fi as well.  We appreciate your recommendation, and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: Terrific location. The entrance to Disneyland is a couple of blocks away.  There are numerous restaurants within a few blocks in either direction, as well as Walgreens, CVS, and 7-Eleven.  I did not have a car and was able to walk everywhere I needed to be.  Staff is very friendly and helpful.  I traveled solo and had plenty of room, including a large closet and a fridge.
Manager Response: BarbJ117, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We couldn't agree more about the convenience of the location of the hotel.  Walking distance to the entrances of both Disneyland and California Adventures, many shopping opportunities including the Gardenwalk along with the stores mentioned, and also all of the great restaurants the Disneyland Resort has to offer.  We hope the next time you are in town, you will come back to stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Quaint, affordable, really close to Disneyland!
Summary: Last week my family and I stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites in Anaheim.  We chose this property because of its affordability and closeness to Disneyland.  The hotel itself is a charming Tudor style with plenty of rooms, a pool, and many other amenities to serve our Disney needs.  Our room was just perfect, fit my family of 4 easily.  Everything was well-kept and all of our needs were only a phone call away.  Front desk service was clean, fantastic, anything we needed was easily attainable.  Only a 2-block walk to the entrance to Disneyland and Disney California Adventure.  The only negative (due to Covid) was the rooms were not serviced daily.  That being said, we would just call for towels, etc and they would arrive at the door in minutes.  My fiance rented a scooter for
Manager Response: Brett D, thank you for the amazing review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so glad to see you enjoyed your stay with us and we appreciate the compliments to our staff.  We work hard to make sure we provide all of our guests with a safe, comfortable, clean, and memorable experience when visiting the Castle.  Our staff is constantly working to maintain the property and the rooms, to ensure our guests ensure their visit.  As one of the only hotels across the street from Disneyland to offer Free Parking for one vehicle, Free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there is no better value in the Disneyland Resort area.  During this time, the housekeeping staff is limited to servicing and sanitizing the rooms only after check out.  However, as mentioned we are here to provide any of the requested items as soon as possible to the room.  We are also happy to pick up any used towels or trash from outside the room.  We take care of our guests' scooters every day, and we are happy to charge them in the lobby so they are ready for guests to pick up each morning.  We look forward to having you back to the hotel on your next Disney Vacation!

Summary: This is a no-frills, clean hotel that is a good value for families.  We booked the suite which had a separate bedroom with two queen beds and one queen bed in the main area.  This alone was a huge factor for us in where to book, as the suites are very reasonably priced compared to other hotels in the area.  The bedroom was great for our kids.  It had a separate sink in the bedroom as well which was helpful.    The room was clean but it is dated and old.  The bathroom was also clean but the water did have a strange smell to it.  The shower would either run very hot or very cold.  The grounds are very well maintained.  We did not have time to go to the pool.  The mattresses were okay and I found the bedding (blankets in particular) a little thin.    Room had a mini fridge, coffee
Manager Response: Thank you for your very thorough review of your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so glad to see you enjoyed your visit to the hotel.  The description of the room sounds like one of our Family Suites.  This room features a King size bed in the front area, then 2 Queen size beds in the back.  This is the way to go with larger families, or if you just want a little extra space to spread out.  With a television in each room, it makes it very easy for everyone to enjoy their visit.  Our gift shop on the property did close during the pandemic, but we are fortunate to have a great location with many convenience stores within walking distance.  We hope you were able to enjoy the free Wi Fi and free parking for one vehicle along with the other amenities of the hotel.  During this time, our housekeeping staff cleans and sanitizes rooms only after check out, we have made the health and safety of our staff and our guests a top priority.  It brings us great joy to hear you plan to come back and see us again, we hope it is very soon!

Summary: Clean hotel with a short walk to Disney.   Many amenties closeby starbucks, walgreens, Anaheim Garden Walk. Staff is very friendly and helpful.  We enjoyed relaxing in the hot tub, would be nice if it was open a little later! Rooms are spacious, black out curtains are nice!  Fridge, microwave, and coffee maker in the room.   The beds are firm, if you like that.   Overall it was a great stay,
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so glad to see you enjoyed your visit to the hotel!  The location is tough to beat, within walking distance to the entrances of both Disneyland and California Adventures, many shopping opportunities, and of course all of the great restaurants that the Disneyland Resort has to offer.  The hours of the hot tub are 8:00AM to 10:00PM, if left open later we may receive noise complaints from the guests when people are having a great time at the pool.  We look forward to the next time you come and stay with us, we hope it is very soon!

Summary: Their service was amazing.. I got to the Hotel and go checked in and got my room and I rested for a bit and then walked to Disneyland and it took me 4 to 5 minutes to walk to Disneyland and enjoy the evening there for the remainder of the day.. I will stay at their hotel again
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  We are so grateful for the 5 out of 5 score and the compliments to our staff for the service!  We can't always provide early check in, the standard check in time is 3:00PM, but we are happy to see we were able to get you in early.  The walk to Disneyland is very convenient, but there are also many restaurants and convenient stores within walking distance of the hotel as well!  We hope the next time you come back to stay with us you will have an even better experience than the last time!

Summary: Overall this is a nice hotel within a 7-10 minute walk to the Disney parks. Since there is no breakfast at the hotel we picked-up Starbucks each morning before heading to the parks. There is a Starbucks, Walgreens, and CVS just down from the hotel. There is also a Denny's if you want a full breakfast before heading to parks close by as well. We ate dinner at one of the small restaurants next door one night which was pretty good. Our room was dark, but we didn't spend much time in the room, so it wasn't a big deal. The beds were clean and comfortable. The biggest issue we had was very poor water pressure in the shower, it was more of a dribble. In the end we would stay here again.
Manager Response: Noel A, thank you for taking the time to write a review about the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so happy to see you enjoyed your visit.  The hotel offers some other added values in place of a free breakfast.  We include free parking for one vehicle per room on the nights of the reservation, free Wi Fi, and the hotel does not charge our guests a resort fee.  With all the savings on these values, guests can save enough to get breakfast at any of the local restaurants.  The rooms also feature a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and a hair dryer.  Guests are welcome to bring breakfast items to eat in the rooms if they prefer.  We are glad to hear you will be back to stay with us again, and please if there is any issue, just let us know so we can have our staff address it right away.  Thank you

Summary: Hotel was clean and lots of room , about a 5 minute walk to Disney . Staff was very nice and helpful . Parking is free and if you are a return visitor to Castle Inn let the staff know and you are given a discount on the room .Just give them a call .
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!  We appreciate all of the kind words to the staff and about the cleanliness of the rooms.  We work hard to provide all of our guests with a safe, clean, and comfortable place to stay when visiting the Disneyland Resort area.  The Castle Inn has a perfect location, walking distance to the Disneyland parks, the Anaheim Convention Center, many shopping opportunities, and all of the great restaurants the area has to offer.  We love having our guests come back to visit us so we will always provide those guests who have stayed before with the best possible rate.  We hope the next time you are in town, you will come back to see us again!

Summary: I’ve stayed here plenty times before and it’s been great each time. The location is very convenient to the parks. The rooms are a bit older looking in regards to technology/bathroom/floors but you get what you pay for, and the price was great! You can’t expect to have it all and get a good price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your multiple stays here at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so happy to have our guests coming back to stay with us again.  We are constantly working with our staff to maintain the property and the rooms to our standards, and if there is something we can improve, please let us know during your visit.  As one of the only hotels to provide guests with free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi, and to not charge a resort fee, it is truly one of the best values in the area.  We hope you will continue to return to stay with us many more times in the future.

Summary Heading: Fun theme, great location, good for families
Summary: Location to Disneyland super convenient. Kids were so excited when we pulled up and saw the castle theme of the hotel. Fun lobby decorations and theme throughout the hotel. Hot tub and pool in good shape. Really liked the layout of the family suite with a door between the two rooms.
Manager Response: Sam C, thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We really appreciate your 5 out of 5 review.  The Castle theme is very popular with children and families.  It is an iconic building and makes for a memorable vacation.  The Family Suite is the most comfortable way to stay, 2 rooms with a television in each, refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and hair dryer.  It is like having a home away from home.  With a king bed in one room and 2 queens in the other, there is plenty of room for everyone to sleep comfortably.  As one of the only hotels across the street from Disneyland to offer free parking, free Wi Fi, and no resort fees, the value is one of the best in town!  We hope you come back and see us again very soon!

Summary: This hotel tended to all my expectations, Disneyland being my priority. The rooms are spacious for two people (maybe not a family), however quite dark. The shower was almost impossible to regulate. There was no housekeeping services during our four night stay.  All things apart, it is a 5 minute walk to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Juuliasimoes, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are sorry to hear about the shower temperature fluctuating, for a future stay please report the issue and we will have our maintenance staff take care of it for you.  The health and safety of our staff and our guests is our top priority.  During this challenging time we have eliminated the touch point between the staff and the guest by limiting our housekeeping staff to cleaning and sanitizing rooms only after check out.  We hope to be able to return to servicing all guest rooms on a daily basis soon.  We are very happy to see that you enjoyed your stay with us.  The hotel offers larger rooms, from 2 queen beds and a sofa bed in one shared space, to a 2 bedroom suite with 1 king bed and 2 queen beds in separate areas for larger families.  We hope that you will come back and see us again very soon!

Summary: I stayed here with my three boys for a 2 day trip two Disneyland. I chose this hotel because of the close proximity to the park and free parking. We stayed for two nights. The hotel was a short two block walk to Disneyland. It was clean, comfortable, and well priced. The staff was friendly and helpful. I did not see an elevator, so I recommend asking for a first floor room if stairs are not your thing. It was close to Rite Aid, Walgreens, restaurants and not too far from Target which was good because my 7 year old didn’t bring his suitcase and I had to run down the next morning to buy him an outfit. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently at the Castle Inn & Suites and for writing a review about your visit.  We are so glad to see you enjoyed your visit and we thank you for the kind words about our staff.  Just for the next visit, the hotel has 2 elevators on property.  There are also several staircases located throughout the property to access all 4 floors of the hotel.  The location of the hotel is one of the best in town, right in the center of the Disneyland Resort area.  Within walking distance to both Disneyland and California Adventure, but also to the Anaheim Convention Center, the Anaheim Gardenwalk Shopping Center, and many other restaurants and stores.  Also the Castle Inn & Suites is one of the only hotels in the area to offer free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi, and to not charge a resort fee.  With all these added values it is the perfect choice for families visiting Disneyland.  We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We recently stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites for our Disneyland trip and our stay was absolutely amazing!  They had wonderful customer service, the rooms were super spacious and clean, and the walk to the parks was less than 10 minutes. We absolutely loved our stay and will be staying here again!
Manager Response: Katie21hasse, thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites and for sharing your experience.  We are genuinely grateful for your compliments to our staff; we make customer service our top priority.  Our housekeeping staff appreciates the kind words as well, now more than ever we are focused on keeping the rooms clean and sanitized for all of our guests.  The location of the hotel is one of the best in town, right in the heart of the Disneyland resort.  Walking distance to so many shops, restaurants, and of course the main gate of both Disneyland parks!  When you include the free parking, free Wi Fi, and no resort fees, the value is tough to beat.  We are happy to hear you will be back to stay with us again, we hope it is very soon!

Summary: I admit we are Disney snobs-we normally stay at one of the Disney resorts but it was last minute and quite frankly, much less expensive.  We were very pleasantly surprised with Castle Inn and Suites.  Clean, roomy, safe and short walk to Disney.  In an era of short staffed and grumpy employees, Castle Inn's employees were very friendly and seemed to care about their jobs and their guests.  The room was clean and seemed larger than most chain hotel rooms, had a fridge and microwave.  It was too chilly for swimming so we did not check out the pool area.  They allowed us to leave our car in the PL even after check out, while we were at the parks.  Overall great and very affordable stay.  I felt very safe even walking back alone one night from the parks while the rest of the family
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!  We are so happy to see you enjoyed the Castle Inn & Suites as much as you enjoyed the Disneyland Hotels!  Our staff is so grateful for your kind words, especially for the compliments about the customer service you received.  Our guests are very important to us, and we want to make sure each one has a safe, comfortable, and memorable experience.  Our hotel rooms are a little larger than most of the hotels in the area.  As an independent property, we have the freedom to focus on the things our guests value most.  Which is why we have included free parking, free Wi Fi, and do not charge a resort fee.  We hope the next time you come back to visit Disneyland; you will choose to stay with us again!

Summary: We stayed here for a week long trip to Disneyland  and it was a great hotel! Definitely recommend it! The walk from the hotel to the parks wasn’t long and there’s lots of restaurants around the hotel so you don’t have to eat in the parks. Rooms were quiet, nice, and clean. There’s also a Walgreens and a CVS across the street. Great hotel!
Manager Response: Yourface_isgreat, thank you for coming to visit us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so happy to see you had a great week staying here at the hotel!  As mentioned, the location is fantastic, right across the street from the Disneyland Resort, and within walking distance to convenient shopping opportunities as well as restaurants.  As one of the only hotels this close to Disneyland to offer free parking, free Wi Fi, and no Resort Fees, the value of the hotel can't be beat.  We hope you come back and stay with us in the very near future!

Summary: Not a lot of extras (ex: no breakfast, and the store and vending machines onsite were down due to COVID constraints) and not fancy BUT it is two blocks down from the entrance to Disneyland, super clean, reasonably priced, great hospitality and friendly, helpful front desk service. I would stay here every time!
Manager Response: Mama-mitch69, thank you for your review of the Castle Inn & Suites.  In place of offering a continental breakfast, the hotel includes free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi in the room, and does not charge a resort fee.  With all these savings a family can visit one of the nearby restaurants such as Denny's, IHOP, Mc Donald's or Panera bread and have a full meal.  The hotel also features refrigerators, microwaves, and free coffee with the coffee makers in the rooms.  We are so glad to hear you would stay here every time you visit the parks!  Let's hope you get to come again sooner rather than later!

Summary: Nice room.  Very clean.  The staff was so helpful and friendly.  We rented 2 scooters for our Disneyland trip and the staff kept them in the lobby for us and had them ready and fully charged for us each day.  Made it so simple.  They were within scooter distance (or walking distance if you don't need the scooter) of Disneyland.  Will definitely stay again when we go to Disneyland the next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review of your stay!  We are so glad to see you enjoyed your visit to the Castle Inn & Suites in Anaheim!  Our staff appreciates your kind words and always goes the extra mile for our guests.  We have found that it is much easier for us to keep the scooters in the lobby where we can charge them for our guests, and it also makes the experience in the room more enjoyable.  Besides the great location, we hope you were able to enjoy the free parking for one vehicle and free Wi Fi in the room as well.  We look forward to having you back at the hotel again soon!

Summary: The staff was so so friendly and helpful. The decor and theme of the building and lobby was so cute! The room was clean and comfortable. It was a super short walk from the main gate at Disneyland. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: We appreciate your thoughtful review and the 5 out of 5 score!  The Castle Inn & Suites is an iconic building located across the street from the Disneyland Resort.  It is definitely a hotel you will remember if you come and stay with us.  Especially for children it makes a Disneyland trip special.  Our staff is what makes the hotel special for our guests as well, and we are so glad to see you enjoyed their service.  The location in relation to the entrance of Disneyland is tough to beat and makes it possible to take a break in the middle of the day to come back and rest up.  We hope the next time you are in town you will come back to see us again!

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel many times and we really enjoy it. It is always clean and the service is great! The front desk is kind and helpful. The hotel is only about 2 blocks away from Disneyland, which is so nice because it is not a far walk. Our kids enjoy the pool and the hot tub.
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review of your experiences here at the Castle Inn & Suites in Anaheim.  We appreciate all of your past visits, and we hope you plan to come and stay with us many more times in the future.  Our front desk staff is very grateful for your compliments, we work hard to provide a high level of customer service.  As one of the only hotels across the street from the Disneyland Resort to offer free parking, free Wi Fi and no Resort fees, the value just can't be beat!  We are already looking forward to your next vacation!

Summary: I choose to stay here for the price and a little worried honestly after i booked it (you get what you pay for fear in mind) And this hotel was not short of a GREAT stay our room was big with lots of room! Clean the hot tub and pool were great to relax in after a long day! The staff was friendly and so helpful!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  The hotel is a hidden gem with great value across from the Disneyland Resort.  We aim to provide all of our guests with a clean and comfortable place to stay when in the area.  Our hotel is designed for families on vacation, and we provide the comforts of home such as refrigerators, coffee makers, hair dryers, and microwaves in every room.  The pool is one of the most popular features of the hotel, especially when it is warm, or when you just need a good soak after a long day at Disneyland.  We hope you remember us the next time you are in town and will come back and see us again soon!

Summary: Park visits have different hotel needs. You are out early until late. All you need is a clean, safe. friendly place to lay your head. This is it. We had a two room suite fur our family of 6. This was the best value element of all our trip. Paint and furnishings a tad worn but clean. Staff exceptionally friendly and helpful. Easy, plentiful parking. Optimal location just 12 minute walk from actual Par entrance line up. Cheesecake factory and Bubba Gump just 10 minutes other way!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We really appreciate all of the kind things you have to say about the hotel.  Our staff is grateful for the compliments, and it keeps us motivated to keep providing the best customer service possible.  The Family Suite is definitely the most comfortable way to sleep a family of 6.  With 1 king bed in the front room, and 2 queen beds in the back area, there is plenty of space for everyone.  With free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi, and no resort fee, the Castle Inn & Suites is the best value across the street from Disneyland.  Not only are there the great restaurants at the Gardenwalk such as Bubba Gump and Cheesecake Factory, there are a lot of shopping opportunities as well!  We hope the next time you are in town, you will come back to visit us again.

Summary: We recently traveled from MA to CA and stayed at 3 different hotels in our trip from LA to SD, including the famous Hotel Del Coronado. The Castle Inn & Suites was the best experience for our family. We have a 6 year old and a 2 year old and this was the only hotel room that gave us enough space. We booked a family suite and I'm so glad we ddi. They had a space within our room that I could close the door to and they could sleep while we stayed up and had a drink and watched tv. There was enough room for them to wrestle and play and I never yelled "Be careful you could break that". We went to Disney for one of the days and my 2 year old got sick and puked. I was able to carry her all the way back to the hotel. It was absolutely perfect and if we ever hit up Anaheim again, we
Manager Response: MegTPeters, thank you so much for the wonderful review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  We have worked hard over the years to provide a safe, clean, and comfortable stay for families visiting the Disneyland Resort area.  The Family Suite is definitely the best way to maximize your time at the hotel.  With a king bed in the front area, 2 queen beds in the back area, and a door to separate the two rooms, there is plenty of space for the whole family.  Also, with no resort fees in addition to the cost of the room, free parking for one vehicle, and Wi Fi included as well, it is definitely the best value in town.  We hope you are back to visit Disneyland very soon, and when you come back; we can provide you with the same great experience you have come to expect.

Summary Heading: Clean hotel with the kindest staff
Summary: The whole hotel was very clean and wonderful ambience. The staff was so personable and kind each day we saw the same staff that was always accommodating. Clean pool area with a hot tub, pool and kid pool. Had an yearly morning emergency and they opened the laundry to let me do a load.
Manager Response: Geoffrey S, thank you for taking the time to write about your experience here at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We genuinely appreciate the kind words about our staff.  We always make our guests the priority, and we try to help whenever we can.  We are very lucky to have the experienced maintenance and housekeeping staff who take care of the hotel, and keep it clean for all of our guests.  We hope the next time you are in town to visit Disneyland; you will come back to stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Convenient, perfect for a Disneyland adventure
Summary: We recently stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites, great location- walking distance to the parks.  Free parking.  Very spacious room.  Could be updated but considering we spent little time in the room, it wasn’t a huge deal.  Incredibly friendly staff.  Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!  We appreciate all of the compliments about the staff and the hotel in general.  The Castle Inn & Suites is one of the only hotels to offer free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi, and to also not charge a resort fee.  The value just cannot be beat when you are visiting Anaheim in general, and especially Disneyland.  We are constantly making efforts to improve the rooms, and the overall guest experience.  Your feedback is appreciated.  We look forward to your next visit, hopefully it is very soon!

Summary: My family and I stayed two days. It was clean and really close to Disney. They have hand sanitizer available closer to the elevators and public spaces. The room was clean and it was really easy to get extra towels and toiletries. The check in and check out was fast and safe. The personal was very nice.
Manager Response: Ligiao366, thank you for your kind review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We have made an effort to create a safe and healthy environment for our guests and also for our staff during these challenging times.  The hotel has made it a priority to provide all of our staff with appropriate personal protection equipment, and to provide opportunities for everyone to have access to hand sanitizer throughout the property.  We have also switched to hospital grade disinfecting chemicals to use when cleaning and sanitizing each guest room.  We are grateful for your compliments about the cleanliness of the room and the kindness of our staff.  We hope the next time you are visiting Disneyland; you will come back to see us again as well.

Summary Heading: Great stay for a budget trip to the parks
Summary: I visted the Disneyland parks twice this month and stayed at the Castle Inn both times. tThey are affordable, within walking distance and offers single rooms and family suites for small or large groups. The rooms are clean and comfortable for budget hotel and the the staff is very firendly! A few additional perks include free parking, discount prices for Magic Key holders, AAA member, Veteran, and other groups, and scooter rental from the lobby! This hotel is a great option for a budget trip to the parks!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are glad to see you enjoyed your stay and appreciate the compliments about the staff.  The hotel offers rooms from 2 queen beds for up to 4, to 3 different types of suites for up to 6 people.  All of the rooms have refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, and hair dryers.  They have all been designed with families in mind.  We offer all sorts of discounts so that everybody has a chance to come and enjoy the hotel.  With free parking, free Wi Fi, and no Resort Fees, there is no better value when visiting the Disneyland Resort area.  We hope you come back to see us again twice next month!

Summary: I would highly recommend the Castle Inn.  We have stayed here several times with our latest being the beginning of December.  We had 2 rooms one for my husband, sister and I and one for my son and his family.  On our 1st day our son became ill and with no questions asked we were able to upgrade to a suite for him and his family so he could isolate (not COVID related).  2 days later he was transported to the hospital via ambulance and immediately the hotel staff reached out to see what we needed and how they could help us.  My son's wife went to the hospital to stay with him and we continued on to Disneyland through the week so our grandkids could have a good time.  Until our son was transferred to UCLA Medical Center the Castle Inn stepped up and allowed us to stay on a day by
Manager Response: Janice, thank you for sharing your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We remember your family, we hope everything worked out and your son has made a full recovery.  We are in the hospitality industry, and we treat each guest with the care and kindness that we would hope to receive.  We know that during a vacation, things do not always go as planned.  We are grateful that we were able to accommodate you and your family through the challenges you faced.  Our hotel is the perfect choice for families, and as an independently owned and operated company, we can go the extra mile to make your stay special.  Thank you for all of the compliments to the staff it means a great deal to us.  We will be here waiting to provide you the same great service (though hopefully with none of the same challenges) that you experienced last time.  Come back and see us again soon!

Summary: The room was clean. The staff was outstanding. Location to the parks is great and the price is awesome. We walked to the parks. There is also an ART stop near if you need transportation. Will stay here again when on a budget minded trip without hesitation.
Manager Response: Texasphotochick, thank you for your kind review.  We appreciate all of our guests coming to stay with us and we are glad to see you enjoyed your stay.  The ART stop is very convenient if there are guests who would prefer to take a shuttle to the park, but there is a fee to ride.  Being only a 5 to 7 minute walk from the entrance of both parks, most of our guests find it is faster and easier just to walk over for the day.  We genuinely appreciate the kind words about the staff, we always make our guest the priority, and we are so happy to see they did not disappoint!  With free parking, free Wi Fi, and no Resort Fees, there is no better value in the Disneyland Resort Area!  We look forward to your return trip!

Summary Heading: Once Again Castle Inn and Suites makes for an awesome stay
Summary: My  current stay was 1/11/22-1/14/22  but I have stayed here several times before. Room was spacious with 2 tables to eat at and plenty of counter space near the sink. Lots of towels with a  fridge and microwave. This is the second time I was able to check in early. Office staff is friendly and efficient. The walk was 10 minutes or less. You can't beat their location.
Manager Response: TeresaO2474UO, thank you for the amazing review about your experiences here at the Castle Inn & Suites and for staying with us again!  Our rooms are very spacious for the area, and with one desk for working, another table to eat or store things, it is a very comfortable layout.  Having a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and a hair dryer it is like having your home away from home.  When we have the rooms available we are happy to offer early check in at no extra charge, but it is always subject to availability.  Our office staff genuinely appreciates your compliments, it means a lot to us.  We look forward to seeing you again very soon!

Summary Heading: Great Stay & Easy quick walk to Disneyland
Summary: Room was clean, no issues.  Front desk employees were friendly.  My son and I walked to and from the parks multiple times.  10 Min walk from Hotel to entrance of Disney. Pool and Hot Tub were open and working but we did not use either.
Manager Response: Dareu2smile, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We appreciate the compliments to the staff about the cleanliness of the room and the friendliness of the front desk staff.  The heated pool and hot tub are open year-round from 8:00AM to 10:00PM daily.  The location across the street from Disneyland is tough to beat.  Walking distance to both Disney parks, many shopping opportunities, and also many restaurants in the area.  The hotel also has a coin operated laundry area in case a guest needs it, and refrigerators, microwaves, and coffee makers in every room.  We hope the next time you are in town to visit Disneyland, you come back to stay with us again!

Summary: My sister and I stayed 1/7/22-1/11/22 and we were beyond impressed. Very clean spacious room! (Standard.) Staff was kind, personable, and very understanding. I cannot stress how much I highly recommend staying here. It being castle theme added to our magically trip to Disney.
Manager Response: SophiaRS22, thank you for taking the time to write such a great review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We genuinely appreciate the compliments to our staff about the cleanliness of the room and the kindness of the front desk staff.  The rooms are all complete with refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, and hair dryers.  Even the standard rooms can feel very spacious, like a home away from home.  The Castle Inn & Suites is definitely a magical place, and we hope the next time you are in town you will come back to visit us very soon!

Summary: Mom and daughter trip the week between Christmas and the New Year. We arrived earlier than expected and were pleasantly surprised that they had a room available to us to check in early. We experienced Disney magic faster than expected!  The hotel is within walking distance from Disneyland - very convenient.  The staff was friendly, outgoing and very accomodating. Our room was spacious and clean. Free parking was a GREAT bonus.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so excited to have our guests at the hotel, sometimes we can't wait for check in time to get them in.  Especially during the holiday time, it is a real bonus to be able to check in early.  We want you to get the magic of the Castle, before you get to the magic of Disneyland!  The location of the hotel is one of the best in the city, and everything you need is within a short walk.  We appreciate the compliments to the staff, we make every effort provide our guests with a safe, clean, and enjoyable visit to the hotel.  Free parking, free Wi Fi, and no resort fees makes the Castle Inn & Suites one of the best values when families are visiting the Disneyland Resort.  Thank you again for staying with us, we look forward to you coming back to visit next time you are in town.

Summary: This was a return visit. Great staff. Very pleasant and helpful. The room was large. 2 Queen beds, a table and chairs and lots of room. Frig was included. No breakfast any longer but parking and Wi-Fi are free.  Very short walk to Disneyland.  We highly recommend Castle Inn & Suites!
Manager Response: GWaters712, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so grateful for your recommendation; word of mouth is the highest compliment we could ask for.  All rooms on the property feature a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and a hair dryer.  Though the hotel does not offer a breakfast, we are happy to provide our guests with free coffee for the coffee maker in the room, free Wi Fi in the room, and the hotel does not have a resort fee which can be found at most area hotels.  We are so happy to have our guests returning to the hotel, and we area already looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: I booked this hotel for my 2 daughters and I while at Disneyland for two days. The staff here were wonderful! They all were very welcoming and helpful. The room was extremely clean. It was exactly what we needed after a day of walking around Disneyland.
Manager Response: Jason P, thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We love our staff, and our staff really enjoys helping our guests!  It makes our job easy when we have such delightful guests staying with us.  We hope you were able to also use the free Wi Fi, and take advantage of the free parking for one vehicle.  We are grateful for the compliments to the housekeeping staff as well, it is more important than ever for our staff to focus on cleaning and disinfecting after each guest checks out.  Next time you are in town, come back to see us again.  You will always be treated like royalty when you visit the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: Room was older but very clean, spacious and quiet. Parking was excellent. Very close proximity to Disneyland. About a 2 block walk which takes about 15 minutes at a leisurely pace. Although we were not staying a second day, the front desk let us leave our car in the parking lot for free when other hotels were charging $30 a day.
Manager Response: 662vickiec, thank you for your recent visit to the Castle Inn & Suites in Anaheim!  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review about your stay with us.  The hotel location is right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort area.  Walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventures, the Anaheim Convention Center, the Gardenwalk shopping center, and many different restaurants.  The hotel is one of the last ones to offer free parking for one vehicle on the nights of your reservation, free Wi Fi in the room, and also to not charge a resort fee, making it truly one of the best values in town.  We hope you remember us the next time you are in town and come back to see us again very soon!

Summary: Had a great stay at Castle Inn over Christmas . Lovely and attentive front desk staff who provided an electric kettle for me on request. The rooms were ample and well kept, the location was also quiet at night and really can't be beat for proximity to both the theme parks but also the walgreens/cvs if you need. The castle theme of the hotel is a cute and charming bonus as well. I will definitely stay again on my next Disneyland visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay with us at the Castle Inn & Suites during the holidays!  It is the best time of year to visit Disneyland, and you get the added bonus of the Christmas decorations in the lobby as well!  We really appreciate your compliments about the atmosphere of the hotel, along with the kind words about our staff.  You are definitely right about the location; it is right in the middle of all that the Disneyland Resort has to offer.  We are happy to provide our guests with items they need like a hot water kettle, extra coffee for the rooms, even a toothbrush when they are forgotten.  Thank you for the recommendation, and we can't wait to see you again next time you are in town!

Summary: The Castle Inn and Suites was the perfect place to stay for a Disneyland vacation. Located just a couple blocks for the park entrance, it was easy to walk to and from with the 5 kids in our party. The room we were in was very clean and large enough for our whole family to stay comfortably. The staff was super friendly and accommodating! I recommend staying at the Castle Inn and Suites. I will definitely stay there again for our next Disneyland vacation!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the 5 out of 5 review!  We are so glad to see you had a great stay with us and you plan to come back and see us again next time.  The easy walk to and from both Disneyland and California Adventures is one of the reasons many guests choose to stay with us.  We hope that our service, and your experience will be the reason you choose to come back and stay with us again!  Our Family Suite is a great option for larger families, with 1 king bed and 2 queen beds divided into separate spaces by a door.  Our staff is very grateful for your compliments, we always make our guest the priority.  We are looking forward to your next visit, we hope it is very soon!

Summary: Sorry this is a late review, My Family and I stayed here on Oct 18th and 19th. Upon arrival Staff treated us with warm smiles and quickly checked us in and got us settled. They provided us with area information, and let us know that they were there, if we needed assistance. The room was very nice, clean, sanitized and well disinfected. My Kids loved that we were so close to Disneyland, and they can walk to the park. On our last day at the Park, the Manager allowed us to leave our vehicle parked on the property, which saved us a few bucks, and made are day extra special. You have earned  a loyal Customer, Thank you!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review! We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  It is amazing how good we are all getting at being able to tell who is smiling, even behind our masks.  We appreciate the compliments to our front-line agents who helped you with the check in process, and we are glad you were able to leave the vehicle after checking out.  Timing is everything, on busier days we often have to ask the vehicle to move off property at check-out time.   We also are very grateful for the kind words about our housekeeping staff.  During these challenging times, we have made cleaning, sanitizing, and disinfecting a top priority in order to provide our guests with a safe, clean and comfortable place to stay.  As one of the only hotels with free parking, free Wi Fi, and no resort fees, there is no better value across from the Disneyland resort! We are proud to have you as a loyal customer, and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Family of 3 stayed in their standard room (2 Queen sized beds).  It was very clean and a comfortable fit with both a desk and a table. Refrigerator was cold, did not use the microwave.  We brought our own coffee pot as the little ones just aren't enough :)  But the front desk was always willing to resupply coffee, sugar, etc.  I was already aware that the gift shop had gone out of business due to Covid, so that was not a surprise. I have to agree with a previous review that having a continental breakfast served on site would be a great addition to this hotel.  However, if you are walking to Disneyland, there is an IHOP and Denny's on the way.  Speaking of walking, we found Disneyland to be more of a 15 min walk rather than the 5-7 min. I read.  But having a Walgreens and CVS (24
Manager Response: Moqui2015, thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are truly grateful for your kind words about your experience, the cleanliness of the room, and the interaction with our staff.  We are always happy to supply our guests with extra coffee for the rooms, when visiting Disneyland, we could all use a little extra caffeine.  It is unfortunate that the gift shop went out of business last year during the pandemic, and we hope to get a new tenant soon.  The Castle Inn & Suites is one of the only hotels across from the Disneyland Resort to offer free parking, free Wi Fi, and to not charge a resort fee.  While we do not offer a continental breakfast, each room does include a refrigerator and microwave if guests would like to bring in breakfast items, and of course the free coffee with the coffee maker.  Thank you as well for mentioning the nearby restaurants and convenient stores such as Walgreens and CVS.  We hope the next time you are in Anaheim; you will come back and stay with us again at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: Family of six recently stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites. It’s approximately 1.5 blocks from Disney, easy to walk with strollers etc. The Garden Walk is also about a block away so you can find lots of restaurants and shops. There is also a Starbucks next to the Walgreens (purchased 24 packs of water.)   We flew into LAX which looking back was a mistake, the Uber/Lyft trip was almost $100 and a 45 minute drive with light traffic. SNA would be the better option next time. Delta lost our stroller but fortunately we were given a loaner.  When we showed up we were greeted by Marc whom I believe is the hotel manager. He was very nice and helpful getting us checked in. We made him aware the lost stroller might show up and he said we would get contacted immediately if it did. We
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  And thank you for taking the time to write a very thorough review about your experience at the hotel.  We appreciate all of the kind things you have to say about our staff, our customer service, and the cleanliness of the room.  We are happy to see you received your stroller and the any issues you encountered were resolved quickly.  In place of offering a continental breakfast, the hotel includes other values such as free parking for one vehicle per room and free Wi Fi in the rooms.  The Wi Fi on the property is very fast and it allows our guests to stream movies or play online video games while on property.  Also, the hotel does not charge a resort fee that the majority of hotels in the area charge.  This allows the Castle Inn & Suites to provide our guests with the best value of any hotel within walking distance of the Disneyland parks.  We are glad to see we will make the list for your next stay; we hope to be at the top of the list once you add in the extra savings.  Remember, you will always be treated like royalty when you stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: This hotel is walking distance from the park. The staff is friendly and helpful. They’re great with returning customers too! It’s a clean, affordable hotel. Best bang for your buck! We stay here for all our Disneyland visits!
Manager Response: JoanieSuzette, thank you for the 5 out of 5 review of your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay with us!  Our staff is genuinely grateful for the compliments, it means the world to us to have our guests back in the hotel now that the Disneyland parks are open again and so is the hotel.  We agree that the Castle Inn is the best value of all of the hotels near Disneyland.  With free Parking, free Wi Fi, and No Resort Fees, there is no better place to stay.  Also, everything is within walking distance, from single slices of pizza to fine dining, many shopping opportunities, and of course walking distance to the entrance of both Disneyland parks.  Our friendly staff will be here ready to welcome you back on your next visit, we hope you come back and see us very soon!

Summary Heading: Best Hotel right outside the Park
Summary: Friends and I booked a family suite for the 5 of us during our Fall Break Trip to Disneyland. Was MUCH more affordable than any of the other hotels nearby without sacrificing any of the quality. Also only a quick 10 min walk to the Park Gates. Will definitely be staying again next time I come back to Disney!
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are one of the only hotels across the street from the Disneyland Resort to offer free parking, free Wi Fi and NO resort fees.  It truly is one of the best values in town and we appreciate your compliments about the quality.  We work hard to make sure each of our guests has a safe, comfortable, clean and memorable place to stay when visiting Anaheim.  The hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland, but also to the Anaheim Convention Center, and the Anaheim Gardenwalk shopping center.  We are so glad to see you are definitely coming back to stay with us again, and we will definitely be here looking forward to your arrival!  See you soon

Summary: Friend and I stayed in a room on the 2nd floor with 2 queen beds during mid-December. Gorgeous property and within walking distance (10-15 min) of Disney. We walked back and forth from the park to the hotel regardless of time of day, and the walk in between was always well lit and busy with other parkgoers, whether it was 7 in the morning, 11:30 at night, or anywhere in between; we always felt very safe and welcomed into the hotel when returning, too. The hotel itself is extremely charming with its castle motif/theming. The staff was always very friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and came with lots of clothing storage space, a fridge, and a microwave. The lobby Christmas decor was also extremely charming and made for some great photos.  My only complaint would have to be
Manager Response: Luckysocks11, thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites, and for taking the time to write a review about your stay.  We appreciate all of your compliments about the hotel.  The theme of the building itself really sets us apart from the other hotels in the area.  It makes a stay at the Castle Inn & Suites very memorable.  The walk to the entrances of both Disneyland and California Adventure is pretty quick and easy, and as mentioned it is always safe.  The street is well maintained, well lit, and always crowded with other guests coming and going from the Disneyland Resort.  The shower curtains in the rooms are an ivory color.  However, if there is ever a concern, please bring it to the attention of our front desk staff and we will have it addressed as soon as possible. We hope during the stay you were also able to take advantage of the free Wi Fi and free parking.  With no resort fees on top of the room charges, there is no better place to stay when you are in Anaheim. We like to celebrate the holidays and decorate for Halloween and Christmas.  Next year we hope you come back and see us again in the fall (if not sooner)!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: It's about a ten minute walk to Disneyland and the room that we had was great for two people. It was spacious and clean. Everything was in good working order and it was mostly quiet. I highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so happy to see you enjoyed you visit and we appreciate the compliments about the room.  The hotel is perfectly located across the street from the Disneyland Resort, but also close to so many other things such as convenient stores, a shopping center, and many local restaurants.  We hope you were able to enjoy the free parking for one vehicle during the nights of the reservation, free Wi Fi in the room, and of course the Castle Inn & Suites doesn't charge a resort fee either.  We are very grateful for your recommendation; it is the highest compliment you could provide.  We hope you are already planning your next trip to Disneyland, and if so, you are planning to come back and stay with us again as well!

Summary Heading: great stay at Castle Inn & Suites
Summary: My family had a great stay at Castle Inn and Suites in Oct. 2021. We had three rooms reserved. They were all near to each other. The staff was wonderful. We didn't have any problems. The beds were comfortable, there were plenty of towels and the showers worked great. We also enjoyed the pool and hot tub. The motel is only a short 10 minute walk to the entrance to Disneyland where we went each day. There was a refrigerator in each room in addition to a coffee maker. The price of the rooms was also inexpensive. We will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites in October.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review about your experience here at the hotel.   We are happy to see you enjoyed your stay and that our staff was able to get the rooms located as close as possible.  Our staff appreciates your kind words, and we make every effort to meet our guests' requests.  Having a heated pool and especially a hot tub is such a treat after a long day at the Disneyland parks.  We hope you were able to enjoy the free parking for one vehicle per room, and the free Wi Fi during your stay as well.  Having a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and a hair dryer in the room brings all the comforts of home on your Disneyland vacation!  We are glad to hear you plan to return to visit us again, the sooner the better!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay and close to the park!
Summary: I've looked into a few places to stay close to Disneyland before and this one always went under my radar despite seeing it almost every time I was in the area. This last visit it popped up and I ended up pulling the trigger, and I'm glad I did. The outside is really well themed, and even more beautiful at night. When you're in the parking lot it really starts to feel like a castle and a fortress.  We stayed in a 2 queen room, and it was spacious enough for us, had most amenities we needed (TV, fridge, table space etc...), and was a delight to stay at. The only real thing that I would say could change would be the amount of outlets in the room, but I understand this is probably an infrastructure thing and not an easy thing to change. I HATE parking lots and finding parking but
Manager Response: Starlord749, thank you so much for taking the time to write such a thorough review about your experience here at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate all of the kind words, and the great description of the hotel.  The building itself is definitely iconic, and makes a trip to Disneyland even more special and memorable.  With refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, and hair dryers, the room provides almost all the comforts of home.  We appreciate your feedback about adding outlets, as mentioned it is not as easy as just sticking something in the room, there is a process involved.  We are working on some creative solutions to resolve this issue in the near future.  The Castle Inn & Suites is one of the only hotels left across from the Disneyland Resort to offer free parking, free Wi Fi in the room, and to not charge a resort fee.  That is the best surprise at the end of a hotel stay, no surprise charges!  We definitely love to see all of the families walking up and down Harbor, it is a great change from a year ago!  We are so happy to hear you plan to come back and see us again, we hope it is very soon!

Summary: We stayed in the Family Suite which has 1 king in one room and 2 queen beds in another. It was perfect for us traveling with our two adult children. The second room had a mirror and sink so we weren't always fighting over bathroom space. There was a fridge in the room where we kept our breakfast drinks, as the hotel doesn't offer breakfast. It's not modern or updated - it could use additional outlets or USB ports - but it was adequate for our needs and the location was perfect, a short walk to the Disneyland parks. Restaurants and stores were nearby making it very convenient.
Manager Response: Lisa W, thank you for the great review about your stay!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit and we are grateful for your compliments.  The Family Suites are definitely the most comfortable way to travel, having the extra vanity in the back makes getting ready for Disneyland a lot easier for larger groups.  The hotel rooms have many of the modern amenities such as refrigerators, microwaves, flat screen televisions, hair dryers, and coffee makers.  We are working on a solution to provide additional outlets and USB ports in the rooms, so we hope you come back and stay with us again to see the updates.  The location in relation to Disneyland, shopping experiences, and restaurants is very tough to beat, right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort.  We look forward to your next stay, we hope it is soon!

Summary: This was my first time staying at this hotel. The staff was great, the rooms were clean and worked very well. Stayed in a family suite with a king bed in one room and 2 queen beds in the other room. Thank you to the staff for being great both in check in and check out. I believe i spoke with Brianna at check out and unfortunately did not get the name of the man that helped to check us in. Both were great! Will definitely recommend this hotel. Not far from Disneyland, was able to easily walk to and from the park. Already planning to stay here on our next trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review about your experience, and welcome to the Castle Inn & Suites family!  We hope during your stay you were able to take advantage of the free parking and free Wi Fi as well.  We are sincerely grateful to you for the compliments to our staff.  Brianna is wonderful, like all of our staff we are lucky to have them and they always work hard to help our guests.   The Family Suite is the best way to stay when visiting the parks.  Plenty of space, separated areas for privacy or if some people in the party want to get some sleep a little earlier, and with all the comforts of home.  We hope we will become your home away from home when you are visiting Disneyland and we are already looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great location for Disney! Very sweet staff!
Summary: We stayed there for Disneyland, not a far walk at all and close to CVS/Walgreens. The staff was very nice about us leaving our vehicle BEFORE check in and AFTER check out which helped a ton!! Thank you! Room was clean and perfect!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review about your stay!  The parking policy provides free parking for one vehicle per registered room during the nights of the reservation.  Parking prior to check in and after check-out is subject to availability on the day of arrival.  We are glad to see we were able to accommodate your vehicle on this recent stay.  The hotel location is fantastic, right in the heart of the resort area, close to the entrance of the parks, but also close to so many great restaurants and shopping opportunities.  We hope the next time you are in town, you will come back and see us again as well!

Summary: This is one of our favorite hotels to stay at when visiting Disneyland. Great staff, always helpful and friendly. Rooms are perfect in size, always clean and comfortable. Location is easy walk to the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming back to stay with us again at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so happy to see all of our guests coming back to the hotel now that the parks are open again.  We are truly grateful for your kind words about the staff, we have always placed a special emphasis on our customer service.  Our housekeeping staff has been working to make sure the rooms are always kept to the standards you have come to expect from the hotel.  As one of the only hotels across the street from Disneyland to offer free parking, free Wi Fi, and to not charge a resort fee, it is truly one of the best values in the Disneyland Resort area.  We hope you come back for another wonderful stay very soon!
