Summary: Excellent hotel with a short walk to Disneyland. The hotel was clean and comfortable. The staff were helpful and friendly. We arrived early and left late; storing our bags was not an issue. The staff made the stay less stressful for this. Definitely would stay again.
Manager Response: Daniel, thank you for writing about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your kind words about our staff.  We are always looking for ways to help our guests.  The hotel offers free luggage storage for our guests prior to check in and after check-out.  We have found that guests really want to maximize their time in the parks, so leaving the luggage to get to the parks that first day, or to hit the last few rides after check-out is a big benefit.  Since the hotel is such a short walk to Disneyland, it is easy to just come back after check-in time (3:00PM) to pick up the keys and head to the room.  We look forward to your next visit, hopefully it is very soon!

Summary Heading: Staff is outstanding and the hotel is very close to the parks
Summary: We chose this hotel because of its proximity to the Disney parks, only a 7 minute walk, which meant we could walk back to rest a bit in the middle of the day. With a fridge and microwave, we could even make a snack The rooms were clean and a standard size for the price point. What set this hotel apart was the incredible friendly and kind staff.  They were very helpful and pleasant.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We also believe that our staff is truly what sets us apart from the other hotels, we are very lucky to have them and they are appreciated.  We have always made our guests a top priority, and we will continue to strive for the excellent customer service you have come to expect from us.  The Castle Inn & Suites is one of the only hotels across from the Disneyland Resort to offer free parking for one vehicle per room during the nights of the reservation, free Wi Fi in the room, and to not charge a resort fee.  Having the amenities such as a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and a hair dryer in the room makes the vacation much more comfortable.  We are so happy to hear you will definitely be back for another visit; we hope it is sooner rather than later!

Summary Heading: Perfect spot for a family Disneyland vacation!
Summary: We were looking for the perfect hotel for a family vacation to Disneyland and found it at the Castle Inn and Suites. We booked a suite so our teenagers could have their own room which worked great with two queen beds in their room. The rooms were very clean and worked great for our family.   It took us less than 15 minutes to walk to the entrance to Disneyland and California Adventure. Our battery died when we arrived at the Castle Inn and Suites. Not having tools to switch out the battery, the maintenance staff at the Castle Inn were a huge help and let us borrow some tools.   We would highly recommend the Castle Inn and Suites!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!  We appreciate your compliments about the staff, we try to go out of our way to be helpful.   We are happy to hear our maintenance staff was able to help you with the battery issue and you were able to get the car running!  The Family Suite is definitely the most comfortable way to stay, with a king bed in the front area, then 2 queen beds in the back, there is plenty of room for everyone.  Also the room feature 2 televisions which can come in handy with larger groups.  In addition every room features a refrigerator, coffee maker, microwave, and hair dryer, so the hotel has all the comforts of home even though you are on vacation.  We hope you keep us in mind the next time you come to visit Disneyland.  We would love you have to back at the hotel again soon!

Summary: Hey there everyone...my family recently stay at this hotel call castle inn and suites and it was an amazing experience for being 1st timers at that hotel room was very spacious for the 5 of us very clean all around and so close to everything amenities like breakfast was not offered but we didn't care much about that when there is many other alternatives around like Denny's IHOP and various others places to eat and very close to the main course DISNEY PARK... overall we were happy with our stay at castle inn and suites
Manager Response: Thanks for the Awesome review about the Castle Inn & Suites!  We appreciate you taking the time to let the world know you had a great stay with us.  In place of offering a continental breakfast, the hotel offers free parking for one vehicle during the nights of the reservation, free Wi Fi in the room, and we do not charge a resort fee.  As mentioned, with so many options within walking distance of the hotel, it is easy to find someplace for breakfast.  Every room also has a refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker as well, in case guests would like to bring any breakfast items in.  We hope the next time you come to town you come back to visit us again at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: I have always stayed here when visiting Disneyland.  The staff is always welcoming and friendly.  The rooms are clean.  My most recent visit, due to covid restrictions, housekeeping does not visit everyday, however, if you need anything, (i.e. towels, pillows, trash emptied), a simple call to the front desk and its done.  The walk to the park is completely doable.
Manager Response: Lisa5457, thank you for writing such a kind review about your stay with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate that you have come to stay with us time and again over the years.  It has been so wonderful to see all of our repeat guests coming back to stay with us after the shut down during the pandemic.  We are still adapting and finding new ways to provide our guests with the level of comfort and service they have come to expect over the years.  While we have modified the cleaning procedures in order to eliminate the contact point between the staff and the guest, we still make sure to clean and sanitize every room, using hospital grade cleaning chemicals after each guest checks out.  We also have staff available to deliver items to rooms, or to pick up used towels or trash from outside the rooms during the stay.  We look forward to serving you for many more years to come.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Clean, friendly, great atmosphere and a short walk to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is very clean and the castle theme gets the kids in the mood to visit Disneyland.  The pool and hot tub were highlights for my girls and the staff were really helpful and accommodating.  The rooms are small and basic but well laid out.  The hotel was pretty full when we visited but I didn't hear anyone through the walls at all.  Either our neighbours were really silent or this hotel has great sound proofing.  My guess is the latter.  I came to this hotel in 1990 as a kid and it was neat to return with my kids in 2021.  The inside and outside have been well maintained and I am excited to return again and make it a family tradition.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review about your experience with us.  Your first visit to the hotel was just after we opened back in 1990, and we think it is wonderful you were able to bring your children back to the hotel after all these years!  Every room on the property features a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker and a hair dryer.  We hope you were also able to take advantage of the free parking for one vehicle and the free Wi Fi while you were here.  The castle theme really does make the hotel a memorable place to stay, and we hope you and your children come back to stay with us often!  Remember, you will always be treated like royalty at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: A great stay within walking distance to Disneyland. The rooms were basic but very clean and spacious. There were multiple food places as well as a Walgreens, CVS, and Starbucks only a short walk away. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thanks for writing about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites, we are so happy to see you enjoyed your visit!  All rooms in the hotel include free parking for one vehicle during the nights of the reservation, free Wi Fi in the room, and also refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, and hair dryers.  During the current health situation, we have placed even more of a priority on cleaning, disinfecting, and sanitizing the hotel rooms for our guests.  The hotel location is one of the great benefits of staying with us, within walking distance to everything you could need.  With free parking, guests can just park the car and walk to many restaurants, stores, shopping centers, the Anaheim Convention Center, and the entrance to Disneyland and California Adventures.  We are looking forward to the next time you come to visit!  Hope to see you soon

Summary: This was a very clean, comfortable place to stay during my vacation. The staff was excellent—so nice and helpful! You can tell they really care about their guests. They also take safety seriously—be sure to wear your mask in shared spaces like the lobby and elevators. I slept really well in the beds and totally had enough towels to last the entire visit. It was also in a super convenient location. There were drugstores and convenience stores nearby and, of course, the parks. It took me a mere 10 minutes to walk from the hotel and get through park security. I'd totally recommend this hotel to others!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for leaving us a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We thank you for your kind words about our staff, we are always striving to improve our customer service and we are glad we met or exceeded your expectations.  During this challenging time, we have taken extra steps to ensure the health and safety of all of our guests and our staff.  We require masks in all indoor areas such as the lobby and the elevators, and we have provided appropriate PPE for all of our staff.  There have been many other additions such as hand sanitizers throughout the property, heightened cleaning protocols, and acrylic shields in place at the front desk.  We are glad to hear you had a comfortable night's sleep, and we will pass on your compliments to the housekeeping staff as well.  Thank you for the recommendation, and we hope to see you very soon!

Summary: So close to Disneyland, comfy beds and such a relaxing pool area. I’ve stayed here twice now and been more than satisfied with my stays. Would highly recommend this place to anyone who is looking for a short walk to the park
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!  We couldn't ask for more than a recommendation from a guest who has come to stay with us multiple times.  Having a heated pool is one feature we just couldn't go without.  Great in the summer to cool off, yet warm enough in the winter so guests can still swim and enjoy the hot tub.  The pool is open every day of the year from 8:00AM to 10:00PM.  The hotel is in one of the best locations in town, right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort and walking distance to so many shopping areas, restaurants, and of course the star of the show, Disneyland.  One of the best parts about staying at the Castle Inn & Suites is the lack of extra costs.  We include free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi, and do not charge  a resort fee.  We are already looking forward to your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: I stayed here for my birthday and I have to say the service was absolutely amazing! A short walking distance from Disney, and close to a ton of food. Definitely will stay here again. The concierge desk was very helpful and extremely nice
Manager Response: Thank you for writing about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Our staff is grateful for your compliments about the service you received.  We make customer service a priority and always put the guest first.  The location across from the Disneyland Resort is one of the best perks of staying at the hotel, but with free parking and free Wi Fi too, it truly is a value that can't be beat.   We are glad to hear you plan to come back and stay with us again, we hope it is very soon!

Summary Heading: Perfect Hotel for a family Disneyland trip!!
Summary: My husband, daughter, and grandson stayed here for one night while visiting Disneyland.  Right when you walk in the lobby doors you are greeted warmly! We were lucky our room was ready for early check-in at 1:00 pm.  The room had a microwave and mini fridge.  Room was clean and well stocked with necessities.  The AC worked great.  My grandson enjoyed the kid pool which is 1 1/2 feet deep.  It was an unusually hot day so the pool was a plus.  There is a Starbucks and Walgreens close by.  Disneyland is only a 10 minute walk!! And parking is FREE!! Upon checkout we realized we had a dead car battery.   The girl at the front desk said they would be able to help us with that! We had already called for roadside assistance.  I can’t recommend this hotel enough!! This will be our go to
Manager Response: Nancy, thank you for writing such a fantastic review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  It sounds like you had a great stay with us.  We are sincerely thankful for all of our guests, and we love to see their smiling faces coming into the lobby.  All of the rooms in the Castle Inn & Suites come with refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, and hair dryers.  It is like traveling to Disneyland without leaving the comforts of home.  The hotel provides free coffee with the coffee makers as well.  Not only is the hotel within walking distance to both Disneyland and California Adventures, but also within walking distance to many dining and shopping opportunities as well.  We try to always go the extra mile for our guests, and to be prepared for any situation that may arise.  We appreciate being your go-to hotel and we look forward to many more experiences with you and your family in the near future.

Summary: Be aware that they will not guarantee a ground floor room and will try to convince you that no hotel will. We need a ground floor for disability purposes which is why we request it all the time when traveling and try not to take an accessible room when we don't need the features of one and leave those rooms for those that truly need it. So by requesting a regular standard room on a ground floor works well for everyone and many hotels are more than happy to do so.  They tried to tell me that no hotels will guarantee a ground floor when in fact there are many hotels that will as we travel multiple times a year for pleasure and medical purposes staying in a variety of hotels and rarely have come across one that refuses to guarantee a ground floor like they do. They weren't even
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us feedback regarding your phone call to the Castle Inn & Suites.  We would like to take this opportunity to address your concerns, and we will use this information to try to improve on our future guests' experiences.  We have researched this incident with our staff, we apologize for the late reply but we wanted to make sure we had all of the information.  While we cannot guarantee a room located on the ground floor, we can always place a request on the reservation and our staff will make every effort to meet the request.  We are not able to speak to whether other hotels or properties are able to guarantee a room to be located in a specific area, we can only reply regarding our own policies.  When a guest books a room at the Castle Inn & Suites, we guarantee to hold the room for the guest's arrival.  This means that even if the guest is arriving late in the evening, we will not cancel the reservation.  However, we cannot guarantee the room will be located in a specific location as due to some unforeseen circumstances, we may not be able to place the room in the desired location.  We apologize if there was a misunderstanding, and if we did not meet your expectations by not guaranteeing the room on the ground floor.  Our staff has reported they offered a room type which has a roll in shower, which is only located on the ground floor and would therefore satisfy this request.  However, as mentioned in the review, this room type was not desired.  We hope this will help to clear up any misunderstanding, and if you decide to book with us in the future, please know that we prioritize all of our guest requests and strive to provide the best customer service we can.

Summary: Check in was easy and the staff was kind! The rooms were clean, the A/C worked well and didn't smell of mold or mildew. They offered to hold my bags at check out too! I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We appreciate your compliments about the front desk staff and we are so glad to see you enjoyed your stay with us.  We offer free luggage storage for our guests prior to check in and after check out.  We know most of our guests want to spend as much time as possible in the Disneyland parks, which are only a 5 to 7 minute walk from the hotel.  We are happy to hear you will definitely come back to stay at the hotel again, we hope it is soon!

Summary Heading: Clean, friendly and walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here in November 2021. This hotel is on the same road as the entrance to Disneyland and 2 blocks from the entrance, so eat walking distance. The rooms are a bit dated but they are extremely well kept and clean. When we entered the room it was obvious that they are disinfecting between guest stays with bleach. The rooms had a half fridge, microwave, coffee maker, and hair dryer in them. The beds were comfortable and great pillows on them.  The front desk staff were very friendly and very accommodating. They were very fast responding to any requests we had. Good COVID controls in place as well. There is a strip mall beside the hotel with a subway, pizza place, Korean fast food, and a Mexican place to eat. Three is also a CVS, Walgreens, and 7-11 all at the intersection 2
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  The location of the hotel is one of the many benefits of staying here.  Not only within walking distance to so many great restaurants and all of the convenient stores you mentioned, but also to the gates of both Disneyland and California Adventures.  As one of the last hotels right across the street from the Disneyland Resort to offer free parking, free Wi Fi, and no resort fees, the Castle Inn & Suites is the best value in town.  We are truly grateful for your compliments about our staff, we make our guests a top priority and we can't wait to welcome you back to the hotel soon!

Summary: We just spent 5 wonderful days at Castle Inn & Suites! From the ease of checking in (completely covid compliant)  to the cleanliness of our family suite I can’t say enough amazing things about this lovely place! Due to covid daily housekeeping is not an option but let me tell you that any time I called guest services they were quick to get me anything we needed. I called for towels and within 2 minutes They were hand delivered by the nicest person on staff! So close to Disneyland that it was a 10 min walk to the front gate. Close to Starbucks, CVS and the strip mall next to it had delicious Mexican food! Our room was a nice size with comfortable beds. The hot tub was nice and clean as well. Very charming grounds and easily accessible. We will definitely be staying here again!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the outstanding review of your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  During this challenging time we are making every effort to ensure the health and safety of our guests and our staff.  The hotel has provided all appropriate PPE for the team members, and implemented additional cleaning and sanitizing protocols not only in the rooms but also at the front desk.  As mentioned the housekeeping service is limited to cleaning and sanitizing the rooms until after guests check out, but we are happy to provide all of the amenities guests need during their stay.  The location is one of the great benefits of staying at the Castle Inn, walking distance to everything in the heart of the Disneyland Resort Area.  The entrance of the parks, Downtown Disneyland, the Anaheim Convention Center, and the Gardenwalk Shopping Center as well.  The Family Suite is definitely the most comfortable way to spend a Disney vacation, with 1 King bed in the front room, and 2 Queen beds in the back room, it is big enough to accommodate up to 6 guests.  Thank you for your compliments to the maintenance staff about the pool and the grounds, we will be sure to pass them on.  We hope to see you back at the Castle soon!

Summary: The staff is always extremely helpful, friendly and professional!! This is the only hotel my family stays at when visiting Anaheim (Disneyland)! The location is fantastic, Free parking and great service! Marc, the manager, always does his best to accommodate his guest and their needs!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay.  We can't tell you how happy we are to have our guests coming back to the hotel after such a long time.  We missed seeing out guests' smiling faces during the closure of Disneyland.   The Castle Inn & Suites is one of the last hotels across the street from Disneyland to offer free parking for one vehicle per room on the nights of the reservation, free Wi Fi in the room, and to not charge a resort fee.  We are already looking forward to the next time you come see us again!

Summary: Great hotel! Very reasonably priced, clean, comfortable, and within walking distance to Disneyland (approximately 7–10 minute walk). I recently stayed there for a family Disney trip and we were extremely satisfied! The staff was polite, and professional and made sure we were taken care of. Would absolutely stay there again in the future and recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!  Our staff is always working to provide guests with the type of visit you experienced,  safe, clean and comfortable.  We very much appreciate your compliments to our team and we will continue to make every effort to continue giving our guests the high level of customer service they have come to expect.  The location is certainly one of the best in the area, right across from the Disneyland parks, and within walking distance to several shopping and dining opportunities.  We are grateful for your recommendation and we will look forward to your next visit!

Summary: It's so good to be back at the Castle Inn! We've missed them so much during Covid. They always treat us exceptionally well. We've stayed here every year (prior to Covid) for almost ten years. We wouldn't stay anywhere else when we visit Disney. The service, the comfort, the cleanliness - all spot on!
Manager Response: Holly, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We at the hotel are so happy to see guests again.  During the time the hotel was closed, we missed our repeat guests who we have developed a relationship with over the years, and things are finally starting to feel like "normal" again when we see their smiling faces coming back to stay with us.  We have always placed a priority on our customer service, and we appreciate your compliments to all of our team.  We hope you were able to take advantage of the free parking, and fee Wi-Fi while you were here.  We are looking forward to another 10 years of serving you and your family!

Summary: First of all, you can’t beat the location — it’s a roughly ten minute walk from hotel to the Esplanade, so it’s incredibly convenient for midday returns and arriving early. As for the Castle Inn and Suites itself… well, it’s adorable! You’re literally staying somewhere that gets you perfectly in the mood for Disneyland. The rooms are spacious, you get FREE parking included with your booking which is much appreciated after the recent parking price hike at the parks, and the staff is so friendly. Everyone I spoke to during my stay was awesome and always accommodating. They’re a wonderful team and a perfect stay for you and your family! :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review of your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We couldn't agree more about the location, right across the street from the Disneyland resort, within walking distance to the entrance of both parks.  Also within walking distance to many shopping and dining areas as well.  Thank you for your kind words about the hotel, and about our staff.  All of the efforts of the the team contribute to each guest having  a positive and memorable experience when they visit.  The hotel offers free parking for one vehicle per room during the nights of the reservation, Free Wi Fi, and also does not charge a resort fee.  With all these added values, it is definitely the best choice in the Disneyland Resort area for families.  We are looking forward to your next visit already!  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed at the CI&S for 4 nights. Good proximity to DL. Timed it at 14min walk from hotel to park turnstiles. Because of covid, no housekeeping during our stay, but still resupplied plenty of towels as needed. Also, towels are NOT available at the pool, you must bring them from your room.  We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so happy to see you enjoyed your visit to the hotel!  The walk from the hotel to the park is very easy, and can take even less time if you catch the green light!  During this time, our staff is limited to cleaning and sanitizing the rooms after guests depart.  This is done out of an abundance of caution during the ongoing pandemic.  We hope we will be able to return to "normal" soon, and we will be able to provide service on all of the rooms in the hotel.  In the meantime we are happy to supply guests with the amenities from the rooms such as towels, coffee, shampoo, soap, etc. either from the front desk or by delivering them to the rooms.  Guests may take the towels from the room to the pool, and then contact the front desk so we can provide the guest with fresh towels and remove the used towels from the room.  We hope that you decide to come back and stay with us again very soon.

Summary: Though it may need some updating, it was a wonderful stay, friendly staff, clean rooms, great hot tub, and perfect location. This review needs 200 character minimum, although I already wrote everything that needs to be said.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your visit to the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your compliments about our friendly staff and we will continue to make customer service a top priority of the hotel.   We are fortunate to have a housekeeping staff that is always working to keep the rooms up to the standards of the hotel and providing our guests with a clean, safe, comfortable place to stay.  We hope while you were here you were able to enjoy the included values like free Wi Fi, and free parking for one vehicle in the nights of the reservation.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you

Summary: The place was great from checking in to the room being very comfortable to checking out.  Everyone was very nice and helpful esp when I had a scooter delivered there, they charged it for me every night and helped me in and out with it
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Our staff is very grateful to you for the kind words.  We are happy to help guests with their scooters, and we have created a special area just to charge them overnight.  It is much more convenient for the guest to pick the scooter up from the lobby, rather than take it to the room.  We hope during your stay you enjoyed the in room amenities such as the microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, and hair dryer, which all help to make your stay more comfortable.  We also hope you had the opportunity to connect to our free Wi Fi network, and take advantage of the free parking for one vehicle during the nights of your reservation.  We are looking forward to your next stay with us, we hope you come back and see us again soon!

Summary: We stayed here last month.  It was a great trip.  Check in was quick and easy.  The friendly staff went over COVID protocols and we were off to our room.  We had 2 rooms and the staff ensured they were adjoining.  Rooms were clean as always as this wasn't our first stay on this property.  The kids loved the pool as it was refreshing after a long day at Disneyland.  The only issue was that the little gift/snack shop had closed due to COVID but that was quickly remedied with a short walk to CVS.  This property is an easy walk to Disneyland and close to the Gardenwalk.  We love this property and already booked for our next trip in December with my other son and his family.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review!  We appreciate your kind words about the hotel and the staff, as well as your many stays with us over the years.  The gift shop unfortunately did not survive the pandemic, and we were very sorry to see them go out of business.  We hope to get a new tenant in the gift shop soon so we have everything our guests need here on the property.  However, as mentioned, CVS, Walgreens, and 7-11 are all within walking distance which is very convenient.  We make every effort to meet all of our guest requests, and we are happy to hear the front desk was able to get your rooms adjoining.  We are looking forward to your return in December!  Please let us know if we can be of any further assistance

Summary: We haven’t been able to go on vacation for a while now and making reservations or trying to go anywhere has been crazy! But these guys were amazing! They were accommodating helpful efficient and it was an absolute pleasure staying here! Things were clean comfortable and anything we had questions about they were more than happy to help. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  It was our pleasure to have you as a guest of the hotel.  We truly appreciate all of your compliments about our staff, from the time the reservation was created, through the stay, and at check out.  We are so lucky to have such an amazing housekeeping team that always makes sure our guests have a clean, comfortable, and memorable experience.  We are looking forward to your next visit.  And remember, you will always be treated like royalty at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: Our stay at Castle inn was great! It’s the perfect distance to the Disney parks. The 3 small pools were good for a shallow pools for the littles, a larger pool to stretch out and a hot tub to ease mom and dads sore muscles. The rooms were clean and staff was super friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  The pool area has something for everyone!  Nothing like a long hot soak in the hot tub after an exciting days of Disneyland and California Adventure.  We hope you were able to enjoy some of the other amenities of the hotel as well such as free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi, and with no resort fees, it makes the Castle Inn one of the most popular choices for families coming to Disneyland!  Our staff appreciates your compliments and we will be here for you the next time you visit!

Summary Heading: Castle Inn puts you close to Disney
Summary: A great hotel to stay with family’s. We had the 3 bed room that house 6 of us comfortably. It was a short not the shortest but short walk to Disney so it was easy to access and head back in middle of day if needed. Comfortable beds and nice staff. I would recommend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review about the Castle Inn & Suites!  The Family Suites are the most comfortable way to stay when you have 6 people in your group.  With 1 King bed in the front area, 2 queen beds in the back area, a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and hair dryer, it is like having a home away from home.  Plenty of space for everyone to spread out.  The location is incredible, within a 5 to 6 minute walk from the entrance of the Disneyland parks, but also within walking distance to many restaurants, and shopping areas.  We hope the next time you come to visit the Disneyland Resort you will come back to stay with us again!

Summary: Our family always stays at the Castel Inn and suites. This place is rustic and you feel like your in a old castle. Rooms are very clean,  FREE parking, staff is so helpful and very happy to help with your stay. This place is only a 10 minute or less walk to downtown Disney. Great for families for a nice vacation or a short stay. Highly recommend and it’s worth the price our family thinks. You can see photos on there Website, make reservations or call them with questions. Have a magical stay!! The Watson Family
Manager Response: Watson Family, we are genuinely grateful to you for staying with us over the years.  We have a lot of repeat guests to the hotel, and we love to see you coming back to stay with us.  It is almost starting to feel like "normal" again.  The Castle Inn is definitely one of the best values on the block.  With free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi, and no resort fees, it is the perfect option for families such as yours who are coming to visit Disneyland.  All those savings on extra fees charged by other hotels add up to a lot of churros inside the parks!  Thank you for the compliments to our housekeeping staff, we will make sure to keep up the standards you have come to expect when staying with us.  We hope to see you and the entire Watson Family back in the hotel very soon!

Summary: Our stay here was perfect!   When you visit Disneyland, you are not at your hotel much but I loved it.  Each night we would soak in the hot tub and swim in the pool.  They accommodated my request for a late check-out so I didn't have to wait outside for an hour for my uber to the airport.  The staff were great, too!  I would highly recommend staying here.  I will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your Fabulous review of your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites in Anaheim!  Our staff sincerely appreciates your kind words.  There is nothing like a long soak in a hot tub to melt away the long days of walking around and riding all of the rides in Disneyland.  Our front desk is available 24 hours per day, and we are happy to accommodate our guests requests when possible.  We are pleased to see the staff was able to extend check out by an extra hour for you.  We appreciate your recommendation and we hope to see you again very soon!

Summary Heading: Hop skip and a jump to Disneyland
Summary: This is a very reasonable priced Hotel within walking distance to Disneyland ( under 10 minutes) The exterior of Hotel is castle theme and the standard room with 2 queen beds was very roomy with plenty of table/desk space and a roomy closet. Free parking, one vehicle per room ( which most Hotels charge $15 A DAY) 4 story outside entrance to rooms. Staff was masked and extremely courteous and patient with many guests to tend to during these covid times. Room was very clean and the bed was firm and comfortable. All things in room were in working order and when a quarter got stuck in washing machine (guest laundry) Steve from the front desk was prompt in fixing the machine, returning my lost quarters and setting the machine for a free wash due to the inconvenience. This occurred
Manager Response: Peterpan4ever, thank you for writing a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  As one of the only hotels left to offer free parking for one vehicle per room on the nights of the reservation, free Wi Fi in the room, and no resort fees,  the Castle Inn & Suites is the best value in town!  We appreciate the kind remarks about the housekeeping staff, they work hard to make sure the rooms are clean and comfortable for our guests.  Our front desk staff is always looking for a chance to go above and beyond with the customer service, and we thank you for sharing your story.  Next time you are in town, come back and see us again!

Summary: We booked a hotel a month ago and let them know we'd get there late. But it turns out they gave our room away without notice! So we were trapped in Anaheim at 4 am calling places hoping for the best. We called about 10 places before calling here and everyone turned us down. We were getting desperate and exhausted. We called here and they got us a room asap, got us in, gave us a cheaper rate than normal just to make sure we had place to sleep. They saved our butts. We are magic key holders at Disney and we already made it so this is our official go to place. We are so happy we found this place. Walking distance from Disney, amazing cozy beds, and the best service around. We already have our next trip booked here! Will always recommend. Thank you Castle Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for writing about your experience here at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are not sure we are "Life Savers", but we definitely are happy we could help you when you came to town.  Our hotel never cancels reservations for our guests with a late arrival.  We require a credit card, or payment in advance to guarantee a reservation, and we will make sure to have the room available if you arrive after check in time.  We appreciate the recommendation as well as your compliments to our staff.  We hope we have become your home away from home when you are in the area using your Magic Key reservations to visit Disneyland.

Summary: The service here is always great. Comfortable beds, clean room, and a hop, skip, and a jump to Disneyland. It's our go to place every time we visit Anaheim. There are restaurants along the way. Plus! It looks like a castle! Adding to the magic of a Disneyland visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming back to stay with us again and again.  It is finally beginning to feel like "normal" when we can welcome back our returning guests.  Thank you for your kind words, our staff is always looking for an opportunity to provide the level of customer service our guests have come to expect.  The hotel location is perfect for families visiting the Disneyland resort, a short walk (or a hop, skip, and a jump) from the entrance of both parks, and also within walking distance to many restaurants and places to shop!  As mentioned, it also looks like a castle!  This iconic structure really sets our hotel apart from the rest, and makes the experience very memorable for all of our guests!  Come back to see us again (and again)  soon!

Summary Heading: Nice, Clean, and Comfortable with a great location
Summary: Decided it was finally time to get out of the house after a year and a half of no traveling, and Disneyland was the place. This place had great reviews, prices and location.    My flight got in early, and I got to the place early. Check in was friendly and easy, and although they did not have any rooms available for an early check in, they did have a secure place to store my luggage until a room was ready. This allowed me to head to the parks early that day.   Once I got my room, I found it to be very clean and comfortable. (I even gave it a black light test, and it passed! I've been to some high end 4 star places that haven't). Beds were very comfortable. Nice amenities (Coffee maker; mini-frig; microwave) Bathroom was clean. And my only ding for the place would be the height
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a very thorough review of your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are very happy to see you enjoyed your stay, and we appreciate all of the high praise.  Our housekeeping staff is always making an extra effort to ensure all of the guest rooms are cleaned to the standards of the hotel and meet or exceed the guest's expectations.  The hotel location is very convenient. so close to the entrance of the Disney theme parks, but also close to all the restaurants and stores in the area as well.  The extra value comes from the included amenities like free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi in the room, and with no resort fees it is a great selection for families.  Our friendly staff will be here to welcome you , and treat you like royalty the next time you visit.

Summary: We planned a weekend with family with a central location in Orange County.  The Castle Inn was a perfect fit!  Our Parlor Suite had 2 queen beds in the back room and a lovely couch and table in the front room with the bathroom between.  I really enjoyed the bedding! Clean lines with 2 sheets and a blanket were so comfortable!  They have a nice pool on site with a very warm Jacuzzi. We chatted with other guests! So friendly!!  Check in and out was easy and efficient.  I'm terrible with names. 😬 Maybe Bart and Brittney?? 🤷🏼‍♀️ Super kind!  Thank you for the over and above hospitality! 😉  Will stay here again in a heartbeat!! ❤
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review!  We love seeing our guests coming back to the hotel from all over the country.  We hope you made it home safely and we can't wait to see you again!  A Parlor Suite is just the ticket when booking for a larger family, or for guests who just need a little more space (or an extra television).  Each room at the Castle Inn also features a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and a hair dryer.  We hope you were also able to take advantage of the free parking for one vehicle per room, and free Wi Fi.  We genuinely appreciate your compliments to the staff and about the hotel in general.  Our "B" team at the front desk is looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great place, short walk to Disneyland
Summary: Super clean.  Friendly staff.  Perfect place for families - large rooms with two queens and sofa bed.  Short walk to Denny’s, iHop, Starbucks.  Two blocks from Disneyland.  Very comfortable.  Pool.  You also get free parking for the day you’re there, though not for the day you check out.
Manager Response: Thanks for the 5 out of 5 review!  We think the hotel is perfect for families as well.  The hotel offers several different room layouts for families of all sizes.  From 2 queen beds, or 2 queen beds and a sofa bed, to 1 king bed and 2 queen beds, there is something for everyone.  The location is very convenient as well, walking distance to multiple options for restaurants, shopping, and of course the entrance  to both Disneyland parks.  The hotel pool is outdoor, heated, and open every day from 8:00AM to 10:00AM.  The hotel provides free parking for one vehicle per registered room during the nights of the reservation.  In order to ensure we have enough parking for the guests arriving, we cannot guarantee parking at the hotel after check out.  We hope the next time you are in town, you will come back to see us again!

Summary: I went with my sister and niece and the entire family to Disney, took her for the first time and we were all excited. I  have stayed in others years at Castle Inn and it was fun, and this time around great too and they take Covid very seriously and have great precautions, we all felt good about the choice. The free parking is a major perk because you need a car, and very nice staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so glad to see you enjoyed you visit to the hotel, and welcome back after the challenging time during the pandemic.  Our hotel has implemented many policies and practices to be as proactive as possible in the prevention of COVID-19.  Our staff takes the health and safety of our staff and our guests very seriously and makes it a top priority.  Our hotel is one of the only ones in the area to not only offer free parking for one vehicle per room on the nights of the reservation, but to also offer free Wi Fi, and to not charge a resort fee.  Our staff thanks you for the compliments and we will be here the next time you want to visit.

Summary: Just stayed there 4 nights! Very friendly and helpful staff! Nice clean room! Only a 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Main Gate! Only a half a block from Starbucks and Walgreens! Highly recommend it!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay.  The location of the hotel is very difficult to beat in the area.  The Castle Inn  & Suites is located about halfway between the entrance to Disneyland, and the Anaheim Convention Center.  Also directly behind the hotel is the Gardenwalk shopping center where there are many shopping, dining, and entertainment options.  Everything is right within walking distance!  Thank you for the great recommendation, and we will look forward to the next time you come and stay with us again!

Summary: Just got back from our Disneyland trip, we had a great time. 1st time staying at Castle Inn & Suites Anaheim. I highly recommend this hotel. We stayed in the Family Suite this time. It was very clean & spacious, within walking distance to Disneyland, food, pharmacy if needed, & a Starbucks. Staff was very friendly & helpful. My only ding is, toilet was low, kid friendly, not old man friendly. Other than that, if you are going on a family vacation to Disneyland, stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.
Manager Response: Mike, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  The Family Suite is definitely the best way to travel.  With one King bed in the front area, and 2 queen beds in the back area, there is plenty of space for larger families or groups.  We hope you were able to enjoy the free parking for one vehicle, free WiFi, and the close walk to the Disneyland parks as well!  The toilets are of a standard height, but we appreciate the feedback and will keep it in mind.  We hope that though this was your first visit to the hotel, it won't be your last!

Summary: We loved staying here! The staff is very nice and accommodating. The location is a very short walk to the parks, which was very convenient having two toddlers. The location was very quiet and felt safe. We will definitely be staying again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic 5 out of 5 review!  We loved having you as our guest, and we are so glad to see you enjoyed your stay at the hotel.  Our staff is always working to provide the best possible customer service to our guests.  The hotel location is perfect for guests visiting Disneyland.  Right across from the parks, about a block south of the entrance to both Disneyland and California Adventures.  Also within walking distance of the hotel there are many restaurants, shopping areas, and entertainment options.  We are looking forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Room was very comfortable and clean, front staff very polite and helpful. Close to Disneyland and California Adventure. Close to restaurants. Will definitely stay here again. Love the parking was included.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and the review about our hotel.  We are so happy to be able to provide our guests with a great experience now that the hotel is open again.  Our staff appreciates your compliments, and we will continue to try to provide the level of customer service you experienced for all of our guests.  The Castle Inn & Suites is one of the last hotels across from Disneyland to offer free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi, and to not charge a resort fee.  With all these added together, it is definitely the best value in town.  We are already looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: This was a perfect choice for my daughter and I. It is a short walk right across the street and down a block to the park entrances. The hotel was very comfortable and very clean. They had the most fabulous shower head that was a godsend with tired aching muscles. the staff at the front desk were always very friendly. I would definitely stay here again if I were to visit Disneyland in the future.
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review!  We are glad to see you and your daughter had a great stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We try to provide a safe, clean and comfortable stay for all of our guests.  This includes providing an adjustable showerhead in the room along with a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and a hair dryer.  The location in relation to Disneyland is very tough to beat.  Walking distance to both Disneyland and California Adventures, and also within walking distance to the shops and restaurants in the Disneyland Resort.  We hope you have a chance to come back to Disneyland again soon, and when you do you come back and see us again too!

Summary: Our rooms were clean and quiet.  We stayed in other places where you can really hear the traffic on Harbor Blvd, but this one is tucked away behind a castle wall to keep out the noise!  Very helpful staff and free parking!!  I haven't gotten that at any other hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  Our staff genuinely appreciates the compliments, we work hard to make customer service a top priority.  The Castle theme is not only helpful to make the hotel a memorable place to stay, but the design also allows the majority of the rooms to be away from the noise on the street.  We hope you were also able to enjoy the other values of the hotel such as free Wi Fi, free Parking, and no resort fees.   Next time you are in town to visit Disneyland, we would love to have you come stay with us again.

Summary: Free Parking, friendly staff, quick walk to Disneyland- it was exactly what we were looking for. We arrived early, stayed late the next day and we’re still able to park for free. Definitely coming back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!  We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay with us!  It is great that we were able to accommodate your stay with an early check in and late check out.   Check in is usually after 3:00PM, and check out is at 11:00am.   Parking will generally expire at check out time on the day of departure.  It was good timing that the hotel was going to have enough parking to allow the vehicle to stay a little while after check out.  When providing free parking for one vehicle per room, we have to make sure we will have enough parking for our guests arriving each day.  We look forward to the next time you visit, and we hope you have the same great timing!

Summary Heading: Great location and service, also really cute aesthetic
Summary: This was my first trip to Disneyland as an adult and it was so much fun!!! The hotel was well priced, clean rooms, cute aesthetic, easy walk to Disney, and really great service! Also great AC for those hot LA days. Shout out to Marc who helped us out during check out :)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  Welcome to our family, it is a big family of people from all over the world.  We appreciate your kind words about the hotel and our staff.  We will continue to make every effort to provide our guests with the type of experience you had your first time here.  As one of the last hotels across the street from Disneyland to provide free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi, and to not charge a resort fee, it is the best value in town!  Next time you are in Anaheim, come back and see us again!

Summary: I’ve stayed here many times over the years and have never been disappointed. Staff is wonderful and the rooms are spacious and clean. Sadly, they had to close down their gift shop for the time being, but I’m hopeful they’ll reopen that once business picks up.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us in the past, and for your recent return to the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so grateful to see our repeat guests coming back to the hotel  after the hotel was closed during the pandemic.  During that time, our gift shop unfortunately didn't survive, and we are also hopeful we will find someone to reopen it soon.  One lucky thing about the location of the hotel is we are surrounded by convenience stores such as 7-11, Walgreens, and CVS Pharmacy.  These stores can provide most of the items that our gift shop once sold on property.  In the meantime we will do our best to provide all of our guests with the safe, clean, comfortable experience we always have.  Thank you for the compliments to our staff, and we hope to see you again real soon!

Summary Heading: GREAT place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: We arrived pretty late but we had no issues checking in. The staff were really friendly and the distance from Disneyland to Castle Inn was no more than 7 minutes! The rooms were spacious and clean, we’ll definitely be returning :)
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us!  Our front desk staff is available 24 hours per day, late check in is never a problem.  We are grateful for your compliments to the staff and will continue to give you the customer service you deserve when you stay with us.  The location is super convenient, close to the Disneyland entrance as mentioned, but also close to shopping opportunities, and all the great restaurants in the Disneyland Resort area.  With parking for one car included free, free Wi Fi, and no resort fee, it is the best value in town.  Thanks again for staying with us, and we look forward to the next time you are in town!

Summary: We love this place!!!  I was able to make an easy last minute upgrade,  and the upgrade was reasonable,  Even though we were in charge of our own housekeeping,   that was made easy by calling the front desk,  and getting clean towels,   trash removed,  and extra coffee supplies,   all within a timely manor.      The hot tub was not that hot,   however when talking to the front desk they had their pool person looking into it.  The room was clean,  and the customer service was on point
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We know that during this challenging time with the new Covid restrictions, things are quite the "normal" we were used to.  Our staff is happy to supply guests with the in room amenities either from the front desk, or we can have them delivered right to the room.  We will also remove trash or used towels while dropping off new items.  We make every effort to address any guest concerns as soon as possible, and as mentioned the pool service company was out the next day.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, and the upgraded room.  When saving on parking, Wi Fi, and resort fees, it is easy to see why guests may want to spend a little bit more for a larger room type.  We hope the next time you come to Disneyland you will come back and stay with us again at the Castle Inn & Suites.

Summary Heading: Great Big Room, but location was a bit tough
Summary: This hotel had great service and a nice room, however we were placed next to the elevator and the ice machine for our level and were awakened a few times by people using these utilities late at night. Other than that, everything was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are happy to see you enjoyed your stay.  Our rooms are quite spacious for the area, and complete with refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, and hair dryers as well.  We are sorry to hear the location was inconvenient, and we would be happy to add a request for a quiet location if you decide to return to the hotel.  Our staff is looking forward to your next visit, please let us know if we can be of any further assistance.  Thank you

Summary: The reviews I read weren't very good. Upon my arrival I was treated to SPECTACULAR CUSTOMER SERVICE by Angel and Mark. The room was very clean and comfortable. So difficult for small hotel chains to compete during COVID-19. These people were all great! Went above n beyond. GREAT EXPERIENCE! Disneyland was close. The hotel was maintained nicely during my stay. I WOULD RECOMMEND!⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Manager Response: Thank you for the Spectacular 5 Star Review!  We are so happy to have our guests back in the hotel, and we appreciate your recommendation.  As a small business in Anaheim, an independently owned and operated hotel, we love the opportunity to not only compete with, but to exceed the standards of the large corporate chain hotels in the area.  At the Castle Inn & Suites each guest is special, your not just another number in the system.  We genuinely appreciate your compliments and we will look forward to the next time you visit.  As always, we will continue to provide free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi, and we never charge a resort fee.  Thanks again for staying with us!

Summary: The staff here is fabulous!!! We’ve been fortunate to go to Disneyland 4 times since they have re-opened and 3 out of those 4 times we’ve stayed here and it’s always a great place to stay. Rooms are clean, quiet, super close walk to Disneyland/California Adventure and the staff is AMAZING!!! We needed a late check out today and they were extremely accommodating. We have purchased a Disney Magic Key and we will definitely be back and staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the amazing review of your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are very fortunate to have a great staff at the front desk to take care of the guests, and the fabulous housekeeping department that makes sure each guest room is up to the standards of the hotel.  We love having our special repeat guests who come back to visit with us so often.  The new Magic Key program at Disneyland makes it much more accessible for guests and we hope we will see you many more times in the near future!

Summary: Our room was clean & comfortable, and the price was very reasonable.  The walk to Disneyland was only a few minutes and the staff here was exceptionally nice and helpful.  I’d definitely recommend staying here!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about the Castle Inn & Suites.  Our staff always goes the extra mile for our guests, and we are so happy to see it was noticed and appreciated.  As far as value goes, our hotel is tough to beat.  Walking distance to shops, restaurants, and the entrances of the Disneyland parks.  The hotel also offers free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi, and does not charge a resort fee.  We appreciate your recommendation as well, this is the highest compliment we could receive.  We hope the next time you are in town, you will be back at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: We love this hotel! We always stay here when we visit the parks. The staff is extremely friendly and always willing to help. Very close to the parks! Free parking! And free WiFi! Yes please! Pulse the kids love the decor.  Foss Family
Manager Response: Thank you Foss Family for staying with us again and for the amazing review.  We couldn't have said it better ourselves!  We know there are a lot of options near Disneyland, and we are very grateful to be your hotel of choice.  It is always nice to see a familiar face checking into the hotel,  and we are looking forward to your next stay already.  Our staff will be here waiting to provide you with the customer service you have come to enjoy over the years.

Summary: This is a great hotel for your Disneyland trip! It's so close to the park. And it's quiet and safe. And the rooms are well kept and spacious. We'll be staying here during our next family trip to Disneyland, for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!  The location of the hotel is one of the best in Anaheim, right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort area.  Within less than a 10 minute walk to the entrances of both Disneyland and California Adventure, also within walking distance to the Anaheim Convention Center, and many restaurants and shopping areas.  Our staff works hard to make sure each of our guests has a safe, clean, comfortable, and memorable experience.  We can't wait for your next Disneyland trip so we get to see you again!

Summary: We went to Disneyland and the walk was real close. There were lots of places to walk to  eat at. The staff was super nice and helpful I would stay again! We took my 3 year old and 12 year old and we loved the stay there plenty of room and very clean 👌
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so happy to have guests back in the  hotel and grateful for your kind words about your experience with the staff.  The hotel is located right in the heart of the Disneyland resort, walking distance to dining, shopping, and of course the entrance to both Disneyland theme parks.  We hope your children enjoyed our Castle theme and felt like royalty while you were here.  It is a perfect hotel for families, with microwaves and refrigerators in every room, free parking for one car, and free Wi Fi too!  We are looking forward to the next stay, we hope it is very soon!

Summary: Brought my family here in August '21 for a Disneyland trip.  The staff were very helpful and accommodating.  The room was clean and bigger than expected.  Overall this turned out to be a much better experience than I was even expecting, and will return again
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  The hotel is a perfect choice for families visiting Disneyland.  With free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi, and no resort fees, it is the best value in town.  We are happy to hear you were impressed by the experience you had, and we look forward to accommodating you again.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for trips to Disneyland
Summary: This was our second time staying at Castle Inn. Both times have been great stays. I am so happy to see that the hotel is open again for those looking to visit Disneyland. Almost anything you could ever want or need is within a short walk. The short walk to Disneyland is so nice in the morning and there is practically no crowd once you get out of the bus area when leaving for the night. Anytime we needed anything for our room housekeeping was on it very quickly. the free parking was also a huge plus and definitely something to consider as parking in the area can add up. Can't wait to visit again when we come back to Disneyland in a few years.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are grateful for the 5 out of 5 rating!  Our staff is so excited and happy to have our guests back after being closed for over a year during the pandemic.  The location is one of the best, as mentioned it is within walking distance to everything you need, restaurants, shops, entertainment, and of course the entrance to both Disneyland and California Adventures.  As one of the only hotels in walking distance to not only offer free parking, but also free Wi Fi and not charge any resort fees, the hotel is a great value.  We can't wait to have you as a guest again, come back to see us soon!

Summary: We stayed at Castle Inn and Suites for four days while we went to Disneyland. The rook was nice, quiet, and clean. The staff was extremely friendly, the inn was close to a CVS and Walgreeens. It’s about a 10 minute walk down the street to the Disneyland property, which was also nice. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We appreciate your compliments and we can't agree with you more.  As a hotel located across the street from the Disneyland resort, the value is really difficult to beat.  Located within walking distance to all sorts of shopping, restaurants, and of course walking distance to the main entrance of Disneyland as well.  We are one of the only hotels still offering free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi, and not charging a resort fee as well.  Our staff will continue to provide our guests with a safe, clean, and comfortable place where they can rest easy after a long day at the parks.  We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: This was our second stay at Castle Inn!  Love walking to & from Disneyland!  Staff was wonderful & friendly!  Hotel room had everything you could need including refrigerator & microwave!  Large sink area outside bathroom was great for one of us to shower & the other of us to get ready!  Mini closet perfect for hanging up clothes!  Air conditioner was heaven!  Would highly recommend!  Look forward to our next visit!
Manager Response: Thank you for coming back to stay with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so happy to welcome back our repeat guests again.  Our staff is grateful to you for the kind words, and we will continue to provide the level of customer service you have come to expect.  Having a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and a hair dryer in the room makes the hotel feel like a home away from home.  The layout of the room was designed for guests getting ready for the Disneyland parks.  In the event the restroom area is being used for a shower, the vanity area is available for another guest to use for makeup, to shave, or to brush their teeth.  We try to make every effort to ensure our guests are well taken care of and have every opportunity to maximize their time in Disneyland.  We will be here waiting for you the next time you are in town!

Summary: Family of 3 stayed for 2 nights, close to Disneyland, lots of little shops around for necessities . Staff was very accommodating allowing us to leave our rental car there even after check out for another day in the park. Pool was clean with a hot tub.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review, and for giving us a 5 out of 5!  The hotel really is very convenient, close to Disneyland, close to the Convention Center, and also to many shops and restaurants.  Our staff appreciates your nice remarks, and we always try to accommodate our guests when possible.  In general, the free parking is limited to one vehicle per room for the nights of the reservation only.  Parking technically expires at check out time on the date of departure.  However, if you were staying at the hotel during a time when the parking is not full, we are happy to allow the vehicle to stay parked after check out.  This will be based on availability, and the front desk will have to make the decision on a case by case basis.  We are glad to see you enjoyed your stay, and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Our family stayed from Aug 13-Aug 15. It’s our first time staying at the hotel and the staff was friendly. We stayed in a family suite which was perfect for our family of 5. Disneyland is 10 mins away from the hotel with plenty of parking. Our rooms were clean and didn’t have any problems. The hotel staff followed COVID-19 protocols. There were also plenty of restaurants and convenience stores nearby like 7-11. We had a wonderful time!  We are definitely coming back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the amazing review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We pride ourselves on the friendly service all of our guests have come to expect.  The Family Suite is definitely the best way to accommodate a larger family, with 1 king bed and 2 queen beds, up to 6 people can comfortably sleep in the 2 room suite.  With free parking, free Wi Fi, and no resort fees, it is a great choice for families of all sizes.  We are taking all precautions when it comes to the health and safety of our staff and our guests.  We want to make sure everyone stays healthy so you can keep coming back to stay with us in the future.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Everything was PERFECT! The staff were VERY friendly, hospitable, accommodating, knowledgeable, and went above & beyond! The room was clean, spacious, and comfortable. And to top it all off, it was only a 2 block walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites!  Our staff is always prepared to go the extra mile for our guests, and they are what makes our hotel such a great place to stay.  Our housekeeping staff is grateful for your kind words and we will all continue to give our best effort to ensure all of our guests meet the same standards you experienced during your visit.  The walk to Disneyland is nice and easy, and with parking and Wi Fi included, the value of the hotel can't be beat!  We hope the next time you are in town you will come back and see us again!  You will always be treated like royalty at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: I booked this hotel for my daughter's 21st Birthday. She has always wanted to stay at the Castle!  Customer Service was OUTSTANDING. Rooms were very clean. Air worked GREAT! It was not noisy at all. I would stay here again. I was afraid the walk was going to be brutal after a long day at the parks, as I have stayed closer up the street to the park before but parking your car and getting in and out of those small areas was not fun! I even hit a pole at one hotel. There is PLENTY of spacious parking and the pool looked fun.  Restrooms were clean. BRING YOUR OWN SOAPS AND SHAMPOOS! I forgot too!  But what they provided did the job.  Beds were clean and comfy.  Again customer service and staff were OUTSTANDING!
Manager Response: Thank you for the OUTSTANDING review!  We have always made customer service a top priority at the hotel and we are very grateful for your remarks about the customer service and we are happy to be your hotel of choice to celebrate your daughter's 21st birthday!  The housekeeping staff is always making sure the rooms are clean and ready for our guests to enjoy.  During these past few months the air conditioners have been a very important aspect of our guest's stay.  Though the parking is spacious, and there are plenty of spots, we do have to keep a limit of one vehicle per room in order to accommodate all of our guests.  And the bonus that the parking is included for free makes the hotel one of the best values in Anaheim!  We are sorry to hear you forgot your soap and shampoo, but the hotel is happy to provide extra of any of the in room amenities requested during your stay.  We can't wait to see you again the next time you come to town!

Summary Heading: Great Stay! Will be my Go To next trip!
Summary: I was very happy with my stay here! Location is great! Rooms amenities were what I had hoped for! Clean, comfortable rooms! Great staff!! Price was very reasonable!! I was very pleased with my stay here, and this will be my 1st choice next time I go to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for for the 5 out of 5 review!  We were very happy to have you stay with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  Besides the location right across from Disneyland, we hope you were able to enjoy the other added values included with your stay such as free parking, and free Wi Fi.  Another great value is that the hotel does not charge a resort fee, saving guests more money for Disneyland souvenirs!  We aim to provide a clean and comfortable stay for our guests and seems like we were able to do just that for you.  We hope we will become your home away from home whenever you are in town visiting Disneyland.  See you real soon!

Summary: Stayed w/ my family in the family suite  big room and great privacy. Not a long walk from Disney and can’t beat free parking and free wifi and friendly staff. Definitely recommend! Returning soon! 😁😁😁😁
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  Our Family Suite is the most comfortable way to stay when visiting Disneyland.  With one king bed in the front room, and 2 queen beds in the back room, there is plenty of space for everyone to sleep comfortably.  The rooms also have a door to divide them for privacy, and a television in each room of the suite.  The hotel is within walking distance of the park as mentioned, and our friendly staff really appreciates your compliments.  Thank you for the recommendation as well, we look forward to your return!

Summary: We love staying at the Castle Inn! The location is perfect!! Just a short walk to Disneyland. The rooms are clean, employees are friendly & helpful, pool & hot tub were well kept and relaxing after a long day at the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay.  We appreciate your kind words about the staff and we will continue to try to make everyone feel like they are welcome and special.  We are so proud to be your home away from home and we know that it is a privilege to be your chosen hotel when you are visiting Anaheim.  Our repeat guests are a big part of what makes our hotel unique, and we look forward to your next stay!  Remember at the Castle Inn & Suites we will provide free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi, and we do not charge a resort fee.

Summary: My family and I spent 3 nights at the Castle Inn & Suites for our visit to Disneyland and we will definitely consider staying there again when we come back. The rooms were spacious and clean, the staff was friendly and available before & after the parks opened and closed, and the location was perfect (less than 10 minute walk to and from Disneyland).
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.   We are so glad to see you enjoyed your stay and will come back and stay with us again soon!  All of our staff appreciates your compliments about their customer service and the cleanliness of the rooms.  Our front desk is available 24 hours per day for any help a guest may need.  We hope during your visit you were able to enjoy the other added values such as free parking, free Wi Fi, and no resort fees on top of the great location of the hotel.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We had a great experience there while visiting Disneyland for a week. The staff is friendly, the rooms are clean, the beds are comfortable. They also have a pool and a hot tub, which was nice to relax when we were not in the parks. Very good location, we had a short work to the entrance of the park. We are a family of 6 and the suite was perfect for us with 2 rooms, 1 king size bed and 2 queens.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review!  We are so happy to have guests back in the hotel after being closed for over a year.  Our staff gets excited to help the guests with any questions, and always makes it a priority to ensure they have the best possible experience.  Our housekeeping department appreciates your kind words and will continue to make every effort so our guests have a clean, comfortable, and safe place to stay when visiting Disneyland.  The pool and hot tub definitely come in handy to cool off during the summer months, or for a good soak after a long day of walking at the parks.  The Family Suite is the best option for a family of 6, plenty of space for everyone to spread out.  We look forward to your next visit, come back and see us again soon!

Summary: Clean rooms. Excellent service . Fast room service . Plus free parking for one car. Close to disneyland (8 mins walk). Close to stores(Walgreen, cvs). Staff is friendly. Swimming pools area is clean and well maintained
Manager Response: Thank you for your very well organized and efficient review of your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites!  Our staff appreciates your compliments.  We always make our guests the top priority and put an emphasis and providing a clean comfortable place to stay.  The front desk is always going out of their way to help guests.  The hotel is one of the last in the area to offer free parking for one vehicle per registered room, free parking, and to not charge a resort fee!  The location is difficult to beat, walking distance to all of the entertainment, shopping, and dining options in the Disneyland Resort has to offer.  Our swimming pool is open every day from 8:00AM to 10;00PM.  The pool and children's wading pool are heated, and of course the hot tub is always a welcoming sight for guests after a long day at Disneyland.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great service; we were arriving late (after our day in Disney), and they were very helpful making sure we knew we could check in at 11 pm. They also told us to call in the morning when we were driving over to see if there was any parking available, so we didn't have to park at Disney. There wasn't, but it was still good of them to offer. Wouldn't have been a bad walk from the park to the hotel, but wasn't a bad drive either :)
Manager Response: Thanks for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are sorry to hear there was no parking available early in the morning, this summer has been very busy!  If you come back at a time when the hotel is not as full, we will be happy to have you park prior to check in time.  Our front desk is available 24 hours per day to help guests, even if it is late at night we will be ready and waiting for you.  The hotel is definitely within walking distance of both of the Disneyland parks, and we even include the parking for free!  (Limit of one vehicle per registered room on the nights of the reservation)  We hope the next time you are in town you will come back and see us again!

Summary Heading: Great service & close to Disneyland gate
Summary: Stayed July 24 - 28, 2021 in a standard double queen room. From the minute we walked in, we were greeted with smiles and treated this way throughout our stay. Check in was a breeze, but we were early and no rooms available yet, but we were allowed to park so we could walk to Downtown Disney. (our park tickets were for the next day) The gentleman at the desk also reminded us that the stroller we had rented had already been delivered and gestured to the side of the lobby where it was set up and waiting - yay! No walking a toddler! He also said we could use the pool, but all the changing and needing to unpack swimsuits etc, was a little much for us after dealing with LAX and the traffic from there to the hotel. (If you get the opportunity - fly into Santa Ana, that is what we will
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are so happy to have guests back at the hotel, and we are glad to see we made your experience great!  Our front desk staff appreciates your kind words and the housekeeping staff is very grateful for the compliments as well!  We work with several companies in the area that deliver items such as strollers, wheelchairs, electric scooters, and even gift baskets for our guests.  Anything we can do to make your stay a little more enjoyable and comfortable is our pleasure to provide.  The hotel location is one of the best in the city, and rooms that are complete with refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, and hair dryers make our guests feel right at home.  We can't wait to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Easy walk to Disneyland.  Clean hotel.  Nice staff.
Summary: I just came back from a 4 night stay at the Castle Inn.  Before going, I read some reviews saying that Castle Inn was an old, basic motel and the one redeeming quality was the short walk to Disneyland.
