However, I was pleasantly surprised at the room I stayed in and the motel overall.  The room my family got appeared updated and very clean.  Nothing in the room appeared to be old.  At the time of my stay, daily maid service was not happening due to Covid-19.  Cleaning of rooms was only happening after guests check out.  However, you can call the front desk and ask for fresh towels, coffees for the in room coffee maker, and additional toiletries (soaps, shampoos, toilet paper).  After I called, I got a delivery within a few minutes of towels, soaps, and coffees for the coffee
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites!  The Castle Inn has been welcoming guests through its doors for over 30 years, and in all that time we have constantly been keeping up the hotel and maintaining the property.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, and appreciated all of the hard work the staff does to provide a clean, comfortable, and safe place for our guests.  All rooms have been updated with refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, and hair dryers.  The hotel also includes free parking for one vehicle, free parking, and does not charge a resort fee.  So in addition to the great location, the hotel is the best value in town!  We are glad to hear you will come see us again next time you are in town!

Summary: Clean hotel; friendly and helpful staff. Close to Disneyland (10-15 min walk)  and restaurants close by. My kids love the castle theme. Swimming pool was a little small but still fun for the kids to swim at.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  The location of the hotel is one of the best in the Disneyland Resort area.  There are many entertainment options, the entrances to the theme parks, restaurants, and shopping opportunities all within walking distance of the hotel.  The Castle theme definitely makes it a memorable place to stay, and we love having families stay with us.  We hope you will remember us the next time you are in town.  Remember, you will always be treated like royalty when you stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary Heading: Clean, comfy, and close to the parks
Summary: We stayed here four nights and couldn't have been more comfortable. Staff was super friendly and accommodating.  No housekeeping because of Covid and that's understandable.  We got what we needed when we asked. Easy walking distance to parks and restaurants.  Rooms and grounds are very well maintained.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the 5 out of 5 review of your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Our staff is very grateful for your compliments.  We all work hard to make sure our guests have a pleasant, safe, enjoyable, and memorable stay.  Due to the ongoing pandemic, and out of an abundance of caution our housekeeping staff is limited to servicing rooms only after check out.  We appreciate your understanding, and we are happy to provide requested items to our guests during their stay.  We will continue to offer our guests free parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi Fi in the rooms, and will not charge our guests a resort fee.  These added values make our hotel one of the best choices for families visiting the Disneyland parks.  We hope you and your family will come back to see us again very soon!

Summary: We loved our stay here. Clean and comfortable. The staff were professional and helpful. The pillows are soft and comfy. The shower was really nice. Hot water was plentiful. It’s very close to Disneyland - a short walk. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Our staff appreciates your compliments and we will continue to offer the best possible customer service you have come to know and expect.  In addition to the great location, we hope you were able to take advantage of the free parking for one vehicle, free Wi Fi, and the lack of resort fees.  Our family owned hotel will continue to provide a safe, clean, and comfortable place for guests to stay.  We look forward to the next time you visit us at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: 10 minute walk to Disney.  No lobby coffee but Starbucks is a quick walk around the corner.  Also due to Covid there is no housekeeping and they only clean before you check in and after you leave so a bigger trash can would have been nice.  Hotel was quiet so you didn’t hear your neighbors which is a plus.  Also we left a bag of my daughter’s stuffed animals by mistake.  Hotel management contacted us and we were still in town so we were able to pick them up before making the drive home.
Manager Response: We appreciate the 5 out of 5 review!  While there are some limitations during this challenging time, our staff is happy to find a way to accommodate all of our guests requests.  Though we are not entering the rooms to provide daily service, we have staff on property throughout the day, and into the evening to pick up trash or drop off any requested items.  We are pleased to see you enjoyed a nice quiet room to rest after a long day at Disneyland.  Our staff always goes the extra mile to make sure our guests have a memorable experience, and we are grateful we could catch you before you went home so you could pick up the stuffed animals.  We hope you remember us on your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: We booked this hotel last minute as we didn’t want to drive home late at night after a long day at Disney! I was originally concerned about noise as it’s right on the main road, but the windows are double paned and it was remarkable quiet! The room was clean, beds comfortable and the front office staff were very friendly and helpful.  Plus you can’t beat the location, just a short walk from the parks! Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  It sounds like you had one of our Executive Suites.  This is the room type located on the front of the building, with double plane glass windows.  The room also features a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and hair dryer.  All of the Executive Suites also feature 2 queen size beds, and a sofa bed.  We are happy to hear our front desk staff provided you with excellent customer service!  The location is just about the best in town.  With free parking and free WiFi, there is no better option in town!  We look forward to your next stay!

Summary Heading: Perfect room for my family of 6, thank you Castle inn!
Summary: The property is cool, I love the castle theme. It is starting to show its age, however the location is great.   Pros:  - Closer walk than if you park in the Disney parking lot since their trams are not running.  - A couple of good restaurants close by after Disney (Hawaiian on the left and Mexican on the right were both good). - It felt so good to find a hotel that had rooms that would accommodate a large family. Since I have small kids that was the deciding factor, I don't want to split up the family on a Disney trip. We got a room with two queens and a pull out bed.  - Quiet (couldn't hear neighbors or traffic) - Having a pool and hot tub was really nice to swim in  Cons:  -Not cleaning the rooms every day (I know its a COVID thing, but still its an annoyance when we are
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of the Castle Inn & Suites.  We understand that limited service is not convenient, but the health and safety of our guests and our staff is our main priority during these challenging times.  It sounds like the room type you had reserved was our Executive Suite with 2 queen beds and a sofa bed all in the same shared space.  The hotel offers even larger rooms, which have a door to separate the front room from the back room, and offer 2 queen beds plus a king size bed.  Another pro about staying at the Castle Inn & Suites is free parking for one vehicle per room on the nights of the reservation, free WiFi, and no resort fees.  We hope you were able to enjoy these features as well.  Next time you are in town, we hope you choose to come stay with us again.

Summary: This hotel was very affordable, the staff was friendly and helpful, and we had a clean room! It’s also a short walk to disney. Highly recommend if you’re unsure of which hotel to go to for your disney trip!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  The staff is very grateful for your compliments and we hope to see you again soon!  For all groups traveling to Disneyland the hotel is a safe, clean, comfortable place to stay.  The hotel is also within walking distance of the Gardenwalk shopping center and the Anaheim Convention Center.  With so many options for dining and entertainment, guests can just leave the vehicle parked in the lot (free of charge for one car per room on the nights of the reservation) and walk to all the great things Anaheim has to offer.  Thank you for your recommendation, and please come back to see us when you return for your next Disney Trip!

Summary Heading: Pleasant hotel and close to Disneyland
Summary: We had a group of 9 people. We had two rooms. One room was a suite. The hotel was clean. The staff was very friendly and helpful. It was a very short walk from the entrance of Disneyland. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel experience.  Our staff works hard to make sure our guests have a clean and comfortable stay.  We always make customer service a top priority.  We are so happy to have guests back in the hotel that it makes our day to here you appreciated the help.  The hotel location is the best in town, close to shopping, close to dining, close to entertainment, and of course close to the main gate of both Disney parks!  We are happy to hear you will be back to stay with us again some day!

Summary: This was our first stay at Castle Inn & Suites, and we are glad we chose this spot.  Love the castle theme / look of the hotel - very appropriate for us Disneyland visitors.  The staff was very welcoming, friendly, helpful, and easy to talk to.   Even though they are not cleaning rooms if you are staying multiple days, staff is very responsive to providing whatever you need right away when you call.  We really enjoyed the pool and jacuzzi as they were clean and in good working order.  And we loved that it was so close to the park entrances - just a 10-minute walk.  Would certainly recommend this place to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We have been waiting for the opportunity to host guests at the hotel again!  Out of an abundance of caution, and for the health and safety of our guests and our employees, rooms are only serviced after guests check out.  We hope that as things continue to improve we will be able to return to the service we provided prior to the pandemic in the near future.  The pool is heated, and the pool area is open from 8:00 in the morning until 10:00 in the evening.  We are happy to hear you will be recommending us and look forward to your next stay.  Thank you

Summary: I have always been a big fan of Castle Inn and Suites when paying a visit to Disneyland. I was delighted to find that it was still going strong after the extended park closure due to the pandemic. The staff was still friendly, the rooms were still clean, and the location was still optimal.   Due to the pandemic, they are not currently performing housekeeping services until after checkout, but this was not inconvenient at all as the staff was prompt and amenable to any requests made for fresh towels or emptying a garbage can. I felt that my health and my comfort were both made top priorities throughout my stay and I left looking forward to returning there again on a future trip. Thank you for a safe welcome back, Castle Inn and Suites!
Manager Response: 3tylerf, thank you for staying with us again at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We can't tell you enough how happy we are to have guests back at the hotel, and how grateful we are to have survived the pandemic and the extended closure of Disneyland.  Though some things have changed as mentioned such as the housekeeping service limited to after check out, some things never will, such as our commitment to our guests and our staff.  We are happy to assist our guests with any needs during this time, and will continue to make the health and comfort of our guests a priority.  The location is right in the heart of the Disneyland resort, and the hotel still offers free parking, free WiFi and still does not charge a resort fee.  We are thankful to be your preferred hotel when paying a visit to Disneyland.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Our stay at the Castle Inn & Suites was great. We got there early before check in and of course were able to leave all of our luggage and they checked us in so when we came home from Disneyland that night we were all set to go. We had two rooms and got us right next to each other with adjoining doors which was nice. The people at the front counter couldn't have been nicer and so friendly. Easy to talk to also. When we came back that night our rooms were ready, we got our stuff and off to our rooms. Same thing when we left after our third night there. We left our stuff because we had a late flight and went to downtown Disney for the day. They were very accommodating and again everyone was very friendly. I highly recommend this hotel, the rooms were a nice size and clean. I would
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review Michele M!  We are happy to offer free luggage storage for our guests prior to check in and after check out!  As mentioned guests with cars receive free parking for one vehicle on the nights of the reservation.  One thing that makes the Castle Inn & Suites special is the staff, and we all appreciate the compliments.  There are a limited number of connecting rooms, and we are glad to see it had a big impact on your experience.  Next time you are in town, we hope you have found your home away from home.

Summary: First time staying at the hotel. The price was right. Walking distance to the park. The staff was friendly and the room was clean.  They were not cleaning the rooms due to Covid. But we put out trash out each day and they picked it up. When we needed fresh towel they brought them up within 5 mins.  We will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  Our staff appreciates your compliments and works hard to make sure guests enjoy their stay.  As a precaution for our employees and our guests, we are only servicing rooms after check out.  However, as mentioned, we are happy to help in other ways such as removing trash, delivering towels, or other amenities as guests request.  With a very competitive rate, free parking, free WiFi, and no resort fees, it is difficult to find a better value near the Disneyland Resort!  We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Customer service is amazing!  Friendly and engaging staff!  Location is the best!  Walking distance to Disneyland and several shops and restaurants.  A/C works great!  It is cold :)  We had 4 adults in a two bedroom suite.  Very comfortable!  We will be back!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  It sounds like you had a Family Suite, with 1 king bed in the front room and 2 queen beds in the back room.  This room type is perfect for larger groups, or groups that need a little extra space.  Our staff appreciates your remarks about the amazing customer service!  The hotel location is in a prime spot right in the center of the Disneyland Resort area.  During your stay you may have also enjoyed the free parking, free Wifi, and that the hotel has no resort fees.  We hope you come see us again real soon.

Summary: Though they aren't the fanciest they are the most accomodating and welcoming!    We were treated like royalty at the Castle Inn BEFORE we checked in and AFTER we checked out!  The owner was so generous and allowed us to store our luggage when we arrived several hours before official check-in and even use the pool to soak our tired feet despite it being well past check-out time but our shuttle to the airport wasn't going to arrive for hours.    And the heated pool and spa were wonderful, the room very clean, and you can't beat the location!  one block from the Park entrance, 1/2 block from Dennys, Walgreens and CVS -
Manager Response: Thank you for your fantastic review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are all working hard to provide our guests with the best possible experience when visiting.  We are glad you enjoyed the use of our free luggage storage, and the pool area.  We greatly appreciate the kind words about our customer service, it is what sets our hotel apart from the rest in the area.  Not to mention the great location, with free parking and free Wifi, it is the best value in the area!  Next time you are in town, come back to see us again!

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel for a Family Vacation
Summary: We stayed for our week trip to Disneyland. Super close walking distance to the park. Anytime we needed anything the front desk was super helpful and friendly. Additionally, the rooms were clean and comfortable. The room included a fridge and a microwave, so it was easy to make late a night and early morning snacks. The hotel includes free parking, which isn’t a given a lot of the neighboring Disney hotels, so that was amazing as well.  My daughter absolutely loved the theme and called the hotel her castle for the entire trip. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for spending your week trip to Disneyland with us!  We are proud to be your daughter's castle as well!  The location of the hotel is the best, right across from the parks with shopping and dining options in walking distance as well.  Our staff all works hard to make sure our guests enjoy a clean, comfortable, safe place to stay.  All rooms are complete with not only the refrigerator and microwave, but also a hair dryer and a coffee maker.  The free parking is definitely becoming a rare feature near Disneyland, but as long as we keep a limit of one vehicle per room, and the parking expires at check out on the departure date, we are able to accommodate all of our guests' vehicles.  Thank you for the review and the high recommendation, we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We went to Castle Inn and Suites as a family vacation with a trip to Disneyland. The staff were very friendly and accommodating. The walk to Disneyland was only 10 mins! I would love to stay here again!
Manager Response: Thanks for coming to stay with us.  We would love to have you back at the hotel again!  The hotel is designed specifically with families in mind.  With rooms that are designed with refrigerators and microwaves for snacks and breakfast, coffee makers with free coffee and hair dryers in the rooms they are perfect for families.  Also families can save big with the free parking, free WiFi, and no resort fees!  Thank you for the kind remarks about our staff, we all really appreciate the compliments!  See you next time!

Summary: Nice clean room queen size bed, nothing fancy but had everything we needed for my son & grandson & my wife. There was a pool at the property but we didn't use it,  looked clean & well maintained. Gave us helpfull information to park up the street with a nice discount on our second day after checking out of hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay!  At the Castle Inn & Suites we aim to provide a clean, safe, and comfortable stay for our guests visiting Anaheim for a variety of reasons.  The rooms are all furnished with refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, and hair dryers, which allows our guests to feel right at home.  The pool is heated, along with a children's wading pool and a hot tub, it is a great place to relax after a long day at Disneyland.  The alternative parking solution has been a big hit for guests wanting to leave their vehicles after check out.  In order to provide parking for guests arriving each day, we do have to ask guests checking out to move their vehicles off property.  Having a nearby parking structure which provides a discounted rate for our guests is very beneficial.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I really like this hotel.  It isn't fancy but clean, price is reasonable, the staff is sooooo helpful.  They were professional, nice, informative.  Briana assisted us both times.  There were others but I forgot their name.  You are able to get a scooter dropped off at the hotel and take it to Disneyland and back to the hotel.  The office charges them overnight.  This was great that we were able to take a disabled person with us.
Manager Response: Thank you for the Awesome review!  Also thank you for mentioning Briana, she is one of our super star front desk agents who provides stellar customer service.  We very much appreciate your kind words, and we know that the staff working for the hotel is what sets us apart from other hotels in the area.  The hotel aims to be the best value in the Disneyland Resort area.  With great rates, free parking, free WiFi, and no resort fees, there is no better deal across from Disneyland.  We work with several scooter companies in the area, we do not rent them directly to guests.  However, we are happy to assist guests with the scooters, and we have a designated area to charge them each night so they are ready to go in the morning.  We ask that our guests do not take the scooters up to the guest rooms as a safety precaution.  Thank you for staying with us, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Service was fast and friendly. Amenities were clean. My kids loved the castle theme, giving a feeling of Disney magic before entering the park. Easy access to the park, which is just across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are pleased to see you enjoyed your stay and the services provided by the hotel.  Our castle theme is one of the many ways we set ourselves apart from the other hotels in the area.  The location of the hotel is just about the best in Anaheim, with free parking, free WiFi, and no Resort Fees, we believe it is the best value in the city.  Our housekeeping and maintenance staff is always working to ensure the amenities are clean and ready for guests use.  Come back and see us again the next time you are in town!

Summary: We recently stayed here for a quick trip to Disneyland. We checked in with Carlos and it was quick and easy. Went right up to the room, which was clean and comfortable. The hotel is walking distance from Disneyland which is great!! We check out early in the morning and Mark was able to accommodate and let us keep our car parked while we visited the park. When we got back we asked the desk for some duct tape to fix something and they were quick to help.  Any time I went to the front office they were cleaning and sanitizing.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone with kids visiting Disney!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and for the great review!  All of our staff appreciates the compliments and are happy to help our guests with whatever they need.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and would recommend us to anyone visiting Disneyland.  The parking policy currently provides free parking for one vehicle per registered room for the nights of the reservation only.  Parking expires at check out time on the departure day.  If traveling during a slower period, we may be able to accommodate a vehicle after check out, but not during high occupancy days such as summer, peak seasons, or holiday periods.  We are continuing to make every effort to ensure the health and safety of our guests and employees.  Cleaning and sanitizing are just one of the many ways we try to do that.  We hope the next time you are in town, you will choose to stay with us again at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: We had two rooms here in late May and had an excellent experience.  Both rooms were very clean, especially the bathrooms.  The staff was friendly and inviting and everything was easy.  While housekeeping service is not available right now, our trash was promptly removed when we left it outside and we got clean towels every day.  It is a pleasant and short walk to the park.  Parking is included which was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites for 4 nights!  We are very pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay.  The housekeeping staff appreciates the compliments about the cleanliness of the rooms too.  We make every effort to accommodate guest requests like getting rooms close together, or on a particular floor.  We hope that along with the free parking you were able to enjoy the free WiFi as well.  While we are all navigating the obstacles of providing service during these challenging times, we make every effort to make sure guests have an enjoyable stay.  We are happy to deliver items, or pick up trash and used towels, but for everyone's safety we do not enter the room unless it is absolutely necessary.  We hope the next time you come to town, you come back to see us again too!

Summary: This place always has amazing service. My family and I have stayed here before, and this time my family and I had unusual circumstanced and the staff was more than accommodating. We’ll definitely be returning here for further visits, and we highly recommend.
Manager Response: Kassiahs, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay.  Our staff is what makes our hotel special.  We have always made the guest our priority, and will often go out of our way to help in any way we can.  We appreciate the feedback that the hotel was able to accommodate your unusual circumstances, and we are grateful for your recommendation. Please remember us the next time you come to the Disneyland area, we will be here waiting to provide the service you have come to expect.

Summary: We went to Disneyland and stayed a total of 5 nights! The customer service you will receive here is absolutely outstanding! From the moment we walked in we were greeted with a huge smile and great service! We were there for my daughter’s sweet 16 and the hotel staff went out of there way to make it a wonderful stay! When we needed additional towels, a staff member came immediately!   The room was clean and satisfied what we needed. We were only there from late evening to the morning and spent the days in the park!   The walk to the park was not long at all. Maybe a 5 minute walk! Super convenient   They held our luggage in a locked room on our last day and ensured our items were safe and secure!  I highly recommend.
Manager Response: Lilmizzj21, thank you for the amazing review of the Castle Inn & Suites and its staff.  We are all so happy to welcome back guests to the hotel.  It is great to hear you could see us smiling, even under our masks.  The location to the front gate of the Disneyland parks is one of the best in town.  We go out of our way to make sure you enjoy your stay, and it is nice to see you had a great time.  We offer free luggage storage prior to check in and after check out for all of our guests.  With free parking, free WiFi, and no resort fees, this all adds up to more money for guests at the parks.  Thank you for your kind words and your recommendation.  We look forward to the next time you stay with us.

Summary Heading: Great Location - bring a power strip & your own soap
Summary: Friendly staff. Check in was quick and easy. Got to my room and while it was clean and inviting, there were a couple minor issues.   1. Shower: water pressure was really lacking. Took forever to get hot (hello, California drought). The supplied soap was rough and difficult to lather. My fault - I should have used the body wash I brought but I was exhausted.   2. There were ZERO outlets near either bed. Nothing to plug my phone into. It’s 2021!! 5 year olds have cell phones. What hotel in this day and age doesn’t have at least one outlet between the beds? Time to upgrade the lamp or put in a power strip.   3. The room location itself was not the best. 146 is right across from the elevator. The light outside is so bright even the black out curtains couldn’t completely keep it out.
Manager Response: Justaddlaughter, thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are happy to see you will come back to stay with us again, and we appreciate the opportunity to address some of your concerns.  If there is any maintenance issue during your stay, please contact the front desk so we can have our maintenance staff fix the issue.  We take all guest concerns seriously, and will make every effort to resolve any problem.  Each room is equipped with multiple outlets, and has a lamp with an outlet in the base.  Not all outlets are accessible from the beds, but they are available near the desk, table, and vanity in the room.  On your future return, we would be happy to place  a request in the reservation for a quieter location, or an upper floor if it will make your stay more enjoyable.  Please let us know the next time you are in town, we would be happy to have you back again.

Summary: Clean and super close to Disneyland. Only took 15min to walk to Disneyland. Was close to food shopping. My husband and I Will stay there the next time we go to Disneyland. Staff very friendly and theme of hotel was very well done.  Highly recommend!!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the 5 out of 5 review!  We couldn't ask for more than than and a high recommendation!  Our staff's secret to providing great customer service is that we are so happy to have guests back in the hotel!  The walk to the park is short, and to the restaurants and other entertainment is even shorter!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed the theme of the hotel and we can't wait to see you again!  Thank you

Summary: My best friend and I stayed two nights to go to Disneyland. It is a short distance walk from the park, and was perfect in the morning! It was a nice room with lots of space! This hotel is somewhere amazing to stay if you are not looking for somewhere super fancy.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  The hotel is truly a great place to stay, for families and friends of all sizes.  The rooms are on the larger side for the area, with plenty of space to spread out.  Our rooms also include amenities such as refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, and hair dryers.  These help the guest feel right at home even though they are in our hotel.  With free parking included for one vehicle per room, free WiFi, and no resort fees, we believe it is the best value in the city.  Now that you have had the Castle Inn experience, we hope you will come back for more soon!

Summary: The hotel is dated and the water pressure was not the best.  But for a Disneyland trip it is PERFECT!   We will be staying here again on our next trip to Disney.  Front Staff knowledgable and even directed me to a company to rent a mobility scooter!  Thumbs up!  Bed comfy and ac worked great!  WIFI was good!
Manager Response: Thanks for the 5 out of 5 review!  The Castle Inn & Suites has been taking care of guests for 30+ years.  We also believe it is the perfect place to stay, especially when in town for Disneyland.  If you come back to stay with us again and have any issues, please do not hesitate to contact the front desk.  Most issues are able to be resolved quickly and easily.  We work with several mobility companies in the area, and our knowledgeable staff can usually help with any guest request or question.  A comfy bed, good air conditioner, and fast WiFi makes a world of difference after a long day at the parks.  Come back to see us the next time you are in town!

Summary: We had 2-day tickets for Disneyland and stayed here between days. The hotel has a castle theme - that made it fun to stay here. The room was nice and they let us leave our car in the lot while at the park. It's only a few blocks to walk to the Disneyland parking lot. It was super convenient to do it this way!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  The 2 day ticket is definitely the way to go, and sometimes even 2 days is not enough time to see both parks!  Our hotel's castle theme makes the experience memorable for families and children love it too!  Parking is included free for one vehicle per registered room, but is limited to the dates of the reservation from check in to check out.  We are happy to hear we could accommodate your vehicle when you visited, and we hope you come back to visit with us again soon!

Summary: Staff were all SUPER helpful.  Our special requests were set up exactly as requested prior to our check in so arriving at night was a breeze.  Three big clean comfy beds to pop the sleeping kids into slick as can be.  Fridge and microwave very welcome.  2 block easy walk to the Disneyland entrance.  There is CVS and Walgreens and lots of takeout also within 2 blocks.  Not a luxury resort-- but absolutely exactly perfect if you want an easy clean safe friendly home base while you use all your energy at the park. Kids loved the castle theme too.      Thank you to the front desk for being so friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Cheri, thank you for your amazing review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  Our front desk staff really appreciates your compliments!  It is always easiest to meet a guests request when we are made aware in advance.  The hotel is a great value for families of all sizes.  We hope you were also able to take advantage of the free WiFi, free parking for one vehicle per registered room, and with no resort fees, there is no better choice in the area.  Our friendly and helpful staff will be here waiting for you the next time you come to town!

Summary: The team at this hotel did an awesome job with our stay. They let me have a couple bandaids for my blistered toes and the room was very clean. Made our trip to Disneyland fun, smooth, and easy. Thank you so much!!!! Also a quick 10-15 minutes walk from the harbor entrance.
Manager Response: Kaitlynh763, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are happy to hear the staff was able to make your stay awesome!  We always make our guests the priority, and we hope to see you back at the hotel in the near future.  With not only a great location, but added values like free parking, free WiFi, and NO resort fees, it is a great choice when visiting Disneyland.  Next time you are back in town, come stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Great hotel! Great service! Great location! Great prices!!Quiet rooms!! Highly recommend!!!
Summary: The rooms are very clean, roomy, very quiet and so conveniently close to Disneyland!! Staff is so helpful, accommodating and friendly!! You definitely get more for your money!! They have early check in and a huge parking lot!! We are visiting the Disney park again next month and already made our reservations to stay at the Castle Inn! I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review of your stay!  We are so glad to welcome back our guests to the hotel.  The value of the hotel is difficult to beat, with free parking, free WiFi, and no resort fees, you definitely get the most bang for your buck.  Also being within walking distance of the entrance of Disneyland means no shuttles, no parking fees, and an easy walk back in case kids need a break in the middle of the day.  Early check in isn't always available, normally check in is after 3:00PM, but we are happy we were able to provide one to you!  Parking is limited to one vehicle per room so we can ensure we have enough spots for everyone.  We look forward to your return visit!

Summary: I have stayed here twice its that great it’s a walking distance to Disneyland and Garden Walk Plaza. Room was clean and staff was amazing with all requests. Parking is free compared to other hotels in the area so that’s a big plus.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites not once but twice!  As a repeat guest of the hotel we value your feedback and appreciate your kind words.  The location of the hotel is one of the best in Anaheim, so many dining, entertainment, and shopping places within a quick walk of the hotel.  Our staff is working hard to maintain the standards of the hotel, and we are proud to hear you thought they were amazing.  Free parking is rare, but we are happy to offer it to our guests.  Parking is limited to one vehicle per room, only on the nights of the reservation, and expires at check out time on the day of departure.  This way we can accommodate all of our guests' vehicles.  We can't wait to see your smiling face again when you are back in town!

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights within the first few days of Disneyland reopening. Very easy to reserve online. Parking was free and it was a very easy walk to the main entrance of the park. Hotel staff were friendly and accommodating. The room was clean and the ac worked great. I don’t think breakfast is served because of covid however the room had a small refrigerator and a microwave which worked out perfect for breakfast in the room. We will definitely stay here in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of your stay!  As mentioned, the hotel does no offer breakfast, but there are many restaurants within walking distance of the hotel such as Denny's, IHOP, and McDonald's just to name a few.  The hotel provides free coffee with the coffeemaker in the room, and also as mentioned there is a refrigerator and microwave in every room in case guests would like to bring any breakfast items.  In place of a free breakfast, the hotel has some other added values such as the free parking, free WiFi in the rooms, and does not charge a resort fee.  Our staff appreciates the compliments and will always go out of our way to make a guest's experience enjoyable.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great family Hotel close the Disneyland Resort
Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn and had a great stay. The rooms are clean and beds were comfortable. The room has a microwave and refrigerator for your drinks and snacks. Plenty of towels and power outlets for your devices. The hotel is about a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland Resort and about a 5 minute walk to the Garden Walk. Parking is included with the rate and there are NO resort fees like the others closer to the park.  The pool was closed and there was no housekeeping due to Covid, I'm sure that will change soon. You can call the front desk for fresh towels and other items you may need during your stay.
Manager Response: ErnestoS847, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay.  We are pleased to see you enjoyed your visit to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Out of an abundance of caution and safety, our staff does not enter an occupied room unless it is necessary or an emergency.  However, we are happy to report the pool is open for guest use every day from 8:00AM to 10:00PM.  The pool area has a hot tub, heated swimming pool, and a heated child's wading pool.  We are sorry this amenity was not available during your stay, but we hope you will be able to come back and enjoy it next time.  We may be the last hotel in Anaheim offering free parking, free WiFi, and NOT charging a resort fee.  So the value can't be beat!  See you real soon!

Summary: First Timers...It was PERFECT. About a 10 minute walk to the parks. Staff was very friendly, helpful and taking safety precautions for covid-19 . We had the Family Suite...which was the coolest, two separate rooms one for us the other for the kiddos. Very clean and sanitary. Quite and comfortable. We highly recommend. We'll definitely stay again :)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We have been taking many precautions and placed guest and employee safety at the top of our priority list.  The Family Suite is a perfect setup for large families as it can sleep up to 6 people, or for guests who would like a little more space to spread out.  We will continue to be proactive in our approach to the health and safety of our guests, and we will always be as friendly and helpful as possible.  We are so happy to have guests back in the hotel and look forward to your return.

Summary: Stayed at the Castle Inn Suites for 3 nights. Close proximity to Disneyland entrance & lots of restaurants in the locality along with 2 large pharmacies closeby. The rooms very clean & had good facilities, however hotel is a little dated & maybe could do with a refurb to freshen up. Staff were very accommodating & helpful during our stay. The location was great as if a break was needed from Disneyland, only a short walk back to the room.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide a review from your stay with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We thank you very much for your great feedback, and hope if your travel plans bring you back to the Castle Inn & Suites, you will come back to stay with us.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: As always the castle inn and suite provided a smiles an fun welcome,  rooms are always clean an fresh , staff are careing an always helpful,  this was my 8th stay an it always feels like heaven,  huge car park an pools are always clean an for its location close to everything its quiet in the rooms, perfect for a sleep in or aftetnoons golden girls nanna nap an rest , thank u again an see u soon , trav
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the review and will share this with staff.  We hope to see you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great company, lovely and helpful staff. They gave great recommendations when we had nothing to do, and helped with shuttles to Universal Studios. This hotel was near lots of great restaurants and theme parks (Disneyland). I would stay here again
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to write your review.   We look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Clean Rooms and Kind Staff -- The perfect hotel for Disneyland
Summary: + Extremely clean bathroom.  + Duvet covers are outdated, but the sheets themselves were clean and comfortable. + Front desk staff were helpful and kind. We checked in around 1:00am and the overnight staff greeted us warmly and got us checked-in right promptly.  + Easy 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland security entrance on Harbor Blvd.  + Parking is free and Castle Inn allowed us to leave our vehicle for a few more hours past the check-out time. This was such a huge bonus and made our stay that much more enjoyable.  + If you're planning to visit Disneyland-- this is the perfect hotel. We will definitely be booking another stay at Castle Inn and Suites.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We really appreciate you taking the time to provide a detailed review from your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed two nights and the location is great for walking to Disneyland, especially for the price of the hotel. The room was comfy and clean. We did not use the amenities but the staff was friendly and parking was easy.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review.  We hope you will come back to see us in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Our stay was amazing!  The room was very clean and comfortable.  The hotel staff was very professional and kind.  Our kids were very excited to stay in a castle.  We were able to get a military discount, which we really appreciated.  The castle inn suites is in a great location and within walking distance to Disneyland.  It was nice being so close, especially with two young children and an expecting wife.  We will definitely stay again and we would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We thank you for taking the time to provide your review, we were very happy to hear you had a great time.  We hope to see you in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Very close to Disneyland, free parking.
Summary: The castle inn is about a 10 minute walk from the gate to Disneyland, the parking is free and they don’t charge a resort fee, which is rare in this neighborhood.  It’s an older hotel but was well maintained and really quiet, even the air conditioner was quiet.  The front desk was very friendly, we really enjoyed our visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words about the Castle Inn & Suites and the staff.  We all work very hard to provide the best possible service for our guests.  We are very happy to hear you enjoyed your visit to the hotel!  You are correct that a hotel offering free parking, free WiFi, and not charging a resort fee is very rare to find across the street from the Disneyland Resort.  We might be the last one left!  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of the hotel.  Next time you come to town, come back and see us again!

Summary: Great rooms friendly and helpful staff. Only 7-8 minutes walk to Disneyland passing Denny’s and other places to eat. Has a convenient shop attached to the hotel and in the other direction to Disneyland a selection of takeaway and eat in food.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  The hotel has one of the best locations in town!  The restaurants in walking distance make it easy for guests to go out for a quick bite to eat, or enjoy a more relaxed sit down meal.  The gift shop on property is very convenient for guests who wish to grab a few snacks for the room, or pick up some souvenirs.  We hope the next time you come to visit Disneyland, you will come back and stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Great location and amenities for family to teens to Disneyland
Summary: Just got back from a fun trip to the Disney parks, with my husband and our three teens. We booked a bigger room at Castle Suites and the kids shared the two beds in one room, while my husband and I were together  in the other.  The beds were decent and we slept well.  (walking 27,000+ steps at Disneyland helped there, too).   The location is ideal and we could walk easily to the parks. We all came back for an afternoon break and that was easy to do, too. We appreciated having parking available for our rental car. And the day we left (a Monday), there were lots of spaces and management let us keep the car there while we went to Disneyland.   There is a small kitchenette, with a fridge, coffee maker and a fairly week microwave. Still, it was enough to allow us to buy stuff at the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  It sounds like your family enjoyed their stay in one of our Family Suites.  This room type features a king size bed in the front room and 2 queen beds in the back room.  This is an ideal setup for larger families or families with older children.  With two televisions and separate rooms, it allows families to spread out and relax after a long day at the parks.  With free parking, free Wifi in the rooms, and no resort fees, the Castle Inn & Suites is a great options for all families visiting the Anaheim area.  Thank you for the recommendation and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Perfect location for family trip based around Disneyland... walking distance to everything u could want or need... safe clean streets (day and night!!) friendly community.   Go to Disneyland first thing in the morning... run across the road for lunch... 5mins walk to hotel to grab a jumper then straight back to Disneyland for a night of more fun!!  Little to zero poverty in sight to spoil ur families dream vacation. Rooms sufficient for long days out and restful nights in. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Great Idea!  We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  The hotel is truly located within walking distance to all the great things near the Disneyland resort.  The Anaheim Convention Center, all of the restaurants, entertainment options, and of course the main entrance to the parks of Disneyland.  The city of Anaheim takes great care of the resort area for all of our visitors, the same way the hotels make an effort to keep up the properties.  As a whole, Anaheim is an ideal place for families to come and relax, and enjoy all the things the city has to offer.  The Castle Inn & Suites offers a safe and affordable place to stay when you visit.  We will see you next time you come to town!

Summary: There was 7 of us and we were given an adjoining room, which was very useful.. The room was spacious and clean. Cleaning staff was very friendly. Prompt service when we call for extra needs, like coffee and towels. We all enjoyed the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of the hotel.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay.  Having 2 rooms with a connecting door always makes traveling with a larger group more convenient.  The staff makes every effort to meet all of our guests needs as soon as possible.  We have staff available 24 hours at the front desk to assist our guests with their needs.  We hope you will come back to visit again soon.  Thank you

Summary: This was our first visit to the Castle! The rooms are CLEAN! The hotel has a working elevator even though the rooms enter from outside. The staff is friendly and helpful. I just wish they offered coffee in the morning and a muffin. The walk to Disneyland is not bad at all! We enjoyed our stay! We plan to stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your first visit.  The hotel has 2 elevators which function to all 4 floors of the hotel.  In place of a muffin in the morning, the hotel offers free parking for one vehicle per registered room, free WiFi, and does not charge a resort fee that are so common these days.  In the rooms there is free coffee provided to use in the coffee maker, a refrigerator, and a microwave.  We can't wait to see you again!!

Summary: First, let me start off by saying that this is in no way a bad review.  The cons I will list are far outweighed by the primary pro: location.  This motel does exactly what you need it to do and that is provide a safe, somewhat quiet and comfortable place for you to rest between your visits to the parks.  There aren’t too many properties with this proximity so if that’s what you want, that’s what Castle Inn will provide.  This is a motel, which is defined as having no interior hallways.  If that bothers you, look elsewhere.  This kind of place can get a bit noisy but if you sleep well, or bring earplugs (which I always do when I travel), it should be no big deal.  We spent one night here as we visited the parks.  I had read all the reviews and was aware of what we were getting.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a very in depth review of the hotel.  We are very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  As mentioned in the title, the location is very convenient!  The hotel staff makes customer service and guest satisfaction a priority and tries the best they can to make every guest stay as enjoyable as possible.  The hotel went through a renovation just a few years ago, and at that time a darker furniture, carpet, and overall style was chosen to go with the Castle theme of the hotel.  The hotel added outlets in the room, and installed lamps that have an outlet in the base as well.  As mentioned the pros far outweigh the cons, and as long as the guest is happy, we are happy.  We look forward to your next visit to the hotel!

Summary: We have been to Disneyland many times and stayed at at least 5-6 of the hotels along Harbor Blvd right next to Disneyland. For this trip, we selected Castle Inn and Suites because the price was right. I have seen the hotel many times, so I figured it would be ok.  Check in was very friendly. Free parking is amazing as well. The pictures don’t show it, but it is a motel style hotel with all the rooms facing the parking lot.  We got to our room and I was disappointed. It seemed clean, but very dated. It was impossible to find outlets to charge our phones, iPads, etc. we had to unplug the clock and lamp near the bed and move the nightstand. Many holes are like this and it’s very annoying. It’s 2020, and people need to charge things. Many hotels have lamps with charging ports. But I
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are sorry to hear you did not enjoy your stay.  The hotel is located right across the street from the Disneyland Resort, close to all of the restaurants and entertainment options in the Resort area of Anaheim.  It is a very popular choice for families visiting Disneyland.  All guest rooms in the hotel have a lamp on the desk which has a plug in the base for guests to charge their devices as mentioned in the review.  We are sorry if you did not see the lamp with the plug in the base.  If at any time during a guest stay there is an issue, the front desk will be happy to help find a solution.  If a guest would prefer a different location, we are always happy to accommodate the request based upon availability.  The hotel has constant hot water throughout the building, we have not had any reported issues regarding guests running out of hot water in any other guest rooms.  We appreciate you bringing this to our attention and will have our maintenance staff check the room to see if there was an issue in this specific room.  Thank you again for taking the time to write a review.

Summary: I'm a single mom of a toddler, and we loved staying in the Castle!  My only complaint is that there isn't a true deadbolt or door stop on the room door.  The deadbold unlocks when the inside door knob, lever style, is opened.  It's ok for most guest, but my smart 3 year old could pull the lever down unlocking the deadbold and opening the door.  I didn't leave him unattended, he wasn't trying to escape, and everything was ok, but many hotel rooms have a door stop lock that prevents the door from being opened, which is an extra layer of safety and peace of mind for moms! That said..The room was GREAT! We loved how close we were to the parks and food.  We ate breakfast and most dinners in the room with the fridge and microwave (leftovers and cup of noodles type food). It was in the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your visit and all of the compliments about the hotel and staff.  Hotels are required to have "panic hardware".  Panic hardware is designed for guests inside the room to be able to exit the room during an emergency as easily as possible.  Therefore the inside door handle will disengage the deadbolt.  Also, if a guest was having a medical emergency in the room, a latch could prevent emergency services from entering the room quickly to address the emergency.  We have panic hardware installed in all of our guest rooms.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed the heated pool, even though it was cold at night.  We hope the free WiFi and free parking came in handy as well.  Especially for families, the Castle Inn & Suites is a great choice for a friendly, affordable and comfortable hotel near the Disneyland parks.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Convient, great deal, close proximity to the park!!!
Summary: Our room was fantastic, clean and neat...Front end staff was great, housekeeping very friendly. The little market carries the essentials that you sometimes forget and the extras that you may find you need. Nice pool and hottub. Lovely flowers and huge parking lot. Closeness to Disney is fantastic,nice walking distance, also close to Pizza Press! Stayed for 5 days on a pkg with Westjet and would recommend this to anyone! Also was very accomadating for a later checkout!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for booking your room with us through WestJet Vacations.  We appreciate you taking the time to write your review, so thank you for all the great feedback.  We hope the next time you visit the Disneyland Resort, you'll come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Great location, Alberta on reception was very efficient and helpful, the pool was a bonus and the room (on the 3rd floor) met all of our needs. It was also super convenient having the shop onsite when we needed milk and snacks. Oh and the kids LOVED staying in a "castle" :-)
Manager Response: We would all like to thank you for staying with us recently and for writing your review.  We were very happy to hear the kids "loved staying in a castle".  We hope the next time you visit the Disneyland area, you'll come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Just came back from a 1 week adult trip.   Booked two rooms, one regular and one executive.  All questions we asked before hand were answered.  All requests we made were met.  Front desk was friendly and very helpful.  Housekeeping did a great job.  This meant it was a stress free stay.  Enjoyed the hot tub every day.  Felt it was good value for being so close to Disneyland.  Did not have any issues with noise as others mentioned. Thanks Castle Inn we enjoyed staying with you.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us, and for taking the time to write your review.  We really appreciate the great feedback and hope to see you the next time you visit the Disneyland area.  Sincerely,

Summary: Only just returned today from a week here loved it, great location so handy to everything, 10 min walk to Disney Land and shops here are also very close the room itself is a bit old but it's clean, loved it, very comfortable beds, the only downside was the noise but was only in the early hours when other people were checking in our or out. also if you hire a car you are able to park your car there, staff very friendly always willing to help with anything you need to know booked 3 tours through them, definitely coming here again next year.
Manager Response: We would like to take the time to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites and for writing such a nice review, we really appreciate the feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back next year.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Our travel agent booked this hotel for us on a deal as we were going to stay in a cheap fleabag hotel and the deal the travel agent got worked out same price for a cheap hotel but this place is not a cheap looking place. The staff were outstanding from check-in to past checkout. The amenities were great, we didnt use the pool due to cooler days and busy disneylanding it uo but looked great. Loads of parking if you need that and a store onsite for food drink and more. Short walk to Disneyland easy to do each day. We had 2 queen beds which was good and convenient. Rooms were huge. Lots if families staying so keep in mind over excited kids. All over qould recommend this hotel for anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for writing your review, we really appreciate the 5 stars and the great feedback.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My daughter (7) and I enjoyed our recent stay. It is very conveneient to not only the theme parks but also some restaraunts and stores. Rooms are clean and the pool while small was heated. Only complaint was the water pressure in the showers left a little to be desired.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to post your review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback and hope you will come back to see us in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I’ve stayed at this hotel several times and the staff are fantastic, friendly, accommodating. The rooms are kitchy and comfortable. Serve a basic room and no frills to them. I’d say the pool is the downfall unfortunately it’s tiny and in the middle of the parking lot, so if ever they had money for upgrades, I’d say this is where they couldn’t go wrong.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us for taking the time to post your review.  We do have plans in the near future to do some enhancements to the pool area so thank you for your feedback.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My 8 year old daughter and I arrived after a 13 hour flight from Australia. We arrived at 9am and the manager said that the hotel had been booked out the night before and that housekeeping were still cleaning the rooms. Since check in began at 3 this was totally understandable. My daughter and I went for a walk and then we come back to the hotel reception where my daughter fell asleep as she was exhausted. At midday the manager told us that he had a room for us for which I will be eternally grateful for. We went to the room which was incredibly clean. There  were heaps of places to plug our electrical devices in and the beds were incredibly comfortable.   The bathroom was spotless and there were so many towels. Everyone we cane across working there was incredibly helpful and
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write a review about your experience with the Castle Inn & Suites.  We try to go out of our way to accommodate our guests, while it is not always possible to offer early check in, we like to make it available when we can.  Thank you for the compliments about the housekeeping department as well, we work very hard to make service a top priority.  The hotel offers complimentary luggage storage for our guests prior to check in and also after check out.  We look forward to your next visit to the hotel.  Take care and thank you again for your great review!

Summary: OVERALL:  Of all the places my family has stayed at in the Disneyland area over the past 20+ years, this is the one I regret staying at the most. With a catchy name and a pretty castle facade, I thought this might be worth a try. In the end, my conclusion after trying this place was that it's a glorified motel that has a stellar location, no doubt, but you will NOT get restful sleep here. Better to book one of the neighboring hotels or one that's slightly further away, and far far better—then just walk a bit or uber/lyft your way to the park. These other hotels include a restful  and comfortable, clean space, a good breakfast inclusive in the rate, in addition to free wifi and parking. For the little time that you *do* spend at the hotel, you really need it to be comfortable,
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are sorry to hear you did not enjoy your visit.  We would have appreciated an opportunity to address your concerns during your stay.  The hotel location as mentioned is great, the Castle Inn is located within a 5 to 7 minute walk to the entrance of both Disneyland and California Adventures.  With free parking, free WiFi in the room, and no resort fees, it is a great value for families visiting the Anaheim area.  We can assure you that all of the beds on property are either Queen size beds or King size beds.  The hotel uses Sealy brand Perfect Sleeper mattresses.  Sealy is a major manufacturer of mattresses in the U.S.  The size of a queen mattress is 60" wide by 80" long.  Each room in the hotel offers several outlets for guest convenience, including an outlet at the base of the lamp on the desk where electronics can be easily charged.  We are happy to provide additional hangers for the wardrobe unit, and irons and ironing boards are available upon request.  We have staff available 24 hours per day.  Thank you again for your recent stay, we hope this information is helpful to you and our future guests.

Summary: This is the best place I have stayed on a trip to Disneyland The accommodations are outstanding the service is impeccable and the location is right by maingate They even have TWO hot tubs One for kids
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  We work hard to make sure our guests have a great experience and we are always grateful to hear we made a guest happy!  Our hotel is in a great location, right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort Area, with access to restaurants, shops, the convention center, and of course the Disney parks.  Thank you for mentioning the pool area, the hotel features a heated swimming pool, a hot tub, and a child's wading pool which is heated as well.  We hope the next time you come to town, we will see you again!

Summary: This is a very affordable and well-located option for families visiting Disneyland.  We considered staying at one of the larger chain hotels on the next block (farther from Disneyland), but we figured that we would just be using the hotel to sleep, so we didn't need the kitchenette or other amenities that those hotels provided.  The hotel is an older property, but the interior of the rooms is clean.  The beds were very comfortable with clean, soft sheets.  I wish there was a safe in the room because the rooms have external entrances, but nothing felt unsafe.  The shower head is low, so if you are over 5' 9", you will need to bend your knees a bit to wash your hair, but it's not a big deal.  We appreciated the free parking.  We stayed 4 nights, and there were many restaurants
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to post your review.  We appreciate all the feedback, as we know other guest's read our reviews and this is very helpful.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great experience for a larger family!
Summary: We couldn’t ask for more! Not every hotel can accommodate a family of 6 without having to pay for a multi room suite. That’s just not something we wanted to pay for on a trip to Disneyland since we would really only be sleeping there. Castle Inn had rooms big enough (using the couch hide-a-bed.) It was clean, the staff was friendly, it was quiet even on the busy road, and in walking distance of Disney. We will be back for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for providing your review from your stay.  We appreciate the great review and feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Stay was great! Room was clean with attention to details had plenty of towels, microwave and cold fridge. Staff was accommodating and polite. Safe and lighted parking lot. Short walk to Disneyland. Shopping center with restaurants right next door. Definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate you taking the time to write your review and provide your feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I have stayed here many times and & have always had and enjoyable experience & this time was no exception. Rooms are always really clean, Price are very reasonable, Guest Service is friendly and helpful, great location (within walking distance to Disneyland), not to mention Free parking at hotel included. Stayed here with my husband and daughter for a fun day at Disneyland and upon check-in we were pleasantly surprised by a complimentary upgrade in our room, thank you Castle Inn & Suites Anaheim. Our room was awesome, clean & quiet. They just need to get mini Keurig Coffee Makers in the rooms and that will be perfect! Definitely recommend for any type of traveller with or without children.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the review and great feedback.  We elected to use a different kind of single cup coffee maker as those mini Keurig machines walk out of hotel rooms quite a bit.  We've actually had many guest's ask us where they can buy our coffee machine's, so we realize it's a preference.  Once again, thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Booked for two nights as we were travelling onwards to Vegas. The room was quite big, nicely cleaned and with good towel condition. Carpet also clean but I bring slippers so it doesn’t worry me. Sheets were clean but showing age, maybe an upgrade could be considered? No safe in the room, we did miss this.   Location for Disney it’s brilliant, Starbucks, CVS and Walgreens for soya/almond milk, five mins walk.  Surrounded by restaurants, take outs etc.   It’s very quiet here but with the usual bustle of once someone is awake, everyone is awake, but that’s something we have to live with.  Air con/heating unit is very noisy and does kick in all through the night so sleeping is a bit tricky if you’re not used to the noise. If location is important with free parking, this is a good
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the feedback and will definitely share your review with our team.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great castle-themed hotel, walking distance to Disneyland Parks.  We were visiting Dec 29-Jan 01 and enjoyed our stay. Location:  looking at the huge crowds trying to get on various ART transfer buses and waiting for cabs/uber rides we were happy to take the short walk to/from the hotel.  It is also half a block from CVS and Walgreens as well as dining, including IHOP. Check in and check out was effortless and staff were very friendly. We did make use of the pool/jacuzzi which is open till 10pm as well as the laundry facilities. Coin operated. Front desk can provide detergent and bounce sheet for .75 cents each. We were upgraded to a Suite at the front of the Castle, 4th floor, overlooking Harbour Blvd. Suite was clean and spacious - 2 beds and pullout.  Decor was on the darker
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to write your review we really appreciate it.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: we stayed there for 2 weeks Sept/oct 2019 and was very happy with location, rooms, staff and plan to go back this year
Summary: We stayed here 30 years ago and had a great time, decided to re-live some memories and so happy we did it, we found it to be best location for Disneyland, walking distance, rooms were clean and staff were very helpful, going back this year as we had such a wonderful experience and highly recommend this hotel for everyone
Manager Response: We would like to take this time to thank you for staying with us for 2 weeks in Sept/Oct.  We were very happy to hear you had a great time and made new memories with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn the next time you visit the Disneyland area.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I stayed here by myself December 8-13. I met up with my daughter and her family who were staying at a different hotel. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Check in and check out was fast and easy. Most important to me the room was very clean, bed and pillows were comfortable. Definitely better than daughter's room as it had a larger fridge and a microwave. Coffee supply and fixings were plentiful. I was on the ground floor in room 118. There was some noise which was no fault of the hotel's, just rude guests. Bathroom could use a reno but was clean and worked fine. I wouldn't hesitate to book here again or recommend to family and friends. Good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review from your recent stay with us.  We really appreciate the kind words and feedback and no that future guest's reading review find these reviews very helpful when selecting their hotel's.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This is a great place to stay if you are visiting Disneyland.  It is a good value for the price.  The hotel is about a 10-15 minute walk from the park entrances. The rooms are decent as we really did not spend much time there other than to sleep. The beds and the pillows were very comfortable.  The shower was a little wonky.  The water temp was hard to control and occasionally there was a lack of hot water, but it was not unbearable.  The doors and windows are a bit thin so noise travels and you can hear the fireworks from the park.  There is a Walgreens just a block away for snacks, sodas and water, but if you don’t feel like walking the gift store on-site was nice to have and the prices were fairly reasonable.  Our kids love the castle theme and look.  We will definitely be
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for staying with us early this month, and for taking the time to post your review.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you come back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I stayed here because of good views and free parking space.  Also, walking distance to Disneyland is not that bad at all 7 to 11 mins top.  It's nearby to all restaurants and mini shops ( 5 mins or less).  I'll stay here again to save $$$$ and time.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for staying with us earlier in the month and for posting your review.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,

Summary: This hotel has its pros and cons.  First of all, it is located within walking distance of Disneyland which is great.  It has a castle theme which kids love but when you are inside the room you wouldn’t know it.  The hotel is old and really worn out.  However, the room appeared clean and smelled clean which is really important.  They really need to spend some money and update the bathrooms.  They must have used 5 full tubes of caulk to cover up issues in the bathroom.  I would consider staying here again. It was ok.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us last month.  We appreciate the feedback and know that we are always doing our best to make improvements, and we have future plans for some enhancements to the rooms and property in the near future.  Please keep us in mind if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim area in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I stayed here over the Christmas break for 3 days.  It was my first time at this hotel and I chose it because it was walking distance to Disneyland and CA Adventure.  Overall, it was a decent hotel and could be one of my go-to hotels in the area when I visit Disneyland, which I do every 1-2 months.  However, it had one major issue that I can't ignore.....the noise!  The hotel itself is fairly nice--clean, good amenities like fridge and microwave oven in the room, etc.  Price per night is reasonable and there is plenty of parking that is free too!  Usually, the hotels within a short walking distance to the parks charge for parking ($15-30 per night) and there aren't enough parking spots for the guests.  Hence, if you come back to the hotel after 9 pm, good luck finding a spot!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to post a detailed review of our recent stay.  We appreciate the feedback regarding the noise you encountered.  This is not a typical comment we hear about, so we apologize.  We will share your review with our team.  If there is ever something specific you find in a room that has an issue or concern, please always insure you inform the hotel front office so we can address the concern immediately and see if it is something we can repair, or address while you are still in house.  Once again, thank you for your review.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My family stayed there recently, staff we’re great and Disneyland was thereby.  This is a great place to stay if your main purpose is to visit  Disneyland as this place is further from the major shopping outlets. I will   definitely recommend this place to friends and family.  Keep up the good work!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us over the holidays last month.  We appreciate the review and hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This is quite a large hotel.  The rooms are big and clean.  About 20 mins walk to Disneyland.  U will see a huge crowd of people walking there in the morning from hotels nearby.  There are convenience stores and restaurants all about.  There is also an onsite mart in the hotel.  Coffee maker is provided.  Reception staff are not so friendly.  Quick check in and check out.  Good value for money.
Manager Response: We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for staying with us recently, and for providing your review from your stay.  We apologize if you felt our front desk staff was not friendly.  We do take pride in our guest service, so we will share this with the team.  We hope you will come back to see us the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Our family of 4 had a great stay at the Castle Inn. Very friendly staff and good sized rooms and so so close to The Disney parks. The pool is small but the jacuzzi is great and we spent quite a few hours in there.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for taking the time to provide a review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Our less than 10 minute walk across the street does provide a lot of value to guest's and we were happy to hear you enjoyed the jacuzzi during your stay.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed 4 nights to head to Disneyland, Universal and San Diego. Location brilliant as it’s a five minute walk to Disneyland so tired little legs do not have far to walk when the park shuts. Tired rooms that are in desperate need of an upgrade but clean enough and certainly large enough. Friendly helpful staff and a small convenience store that charges like a wounded bull. Restaurants just around the corner. No breakfast but parking and coin operated laundry which is great. Ok to stay if you don’t want anything fancy but looking for a great location.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review and feedback.  We take all feedback in to account when planning our annual upgrades, enhancements etc.  We did a full room renovation about 6 years ago, so we know our darker, richer colors and fabrics guests think may reflect a tired feel.  We went this route to enhance our Castle theme, but again, we appreciate the feedback.  We hope you will come back to see us one day in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I stayed here for 5 nights while I buried Disneyland with my husband and Step-son. There were 2 separate rooms that can sleep 6 in 3 double beds. Microwave and fridge were included. Free access to security deposit box on lobby was good About half a mile walk to the parks. Walgreens is close by, plus a little diner that sells lovely food at a reasonable price, called Pizza Breakfast Diner. We had breakfast there a couple of days.
