Our son also had food there on leaving the parks. Always very tasty and reasonably priced.  Accommodation was clean and quiet. Plenty parking if needed and buses run outside for convenience.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide a review and we appreciate the 5 stars.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim area you will come back to see us.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland - clean, comfortable, and friendly
Summary: This was an excellent base for my recent family visit to Disneyland. The room was as advertised, an excellent value for the location. We appreciated the friendly service of Marc, who stored our luggage and arranged a cab on our departure day. Thanks
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate you taking the time to write your review and we will insure we share this with the staff.  We hope to see you in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We are just finishing our 8 night stay and the Castle Inn and Suites has been great.  Close to Disney, about two long blocks.  There are closer hotels but the walk is really not bad at all.  Lots of places to eat and shops like CVS, Walgreens’s and 7-11 across the road. Cozy rooms, clean and comfy.  Beds are comfy.  No safe in the room but you can get a safe box down in the lobby for no charge.  There is a gift shop and free parking.  The staff friendly and helpful.  Nice size room for two adults and two older children.  Motel style hotel.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for posting your review from your stay.  We appreciate the feedback you provided, and look forward to seeing you again.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: A 3 night stay with family of 4 adults and 2 children was near perfect for our trip to Disneyland. Would have given 5 stars had there been a second bathroom, but it still worked well. Just a 15 minute walk to Disney main entrance, and only 5 minutes to an I-hop for breakfast. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We would all like to thank you for staying with us recently, and for providing your review and feedback.  Thank you for the 4 stars, we appreciate it.  We look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I booked my room through Expedia , room was perfect , comfortable bedding and nicely cleaned , for a good price it is a 5 min walk down to Disneyland front entrance. If you’re also big about wanting to leave your vehicle at the hotel when you checkout so you can enjoy your trip to Disneyland and not have to spend extra $$$ I would highly recommend this hotel and they will accommodate you if parking is available, most hotels charge an extra $25+ , just a thought when booking a hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review.  We appreciate the feedback and hope to see you next time you visit the Disneyland area.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We decided to book a last minute trip to Disneyland for Thanksgiving this year. We are DVC members and there was no available rooms so I googled hotel rooms. This particular hotel came up as one of the Disney Good Neighbor Hotels and it said in its website that it was “across the street from Disneyland “.  Well, this hotel is two blocks down from the entrance and if I were the CEO of Disney I would not be recommending this hotel as a “good neighbor “.  The first room we were checked into had ripped curtains, stains on the carpet, blood stains on the ceiling (that’s what it looked like to us) and a light out above the sink in the 2nd bedroom. The staff apologized and checked us into a second room that only had stained carpet and tape on the wall in the front bedroom, it was
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Staff, Great Location, my go-to hotel for Disneyland trips
Summary: I am a Disneyland Annual Passholder and this is my go-to hotel for all of my trips. Free Cancellation! Free Parking! The rooms are large, clean, and cozy. Onsite convenience store that is reasonably priced. We rent ECVs and they will hold them in the lobby and charge them overnight for us. The staff is amazing! They called me to let me know I left items in the room after checkout when i had no idea. They held my item for almost a month until my next visit, at my request. They also made accommodations when I extended my visit at the last minute. The manager Marc seems to have picked an amazing group of people for the staff. Everyone has been so kind and accommodating. If you can't stay on Disney property, this is where you should be.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for choosing us as your go-to hotel when visiting Disneyland.  Your feedback and review is appreciated and we will definitely share this with the staff.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Our travel agent booked us into these suites. They far exceeded our expectation. So close to Disneyland about a 10min walk away. Room is very clean, cannot hear neighbouring rooms. Fabulous nights sleep. Staff are courteous and very friendly. They went above and beyond to help us with any question we had. They helped book transport to and from attractions, gave directions and guidance. Will definitely come back again.
Manager Response: We appreciate you spending your Honeymoon with us.  Thank you for the lovely review and feedback.  We hope you will make Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home for all future anniversaries.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed in two joining rooms in a group of four friends which was given to us on arrival without being requested! The room has microwaves and fridges which was an added bonus! We really enjoyed our stay as it was just a walk down the road to Disneyland and many grocery shops closely situated. Staff were friendly and rooms nice and cosey with the castle theme running through.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for taking the time to post your review we really appreciate it.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: A great hotel in the perfect location for Disneyland. An easy walk to Disneyland and central to restaurants. The rooms were clean, the staff were friendly and we would definitely stay here again. WiFi was an added bonus for the traveling teenager.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to post your review from your stay with us in November.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: 1st time visiting Disneyland. Stayed at Castle Inn because of the location and price. The hotel is 2 blocks across the street from the park entrance The walk wasn’t bad at all, about 7 mins. Lots of food places around hotel. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The hotel was nice and clean. Room had microwave, fridge and coffee maker. The room was a very nice size. Didn’t hear any outside noise or from next door rooms. Small gift shop which included food and drugstore needs. There is a pool but the weather was to cool to swim. Really enjoyed our stay. Will stay there again😊
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to write a review from your stay.  Guest feedback is very important to us, and we really appreciate it.  We hope to see you again the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My Fiancé and I recently stayed here for 6 nights and we loved it. We were on the top floor. The rooms are clean and spacious and have tea/coffee making, good size fridge and microwave, this was great as we could get our groceries and do most of our meals in the room and save money that way. Great location for Disneyland, only a 10 minute walk if that. The hotel has a pool and spa that is open until 10, they are pretty lenient with the times though and didn’t close it until 10:25 most nights, it’s great to get in the hot spa and relax after a long day of walking the theme parks! The wifi had a strong connection all the time, there are ice machines, friendly staff. We didn’t have a car but there is a big car park for those who do. Would stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you for taking the time to provide your review of your stay.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My fiancee and I stayed here for our trip to Disneyland, it was clean and the service was excellent. Nothing fancy, but it was very close to the park. The convenience of being so close to Disneyland and California adventure park was great! I will be staying here again in the future!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to post a review, we really appreciate it.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Lovely hotel about 10 minute walk to main entrance to Disneyland. Very clean and comfy beds. Visited with my daughter, her husband and two children so they gave us an interconnecting room which was excellent. Close to the shops. Highly recommend. Staff very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!  Our staff appreciates the kind words.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  The connecting rooms are great when there is a large family, especially with children.  We hope you and your family will come back to see us again soon!

Summary: This Castle was really a great place to stay for a trip to Disney. Clean comfortable rooms, all staff we encountered were most helpful. The pool was a nice break between trips to the Disney parks. Nice that this place is so close. Very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  The hotel is conveniently located near the Disney parks, the Anaheim Convention Center, and many shops and restaurants.  Thank you for the compliments to our staff, we work hard to give our guests the best experience possible.  With free parking for one vehicle, free WiFi, and no resort fees, it is the perfect place for a family vacation.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Got a great rate Thursday night 11/7. Friendly staff. They let us park all day after checkout so we could enjoy Disneyland. Very nice rooms. And free HBO. Kids had a blast. Short walk to park entrance. Highly recommend
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  We are always happy to hear our guests enjoyed their stay.  We recently added many channels for children like the Cartoon Network, Nickelodeon, a few Disney channels, as well as the HBO channels.  When all else fails a guest can always stream content using the free WiFi.  Parking is included free for one vehicle per registered room, while we can't always guarantee parking for the following day, we are happy to accommodate it when the opportunity presents itself.  We hope the next time you visit Anaheim you will come see us again!

Summary: First visit to this hotel. Staff was amazing! Everyone we came into contact with were extremely friendly, helpful, and efficient. Rooms were clean and large. We had 2 beds and still had enough room to put a pack n play up for our toddler. Walk to Disney was a straight shot and only took maybe 5 minutes. We will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  The staff makes our guest service a top priority.  The rooms are very spacious, and with the added amenities of a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, and a hair dryer in the room, they are perfect for families on vacation.  The location is tough to beat in the Anaheim area, close to everything and walking distance to the Disney parks too.  We can't wait to see you again!

Summary: Good hotel and loved the Halloween trick or treat for the children. most of the staff were so helpful until it was time to check out...I have asked for last check out (until 1 pm in my email) but I called and organised for a 4 pm check out. I did not confirm this in another email...my bad. Confirmed 4 pm check out on check in and again when we organise our transfer home. On the day with two small children and the stress of managing 9 checked bags and 5 carryon bags, the hotel explained that we  had late check out until 1pm and it was nearly 2 so if we needed an additional hour it would be 88 Dollars US for an hour. great learnings ...get it in writing.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites and taking the time to review the hotel.  It was a pleasure to accommodate you and your family during your visit to Anaheim.  We apologize if there was a misunderstanding or miscommunication during your visit.  As mentioned in the review, we had organized in advance a late check out for your party at 1:00PM.  Normal check out is at 11:00AM.  Our records do not indicate a later check out was requested during your stay, any later than 1:00PM would result in an additional charge.  As a courtesy, the front desk offered to allow the 4:00PM check out for a discounted rate from the normal late check out cost.  If we had been made aware of the change in plans, we would have informed you in advance that a late check out beyond 1:00PM would incur additional charges.  We hope you enjoyed the rest of your visit to the hotel and if you are in the Anaheim area again would consider coming back to the Castle Inn & Suites.

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn for 4 nights. it’s in a great location for Disneyland/Anaheim Convention Centre. Plenty of stores around as well as restaurants. Room was well established and comfortable. Beds were comfortable. Good selection of Tv channels for when you’re in the room. Pool was an average size but in a good way, Spa also. The store below was terrific to have for a last minute snack/drink. Housekeeping was done wonderfully. Wifi was strong at all times and easy to connect to. Everyone at Castle Inn was welcoming and friendly and happy to help with any queries. Our room was a standard with two double beds. Photo is of room as we were leaving hence one bed unmade. Would recommend staying in this hotel to everyone and will be returning next time we come to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We love to hear you have found your home away from home.  We also appreciate the very thorough review of your stay.  The WiFi was installed as a priority for the hotel as every room generally has multiple devices to connect, we want to make sure everyone can have quality internet access.  We look forward to accommodating you and your party next time you come to town!

Summary: I would love to give this hotel 5 stars but for a few things. The decore is very outdated and could use a makeover of bedding.  Also, the room we stayed in, (433), was incredibly dusty. Other than that, the hotel is in a great location to Disneyland and plenty of restaurants to choose from as there is no restaurant on site. There is a pool and spa as well.  I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate you brining these concerns to our attention.  We make every effort to ensure each guest room is cleaned to the hotel standards, we will certainly look into this report of a dusty room.  The location of the hotel is tough to beat, close to all of the attractions in the Anaheim Resort area.  Also with the free WiFi, free parking for one vehicle, and no resort fees, it is a great value as well!  Thank you for recommending us and we hope you come back again soon!

Summary Heading: Contacted us for item we left in room
Summary: The property is across and down the street from the main entrance to Disneyland so location is prime.  Parking is free, no breakfast.  Beds were ok, pillows horrible, one of the bedspreads had a hole in it.  The room is pretty big, extra room for Disney "stuff".  Our refrigerator was not functioning so we called and Maintenance replaced it with a brand new one.  The 4th star here is for the phone call I got the day we checked out to tell us they found some headphones and they would be mailing them to us.    We pay for shipping, but it is great that they called us.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to write your review from your stay with us.  We were sorry to hear you did not like our pillows or beds.  We have many guest's asking us if they can buy our pillows and mattress' so we understand every guest has different comfort level's, so we appreciate the feedback.  We get so many items left behind, we always try to reach the guest before they leave the area just in case they are nearby and can return to collect the items left behind, but if not, we are always happy to return them via the mail.  Thank you again, and we hope you'll come back to see us again.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Just got back from a 5 night stay here with my wife and two kids (4 and 1). The best part about this hotel was its proximity to Disneyland, super close. The free parking is a rare feature nowadays, that was also nice. That’s all that was remarkable about our stay.   The worst part was the cigarette smoke that came through the 1/2” gap at the bottom of our door. I had to put towels up against it to keep that out. The bathroom was little to be desired. The hot and cold water faucet in the shower couldn’t find a happy warm temp. Either hot or cold. The cold water valve was broken and turned both ways, you had to get it just right to not drip. The shower head was badly corroded with hard water deposits and if you’re 6’ tall it will be at your neck. All the pillows were hard and
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are sorry to hear there were not enough conveniently located outlets for all of your electronic devices.  The hotel has been renovated on a regular basis, the last one included adding extra outlets for our guests, installing granite counter tops, upgrading our television system, replacing furniture, mattresses and bedding, and replacing all of the air conditioning units, along with several other improvements.  We make every effort to address any guest concerns during the stay, if we missed some items in your room, we hope you will let us know the next time so we can have housekeeping or maintenance take care of them prior to check out.  As mentioned the hotel is located very close to Disneyland, with free parking, free WiFi, and no resort fees, it is hard to find a better value.  We will continue to try to take every opportunity to improve our guests' experience.  We thank you for taking the time to write a review of the hotel.  We hope the next time you come to Anaheim you will come back to visit us and see the improvements we continue to make.

Summary: Brianna was very accommodating with our last minute reservation. She was very pleasant and professional which made our visit very comfortable. As annual pass holders for Disneyland we have stayed at numerous hotels in the area but found Castle Inn and their staff to be the best. Their spacious rooms, great water pressure, and comfortable beds made for an enjoyable trip. We thank Brianna for making this trip enjoyable.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us and for commenting on our staff member, we will make sure we share this review with her.    We take pride in our guest service, so thank you for taking the time to point that out in your review.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Friendly Staff and Easy Walk to the Parks.
Summary: My family and I decided to add a night towards the end of our vacation after spending the week at The Disneyland Hotel and booked our last night at the castle inn! The staff was incredibly friendly and the free parking was a plus. The walk to the parks is close and safe. We were also upgraded to a parlor suite which was great use of extra space. The room itself was clean and well supplied with towels and soap. Towards the middle of the night, my husband and I were awoken by some strange noises and then some “toy box music” is room 150 haunted? We aren’t complaining but would love to know! Thanks
Manager Response: Thank you very much for booking a night with us after your vacation at the Disneyland Hotel.  We appreciate the review and you taking the time to provide your feedback.  We are not aware of any "noises" coming from any of our rooms, so although we are a "castle" we are a "fun castle theme" and not haunted :)  We hope you will come back to see us the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great price, location, and comfort.  We had two rooms next to each other on first floor.  We walked to Disneyland and saved the parking fee.  No hot breakfast at this hotel, though.  We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to post your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My family and I chose the Castle Inn because they are like family to us! We recommend the Castle if you're planning on a visit to the Anaheim area because it's so centrally located.  You have the Disney Resort within walking distance so we spent a day there and enjoyed a nap mid day.  We also recently moved from Orange County so the property is a very convenient and comfortable place to stay while visiting family and friends.  I can't say enough about how much the staff made our 5 night stay enjoyable!  If you are looking for a reasonably priced hotel, this is it! Free parking for one car, too! So nice to see so many familiar faces! Marc, Kelly, Angel, David, Eric, Gabriel,  Alberta, and especially Briana, thank you so much!  XOXO
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for taking the time to provide such a great review and feedback from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We love being family to our guest's, and we appreciate you taking the time to write that.  We look forward to welcoming you back to your home away from home the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I almost don't want to give a review because I want to keep this special place a secret! The staff was cheerful, kind and helpful. The rooms were clean and had new furniture. The interior design was appropriate to the castle theme. We appreciated having a refrigerator and microwave in the room so we could do some of our own meals away from the crowds. We also liked that Castle Inn and Suites is just 3 short blocks away from Disneyland which makes it very easy to take a break from the park and go back later.  When we arrived, the refrigerator in our room seemed warm. We asked a staff member if he would check it out. When we arrived back to our room that afternoon, our frig had been exchanged for a new one, with no fuss. It is a great place to stay. PLEASE KEEP IT A SECRET! (-:
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for staying with us ( we'll keep it a secret) and for taking the time to write such a lovely review and provide great feedback from your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Our extended family had a two-room family suite at the back of the hotel on the top floor.  Very quiet location.  Rooms were clean and beds/pillows comfortable.  The additional sink and mirror in the second bedroom area was so convenient and appreciated when getting ready in the mornings.  Walking distance to the parks and close to restaurants and drug stores.  The grand kids enjoyed the kiddie pool and the adults appreciated the larger pool and hot tub.  Room was ready when we arrived and was able to get a 1 p.m. checkout at no additional charge even though the hotel was booked for that evening.  Would recommend this hotel and location to anyone looking for a clean, affordable place to stay when visiting Disneyland!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you so much for the kind words and feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Staff were very helpful. Rooms were clean. Had a great stay. So close to Disneyland. Thank you so much to all staff. Called places when we needed to and kept us informed. We will be coming back as soon as we can.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your review, we greatly appreciate it.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great deal for hotel super close to Disneyland
Summary: I was able to find an amazing deal on this place, it was so inexpensive I was worried it was going to be too cheap, but I heard good things about it and I'm so glad we stayed there. Their rooms are nice, the staff was nice, and the Hotel is very close to the Disneyland entrance. I will definitely stay there again
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for staying with us recently.  We were happy to hear you were able to stay with us when we were running a special.  We get some comments are rates are too high, and other times, we hear our prices are just right.  We try to keep the best rates available for guest's as we know it's very expensive to visit Disneyland.   We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The hotel is 10 minutes walk from the gates of Disneyland.  Our rooms were on the 2nd level. The rooms were huge with 2 king beds in each room.  The staff were very friendly and helpful. We had adjoining  rooms so the lovely lady at reception unlocked the adjoining door so that we could have one big family room. It was  the highlight of our stay as Disneyland was such a disappointment.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide a review from your stay with us recently.  We were very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites, and sorry to hear that Disneyland was so busy it made for a not so pleasant experience.  We hope you will come back to see us the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The hotel was nice and clean. The pool was nice. The staff was friendly. This was our first time staying there and we will definitely be back on our next trip. The walk to Disneyland is quick and easy.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your first time.  We appreciate the feedback and review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I am a travel consultant and I regularly bring dance groups over to dance at Disney and Universal. I always choose to use the Castle Inn for many reasons for my groups. One being the great location - not only is it across the road from Disneyland but it is also at the better end of Harbor Blvd as it close to CVS , Walgreens and many restaurants as well as Garden Walk. It is also only a mile from Target if you want to stock up on snacks or souvenirs. The staff here are amazing and extremely happy to help in any way to make your stay enjoyable. The other great thing about this hotel is that have rooms that do accommodate larger families - not many hotels in this area actually have rooms that sleep up to 8 in a room (not many that do sleep 8) but plenty that sleep up to 6. At first
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your review from your stay.  We were very happy to hear you and the dance group had a great time and we hope you will come back to see us in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I don't plan on spending a lot of time in the hotel room on a Disney vacation but this place got the job done. Beds were reasonably comfy and room was quiet most of the time. Only time there was any real noise was when you could hear the Disneyland fireworks! I really appreciated the convenience store in the front of the hotel so I could grab a juice and a granola bar on the way to the park in the morning. The rooms themselves are nothing special are clean and simple.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review from your stay.  We hope you will come back to see us the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Convenient to Disneyland and places to eat. Handy Dairy/convenient store by enterance!! They sell beer and wine too :) only had coffe make which made 1 coffee at a time and no toaster, would have loved a toaster in room!! Pool was nice and refreshing without being freezing and was nice to soak in the 38degree celcius spa by pool. Overall good price for stay for what you get
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for providing a review from your stay.  We hope you will come back to visit in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Inexpensive room , clean. We were able to get into our room early. Well maintained. Short walk to the park and near by restaurants overall great place for a great little get away. On site little mini mart for last minute things or late night snacks.
Manager Response: We would like to take this time to say thank you for staying with us for your recent trip to the Disneyland Resort.  Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback and review, we really appreciate it.  We hope you will come back to see us in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great inn with very friendly staff! Across the street from Disneyland (approx. 10 minute walk). Helpful if you arrive before check in and/or awaiting shuttle to airport after checkout. They will hold your bags for you while you go out for the day in a secure area. The cleaning staff were wonderful and allowed me to request items from their cart when we ran out. Nice small pool for the kids and a couple of hot tubs. Didn’t go in them (didn’t have time). Overall a friendly place to stay. Good a/c for those hot California days!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for your recent trip to the Anaheim Resort.  We really appreciate you taking the time to write a review and provide your feedback from your stay.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim area, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My adult daughter and I stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites on Harbor Blvd from Sep 4-10, 2019 and thoroughly enjoyed our stay.    When we arrived around 2 p.m. on Sept 4 and we were pleasantly surprised to be given our room keys right away.  We were in room 334, about 1/2 way down the long block of rooms.  I was a little nervous about viewing the room as I'd read a few reviews that it was dated and musty in some rooms.  Our room smelled slightly of bleach when entering but we just opened the door for a few minutes and the smell dissipated. I would prefer if they used more environmentally friendly cleaners, but understand it's inexpensive and effective.    The room was very clean and roomy with two queen beds,two small tables with 3 chairs between them, a reasonable size TV,
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites, and for taking the time to provide such a great, detailed review from your stay.  We know this will be very helpful to other guest's who read reviews before they book, so thank you again.  We look forward to seeing you the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed in an executive suite on the second floor. Large room with nice decor and very well maintained and clean. The room was very dark due to the way exterior walls are on the second floor which would probably be different on other floors. Would also probably be a good thing in the heat! Only wee gripe is the extremely loud air con unit, I would wake up in the night and think I was in the middle of a storm or something. We arrived very early and didn’t expect to get a room at that time but they did give us one which was awesome. The laundry is very convenient next to the pool so you can swim while doing your laundry. Parking was so easy, right outside the rooms, a big plus compared to hotel car parking where you often have to walk miles. Reservations were excellent to deal
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your review and feedback from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the detailed feedback and hope the next time you come back to the Anaheim Resort, you will come see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Two days and one night living
Summary: We only booked for one night, arrived in Anaheim in the morning to finish the check-in, because we have not yet arrived, we put the luggage in the storage and then went to Disneyland. The location is really close, about 10 minutes walk. In the evening, I ordered a takeaway, and the takeaway was also placed at the front desk. The next morning, I packed my bags and returned the room to the luggage storage at the front desk. The attitude of the service staff was also very good. All in all was a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write your review from your stay with us recently.  Thank you for the feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We arrived late (10:30 pm) on a Friday night and found check-in quick and easy. Our room was hot when we arrived as the A/C was off but after turning it on for 30 mins it cooled down. Room, beds, and the bathroom were clean. Parking was easy and when we asked if we could park until 6 pm the next day this was accommodated. The walk to Disney was about 10 mins and was very easy.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for posting your review and feedback from your stay.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: First time staying at this hotel and I really enjoyed my stay. Excellent service and staff! The room was clean and well stocked. And very close to Disneyland. Which is why went booked this place but I will definitely be coming back. I highly recommend you check this place out!!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate you taking the time the write a review and recommendation for others to check us out.  Once again, thank you, and we hope to see you again soon.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We were very happy with our stay at the Castle. The staff were polite and friendly and check in was a breeze. We had a room on the third floor and it was clean and well maintained. The room had two queen beds, a fridge and also a microwave. They don’t have in room safes but they did offer safety deposit boxes which we used for our passports etc.   There were ice machines and also a pool and coin laundry.  This place is in an excellent location. There is a CVS pharmacy store and Walgreens about 200 meters away and a Denny’s and heaps of other restaurants all in walking distance. It is also a 5 min walk to the Disneyland entry.   It’s not the flashiest place, but if your looking for a good family place to stay in a top location I would recommend the Castle Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent stay.  We appreciate you taking the time to write your review and provide feedback.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The best thing about this hotel is that it’s a quick 7-8 minute walk to Disneyland. The second best thing is the pool was nice and never busy. The rooms were “okay” they had everything we needed including a mini fridge and table to eat at. The bathroom was small but the beds were comfortable. The laundry machines were broken and out of order when we were there. Staff was friendly except we couldn’t get an early check in.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to post your review from your stay.  We make all effort to do early check in's for our guest's, but it is all based on the night before and if we are sold out, then it's more difficult.  We hope by pre-registering you, parking your vehicle if you had one, and storing your luggage helped so you could go about your day.  We hope you will come back to see us the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: I wish I would have tried it sooner!
Summary: I have had the opportunity to visit Disneyland a lot over the years and have stayed at several hotels. I wish I would have stayed at Castle Inn and Suites years ago! I was a little worried by some of the pictures and reviews but my stay was great. The front desk staff was delightful, the rooms were bigger than I thought they would be with a fridge and other amenities and parking was free. The only issue I had was some variable shower pressure and temperature my second day but that is not uncommon at hotels. The walk to Disneyland was very easy and I look forward to staying here again!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We were happy to hear you had a good experience, and enjoyed your stay.  We were sorry to hear about the water pressure.  We hope you reported this to the front desk staff as this is an isolated concern and one that can be fixed very quickly.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: The room didn't look very good a first, lumpy beds, bad smell etc. We went to Disneyland then came back to make the "best of it" in the room. but couldn't do it. Water wold not run enough to fill the tub for a bath. We tried two more rooms no good water pressure. Maintenance could not fix the problem we got our money back and left.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the opportunity to address these concerns and respond to the review.  Upon arrival to the hotel, after checking in, low pressure was reported in the room and the front desk offered another room.  After checking the other rooms and being denied a free upgrade, it was mutually agreed that you could cancel the reservation with no charge.  Maintenance checked all 3 rooms and reported that the rooms had plenty of water pressure.  Management checked the rooms the following day and found they had adequate pressure as well.  Maintenance was unable to increase the pressure in the room, but there was enough to fill the tub, take a shower, or for any other normal use of the facility.  We apologize that we were unable to meet your expectations.

Summary: Nice hotel just 2 blocks from disneyland.  Clean, spacious rooms, set off the main road so very quiet. Nice outdoor pool area away from rooms to keep noise down.  Property is well cared for. you'll be happy with your choice when you pull in.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us.  We appreciate the review and feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: An 8 minute walk to the Disney parks so a great location.  Was expecting an hotel but really the establishment is a motel. Two queen beds and a bathroom; shower was a little iffy but sufficient. We used the pool which was very small but clean. If location is your first need then would recommend this establishment.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are considered a 3 Diamond Motel by AAA because we have exterior corridor's.   We were sorry to hear you had some concerns with the shower, we hope you reported this to the front desk staff as we can have maintenance check these things out and in most cases a quick and easy fix.    We hope you will keep us in mind the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This hotel is just around the corner from Disneyland. The price indicates the location more than the quality of the rooms. It has a look and feel of a budget hotel but because it is about a 5 minute walk from the main entrance the price to stay here is slightly higher than what you would expect to pay for a hotel of this quality. We had a mixer shower/bath tap and because of this we could not get a great stream coming out of the shower. The pool is in the parking lot and is small You can only get into it with a room key and it was never too busy. The room was very clean and a decent size for a family of 4. It is worth a 4 out of 5 rating simply because it was a nice room and really close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review from your recent stay.  We appreciate the feedback and hope you will come back to see us the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Good option for families on a budget
Summary: We stayed 4 nights for a Disney trip that also included a beach day. The hotel is aging and there were some small issues with the smell (we sprayed air freshener and it was fine) and functionality (water temp in shower). However, the price was great, parking was free, the front desk employees were nice, housekeeping was excellent, and it was an easy walk to Disney. It’s a decent value option for families on a budget, so Castle Inn was just right for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We thank you for taking the time to write a review from your stay.  We hope the next time you come back to the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Nice location for convention and Disneyland
Summary: We got a nice double room. It had a back room with two queens and a front room with one queen bed. The back room had it's own sink and counter which made getting ready easy in the morning. The only thing I would have liked to see was a place to hang clothes in the back room. Each couple in out party used the closet which meant the ones using the back room had to go into the other couples room to get into the closet. There is only one toilet and shower/tub but with a bit of organization that worked out ok. The hotel is withing walking distance to the convention center and Disneyland. There are lots of places to eat very close to the hotel. The pool area was nice and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suite for your recent trip to Disneyland.  It sounds like our Family Suite that offers 1 King Bed in the front room and 2 Queen Beds in the back room worked out for you and your friends.  We appreciate the feedback and suggestion and hope the next time you return to the Disneyland area, you will think of the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed there for 8 days. 1 1/2 blocks from disneyland. Nice and clean. It was a little musty smelling and our refrigerator was't very cool. We didn't complain as we just had water in there. I believe the must came from the air conditioner. Overall not a bad stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for posting your review.  We always hope our guest's report any concerns from their room as majority of the time it can be a quick fix and concern resolved.    We appreciate the feedback and we were happy to hear you had a nice stay.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The only positive thing to say is the location of this hotel. A short walk to Disneyland, so we could avoid the nightmare traffic and over-charging of the DL parking garage! The room rate was cheap too. But you get what you pay for! The first room that they gave us was filthy! Spots on the floor! Hair still in the bathroom sink! Musty smell! Yuck!! I immediately went back to the front desk and demanded a different room. After having to explain why we wanted to move to another room, they finally gave us a different one. I checked outs the room before we lugged all our stuff up to it. It certainly wasn’t perfect, but at least it was clean. While I was checking it out, my wife was trying to find us another hotel. No such luck last minute. We moved into the room and put up with the
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Castle Inn Anaheim 7 minute  walk from Disneyland July 18 to July 25 2019
Summary: My family and I stayed at Castle Inn for 1 week. Our room was very clean, we had the 2 double beds, there is a mini fridge and microwave in the room, along with the shower/ bath tub and sink. There is no safe but the front desk can lock up your passport and money if needed.One parking pass to each suite, you can park anywhere in their lot, as long as you display your pass. We have arrived at 130pm at the hotel, check in time is at 3pm. You can ask the front desk to hold your luggage in a locked secure room, and we went to have lunch. There is also a nice small pool, never had time to use it, as we were on the go, walking around. There is a little store in the Castle Inn and the prices are really descent there for water and other stuff. They are open from 7am to 11pm everyday.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to the Disneyland Resort.  Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed review of your stay and some of our features, location and amenities, we know other guest's enjoy reading other guest's reviews.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My family and I had a great time staying at the Castle Inn for our Disneyland vacation. Two blocks away from the entrance to the park, just around the corner from the Garden Walk, clean room with a pool and gift shop! We would stay again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to post a review from your stay, we really appreciated it.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great property that even though is large still has a family owned feel
Summary: Spent a few days at Disneyland Parks so we stayed here. Easy check in, cool quiet room, great gardens, quick shuttles, and friendly helpful staff. The best part???? The family of little Duckies the staff protects within the gardens that just roam around and really charm up the place.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review, but we think you posted this on the wrong hotel site.  We want to make sure your review gets posted to the hotel in Anaheim where you stayed.  We don't have "Duckies" although I wished we did, so hopefully you see this and get on the hotel site where you stayed so they can get your review.  Have a great day,  Castle Inn & Suites, Anaheim, CA.

Summary: The room was nice, comfortable beds, they have a mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker and a small convince store. The staff was very nice. If you need to rent a scooter the staff is happy to get one delivered to the hotel.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  We appreciate the review and hope you will come back to see us again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Comfortable and very friendly staff. We didn't spend a lot of time in the room but it was clean. Had a problem with the bathroom but they sent maintenance immediately and corrected the issue. Great place, close to the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to post your review from your recent stay.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Disneyland area.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Seriously it's a 7 minute walk. We stayed there for 4 nights and were so pleased. The room was clean. The location was so close. The staff was so nice. If I go back to Disneyland I will stay there again to be honest.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the feedback and hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Wasn’t sure what to expect when we arrived. However it soon became apparent that the location of this hotel is great- a five minute walk from Disney. The rooms are very clean- slightly dark- in keeping with a castle but spacious and the beds - best night sleep so far in my vacation. The reception staff were extremely helpful. On our last day allowed to keep safe deposit box ( located in reception) and our luggage stored for us whilst we visited the park. They also arranged a taxi transport up to Hollywood LA with classic transportation- driver was great.  However being from England it’s a castle by name not by structure 😂
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review and feedback you provided.  We hope you will come back to see us if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Stayed there for two nights so that I could go to Disney.  It was within a short walking distance from the park entrances.  The hotel itself was nice, spacious, comfortable beds, clean, A/C worked great.  I wish I had more time to check out the pool, but it was a great stay.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to post a review, we really appreciate it.  We hope to see you then next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Consider what you're used to... and be honest with what you need. This is likely NOT IT!
Summary: In the words of my 7 year old daughter, "Don't we usually stay in NICE hotels???"   The outside walkway going to the room is small pebbled concrete that's uneven.  I worried I was dizzy trying to access our room because the surface weaved and bobbed. We booked a 2 room suite--expecting a room with two bedrooms off of it. This room, for which we paid $247 a night, was a room with another room off of it.  The main room had a queen bed, not a king--as stated. The linens were thin, pilled, and standard Motel-6 quality bed spreads. The room smelled oddly of honey and urine. The air conditioning was musty. The bathroom wall seemed to have small spots of black mold along the mirror. The fridge didn't work properly, allowing the two milks we bought for breakfast to go bad
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are sorry we were unable to meet your expectations.  The room type reserved was a two bedroom suite which can accommodate up to 6 people.  We regret that during your stay at the hotel you did not inform us of any issues in the room, we could have addressed them while you were still at the hotel and perhaps avoided a negative experience.  We are happy to hear you found suitable accommodations nearby for the remainder of your stay.  We make every effort to provide a positive experience for our guests and take care of any issues that may arise as quickly as possible.

Summary: The staff was friendly, check in was easy, and the room was clean.  However, the room was dark, probably because of the dark furniture and upholstery, but was a decent size.  My daughters didn't particularly care for the hotel since they felt it was outdated.  It was great for a couple of days to go to Disneyland.  It was a quick walk to the park and was in a good location to other restaurants, CVS etc.  Also it had free parking which was a plus.  Also beware it does not have an iron and ironing board in the room. So you can't quickly iron out any wrinkles...
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently and for providing your review.    We do offer iron/ironing boards so if you ever come back to see us, just let us know you need one and they will be delivered to your room.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Worth the stay. Older hotel but clean and it's a CASTLE!! Make sure you take in the stained glass in the lobby. Very close to the park entrance. The staff was friendly and helpful. Every little girl no matter how old will love the idea of staying in a castle.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us and for taking the time to post your review we really appreciate it.  We were very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to seeing you the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Very comfortable beds and literally a 7 minute walk from Disneyland.
Summary: My family of four stayed there July 2018 and I have meaning to write a review.  We had been in the US (Australians) for a month, and these were by far the most comfortable beds we slept in at any of the hotels we stayed in.  Separate bedroom for the kids was great.  Reception staff were exceptional especially Pat on check in who was very helpful.  To be fair, all staff were great.  Great pool also. No onsite dining however just a short 5-10 minute walk to various cafes and restaurants.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us last year, and for remembering to post your review, this is very much appreciated.  We do get a lot of comments regarding our mattress and pillow's.  We've had guest's ask where they can buy them, and we have actually sold many pillows to our guest's.  We will make sure we share this with the staff as well.  We hope if your travel plans bring you back to the States in the near future, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We booked a last minute trip to Disneyland, and chose the Castle Inn based on reviewers saying that it was clean, and close to the park. We found this to be very true. It's definitely not a fancy hotel, but it was very clean, which is super important to us. The room also had microwave and small fridge for us store our snacks that we took to the park each day. Staff was very friendly, and they even let us use the free parking for a few hours after hour checkout time.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review and we do take pride in our cleanliness and friendly staff, so thank you for mentioning that.  We hope you will come back to see us the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My family and I stay at this hotel about once a month (for our Disney fix) and we always feel at home!!  The front desk staff is amazing (Hello David) and they always try to accommodate you.  Easy walk to Disneyland, about 10 minutes on a slow stroll.  Stay here!!  You won't be sorry!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for being one of our returning guest's.  We appreciate the great review and will definitely pass this along to our staff.  We will see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We needed a hotel for a quick over-night Disney stay.  Chose Castle Inn based on location and price. Great location if you want to be able to walk to parks. Great price, easy check in. Only reasons I didn’t give 5-stars were for the following: Bathroom: a bit dated. Water pressure not the greatest and water did not stay warm through our showers.  Parking: the spaces are so tiny that oversized vehicles did not fit and many took two spaces up. And you have to just hope that no one dings your car with their car door because there is no space.  Would still recommend.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to post your review, this is always very helpful.  We will always continue to make improvements and enhancements to the property, so we appreciate your feedback.  Thank you for the recommendation and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The staff was extremely friendly and knowledgeable, especially Alberta. We needed a scooter rental for Disney land which is just walking distance away and they had information on a couple of different companies. The one they suggested was half the price of renting one in Disneyland and much faster. We left it at hotel office every night and they charged it for us and had it ready for next day. They also gave us multiple food options. It is a older Hotel and shows some wear but is clean.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to post our review.  We hope to see you the next time we visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Avoid at all costs!! We got sent to the far corner of the Motel, Room 145!!! After going to bed at around 10.30pm as they say "it all kicked off". The lift is right out side the door so  every child from Anaheim and surrounding areas seemed to go up and down endlessly. The area was lit by what seemed to be a searchlight rather than a floodlight. The laundry is next door and it kept operating till about midnight. The best part was the refrigeration unit driving what was the Coke machine next to true lift (Supposedly out of order) which kicked in every 10 minutes with a roar that was more akin to 20 747's taking off at LAX. I think we drifted off at about 4am!! On departure that afternoon the gentleman at the desk said "didn't they warn you"?? Nope. PLEASE close that room down!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to the Castle Inn & Suites.  The front desk staff is available 24 hours per day for any guest concerns or questions.  We apologize for the inconveniences you experienced due to your room location.  For any future stay please contact the front desk and we will be happy to help find a solution to the issue.  We appreciate the feedback and will take your concerns into consideration. Thank you

Summary: The folks at Castle Inn and Suites always make us feel welcome. They go out of their way to accommodate us. We so enjoy staying there every year (for eight years!) because we can always count on them to be professional and delightful. The place is always clean and comfortable. It's like our home away from home. Everyone there is wonderful. We love the place!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites, and for taking the time to provide your review, we really appreciate it.  We look forward to having you return to your home away from home in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Positives: friendly, helpful staff. Excellent location, 5 minutes walk to Disneyland and within 15 minutes of several eateries. Clean room. Pool and spa. Negatives: no cutlery in room, no plates. Shower pressure was poor.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to the Disneyland Resort area.  We appreciate all feedback positive and negative.  Because we are a property that does not allow cooking in our guest rooms,  we do not provide cutlery or plates in our rooms.  You would find these items in a property that offers a kitchen where cooking is allowed. We do have a gift shop on property that provides paper/plastic items for guest's.  We apologize you assumed that we were a property that would provide cutlery, plates etc.  Once again, we appreciate all feedback and hope you may return to visit us in the future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This hotel is in walking distance of Disney.  They have nice clean rooms, with a laundry room and very helpful staff.  The pool is heated but is kind of small compared to other hotels.  My kids didn't noticed and enjoyed swimming and being in the hot tub.
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your stay earlier this month, and thank you for providing your review.  We hope you will come back to see us in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The rooms are very clean and comfortable. We had a family suite which had all ammenities needed for our 2y.o plus enough space for some privacy. Good location, 10min walk to Disney gates, Lots of nearby options for food and convenience stores. All of the staff were wonderful and helped beyond their roles. Perhaps not as modern as other big chain hotels, but I would stay here again due to is cleanliness and great staff.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your review, we really appreciate it.  We take pride in our guest service and cleanliness of our property so thank you for mentioning this.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: No breakfast, be aware of that. Fridge has no icebox, but we asked to keep our icepacks in the staff freezer.  there is a microwave.  7-10 minutes to gates of disney including waiting for the lights. Its a really short walk, which is why we chose this due to 3 kids under eight. Two elevators if needed. Doors are outside facing (vs. inside hall). Our room was very very quiet the whole time.  Everything worked. Our fridge had an issue, but we called and it was fixed within ten minutes.  Also the parking lot is very clean, they have someone sweeping. I didn't try the pool, it was too cold while we were there, but others did.  I did use the laundry, it was a dollar something for wash and another dollars oemthing to dry, bring your own soap. There is a small store onsite, very small.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently and for posting your review.  Your feedback and review is very much appreciated, and we know other guest's benefit from all feedback our guest's post.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Would definitely recommend this accommodation. Location is great. Walking distance to Disneyland, CVS pharmacy, subway, ihop and many other places to eat and few open 24hours. Service here is great and friendly. Housekeeping was done daily and very friendly staff. We would definitely be staying here again kids loved it. Also the pool is a bonus. A++++
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your review, we really appreciate it.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn for 6 nights. Considering they cost a 3rd of a Disneyland property hotel, the money we saved paid for the rest of the vacation.  Room was clean. We had one of only 4 smoking rooms in the entire area from all hotels available. And the smoking room was on the ground floor, great for my old knees.  staff was professional and helpful. Short 10 minute walk to and from Dland, only a $9 uber ride when you rtired.  Highly recommend.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for staying with us, and for writing your review.  We were happy to hear our smoking room you requested worked well for you and your knees.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you return to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: This was our first time staying here and we weren’t disappointed. Close proximity to Disneyland and friendly staff! We were very happy our room was ready when we arrived before the check in time and would definitely come back. Only complaint is that the elevator took forever LOL
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that you will come back to see us.  Have a great day,

Summary Heading: Great hotel very close (5 minute) walk to Disneyland gates.
Summary: This was our first visit to Castle Inn and Suites and we wouldn't hesitate to use them again. An older hotel but rooms were clean and front desk staff are very helpful and friendly.  Was only about a 5 minute walk to Disneyland gates.  Close to Starbucks and eateries (pizza/subway/chinese food/denny's/ihop/Mimi's etc).  A busy family hotel due to the closeness to Disney so pool usually busy with kids but we found the hotel comfortable non the less.  No frills of course but there is a fridge and microwave and everything worked fine in our room.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to post your review, thank you very much.  We were happy to hear you and your family had a nice visit, and we hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Short walk to Disneyland - perfect for families!
Summary: We recently stayed 10 nights at the Castle Inn and Suites for our Disneyland holiday with our 2 young children (3 and 4 years old).  We chose this hotel because it was budget friendly, had excellent reviews and was located across the street from the Disneyland entrance.  We also had a hire car during our stay and it was one of the few hotels in the area that offered free on-site parking.    We were so happy with our stay here!  The rooms are spacious, clean, comfortable and the kids loved the pool.  The staff were extremely helpful with tips and advice on where to eat.  The walk to Disney is about 10 or so minutes and being along the main road, means that it was a safe walk home after leaving the park late at night.   The on-site laundry facilities were also really handy and the
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great review and feedback.  We know other guests choosing their hotel's look at hotel review's and find them very helpful, so we just wanted to thank you again.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Stayed here with my little one on a mom and son Disney trip . Staff was very friendly and helpful . We arrived at 12:30pm so they kept our luggage in a locked room so we could start having fun at Disney right away and then come back anytime after 3pm to get our room . Lots of parking . Small pool , we didn’t use it this trip but lots of people did . Rooms were quiet , and clean . Slightly outdated exterior but tv , desk , furniture all new . Beds were comfortable . Shower head was a big massage one and no issues having hot showers at end of long day in the  parks . Fridge and microwave in room. Quick 6 minute walk to the Disney park gates . We walked back often at 12:30 am and always felt safe . Sidewalks very well light . Walgreens store two minute walk away and open 24 hrs .
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for staying with us earlier this month, and for taking the time to write a review of your stay.  We appreciate the feedback and comments.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Clean rooms, easy walk to DL.  Our Granddaughter ended up with the flu during our DL vacation. The hotel staff were exceptionally helpful and helped us immensely. Even allowing us to stay later to make sure she was able to travel.  Thank you Castle Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review and feedback. We were of course happy to help you with your Grand Daughter.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I am a travel consultant and I use this hotel on a regular basis as I take Dance groups over to dance at Disneyland. I use this hotel because of the service, the room sizes which accommodate larger families (not many do in Anaheim if you have more than 4 in your family) the location is great. You are across the road from Disneyland, you have several places to shop and stock up on goodies, souveneirs, food, drinks etc at CVS and Walgreens. There are several great restaurants close by. It is also clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your review and feedback.  We were happy to read you and your dance group enjoy the hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I stay at this hotel everytime I go to Disneyland and I have to say that Alberta is the best!!! She always goes out of her way to help us, whether that is checking us in, getting a rental scooter delivered to the hotel for my mom or just being her awesome self! She is the reason we go back time after time.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the kind words regarding our staff member, and we will insure we share this with the staff.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Booked my trip in Dec. Received an excellent deal. Arrived at the hotel in May. Pleasantly surprised. Rooms were large and roomy. Beds were comfortable. Nice to have microwave and frige in the room. Though we usually stay across the street from Disneyland, this hotel is not a very far walk at all. Nice pool and hot tub for your achy feet. This will be our new favorite hotel. Staff very friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your Disneyland visit's.  We appreciate the kind words and great review.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Just returned from a 3 day trip to Disneyland and California Adventure. We had 5 adults and booked a parlor suite at the Castle Inn & Suites. My mom uses a scooter to get around long distance (i.e. lots of walking) so we were looking for a hotel close to the park so she could go back and forth throughout the day. This hotel was spot on in the distance, price, and everything else.   The room was clean and 99% of things were in working order. The only complaint was the shower head. It was in one position and couldn't move it, but that may not bother you.   There was a lot of space, even when all 5 of us were in the room it didn't feel crowded at all.  The hotel is close to walk back and forth from the parks with CVS, Walgreens, 7/11, and other small stores located very close.
Manager Response: We would like to take this time to thank you for staying with us, and for taking the time to provide detailed feedback of your stay.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Some of best thing about this hotel is like 5-7 minute from from Disneyland, Disney Gardenwalk is like 12 mins aways and the Anaheim convention center is like 10 mins away.Also, walking about 13-15 mins to the Cheesecake factory, Bubba Gump shrimp restaurant. The hotel its self is 4 floors. Stayed on the second floor. It does have and elevator. Which has and ice machine and drink machine right next to it. The room had 2 double beds, 2 separate tables with chairs, TV, Microwave,coffee make standing wardrobe, fridge and a beside table. Its was awesome that the bedside table lamp had a power outlet. The room was well clean and smelt good. Only thing that was missing was a hairdryer. Which wasn't a big deal for me. However, my friend would have liked to have one available. The pool
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide your review.  All rooms have hair dryers, so we hope you contacted the front desk to let them know your room was missing one so we could bring another one to the room.    Majority of hotels in Southern California have heated outdoor pools, so we are very lucky to not have too many days of cool weather, so we hope you got to enjoy it during your stay.  We hope you will come back to see us the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 8 nights in May as part of our Disneyland vacation. The location was great as it is a close walk to DL and there is a Walgreens super close too. The room was clean and my daughter loved the pool. The staff was nice and helpful. My daughter loved that we were staying in a castle and there were lots of places to eat close by. We stayed in a family suite which gave us lots of room and allowed us to visit when my daughter napped! I would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to the Anaheim Resort.  We were happy to hear your daughter enjoyed staying in a Castle, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We had a fantastic stay and were impressed with the ease of check-in, parking, cleanliness of the room, prompt attention to requests from the front office. This property has five star service with budget pricing.
Manager Response: We would like to take this opportunity to thank you so much for the great feedback and rating you provided from your stay.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The rooms are spacious and comfortable. The staff are friendly. Great location being situated across the road from Disneyland. Easy parking, you can park right out front your room if you’re on ground level. Has a nice small pool and spa. Has a laundry but unfortunately when we stayed there only 1 washing machine was working the others broken. Walking distance to restaurants and souvenir shops, Starbucks and CVS pharmacy.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to write a review from your stay.  All washing machines and dryers are up and running.  We did have an isolated case recently where a few of the machines were down, but we call out a service company right away when this happens, so the machines aren't down for long.  Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Fantastic stay and comfortable settings.  All the stuff is up to date with that and all the amenities provided for an enjoyable stay! Hotel staff and management are terrific plus the location is outstanding with surrounding areas giving opportunity two full fill my family‘s needs.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.    Thank you for the review and feedback, we really appreciate it.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Perfect location with only a 5 minute walk to the entrance of Disneyland. Also very handy to a lot of eating places, and convenience stores. Great facilities - laundry, pool and shop. Good size suite for our family of five. Older room, but clean and comfortable. Helpful staff.  Our only negative experience was the inconsiderate parents allowing their yelling children to run along the balcony for an hour in the early morning. But sadly no accommodation is exempt from rude or thoughtless guests.  We would happily stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to take this time to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your very helpful review and feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: My Disney Home away from Home !
Summary: Recently stayed at the Castle for the second time in less then a year !  Arrived after a long flight and was able to check in around noon.  Was in a family suite.. which is two rooms, one with 2 beds and one with a king bed.     Room was HUGE and clean and had a full bathroom as well as a separate sink area in the room with the two beds !   We stayed for one night. And had no problems leaving our car until late on our check out day so we could spend the day in the park.    The front desk staff is very friendly.    The pool looked clean and had a few people using it... our stay wasn’t long enough to use it! Maybe another time !   There is also a variety store attached to the hotel with snacks and some souvenirs etc which was handy!  Hotel is a quick 5 minute walk to the parks !
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and for posting your review.  We really appreciate the kind words and feedback and look forward to welcoming you back next year.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This place is close to the park, great size rooms and friendly staff. We are always very happy when we stay here they know our family by name and continue to stay here for their outstanding customer service. They have a good size pool and within walking distance to the park making it fun and easy for the kids.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review.  We appreciate you being happy when you stay with us, and we look forward to the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The Castle Inn is quite well located. It is not the closest to Disney compared to many others but I like the location for its proximity to CVS and Walgreens. We bought our breakfast, lunch and snacks from either one of these each day to keep costs down in the park.  The rooms are very noisy. We had a family suite and found the noise went the whole time we were there.  We also had a baby who crawled on the carpet and the tops of his feet became very black. Obviously time for a carpet clean or to get rid of carpet in such high turn over rooms. Pretty gross.  The pool was nice to cool off in during a break from the parks. I also found the washer and dryers so handy to have.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback from your stay with us.   We were sorry to hear you had a noisy room location.  We have many rooms where guest's say they hear nothing, so again we are sorry for this.  We go through all of our rooms on a daily/weekly/monthly basis and put rooms out of inventory to do deep cleaning, so we hope you reported this to the front desk so we know the room you stayed in so we can address the carpet cleaning.  Once again, we appreciate all feedback, and we hope you will come back to see us in the future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Nice, Friendly hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: We arrived early and the hotel stored our luggage while we walked to Disneyland. Their 24-hr desk allowed us to check in late (we checked in around 11:30pm). Our room was clean & well-stocked with towels. It also included a mini frig, microwave, coffee pot (stocked with tea, sugar, reg. and decaf coffee), hair dryer and free WiFi. They offer a heated pool, laundry room, and a mini store as well. The store is pricier than CVS or Walgreens but WAY CHEAPER than any of the Disneyland offerings, which is nice when you want bottled water, Tylenol, etc. The hotel even held onto our bags for us AFTER checkout time as our plane didn’t leave until 4pm.
