My family enjoyed more time in the park, then came back, got our bags and headed to the airport. I highly recommend this hotel. The
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review and feedback, and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay for our family trip to Disneyland. Perfect walking distance to the park. Rooms & service was great. Had connecting rooms. They offered scooter rental for use from hotel & Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: What a dump and no parking. Stay elsewhere
Summary: What a dump. Stayed at several Disney area hotels and this is the worst. The exterior castle look is cool but walk in to 1960 with sheets that literally look like grandmas house.  Topping the crappy rooms is the stupid parking issue. You spend $350 to stay the night expecting to walk to Disneyland the next day but THEY DON'T HAVE PARKING!!!  You have to drive to a Disney lot and pay more. They offered as available parking up til 3PM. Huh Morons I'll just leave Disneyland at 2 PM to move my car.  Save your Money. Stay at Portifino or Marriott. This place smells horrible too. Like the mothballs in Grandmas closet.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate all feedback from our guests whether positive or negative.  We would like to clear up a few items in the review that are not accurate.  The décor in the rooms was selected to reflect a castle theme, with rich colors and dark furniture.  The hotel offers on site parking for our guests with a limit of one vehicle per registered room on the nights the room is reserved.  The terms of parking state that parking expires at the check out time (11:00AM) on the date of departure.  However, as a courtesy the front desk offered to extend that time until 3:00PM.  We apologize if this courtesy did not meet your expectations.  As one of the last hotels in the area to offer free parking we make every effort to ensure our guests with reservations will have a parking spot available upon arrival.  Many other hotels will allow a vehicle to remain as they are charging for each night the vehicle is on site, including an additional charge for the check out day.  The staff makes every effort to accommodate our guests needs, and will continue to strive to provide the best customer service possible.  Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary: They advertise a family suite, that we stayed in, as two seperate rooms. All they did was pull the couch out and put in a king bed. You have to walk through this room to get to the only bedroom. There was no closet in this room. To work the coffee pot you had to search for a plug. Because the cord was so short, you had to place it on the floor. The room allows up to six people, which means you could have two cars. The problem is they only allow one car per room. They don't even allow you to pay for an extra space. Their advice was to talk to the hotel next to them and ask them if you could pay them to park there. If I wanted to park there I would have paid for a room there. Next time I will. The front desk employees were very cold. Like talking to programmed robots. I gave it a
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are sorry to hear you were disappointed in the layout of the room and the service you received.  However, we would like to use this as an opportunity to let our readers know about the room features and policies of the hotel.  The Family Suite is a two room unit, it is not two separate rooms.  The front room has a king bed and the back room has two queen beds.  There is a closet in the room, located in the front room across from the bathroom.  The coffee maker can be plugged in at the vanity sink in the back room on the counter where it is located upon arrival to the room.  The hotel policy is stated on the website as one vehicle per registered room.  As the Family Suite is only one room, not two, we allow free parking for one vehicle.  In order to accommodate all of our guests' vehicles and avoid parking problems, during busy times such as spring break we need to keep a strict limit on the number of vehicles on property.  We are happy to hear your room was clean and hope you will come back to stay again.  We hope this information will help clarify any concerns for a future visit to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you

Summary: This is a nice hotel if you are planning for a family trip to Disneyland.  They offer free parking, and we didn't have any issue finding a parking spot.  The property is within a couple of blocks from the park and easy walking distance.  There are restaurants and other convenience stores nearby (Walgreen's, etc.).  The staff was very nice, and offers typical amenities.  There is no breakfast so be sure to go to Walgreen's for some quick bites in the morning so you don't have to buy in the park.  It was cool when we were there so we didn't use the pool or hot tub, but it was outdoors and looked decent.  The rooms were nothing fancy, but clean and typical of the price range.  Overall we would stay here again if we visit Disneyland in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about the Castle inn & Suites.  The hotel offers free WiFi along with the free parking.  It is a great option for all families coming to the area, especially with amenities such as refrigerators, microwaves, and coffee makers in the rooms, bringing items for breakfast to save is a cinch.  The location of the hotel is truly tough to beat, as mentioned there are many places for entertainment, snacks, or meals in walking distance.  We are happy to hear you will return to visit us some time soon!  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: We stayed at Castle Inn and Suites for a conference. The rooms were spacious and very clean. The best part of our stay was the friendly, accommodating and professional staff who assisted us throughout our stay. Nother was any trouble, they were happy to help and very generous with their time.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the great review and feedback.  We appreciate you taking the time to write this and we look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This place was clean enough for mky liking, and I am very picky.  The family suite  was sufficiently large for 5 of us plus golf clubs, and the fridge didn’t have that silly freezer bit on the top which allowed us to store several days of breakfasts and lunches.  Bonus: they let us park in the lot following our check out for our last day in the park.  We’ll return!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for providing your review from your stay.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The service was excellent. The people working at the front desk were very pleasant, helpful and answered all our questions. The room was very comfortable and spacious. It is located near many good restaurants that are walking distance. The convention center is also walking distance. I also appreciated when I called, I was able to directly talk to a person. And parking is free! We will be definitely be going back!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to the Anaheim Resort.  We appreciate the feedback and nice to hear you will be coming back to see us in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Overall we were very happy with our stay-close proximity to the Disney parks, the room was clean... My one complaint is that the person occupying the room next door to us was constantly out on the balcony smoking which is NOT allowed. When we would leave the room, the entire area smelled like smoke. Both my husband and myself called the front desk and went down in person to complain, but the man continued to smoke outside his room the entire time we were there. Incredibly frustrating for non-smokers with small children...
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently and we are very sorry to hear you encountered a guest that was not considerate of others around his room.    We do appreciate you taking the time to provide your feedback and we hope that encounter you had with the smoker does not deter you from coming back to see us in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I stayed here with my daughter, son in law and 4 yr old grandson for three nights- we searched and searched for an affordable place to stay while also trying to figure out transport to Disney- this place was perfect! First, parking is FREE! Second we had a ‘family suite’ which is two bedrooms separated by a door- I loved that the second BR had its own sink- as well as a table and chairs- with two (full?) beds- there was also a fridge, microwave and coffee maker- We were able to check in upon arrival which was well before 3pm. We were then able to WALK to Disney- completely safe and easy- just walk a couple blocks and cross the street! Super close! It was so convenient to be able to just walk back to the hotel for a break and then go back to Disney- I was also able to take my
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review, and feedback, I'm sure this will be very helpful to future guests looking to come stay with us.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Good Place to Stay on a Budget
Summary: We arrived a few days earlier than expected for our Disneyland trip and need a place to stay close to the park for a day. I have seen the Castle Inn several times on Tripadvisor and other booking sites plus I have seen it from the street and decided to give it a try, it was ok.  We checked in late and got a corner room on the fourth floor where the window really didn't look out on the courtyard or parking lot but to a hall with almost no natural light (however very quiet due to location), when checking in I would make sure you avoid this room type on all floors if you do want a well lite room. The room was clean and well appointed however; dated.  Additionally the bed was a little hard for my taste.  Lastly; unlike many of the other hotels surrounding Disneyland The Castle INN
Manager Response: Thank you for much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review.  We appreciate the feedback.  We have never served a breakfast at our property, as we feel providing free parking, free wi fi and not charge a resort fee is such a much better value to our guest's.  We hope you will come back to see us the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here the night before a Disneyland day and it was great to be so close to the park. The check in process was smooth and easy and the room was clean and nice. My only issues, which was just unfortunate placement, was our room 247 is next to elevator and the stairs. There is not much soundproofing, so it was very loud hearing people walk by at night and early morning.  The location is what really makes this place so great, plus the added bonus of free parking (hard to find around there). It was also a pleasant surprise when we checked out that before I could even ask about keeping our car, they asked if we were heading to disneyland and said we were welcome to keep our car parked there! YAY!  So, would visit again, just would ask for a different room!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great place to stay, staff was extra kind and helpful. Parking was nice and not a long walk to Disney land from the hotel. We had some problems with some kids above us yelling and running from room to room late at night, but called the front desk and they took care of it immediately.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide a review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the feedback and hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great location two blocks from entrance of Disneyland.  Surrounded by restuarants and some gift shops, coffee, ice cream, Walgreens etc all within walking distance.  Easy on and off the I-% freeway.  Nearby Target and 99 cent store.  Room was clean and quiet on the 3rd floor despite a large group of teenagers being there, we heard nothing and slept great.  Microwave and fridge in room was super helpful to have breakfast before we went to disney and kept sandwich items for the next day.  Would recommend and stay again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent stay in Anaheim.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide a review from your stay.  We hope to see you the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort area.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Affordable, Clean Place to Stay near Disneyland
Summary: If you're just looking for a place that is clean and well-maintained and you don't care about ambiance, this is the place for you. The beds were clean and comfortable, they provide a mini fridge and microwave, it was close to Disneyland (just walk down a block and a half, cross the street and enter the park), and was close to some good take-out places.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we appreciate the feedback and hope you will come back to stay with us in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Budget Friendly Motel, with a short walk to Disney!
Summary: I took my son to Disneyland, and booked this motel. The rooms were clean, it was in walking distance to the park. Close to a Walgreens and 7-11. Clean pool and patio. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Close to a strip mall and good restaurants. It allows you to go to Disney, and not break the bank on your hotel room to do other things.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for staying with us recently, and for providing your review.  We hope you will keep us in mind if you have any future travel plans to return to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great and affordable place to stay
Summary: I loved the fact that it was close to the park.  The hotel was clean and well kept.  The staff was friendly and very helpful.  I had my daughter, son in law and their 4 year old and 6 month old baby in the next room and unless their door was open I didn't hear any of them.  There were times when I knew they were being quite loud because I was on the phone with them but it was hard to hear in my room. The bed was very comfortable and the pillows were amazing.  There is no breakfast included but with the savings from staying here and the cost of breakfast to go I actually saved money, and there are very close places to go eat.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!  The Castle Inn & Suites is a great place for families to stay when visiting Anaheim.  In place of a free continental breakfast, the hotel provides free parking for one vehicle per room, free WiFi, and does not charge a resort fee.  Also every room includes a coffee maker with free coffee, microwave, and refrigerator.  So guests are always welcome to bring breakfast items for additional savings.  With so many restaurants in walking distance though it may be easier to just stop on the short walk to the parks.  We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed the hotel, we make every effort to ensure our guests are happy.  Come back and see us again next time you come to town.

Summary: My partner and I travelled to Anaheim to go to Disney. Great location, friendly staff at reception. Room was large with two double bed. We had noisy kids in the room above us and heard them running and stomping all through the night which was extremely rude and annoying. Otherwise it was a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the kind comments about the staff and the rooms.  With Disneyland right across the street, kids can definitely be energetic when getting ready to go to the parks.  If there is ever a concern please contact the front desk so we have an opportunity to address the issue.  We hope that if you return to Anaheim to visit Disneyland again, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.

Summary: We enjoyed our three night stay at Castle Inn. We had a / bedroom suite which allowed our family of 3 (teenage son) to all have our own space.  Yes, it wasn’t the most modern decor but it perfectly suited our needs.  Roomy, clean, close to Disneyland (it was closer than we expected to Disneyland - a very easy walk). staff were lovely and very accommodating. We didn’t have a car but free parking is a great bonus when you see some of the prices charged to park your car!  An added bonus for us was that it has an on-site pay laundry for washing / drying clothes.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words Julia.  The hotel is located right in the heart of the Disneyland resort district.  Not only does the hotel offer free parking, but also includes free in room WiFi.  Many of the surrounding hotels also charge a resort fee, but not the Castle Inn & Suites.  The on site laundry (open from 8:00AM until 10:00PM) is very handy especially for those guests with a longer stay, or when you come back soaking wet from a ride at the parks!  The staff makes customer service a top priority, so when you come back to the area please stop in and say hi.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: A 10 minute walk to the Disneyland park gates.  This is gold after a long day of walking around the parks.  Also a very good pizza place about a minutes walk.  Pool and spa are great for a relax before hitting Disney for the night session.  Rooms are a good size - large enough for a family of 4 with each one having a decent size case.  Beds were very comfortable.  Room decor and bathroom nothing special but always clean.  Ice machine on each floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to the Castle Inn & Suites.  The location of the hotel is tough to beat.  Close to the parks, close to many of the restaurants, and close to shopping areas as well.  The staff works hard to keep the property clean and comfortable for all of our guests.  We hope to see you again soon when you come back to Anaheim!

Summary: We had a great experience with Castle Inn and Suites.  This is my 2nd visit to Castle Inn and won't be my last.  Great location to the Disney Park and restaurants outside the park.  The suite was spacious and clean.  The staff were all friendly and very accommodating.  Will recommend the Castle Inn and Suites to my family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are always happy to see our guests come back to stay with us again and again.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  Word of mouth is the highest praise we can ask for.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Carpet is gross, keep socks on. Bedding could be replaced. Bathrooms could be a lot cleaner. If you’re looking for cheap and don’t care about a clean place. This place is for you. Bonus, it is close to walking distance to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we appreciate the opportunity to address issues in rooms or when guests are not happy.  We apologize if the room did not meet your expectations.  Please send an email to us at reservations@castleinn.com with the date of your stay and the name on the reservation.  We would like to make sure we have corrected the issues you experienced in the room to ensure our future guests have a more pleasant experience.  We try to ensure every room is clean, safe, and comfortable for all of our guests to create a memorable experience at the hotel.  We hope that you will come back to the hotel in the future to enjoy the services offered and the location again.

Summary: Overall had a good stay here. Nothing negative to say about the rooms as it was clean. It feels outdated, wished there were more plug-ins for chargers. So used to having the nightstand light having a plug in for my charger. We loved that it was a walking distance from Disneyland. Other than that, we probably would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay.  We appreciate the feedback and hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Another fabulous stay at this hotel. Free WiFi, free parking, pool, great room rates, and located directly across the street from Disneyland Resort, it doesn’t get any better. My  and my wife’s first choice always for our family stay in Anaheim. I like calling late night/early morning hours and making my reservations with Eric. He is very accommodating regarding any special requests or questions we may have. This is not a big chain hotel where calls are transferred to an out of state call center. Alberta and Alma greet us by name as we check in with them and always have a cheerful comment. Mark (Manager) and other staff members (Dave,Angel,Pat) are also so friendly as our paths cross during our stay. For our future trip, we were assisted by Ragini. We feel so welcome staying
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the great review and feedback, we will certainly share this with the staff.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Our family of five, which included grandparents, stayed here this week to do three days at Disney. We loved the location as it’s a two block walk from the park gates and one block in the other direction was IHOP, Walgreens and just about anything else you could need or want. Hotel staff was friendly and room was clean. We got a family room so my parents slept in the front room while we slept in the back room. It was nice to be together but have our privacy too. We’ll stay there again on our next trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to the Disneyland Resort.  We were very happy to hear you had a great time and that you will come back to see us in the future.  Once again, thank you,  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here end of October 2018, we have stayed here before as it's a 5 minute walk to Disneyland a great location plenty of eating places within easy walking distance.. the rooms are very large with fridge, microwave and dining setting, we had some special requests and hotel staff were only to happy to accommodate us and when we went to east coast for 2 weeks the hotel stored some of our luggage at no extra charge until we returned in November...there is a laundry, pool and spa and a convenience store on site, we will be back in 2 years time and will stay here again big thumbs up...,
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us in October of last year.  We appreciate the big thumbs up, and can not wait to welcome you back in 2 years time when you return to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Located within walking distance of Disneyland and California adventure.  Room was spacious and clean with a large vanity area for getting ready.  Small refrigerator and microwave were included with the room. Available parking and laundry facilities.  Easy to purchase park tickets at the hotel. Friendly staff always available for help.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for the kind review, we really appreciate it.  We hope to see you in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: There are no negatives that I can find for this hotel. From the time I arrived until I left 8 nights later I only had positive experiences. I have read other reviews where others have commented that the rooms look tired and old but I did not find that to be the case. Sure the wallpaper is a dark red but I think the atmosphere of the room only adds to the character of the castle theme of the hotel. The added benefit of this hotel is that it is no more than a 10 minute walk to the front gates of Disneyland. There are plenty of eateries within a short walk from the hotel as well as pharmacies and larger stores like target. The hotel has a swimming pool, laundry, extremely comfortable beds, and an onsite convenience store. The staff in the reception are very friendly and extremely
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review and feedback from your stay.  We appreciate the comment you made about our rooms, as that's exactly what we were going for when we did our complete room renovation 5 year's ago.  We elected to use the darker, richer fabric's and furnishings to compliment our Castle-Theme.  Using the lighter furniture, or white bedding so many hotels use these days would not work with our property, so we appreciate that you got this and commented on it.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Thanks, great stay. Helpful staff great location  fur family trip to Disneyland. Easy walk to parks could come and have a nap in afternoon then head back to park. Rooms a bit dimly lit but spacious .  Thanks
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide your review.  Thank you again,  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels near Disneyland / Comfortable Beds / Free Parking / Very Clean
Summary: We always stay in this hotel everytime we go to Disneyland, we never get disappointed. We got a pretty good deal as a return guest. We love that it’s free parking, we came in early room wasn’t ready yet but they let us park our car. Walkable to Disneyland saves us $20/day. Room is always clean, neatly arranged and organized ( i like the decoration they do with the towels like a swan and bow wd the toilet paper) little things that matters a lot... effort! Kudos to the HK team who prepared the room...comfortable beds too. We stayed for 2 nights, we left dnd in the door so they dnt need to clean the room, when i requested for towels and extra sheets, they delivered it in no time. Front desks people are so accommodating i requested an hour late check out they always allow us, tho we
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for being a returning guest of the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the feedback you provided as I'm sure this is very helpful to future guest's.  We hope you reported your mini fridge concern to the front desk as this may have been an isolated situation.  We have the "energy-efficient" mini fridges in our rooms which do not have a compressor so there is no ice tray area, therefore, it makes these refrigerators quieter in the rooms.  They have an adjustment to level 5, so your fridge may have been turned down.    Our gift shop does sell coffee so we are sorry if there was confusion with that.  There is also a Starbucks and Coffee Bean within walking distance.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We recently stayed here for our trip to Disneyland. The room was very clean and the staff were very friendly. We requested a couple of towels after accidentally leaving our DO NOT DISTURB sign up all day and they brought them within minutes. Little things like having garbage cans located outside every few rooms made breakfast clean up so easy. It was about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland bag check line. We got a superb deal on this hotel by booking early and it more than met expectations.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you for the great feedback and we hope to see you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I went to disney with 2 young children and with all the snacks flying in the room we needed daily vacuuming and fresh bath towels and our needs were met.  2 queen Beds in our room which were very comfortable.  Microwave needed to be unplugged because it was being turned on over and over by my children.  Walk to disney was about 5-7 minutes so you save on the disney $20/day parking.   I will definitely stay here next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for our recent visit to the Anaheim Resort.  We want to thank you very much for taking the time to post your review and provide your feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great location & easy walk to Disneyland
Summary: Arrived about 5 hours early for check-in and the staff were only too happy to help us out.  The room was ready about 10 minutes after we arrived and we were able to settle in.  check-out was just as easy with the staff holding our luggage for the day while we were at the theme park. The only negative was there is no onsite restaurant but there were plenty within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the feedback.    Yes, we are surrounded my numerous restaurants for Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner options.  We hope to see you in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This hotel is great value for money and is an excellent location to the theme parks.  It is roughly a five minute walk and is also close to the Anaheim Garden Walk, a 7/11, CVS etc.  There is no safe in the room, but they are happy to watch your bags in the office while you are out.  We would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out to write a review about the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay.  The location of the hotel is tough to beat, close to all the entertainment options in the Anaheim area.  The hotel also provides safe deposit boxes at the front desk for any valuables.  We hope the next time you are in the area you will come see us again!

Summary: I waited in the lobby for two hours waiting for my room to be ready.  They won’t let you check In a minute before checknin time.  What kind of customer service is this? Sit there and watch me wait for two hours, no clean room available really?  My teenager sleeping in a chair.  Over priced hotel, walk is longer than expected.  Pool is tiny, no customer service. I would not book again or recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to the Castle Inn & Suites.  We apologize that we were unable to check you in early.  During a busy time of year such as this past holiday weekend, the hotel is usually sold out.  If a guest arrives early we make every effort to take care of registration, store bags, or issue a parking permit if there is space available, but rooms are generally not ready to check in until after 3:00PM.  We are sorry to hear we did not meet you expectations and would have liked an opportunity to review the reasons why the room was not available and offer a further explanation at check out, but it appears you checked out without stopping by the front desk.

Summary: This hotel is perfect location for Disneyland then parks. It’s an easy 10 min walk..if that! Plenty of restaurants around although we didn’t use them much as not big eaters & saved money by having dinner in room or talking snack throughout day!! Room was always clean & was big enough for 2 adults & 2 kids ( 9 & 12) tea/coffee in room which I appreciated ( paid a lot more in Vegas and non in room!!) Staff were more then helpful and friendly!!  Only negative was there no iron in room which was bit inconvenient as needed one nearly every day!! But that wouldn’t stop us staying again!! Loved it 👍🏼
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the feedback and comments.  We may look at putting iron/ironing boards in all our rooms in the future, but you can certainly hang on to it if you come back and need to use one for your entire stay, that is not a problem.    We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn for a trip to Disneyland and had a great experience. We oroginally booked based on price and distance from the park as well as the theme. We weren’t disappointed. Our room was clean and comfortable, but keep in mind this is an older hotel. The staff at the front desk were great and stowed our bags while we waited for check in and after we checked out but still wanted to enjoy the park. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay in the Anaheim Resort.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Our family stayed in 2 rooms for 5 nights. The only hotel we managed to park the hire car without being charged to do so! Ample carparking available. The rooms were slightly dated but very clean and tidy and all included a fridge and microwave which was very handy with a 4 year old. 5 minute walk to Disneyland, restaurants and a CVS pharmacy. Our 4 year old found it very exciting to stay at a 'castle'. We would definently stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and for providing your review and feedback from your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: The hotel is slightly on the dated side, but it is clean and within walking distance from Disneyland. It is a place we would again consider when in the area as it it priced reasonably well. For a fairly large establishment we experienced very little outside noise. Can recommend if you are not too fussed about older decor.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites recently.  We appreciate the review and feedback.  We hope to see you in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Awesome location, great family suite, super amenities
Summary: After you drive in through the front of the Castle, check in and given your room keys, the stay is oh so easy. It’s location is superb - just a 5 minute walk to Disneyland and California Adventure Park (directly across the road). The family suite was perfect for our family of six, was exceptionally clean and well appointed.  The complex has a large swimming pool and spa and a great coin operated laundry with 4 washers and 4 dryers.  Walking distance to restaurants, coffee, convenience stores.  The staff were extremely friendly and accommodating. Heaps, and I mean heaps, of off street parking.  Great place to stay and would definately stay there again.  Highly recommend for families as the complex is quiet and very family friendly.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide a review of your stay.  We appreciation the recommendation, and hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My Mum and I stayed for 4 nights whilst visiting Disney. The hotel was in a great location, being an easy walk to the parks and also close to a number of restaurants and pharmacies. The room was basic, but comfortable, and smelt strongly of cleaning products when we arrived so we knew it was clean! The staff were lovely and let us have a late checkout, and also were great with calling and handling an issue we had with our airport transfers.  All in all, we really enjoyed our stay at the Castle and it was a perfect place to stay whilst spending long days at Disneyland. We would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We greatly appreciate the review and the feedback from your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back, the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at this hotel because it was walking distance to Disneyland.  It is a huge hotel with four floors and outside doors.  Parking spots could be a bit bigger, but then California parking is never great.  They do have lots of places to park.  The rooms were nice size, clean  and had everything you would need.  The WiFi worked great. The staff was friendly and helpful.  If you need to rent a mobilty scooter you can do it at the front desk.  The cost was $40 a day, but got cheaper the more days you used it. They had a nice little gift shop with snacks and stuff.  This hotel cost much less than the surrounding hotels.  We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great review and feedback.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We got this hotel with a Disney Vacation bundle. It was less than 10 minute walk to the park, which was the best part. The rooms were clean, although a bit outdated in the decor. Pretty quiet for a family styled hotel. Checking in was easy, although I did have to ask for the tickets that came with our bundle deal, the guy just wanted to give us the room keys and didn't look at the notes. They also didn't give my friend a crown, which they do when you tell them it's their birthday. I told them months ago so they either forgot or this person didn't look at the notes again. Small thing, but to someone else it might have been a big deal. Overall it was a great place to stay for our 4 nights at the Magical Kingdom.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to post your review.  We appreciate the feedback.  We apologize we did not get your friend a crown.  We love handing out our paper crowns to our guest that are celebrating special occasions or just because.  Kids love them, and so do the grown ups.  We hope the next time you return to the Disneyland Resort, you will come back to stay with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stay here every time we visit Disneyland and Anaheim. We cannot recommend them enough. Staff are friendly and welcoming! Rooms are clean. And it’s walking distance to Disneyland, Downtown Disney, restaurants and transportation. We will definitely be back on our next holiday!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites and for the recommendation to future guest's.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This is a wonderful place to stay if visiting Disneyland, it’s very close without paying the price of in park hotels.  Room was comfortable and clean and the staff were fantastic, we were there for 3 nights and loved it!  Could not have asked for more.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review.  We were very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  We hope you will come back to see us one day in the future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This was my 4th stay and 2nd of 2018!  We arrived December 12th and checked out December 19th. From the moment we checked in to leaving it was nothing but GREAT. The pool was nice and hot tub was great to rest between parks. The staff was always friendly and accommodating. Being a 10 minute walk to the entrance of both parks and downtown Disney this hotel is perfect. Many restaurants available on Harbour and adjacent streets as well. No need to look further if you want comfort and a great place this is it!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the great review and feedback from your recent stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Stayed at the castle in and suites in a family suite. It is basically 2 bedrooms , 1 with a king bed and 1 with 2 queens. 1 bathroom. Lots of room and comfortable! Highly recommend for a family looking to spread out. I always say that the castle in is cheap and cheerful and close to Disneyland. About a 10 min walk to the gate to enter the park. The staff is super helpful and friendly. For sure visit again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to write your review.  Thank you for mentioning we are an affordable alternative when staying in the Anaheim Resort.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Dec 5-12 and enjoyed our stay in.  It was within in walking distance to the park while still being close to restaurants and the CVS.  The front desk was helpful with change for the dryer (it poured while we were there), directions to local attractions, and a late check out.  The pool and hot tub are in the middle of the parking lot but there aren't many cars driving around so that was no problem.  The hot tub was a nice place to chat with other guests while soaking tired muscles after the park. The rooms were spacious and the beds and pillows were comfortable.  We would recommend the family suites as it was nice to have the extra room.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great feedback and hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We are a family of 7 and were given an interconnecting room which we found great for all of us.   The staff were so friendly and were extremely compassionate and helpful when one of our party had to be hospitalised.  Thank you Mark and staff as your support was appreciated.   Hotel is in an easy walk to Disney park entrance and food outlets.  Rooms were roomy enough and linen and general housekeeping were up to a very good standard.  Would recommend for families and couples.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write your review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the feedback and will definitely pass this along to our staff.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I traveled with my niece and her 4 year old son.  We arrived at 10A, knowing our room would not be ready,  the front desk stored our luggage so we could walk to Disneyland. 10 minute walk from hotel to front gate, shorter time probably without a 4yr old :)  Excellent location, they have a small store onsite for snacks/beverages. Room was huge on the 3rd floor, with everything we needed.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you'll come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: For the money it was fine. Could do with upgrading. The rooms were a bit stuffy so had to run air conditioning basically 24/7  The carpet was dirty.  Staff were friendly need to upgrade the ironing boards it was like a kids play one. Close to Disneyland was a bonus
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback from your recent stay.  We hope you reported your carpet being dirty to our front desk staff as our carpet's are cleaned on a regular basis so this is important to let us know.  We have found most of the guest's that come to the Castle Inn & Suites do not use the iron/ironing boards so we have the smaller version's for that reason.  We may look at upgrading them in the future.  Once again, thank you for your review.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Castle inn was excellent rooms very clean staff very helpful and Friendly close to Disney land and adventure park very central to shops and bus services we stayed for 6days dennys close by short ride to knotts berry farm and outlet shopping and there is coin operated washing machine and dryed on site with hot spa and pool
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for providing your feedback from your stay.  We appreciate the 5 stars and hope you will come back to see us in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 4 nights and it was wonderful! 7 min walk from Disneyland, not too loud. The pillows are really stiff so I recommend you bring your own. But other than that, absolutely wonderful!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay.  We appreciate the feedback and hope to see you in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Very good location. An honest, good value property.
Summary: Started out for one night in a single room (440) on the top floor. Very quiet and tidy room, with no issues at all, but I decided to upgrade to a suite (250) as I was staying for two weeks. Lots more noise from neighbors who were mostly families with kids. Heard people walking around above me. In the end, the extra space of a separate bedroom etc, was worth the noise. Pretty quiet once the people had come 'home' from Disneyland and gone to bed. Please note - this is not a hotel problem, it's just people not caring when they walk past a "Do not disturb' sign on a door. The hotel was very clean, well kept, friendly staff and a nice pool & spa area. The property is not exactly opposite the Disneyland entrance, but a leisurely 6-8 minute stroll will get you there. VERY handy late at
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for staying with us for your 2 week Disneyland Vacation.  We appreciate the great feedback in your review and all the great pointers you provided.  We know other guests read review's, so thank you again for such positive feedback and recommendations.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Good location a little out dated
Summary: The room was clean and it's within walking distance to Disney Land. Carpet a little outdated. Stayed in a family suite for a decent price. The on line view of the room looks bigger than it really is. Over all happy with our stay.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to post your review.  We appreciate your feedback.  We look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Only 1 block and a half from Disney gates. Easy walk. Denny's is on the way. First time at this hotel. It was clean and comfortable. Staff was very efficient and accommodating. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for your review, it is really appreciated, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Happy stay for a great vacation
Summary: This hotel was clean and comfortable. The  beds were on the firm side, which was good for us. The pillows were comfortable, the bedding was also nice. The AC worked well and the overall function of the room was great. The staff was very friendly and it was nice having the little convenience store on site to get drinks and snacks. The best part of the hotel is the location. It was a very easy walk from the hotel to Disney/DCA/Downtown Disney. It was safe no matter the time of day or night we were out. We walked with our toddler to the parks every day. If we return to Anaheim, we will certainly stay here again!
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review.  Thank you for the 5 stars, and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: So we stayed here for Thanksgiving. We were in a Parlor Suite and here are the pros and cons.  Pros: great location - less then ten minute walk. The staff was pretty nice. Decent price and free parking. Rooms were clean. The parlor suite has a front room with a pull out bed and it’s own tv. Then the bathroom. Then the back room had two queens, it’s own tv and it’s own sink. Pretty quiet. They makecswans out of the washcloths and bows in the TP.   Cons: beds are Not comfortable at all and the pillows are super hard. My neck and shoulder hurt every morning. This was a big issue for me as I would think for $200 a night that the bed and pillows would be of higher quality. The TV reception in the back room wasn’t very good. The shop on site is super expensive. The AC wouldn’t go
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for providing your review.  We appreciate the pro's and con's and always strive to make improvements based on our guest's feedback.  We hope you let someone at the front desk know about the A/C and the TV.  This can be an easy fix in most cases, so hopefully you reported those issues.  The elevator concern would be isolated as this is something that does not happen on a regular basis.  Any elevator issue we receive is reported to the elevator company right away so they can come to the hotel to check that out for us.  We understand the Serta Sleeper mattress' may not be the best for all guest's, however, the majority of our guest's do like the mattress' and pillow's as we on many occasions sell our pillow's to our guest's and many want to know where we buy the mattress'.  However, we understand they do not work for everyone.  Thank you again for your comments, and we hope you will come back to see us.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Just returned from a holiday to Disneyland. We have stayed at this hotel before and again we were not disappointed. The staff were very friendly and accommodating - nothing was a problem for them. The hotel is nicely situated near Disneyland and restaurants. The rooms were well maintained. Thoroughly enjoyed our time there.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for returning to the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your support of the hotel and for taking time to write a review.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you return to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: A Lovely Hotel That Fit Our Budget
Summary: Our family of 5 really enjoyed staying at the Castle Inn & Suites. Great service and the fancy room details are a nice touch. It is about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, not a big deal for older kids but it's a bit of a stretch for younger kids. It'd be wonderful if this hotel offered breakfast, but there are grocery stores nearby to pick up breakfast food for a quick morning (our room came with a fridge and microwave, super handy!). Our only complaint was a noisy garbage truck at 7am on a Saturday when we were trying to sleep in, but that probably wasn't the hotel's fault. Would definitely recommend to friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This is the second Tim's I've stayed here to visit disneyland and once again it was wonderful. Great service, the rooms are clean and comfortable. I will definetly be staying here again for my next trip.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for the lovely review and feedback.  This means the world to us and we will share your review with our staff.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: stayed at this hotel for 6 nights great service rooms clean and maintained serviced every day staff very friendly and helpful went out of their way to help and do things for us spa beautiful  value for money has a shop thats very handy nice and quiet and opposite disneyland plenty of resturants around that cater for all budgets and ages shopping centre 10 minute walk
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide a review from your recent stay.  Thank you so much for staying with us and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Enjoyed our third stay here and love the short walk to Disneyland!
Summary: My daughter & I had stayed here before, this time we brought the boys, so we reserved a parlor suite.  The 2 beds were very comfortable with plenty of pillows.  The hide-a-bed was awful, both as a couch and a bed.  It sounded like it was going to fall to pieces every time we sat on it!  The extra sink area was a nice bonus and the closet was perfect for storing our souvenirs.  Water temperature fluctuation is still a problem, but the water pressure is outstanding for a hotel shower.  We had an alarming moment at check in when they said our reservation had been canceled, but luckily they had a room available.  Their lack of concern and empathy was not very comforting, the only detail they had was that it had been canceled over the phone 2 weeks before our arrival.  Next time I
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide a review and feedback from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were sorry to hear about the sofa bed in your room.  We hope you reported this to our front desk staff so we could address that concern right away.  Our sofa beds are fairly new and we get more compliments about them then not, so the one in your room may have had an issue we were unaware of.  Thank you again for providing your feedback and we hope to see you again soon.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Fantastic customer service and great location as walking distance to Disneyland, shops, restaurants, etc. Staff were more than helpful to assist with any tours, tickets to sporting events and co-ordinate uber/lyft or taxi rides too.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and providing your reviewing, we really appreciate it.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: It was ok, and it did save money..
Summary: The staff was very friendly, we appreciated that. The outside is fun, it's run down, but it's really cool looking for the kiddos. The room was clean, but there was a big ant problem on the sink area by the coffee maker. After the first night, we couldn't put anything on that counter at all or it would get covered with ants. The coffee maker also put off a strong bad taste, so unfortunately that was unusable as well. The fridge also leaked, we tried to save some pizza our first night, but by morning it was completely soaked from a leak coming from the top of the fridge. The location is close to Disneyland, so that was nice. It was our budget year trip, so this worked, but next time we will stay back on the resort property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn and for your review.  We are sorry you experienced some inconveniences while you were staying with us.  We do hope you reported the ant concern as well as the refrigerator issue.  These are easily fixed and isolated concerns.  We realize you may not come back, but we are here if you change your mind.  Sincerely,

Summary: Stayed here recently. Room was clean and spacious but the whole complex is very dated. Its also one of the hotels that's a bit further away from Disneyland although still close enough to walk. Laundry was good and reasonably priced. Beds were very hard as were the pillows.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for writing a review.  All feedback is welcome, so thank you.  Sincerely,

Summary: Disneyland is only a few blocks away. It was nice and convenient. Little store up front had snacks, drinks and alcohol. Good and clean. Might stay closer to the park next time, but this was a solid choice.
Manager Response: We thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We are less than a 10 minute walk to the main entrance.  We also sell the Anaheim Resort Transit tickets at our front desk, however, most guest like the convenience of the walk rather than the shuttle.  Thank you again,

Summary Heading: An aging hotel located right across from the Disneyland Entrance
Summary: We stayed for 2 nights at Castle Inn and Suites when visited Disneyland in October. The location of Castle Inn and Suites is excellent. It is a short walk across the entrance - very convenient if you are visiting Disneyland. There are many restaurants along side both sides of the road. The hotel is in general an aging condition; however, the room is quite spacious with clean amenities. With the sky-high hotel prices around Disneyland, Castle Inn & Suites offers pretty reasonable rates. We found this hotel acceptable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Although  this property is dated and the rooms need make over, it is very clean and comfortable.  The location is fabulous,  across the road from  Disney land and close by lots of restaurants. They have a great pool and if travelling with children it is ideal. Our grandkids  loved  that they were staying in a "Castle". The convenience store attached to the property has everything you need  and all staff were very helpful. Excellent value for money.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review.  We actually did a full room renovation less about 5 years ago.  Because our decor is in the darker, richer fabrics & furnishings, some guests may take this as being "dated" but the lighter furniture, and/or white bedding many hotels use these days would just not compliment our Castle theme.  Once again, thank you for your feedback, and we hope you come back to see us in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I enjoyed staying in this hotel. Very clean room, centrally located and most of all a 9 to 10 minute WALK to DISNEYLAND. You can enjoy Disneyland knowing that your hotel is just minutes walk. You don't have to worry about driving, parking etc...which is a huge hassle for me. Only thing is I didn't sleep good maybe because they don't have that type of pillow they have like in Holiday express hotel or Hampton inn.  My back is achy maybe because of bed. My neck is not comfortable on the pillow so I slept without a pillow.  But, no big deal...at least it is a walking distance to the happiest place on earth. Still a 5 - star  for me.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for the 5 stars, we really appreciate it.  We were sorry to hear you did not sleep well.  We understand our beds and/or pillows may not work for some guests.  We do have many, many guests asking us where they can purchase the Serta Sleeper mattress' we have, along with our pillows.  We have had guests buy an entire box of pillows from us, so again, we understand this is choice and appreciate your feedback.  We hope you will come back to see us the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This Disneyland trip we decided to try a different hotel to save cost. Well it was a good thought.  We are back to our usual hotel Paradise Pier for our trip.  My review: homeless sleeping in the bushs in front of the hotel. My teenage children saw drunk people at 1am staggering around in a open dirt lot next to the hotel. God bless them. Our shower no matter what time of day alternated from cold to burning hot.  The elevators only two trashed out.  Out sideways are uneven on the balcony was unnerving to me.  The style us like a old style 1980s motel entry doors face the open balcony. The hotel staff was very gracious and had excellent customer service. The walk is not bad. One and half blocks. Ther is a Dennys along the one and half blocks. Now we know.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for giving the Castle Inn & Suites a try on your recent visit.  We appreciate the review.  Unfortunately, the entire Anaheim Resort see homeless from time to time, and we can not control when they decide to stop in front of our property to sleep.  We see many homeless at other hotels as well, so we are sorry you had to witness this.  We do not have any control over the empty lot next to our hotel as well.  The owners that own that land just are not doing anything with it at this time.  Again, we don't like it either, but not much we can do about that.  Any issues or concerns with the water temperature is an easy fix once reported to our front desk staff, so we hope you brought this to their attention.  This is an isolated situation and again, an easy fix.  There are many properties in the Anaheim Resort with the outside entrance style, and we understand not everyone likes this set up, but we have many guests that return year over year, so again, we understand we may not be the property for everyone.  Once again, thank you for your feedback this is very helpful and we will share this with our team.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for two nights to visit the Disney parks.  Perks: the hotel rate came with one parking spot. Another perk, the hotel has its own small sundry shop and sat next to - Denny’s, IHOP, Tony Roma’s if you choose not to eat inside the park. It also sat next to a pizza and boba place. The hotel was also a block and a half to the Disney’s welcome sign which means you still have to walk into the park entrance. But close enough. The room came with a microwave, fridge and a coffee maker. Tips: this property DOES not serve breakfast so pack what you can, to make it easier for breakfast the following morning before heading out ! The park is completely busy in the first few hours ! There’s a small pool and hot tub if you want to squeeze with everyone at the end of the day. It’s
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback and tips from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We hope you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Walking distance to the park. Room was good size and comfortable.  Staff was friendly. Suggest you bring your own soap.  Room doesn't have an iron or ironing board unless you request it.  The ironing board was small and hard to work with. I can't remember the last time a hotel didn't have an iron and board in the room.  Other than that it was a great hotel and we had a great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your feedback from your stay.  We currently do not provide in room iron/boards as majority of our guests do not request them or use them.  We may look to add these amenities in our rooms in the future, but yes, a simple call to our front desk and housekeeping will bring an iron and ironing board to your room.  We do provide soap and other amenities, so if you find that you run out and need more, again, a call to our front desk and we are happy to provide more of our amenities you may need while you are here with us.    We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: 13 of us shared 3 suites.  Plenty of room, great location with easy walk to Disneyland & plenty of eating options close by.  On-site store had a good range of essentials like milk, toiletries, drinks, icecream, alcohol, meals you could heat in the microwave etc.  No plates, cutlery etc in rooms so take your own or buy nearby.  Kids loved the pool & spa, but we didn't have much time to use them.  Bus very close to travel to Walmart, about 1/2 hour trip.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your feedback from your stay.  Our guest's feedback is valuable, and very much appreciated.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: So my fiance and I stayed here for our trip to Disneyland (as he did propose to me during the trip). The hotel is awesome, short walk to Disneyland and the staff is very friendly as we arrived around 7 am and they were more then happy to story our bags. The housekeeping was friendly and cleaned the room beautifully. We go to Disneyland once a year (or try to lol) and we will be staying here again,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your very exciting, engagement trip to Disneyland.  What a great memory you will always have, and we hope you make the Castle Inn & Suites part of your future visit to the Disneyland Resort.  Congratulations!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We came across this place and decided to go in for a look. They had a room available so we took it.     The room was large. The bed very comfortable and king size.  Breaky wasn’t available due to the castle not being open on weekdays in winter. But they gave us a breaky pack which was fine.      We seemed to be the only people in the whole castle and we had a ball running around looking at all the stuff and there was heaps of it.  Exactly how I imagined a castle should be.     We can’t wait to go back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is in a fantastic location with free parking. Across the road from Disneyland and around the corner from shops and restaurants at Anaheim Garden Walk. I booked 2 x parlor suites for 4 nights and the suites were very spacious. Great shop with groceries and gifts. Unfortunately the “pros” end there.  We had a ground floor room which enabled us to become very close to our upstairs neighbours. We heard conversations, toilet flushing and loud thumping and banging at all hours. Sounded like a herd of elephants whilst trying to go to sleep at night.   Housekeeping came each day late, around 4-5pm. Which was a pain as 99% of people in the hotel would go to Disneyland of a morning  then come back to hotel for a rest in the afternoon to go back at night for parade/fireworks. So
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate the feedback and that you took the time to mention the amenities you and your family enjoyed about the hotel.  We make every effort to ensure our guests enjoy their stay, and whenever we are made aware of an issue we address it as soon as possible.  In the future, if the staff is made aware that a guest would like service during the stay prior to a certain hour, we can coordinate with housekeeping to ensure it is done.  We apologize if certain aspects of your visit did not meet your expectations and we will use the feedback to try to improve on our guests' experiences for the future.  We hope you will come back and stay with us some time and have a more enjoyable visit.

Summary: Very close to Disneyland and other amenities. Moderately priced rooms. It is a very good location. They have a gift store but not needed as all amenities are close and within walking distance. Friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide your review from your stay.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Good rate considering where it is located. Nothing fancy but clean and actually quiet. The onsite store had everything. The staff was very helpful and nice. We would considering coming back next year for our Disney trip. If they served breakfast it would be perfect!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to post a review from your stay.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My families been going to this hotel for years, its a fun theme for kids and perfect walking distance to the parks. The staff is always nice but the front desk agents are who really show how welcomed you are. They are all great but one stands out above the rest, Alberta has always made us feel like family and made our stays easy and convenient. Thank you Alberta and keep up the good work ! Hopefully we’ll see you again on our next trip !
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for staying with us recently and for the great review.  We will definitely pass this along to our front desk staff.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites, your home away from home.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Like a home away from home
Summary: Loved this hotel from the time we stepped through the front door.  The staff are all amazing, particularly Alberta who helped make our stay so memorable.  Nothing was too much trouble.  Its a short walk to Disneyland with many great restaurants along the way, close to all amenities and good sized clean and comfortable rooms.  Overall it was just a wonderful home away from home.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us and for making the Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home.  We appreciate the kind words and will certainly pass this along to our staff.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed 4 nights and had to last minute add another person to our party.  They made the switch without hassle.  Great service and very nice employees.  The rooms were comfortable and clean.  It was quiet even though there were a lot of people there.  We will definitely choose them again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Your feedback and kind words are appreciated and we will pass this along to our team.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Castle Inn was recommended to us by a friend who stays here with his family every year when they go to Disneyland.  The park isn’t directly across the street, but it’s only about a 10 minute walk away.  There are plenty of parking spaces, and each room rented is given a pass for a vehicle to park for free. Booking your stay is very easy with one direct summary of fees due upon arrival.  We traveled as a family of 5 and were given two adjoining rooms on the first floor.  I must acknowledge Alberta.  She saw that we had our baby with us, took note of it, and called us before 3pm to get us checked into the rooms.  She also unlocked the doors that connected our rooms so we could all have access to each other.  When it was time to checkout, she offered a late checkout, which was not
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us on a friends recommendation.  We appreciate the review and your feedback.  We wanted to let you know that we renovated all of our guest rooms less than 5 years ago.  Many may think we are "dated" as we designed our rooms and decor in the darker, richer fabrics and furnishings to compliment our castle theme.  Many hotels decorate in lighter, white colors and this just would not suit our property.    We do daily housekeeping service so not sure why you did not have service other than to think you had your do not disturb sign on your door.  Had you missed service for a day or more you can always reach out to the front desk staff to let them know and housekeeping would have been notified immediately.  The days you were here, we had a last minute service from the Anaheim Fire Department testing our fire alarms.  When we have notice we always let our guest no in advance, but this one was last minute and we were unable to inform all guests.  There was one loud alarm test indeed, so we apologize you were here during the day when this was being tested.  Once again, thank you for your review and we hope you will return to the Castle In & Suites on a future visit to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This hotel does not sneak in added costs, like resort fees and outrageous parking and then more shuttle fees. I like that the prices are honest and upfront. The rooms are always clean and I like the fridge and microwave in the room I love that the hotel is close enough to walk to Disneyland and not have to wait for shuttles that waste time. The Staff is always nice here EVERYONE is nice and helpful. I have stayed here many times a year for many years. If something goes wrong they take care of it in the best way they can. They will give you a small discount for being repeat guest. The towels folded into swans and fans is always a nice little special touch we love.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the review and kind words.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The room was not clean. We found in the arrival a wet long red hair in the toilets sit and, two days after, some food and trash from previous guests under de bed. The hotel is also very old, more than it appears through pictures of the website.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback.  We apologize you did not have a good experience recently.  We pride ourselves on our property, rooms and guest service, so we hope any concerns you had you reported immediately to our front desk staff so we could address them.  The hotel was built in 1989 and has had several room renovations over the past many years, the most recent was fall of 2013.  We did a full room renovation and decorated our rooms in darker, richer fabrics and furnishings to compliment our castle them.    We realize we are not the property for everyone, but we do take pride in our services as well as our guests feedback.  We continue to strive to improve in every area of the hotel, and appreciate your feedback.  Regards,

Summary: We had booked one family suite for my daughter, son in law and two small kids and one standard room for me. Not sure if it was accidental but we ended up with two family suites side by side so it was perfect. It was reasonable walking distance to the Disneyland gates and perfectly comfortable. Not flash but the staff were pleasant and it had everything we needed. As per previous reviews, the water temperature could be a bit inconsistent but not to the extent that we were concerned. They were kind enough to give us a free late checkout until 1pm, held our suitcases for us and let us hang out by the pool until our shuttle was due. Would certainly stay there again
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that the room assignment worked out for you and your family. Your feedback is important to us, and we appreciate it.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: I love Castle Inn and Suites
Summary: I just want to say how much I appreciate this hotel! First of all, it is so easy to book a room. I like that there is no deposit or holding fee. I also love that they allow me to park there before I am allowed to check-in so that my family and I can enjoy the morning day at Disneyland. They don’t sell one day park tickets but they recommend places we can go to beat the crowds. Plus, we got a $5 discount where they recommended us to get our tickets on each ticket! Thank you so much for going above and beyond for us. See you soon! 😊
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us last month, and for taking the time to provide your review.  We appreciate the kind words and support.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This hotel is in a great location, close walking distance to Disney (though saying it’s ‘across the road’ is a little inaccurate).  There are also many good options in close proximity. The staff were friendly and the rooms clean, we had a family suite which was great to have that extra space.  But there was a strange smell in the room which I think was whatever cleaning products were used, we got used to it in time but it was very strong.  Also the shower was difficult, went from burning you to freezing cold in seconds. Definitely a good option if you were trying to keep to a budget, but probably wouldn’t rush to stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for taking the time to provide a review from your recent stay.  We hope you contacted our front desk staff right away so we could look into the concerns you have mentioned.  We are unable to look up room numbers as we do not get full guest names from these reviews, so it's very important to report room concerns when you are in the hotel and allow us the time to fix any issue and in many cases we can move your room.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  Regards,

Summary Heading: Musty wet basement smell and no floor/ceiling insulation
Summary: Pros: 1. Close to Disneyland...walking distance 2. Good sized room 3. Not badly priced  Cons: 1. Smelled of water damage like a musty funky basement...ceiling above shower rod was soft to touch and bubbly bulging 2. Dark dank room 3. Water temperature in shower fluctuated wildly...I resorted to taking “safe” unsatisfying cool showers 4. No wall or ceiling/floor insulation...all walking running wheeling heard disturbingly 5. Smokers stand just outside my window and doors
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback from your stay with us last month.  We were sorry to hear you did not have an enjoyable visit.  We hope you reported your concerns to our front desk staff right away as the majority of the concerns you reported could have been addressed and fixed right away.  Since we don't get guests full names on these reviews, we are unable to look up the room you stayed in so we can insure concerns are addressed.  It's very important to insure any inconvenience is reported to the hotel while you are here so we can address it immediately.  Once again, thank you for the feedback.  Regards,

Summary: If all you need is a free parking and a clean room to rest your head close to disneyland, you will get it. The option of walking to park, not depending on a shuttle or look for parking is great. We had a bit of a problem with the showers- there is only a showerhead from the top, and the temperature is not stable, so can't use it to bath the kids, and the bathtub was not properly corked so the bath was uncomfortable.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  We hope you reported any shower head issues to our front desk staff right away, as in many cases, this is a quick and easy fix.     Once again, thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback, we do appreciate it.  Kind Regards,

Summary: If you're after a budget hotel close to Disney, you probably can't do better than this.  The staff were good, rooms were clean and the location - 5 minutes walk to Disney's gates!!  It's also close to other shops, restaurants and amenities - all in walking distance.  Yes, it's dated only in the sense of design.  After all, it is themed to be a castle.
