Everything was neat and tidy.    One small caution, the outside walkways are made of wood.  So if you're a light sleeper, you might be woken up by the sound of trolley bags or trolleys being pushed.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review and your feedback.  Thank you for pointing out that we are indeed a "castle theme" property.  We went through an entire room renovation less than 5 years ago, so many times guests think we are "outdated" as we went with the darker, richer fabrics & furnishings rather than the stark white bedding many hotels do these days.   We hope when you return to the Anaheim Resort, you will make the Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for three nights on a recent Disneyland trip. It is a decent clean hotel. The hotel has been there for ages you can tell but the have done a lot of upgrades and upkeep to keep it clean and fresh. Check in was a breeze free parking was amazing. The hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland it is about 1/4 mile from the hotel to Disneyland security. It took us 10-15 mins with 4 kids. The room was clean and the beds were comfortable. The front desk was more than helpful with the couple of requests we had. Overall would stay here again for a quick trip.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide your review of your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you very much for pointing out the upgrades and upkeep, this is very important to us and we pride ourselves on keeping our Castle Kingdom, fresh and current.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Great atmosphere, quiet, clean hotel. Excellent block out blinds.Staff helpful. We really enjoyed our stay at the Castle Inn. We  would recommend to families. Only a short walk to Disneyland.Made friends by the pool. Would definately stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to take this opportunity to say thank you for the very kind review.  We appreciate when our guests take the time to sit down when they get home and provide feedback from their stay.   We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We arrived and our grandaughter instantly loved the Castle look. We arrived very early at 1030a and very happy they could accommodate us. We got to our room and were surprised how big and clean it was. The staff was very friendly and the pool was a great touch since we arrived early. We were able to also purchase our tickets to Disneyland at the hotel and found it was a very quick 7min walk to the gates of Disney. There was a strip mall with a few shops next door and CVS and Walgreen across the street. Also a gift shop in the hotel which was very handy! Would I stay here again? You bet!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us and for taking the time to write a review from your stay.  We were happy to hear your granddaughter loved the Castle theme of the hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Very clean, easy walk, magical for little kids
Summary: We loved our stay! The hotel staff was incredibly kind and accomodating. The room was clean. we felt we had plenty of room for 2 adults and two small children in a room with 2 queen beds. Our kids LOVED that we were sleeping in a "castle!" Magical memories for all of us and a great first time at DLand with the kids.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review.  We are very happy to hear the kids loved that they were sleeping in a Castle, and that it was your first time at Disneyland.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We changed to this hotel last minute as we found out our original booking had the pool shut down during our stay. We called and booked a 2 bedroom suite a day before arriving. Now perhaps i am wrong but in my history of vacationing a 2 bedroom suite includes 2 bedrooms and a living room, usually 2 to 3 bathrooms.  Well surprise!! Its a standard 1 bedroom! One bedroom with two beds and another bed in the main room, one bathroom.  We survived as our party even though unrelated to each other was pretty easy going about sleeping arrangements.  The coffee pot was fun....it took 4 cycles to make a single cup of coffee. The staff was amazing.  Super fast and friendly.  The location is obviously the best feature but i would definitely stay again...we would just book different rooms.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, clean, but a little dated
Summary: First the pros: The staff could not have been friendlier, from check in to check out, everyone we encountered was friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean, all linens clean and all in all it was a good place to lay our heads after a long day at Disneyland! It's a little bit of a walk: two blocks plus getting to the esplanade - but not bad at all, plus there are a lot of amenities nearby including Walgreens and restaurants. The pool area was nice, but could use a little upgrading.   The cons: The room smelled of mildew and was really bad in the bathroom. The air conditioner was a bit spotty, and the room felt damp the entire time. In fact, a sweater we had in the stayed damp even after  hanging it - it just wouldn't dry!   Overall: I probably would not stay here again, but for
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently, and for providing your feedback from your stay.  We encountered abnormally hot, humid days this summer, so we apologize if you had some concerns during your stay.  We hope you reported any concerns to our front desk staff while you were here as many of these can be addressed and fixed immediately.    Once again, thank you and we do hope you may give us another opportunity in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Castle Inn and Suites is nice and close to the entrance to Disneyland. The parking is free and plenty of spaces and the rooms are very clean.  My only problem was, the beds were very uncomfortable, it felt like the springs were coming through the mattress.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the opportunity to provide a review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were sorry to hear you found our mattress' uncomfortable.  Our mattress' are less than 5 years old and they are Serta sleepers.  We hope you provided this feedback to our front desk staff so we could check out the mattress in your room as it may have been an isolated problem.    Once again, thank you, we do appreciate your feedback, and hope you will come back to see us in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I was looking at the great reviews about this hotel while I was in Australia and thought I would book to stay here as close to Disneyland and other facilities. I must say as soon as I got here, I could not fault this place at all. Excellent service from the front desk all way to the house keeping.  Definitely will be staying here again.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This hotel is not the fanciest in Anaheim, CA but it is very comfortable and the location to walk to Disneyland main gate is VERY doable.  The room had a refrigerator and microwave so we saved money by having breakfast in our room.  Since the hotel had available parking on Monday, the hotel allowed us to remain parked in their lot so that we could spend another day at California Adventure.  This saved us the $20.00 parking fee at Disneyland.  I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide a review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We really appreciate the great feedback, and thank you for recommending the hotel.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Ok the bad,its set like a motel so all rooms off an open balcony and only 1 lift, thats it on any bad points. The location is a very easy 10 minute walk to Disney just 2 blocks,there is a very good selection of fast food to high end restaurant in walking distance, the in hotel gift shop/basic foods and drinks are priced the same as 7/11 and quickey mart near by. The rooms (ours was 2 queen bed) had loads of room for 4 of us, with a microwave for breakfast before leaving, there was no plates or cutlery but $8 from shop solved this, there was a bath and shower,room was made evey day inc Sunday. Pool was a bit small could fit about 15 people but there was a small kids pool and a large Jacuzzi all good to cool off after a long day. The complete complex was spot less,with all staff
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently, and providing your feedback from you stay.   Just a quick point in case you return to see us.  We actually have 2 lift's on property.  One is in the front of the property, and the second one is towards the back of the property.  There may have been an isolated issue with the lift you used during your stay, but if so, we get right on addressing that and insuring our lifts are fully functional.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at this hotel 10 years ago for our honeymoon trip to Disneyland and returned last week to celebrate our 10 year anniversary. When we arrived we were informed our room had been upgraded to a family suite which was fantastic! The staff at the hotel are lovely, the rooms are big spacious and clean and I wouldn’t stay anywhere else. It’s under a 10 minute walk to Disneyland and very close to restaurants and shops. They have a nice clean pool and an onsite shop for essentials. Our room had a coffee machine, large fridge and microwave, the free WiFi was fast and they also offer free parking but the best part was our 6 year old son loved that it looked like a Castle. Great stay for family’s wanting to visit Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you so much for returning to the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent 10 year anniversary.  I'm sure you saw many changes to the property from your first visit 10 years ago.  We appreciate the kind review and feedback, and look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Big room friendly service, accommodating at last minute booking
Summary: This hotel fitted us in at late notice, we had a big room with two queen beds free wifi and right across the road from Disneyland. The shower was nice and hot the best I had across the six hotels that I stayed at across America. Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your last minute booking.  We appreciate the review and feedback from your stay.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: What a great hotel the staff were so helpful we didn't check in till 11pm but they were still really friendly. Disney is only a five minute walk away loads of shops and restaurants near by. The rooms are a good size and clean and there is a small pool to cool off in. Great value for money
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for providing your feedback from your stay.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Comfortable, great staff, parking included and great location for Disneyland.
Summary: The room was large but a bit dated--lack of power outlets for charging electronics. The hot water in the shower was inconsistent. The location is across the street from Disneyland and the main entrance is about a block away. The hotel let us park all day and night. Friendly and helpful staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to write a review, we really appreciate it.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Thank you Alex T @ Dragon Den/ and John with bellhop @ Legoland Castle Hotel! Took care of all our luggage, booked us dinner show for eight kids eight adults, bb + grandpas oxygen tank in tow ~ all good! Really appreciate their professional way. Service like this really helps.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have been staying at this motel for the last 6 years and each visit is just as fantastic as those before. The rooms are good size, same as the bathrooms. Always clean and plenty of parking. Will stay again. Staff are always friendly and helpful. Easy to check in and out.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your review and kind words and will pass this along to the staff.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: First time here, GREAT stay, fantastic friendly staff, super location
Summary: I usually don't stay off Harbor, because of the "Disneyland" prices. But this one offered a lower then TripAdvisor price, for Disney passholders. It was only slightly higher then my regular Anaheim place. Good reviews - gave it a shot. Requested high floor, near Harbor. I dropped in at 1pm, for pre-checking and parking pass. They surprised me by having my room ready. After an early long drive, that was a true bonus. It was 421 and close to the street, just as requested. Room was already chilled - another bonus on these rare hot Anaheim days. Everything in room working, and clean. Entryway has wood laminate, and bathroom tiles. But bed area still has carpet. Not too bad. But no carpet would be a plus. I really, really like the individual coffee supplies. Just use what you need,
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your great feedback from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your attention to detail with your review and will definitely share this with the staff.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us again.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My daughter and I have passes and just wanted to stay near the park for a night.  My family stayed her about 9 years ago and enjoyed it.  So, we decided to try it again. Pros:  Close walk to the park, friendly staff, a gift shop, and clean rooms.   Cons:  The shower had more water coming out at the lower faucet than the actual shower head.  Also, the water got lukewarm at best.  Because the weather was so hot, it was fine....otherwise, that needs to be fixed.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently for your mother/daughter overnight trip, and for providing your review from your stay.  Thank you for providing your pros and cons.  We hope you reported the shower concern you experienced while you were here so we could have addressed that right away.  In most cases this is a quick,easy fix.    Again, thank you for your review and hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Highly recommend this Castle Themed Hotel. The staff are very friendly and helpful, the room and surrounding areas are clean and tidy and it is in very easy and quick walking proximity to Disneyland. The pool is refreshing after a long day out in the summer heat, however the concrete near the end where you get in could be smoothed out as it is rough on your feet. Very happy with the choice we made.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your first ever overseas family holiday.  Thank you so much for the review and your feedback from your stay, it is greatly appreciated.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My first time staying at this hotel while going to Disneyland and I was very impressed.  The room was very comfortable and the hotel was about a 5 minute walk to Disneyland.  They even let me put my cooler packs in their staff freezer so they'd be ready for my trip home.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review and feedback from your visit.  We really appreciate it and again, thank you very much.  We will see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: In June, we had a wonderful experience on our trip to Disneyland.  We stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites.  Alma and Alberta welcomed us by name.  We arrived early but our room was vacant so Alberta booked it and we were able to check in about 10:00. We were tired from our flight and wanted 20 minutes to decompress —so the early check-in out so perfectly. We soon discovered that the TV remote was missing.  After a phone call to the front desk, maintenance (regretfully, we forgot to ask the maintenance worker’s name to acknowledge him in this post) came and set up a new remote.  Not 2 minutes later Mark, the hotel manager, shows up with a remote to set up.  While we were greeting Mark, the TV and remote were already working.  What amazing customer service!  We loved our
Manager Response: Good Afternoon,  We would like to thank you very much for staying with us last month, and for taking the time to post your review.  We do pride ourselves on our guest service so we really appreciate it acknowledging it.  We will certainly pass this along to our staff members.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Have a great day,

Summary Heading: Pretty Hotel on the outside, but not very comfortable
Summary: The hotel itself has a very nice appearance. The staff were very friendly and pleasant. The rooms were clean. The pool area was small, but well maintained. The WiFi worked as expected, and while not right across the street from Disneyland is still a fairly short walk. On the downside, the beds were hard and uncomfortable, as were the pillows. Water pressure is almost to high, and requires constant adjustment to take a shower. The water temperature goes from just right to cold to scalding hot and back again.    Would not be my first choice for a place to stay if we return to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your feedback from your stay.  We understand we can not please everyone with the firmness of our beds and pillows.  We have so many guests that love our beds and pillows we have been asked so many times where they can purchase our mattress and we have sold many pillows to our guests.  Our mattress' are the Serta Sleepers and hotels tend to buy more firm due to the usage they get, so we hope you can understand this.  The water pressure is an isolated situation and when brought to our attention we can fix this right away.  We hope you will give us another try the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: A wonderful surprise just across from Disney
Summary: We stayed here whilst visiting Disneyland. Staff were very helpful at check-in and even allowed us to check in a little earlier than we expected, which was a bonus. They also assisted us with directions and purchasing Disney tickets at reception, thus allowing us to skip the queues at Disney’s own ticket booths (note, prices were the same).   The location was fantastic- just across the road from Disney (it’s about a 10 minute walk to the gates of Disney). There is a CVS and other supermarket/stores nearby, as well as a Starbucks. On the walk to Disney (straight up the street and across the road) there are many diner/eateries.   The property itself was clean and well-maintained. We loved the castle theming throughout. The rooms were accessible by lift or stairs, there was never a
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great review and feedback you have provided.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We spent 5 days here with our family of 6 in the family suite and it was the perfect size or us. 1 king bed and 2 queens, a separate sink and mirror area in addition to the bathroom, and 2 little table/sitting areas for cereal in he morning. The a/c worked wonderfully, the beds were comfortable, and it was only a 10 minute walk to the parks. We loved the little store at the hotel, too, for little things that were forgotten. The store was expensive but the convenience made it worth it. The front office staff was OK, nothing special but the housekeepers were wonderful. So accommodating and they were always friendly and smiling. The only negative thing we experienced was the water temperature. During our showers the water would be fine but then it was randomly blast ice cold water
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us last month.  We appreciate the review and feedback and will address the concern you mention with the water temperature.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for a week November/December 2017 and would definitely stay again. Rooms were clean and comfortable and the room temperature was always warm and cosy when we returned late at night which was very pleasant given how cold we were by the time we returned to our room. We had absolutely no issues with our room.  Staff were always friendly and helpful.  Hotel was located an easy 10 minute walk from Disneyland Resort and also a couple of minutes walk from a 7 Eleven for supplies.  Christmas decorations in the foyer were also tastefully done and a nice touch.  If you are from Australia or NZ worth checking with your travel agent for deals, we got an excellent deal saved us heaps.
Manager Response: We thank you very much for staying with us the end of last year.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide your review and feedback from your stay.  We were very happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay, and we hope to see you again when your travel plans bring you back to the States.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We spent three nights in Castle Inn during our trip to Disneyland. We picked the hotel based on very convenient location, close to Disneyland, and also based on good reviews. Unfortunately our stay was not that pleasant.   Nice things: our room was spacious, with plenty of storage and drawers and the bed was ok, maybe slightly soft but better than most other hotels we stayed in. It felt clean, the equipment was a regular hotel stuff. We appreciated a small fridge, where we could store our food. Negative things: we arrived late - close to midnight and were told that there are only two rooms available. The receptionist picked the “better” room for us, which was further from the road. However it turned out to be a nightmare: our room was exactly at the service room for room
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed 5 nights at Castle Inn & Suites and couldn't fault the service or the quality of the room. We arrived before check in on the first day and was asked if we'd like to take a room by the elevator (a little louder than other rooms) and was happy to just be offered a room 3 hours before actual check in after a 15hour flight from New Zealand. The amenities were readily available so it was easy for us to do our laundry or run down to the lobby shop for anything extra we needed. It is directly across the road from Disneylands also which was handy for us to walk there both days we were booked in for. Will definitely be back in afew years for another trip.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently and for the great feedback and review, we really appreciate it.  We take pride in our service and it was very nice to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back in a few years.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Castle in and suites - Fun place with kids
Summary: Fun place to stay with kids, but definitely not across the street from Disneyland like the advertisement on their hotel says. It is two large blocks away. It is not a bad walk though. It is still close enough. It's an older hotel, but kept up. The faucets and water temperature in shower was an issue, but other than that all was good. The water temperature would switch from cold to really hot and no matter how we adjusted it, it would switch back and forth, so showers we're not comfortable. The faucets in both sinks dripped. The suite we had was great size for our large family and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review and your feedback.  We are considered across the street from the Disneyland Resort.  We do face the back of California Adventure park, and it's less than a 10 minute walk.  We realize it make seem longer to some guests, but thank you for your feedback.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Great good neighbor hotel and location near parks!  Easy walk to park area!   A little trouble with getting enough towels and washcloths but were prompt after making call to request. Reasonable price and would stay again.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for taking the time to provide a review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We look forward to welcoming you back.    Kindest Regards,

Summary: Room spacious, clean and perfect for a family, close to Disneyland. Staff nice and helpful. Would stay again. Family suites have two rooms with one king bed and one room with two queen beds. One full bathroom and a sink in one of the bedrooms.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review.  We really appreciate it and look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Castle Inn and Suites is a great hotel located across the street from the entrance to Disneyland and Disney California Adventure.  The rooms are clean and spacious and the staff is very friendly and helpful.  On top of all that, the price is right.  If you're looking for a nice hotel for your family while hitting the local theme parks, Castle Inn and Suites is worth a try.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and for posting your review from your stay.  We appreciate when our guests provide feedback as we know this can be very helpful to other future guests, so thank you again.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: A trip to Disneyland - California is not a true experience without staying at the Castle Inn. We have stayed at the Castle Inn at least a dozen times when we have come to visit the Disneyland parks. This is a basic, no-frills motel. No free breakfast, but you will not suffer. The proximity is an absolute bonus with the Disneyland Parks entrance 2 blocks down the street. Reasonably priced (make reservations as soon as you can.) Great housekeeping staff! We had 4 rooms for our family of 13 with 5 children. The rooms were always nice and freshly cleaned when we returned from the parks. Thank you for cleaning up all the crackers, cereal and clutter we made. There are places to eat very close by that stay open quite late so there was also food for the kids. The gift shop has a good
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to write your review.  We appreciate all the attention to detail in your feedback you provided, so thank you again.  Our pool is heated year round, so not sure what happened when you were here, it could have just been an isolated situation.  All guests can really enjoy swimming year round due to our heated pool, so when you come back please check this out for us.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Stayed for 2 nights with my teenage daughter and her friend. Drove in from CO so wanted free parking and this hotel was perfect for that. Lots of parking available at no extra charge. The room was fine, beds/pillows were just ok but it was not noisy for us even on the first floor. We slept well. No breakfast or food of any kind but there is a little convenience store. It’s 2 blocks from the front of the Disneyland entrance and took me about 6-7 minutes to walk. There’s no wow factor but the price is reasonable.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate your review and feedback.  We hope you will come back and see us again.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed here again because of its proximity to Disneyland. We love how big the room is. We could fit everything in the room we needed to. There is a microwave and refrigerator and tables to sit at. The only reason I didn’t give it five stars is because I asked that we have four washcloths. Twice. They didn’t give them to us and it got to the point they only gave us one. To me, it was a simple request and I was annoyed they couldn’t fulfill it. All in all, it was a good place to stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at Castle Inn & Suites for 14 nights. On arrival after our flight from Melb Australia we were greeted with the biggest smile from the most amazing Alberta! Our booked room wasn't ready as it was 9am, however we were quickly offered an alternative so we could check in right away.   We were super happy with our suite.  The beds were super comfy, bathroom was clean and the room was huge. We are a family of 4 so it was fantastic to have plenty of room. Facilities were great, hot tub was perfect after a big day at Disney Land.  Easy walking distance to the parks, great restaurants close by, car rental also close by. Convenience store onsite was great.  Nothing was ever a problem at this hotel, Alberta couldn't do enough to make our stay perfect in every way, from a friendly
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review.  We will definitely share this with the staff.  We were so happy to hear you had a great time and our team member Alberta made your stay memorable.    We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Family description: Parents with two adult children.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  We had mailed items that we did not want to carry on our flight and the hotel received our package and secured it for us until our arrival.  The room was clean but a little dated: The room felt a little dark. There were not enough wall outlets to accommodate a family of four and all of their charging needs. Privacy for the parents using the king size bed was limited due to the layout of the room such that the bathroom was not separated from the parent’s room.  One of the air conditioners had a musty smell.  Overall the visit was pleasurable.  The hotel is located about 15 minutes from the park gates.  It is an easy walk that is well traveled and lit.  There are plenty of places to eat
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites, and for providing your feedback from your stay.  We appreciate the review and hope to see you again if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We were very surprised by this hotel as we were not expecting much chose it for its price and proximity to Disneyland. The room was great clean and comfortable the staff were very friendly. Close to food and a 5 minute walk to the gates of Disneyland perfect end to our honeymoon and will recommend to others.
Manager Response: We would like to take this time to thank you for staying with us recently, and for making one of your honeymoon stops the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the review and feedback, and hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This was my second stay at the Castle Inn and Suites and I would highly recommend it. The walk to the Disney Resort is 2 blocks. The hotel was clean and well looked after. Staff was very friendly and accommodating. We loved having our own beds in our suite. It was a great place to stay and we would do it again. It is also very close to two great restaurants Denny's and I hop. The first time we stayed was with family,{2010} including our 5 year old Grand daughter and we enjoyed it very much. She had a great time and did not even mind walking to Disney..
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We were happy to hear you were a returning guest from 2010.    We hope you will make Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home when visiting the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn & Suites May 10 -13th. Great location to the parks, approx. 10 min. walk.  Our room was ready and clean when we arrived. The staff were very pleasant.  Beds were comfy, pillows could have been better tho. Nice to have a fridge, microwave, and coffee maker. We wanted more coffee in the room and only had to ask once, each day the hospitality staff made sure they left us extra. Towels for the pool were given as often as we needed.  The pool & hot tub were great. You can take your beverages and food in and relax after a long day of walking. Location over all was great, a lot of restaurants all within walking distance. The gift shop on site was well stalked with everything you might need and some of their prices were better than Walgreens for pop, milk
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide such a great review and feedback from your stay.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for 12 nights from May 1st-13th. The front desk staff was wonderful, and the room was perfect. Very spacious and very clean. The hotel is about a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance, and about a block away from Walgreens, CVS and a 7/11. Extremely convenient location! We loved this hotel and will be back! We have already recommended this hotel to friends and family who are planning their own Disney vacations!
Manager Response: We would like to take this time to say a very big thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent stay in the Disneyland Resort.  Your review and feedback from your stay is great appreciated.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My husband and I stayed here last week for 3 nights.  It was within walking distance to Disneyland - probably took about 10 minutes to walk at a nice relaxing pace.  Whenever we went to Downtown Disney we opted to drive instead of walk.  The free parking was great.  We never had trouble finding a spot to park close to our room.  I really liked that the rooms were a bit more spacious than some.  Ours had 2 tables and a few places to unpack our clothes.  I also liked that there was a small kiddie pool that if we had our kids, they would have loved!  They also had a pool and hot tub that we enjoyed.  It was very popular though.  I did give it 4 stars instead of 5 for two reasons.  The beds were quite hard.  I was expecting firm from the reviews but these were very firm.  Also the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide a review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback and comments.  We realize all guests have certain mattress' firmness they like and we have many guests asking us where they can buy our mattress', but we totally understand.  We get the same comments about our pillows, we sell our pillows to so many guests, but again, it's all preference.  Thank you again for taking your time to write your review and we hope to see you again on another visit to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We have the family room for 6 of us and it is perfect. The price is reasonable. The staff was more than friendly. We were able to rent our scooters through the hotel. The location is perfect an easy walk to the front gates.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to write a review from your stay.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I haver stayed at numerous hotels in Anaheim but my stay at the castle inn tops everything. The staff is the friendliest I have ever dealt with. The hotel room are immaculately clean. I would recommend to anyone to stay at the castle inn especially due to its convent location only minutes from Disneyland and a multitude of restraints and low prices. Theres nothing like coming to a clean room and friendly staff. They make you feel like family.- Overstreet family
Manager Response: Thank you Overstreet family for staying with us recently, and for providing your review.  We really appreciate the kind words and feedback this means a great deal to us.  We will definitely share this with the staff.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We spent 2 nights at the Castle Inn and Suites in April 2018 while we visited Disneyland.  The staff were extremely friendly and helpful.  The rooms while dated decor were large and comfortable and nice and clean. Parking facilities on site and a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, convenience store on site and many restaurants within an easy walk. Highly recommend for a family stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us in April and for providing your review of your stay, we really appreciate it.  We hope you will keep us in mind the next time your travel plans return you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Here's an important tip if you must book at this hotel:  DO NOT stay at ROOM 347 or any rooms in the back corner of the property!!    It is near the vending machines and it is loud!   It is also near the elevator. Worst of all, it was next to the housekeeping office.  And they are super loud and wakes you up at 6am.  They are talking loud and pushing/pulling their carts around without consideration.  It was not at all fun to wake up to all that noise.  We hoped to sleep till 7am after a long day at Disney and kids are exhausted.  When we arrived, our bathroom was missing the shower curtain.  We had to request for a curtain to brought twice!  Then we had to put it in ourselves.  The shower wall also had some black molds.     I was actually expecting better from the hotel based on
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Thank you for saving the day!
Summary: The Castle Inn & Suites is a really nice little property located right near the entrance to Disney. The "good neighbor" listing would have you think that it is RIGHT across the street, which it is not but it is very close and has all the basics you need for a few night stay.  The property is clean, but it is a little dated. For the price you can't beat it. However, the stand out was the service. We left my sons lovey in the room, and didn't realize it until we were back in San Diego. The front desk person (Matt) was kind enough to overnight it to us, which was amazing as we were flying out on Saturday and we needed that owl for the flight.   Thank you to Matt and the Castle Inn team for saving the day!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  We were happy we "saved the day".  We do feel our location is true to our advertising as we face the back of California Adventure, and it's a 7-10 minute walk to the entrance, however, we do realize many guests have a different take on what is "right across the street" and what is not, so we understand that.    Once again, thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide your feedback.  We hope to see you again if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We spent 3 nights at the Castle Inn and Suites.  They provide parking facilities on site. The rooms are a good size with twin double beds that were very comfortable. Tea and coffee facilities were provided in our room and there is an onsite shop where you can buy food/souvenirs that you may need.   Staff were all very friendly and helpful.  We used the outside pool area to enjoy our take away dinner one night.  We also appreciated the laundry facilities on site. We were traveling with another couple but I think this would be a great place to come with families.  I am especially sure that little girls would love the idea of sleeping in a castle!  It is only a short walk to the gates of Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for taking the time to provide your review we really appreciate it.  Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you on a future visit to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I booked this hotel as it was one of the few with good reviews in close proximity to Disneyland with dates available during my birthday.  I must say my experience at Castle Inn and Suites went above and beyond my expectations.   I originally booked the Executive Suite, but upon arrival, we were upgraded to the Parlor Suite (Happy Birthday to me!) which included a separate room and an extra TV(which I really appreciated).   The suite was cozy, clean and suited all of our needs.  The beds were comfortable, although I personally prefer softer pillows.  I appreciated the shower head with the adjustable pressure.    The on-site convenience store was reasonably priced with a nice variety items from snacks to souvenirs and even luggage.    The pool and Jacuzzi was clean and enjoyable
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently and for providing a great review and your feedback from your stay.  We really appreciate the kind words, and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Great location, only had to walk 15 minutes to Disneyland. There are plenty of eating establishments within easy walk. There are laundry facilities at the hotel. Pool etc. rooms are well serviced. Enjoyed our stay
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your feedback, we really appreciate it.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The location of this hotel to Disneyland is great.  The hotel is older, but rooms are very clean.  Good value for the price.  Staff are friendly.  Kids will like the pool and the hot tub is a great place to soak after a full day at the park.  We appreciated having a fridge and microwave in the room, so we could eat breakfast there.  There is no restaurant on site, but there is a convenience store to buy snacks, cereal, milk, etc.  Walgreens and CVS are across the street. Cons: The rooms are dark and it is noisy.  If anyone is in the walkway outside your room, you will hear them. Watch out for the water temperature in the shower.  The temperature fluctuates often and to extremes.  I would be concerned about small children. Overall, great value.  We would consider staying here
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate all feedback pro and con.  On the "con" side, our rooms are intentionally darker as we have a "castle-theme" hotel, and have a decor set in the darker, richer fabrics and furnishings to compliment the theme.  We have recently changed out all lighting in the rooms and the property with the led light's to brighten up the rooms, walkways and property and we have received great feedback from our guest's.    In regards to the water temperature, we apologize for this, and hope you reported this to our front desk staff as in most cases, this is a very easy and quick fix.   Thank you for pointing out the location and surrounding area, and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: If you’re wanting a four or five star hotel, this is not it. But if you’re looking for a clean, safe place that’s a short walk to Disneyland, it’s perfect. Yes, it’s loud, but that is to be expected from a family hotel. And the issue with the water temperature is annoying, but the convenience of the location far outweighs any negative things about this place.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for staying with us, and for writing a review from your stay.  We appreciate all feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I was very wary of staying at this hotel as it seemed so cheap but the reviews were spot on! We normal stay at 5 star hotels and were looking at the Disneyland Hotels but with the cost of Disneyland we were looking at other options. We were able to get s 4 day pass to Disneyland and 4 nights at the Castle Inn v’s 2 nights at a Disney Hotel and 1 day park entry. We are so glad we booked this hotel. It met all our needs and more and the service was better than a 5 star hotel. The rooms were a little on the dark side, which worked well as we came back in the afternoon and had a rest. Rooms have a fridge, microwave, tea:coffee making facilities and a hair dryer. The rooms were clean but a little old fashioned but for them price amazing value. We stayed on the 4th floor and there was
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the great review and all the feedback from your stay.  I'm sure future guest's reading the reviews will find this very helpful.  We hope the next time you plan a trip to the Disneyland area, you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: If you are reading this chances are you are taking your kids or grand kids to Disney resort, an exceptionally rewarding but equally draining experience in physical terms. If we did Disney again what we'd change was allowing an extra night and spend a day recovering after the first 15 hour marathon day before doing a second day of parks. The hotel has everything you need, extremely spacious if not slightly dark rooms, a decent combination of 3 swimming pools that are well secured to keep kids safe, decent TVs, coffee machines. The location was key for us, 10 minutes walk from the front door of Disney resort, 5 minutes walk from a large Walgreens for supplies, a shopping mall a block behind looks near chapter 11 but still had as at April 2018 a good selection of places to eat and
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review and feedback from your stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Spent 13 nights here with family while on holiday visiting Disneyland and other SolCal attractions.  The family suite was great and staff very good.  The hotel is not far from the entrance to Disneyland with Denny's, Ihop and other eating establishments nearby.  The only fault we had is that the family suite, suitable for 6 adults only had one toilet/shower. This establishment is one which we shall keep in mind on our next Disney family holiday.
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disney Holiday.  We appreciate the feedback regarding the Family Suite.  We have found with most guests they don't mind the 1 toliet/shower as there is the granite sink area in the back room so someone could be getting ready there, while another person is using the full facility, but we do understand this may not work for everyone.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you plan your family vacation.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Nice staff, nice room, GREAT location
Summary: Stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites maybe 20 years ago and it seemed to be in really good condition for it's age, not brand new, clearly, but nice. We weren't in the room all that much, going to Disneyland which BTW is about a 10 min (or less) walk. We usually stay at a hotel right in front of the park entrance but I have to say this location is ideal-walking distance to both the park and Gardenwalk where we had dinner at The Cheesecake Factory.                                                                               The room was very clean, nice toiletries, soft towels and good water pressure. Bedspreads were a satiny material, not my fave but oK. My suggestion for improvement would be to get lamps or outlets near the night stand with PHONE CHARGERS. Everyone needs these
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently, and also for staying with us 20 years ago.  We did a full room renovation in fall of 2013 so I'm sure you saw some improvements from your stay 20 years ago.  We did add additional outlets when we renovated, and added lamps with the outlets for easy charging.    We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Clean, tidy, didn't see the staff very much- but when we did they were friendly. Easy walk to Disneyland and California adventure park. Close to Walgraves/ CVS/seven eleven. Coffee supplied was good.  Will commend to others
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for recommending us to others.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great Value and so close to Disneyland!!
Summary: My family of four with two children stayed here in February of 2016 and have already booked another stay on May during Memorial Day week!  We booked through getawaytoday.com (super good deal and includes park tickets) and the Castle Inn And Suites is a Good Neighbor Hotel.  The rooms are a very good size and there is a pool and hot tub!  We rented a double stroller that was delivered to the front desk and the employees were super helpful with getting the stroller to us.  Free parking is a huge bonus! There are refrigerators in the rooms so it was easy to go to the Mini Mart and purchase milk and breakfast items for the week.  It only took us about 8 minutes to walk to the Disneyland Entrance.  You can see the fence of California Adventure right across the street.  We can’t wait
Manager Response: We would all like to say thank you for staying with us in 2016, recently and again this coming May.  We appreciate the great review and feedback, and look forward to seeing you again next month.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Just a quick note, we are return guests, we stay here almost every time we visit, we always feel safe and we are pleased with the room rates. Never have we really experienced a problem, and when we have it was quickly resolved. My only complaint this visit was I don't think the beds were as comfortable as in the past, but it could be that with each passing year I just need more comfort. Lol,  suggestions on which rooms have the most comfortable beds?
Manager Response: Hello from the Castle Inn & Suites,  Thank you for being a returning guest, we truly appreciate your support.  All of our beds are less than 5 years old, since we did a full renovation the fall of 2013.    We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: We stayed at Castle Inn for 7 nights over spring break and had an excellent stay. Very clean hotel in an ideal location. Just a few minutes walk to Disney parks, numerous stores, and restaurants. The staff were very friendly and accommodating.  The pool/hot tub, laundry facilities and store were all very conveinent.  Plus theres free parking,  in room fridge , microwave and coffee maker. Only cons were the fact that you can't open up the windows for fresh air so the room can get very stuffy and you can hear everyone walking by and above you. Since we were at the parks most days this wasn't too big a deal. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review from your stay.  Your feedback is very important to us, and we know other guests find value in receiving reviews from past guests, so thank you again.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We recently stayed for four nights in an Executive suites (room 410).  Our children are both grown so this room arrangement is excellent. These rooms are at the front of the hotel and are only in that section.  The windows face the road.  The room has a table to eat at, a table for a computer/business, a coffee table in front of the couch, a fridge, microwave, and coffee maker.  We could easily spread out all of our stuff.  Additionally, the bathroom and sink area are separate and are at the front of the room.  Thus, if your teenagers are sleeping in, they don't wake up because of the lights in the morning or night.  We brought coffee pods (check out amazon, you can make your own), oatmeal, and stopped at a grocery store for fruit.  Thus we had plenty for breakfast and snacks.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us earlier this month.  Your feedback and review from your stay is very appreciated and I'm sure helps future guests looking for their hotel stay in Anaheim.  We look forward to you returning to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: As I sit in bed at 9am, sleeping in from a long past 2 days at the park, I’ve been away for 2 hours listening to the people walk above me like elephants and everyone on the second floor walking the outdoor hallways and their rolling suitcases.   We have a first floor room and we can hear every guest that walks the second level due to the age of the building and how it was build. I think I heard a mouse walking earlier.   Other than the noise (be sure to ask for a 3rd floor room to avoid this!) the hotel isn’t too bad at all.   My brother and I decided to stay here for 2 quick days at Disneyland and what a great location! We are about 12 min walk to the gate and you walk on very secure sidewalks to get there with hundreds of other making the same trip.   The hotel staff is very
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us earlier this month.  We appreciate all the feedback and know you have many choices in the Anaheim Resort.    We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Since getting annual passes at Disneyland, my siblings and I have made Castle Inn and Suites our new home. In the past 5 months, we have stayed here 5 times. Every stay has been the same...EXCELLENT!! We have stayed in their Executive Suites and their Family Suites. Our favorite is the Family Suites...everyone gets their own bed. Rooms are incredibly clean. Beds are great. Lots of pillows. Towels are fluffy. Shower is clean. Free parking. Microwave and Mini-Fridge. Up to date. Close to a variety of restaurants. Short walk to Disneyland. What more could you want? If I could give this place 10 stars...I would!
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for having the Castle Inn & Suites be your home away from home.  We truly appreciate your support and the great feedback from your recent stay.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great location, with many restaurant options nearby, as well as convenience mart and Walgreens. Staff super friendly and eager to assist. Extended choice of which floor we wished to have. Elevator is a bit slow, but functional. Furniture seemed new, in good condition. Beds and linens comfortable, sufficient pillows and towels. Very clean on arrival and throughout stay. Would benefit from having a recycle container in room for empty drink bottles. Room did have microwave and fridge. Fridge was cool but not cold enough to entrust dairy products. But handy to have both anyway.  Only downfall in the room was that there is not an in room safe; they do have secure safes in lobby/office area, but I did not find this convenient.   Temperature easy to control in room. Did have some
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide a review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the great feedback, and hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regard,

Summary: 10 min walk from Disneyland and also close to great restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory (8 or so minute walk). It's super close to Walgreens and CVS if you need to buy things and they also have a good mini mart at the hotel. The beds are nice and firm and supportive which is exactly what you need after a day at Disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Spent two nights at the Castle during Expo West at the convention center.  If you are looking for a quiet, clean, well maintained, convenient, safe, and affordable hotel room near the Disney/Convention center complex...then you can do no better than the Castle.  If you need to be surrounded by granite, marble and concierge pampering; then pay the extra 200% plus to stay at the Marriott, et al.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us during Expo West.  We appreciate the great review and feedback, and hope you will come back to stay with us next year during Expo West.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Stayed here because of a friend's recommendation.  We weren't disappointed.  The check-in staff were super friendly and the room was perfectly clean.  We obviously stayed here because of Disneyland.  We had our two children with us (age 8 and 6).  Stayed for four nights and had a great stay.  Sure the hotel is a little aged, but it doesn't matter, you're only there for a few hours each night to sleep, then off to Disneyland in the morning.  Don't stay here if you want peace and quiet.  The hotel is noisy from around 6:30am when people get ready to go to Disney and as late as around 12:30am when people get back from the park.  Didn't bother us as we were 'those' people I guess, although we always try to be super quiet when entering and leaving our room.  Other people
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to Disneyland.  Thank you so much for your review and feedback of your stay.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will think of the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My granddaughter and I stayed at Castle Inn and Suites for 5 nights in March. We were greeted with friendly staff. We were given a suite and had a lovely room with two double beds and sitting area.  Two blocks from Disneyland and very close to many different restaurants. Loved the location, could come back for a rest during the day. They have a pool and jacuzzi, my granddaughter loved the jacuzzi since the weather was cooler at this time of year. If you decided to go to Disneyland I would highly recommend you stay at the Castle Inn and Suites. Thank you to the staff for making our visit very enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review, we greatly appreciate the feedback and look forward to seeing you again the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This was not our first trip to Disneyland but our first stay at the Castle Inn and Suites. We were very pleased with our choice. The check in was quick, easy and friendly. Our room was just finished as we were checking in, early afternoon, and was located at the back of the property. We chose the family suite so our teenager could have some privacy and it worked out great.  The hotel is a quick walk to the park and lots of restaurants within walking distance. We normally stay at hotels with the complimentary breakfast but we honestly didn't miss it a bit. We didn't get a chance to use the pool or hot tubs as it was rather chilly during our stay in late February.  All in all a great pick for the price!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to the Disneyland Resort.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Another great stay at Castle Inn and Suites! 	We checked into the hotel around 8:30PM.  Angel, who assisted us, let us know that Juan (in the Maintenance Department) had provided an iron and board—as we requested.  My wife and I had a restful sleep—after going across the street for a few rides in California Adventure. 	The hotel provides free parking—which is a great plus!  However, the next day I managed to park in a fire zone.  David, from the front desk, called to inform me of my mistake. I went out to move my rental car and ran into him walking by.  David explained how I went wrong and told me he would move his car and let me have his spot.  I said that I could see several open parking spots and I’d just drive over to one. 	Later I said “hi” and “thank you” to Eric who does
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide such a great detailed review of your recent stay with us.  We will make sure we pass this along to our staff.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Easy to locate just two blocks from Disneyland's entrance!  The staff allowed us to park for FREE prior to check in and after check out so we could go to the park.  The staff was very friendly the room was great just one set back, there wasn't a breakfast offered which I would have expected for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us and for taking the time to provide a review of your stay.  We have never provided a breakfast at our property, and we feel the free parking, free wi fi, and no resort fee is a much better benefit to the guest.  We are very lucky to be surrounded by numerous restaurants for breakfast, lunch & dinner options.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: 5 Fabulous Nights at the Castle Inn
Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites for 5 nights from the 22nd to the 27th of February.  The location is absolutely fantastic, located only a short walk, approx half a block from the entrance to the Disneyland Resort. At a steady stroll you will be at the Disneyland security check in point in just under 10 minutes.  The check in staff were really friendly and welcoming, Alberta greeted us and checked us in, even though we were an hour early, having just driven across from Long Beach. But, it seemingly was not a problem and she kindly checked us into room 244. Parking is free, you just display a little token from your rear view mirror. They do not charge any resort fees, so including the tax, the price came with no extra surprises, which was quite refreshing.  The rooms are
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your feedback from your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed there for one night when we went to Disneyland and we were SO pleased! They allow you to park there for free before heading to the park, all you have to do is register first, they also allowed us to check in early as the room we were to be given was ready (we had one of the two smoking rooms so...). The room itself was a very nice size and had a microwave which was a pleasant surprise and was very clean. The only  reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 was because the water temperature was a bit bipolar in the evening but apparently it resolved itself by the next morning. We enjoyed this hotel so much we  already have another reservation to stay there again at the end of the month. If you looking for a nice clean hotel with a decent size room and friendly staff (the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We love having you here!  We are already looking forward to your next visit.  As a hotel that is 99 percent non smoking, it is nice to know someone has enjoyed one of our smoking optional rooms.  Whenever we have parking available, we are happy to allow our guests with reservations to park on site and register the vehicle prior to check in.  We very much appreciate the kind words about the front desk staff, they work diligently to provide a memorable experience for all of our guests.  With parking and WiFi included free, and no resort fees, it is tough to beat the value for any hotel across the street from Disneyland.  We can't wait to see you again at the end of the month!

Summary: Stayed here one night for an impromptu Disneyland trip. The service experience at the front desk was the real standout. Extremely friendly and accommodating. While we were checking in there was an angry couple next to us who were clearly unhappy at several items, including why they couldn't check in before official check in. I noted how the agent handled the situation - better than I would have.  Parking spaces were ample and not hard to find. We found one right in front of our room. The decor in the room must have been recently refreshed, and overall the size of the room was nicer than several other properties on the same road. I was expecting a more ordinary look and feel.  Pros:  parking/ good size bath areas/FIRM bed/friendly service Cons: Only one thing happened - and only
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review!  Our staff is very happy about the positive feedback, we make customer service a top priority of the hotel.  While we try to accommodate all of our guests requests, sometimes it is just not possible to rent a room prior to our 3:00PM check in time.  We are very glad that the front desk agent handled the situation according to our standards and hope the guest was understanding of the situation.  While parking is ample at times, with free parking we do have to keep a limit of one vehicle per registered room most days of the year.  We did a full scale remodel on the hotel fairly recently and work very hard to keep the rooms up for our guests.  From the feedback the square footage of the rooms is rather large for the area.  Next time you visit our friendly staff will be waiting to accommodate you again!

Summary: We arrived and could not fault the staff who were friendly and welcoming. We stayed in a family room which had 2 rooms the main with a King size bed and the other 2 large Double beds. The beds were very comfortable and clean. The rooms were always clean tidy. As we had our baby with us she fell asleep before checkout time and they kindly gave us a late checkout which was great.  Disneyland Resort is only 5 minutes walk from the hotel. The only thing I would complain would be the bathroom smelt.  Although my family had a great time and highly recommend this hotel to anyone especially for large families.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  The front desk staff is always happy to welcome our guests to the hotel.  The Family Suite is definitely the most comfortable way to stay, with 2 separate rooms, on King bed and two Queen beds, there is plenty of space for large families of up to 6 people to stay comfortable or smaller families to spread out.  Our housekeeping and maintenance staff is always working hard to ensure the rooms are kept up to standards and our guests can enjoy a clean and tidy room.  We are sorry to hear there was an odor in the restroom, but we would be happy to address any issue a guest has during their visit if it is reported to our staff.  The location is definitely one of the best in town, right across from the park and as mentioned only a 5 minute walk or so from the gates.  We thank you for the future recommendations and hope the next time you visit Anaheim we will see you again!

Summary: Always love staying here! Easy walk to Disneyland and the staff is always helpful! Cleaning crew was friendly and got us some a few extra hand towels really fast after asking. She also gave us a few good recommendations of where to eat around the area. Overall a good stay with some friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thanks for coming back to visit!  Also thank you for taking the time to write a review about the hotel.  Our friendly staff is always looking for new tips to give the guests in regards to dining and entertainment options in the Disneyland Resort area.  The front desk is available 24 hours per day to help guests with questions, concerns, or to make suggestions.  Our housekeeping staff appreciates the kind words and works hard to ensure all of our guests get whatever they need in an efficient and timely manner.  If you come back to Anaheim please come see us again at the Castle Inn & Suites, our friendly staff will be waiting to help.

Summary: Location was pretty good, not too long a walk to Disneyland.  We were a little disappointed about our room.  It was difficult to regulate the temperature of the water for showering and at the sink.  The water would all of a sudden get extremely hot or extremely cold.  We had to keep asking for more bath towels and wash cloths.    Housekeeping missed our room twice.  Thought the hotel was over priced for what we got.  It was nice not to have to pay for parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to the Castle Inn & Suites.  The walk to Disneyland takes most of our guests 5 to 7 minutes, whether visiting the Disneyland park or California Adventures.  Having a close location is ideal especially on long days so families can come back to the hotel and rest.  We are sorry to hear there was a maintenance concern during your stay.  The front desk is available 24 hours per day to assist with reporting any issues our guests have, and usually our maintenance staff is able to address any issue within 24 hours or less depending upon when the issue is reported.  If we are able to coordinate with our guests as far as the plans they have and when they will return to the hotel, we can often get housekeeping in to clean the room before our guests return.  As one of the only hotels so close to Disneyland that offers free parking, free WiFi and has no resort fees, the Castle Inn & Suites is a very budget friendly option when visiting the resort or Anaheim in general.  We hope you will come back and stay with us again so we have an opportunity to improve upon your experience.

Summary: My fiancé and I really enjoy staying here. Both times that we’ve stayed here, we would arrive at around 3-4am. We did a pre-check in and parked the care before heading to the park first thing in the morning. Service has been great both times. The room is cozy and clean.  The only downside to this hotel is the comfort of the bed. The mattress was ok. No support at all. You could tell that it’s an older spring mattress.   Overall, this is a great hotel to stay at. Proximity to Disneyland is very nice. It’s only a short walk to the main gate. I would definitely come back, but it would be nice if they would upgrade their beds.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming back to stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.   As a repeat guest, we hope you continue to come visit us!  Whenever parking is available early in the morning we are happy to allow our guests with reservations to park early, we just don't have the rooms available until after 3:00PM.  The mattresses were all replaced when the hotel was renovated just a few years ago, but were chosen as "firm" mattresses.  If there is ever a concern with your room, please do not hesitate to contact the front desk so we can try to find a way to resolve the issue or make you more comfortable.  From the front desk to housekeeping, from maintenance to the laundry department, all of the staff at the Castle Inn works hard to make this one of the best hotels near Disneyland.  We are grateful for the feedback and your visits.  We hope to see you a third time in the near future!

Summary: i could say so much about this place! it was in the best location for disneyland and the convection centre that i was going to for the week. everyone at this place are really nice people, the rooms are great . if i go back to Anaheim i would stay here again no doubt
Manager Response: Thanks for all of the kind words!  We were happy to accommodate you during your business trip.  Whether in town on business or leisure, the Castle Inn & Suites is the perfect choice.  We hope you were able to take advantage of the free WiFi and free parking while you were here.  The staff appreciates the compliments and will continue to strive to provide the best guest service possible.  While the hotel is a close walk to the Convention Center it is also right across the street from the Disneyland Resort.  With so much to do in Anaheim it pays to have a hotel right in the heart of it all.  When you come back to visit Anaheim, the Castle Inn & Suites will be here for you again.

Summary: We stayed here for the close location to Disneyland and the location didn’t disappoint. Only about a 10 minute walk. (Although seems longer on the way back after a long day! ;)Close enough to come back to your room for a rest and return to the park if needed! Also close to restaurants and Walgreens for breakfast essentials, water etc. Front office staff were friendly and approachable. The rooms were clean and beds comfortable with a fridge, microwave and a coffee percolator (which can also be used to make tea) We had a slight issue with inconsistent water temp one night and the walkways outside the rooms are a bit uneven so take care if you are a bit unstable on your feet. Apart from these small issues I would stay here again. :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!  After walking all day at the parks the hotel may seem farther than just a block south of the main gate, but it is definitely still the same short walk.  Many of our guests, especially those with small children find the hotel is located perfectly to come back and take a nap in the middle of the day so kids can be well rested for the late night fun at Disneyland.  With so many convenience stores and restaurants in walking distance, it is easy to find affordable breakfast items to heat up in the microwave or keep cool in the refrigerator, or just pop in for a quick bite to eat.  We look forward to your next visit to the hotel and hope you will come see us again!

Summary: My family and I were doing one day at Disneyland and we found a decent deal for this hotel.  My kids liked the fact that the front looked like something out of the medieval times.  Check-in was pretty easy and the front staff was very friendly.  The room was furnished very nicely and clean.  The beds were comfy and I liked that the sink was separate from the toilet and shower.  I liked that it was a 2-block walk to Disneyland/CA Adventures.  Even the walk back at night was doable for the tired family.  My two concerns/issues I had were the water temperature and the lack of a breakfast.  While showering the temperature fluctuated.  It was not fun not knowing if the water was going to be cold or hot.  My other issue was the lack of a breakfast, even a continental one.  Typically,
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  The separate sink definitely helps save time for families when getting ready for Disneyland.  Being able to have half of the family using the sink area to brush teeth, put on make up, or shave while another member of the family is showering can really help get everyone to Disneyland a lot quicker.  We hope that the maintenance issue was reported to the desk so we had an opportunity to fix the issue.  In place of a free breakfast such as a continental breakfast, the Castle Inn & Suites has chosen to include free parking for one vehicle per room, free WiFi, and to be one of the only hotels this close to Disneyland to also not charge a resort fee.  In every room there is a refrigerator, microwave, and free coffee with the coffee maker.  We hope that you will come stay with us again in the future because of the great value and friendly staff.  Thank you again for your feedback and your positive review of the hotel.

Summary: We stayed in this hotel last weekend for a quick weekend trip to Disneyland... it’s really close to the park, about 10 minutes from the “esplanade” entrance and lots of restaurants around as well within walking distance. Plus a Walgreen’s one block away for if you forgot anything or need something you don’t want to pay twice as much for inside the park.  Interior of the room was great, we had 2 queen beds and brought a twin air mattress since there were 3 of us and no one wanted to share a bed. We made a bit extra room for the air mattress by moving the little table in the room over a bit closer to the window. Room was clean, toilet seat probably could be replaced (scratches on top) but was still clean. Room had a microwave and refrigerator, no freezer, that was great for
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to the Castle Inn & Suites!  We appreciate the 5 star review!  The location of the hotel is tough to beat, as mentioned there is a Walgreeens pharmacy nearby, also a CVS pharmacy, and 7 11 convenience store which is open 24 hours per day.  The hotel has a gift shop on property which also carries many snack items, food, beer and wine, etc for our guests convenience.  While we are glad to hear the room was spacious enough to allow enough room for an air mattress, it is actually not permitted by the hotel to have guests sleeping on the floor or on an air mattress on the floor as it can potentially be a safety hazard in the event of a fire.  Perhaps for your next visit you may want to upgrade to one of our larger rooms such as our Executive Suite.  This suite offers 2 queen beds and a pull out sofa bed in a larger room, so 3 guests can sleep in the same room without sharing a bed.  The difference in price is usually minimal per night.  All rooms in the hotel have a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker and hair dryer for guest convenience.  Staff is constantly updating the hotel with projects to keep the property looking fresh.  With free parking, free WiFi and no resort fees, it is truly a family friendly and economical option in the Disneyland area!  We look forward to accommodating you again!

Summary: What can I say just got home from a fantastic 2 week family holiday at the castle inn suites,the hotel was clean and tidy and the staff were faultless couldn’t do another for us for our first visit to Anaheim Disney and we’ll be staying there again 5⭐️
Manager Response: Thanks for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!!  The staff works very hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant and memorable stay when they visit.
