We appreciate the kind words and positive feedback.  We hope that during your 2 week stay you were able to enjoy the free parking, free WiFi in the room, and the close proximity to Disneyland!  Also as a hotel which does not charge resort fees, often our guests find they save quite a bit on such a long stay.  We are happy to hear you will come stay with us again and look forward to your next visit!  Just remember, you will always be treated like royalty at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: Great location, comfortable beds. spent most of our time at Disneyland. easy walk to the park, there are lots of off site places to eat close by. check in was quick and easy. check out was quick also. easy Uber to Long beach airport
Manager Response: Thanks for the quick review of the hotel, we are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay.  We try to make the process for check in, check out, or reservations as easy as possible for our guests.  The Long beach airport is very close by, along with the Orange County Airport but we are also not very far from LAX.  Perhaps the location of the hotel is one of our most popular features, located in the heart of the Disneyland Resort district of Anaheim, from the hotel there are shops, dining, and entertainment options right in walking distance.  Having a clean comfortable room to come back to after a long day at the parks is key to enjoying your visit to Anaheim.  We hope you will come back and see us again.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: What else can i say? It's a castle in Disneyland...you could't ask for more. A very interesting design. We checked in late at around 11 pm, and the staff is very helpful. If you stay for a while, there are laundry facilities as well. Room was nice and tidy. And the most important thing, it's 5 mins walk to the theme park. No complains from me, overall it's a great hotel.
Manager Response: The Castle Inn & Suites, the name explains it all.  A Castle hotel across the street from Disneyland, perfect place for families to visit and feel like royalty.  Thank you for the kind words we really appreciate it.  Staff is available at the front desk 24 hour per day to help our guest arriving, departing, returning from the parks late, or even just with questions.  The location is the most important feature of any hotel, and the one thing that cannot be changed.  Besides the coin operated laundry, the hotel also features a pool, hot tub, childrens wading pool, and gift shop.  Thank you for your recent stay and we hope to see you again!

Summary: We spent two nights here during a trip to Disney and were very impressed. Whilst the rooms may be a little dated they would be perfect for a family looking to save money and have a trip close to Disney. Check In was quick and efficient and the staff very friendly. The main Disney entrance is no more than a 10 minute walk, alongside multiple options for food and shops in the area. The Castle theme is a nice touch and makes the hotel stand out on Disney Way. The bed was comfy and the room had a big TV for unwinding at the end of the day! Would highly recommend to couples or small families.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We appreciate the positive feedback about the hotel.  As a castle, we tend to stand out in the area, with so many buildings that look very similar, we like to be unique.  The front desk staff makes it a priority to provide excellent customer service and really appreciates the compliments.  The Castle Inn & Suites definitely provides the most quality to dollar experience so close to the Disneyland parks.  Apart from small families we also offer suites which can sleep up to 6 people, up to and including a two bedroom suite with a king bed in one room and 2 queen beds in a separate room.  Thank you for the recommendation and until next time you visit Anaheim, the Castle Inn & Suites awaits your return.

Summary: If you are looking for an affordable, no bells and whistles place to stay that is in walking distance to Disneyland, restaurants, pharmacies, this could be it. The 4 story motel is ready for renovations, but the rooms are clean and comfortable and the staff were great! There is an elevator but given the length of the inn, be prepared to walk a bit if your room is further down. If you have mobility issues ask for a first floor room. There is a nice pool, hot tub and wading pool for small kids open 8am to 10pm. The pool is not heated although someone told me they read it was, but we continued to find it fine even on cooler days. Again, this area is looking a little worn but it's still nice and was our favourite place to be on a hot day and to ease achy legs and feet. Be sure to
Manager Response: Thank you for your thorough review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  The hotel location is perfectly situated between the Gardenwalk, the Convention Center, and the entrance to Disneyland and California Adventures.  Our pool is open daily from 8am 10pm and is heated.  Though it is not kept as hot as the hot tub, it is roughly 80 degrees or a little warmer on any given day.  We have recently investigated to ensure it has been consistently kept at this temperature.  The gift shop is a very convenient place to visit during our guest stays and often is open early, around 7am and closes late in the evening, sometimes after 11pm.  Our housekeeping and maintenance staff is constantly working to keep the property up and we will pass on the compliments regarding the cleanliness of the rooms.  We hope on your next Disney trip you will come back and see us again at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: We had the family sweet and the rooms were not really big enough for a family of four!! There wasn't a lot of storage space. The pool isn't really satisfactory for your "day from the park day"....The water was very cold I couldn't get into it. We were very disappointed when we came back to our room to get ready for the plans we had made that night and had to wait an hour for the hot water to be turned on.  When I called guest services he didn't seem to bothered by the fact that we had to wait. I wasn't very happy. TLC for the hotel would be great!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to the Castle Inn & Suites.  The Family Suite has 2 bedrooms, a King size bed in the front room and 2 Queen size beds in the back bedroom. There is a door that can be closed to separate the two rooms, a TV in each room as well as a refrigerator, microwave, coffeemaker and hairdryer.  The suite also has 1 full bathroom located in the front room with the King bed and a separate vanity sink in the back room with the 2 Queen beds.  The outdoor pool is heated and open from 8:00AM to 10:00PM.  During your visit the hotel had a routine plumbing issue that required the hot water shut off.  We attempted to inconvenience as few guests as possible by turning off the water in the middle of the day while most of our guests were at Disneyland.  Unfortunately the timing of shutting off and turning on the hot water was not in our control as the repairs had to be completed before we could restore hot water to the building.  During this time water was still available to all rooms, just hot water was unavailable We apologize if you did not find the accommodations to your satisfaction but we would like to assure you that we investigate all concerns that our guests bring to our attention.  In an effort to improve our guests experience we are constantly monitoring the property for things we can improve or repair.  We appreciate you bringing your concerns to our attention and hope you will come visit us again in the future.

Summary: The room is large with a desk and table and the beds are comfortable. We had a fridge and microwave in the room. I see that others commented on the lack of hot water, don’t expect a steaming hot shower.   You can’t beat the distance to Disneyland’s entrance.   The soaps are nothing you would take home. And they don’t do lotions. Hair dryer and tub included.   Two queen beds   Pool is cold and refreshing and hot tub is good.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review.  We appreciate the feedback.  We do have lotion available upon request just in case you return to see us and you need this item, we are happy to provide lotion for you.  Once again, thank you for staying with us.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: About a 7-minute walk to the Disney parks. In a safe location. Parking, pool, and wifi. If you're looking for a clean, cheap, simple hotel, this is for you. We enjoyed being able to walk right to the parks. The bed was a queen- firm but comfortable. Room was clean and well kept. The AC worked great. Biggest complaint was the shower. The tub wouldn't fill up enough to take a bath, and the shower pressure for the hot water was weak. Not sure if it was the people next door flushing toilets or showering at the same time as me, but the water never stayed hot. There were spurts of hot then cold every minute and a half or so. Luckily we only stayed 3 nights to have to deal with that though.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide your review.  We are sorry you had some issues with the tub and hot water.  These concerns can be an easy fix, so we hope you reported this to our front desk staff so we could address it while you were still in-house.  There may be isolated issues from time to time with hot water pressure when the hotel is full, but it's rare.  We can usually address this right away.  We hope you will consider coming back to see us the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Just stayed here for the NAMM 2018 show.The staff was awesome! From day 1, when I went to check in, Angel was so polite and awesome! There was one person ahead of me that was being helped at the desk. Angel came out right away to help me. At the same time, another customer hurried in, so full of herself. She heard Angel asking to help me, and she totally ignored me and rushed past me to the desk. Angel was so awesome, he politely let her know that I was next in line and got me checked in. From there, the experience was great. Staff great, room clean, and cute how they make the swans out of towels like on cruises. Nice touch!  I had a refrigerator and microwave. And, this was in walking distance to the convention center, so I didn't have to worry about paying for parking. I could
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us during the NAMM show.  We greatly appreciate your kind words and feedback.  We pride ourselves on our 5 star customer service, so thank you for pointing this out and commenting on it.  We hope to see you next year if you are planning on attending the NAMM show once again.  Sincerely,

Summary: Clean, conveniently located within a short walk to the theme parks and nice staff. Stayed here 4 nights for our first trip to Anaheim. No complaints, it is affordable and if you plan on spending all day out at the parks it’s an appropriate place to rest your head. Has shops/restaurants within easy walking distance. Walls are thin and you can hear passing foot traffic (other residents and suitcases or trolleys) but this did not phase me at all. Onsite laundry was appreciated and clean pool.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to Disneyland.  We thank you for taking the time to provide your review.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel twice, once in March 2016 and again in June 2017. It is not a luxury resort, the pool area is not much, but we were not there for that. It is only a 12 minutes walk from our room to the gates of Disneyland. Restaurants, car rental, and stores are all within walking distance. The room is very large, clean, with microwave and refrigerator, which makes it great to be able to eat breakfast before the parks and keep snacks in the room. Front desk was very polite and helpful with recommendations for things to do outside of Disneyland. We defiantly recommend it.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us recently and for taking the time to write a review from your stay.  The feedback is great, and we know other guests like to read our guests reviews, so all feedback is welcome and appreciated.  Thank you for recommending us, and we hope to see you again.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We have stayed a few times. Rooms are typically clean, stocked with basics, staff is always polite and helpful. Close enough to walk 10 mins and be at Disneyland. Luggage rolling past and kids, can be noisy right outside your door, so if you have little ones napping they may be best in the back room of the double suite. We will stay again when we want family suites.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to post your review from your recent stay.  We hope to see yo the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The customer service is top notch. They will do their best to meet your accommodations and are very courteous. The rooms are clean and very spacious. We would highly recommend staying here. The walk to Disneyland is very short.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review.  We really appreciate the great feedback and 5 stars.    We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Cute little place for the price
Summary: Overall the stay was nice, no major complaints. It's about what you'd expect for the price—thin walls, not the comfiest pillows, etc. But for a quick one night stay, it got the job done. The decor was cute, we liked the castle theme. The pool is tiny. Clean and safe, not bad!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently. We appreciate the feedback.  It's funny, just the other day, we had guests purchasing our pillows as they thought they were the best they have ever slept on.  This actually happens more often than not, but we totally understand everyone has a different pillow experience.    We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Nice clean hotel a short walk from Disneyland
Summary: A clean hotel close to Disneyland entrance and area restaurants  Once we parked there, we never had to use the car again during the stay.  Close enough to the park to allow for a mid afternoon break and rest at hotel before going back to close down the park.  Lobby staff was very nice.  Room was better than some other hotels we stayed at in the area before.
Manager Response: We would like to thank yo for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you very much for the feedback.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed in a family room which consisted of 2 rooms one with 2 queen beds and a sink and the second with a queen bed and the bathroom.  The rooms are a little old however very clean, well equipped with towels, tea and coffee, we were at the back of the resort, level 4 which was really quiet.  Easy walk to Disneyland, restaurants and the hotel has a pool and well equipped shop on the property.  You can buy your Disneyland tickets from the front desk, shopping outlets also close by.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  It sounds like you may have been in our Family Suite which offers a King Bed in the front room, and 2 Queen Beds in the back room.  The back room does have that extra granite vanity area with a sink, mirror and extra hair dryer.  We hope this worked well for you and your family.  Our rooms were completely renovated less than 5 years ago.  Because our decor is in the darker, richer fabrics and furnishings, some guests assume this is "dated" when in reality it compliments our castle-theme, better than the lighter furniture many hotels go with these days.  We thank you again, and hope to see you in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great location, prep clean rooms, close to restaurants and service was good. They had good security at reception and for us family with two teenage kids to separate bedroom areas was very useful. That said the rooms were getting a little bit tired.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review.  We did a full room renovation less than 5 years ago and do feel our rooms still look very current and fresh.  We realize our decor being in the darker colors some feel this dates the room, but we do feel it compliments the castle theme, rather than the lighter furniture and bedding so many hotels use these days.    Thank you again, and we do hope you will come back to see us in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Castle Inn - clean and close to Disney!
Summary: We make Disneyland an annual trip and for the past 5 years have stayed at the Castle Inn & Suites. When the kids were really little they loved it because it does look like a Castle. Now, they call it they're home away from home! It's not super fancy, but has everything we need. The kids love playing in the pool and we all love the hot tub. Hotel is clean and is less than a 10 minute walk to Disney's front gate. Staff are always friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for the great review and feedback from your recent stay with us.    We appreciate all the kind words, and hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: So happy with this hotel. Clean, close to bars, restaurants and of course Disney Land.  Rooms are well planned out with shower and toilet in a room and sink mirror in room so more than one person can get ready at a time. Room had coffee machine and a decent size fridge
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for providing a great review from your stay.  We really appreciate the kind words, and hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My family stayed here for 4 nights to maximise time at Disneyland. It is a short walk to the park and we enjoyed Denny’s for breakfast in between.  The Castle Inn is basic, Motel style accomodation but if you are only in the room for a short time on the evening and to sleep then it is perfectly suited.  The beds were really comfortable. The rooms were very big and clean and plenty of towels were given for use too.   Location not only perfect for Disneyland but also close to Walgreens, subway, and pizza stores.  All 9 of us enjoyed our stay and I would return.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review of your stay.  We appreciate the great feedback, and hope you will come back to see us the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My husband and I stayed here jan 4th-10th 2018. We originally were booked from the 3rd but due to flight cancellations couldn't get in until the 4th. Without even asking  (and less than the standard 24 hours notice) they adjusted us for the 6 nights instead of the 7. Such a relief for us as we had to book another hotel in a different country last minute due to flights being rerouted due to cancellations. We have stayed before and I have nothing negative to say. It is the best bang for your buck for going to Disneyland and DCA. Walking distance to the parks, 711, CVS , Walgreens as well as the Anaheim gardenwalk with multiple restaurants and stores. My family will be staying here again for future visits.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We were so happy to hear you and your family had a great stay, and that you will come back to see us in the future.  Have a great day,  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Perfect for a family, couples or small group. The beds were comfortable, room was clean, and was a short walk to Disneyland. Surrounded by restaurants which are all within walking distance. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us recently, and thank you so much for the review.  Thank for your highly recommending us and we look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We booked our 31 Dec - 1 Jan 2018 stay in May 2017. We were put in room 145 right next to laundry room and the ice maker and vending machine were right at our door. Needless to say we didn't get any sleep! The hot water kept coming and going with none at all on the morning of the 1st. The manager on duty said he could have moved us of we had complained that night. Yeah right he also that they were fully booked??? Wonder how any1 could have slept with the ice machine 4 meters from the bed.  Not very impressed at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  The date of your stay was over New Years Eve where the hotel was very busy, and many dates were sold out.    If our guests ever have a concern with the room or location of the room, our staff is always ready to help make a move if possible.  The sooner we are made aware of a concern, the sooner we can begin working on a solution.  We do apologize you were unhappy with your stay, and we do hope you will give us another opportunity.    We appreciate the chance to improve our overall guest experience, and we thank you again for the review.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Look, every place near Disneyland is WAY TOO EXPENSIVE for what you get but this one was reasonable (ish) when booked in advance.  Very good customer service, beds were fine, fridge in room, microwave, pluses.  Cons - hot water ran low when people all showering.  Outside hallways means NOISE - we brought a white noise maker but still heard the rolling luggage dragged down. . the. . hall. . . at . .  2 . . .a.m.  By drunk people.  Still fell back asleep.  Room wasn't pristine, pool was basically a square in the ground, you aren't there for the pool.  Again, you are TWO BLOCKS from walking into Disneyland and Disney California, there are cheap food options nearby (McDonald's, okay? I mean let's get real, we have kids, it happens, right?)  Round Table pizza delivers and they have
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review from your stay.  We get various reviews about noise from our property.  Many guests say they never hear anything and slept perfectly, so reviews like yours where you did experience some heavy foot traffic.  This of course will vary based on time of year.  We appreciate that the overall experience was good and that you would consider coming back to see us, so thank you for that.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Castle Inn & Suites is the cheapest option for those who want to stay within walking distance of Disneyland/California Adventure.  It is across the street and two long blocks from the entrance to the parks.  A few of my observations from my stay:  The staff are very friendly and it's a big plus that the lobby is open 24 hours.  They are very accommodating as far as leaving your car / luggage before and after check-in/out.  The pool and hot tubs are very basic, but that's not why you're here, right?  Having the mini-fridge and microwave in every room is a definite plus.  Great for left-overs and breakfast on the go.  I like the four full-sized pillows on the beds.  I need lots of pillow for my arthritis.  The water temperature was very variable.  In the shower you could be
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide a review of your stay.  We appreciate the attention to detail you provided, and hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Went here because was within walking distance to Disneyland. Was a little apprehensive because right next to ice machine. No bad experience. Room was quiet, clean and the beds for every comfy. Disk help was excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to post your review.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The idea of actually staying at a castle was absolutely awesome to me; I was super excited to stay at this hotel and for the most part, this hotel did not disappoint. That being said, there are a few problems with this hotel, one of them being the shower. Over the course of my six night stay, every time that I took a showe, the temperature would go from being scalding to lukewarm in a matter of seconds and would never stay the same. I always look forward to hotel room showers so this was a downside to me. The other problem was the elevator, as it would stall and take forever to arrive, even though there was no one else using it. I often took the stairs because it would take so long.   Now this isn't to say that there were not good things about this hotel. Castle Inn is
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the kind words and also the sentiment that you will return to the hotel on your next visit to the area.  As with the front desk staff, our maintenance would be happy to address any issue a guest has during their stay at the hotel.  On your next visit if there is anything we can do please do not hesitate to ask.  If you choose to bring a vehicle, the hotel offers free parking with a limit of one car per room.  We also hope the free WiFi came in handy as well.  A word of mouth recommendation is the highest compliment we could ask for.  One thing that will never change is the proximity to Disneyland and the focus on customer service here.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: we stayed here for 5 nights  A short walk to Disneyland and California city The owners could not do enough for you They helped with a rental car The rooms were clean and very well maintained.Rooms  cleaned daily ..The kids loved the pool after a hard day out.Wheel chairs are available for rent from the front office.It is central to many great places to eat out  as well..Tours can be arranged as well Would certainly stay here again. We had a family of 7 staying so we had adjoining rooms which was great ....
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review!  Our front desk staff is very appreciative of the compliments.  We are always on hand to assist guests with whatever their needs are.  As mentioned we can help book tours, rental cars, help guests arrange to rent mobility scooters, confirm shuttles to the airports, and help arrange transportation around town.  The desk is also happy to answer any questions or concerns 24 hours per day.  With the recent temperatures, the pool has been a very popular place for our guests after a long day at Disneyland.  We will also pass on the kind words to our housekeeping department about the cleanliness of the rooms.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Average Accommodations but Convenient to Disneyland
Summary: We had four adults and three young children staying for two nights. We had a two bedroom unit: the back room had two queen beds (for two adults and two small children); and the front room had one king bed (for two adults and one small child).  There is only one bathroom with single tub/shower....so it became challenging for usage.  The decor of the rooms was aged, and the cleanliness is questionable because there was NOT a clean and fresh smell in the room.  We did not spend  the day in the room, so that was not as big of an issue.  There is a small (2 cu ft.) refrigerator in the room.  There are flat screen televisions in both bedrooms (approx 35 in).   The television reception was fair to poor (some programming was "snowy").  There is no safe.  Parking is included.  There was
Manager Response: Thank you for your very in depth review of the hotel.  We hope that you enjoyed your stay.  Our suites are all designed to hold up to 6 total people.  The two bedroom suites have a full bathroom but also have a vanity area with a separate sink, mirror, and hairdryer to help alleviate those times when some guests need to shower and others are still finishing with makeup, brushing their teeth, etc.  The two bedroom suites also have dual air conditioners, one in each room which can be programmed individually to the desired temperature.  At the front desk we offer safe deposit boxes free of charge for our guest use as well.  The location is very convenient, close to shopping, the Anaheim Convention Center, and of course the Disneyland Parks.  With free parking, free WiFi and no resort fees at the hotel, the value is tough to beat!  We hope that the next time you decide to visit the Anaheim area you will come back to see us again at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary Heading: Perfect placement, great value for money!
Summary: What a perfectly placed family hotel. Great value for money. Loved how on one side there was a great little pizza place that had amazing pizza for $10 and on the other side was Chinese, Subway and a FANTASTIC Mexican restaurant with amazing food including breakfast. 1 block over was also a Starbucks! These things were all a huge money saver as our kids wake up long before Disney opened so it was great to get everyone fed and caffeinated before we headed out for the day. The rooms were clean and towels and pillows were a plenty.  The laundry was convenient and the front desk had soap and fabric softener. I also love their pool and hot tub. They have a little wading pool for the kids which is right beside the hot tub so the kids could splash around while we enjoyed the hot tub.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide a review from your stay.  Your detailed feedback is very helpful and we appreciate it.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, didn't spend much time in the room
Summary: This hotel has a great location and is one of the few hotels in the Disneyland area that still has free parking and free WiFi. We didn't spend a lot of time in the room but the beds were comfortable and the staff we talked to was all very nice.  Has a nice little shop to buy those forgotten items without having to trek down to Target.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback from your stay.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Spacious rooms and walking distance to the parks
Summary: This is in no way a 4 star resort, but for the Disneyland area, it is a decent place to rest between park visits. We stayed 5 nights around Thanksgiving. Depending on your walking speed and waiting at crossing lights, it is about 7 – 12 minutes from the security booths. Our room was larger than many motels we’ve stayed at for theme park vacations. It had two double beds, one bedside table, dresser, small closet, and TWO tables (a desk and small breakfast size table) and four little chairs. In addition, there is a mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, hair dryer, and basic toiletries. We did not turn on the TV so I can't say anything about the channels available. The room was always clean and plenty of towels provided daily. The downside was the pillows (lumpy foam), the fridge
Manager Response: Thank you for the very thorough review of the hotel!  We appreciate the time taken to write a review of the Castle Inn & Suites.  The description of the standard room with 2 queen beds was very detailed.  We are always very happy to see our guests when they stop in to the lobby and are here to help in any way we can.  If there is ever a concern we will try to address it at the earliest opportunity.  Thankfully there was a room available of the type reserved and we were able to accommodate an early check in for your party.  It was very hot over the Thanksgiving holiday, record breaking for many cities in Orange County!  The pool was very popular and being open from 8:00AM until 10:00PM gives most guests a chance to enjoy it.  We look forward to accommodating you again on your next visit to Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Great themed rooms and plenty of space.
Summary: This motel is close enough to walk to Disneyland, although not right outside the gates.  The theme is castle inside and out, and the two room suite was great for my husband and two teenage sons.   Parking was easy and free. There is a general store on site too.  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  The 2 bedroom Family Suite is a very popular type of room, especially for larger families or guests who just want a little more space.  With a King bed in one room and 2 Queen beds in another, there is plenty of room to spread out.  Free parking is a great value though we do have to limit the parking to one vehicle per room whenever the hotel is busy.  The gift shop on property is very convenient, and there are many more shops and restaurants within walking distance of the hotel as well.  We look forward to your next stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: We were worried about traffic going to Disney the day before Thanksgiving so we spent the night down in Anahiem. We found this hotel on line. Was a good price. It was walking distance from the entrance to Disney. It was an old hotel, but was a good place to sleep. Staff was very friendly and helpful. They have free parking so you can leave your car there while your at Disney. They have free WiFi. There is IHOP and Denny's on the way to Disney you can grab food. Close location made it easy to walk to our car and miss the group of people walking back to the parking lots. Good place, old, but you can catch up on your sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  The Thanksgiving holiday week was a busy time and renting a room in the Anaheim area was a smart decision.  When selecting a hotel, location is a big part of the decision.  The location of the Castle Inn & Suites is tough to beat in the Disneyland area of Anaheim.  It is close to many restaurants and other shopping opportunities in the area.  Free WiFi is another bonus along with the free parking!  We hope to see you again next time you are in the area!  Thank you

Summary: Nice and close to the theme parks.  It's an old hotel but all you really need is a bed to fall into after a long day walking and this hotel served that purpose.  WiFi is free, a pet hate of mine is hotels that charge for this.  Coffee making facilities in the room with a bar fridge and a small shop on site for drinks and snacks. It's not the best hotel you can stay in but it is reasonably priced for the area. Pretty good place overall,
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  The Castle Inn & Suites is an established hotel near the entrance of Disneyland.  With free WiFi, free parking, and the lack of charging a resort fee, it is an ideal place to stay for families and people visiting the Disneyland parks.  The location is great for the resort area, close to the parks, close to the convention center, and also a lot of shopping opportunities.  The gift shop on property definitely comes in handy when a guest wants a snack and does not want to have to leave the property.

Summary: We had a party of 6 people - 3 sets of couples in 3 seperate rooms.  All rooms were clean and tidy and large in size. Older style rooms however comfortable.  The shower went cold now and then during use but it was not a major.  Staff were friendly and helpful and made our stay pleasant.  Great location- 5-10min walk from Disney.  I would recommend this hotel for people visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review!  We are happy to hear that all of the couples in the party enjoyed their stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We hope that while you were here you were able to take advantage of the free parking and free Wi-Fi as well.  Our staff makes customer service a top priority and are grateful for the compliments!  The close proximity to Disneyland makes the Castle an ideal place to stay when visiting the parks!  We hope to see you again on your next visit.

Summary: We loved the theming and great location 10 mins or so walk to Disney, plenty of free parking and the wi-fi was good too. The jacuzzi was as hot as a bath and the laundrette reasonably priced too. Room was comfy and plenty big enough for the 3 of us, fridge and microwave was a nice touch, minor niggle the coffee maker did need watching as it could only take half a cup of water at a time. Plenty of dining opportunities nearby and Walgreens and CVS close by for late night snacks and drinks.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback!  The Castle theme of our hotel is very popular for many of our guests, kids especially love it.   We hope you were able to take some time for photo opportunities during your stay with us.  After a long day at Disneyland some time in the jacuzzi can help recover.  The Wi-Fi is very good on property and the signal is available in every room.  There are many restaurants and shops in walking distance of the hotel, and as mentioned it is a short walk to the entrance of the Disney parks.  We hope that the next time you are in our area we will see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary Heading: Royal Service at the Castle Inn & Suites, Perfect for a Disneyland trip!
Summary: From the moment we arrived, till we checked out, we felt "at home" & comfortable at The Castle Inn & Suites.All the Staff were super friendly & helpful, from Gabriel at the front desk to the houskeeping staff who kept our room in tip top shape. This hotel is super convenient for a day or two or three for  Disneyland, just a short ( 10-15 minute) walk to the main gate.    It is also super convenient for basic shopping to pick up snacks, water, coffee, etc... for the room ( or Disneyland), as there is a Walgreens, CVS, 7-eleven, as well as a starbucks rite on the corner! it is also Walking distance to other restaurants, such as Denny's, P.F. Changs, McDonalds, etc.... While this is an older property, the rooms are very well maintained, and it shows! A nice perk here is that they
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your very nice review of your stay.  We really appreciate the great feedback and we will be passing this along to our team so they can read it.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Go with a sense of fun
Summary: Yes, this is an older property with a strong sense of kitsch.  It is well kept up and clean.  And who doesn’t love towel swans?!  All the rooms have 2 beds, a fridge and a microwave.  Staff is friendly and helpful.  It is 1.5-2 blocks to Disneyland or the Anaheim Convention.  No restaraunt on site BUT within a block you have plenty of choices in a wide price range.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review of your stay.  We hope you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Recently visited Anaheim and stayed 3 nights. The convenience of being a 5 minute flat walk was very much appreciated especially when we wanted to return for a middays rest and return for the afternoon and evening session. The park close at midnight and Castle Inn was an easy place to stay when we wanted to make the most of Disneyland. The rooms are clean and although not luxurious they are well equipped with extra towels fridge and coffee making facilities. We had a ground floor room which was perfect. I can't fault the staff, accomodation, proximity to  Disneyland and comfort not to mention the reasonable rates.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review from your stay.  We hope you will think of us the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Stayed there for a conference recently, and the room was clean, comfortable and centrally located. Easily within walking distance of Disneyland and restaurants. Staff were attentive and check-in/out was easy.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide a review of your recent stay.  Thank you for staying with us.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at the Castle inn for 4 days this past summer and the hotel was just right. Clean rooms and the ac worked great, the pool and laundry were a nice bonus, polite people at the front desk who answered all of our questions. It is nice and close to the main gate of Disney so not a far walk at all. Plus it is close to restaurants and other shops to grab anything you might need. Looking forward to staying there again on our next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  During the summer months the air conditioning is a must! We installed brand new units just a few years ago and are happy to report they have all had a big impact on the comfort of our guests.  Having a coin operated laundry on site is definitely a bonus for guests on extended vacations, or even if your clothes end up wet from a ride at Disneyland.  Free parking and free WiFi can definitely come in handy for those families visiting Anaheim as well.  The location of the hotel is one of the most important factors whenever choosing a hotel and we are glad you chose the Castle Inn.  We are looking forward to your next trip to Disneyland as well!  Thanks again!

Summary: We stayed here for one night while we did the parks, and couldn't fault it.  It was a close walk to the parks, and there were restaurants around.  The hotel looks very cool from the outside, like a castle.  The rooms are slightly dated, but they're clean and comfortable so it didn't matter.  The rooms were large too, if you came with a family.  There is a pool in the centre of the car park which we didn't use, but there were plenty of people in there.  It's a nice place to rest your head after spending all day at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit to the Castle!  The rooms were purposefully chosen to have a darker, richer look, to go along with our castle theme.  The housekeeping staff works diligently to keep our rooms clean and comfortable for all of our guests.  The castle theme is our signature and makes the hotel an iconic building in the Disneyland Resort area.  When walking all day and experiencing all the magic Disney has to offer, having a comfortable, affordable, clean place to relax is very important.  We hope that while you were here you had a chance to enjoy the free WiFi and parking as well!  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: It is an easy walk to the Disneyland entrance.  Although there isn't a restaurant on site - there are several eateries within a block or two. We breakfasted at the IHOP and Denney's on the way to Disney.  There is a great convenience/gift shop at the entrance.  We visited every day for bottles of water and snacks to take into the park. Our suite was perfect for two families to share and yet have privacy.  You have the choice of stairs or elevator to reach the second floor.All the staff  were very friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words about the Castle Inn.  We work very hard to ensure our guests enjoy a clean and comfortable visit.  The staff appreciates your compliments and will continue to make customer service a priority.  The suite must have been one of our Family Suites, they are very spacious with 2 rooms that can be separated by a door.  The gift shop has come in handy for many of our guests, and as mentioned there are many restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.  We hope to see you next time you visit Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Great location, just one block from Disneyland and close to food shops and restaurants
Summary: We had a stuff up with our booking due to our travel agent putting int he wrong year! and the staff were excellent.  They made 'room' for us even though they were full.  I was sick after our long flight but thank goodness we could get a room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are happy to help whenever we can, the mix up with the travel agency was unfortunate, but we were able to make a room available and happy to have you stay with us.  We hope that during your stay you were able to take advantage of the free WiFi and free parking as well.  We will always give our guests top priority and try to make room for them if there is a mix up.  We hope that on your next visit to the area you will remember the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary Heading: I went to Anaheim to visit family and stayed at Castle Inn....very comfortable!
Summary: Castle Inn and Suites is just across the street from Disneyland.  It is clean, comfortable, and quiet.  The service was great and everyone friendly.  Only thing I missed was a breakfast room.  There is a pool which is clean and well-kept and sun decks if the weather permits.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  The Castle Inn & Suites is located right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort district.  Close to the Convention Center, the Gardenwalk shopping center, and of course in walking distance to both Disney parks.  Our friendly staff makes customer service a top priority and appreciates the kind words.  While we do not offer a breakfast on property, there are many restaurants in walking distance of the hotel that are available.  In place of the breakfast we do offer free parking for one vehicle per room, free WiFi in every room, and we do not charge a resort fee as many other properties do.  We often have guests taking advantage of the warm California climate enjoying the sun on the upper decks of the pool area.  We hope to see you next time you visit Anaheim!

Summary: The hotel was wonderful just a short walk to Disneyland and the staff where fantastic. We needed a electric scooter for my mother and the staff not only ordered it for us but we got a discount 5 stars
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We have many guests who find the motorized scooters help out with their time in the parks significantly.  We are always happy to help our guests organize a scooter rental, a car rental, or many tours that are available in the area.  The walk to the park is short, but sometimes on the walk home the scooter comes in handy after being in the parks all day.  The staff appreciates the feedback and will continue to offer our guests the best possible service.  We hope the next time you come to Anaheim you will come see us again!

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites for Disneyland Halloween party.  The hotel is across from Disney plus one block down Harbor. The staff was so nice at the front desk, rooms were a three star (clean, comfortable etc).  Would definitely stay again.  They had a little store where you could buy snacks.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your Halloween party visit!  The location of the hotel is tough to beat, across from the parks about a 5 to 7 minute walk from the gate.  Our guest comfort is very important to us.  Along with the clean rooms we hope the complimentary WiFi and free parking for one car per room came in handy as well.  We look forward to accommodating you on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: Close to Disneyland which is what I wanted. Walking distance. Cheerful helpful service in all aspects.  Shop needs to sell stamps though. Lots of eating outlets on either side. Very close to Bubba Gump and Cheesecake Factory. Denny's is just down the road too. Good Pharmacys on both corners. Make sure if you don't like noise you ask not to be near the lift. It didn't bother me but it might others. I was in room 317 right outside door. But as I say I was at parks first thing till closing so did not bother me.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  One thing that makes our hotel memorable is the Castle theme that runs throughout the building.  Our gift shop does carry many items our guests find useful such as snacks, Disney themed items, drinks, and some first aid supplies.  Stamps, both domestic and international are available at the front desk of the hotel 24 hours per day.   Our staff makes customer service a top priority and is happy to hear the feedback regarding their service.  We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Me and my two kids were taken care of and it was the perfect place to stay considering it was in the centre of everything. The service was awesome, very efficient. And my kids had a great time, I would recommend this hotel to anyone that travels here.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review.  We appreciate the kind words, and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The people at the front desk were awesome and so much fun! Anytime we went down there they were so awesome especially the really fun Green Bay Packers fan! Shout out to her for sure! The location was amazing. It was my ninth time to the Disneyland Resort and this was by far the closest we have stayed (besides hotels on property) and we loved it. The rooms were totally average...it was difficult to get hot water and then when we did it was super hot or super cold. There was no in between.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide your review and feedback.  We were sorry to hear you had an issue with the water fluctuating between hot & cold.  This is an isolated situation that can be easily fixed when reported to the hotel front desk staff.  We hope you let us know so we could fix this while you were still here.    We hope you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The Castle Inn was picked by my wife just because my wife like castles, she made a good choice.  The room was comfortable, the pool is great and the front of house staff are awesome. We had issues with out shuttle service and they helped us with reccomending a different one.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were very happy to hear your wife likes Castles, and that your stay was enjoyable and you enjoyed our staff.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: We have been treated very well every time we go
Summary: The room was great the cleaning serves was great we keep coming back every time 2 to 3 times a year  clean rooms quiet plenty of hot water office staff was great easy check in and out planning on using this hotel every time coming down south
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay.  We are very happy to hear you are going to use the Castle Inn & Suites as your home away from home when visiting the Anaheim Resort.  We look forward to your next visit.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We (my husband and I) stayed here from September 30-October 9. Room was clean. A/C worked very well. Pool was nice. Beds were a bit hard, plenty of pillows. We left the room each day around 7 AM and didn't return until midnight most nights. A 5 day hopper pass to Disneyland/California Adventure. About a 10 minute walk, which seemed much longer at the end of each day. We rented a car for 2 days, nice thing about this hotel, parking was free!! Definitely not a 5* hotel, but close to Disney, and many places to choose from to eat, but once we were in the park, we didn't leave the park till it closed. Room was quiet #432. Elevator we needed at the end of the day! Small convenience store on site, muffins and fruit available there. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, and that you would come back to see us again.  Have a great day, and again, thank you for the review.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Stayed 4 nights for the sole purpose of all things Disney. Hotel was a little further from the main entrance than I usually book but an extra few minutes walk was fine. Good sized room with 2 queen beds, shower over bath, TV, microwave all provided. Only thing missing was an in room safe (the do provide safes at reception). Room was clean and reasonably quiet ( it is Disney after all so there is some excited people walking by the room). Met my expectations and would not hesitate to stay there again
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  We appreciate your review and feedback from your stay.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This was our first time staying at the Castle Inn and Suites.  We normally stay at Paradise Pier, but this was a last minute trip and decided to give on of the good neighbor hotels a try.  I was very happy we did.  Staff was very friendly.  Room was nice.  The walk to Disneyland was easy (and that is taking into account walking back to the room with tired feet from a long day at the park).  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you so much for the great review and the feedback.   We are very happy to hear you will definitely stay with us again.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I’ve stayed at a couple hotels around disneyland, and this has definitely been the worst. Like most reviews have said, the water temperature tends to flucuate alot so one second you’re scalding, and the next you’re freezing. On our third night, I found bed bugs, and the receptionist didn’t offer to move us right away, but asked oh well do you want a new room? We moved rooms, but were leary of bugs for the rest of the time. We never heard an apology about the bugs for the remaining 4 days of our stay. Only good thing is the location.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great value and easy walk to Disneyland
Summary: A family of 6 we booked two interconnecting standard rooms.  Both rooms had to Queen size beds.  Rooms were a good size. Room facilities were good. Beds are comfortable. Having the rooms as interconnecting maybe huge difference for us and is a definite if you were travelling with family. There is a swimming pool and hot tub on premises - small but adequate for a swim after a hot day at Disneyland.  Checking and check out was easy and staff very helpful.  There is a small convenient store on site and you are able to buy most  things that you would need.  Starbucks is only about 200 m walk. Rooms also have a microwave.  Kids love the castle and the same theme   is continued into the rooms. My only criticism is that the lighting is a bit dim in the rooms but  I make that criticism
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to the states.  We appreciate the great review and feedback you provided.  We hope you will think of us the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We had a 2 room suite and loved it.  One of the rooms has 2 queen size beds with a sink and counter space, TV, Hair dryer.  The other room had a King bed, with full bathroom, and TV. Very friendly place, and an easy walk to Disneyland entrance
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We were happy to hear you enjoyed the suite you booked, and our location.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn this week when we were evacuated due to the Canyon Fire 2 and they could not have been nicer. We didn't check in until 11pm that night, and yet were still greeted with a smiling front desk clerk who could not have been nicer! The rooms are super clean, beautifully decorated, and generously sized. For such a budget friendly hotel, we were impressed. You can literally walk to Disneyland, so many restaurants to choose just steps away, and they have an on-site convenience store for snacks and things like toothbrushes, which we forgot to pack when we had to leave our home so suddenly. Thankfully, we were able to return home the next day, but we will definitely be back and tell all our out-of-town friends to stay here! Bonus-it really does look like a
Manager Response: We would like to say we were very sorry you had to evacuate over the recent fires.  We were glad you stayed with us and enjoyed your stay.  We appreciate you spreading the word for us with any of your out of town friends that may be coming to the Anaheim Resort.  We hope all worked out with your home during the fires, and that you weren't too badly affected.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This hotel has a very serious problem maintaining water temperature. The tub / shower goes from tepid to scalding in seconds and fluctuates constantly. We had family also staying in the hotel that experienced the same issues so this wasn’t just our room.  Besides that, this is a very very basic hotel. If it’s all you want to spend then it’s okay, if you can upgrade you probably should. There is a pool but it’s oddly located in the center of the parking lot.  Our room was very quiet which was nice.  Also, the hotel is across from the Disney property but is really a couple of blocks from the actual entrance. Probably a 10 minute walk. Bring your own conditioner & lotion. There isn’t any provided.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  As mentioned the hotel is very conveniently located near the entrance of the Disneyland Resort.  We would like to address any maintenance request or concerns from guests as soon as possible.  Our maintenance staff is generally able to fix any issue in the guest rooms on the same day th issue is reported.  We apologize if there was an issue with the temperature of the water fluctuating in your room.  We provide a 2 in 1 shampoo and conditioner in the rooms, and a separate conditioner or lotion is available upon request.  We hope that on your next visit to the Disneyland area, you will come back and visit us again.

Summary Heading: Castle Inn, always a great stay.
Summary: We Stayed at Castle Inn again on our last trip earlier this year (May 2017). As usual the staff were very helpful and friendly. We love this hotels wifi! It's really good. We choose this hotel because of its location. It is a short walk to the front gate at the Disneyland resort from the hotel. There are Denny's and Ihop nearby as well as  steakhouse and various other eating establishments. Very close by on the corner are two huge chemists that are 24 hour and have everything you could ever really need, food, bulk drinks, cigarettes, vapes, alcohol, all manner of items likes towels, ponchos, cheap merch, and ATM's. I like to stock up my room fridge with bulk packs of Starbucks iced coffees, yum! They also sell fresh fruit tubs and some healthier lighter food options i.e.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for returning to the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to the Anaheim Resort.  You provided such a great, detailed review we are sure other guests looking to book us will appreciate this.  We hope you are coming back again soon, and thank you again for the great review and feedback, we really appreciate it.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: love this property as its close to Disneyland (about 10 minute walk) and you pass about 8 restaurants on your way to Disneyland. Also just around the block is Garden Walk where you will find BUBBA GUMPS and CHEESECAKE FACTORY - our two favourite restaurants.  Hotel is good value and has excellent staff.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently. and for taking the time to provide your review.  It was very nice to hear you enjoyed your stay, our location and staff.  We hope you will come back to see us the next time you visit the states and the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Stayed overnight at the Castle Inn while in Anaheim visiting Disneyland and California Adventures. Location is great, about a 5 min walk to the front gates. If you arrive before the official "check-in" time, they let you pre-register and park your car in their lot so you don't have to pay for the parks parking. Rooms were clean, nothing fancy; but we only needed it for sleeping. We did break our first day of Disney up into 2 times, went back to the room for a nap and then grabbed dinner on the way back to the parks. Staff was friendly, it's not a 5 star resort, but it is a great option while staying close to Disney. They also have a good military discount, which was a huge plus for us!
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for the review and feedback of your stay.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Excellent service, staff very helpful. Rooms are quite large. 2 blocks from disney, easy to walk to, as well as many restaurants nearby.  Small family pool & jacuzzi, open till 9pm. Great hotel for families.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for providing your review of your recent stay.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Spent 6 nights here and had such a wonderful experience. The front desk staff (Gabriel and Eric) met our needs and any request we had. The rooms were always clean and tidy. Whilst it may look a little dated when you first walk into the room, it definitely accommodates all you need in an room whilst on holiday. Best part of it all, only a 7min walk to  Disneyland. The house keeping staff, while you hardly see them, keep your room clean, and even had a little fun moving our sons soft toys around (he has more than a few!). It's exactly what you need for accommodation. Clean, and walking distance to Disneyland, downtown Disney and restaurants around the corner.
Manager Response: We would like to say a very big thank you for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your feedback from your stay.  It was great to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay, our staff and location.  We hope you will keep us in mind the next time your travel plans bring you to the Disneyland area.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Staff at Caslte inn were friendly and very helpful Kelly would have chat with us every morning about our day and what we had done. Rooms were clean and comfortable .Castle Inn is within walking distance to Disneyland and near by restaurants cafes and market shopping
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review.  We were very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that our staff made you feel welcome.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Hotel was great. Staff very pleasant. Rooms nice and clean. Short walk to the park entrance. Gift shop/convenience store handy.  Only suggestion make sure to get room on top floor in case you have upstairs neighbours like us in room 438 who sound like they're elephants jumping and running around at ridiculous hours.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you for your feedback and helpful hints.  We look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This is our second time staying here, it's a nice place. The kids love the pools. Any issues we had were always taking care of quickly. Would stay here again.   Last year we were on the 4 floor this year on second floor, if you have trouble sleeping stay on the 4 the second floor was a bit loud with people above us.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for returning to the Castle Inn & Suites, and for taking the time to provide your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: What people need to understand is that the experience of Disneyland is the park, not where you collapse into bed at night.  You could pay 4 times as much at one of the park hotels, but there's no reason too--a place like the Castle Inn is a short walk from the main Disneyland entrance, is closer to the better eating options, and worked just fine for what we wanted.  The majority of the rooms are set back from the main road; we were on the ground floor and had no problems at all with noise.  We had a double-bedroom suite with temperature control in each room, two TVs, and a mini-fridge, and it did everything we needed it to do.  It may have been nice to have a place with room service, but at the same time there's an IHOP two blocks down where the kids eat dinner free, so that was
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent vacation to the Anaheim Resort.  Thank you for taking the time to provide your review and attention to detail.  I'm sure other guests reading our reviews will find this very helpful.  We recently updated some channels on our TV so this should be good for your next visit.  Once again, thank you and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Very close to Disney area. took about 5/7 min to walk over to the parks. very clean hotel and was very quick to get us a room after coming from a sold out night. the staff was very nice and polite. housing was very fast and did a great job defiantly will be going back to this place.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide a review from your stay.  It was great to hear you had a great time and that you will come back to see us.  Have a great day, and thank you again.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We booked a last-minute trip to Disney in late November for a post-new year trip. Our main focus was location to Disneyland because we were only visiting the park for one very long day - which equaled two nights in the hotel. Although the decor is a bit outdated, we had zero issues with our room. There were some smokers in the vicinity, but we live in an area where it's not allowed at all, so it's a bit more noticeable for us. The room was clean and close to the park, and that's all we needed.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Have a great day,

Summary: We have stayed at about a handful of hotels in the area and this one is practically perfect in every way. The staff was very friendly and professional, it's obvious that they care about their customers. Our room was clean and comfortable. It was conveniently close to CVS and Walgreens. We were able to have them hold our luggage for us after check out and before our shuttle came. It was about a 10 minute walk from our hotel room to the entrance gates to Disneyland. We will definitely be staying here for all of our biannual Disneyland trips.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  We really appreciate the kind review and 5 stars and look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Good Hotel for a Disney Trip
Summary: My family and I stayed here for 5 nights the week after Labor Day. The staff was always super friendly and helpful no matter what time we came to the lobby. The hotel is also in a great location...it took maybe 5 mins to walk to Disneyland resort. There are also restaurants and convenience stores in pretty close proximity (Walgreens and cvs). My ONLY complaint was that the rooms were not very well ventilated. We always came back to a muggy room which was bearable if we  left the door open for a while. Maybe if the windows could crack it would help... All in all, though, still a pretty good value for our money.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your feedback from your stay.  We were very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, our location and staff.  When you return in the near future, please take note that our windows do open slightly in all guest rooms for that ventilation you may need.  They do not open all the way for safety.  Once again, thank you for staying with us, and we hope to see you soon.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Fantastic Service and Walking Distance to Disneyland!
Summary: We booked Castle Inn & Suites for a six night stay while visiting Disneyland.  We arrived early but we were able to put our luggage in a locked room while we went over to the park, and stayed in a family suite that was two full rooms and perfect for two parents and two teenagers.  I timed a walk to the park, and from the hotel lobby over to the Esplanade, through security and through the gates of California Adventure, it took 11:47.  Yes, at the end of the day it seemed much further with tired feet, but we had no problem returning to the hotel midday for a swim and then would head back to the park a couple of hours later.  The pool was nice and clean, and the room was surprisingly quiet for a "motel style" hotel (and we weren't even on the top floor - there was a family above us
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great feedback and points of interest you mention.  We were sorry to hear you had a bit of smell issue with your A/C, we hope you reported this to the front desk as it was most likely an easy, quick fix.   We like that you entered the time of your walk, as we've had many guests also clock the walk at under 10 minutes.  We assume everyone walks at a different pace, so we do mention on most occasions the walk is under 10 minutes.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights when we visited Disney land in August of this year. Excellent location across the road from Disney land. Accommodation was very basic, but it was just a stop off. Plenty of places to eat within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review.  We hope to see you again.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The biggest perk of this hotel is that it's a 5-10 minute walk to the entrance to Disney. Its a great value to be able to park at the hotel and walk to the parks.You can easily walk back to your room for a nap or break in the middle of the day. Stayed recently for the Disneyland Half Marathon and it is also an excellent location for that as you can walk to the starting corrals very easily in the early morning. If you arrive early on the day you are checking in you are allowed to park your car even if your room isn't ready, and you can leave it even after you check out. The staff at this hotel is always lovely, very friendly and helpful. They have a small shop if you come back from the parks and need a snack or drink. The rooms aren't exactly modern but are always very clean,
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review from your stay.  We were very happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay, the hotel, our location and staff.  Although some guests state our rooms aren't modern, this is because we have a castle-theme and we have tried to be authentic but current as well.  We feel our darker, richer fabrics & furnishings compliment our theme, and then our granite bathrooms counters, large flat screen TV, wardrobes instead of standard closet's, gives us that little extra something special.    We did a full renovation less than 4 year's ago, so as far as hotel renovations go, we are pretty current.   We will always strive to maintain our property and look forward to future enhancements in the future.  Once again, thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Was a nice place to stay with our 4-year-old grandson. He liked that it was a castle. Close enough to walk to the gates in the morning. Wish it was closer in the evening when I had to carry him back.  Good price and fun
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing your grandson to stay with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were very happy to hear he enjoyed his stay and liked being in a Castle.  We hope to see you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We loved it here. We got here early in the morning so our room wasn't ready but for a small fee we were upgraded to a large suite to move into straight away. Which was perfect it was our last hotel before our flight back to Perth & we had so much luggage between the two of us to organise before our flight. It was walking distance to Disneyland. It was a long drive to LA but we were mainly here for Disneyland. Great staff as well.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us, all the way from WA.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide your review.  Guest reviews are extremely helpful, and allows us to continue creating memories for our guests and providing our first class hospitality.  We hope if you ever return to the States in the near future, you will think of the Castle Inn & Suites in the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Very clean hotel at walking distance from the entrance of both Disney parks. After a 10 minute walk we were at the entrance. A good way to save parking cost. Very good wifi. Small but clean swimming pool. I definitely would book this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We thank you for choosing our property and we were pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and our location.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We just came back from our visit to Disney and this hotel! Great hotel, clean, friendly staff... nothing to complain about as after a full day at Disney what more can you ask for then a comfy, clean hotel room to lay your head down! We would stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate you providing your feedback from your stay, and it was nice to hear you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I always stay here when I am in Anaheim. The staff are always friendly and accommodating. Also, a major plus, is that you can walk to Disneyland. Parking is never an issue. I just recently stayed here, but this time, I did not have the time to use the pool. I highly recommend Castle Inn & Suites to everyone.
Manager Response: We would all like to thank you very, very much for the great review and all the A+'s we value our guests feedback and we wanted you to know we appreciate it and will share this with our staff.  Thank you so much for being a returning guest, and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We usually stay at the Disney resorts, but for a last minute trip this place was great. I don't want to give too much away because I want to keep this place for myself!! Wonderful front staff and walking distance to Disneyland.  The room was very spacious and CLEAN, which for me is #1.  The beds were comfy and the a/c worked perfectly!  We did get an upper floor so it was nice and quite especially since we were 3 adults. Parking was not an issue for us, but we did park in a handicap spot.  I totally recommend this hotel based on the walkability to Disney.  This is due to not being able to go through the CA Adventure park any longer.  It took us maybe 7 -10 mins from the hotel to the front entrance of Disneyland
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us and for taking the time to provide your review.  We appreciate the feedback and great comments you provided.  We hope to be your home away from home when visiting the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Walking distance to Disneyland, very friendly and accommodating staff, nice large clean and maintained room.  Convenient store located on the property that was well stocked.  Safe and monitored parking for  overnight  stays.  Did not have a  opportunity to use the nice pool but well maintained and safe.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great feedback in your review, and hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Loved the Hotel but my Braclet was stolen!
Summary: Hotel was clean and staff friendly. However my Pandora Disney Bracelet was taken from mt room. It was all Disney Charms collected over a 3 year time period. Should never have taken it off but it was so hot and sticky. I offered a $100.00 reward but of course it was not returned. No safes in rooms! Moral to the story don't wear amything nice to Disney or find a property with room safes.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and providing your review.  When you phoned the hotel 3 days after you checked out to inform us your bracelet was missing, we immediately checked with housekeeping and conducted our due diligence whenever a guest has left behind any item from their stay.  There was no items turned in from Housekeeping from the room you occupied during your stay.  Any and all guest items regardless of size, value, etc are immediately logged by the housekeeper and then turned in to the front desk staff to log in the lost and found book.  On most occasions when an item is found immediately at guest check out, we call the guest on the phone number provided allowing the guest to return to the hotel to claim the lost and found item.  If they have already left the area, then we send all lost and found items out via priority mail.  We return on an annual basis hundreds of packages containing lost and found items like;  Wedding Rings, Laptops, I Pads, Cell Phones, Jewelry etc.   The Castle Inn & Suites staff and employees have been here for many, many years and no employee is going to jeopardize their job by taking any guest item.
