We are sorry you lost your bracelet, and trust when we say, if it was left behind during your stay, you would have had it returned to you immediately.  Sincerely,

Summary: We have been to many hotels within the Disneyland/Anaheim area but we have come to the castle inn loyally for a few years now. They have a great staff that always takes care of us and has been nothing short of amazing. Mark is more then accommodating when it comes to my sons special needs and knows how hard it is to travel the long distance we do so he definitely goes above and beyond to make our stay as easy as possible. The rooms are large, clean and so close to the park that we don't feel like we are walking a country mile to get to and from Disneyland. I love the hotel because it's quiet but totally kid friendly. Alberta is so nice when I call to book and knows everyone by name. I've had to order items and have them shipped to the hotel and David was awesome enough to put
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and providing such a great review of your stay.  We really appreciate the great feedback and attention to detail you provided.  We will definitely share this with our staff.  We look forward to having you come back to see us the next time you return to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The castle theme is so cute and the kids loved staying at a castle.  The staff was very friendly and helpful and even gave us a map and recommendations for good, close restaurants. The short distance to Disneyland was wonderful and an easy walk. The small shop was useful and we bought some needed items. Our room was clean however a little musty. The furniture and beds were very nice. The price was very affordable for our family.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and providing a lovely review of your stay.  We appreciate the feedback from our guest's, and we hope you will come back to see us the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Drip, drip, drip and no one to fix it.
Summary: I struggle with reviews like this. I never really want to have to give a bad review. So when I have to I want give it a lot of thought or reflection to make sure the review is genuine and accurate. This review could be a very low three or a high two. This is my second stay (and review) here so it's a really tough decision.  First here are some pros: staff is super nice and helpful.  They did give us a free upgrade upon arrival, even though I didn't notice the difference in room types from our previous visit (same room reserved). And the view was rather nice.  The room was dated but clean.  Even the fold-out bed was in good shape.  The water was (mostly) hot.  Now for the con (and it's a big one):  Something in our room was leaking. I thought it was the A/C, but I'm not entirely
Manager Response: We wanted to say thank you for returning to the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate our returning guest's and we were very sorry to hear we fell short on your guest experience this time around.  Rest assured we take all reviews to heart and share these with the staff and we put measures in place to research all guest concerns.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to make your next visit to Anaheim, right, so please do not hesitate contacting us directly.  Sincerely,

Summary: This place was very convenient for our Disneyland trip - walking distance, right across the street from the park!  The rooms were clean and comfortable and just as advertised. Be aware that you can only park one car per room at this hotel which was an issue for us as we were a larger group renting two of the large suites.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay.  We appreciate all feedback from our guest's.  We offer complimentary parking for 1 vehicle per registered room, so if you booked 2 suites, you would have been able to park 2 vehicles on site.  In busy season, it's extremely difficult to allow for additional car's if a guest were to arrive with 1 room booked and multiply car's, but thankfully, we are adjacent to 2 public parking area's where additional cars can park and be close to the hotel.  Once again, thank you and we hope you will come back to visit us in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great stay at Castle Inn and Suites
Summary: I am a travel agent and have booked the Castle Inn for many clients and a longtime group for over 10 years. My clients have always enjoyed their stay there.  Working with them professionally has always been a pleasure.  I used to stay with my Aunt who lived in the area but she had moved and I was traveling to Southern California to visit Disneyland, Knotts, and Newport Beach.  I stayed at the Castle Inn for 4 nights in the family suite.  That was a great way for 2 adults and 2 kids (10 and 13) to stretch out and have space,  It was a pleasure to experience the Castle Inn  myself.  Rooms are clean and comfortable, location is fantastic, and  staff is very nice and accommodating.  All rooms except the standard have refrigerator and microwave, there is a small convenience store on
Manager Response: We would like to thank you so much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your detailed review of your stay.  We so appreciate our travel agent partners, and appreciate our long term relationship.  We wanted to make sure you knew that ALL rooms standard and suites at the Castle Inn have a microwave, mini fridge, coffee maker and hair dryer.  Our website does not currently reflect this, but when we renovated in fall of 2013, we installed ALL rooms with these amenities.  Once again, thank you for your continued support of the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I had a very extended stay here. It was not only cozy and snug; it was also hospitable. Almost as if anything you were craving, they were serving. Sometimes, it was noisy. You can hear the neighbors excitement and input about the place. As if they knew any better. Sadly the time came to depart, I was not looking forward to that trip. I highly recommend this stay. It was a once in a lifetime experience
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for taking the time to write your review from your stay.  We hope to see you again in the near future the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: There were 7 of us in a Parlor Suite, it was clean, roomy and the service was great! We are frequent visitors to Disneyland and we make it a point to stay at the Castle Inn. Can't beat it for the price, the comfort, convenience and wonderful staff. The children ages 5 to 17 all give Castle Inn a thumbs up!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and giving us a "thumbs up". We appreciate the great review and feedback from your stay, and wanted to thank you.  We hope to see you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My daughter and I were in Anaheim to attend the Disney 23 Conference at the Anaheim Convention Center.  When searching for a hotel, I noticed that the Castle Inn advertised that they were in walking distance to the Convention Center and Disneyland.  I was delighted to find that this was a true representation!  We easily walked to the convention on Saturday.  Then on Sunday, we strolled over to Disney's California Adventure Theme Park.  On Monday, we walked to Downtown Disney.  Again this was a brief stroll.  The hotel was ideally situated also in terms of restaurants of all types of cuisine, all within a short distance.  A CVS and a Walgreens were nearby.  Although we didn't spend much time in our room itself, the accommodation was excellent. Our room was spacious and had a
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us during the D23 Convention.  It sounds like you had a great trip.  We wanted to thank you so much for staying with us, and for taking the time to provide your feedback from your stay.  We know other guests read past guest reviews so this is very much appreciated.  Come back to see us the next time you visit Disneyland or return for a future D23 Convention!  Kindest Regards,

Summary: The most part I loved about the stay at the Castle Inn and Suites the staff were always friendly, kept a smile on there faces and provided great service. The rooms were nice and equipped well enough. I have no complaints as this was far the BEST stay I've had in such a long time. Also the walk to both parks Disneyland and California Adventure saved money from parking and made it easy for myself and my girls. Its great that the food places, shopping, and a 24 hours Walgreens down the street. There is an ice machine free of charge, most places have you put in coins in order to get ice. Vending machines for soda, and a small store onsite for souvenirs, snacks, etc.. Overall all I can say I will be going back to the Castle Inn & Suites near future on a family trip once again. Thank
Manager Response: We would like to send a big thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.    We thank you so much for the great review and feedback from your stay.  We do look forward to that day when you return to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Have a great day,  Thank you again,

Summary Heading: A Great Stay at the Castle
Summary: We are frequent Disneyland visitors and we have stayed at quite a few of the surrounding hotels. The Castle is by far the best I have stayed at.  The location is fantastic, staff is friendly, our room was spacious and clean. There is a pool and store onsite and not only that - the front of the hotel is a castle! Fun for the whole family. We were very very happy with our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide a review from your stay.  We were very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, the hotel and our location.  We hope you will keep us in mind the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Large Room, Comfortable Bed, Close to Disney Resort
Summary: The room was very large, clean, and had nice comfortable beds and pillows.  No ironing board or iron in the room, but there was a mini fridge and microwave.  Free WIFI.  Close to restaurants and Disney resort.  Pleasant and helpful staff.  Convenience store onsite.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide your review from your stay.  We do offer iron/ironing boards upon request so the next time you visit us and need an iron/ironing board, just call down to the front desk and they will be delivered to your room.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Family vacation at Disneyland for 7 days.  We had two rooms.  The staff at Castle Inn and Suites were extremely friendly and helpful.  Our daughter is a Type 1 diabetic, so her insulin needed to stay refrigerated.  We were concerned that the refrigerator didn't immediately seem cold enough.  We requested the maintenance staff examine it, and they were immediately responsive to checking the refrigerator.  As it turned out, it was operating fine and kept her supplies perfect during our stay, as well as all of our drinks well chilled.  The staff offered the freezer in the offices for her ice packs for our travel needs.  We had one other maintenance issue that was self-induced and again the maintenance crew was immediately responsive and fixed the problem right away.  Each and every
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the great review and feedback from your stay.  We appreciate the attention to detail you provided and we will share this review with our staff.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Really great hotel! Just a five minute walk from Disney Theme Parks and Downtown Disney, there are nearby food and store locations, and it's a just a great place to relax and vacation. Your privacy is very much respected, and you are treated not as a customer but as a guest. Overall, I highly recommend Castle Inn and Suites. Enjoy!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide a review from your stay.  We appreciate the awesome feedback, and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: First Timers for us in California!
Summary: We booked this hotel on WestJet Vacations. The check in was quick. Our family of 5 were booked on the first floor which was really convenient. They have a small store on site by the lobby that has a little bit of everything. This hotel is really close to Disneyland resort entrance and has other restaurants and stores within walking distance. It's easy to get off and on the interstate. The quality of the rooms can use some improvements such as the carpeting and blankets. We really liked how they put effort into folding the towels. The pool is small and you have to bring your own towel from the room, we had fun and it did the trick when it's super hot and need a break from the parks. There is a small wading pool and hot tub too. The parking lot was always almost full but we always
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your WestJet Vacations trip.  We appreciate the review and feedback.    We hope you will keep us in mind the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great family hotel, very reasonable, with family rooms
Summary: I picked this hotel as it was one of the few that had family rooms (2 bedrooms) it also had a fridge and microwave.   We could see the fireworks at Disneyland from our 4th floor room. Very clean and neat hotel, staff were great.  Very close to Disneyland and restaurants.  We walked everywhere, with our baby in a stroller.  This is a budget hotel, but would gladly stay here again. Nice little pool area, not flashy but kids had a great time, has a toddler pool. Very Comfy beds.
Manager Response: We thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to Disneyland.  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your review and feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here 3 nights in July covering 4th July. It is within walking distance of Disneyland and has shops very close for food & eating. They sell discounted tickets to Disneyland which are significantly cheaper than buying at the gate. We had a family room. It was very spacious and appropriately set up. Curiously the room used by our daughter had more room & facilities than the main room. Lots of parking. Laundry is well priced. We will definitely stay here again when we next visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us over the 4th of July holiday.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide your review from your stay.  We wanted to advise you that our Disneyland Park Hopper tickets are the exact same price as Disneyland.  As a Good Neighbor Hotel we sell the tickets at our hotel for the same prices, it's a convenience to our guest's to buy them from us so you can go right to the gate when you get across the street.    Once again, thank you for staying with us and we will see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Room 252 (parlor suite) Stayed 5 nights, 4 days Family of 4 (kids ages: 15 years old, 18 years old)  Pros:   -Affordable. Paid $1229 with military discount -Only 2 blocks from Disneyland -Housekeeping cleaned our rooms daily while we were out at the parks -Free parking  Cons:  -Room had a very strong smell of urine. I checked in close to midnight after a long day of travelling so decided to stay the night in the room hoping the smell would decrease by morning with the AC turned on. I woke up at 6am because the smell was so strong. I called the front desk at 7am. They sent someone up and fixed it to my surprise otherwise, we would've changed rooms cause it was so bad and gave me a headache. This first impression already turned me off to the hotel and caused me to check for
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback.  We were sorry to hear you did not have a pleasant stay.  We appreciate the feedback regarding the room.  We also thank you for contacting our front desk, as most issues/concerns can be addressed immediately.    Most guests enjoy our mattress', they are less than 4 years old and are the Serta sleeper mattress'.  We even have guests asking us where we purchased them so they can buy one.  We realize everyone has different firmness they like in their mattress, so this is understandable.  We went through a full room renovation in Fall 2013, so we have all new furniture and fixtures which are all made in the USA.  We of course went with the darker, richer fabrics and furnishings as opposed to the stark white bedding most hotels offer as we are a Castle theme and felt that would not compliment our rooms.  Once again, we appreciate the feedback and thank you again for staying with us.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Is within walking distance of Disneyland. Is close to amenities such as diners and drugstores and public transportation. Has a jacuzzi pool and little kids pool. Is moderately priced. Has an onsite little store.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review.  We hope to see you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My wife and I have annual passes for both Walt Disney World as well as Disneyland.  Although Walt Disney World is far more expansive, we prefer going to Disneyland.  One of the main reasons is that we love staying at the Castle Inn and Suites located directly across from Cars Land in the California Adventure Park.  The staff members including Marc, Alberta, Alma, David, Angel, Eric, and Pat are fantastic! They always greet us by name, see to it that we get our room preference, and cheerfully attend to any special request we may have.  The hotel's rates are incredibly reasonable considering their location is just outside the Parks' entrances and right next door are fast food eateries providing Mexican, Chinese, Pizza, Sandwich, as well as Mediterranean cuisine.  There also are
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out to write such a great review!  Our staff is always happy to see our repeat guests come through the doors!  We only wish we could remember all of our guests' names so we could give them the same experience.  As your home away from home, we will always be happy to see you.  You compliments will be passed on the the staff,  we always love to hear that guests appreciate the extra effort that is made!  We hope that the free parking, free WiFi, and no resort fees will keep you coming back for years to come!  We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Good place to stay if you go to Disneyland
Summary: Good motel, the room (we took a suite for 5 people) was spacious and clean. Front desk very helpful and nice. Disneyland across the street, so very convenient. Restaurants, CVS, Walgreens & 7/11 near the motel.  Free wifi and free parking but no breakfast included. We enjoyed staying at Castle Inn & Suites
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review from your stay.  We appreciate the great feedback and hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: went down for vidcon which was held at the convection centre, perfect walking distant for it! everyone there was so friendly and helped all our needs, rooms were amazing and well cleaned! would stay here again when i come Anaheim again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during the Vidcon convention.  We were happy to hear you enjoyed our rooms, and location.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My family of five stayed at the Castle Inn & Suites in June 2017 while we were visiting Disneyland. Upon entering our room, we were impressed with the size of the room as well as the cleanliness. Considering their low rates, this was the perfect place for us considering we wanted to stay at the parks all day and just needed a place to sleep and store our belongings.  It's located right down the street from Disneyland. We walked each day with three children (10, 7, 4) and it never took us more than 5-10 minutes to be at the gates. It was an easy walk and not once did I get a complaint about how far anyone had to walk! We never checked out the pool or any other facility because our sole focus was Disney so I cannot comment on that. However, if we ever return to Disneyland, I would
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to write your review from your stay.  We appreciate the great feedback.  We were happy to hear you were able to stay during a time when we were offering special rates.  As you may know the hotel rates can change on a dime, so we are always happy when we can offer great value rates at times throughout the year.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We really liked the location of this hotel, so close to Disneyland.  There is plenty of amenities in the area for food, drinks and supplies.  We walked to Disney for all 3 days we were there.  The room was a little tight for luggage space, as we had 4 adults all with suitcases.  We all found the beds a little hard too.  The staff were very friendly and helpful. Would stay here again. Hotel has a pool, but can get crowed in the afternoon.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for posting your review from your visit.  We appreciate the feedback. As a tip for the future, we have lovely family rooms that sleep up to 6 and are very spacious.  We offer nominal upgrade fee's, so keep that in mind on your next visit as this may work better for you and your group.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: If you want to walk to the parks, fantastic! So easy and accessible. No parking fees which is nice. Easy to take a midday nap and walk back to the parks. Room was spacious and clean. Only downside was there were some people around the hotel who almost seemed to be living there which made you a little uncomfortable to walk around in the evening. But they also had a marketplace which had literally everything you could think of which was also nice.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review from your stay.  It was nice to hear you and your family enjoyed our location and spacious rooms.  We do not have any guests "living" on property, so we are sorry you had an uncomfortable feeling.  We have many international guests that can book a several week trip to Anaheim, but no guest's live on property.  We hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We chose to stay at the Castle Inn and Suites because of its close proximity to Disneyland.  We stayed for one week in February and was not disappointed.  The staff at this Hotel was very professional and made us feel very welcome. Our Standard room was exactly as advertised and had a homey feel to it. Yes, it is dated and showing signs of age but it does go along with the castle theme and we were not bothered by it.  The wifi signal was really good in the room.  The hotel is literally a 5-10 minute walk away from  Disneyland & California Adventure Theme Parks as well as Anaheim Garden Walk.  It was a bit too chilly to try out the outdoor pool, however we would not hesitate in booking with this hotel again in the future.  The only disappointment was that there is no safe in the
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us in February, and for taking the time to write your review from your stay.  We appreciate the great feedback and we were happy to hear you enjoyed the hotel and our location.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Just 2 blocks away from the entranced to Disneyland, the Castle Inn and Suites provides reasonably priced, well presented family accommodation with free parking. Our suite had 1 room with a king bed, the other with 2 queens, good storage, microwave and fridge.  Staff were friendly and helpful and the best tip if you need mobility assistance for Disney is rent an electric scooter from the hotel, it's $10 a day cheaper plus you get to use it on the way to and from Disneyland as well.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us, and for providing your review and feedback from your stay.  We were very happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay, and found our accommodations reasonably priced.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I've always seen the Castle Inn & Suites when visiting Disneyland, but never stayed there until now.  I was very happy with the hotel.  The standard room has both a desk and a table and lots of space to move around.  The staff was very helpful.  We had a concern about the refrigerator and maintenance came promptly to look it over and explain how the fridge worked.  The beds were very comfortable.  After a day at the park, none of us had any trouble sleeping.  It's about a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland.  Also, the rooms seem to be very well insulated from sound, as we were not bothered by noises from any adjoining rooms.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing to stay with us on your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you so much for the great review and feedback, we really appreciate it.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Family of 4 (two kids.. son 8, daughter 10). Hotel only 15 min walk to front doors of DL or DCA and it includes free parking at hotel (most other close hotels charge an additional fee to park your car, per day!) Rooms are clean, come w/micro wave, coffee maker and small frig. large flat screen, free wifi, AC keeps room cool. Ice maker down the hall. Family would come back to room for a nap around 5PM... Always found room serviced and ready. We spent 6 nights at this location... would do again. Stayed on 4th floor which I think is quieter than 1st floor. Again, location is great!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review from your stay.  It was nice to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay, and would do it again!  We look forward to welcoming you back one day in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect place for visiting Disney Parks
Summary: This hotel has a great price/quality rate and it is a perfect place for visiting Disney Parks. You will take 5-10 minutes walking from hotel to parks. Rooms are wide and clean. There is also a small swimming pool but it is enough. You also have a one car free parking place per room. Near the hotel you have a 7 eleven, some restaurant and shops. There is no Breakfast at the hotel but you have a coffee maker at the room that is reload every day, a microwave and a refrigerator, so you only have to buy some bread or sweet at the supermarket and you can have breakfast at the room. We spent 5 days there with our daughter and we enjoyed the place. People working there is also very sweet and polite.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for the great review and feedback from your recent stay.  It was nice to hear you and your family enjoyed the hotel and our location to Disneyland.  Thank you again, and we hope to see you in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Had a wonderful time at the Castle Inn and Suites! Our room was spacious, clean, and comfortable. Staff were super nice and helpful. Pool and spa felt great after our run. Wonderful experience overall!
Manager Response: A very big thank you for your great review and kind words.  Thank you for staying with us during the Disney Run Event, and we hope to see you again for one of the future run events.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Much mahalo to the staff at castle inn and suites. However we would like to send a special mahalo to Alberta for all the help and aloha she extended to our family. We had a big group and she was able to accommodate our family in more ways than one. Our biggest need was for handicap accessibility which Alberta was able to provide. Along with the wonderful service that started as soon as we walked in the lobby at the front desk, everything else was fabulous. From housekeeping to maintenance, everyone was helpful, friendly and kind. The inn is conveniently located across from Disney parks in walking distance. They also provide electric scooters at a totally affable rate for those who may need assistance. Our family had an amazing vacation and it always makes things so much more
Manager Response: Aloha from the Castle Inn & Suites - a very big mahalo for your kind words and review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the kind words, and we will pass this along to our staff.  We hope to see you again when your travel plans bring you back to the mainland and the Castle Inn & Suites.  Mahalo and Aloha,

Summary: It was a great trip. My last trip to Disneyland was 10 years ago with my kids. Now it's the grandkids turn and for their first time this Hotel was awesome. We enjoyed the handicapped accessible room we requested made it easier to get ready each day. They also were very helpful in my obtaining a scooter to use each day. We spent 3 days and we were close enough to get to the front gate with little trouble. My mom was in a wheelchair and me in a scooter we were able to get 4 generations to Disneyland. Thank you Castle Inn my grandkids loved the fridge and micro. And the stain glass knight and dragon was pretty cool at night too. You made Our late nights at the park  perfect to know our room was waiting for us!!!! We will be back
Manager Response: We would like to send a very big thank you for the lovely review.  We were so thrilled to hear you and your family had a great time here at the Castle Inn & Suites and Disneyland.    We hope you will have another opportunity in the near future to return to Disneyland and the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Second stay and again not disappointed
Summary: This was our second stay at Castle Inn and Suites.  This time we stayed in the mini-executive suite and the room was worth the price difference.  We had plenty of room to spread out and with three beds it made this trip much easier with my teenage and preteen daughter.  This property is a short walk to the Disneyland park entrance with plenty of restaurants and other stores nearby, all within walking distance.  My only concern was these beds seemed a bit harder than the last time.  The room has a mini fridge, microwave and small coffee pot.  There are plenty of storage areas for luggage as well as counter/table space.  We only had one request during our stay here which was for extra towels and this was met very quickly.  We never had to request extra towels again as I noticed
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and being a returning guest.  We appreciate the review and feedback from this stay.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Lets face it , you don't spend much time in your room so this place is fine ! Beds were comfortable, rooms quite large. Not used to having the bathroom sink in the main part of the room but no big issue. Well situated a short walk to Disney , California Park and Downtown Disney, couple of minutes to Denny's or IHop for breakfast. Pharmacy and 7 Eleven close by as well. Great front desk staff, very helpful . About 45 min to the airport. This was our 3rd visit , previously stayed at Howard Johnson. If this is your first visit to Disneyland buy a 5 day park hopper pass and enjoy !!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We value our guests feedback, so thank you for taking the time to provide your review.  We hope to see you again, the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: A clean room and friendly staff
Summary: The staff is very friendly and accommodating.  Our room was clean on arrival with nice accommodations.  Easy walking distance to Disneyland with lots of places to eat on the way.  When we left for Disneyland the room was cleaned to our liking.
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you very much for the review.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: A clean and comfortable hotel walking distance to Disneyland. Friendly and helpful staff. close to restaurants. A store was close by where we bought breakfast cereal, milk etc for breakfast. My only complaints wete that the TV remote didn't work. Left a note for the cleaner but note and remote were completely ignored even though we left it in a prominent position. The fridge was so noisy!  But despite these minor irritations I would stay there again as we basically left early to go to Disneyland and came back late so really only slept there.
Manager Response: We thank you for staying with us last week.  We appreciate the review and feedback you have provided.  We were sorry to hear your remote did not work.  Next time, the best thing to do is ring down to the front desk and let our staff know, as this would have been replaced immediately.  Also, we provide the new energy-efficient refrigerator's in our rooms, so they are much quieter than those with the compressor's.  Again, this could have been an easy fix and we would have replaced the refrigerator immediately, as it sounds as if something was wrong with it, as our refrigerators are very quiet.  Thank you again for the feedback and we hope you will come back to see us the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: Great place to stay to visit Disneyland Rooms were large and comfortable Very clean Bathroom excellent Desk staff efficient Arranged transport to Universal Studios for us Walking distance to Disneyland Close to Starbucks and pharmacies Really liked this hotel
Manager Response: We would like to thank you both for staying with us a week ago, and for taking the time to provide your review.  We hope to see you the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel close to Disney parks
Summary: Arrived at midday after a 15 hour flight and appreciated that room was available. Very friendly greeting. Booked an executive suite for family of 3 adults and 2 children. Having 2 separate bedrooms was great. Convenient location -easy few minutes walk to Disneyland. plenty of parking. No breakfast offered but lots of places to eat nearby. Would definitely recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great feedback, so thank you for taking the time to write your review.  We hope to see you again, or any of your friends you recommend to visit us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Check in issues, but nice hotel
Summary: We arrived early morning, and Castle Inn allowed us to store our bags until check in time, so that we could spend the morning at Disneyland. When my SIL and I returned in the afternoon with exhausted kids to check in and nap, We were not allowed to check in, as both of our husbands were on the reservations--despite the fact that our names were on them, they were both paid for with OUR cards, our ID's had same last names/addresses as reservations, AND we both had the confirmation #'s. We had to wait for our husbands to come over from the park (they were in on a ride, so we ended up having to wait in the lobby for an hour with cranky tired kids). Once we finally got checked in, our travel agent called and gave them a piece of her mind (there's NO reason we shouldn't have been able
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we apologize about the inconvenience during the check in process.  Our records indicate this reservation came from a 3rd party, not directly through the hotel.  When we receive reservations from other sources we are usually only provided the lead guest name.  We do not get payment information as to which guest paid the travel agency, or addresses at the time of the booking.  For security purposes we can only release keys to the registered guest.  We are happy to hear that during the remainder of your stay your family was happy.  We try to make every effort to provide a safe, secure, and enjoyable stay for all of our guests.  The housekeeping staff works hard to make sure our rooms are clean, the feedback is much appreciated.  We hope that the slight hiccup during your arrival will not prevent you from booking at the Castle Inn & Suites again, we would be happy to accommodate your party.  While the connecting rooms are limited we always try to get our guests with multiple rooms as close as possible to each other.  We are happy to allow any guest with a mobility issue to use our lobby to leave a scooter, store a wheel chair, or charge a device to help them have a more enjoyable stay.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Convenient and Clean with AP Discount
Summary: We are annual passholders and have stayed here several times (they offer a discounted rate APs!) We have stayed in the executive mini-suite, the family suite, and a room with two queens. All of the rooms are very clean. The mini-suite is a really nice middle ground because it's pretty spacious for the price.  The hotel is a quick walk to the park and is one of the only places nearby that offers free parking. They are super accommodating and allow us to park before we have actually checked in and after we've checked out.  There is a gift shop on site, a CVS, and several restaurants (try the pizza press) nearby as well.   We have stayed several places nearby and the Castle Inn is a consistent, dependable place for us.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide your review.  We were happy to read that all went well, and your family enjoyed their stay with us.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We arrived very late and had a friendly greeting. Room was clean, plenty of parking. My only complaint was that there was no continental breakfast; would've been helpful to eat before heading to the park with a child.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay.  We find the complimentary features like parking and wi fi are a much better value for our guests.  This way you can make your own choice on where to have breakfast, lunch and dinner every day.  Thank you once again for staying with us, and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Nice hotel within easy walk to Disneyland
Summary: My wife and I stayed with our  daughter at this hotel recently.  We wanted to stay at a place within walking distance of the magic kingdom, and this hotel fit the bill.  It was about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland for the three of us, all adults.  The neighborhood was well lit and it seemed very safe walking from the park back to the hotel late at night.    The hotel itself is huge with a castle theme, as one might expect from the name.  The room we stayed in had 2 queen beds and had more than enough room for the three of us.  It was kept very clean.  The bathroom, A/C, and TV all worked fine.  The room   had a slight "old" odor noticeable when we first entered it, however it wasn't offensive and didn't bother us.   All the rooms enter/exit into outdoor corridors, there are no
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide your detailed review from your stay.  We look forward to seeing you again, and having you return to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: The front desk staff was very welcoming and helpful. Our room was spacious, very clean, and quite comfortable. It was equipped with a refrigerator and microwave as well as in-room coffeemaker. While it is located right on Harbor Blvd., a busy street with buses on the way to Disneyland, we heard none of it in our quiet room which was well off the road. We took the Disneyland Express in from LAX rather than hassling with a car, always a challenge in the LA area, so we never had to deal with parking anywhere. Our short walk to the park for our two-day pass was EASY. This hotel provides very comfortable accommodations for a price much lower than most of its similar competitors. It will be our go-to hotel for our next visit.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for the great review from your recent stay.  We appreciate receiving all 5's!    We look forward to being your go-to-hotel the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for 8 nights to enjoy Disneyland and do a couple of day trips. The service was great and the rooms were very clean. The price point is perfect for what we wanted and it is a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland front gates. It is also close to food options at the Anaheim Gardenwalk.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to the Anaheim Resort.  We want to thank you for giving us all 5's and for the "awesome" review.     We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Clean & close to Disneyland, but budget for sure
Summary: We chose this hotel for its close proximity to Disneyland and that is its best feature. The room was clean and had decent furnishings. As I read with other guests the mattresses are your basic hotel mattress and not the nicer softer ones found in more and more hotels these days.  We had the "family suite" which is not huge, but was fine for us. The biggest drawback was the awful smell from the air conditioners; a constant smelly feet odor. The 7:30am trash truck each morning emptying the dumpsters right outside our room was also not good. They should change contractors or request a later time in my opinion.  I am 6' 1" and my son is 6' 5" so the low shower head needs an extender to make it higher.  This is an average hotel that offers basic rooms within close proximity to
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay.  We thank you for reporting some concerns regarding an odor from your room.  We hope you also reported this to our front desk staff so we could have addressed it while you were still in house.  Sometimes, it can be a quick and easy fix.  Once again, thank you for the feedback.  Sincerely,

Summary: Stayed one night int he 1 room suite so that my brother in law and his girlfriend wouldn't have to pay for a room for the trip to Disneyland.  Interior was old but the room was big and the beds were comfortable.  Easy access into Disneyland.  Front desk staff was polite.  Only issue was we only go one parking pass even though we had 2 cars.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay.  We hope your brother in law had a great birthday.  We do feel our free parking amenity for 1 car per registered room puts us above our competitors who charge for parking.  We  do our best to accommodate extra vehicles when we can, but when we are sold out, we are just not able to accommodate extra vehicles per registered ro  Once again thank you for staying with  us.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Basic accommodation but close to Disneyland
Summary: My husband and I Stayed 5 days at this hotel with our 2 children during a 1 month holiday in the US. We stayed in the family suite.  There is small amount of cupboard space and is not well equipped for families with more than 1 suitcase.  There is no in room safe which is annoying.  The family suites are at the rear of the hotel which means if you have a few suitcases you need to trolley them yourself across the car park.  The hotel room walls are thin and so can be quite noisy especially when the children next door are up until midnight.  This hotel is nothing fancy but has the necessities. Hotel room smells musty and there is a persistent mouldy smell in the bathroom. Walk to Disneyland is about 10 min which is great.  There is no restaurant facilities on site despite saying
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your review and feedback from your stay.  We realize we may have fallen short in some areas,  and hope you will give us another opportunity to show you our first-class service.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Nice size room,comfortable beds,lots of hot water for showers,helpful at reception,nice comfortable lobby to wait for our super shuttle. Fridge, microwave in our room which is a plus, nice quiet a/c .
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review, we really appreciate it, and look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here from 4 to 10 May 2017. We arrived at 8.45am in the morning and were met by the lovely manager Alberta (hope I've spelt that right). Having just done 14 hours on a plane plus transit, it was welcome news to hear that we could go straight to our room. Please note that early check ins such as this aren't the norm, we were simply lucky that day.  We had the family suite. Quite large and consisting of wha appeared to be a standard hotel room with king bed, bathroom, fridge, table and closet, which then opened up into a bedroom at the back with two queen beds in it. The rooms were clean and neat. Dark furnishings but there is plenty of light. We found the two queen beds much more comfortable than the king, however we still got a good night sleep in the king. It is just
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great and detailed review from your stay.  We hope you will keep us in mind the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Really loved this hotel! So close to Disneyland, the rooms are neat, clean and spacious, and the kids absolutely loved staying in a "castle". It was only a 10 minute walk to the front of Disney and there were plenty of options to eat nearby (pizza place was especially yum!) The rooms here are great, he had a room with a door separating us from our bub sleeping in his cot in the other room - super helpful for his naps. The only slight negative was the water in the showers - went from hot to cold all the time, which wasn't idea. But no biggie. Overall we loved it and can't wait to stay again!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback and review from your stay with us recently.  We were very happy to hear everyone had a good time and that you will come back to see us again.  We hope you reported the hot/cold water situation to our front desk staff as this is an easy fix.  Once again, thank you, and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This is the second time we've stayed at the Castle Inn and we will stay there again. The rooms are clean, very quiet and well maintained. The staff was friendly and helpful, and the walk to the park is a quick 6-8 minutes. It's also very convenient for the Express bus from the airports, if you choose not to drive. We also liked the little store, bottled water and juices were much cheaper there than in the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We wanted to say thank you for coming back to see us, and for taking the time to provide your review.  Once again, thank you, and we will see you the next time you return to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great Little hotel across the steet from Disneylan
Summary: We stayed 1 night before a run Disney race because we needed a nearby hotel as we were starting at 5:30am.  Very polite staff in the office. Also very helpful.  They let us check in and leave our car and suitcase before check in time when room wasn't ready.  Very clean grounds, nice pool (we didn't use it) and great little mini mart.  The room was very large, 2 queen beds that were comfortable. The room had a microwave, refrigerator and coffee pot.  Coffee was stocked with regular, decaf and tea and all the fixings.  The bathroom had plenty of nice clean towels.   The room was clean, the curtains had black out curtains to keep out the city lights and everything was great.  We were on the 4th floor so it was pretty quiet.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay with us.  We hope to see you the next time Disney has a race, or anytime your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We choose The Castle Inn as it was close to Disneyland, and it did not disappoint.  The room was clean the staff was great.    We drove into California on a Thursday morning and were allowed to check in an park at the hotel.  We just picked up our room keys on the way back form the park.  There are plenty of places to eat close by so if you do not want to eat in the park they are all with in walking distance.  I would stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for our recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you very much for taking the time to write your review.  We were very happy to read that all was great, and that you will come back to see us again.  Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you soon.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: spend four days the crew were great meeting all our requirements, large rooms, clean and well stocked with towels, including towels for the pool and spa, there is a little store on the property meets most needs with and good restaurants very close.  going to book again on next visit
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  We appreciate the review and great feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We just left Castle Inn & Suites after staying for 5 nights.  The room was large, very clean and the accommodations comfortable.  The crew is friendly and ready for anything.  I strongly recommend anyone to stay there.  And it is really very close to the Disney Parks. Five-minute walk to the Parks.  Thanks
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post your review from your recent stay.  We appreciate the great feedback and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Our room had two queen beds with four pillows per bed. The room was dark at night but a little noisy because we were right by the ice machine. No free breakfast but there was very good free WiFi and parking. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for staying with us, and for taking the time to provide your review from your stay.  Please insure when you return to the Castle Inn & Suites, you provide a request to be blocked away from the elevators and ice machines.  This is no worries at all, and we do all possible to fulfill our guest's request's.  Thank you again,

Summary: Only three blocks from DCA and Disneyland.  Clean room with the basics - microwave and refrigerator.  Refrigerator had no freezer section. Store for odds and ends at entrance.  Beds were firm and very comfortable. Staff was efficient.  Room was ready early. Plenty of restaurants within walking distance. There was a big pool for the kids if Splash Mountain wasn't enough.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  We do provide the energy-efficient refrigerators which do not come with freezer section's.    Once again, thank you for staying with us and providing your review.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a convenient location
Summary: This is a great hotel in a great location.  It's a very short walk to Disneyland, and there are numerous family/chain restaurants right near the hotel.  The rooms are clean, modern and have air conditioning/heating.  Staff are very friendly, and the service is just as good.   I'd happily stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to write your review.  We appreciate the great feedback, and look forward to welcoming you back the next time your plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We just stayed and enjoyed our stay. Girl at front desk on check in was very welcoming. We were quite early to check in as we had just flown in from Australia. After a long journey we were very happy our room was ready. The room was spacious for the 3 of us. Nice and clean. Nothing fancy about the room but just perfect for us as we spent most of our time at Disneyland which was only a 5 minute walk away. Restaurants close by too. Comfy beds, quiet room so would stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Super close to Disneyland, no shuttle needed
Summary: We were originally staying at a different hotel on Ball Road but moved to the Castle Inn and Suites as it is much closer to Disneyland. Our first hotel we were promised a shuttle but when we got there, we found out the shuttle was discontinued three days earlier - big disappointment having to walk 25 minutes to Disneyland! The Castle Inn is literally a 2 block walk to Disneylands main entrance an easy 5 minute walk, elevator, good clean room with coffee maker, refrigerator and microwave, great front desk staff, lots of parking access in and out was nice, wonderful relaxing jacuzzi for your tired feet and body.   We will definitely be back on our next visit to Anahiem.  Thank you Marc! Also, lots of great places nearby to eat Mimi's Cafe (great breakfast and mimosas) Panera,
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We greatly appreciate the feedback and thank you for taking the time to write you review.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Went with my twin daughter's and their friend.it was the 2nd time in a year that I stayed at this hotel. Love the staff,  very clean and across the street from the Disneyland grounds. Can't wait to go again.
Manager Response: We would all like to thank you for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that you will be back again to see us.  Thank you once again,  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My best friend and I met in Anaheim for a long weekend in Disneyland. The staff were thoughtful and pleasant and even brought us a blanket to our room when we called the front desk. Great service. Also the little store across from the lobby was really convenient for anything you may have forgot to pack (toothpaste, bandaids) or something you didn't know you wanted (small bottles of sparkling wine, pints of Ben&Jerrys). Rooms were standard motel style but still clean and large enough for two gals to maneuver.  Pool and hot tub were nice to use after a long day at the parks but nothing fancy, which was fine by us.  Also, the location was perfect. For those that are able-bodied and don't mind the 10 min walk to the front gates, it can't be beat, especially for the price.   When I'm
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to "the land".  We greatly appreciate the detailed review and feedback.  We know other guests enjoying reading feedback as well, so we really thank you for providing a great review from your trip.  We look forward to seeing you and your adult friends again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great accommodation for a large family
Summary: For a large family this place was absolutely perfect a short walk from Disneyland,room was cleaned everyday,we had a lovely stay.The bedding was comfortable as well. On a hot day we came back to the airconditioning on and the room cool and clean. Staff was very friendly and helpful. The only negative was the parking spots where not allocated and the parking spots were tight and because we were ground floor we could hear everything above.
Manager Response: We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for providing your review from your recent stay.   We hear some guests love the ground floor, but others do like upper floor's, so on your next stay, please feel free to provide a request on your room allocation and all efforts to provide that request will be given.  Once again, thank you and we look forward to seeing you on your next visit.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Close to the park and reasonably priced
Summary: When we looked online for a hotel that had two rooms in one that was also within walking distance of Disneyland most options were either quite expensive or not highly rated. We found Castle inn and liked that it was themed and fit our needs to house two adult couples. Once we arrived the check in process was very simple and the staff was nice and joked with us as he could tell we were delirious after a whole day of driving. Inside the hotel room was clean, spacious, and well air conditioned. I have to say that this is the first hotel room bathroom that has water pressure that is even close to that of what I consider normal and I was so excited for this as I have long thick hair. Overall I would stay here again and recommend it to my friends.
Manager Response: We would all like to say a very big thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the great review and attention to detail you provided.    Thank you for recommending us to your friends, and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great stay we had 6 nights here.  Stayed in a family suite that was large and very clean.  Great service.  The location for Disneyland is fantastic just a short walk down the road.  Great for popping back for a break and a swim then heading back to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and providing your review, we greatly appreciate it.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Very nice place to stay when going to Disneyland
Summary: My family recently took a trip to Disneyland.  This hotel was very nice.  We stayed in the family suite.  The beds were comfy and clean.  The only problem I saw was the toilet seat needed to be replaced or tightened.  They said the pool was heated but I it was not.  Although they didn't offer food, we had a refrigerator and microwave so we were able to cook in the room.  We also brought a crock pot that saved us money on eating out. They also had a small market that we could go to for snacks, drinks etc.  Loved this hotel.  It was a short walk to Disneyland and very accommodating.  I would definitely recommend it and stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the nice review and feedback.  We hope you brought the toilet seat issue to our front desk staff's attention as this would have been fixed right away.  We appreciate you mentioning we have a microwave and refrigerator in our rooms.  We were glad you found these amenities convenient.    We do not allow "cooking" in our guest rooms, but heating up items, popping popcorn etc, is definitely welcome.    Once again, thank you for staying with us, and for the recommendation, we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Best hotel ever! My husband and I pick this over Disney hotel every time!! Maids were so amazing I passed out in the middle of the day while they started cleaning they asked if they could clean the room and my husband said no it's okay but they still gave us towels and toilet paper and took our trash out! Only sad part is the hot tub closes kinda early but that won't make it where we don't come love this place and always will!!!
Manager Response: We would all like to thank you very much for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciated the great review and feedback you provided.    We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at this hotel in 2014 when we brought our kids to Disneyland the first time, and like in my last review I stayed we'd stay again - which we did! And again matched the expectation - clean, nice sized family rooms. Dated on the outside nice on the inside. Close to Disneyland, and family restaurants.  Thanks for another great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  It was nice to hear you were here in 2014 which was right after our full room renovation, and now again 3 years later you see how our rooms continue to look new and fresh.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I've read a couple of negative reviews on the hotel and all I can say is, it had to be the guest and not the hotel. As a family, kids, grandkids we have have stayed here, perhaps 2 dozen times over 18 yrs. Never had anything but clean rooms and grounds with excellent service. All the staff are smiling and helpful. This last trip we had a bunch of special requests, multiple rooms we want close and on ground floor ( had 2 special needs members with us) we let them know when we booked the room and they came thru. We can afford the best hotels now but, why when location and service are right here. Looking forward to coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you as well for being a returning guest, and not letting any "negative" review sway you away from returning to the hotel.    We are fortunate we get very few "negative" reviews.  Out of 118 ranked hotel's, we are currently 16, so in the top 20 which is very good for our area.    We pride ourselves in our guest service, so thank you for pointing this out.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Close to Disneyland Theme Parks Convenient to stores and restaurants and souvenir shops. Friendly and helpful staff. Adequate facilities, swimming pool, laundry facilities. Lifts to first level floors.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to write your review.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights . It was clean and the staff were so helpful and you can even park your car there before you check in . We got to the park early and want to park our car at the hotel before going to Disneyland and they gave us our pass and let us park . And they don't charge you to park your car like the other surrounding hotels do .It's walking distance from Disneyland . I would definitely stay here again for the good price and location to Disneyland..
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the feedback and hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Thought I was getting a great deal, but got duped!
Summary: We've stayed here before without any real issues. It's a no frills hotel. Nothing special or out of the ordinary. This time when we checked in we let them know I had a disability and needed to be close to an elevator since they had nothing on the bottom floor. They put us on the 4th floor.   On arrival we realized we had a 2 inch gap around the top of our door. We laughed that a humming bird could easily fly through. Six of us were staying in the room and they gave us exactly six towels. Keep in mind 4 of the six were girls and yes, we need hair towels too as the towels are thin and we needed extra towels and kept having to ask for them each and every day. No towels at the pool either!  So we had to use our room towels at the pool!  And then call and ask for new towels!    One
Manager Response: We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your review.  We appreciate all feedback from our guests and value the opportunity to improve our guest experience.    As a previous guest who has stayed with us in the past with no issues, we are sure you can understand that your experience is not typical of our hotel.  We apologize the ground floor rooms were all occupied when you checked in.  When we have advance notice we make all effort to grant requests, but at times we are just not able.  It sounds as if we were able to provide you a room near one of our two elevators on property.  Unfortunately, like any machinery, elevators go out from time to time, and we contacted our professional service right away to come check it out, and it needed a part that was not available until early Monday morning.  We hope you were able to use the 2nd elevator on property so you were not too inconvenienced.  We make all effort to accommodate any guest issue while the guest is in-house.  Had we been aware of your concerns you were having, we would have made all effort to move you to another room, and insure housekeeping was aware to leave extra towels in your room.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to show you are first class hospitality we take pride in.  Thank you again, and we hope to see you again.

Summary: Very satisfied with the service received from Castle Inn and Suites. Travelling from overseas, we sent a few emails prior to arriving to check that everything was in order and we received prompt responses. We were granted early check in, so our room was ready for us when we arrived at 8am. The staff were friendly and our luggage was securely stored for the entire day after we checked out. The location is excellent - close to Disneyland and plenty of places to have meals. We would stay again and happy to recommend to anyone.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review from your stay.  We loved your feedback and we were happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We arrived at 0715 and pre-checked in. The hotel check-in was nice and she assured us our information was not on the room keys, so they have an updated system for the room entry. We were able to leave the car and walk to the park. The Inn is not "right across the street" from the entrance, yet a doable walk, even when tired. The pool was small so we did not bother with going there.   We had a one bedroom and chose the room facing the street. The room was clean and  good size. If you are a light sleeper or sensitive to noise, don't take the rooms in the front. Didn't bother us, we are used to jet noise.   The bathroom was a good size, the bedroom had a tv and table and chairs. The bed was comfortable and the room had an extra sink that made it easier for two people to get ready.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide your review.  We hope you reported your sofa bed concern to our front desk staff as we could have easily fixed this for you.  Our sofa beds are around 3 years old, and we have just updated all of the mattress' on the sofa bed's and we typically get positive reviews regarding our sleeper sofa's.  There could have been an isolated situation with the sofa bed in your room.    Once again, thank you for your review and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Disneyland is only a few steps away
Summary: Great location literally across the street from Disneyland. Walking distance from many restaurants and stores. A bunch of places deliver food @no charge. Room was clean and good sized. Beds were comfortable. No complaints.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Every time we go to Disneyland we stay at a different off-property location. In booking the Castle Inn we were told it was across the street from the entrance. It is - but down a couple of blocks.  The room was clean, which was a good thing because housekeeping didn't show up until nearly 5p the second day of our visit (while my daughter was napping after a full day at the park). The 3rd day they appeared at 9am.  The staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay.  A friendly note that may help with future hotel stays.  Call the front desk staff when you are leaving for the day to ask if your room can be serviced and your estimated return time.   All efforts to clean your room will then be given.  We appreciate the feedback and hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We recently returned from a five night stay at the Castle Inn and Suites. We found this hotel to be fantastic. A quick ten minute walk to Disneyland and lots of food places nearby. The hotel is super clean.  We stayed in a suite so we had three beds and lots of space which made the stay much more enjoyable. The pool is small but adequate. The staff is super friendly and helpful. They were able to accommodate our early check in and recommended a great place to get pizza delivery from!  We would for sure stay here again!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us on your recent trip to the Anaheim Resort.  We appreciate you taking the time to write your review and provide such great feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time your travel plans bring you back to Anaheim.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This hotel has a great location. I picked it because I could get a room with two bedrooms. This worked out great because I was traveling with teens. They even had a sink in their room.  It has a very small pool, but nice jacuzzi. The service was fine.  The rooms are dated, dark, and a bit musty. The beds were comfortable and the room was reasonably clean. TV in both rooms was great. Free Wifi and parking a plus!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We appreciate the feedback and the review.  The rooms were themed with darker furniture to give a more "Castle" theme to them.  The location of the hotel is tough to beat though, close to Disney, close to the Gardenwalk shopping center with many restaurants and entertainment options, and close to the Convention Center for guests traveling on business.  We are proud to provide a clean comfortable room for our guests and hope next time you come to Anaheim you will come back and visit us again.  With free parking, free WiFi, and no resort fees the Castle Inn & Suites is the best value in town!

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay at the Castle Inn and Suites
Summary: Our family has just enjoyed a terrific stay at the Castle Inn and Suites. The rooms are comfortable and clean, and the friendly staff are ever-so-helpful. The castle themed exterior and knight in armor in the foyer add atmosphere, and the shop next door sells handy basics such as milk, biscuits, fruit, ice-cream and other food and drink items, and a range of reasonably priced souveniers.   Disneyland is a pleasant ten minute walk and with so many people out and about until Disneyland's late closing time, walking in the street always felt safe. Tours and pick-ups can be booked in the office, which also sells postage stamps, saving a walk to the Post Office. The Castle Inn does not serve breakfast, but there is a marvellous assortment of family restaurants nearby, and also a
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for the lovely review.  We appreciate the great feedback and all the points of interest you highlighted in the review.  We know future guests read these, and I'm sure this information is very helpful.  We do hope your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort in the near future, and you'll make the Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for four nights when we visited Disneyland.  We were very pleased and would definitely stay here again.  The hotel is a fun theme for the vacation.  Our room was clean and comfortable.  The staff was great.  We love the extra touches of the swan towel and the fanned washcloths, Kleenex and toilet paper! It's just a few minutes walk to where you enter the theme parks, so no waiting for buses and shuttles.  We loved that we could return to the hotel for a rest during the day then go back to Disneyland later without the hassle and cost of busses or shuttles.  No complaints.  You may not have the extra luxury and benefits of a resort hotel but you also don't have the expense of a resort hotel.  A great off-resort option.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate you taking the time to write your review and provide such great feedback.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: First and foremost, i would like to mention Ms.Alberta for such a helpful and kind gestures to accommodate our family needs. The rooms are very clean and well stocked with towels. They even have swan-shaped towels on the vanity tables. The place is very close to everything you could possibly need when on vacation. To the left of the front of the castle theres chinese, mexican, and italian restaurants. Accross the street on Katella ave theres Walgreens and CVS, behind Walgreens is IHOP. To the right of the castle is the way to the entrance of California Adventure and Disneyland. On the way to the entrance you will pass by alot of restaurants like Tony Romas, Dennys, a pizzateria, a creamistry ice cream shop. Thats why the Castle Inn is centrally located to almost anything you
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for providing such a great review.  Thank you for mentioning one of our staff members, we will be sure to pass this along to her.  We appreciate you taking the time to write your review and provide such great detail.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights and were very pleased with our stay! I'd definitely stay here again. The rooms were updated and clean. The staff was super friendly and went out of their way to make our stay great!   The pool area is a little older, but the kids loved it. The only thing missing are some umbrellas around the pool area tables.   Free parking and they let us keep our car there after we checked out.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay with us.  Thank you so much for the nice review and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: OK hotel is all you need
Summary: The purpose of this hotel is just to have a place to stay near Disney, and it did it's job. By no means is it anything luxurious or special, but it's an ok place for the right price (relatively speaking vs onsite Disney properties). We didn't spend a lot of time in the room, but it's 80's style motel-ish. Parking included is huge, and is very close to the parks. Staff was great. I would probably stay again when going to Disney.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay with us.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Stayed in family suite, excellent for two adults and three teens. Only hiccup was one shared bathroom, but second sink made it easier. Loved having the ground floor after walking around the parks all day, hot tub and pool area fabulous. Little ones with the princess effect will love the building style!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate you taking the time to write your review and provide feedback from your stay.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Excellent location & kind hearted Reception staff!
Summary: This hotel is just a short 10 minute walk to Disneyland's gates! Surrounded by food options... Denny's, IHOP, Tony Roma's, Pizza, Mexican..... Clean & comfortable rooms, everything you need! The convenience of a small shop at the entrance that sells pretty much a bit of everything! We were especially impressed and grateful to the Reception Staff who organised our room a little earlier than check in for us, my jet lagged 10 year old appreciated it! Thank you
Manager Response: We would like to say a very big thank you for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to write such a great review with detailed feedback.  We take pride on our customer service, so thank you for mentioning our "kind hearted reception staff" we will make sure to pass this along to them.  We hope if you return to the Anaheim Resort in the near future, you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This hotel offers large and spacious rooms for families with 4 children. In comparison to other hotels located near the main gate of Disneyland along Harbor Blvd, Castle Inn, offered room rates priced significantly lower. The microwave and refrigerator provided in each room compensated for the absence of a continental breakfast.
