The staff was extremely friendly and accommodating with our request for adjacent rooms as this was the first trip to the Magic Kingdom for our four grandchildren, and we wanted to make sure everything was just perfect for them. The maintenance supervisor was at our door within minutes of notifying the front desk of a broken coffeemaker in our room It was replaced with a brand new model. He couldn't have been friendlier! I would definitely recommend this
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to write your review.  We appreciate the feedback and it was very nice to hear you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you plan to visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Great rates, great front desk, safe, close to everything, would give 5 star rating except found a orange and a lego and a zipper coin purse in room on floor. Lego under desk, orange under edge of bed and coin purse under edge of other bed. I believe the room was rushed in cleaning, beds were clean, pull out bed is horribly uncomfortable. Still we have stayed here at least half dozen times. Parking is free, wish pastries and coffee were offered in morning but food is close by. No really negatives to report. Will book again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We would like to thank you for taking the time to write your review.  We appreciate your feedback.  We were sorry to hear you found a few items in the room and we hope you brought this to the attention of our front desk staff so we could address it with our housekeeping department right away.  Once again, thank you for staying with us, and being a returning guest.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This was our first trip to Disney.  I didn't know anything about the hotels in the area but had heard about Castle Inn from others.  Booked through the military voucher program so we got a competitive rate.  The reservation personnel on the phone were very polite and helpful.  When we arrived for check-in everything went very smoothly and the staff was very helpful.  The only surprise for me was that we had to pay an additional fee at the front desk for the taxes.  This was unexpected as it hadn't been explained to me by the military reservation desk or the hotel reservation line.  Not a big deal but just something to be aware of if you are using military vouchers.  Our room was on the third floor.  Easy access by stairs or elevator.  We had two queen size beds, a mini fridge, a
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for the nice review and feedback, we really appreciate it, as well as other guests who read reviews.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: 2nd time there and it was even better!
Summary: We loved this place in 2006 - close by Disneyland and very comfortable family suites! We stayed again last week and it was even nicer than before and we were treated so well by the staff.  I slept through the night (first time in ANY hotel) on the comfortable bed and we had plenty of extra pillows and towels to accommodate our family.  We still love this place and we'll stay there again next time we head to Disneyland!  We rented a car and loved that we had free parking here.  We also like the style of the place - the castle theme is fun!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to the Anaheim Resort.  We appreciate you being a returning guest, and thank you for the great review and feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I have stayed at many hotels in the vicinity of Disneyland, and all of them were musty, dirty, expensive, and dingy. This hotel was clean, spacious, affordable, and comfortable. This will be my go-to hotel on all future Disneyland vacations.
Manager Response: We would like to send a big thank you for your great review.  We really appreciate the 5 stars and for your comments and feedback.  We know other guests read the reviews, so this is very helpful and appreciated.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Our stay was just as good as our first stay. check in was seamless, though they didn't have a room ready, they told us when to come back. Room was spacious, clean. Would stay again. Helpful at the desk. Quiet. The free parking is a bonus & close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland, and being a returning guest.  We appreciate the great review and feedback, and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Duration of stay: 6 nights, 25 Feb-3 March 2017  Booking process and check-in/check-out: this was a combo flights+hotel. At first we had another hotel in mind, but when the price of the flights went up, we started looking at combination trips. We then found this hotel+flights to be within our budget, booked through the British Airways site. Check-in and out: no problems and very quick.   Transport arrival/departure: we had booked a private transfer with a company we found recommended on disboards.  Room: perfectly adequate, and very clean. Good size fridge. Only thing we missed in the room is a safety deposit box. Safety boxes are available at the reception though.  Facilities: we used the laundry facilities, in the building next to the swimming pool. Good wifi.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to Disneyland.  Thank you very much for the great review and detailed feedback this is very much appreciated.  We hope you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I stayed at Disneyland hotel in the past and payed $$$$ then I realized the we were not at the resort most of the time. If that is the case you can stay at this resort. They have a pool. It is very small so not compatible to the Disneyland hotel's pools. The room is clean and about 10-15 min walk to the disneyland gates. Lots of restaurant around. Front desk are very polite and helpful with all your need.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites recently.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide your review and feedback from your stay.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We are family of 5 with kids ages 9,7,and 3.  This hotel is perfect walking distance for us.  Small pool area but it gets the job done.  Love that the rooms all have fridges and microwaves for quick fix meals.  There is a shop on site that sells milk, grab and go foods, and microwave meals in a pinch.  Right across the street is a CVS and Walgreens for any of those last minute items.  Behind the hotel is the Garden walk with a bowling alley, movies, and plenty of nicer restaurants when you are sick of fast food.  Staff is always pleasant and rooms are spacious and clean.  We've stayed several times and will continue to come back.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the lovely review and feedback.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed at this location for a week with two children and found it very great value .it was very clean and in a great location opposite disneyland and great restaurants was better than what we were expecting the staff were very helpful I would definitly stay here again I think it cost us around $1100 AUSD  for 7 nights and I paid for an extra late checkout which was basically another night I think because our flight home wasn't till 10.30pm and trust me it helps
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your Disneyland holiday.  We appreciate the review and feedback.  We hope the next time you visit the states, and the Anaheim Resort, you will think of the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed 6 nights here while we spent a week at Disneyland. We booked through Get Away Today and our check in was really quick. It's right across from the south end of DCA. We had spent the day in Long Beach so coming in from the south our kids couldn't see the park so we were able to surprise them once we got to our room.   It's motel style where the doors go right outside. The rooms are perfect for what we need. The beds were comfy but after a full day at Disney I think everyone could have slept on the floor and slept all night. There was a mini fridge and small microwave. We brought stuff from Costco like breakfast sandwiches, gogurts and poptarts. We could eat breakfast right in the room. There are places down the street too but for us this was a cheaper option. There is
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for taking the time to provide a great, detailed review from your stay with us earlier this year.  We appreciate your feedback, and look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: For the money...a great place to stay.
Summary: Our second trip to Disneyland, my 75th birthday. We decided to try getting a little closer to the main gate.  Our first stay at the Castle Inn, only about 10 minutes away from the main gate.  A little out dated but large for two people. The beds were very comfortable and very little if any road noise.   On the morning of last night of our stay, we wanted to pre-book our seats on the plane. I was having trouble with the computer so  went to the lobby for assistance. A gentleman named Mark came to our rescue. (I assume he was the manager) He was very persistent, polite and in general a real nice person in helping us obtain our objective.   So thank you Mark....we hope to be staying at the Castle again when we return to Anaheim.  Greta & Steve M
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your 75th birthday trip to Disneyland.  We greatly appreciate the review and feedback you provided.    We look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: LOCATION GOOD, BUT HOTEL IN NEED OF RENOVATION!
Summary: This is a great location within walking distance of disneyland, but the hotel is in desparate need of renovation for the money they charge. The sofa sleeper was very dirty, the carpets dirty, the room had a bad smell. when it rained, the rain actually came through the door into the bedroom (the location we were facing had a bedroom door in an odd location). There is no restaurant or coffee in lobby. just a lot of money for a two star hotel when there are much nicer places around. we won't stay or recommend again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were sorry to hear you encountered some concerns during your stay.  We hope you brought the rain issue you mentioned to the attention of our front desk personnel as we would have addressed this immediately.  This is the first we have ever received this concern.   We went through an extensive room renovation in the Fall of 2013.  We also painted the entire exterior less than a year ago, and most recently repaved our parking lot.  We also added some new in room features since the renovation, and we were just awarded a 3 diamond status by AAA.  We hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort, so we have an opportunity to provide the first class service we take pride in.   Kind Regards,

Summary: Our stay was wonderful and we had no issues whatsoever. The location to the parks is amazing and the rates are unbeatable. Our rooms were always cleaned and when we would get back from a long day at Disneyland we would come to the room to find that the house keepers had organized my 2 daughters plush princesses on our beds making the stay even more magical! The Castle Inn and Suites has a great atmosphere and an even better value! We will be staying here for sure on our next vacation to Disneyland!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Bunked in with relatives for one night this past week because we couldn't get in at our timeshare resort. I highly recommend it. The staff at the front desk were pleasant from the minute we walked in and had excellent interpersonal skills and answered our questions confidently and without letting on they had probably answered the same ones a thousand times over. The room had everything we needed and the hot tub was clean and relaxing. Alma at the front desk was exceptional as were the others (I'm sorry, I did not see their name tags). They called a cab for us happily (many resorts won't) and wished us a pleasant stay the rest of our week. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel or stay in it again in the future if our timeshare is not available.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the lovely review and feedback you have provided.  We hope to see you the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Close and affordable hotel near Disneyland
Summary: We enjoyed staying at the Castle Inn & Suites. It is very close to Disneyland, which makes walking with little kids very nice. The price is reasonable and the rooms are nice. The staff were very friendly and helpful with any concerns we had. Will stay again!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your review, we really appreciate it.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: As everyone else that stays here we were on a Disney trip.  This hotel was great! Comfortable beds, clean room, friendly staff, and 8-10 minute walk to Disney.  I used their self service laundry facilities which were clean and efficient.  We were underwhelmed by the pool area. It is in a fenced area in the middle of the parking lot. It is kept clean and has a main pool, hot tub and kiddie pool. It would be nice if they had more greenery or colour.  Overall I recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to the Disneyland Resort.  We appreciate the feedback you provided.  We are looking in to updating our pool area in the near future, so this is an area we will be looking to enhance in the future, so thank you for that feedback.  We hope to see you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Excellent value. Rooms were clean and quiet. Staff was extra helpful and went out of their way to make sure everything was right. Enjoyed sitting in the hot tub and doing the laundry at the same time. Very close to Disneyland and we were able to get our tickets right at the hotel so we didn't have to wait in line when we got there. Definitely will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great review and feedback, and look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My husband and I stayed for a week at the Camelot.  I booked ahead and also got the extended stay rate (5 days or more) so price was very competitive with other properties.  We walked across the street to Disneyland entrance every day to meet with family.  Very close and easy walk.  I appreciated the coffee pot, fridge, and microwave in the room for a quick, cheap breakfast in the room.  The staff was very friendly and greeted us as we arrived and left every day.  Our room was on the 4th floor at the very end of the building and very quiet--as requested.  Overall, very wonderful stay.
Manager Response: We see you noted you stayed at the Camelot, however; the review is based on your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We would like to thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide your review of your stay.  We hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Castle Inn this past weekend.  The staff were friendly, the room was clean and beds were comfortable.  They let us park our car in their parking lot the morning we checked in and the day we  checked out for free.  They allow this as long as they have more guests checking out then checking in.  It saved us money not having to park at Disneyland and made it super convenient not to have to move our car.  Definitely recommend and will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the feedback and we were happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We have stayed her several times. It is always a nice room, the are comfortable and clean. Staff was very nice and helpful. Pool was very clean and nice to swim in. Laundry room was so very convenient.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you for providing your review.  Look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Relatively convenient for family Disneyland trip
Summary: Rooms fine, if not somewhat small and dark.  Beds too firm.  Didn't appreciate the loud bellowing tour bus guides in the early morning parking lot.  Pool/hot tub area handy.  Staff proficient.  Would have been great to have a breakfast of any sort available.  Easy walk to Walgreen's or CVS.  Walk pretty easy to Disneyland, but when dragging along family it really would have been lovely to have a shuttle right up. To near the entrance/tickets to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the feedback from your stay.  Our rooms are larger than most properties in town and we have them furnished in darker, richer fabrics & furnishings to compliment our castle-theme.  We feel our free breakfast, free wi fi and no resort fee is a better value to the Castle guest as there are so many options for breakfast in the Anaheim Resort.  Once again, thank you for your review.  Sincerely,

Summary: They have 24/7 concierge service and everyone was pleasant and helpful. We were 4 adults and 2 young kids. Suite was good for family of 4 and grandparents stayed in a Standard room. Inn is walking distance to parks and places to eat abound! We did not need a car as we Ubered to and from  airports.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We really appreciate the review and feedback you provided.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect experience for my 4yr old's 1st trip to Disney
Summary: This hotel "castle" was beautiful. Rooms were very nice. It was maybe a 5 to 10 minute walk to the Disney gates. We never used our car our whole stay. Good food near by. This will definitely be our Disney hotel from now on.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  Our hotel is focused on family fun and designed to be remembered!  A castle across the street from Disneyland is the perfect place to stay on a family vacation.  We hope that the free WiFi and free parking for one vehicle was another bonus.  Thank you for the compliments on the rooms, our team works hard year round to keep up the property and the rooms.  Being able to just leave the car in the same spot is definitely a plus, and with so many things in walking distance there is no need to drive.  We are looking forward to you next visit to Disney and will be happy to see you all again!

Summary Heading: Mostly Family Vacation with a side of Business
Summary: Hotel room was clean upon arrival and the staff was friendly. We picked this hotel due to it being halfway between Disneyland and the convention center where my husband had business. Beds were comfortable and it was within walking distance to Disney.  My husband had business 4/7 days we were here. We had a room with two queen beds and one crib. Kids' ages at the time of travel were 4, 3 & 1. Our room was cleaned very well the first day but after that there was a lot of food left on the floor and the baby's crib sheets never got changed after that first day. Had to call 3/6 days to get her new sheets and she had eaten breakfast in the crib and there was still food in it.  The shower temperature was very inconsistent so during a 10 minute shower, we were constantly turning the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the hotel and for taking the time out to write a review.  The location of the hotel is ideal for a family traveling to Anaheim and doing both business and leisure travel.  As mentioned it is nearly right in the middle between the walk in entrance of Disney and the Anaheim Convention Center.  Our friendly staff makes it a top priority to provide the best customer service we can.  We will address the concerns mentioned in your review with our maintenance and housekeeping staff.  Thank you for the feedback regarding these matters, we appreciate it.  Feedback provides us an opportunity to improve our guest experience.  There are man tour companies in the area, and based upon their years of experience, they have found the most efficient way to accommodate their guests.  Instead of one bus to stop at every hotel on the way to the final destination, they send multiple buses to pick up as many locations as possible and have them all meet at their terminal.  We are sorry it was an inconvenience to board different buses, but this is the system all of the tour companies in the area use.  We will be happy to accommodate you and your family if you decide to book with our hotel again.

Summary: I called the Front desk inquiring on a lost item a very soft, well spoken voice and friendly voice came on the line. Her name is Briana. Briana was very helpful on trying to locate my item which may I say is gone forever into space. Even thought my Item was not there Briana continue to check all area for my item. Thank... This was a fun hotel to say in I would love to come again for pleasure instead of business but any whom. Thank OH I almost for got about the housekeeping supervisor: "darn forgot her name" thank.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  We appreciate the feedback and will pass on your compliments to the team members.  It is too bad we couldn't locate your lost item, but we do keep records and if something comes up matching the description we will be in touch to return it to you.  Being in town for business, we hope you were able to take advantage of the free WiFi provided by the hotel, and the location being close to the Convention Center.  Next time you are in town for business or pleasure keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind.

Summary: This hotel is just a 10-minute walk from Downtown Disney, Disneyland and Disney California Adventure, which is great after a long day of visiting the theme parks. There are plenty of dining options in the vicinity of the hotel, from IHOP and Subway to The Cheesecake Factory, and the CVS Pharmacy across the road is perfect for stocking up on snacks, drinks and breakfast cereals. There is even a handy convenience store located at the hotel, and the things there are quite reasonably priced. We enjoyed staying in a 'castle' – complete with throne and armour in the foyer – and the room was tastefully decorated to reflect the theme, with chunky dark-wood furniture and castle pictures on the walls. It was a little odd to have the sink in the main room, rather than in the bathroom, but
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  Your review is very much appreciated.  We are glad to hear you liked the theme of the rich dark wood furniture and we tried to use rich colored fabrics and carpet as well.  The sink outside the bathroom is designed to provide guests the best opportunity to all get ready at the same time.  So if the restroom is being used for a shower, the hairdryer, sink and counter area can be used for makeup, shaving, brushing teeth etc.  We hope that this came in handy during your visit.  The gift shop on property is definitely a bonus, especially late at night so you can grab something without leaving the hotel.  We can't always provide early check in, but when we have the room available we are always happy to provide one.  We hope next time you visit Anaheim you will stay with us again at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: Stayed for 10 awesome days with my wife and kids (17 and 13).  Liked: - 5k runs around Disneyland block from the hotel; - absolutely no fees for packages (ordered quite a few from Amazon); - free parking; - free good wifi; - helpfull staff.  Disliked: - cleaning left sink area floor quite dirty for several days; - elevator close to room was broke for almost two days.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn and for taking time out to write a review for us!  The location of the hotel is hard to beat!  We are within walking distance to the Disney Parks, the Gardenwalk shopping center, Downtown Disney and the Anaheim Convention Center.  We are proud to offer our guests free parking with a limit of one vehicle per room, free WiFi in every room, and we charge no resort fees that many hotels in the area charge.  This all adds up to big savings when booking packages, and peace of mind that there will not be a bunch of hidden fees to pay upon check in.  We apologize for any inconvenience the elevator being down caused, we hope the second elevator being available helped.  We had a service tech out to fix it as soon as possible, but we were delayed waiting for a part to be delivered so it could be installed.  We appreciate the kind words, our staff works hard to make sure all of our guests have a memorable and enjoyable experience.  We hope the next time you visit Anaheim you will return to stay with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: Suite with 2 bedrooms - one with king bed and one with 2 queens - was perfect for our family.  Only one bathroom, but the room with 2 queens had a sink.  Very clean, staff extremely helpful, free parking, only a short walk to the park.  Could use a little updating, but was well cared for.  With a young one, we came back to the room in the middle of a long day at Disney.  They had a little onsite convenience store perfect for snacks and incidentals, as well as beverages.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate your review and feedback and look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We arrived super early after our international flight, and were thrilled to find that we were able to get straight into our room - a huge bonus after being on the go for so long.  We booked the 2 Queen executive mini suite, which was a great choice.  There was plenty of room to spread out.  The beds were really comfortable, and it was a relatively large bathroom.  We found it terrific to have the 2 bathroom vanity basins - 1 inside the bathroom and 1 outside the bathroom, it really helped with getting ready each day.  While there is no breakfast included, there are plenty of places nearby, or Disneyland itself.  The room had a fridge, so it was also easy to buy cereal, milk, juice, yogurt etc and make our own.  We had a room that fronted the main road (Sth Harbour Blvde), but
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for such a nice review and great feedback, we really appreciate this.  We hope to see you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The building fit the image of a castle. The rooms were basic, clean & comfortable.  Fairly close walk to Disneyland entrance 10mins. Best part were the staff. Friendly and accommodating, everything you need to make a Disneyland enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you for much for the lovely comment about our staff.  We take pride in our guest service so thank you very much for acknowledging that.  We hope to see you again the next time you plan to visit Disneyland.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: This castle will treat you like royalty!
Summary: When booking our family trip to Disneyland, we wanted accommodations that would be close to the parks without breaking the bank. Located just 2 stop lights away from the Disneyland entrance, this hotel exceeded those needs, & helped us with some of the unexpected ones we had during our stay. Upon arrival, they ensured we could check in early enough for my daughter to take her nap- an accommodation I'm sure the parent of any toddler can appreciate the value of. Anything we needed-from an iron to clorox wipes- they brought quickly & cheerfully, no matter how random the request. As an additional bonus, we came home with clean, folded laundry thanks to their reasonably priced, same day laundry service! I honestly can't say enough wonderful things about the staff here, & the hotel
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great review and feedback you have provided.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Castle fit for a king, queen and 2 princes
Summary: My wife prefers to stay here when we visit Disneyland because of the cleanliness of the rooms. My boys ages (5 and 7) were very excited when we told them we were staying at the castle hotel this time. It's about a 10-15 minute walk to the entrance with small children, which is huge at the end of a long day of walking. We actually used the pool (heated) and spa this time which the boys also loved. We forget swim suits for the boys but was able to buy some at the gift shop conveniently located near the entrance. Castle inn is usually our first choice when looking for moderately priced hotel near Disneyland
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  It was very nice to hear you enjoyed your stay, and that your boys were very excited to stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I was able to book with short notice a family suite to take our granddaughter to Disneyland for her 1st birthday. Staff was pleasant. Room...amazing! Very comfortable beds. Only issue was there were baby spiders in the tub/shower and short hairs.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to provide your review.  Our guests feedback is extremely valuable and we want you to know we appreciate it.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Good family hotel a short walk from Disneyland Resort.
Summary: I stayed 5 nights here while visiting LA and mostly for Disneyland Resort. The hotel itself if situated on Harbor Blvd. which runs right in front of Disneyland (the front entrance is about a 10 minute walk).  My room was on the 4th floor, all doors face a walkway, which is outside. The room was clean and of good size. A flat screen tv is situated in a good spot to watch from either Queen size bed. The counter/sink area of the bathroom is open to the bedroom with an area with a locking door contains the shower/tub and toilet. Plenty of towels are provided and housekeeping did a good job every day of making the bed / replacing towels / taking out trash, etc. I slept well every night, the mattresses were comfortable, as were the pillows.  The area around the hotel is kept up well
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide a detailed review of your stay.  We appreciate the great detail to your review and look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Good value convenient stay near Disney
Summary: We wanted a good value convenient stop over for 3 nights near Disneyland and this fitted the bill perfectly. Staff at reception friendly and helpful. This is actually a large motel with all the rooms opening directly onto walkways (for UK readers think medieval themed council estate!) That's a bit unfair, all was very clean and our double room suite was huge and fitted 2 + 2 teens easily.  Location is about as close as you can get to Disneyland outside a Disney hotel. 5-10 minute walk to the entrance.  We used the pool and Jacuzzi one night which was actually very nice despite being in a kind of compound in the middle of the car park. No restaurant but there are loads of places a few minutes walk away. Not a "resort hotel" we would actually want to spend a whole of time in, but
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to the Disneyland Resort.  Thank you very much for the lovely review and great feedback.  We were happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, and that you feel we are a good value while visiting the Disneyland area.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We were very happy with the two room suite we stayed in on the ground level. Asked for a ground level and parked at the door.  I am sure when it is busy season you wouldn't Be able to do that.  The office staff were extremely helpful and very pleasant.  The location is awesome as we walked to Disney three times and it is just two blocks away to the entrance.  Lots if restaurants around the corner and a three story outdoor plaza with a bowling alley if you are looking for something to do apart from Disney.  Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you so much for the lovely review and feedback, it's most helpful for us and to the other readers.  We hope to see you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great stay a short walk from Disneyland
Summary: Great place to stay while at Disneyland that isn't really expensive. It doesn't have a restaurant but there are many food options that are close. It does have a pool but we didn't have a chance to check it out.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the great rating you gave us and feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time your plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Can nit go wrong staying here. Stayed here for 6 nights through the end of August. 2 Kids <12, only a 5-10min walk to Disneyland. The rooms are exactly what you need considering you'll spend 12+ hrs a day at Disneyland / Universal. Flew in early from Melbourne as were able to get into the room around 10am which was brilliant after a 14hr flight. Rooms are comfortable and have enough size for a weeks stay. Laundry facilities good, pool is fine to cool off, and there are plenty of dining options around within a 5min walk & only 10min drive to the Outlets at Orange. CVS, Walgreens & 7/11 within a 2min walk for all kinds of supplies. Would 100% definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for taking the time to write your review from your stay with us in August.  You provided some great feedback and we know other guests reading the reviews will find this very helpful.    We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites on your next trip to Disneyland.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Last minute reservations were successful...I called early in the morning after someone had cancelled and we got a room at a reasonable rate.  I had called weeks earlier and was told they were totally booked for the date we needed.  Try, and try again if you can to get reservations.  Tripadvisor suggested this as one of the motels we try.  It worked out great for us.  Room was clean, comfortable and close to the elevator.  Motel is across the street from the entrance to Disneyland within walking distance and there are lots of people who stay here due to that reason.  We really enjoyed our stay here with the adjoining little market where you could buy coffee in the morning, and an ATM machine for cash.  Clerks at front desk very helpful and courteous.  We really enjoyed our stay
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We were happy to hear you were able to get in at the last minute.  It appears you were coming over one of Anaheim's large city wide convention's and we do tend to get some last minute cancellation's so glad you stayed on it.  We hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time your plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Just returned from a five night stay. We are a family of 4 with 2 boys ages 7 and 5. It was very conveniently located between Disney and the Garden walk. We walked to and from the amusement parks everyday. The hotel is themed like a castle (duh). I read some pretty tough reviews and almost didn't book this hotel but I'm glad we did. The beds were comfortable and rooms were clean. The decor was up to date. It is an older hotel but it's definitely been cared for. The front office and house keeping staff were courteous. Pizzatarian was a good break from Disneyland food, although the Chinese food place was gross. They have a gift shop attached to the hotel with drinks and snack and some souvenirs. Our room had a microwave and mini fridge. Only thing could make this better is a
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  It was nice to read you were able to enjoy some of the local restaurants around the Anaheim Resort and close to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Most guests that stay with us find the convenience of our location and how we are surrounded by numerous restaurants and shop's.  We are glad you found our gift shop on property a convenience as well.    We have surveyed many guests in the past, and most find that having complimentary parking and free wi fi are a much better savings than the breakfast option.     We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We were greeted by wonderful staff members after a 14 hour flight with a one year old. They couldn't have been anymore helpful with local knowledge on where to see eat and play. Rooms we nice and had plenty of space also conveniently located near Disneyland. Looking forward to staying again very soon
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the great review and feedback from your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Nice place, the kids liked the fact we were staying in a castle themed hotel it made their stay a little more on the magical. The hotel staff was very pleasant to deal with and very accommodating, The hotel is a little dated but very clean and had very large rooms and walking distance to several restaurants and only a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland park.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for taking the time to write your review and we hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Nice place, little dated but you get what you pay for.  Parking is limited. Within walking distance to Disneyland. I would stay again. Scooter rental available a plus! Desk clerks are very cheerful and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review and feedback.  We look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The office staff were pleasant and that is the only good thing about the place. The toilet blocked on first use. The shower alternated from freezing to scalding. Could not use the bath as it would not hold water. Hair dryer did not work. Beds were never made properly. The walkways were angled and wavy making it almost impossible to steer heavy luggageDark and dreary. Never again!!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate all feedback from our guest's.  We apologize you had an unpleasant experience.  Any issue reported to our staff is immediately addressed, or if there is an item that is not working properly, we will replace it.  In the future, if you decide to return, we would be happy to offer a change of room if your stay starts off on the wrong foot for any reason.  We try to ensure all walkways are well lit for our guest's and we inspect the property on a routine basis.  We were happy to hear you enjoyed the customer service from our guest service staff.  We work hard to insure all guests have a pleasant stay at the Castle Inn & Suites, and guest service is our top priority.  We will investigate all the items you reported in your review.  We encourage all guests to contact our front desk immediately during their stay to report any issue or concern they are having, so we can address it right away.  Please note that this is not the experience our guests have in general, and we hope you may reconsider returning to the the Castle Inn & Suites the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  If we can be of further assistance, please feel free to contact us at any time.  Sincerely.

Summary: We stayed here during our Disneyland trip and the staff helped to make it a wonderful experience.  We initially only booked for two nights, but on the second night we decided to extend for a night.  The staff went out of their way to ensure we had a room and didn't have to pack up all of our stuff.  The price is exceptional for the spacious rooms and the family suite is perfect for my large family.  We will be staying here again in the future.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and even ended up extending your visit.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I have visited Southern California on 10 occasions.  I had read a positive review of Castle Inn and Suites but did not stay there until 4 years ago.  I just returned from my fourth stay.  That is unusual for me to like something well enough to come back 3 more times.  No complaints. Comfortable rooms in good condition with comfortable beds. Office staff very polite and helpful especially Mark.  I just do not remember the other names.  Really nice being across the street from Disney Land especially in the morning watching everyone walking toward Disney entrance.  Will probably come back next year.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review.  We really appreciate the kind words and feedback.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great price for what you get
Summary: We stayed in a family suite (3 adults and 1 child) and it was pretty nice.  I have to say I wasn't expecting much and I was pleasantly surprised.  Disney entrances are about 10-15 minutes from door to gate...depending on how fast you walk.  Beds were pretty comfortable and bathrooms were nicely remodeled.  For what we paid, I would say it was a great value!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the review and feedback.  We hope you will visit us again the next time you are coming to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect stay for our 1st Disney trip!
Summary: We stayed here for our first Disneyland trip and we couldn't have been more impressed. My son loved the fact that it was castle themed and we loved that it was clean and affordable. We had our rooms cleaned daily and we really loved coming back to a spotless room after a long day at the parks.  This park is 2 lights away from Disney and it's located right next to a little strip mall with a subway and some souvenir shops. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We were so exited to hear this was your first trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate your review and the great feedback.  We hope you will make the Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed, across the street from Disneyland, for 4 days. The minute we arrived the staffs "wanted to know what they could do to assist us". With younger children they made it possible to get one of our two rooms early. They explained a secrete to get pass exceptionally long security lines; hire a cab for $9 and get dropped off at the Disneyland hotel. This saved us 1.5 hours. When one of our travel companion became ill they let us extend check out in one of our rooms until it was time to leave for the airport. It was a pleasure to deal with the staff and our special thanks and appreciation to Marc Timanus. Will see you again Marc.
Manager Response: Happy New Year!  Thank you very much for staying with us recently, we appreciate your very nice review.  We strive to provide first class guest service, so thank you for mentioning this in your review, and I'll insure our staff member Marc reads this review.  Have a great day, and we hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This property is situated very close to the entrance of Disneyland and multiple restaurants near by and within close walking distance.  The staff were all very friendly and willing to assist us with all out questions.  We rented a car for a couple days and this Inn offers free parking, you just need to let the desk clerk know. The outside looks a little outdated however the rooms we were told before booking had been recently updated and this was definitely true for our room.... It was clean and the beds were comfortable.  We only had one complaint which we never bothered to bring up but it was the temperature of both the tap and shower head were very temperamental staying at one temperature.  I would recommend this property to anyone looking for a reasonably priced place to stay
Manager Response: none

Summary: The property is located within walking distance to Disneyland and to an assortment of restaurant options.  The staff were fantastic and went out of their way to send on an item of clothing we had left behind.  Highly recommended for families
Manager Response: Happy New Year!  thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to write your review from your stay.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We arrived around 4 pm and our check in was quick and painless, the office staff was very helpful and seemed eager to help us enjoy our visit. The room was dated for sure but was clean and everything worked as expected,  We have stayed at 5 or 6 other hotels in the area and would book gladly here again. I believe it was a good value for the price considering it's proximity to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the feedback.  We updated all our guest rooms about 3 year's ago.  Due to our castle-theme, we elected to use the darker, richer fabrics and furnishings to compliment our theme.  Although some guests write that we are "dated", we actually are fairly new with our made in the USA Thomasville furniture.  We also painted the entire exterior of the hotel less than a year ago.    We understand that some feel we have the "dated" look but we think most of our guests appreciate our theme and the look & feel we are going for.  We hope you enjoyed your stay, and that you will come back to see us the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort.  Happy New Year!

Summary: Lovely hotel. Not a long walk from the main Disneyland entrance. Plenty of places to eat nearby. Rooms serviced daily and front desk staff were helpful. Room had a bar fridge, which was helpful to keep some small items of food and drink cold. Lots of parking available for guests, laundry facilities on site which is a must for those longer stays.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to write your review from your recent stay with us.  We were very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and our facilities and location worked well for you and your family.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This accommodation is motel style. The four floor complex has rooms of varying sizes and configurations.  Overall the decor is very dated, dark and unattractive. Fixtures and the general layout are showing their age.  Despite this, the rooms are generally clean and the beds comfortable.  No In-house dining but the area is well served by a range of take away eateries and restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate your feedback.  We are 3 diamond hotel with a Castle Theme, so we elected to go with the darker, richer fabrics and furnishings to compliment our castle theme.  We went through an extensive renovation in the fall of 2013.  A year ago we painted the entire exterior of the hotel, and installed all new A/C units.  We also have the top of the line door lock system and wi fi.    We realize guests may think we appear "dated" when in fact it is our intent to look as authentic as possible.  We have many guests that enjoy our fun castle theme, and we hope you will come back to see us the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: I was so happy with our stay!!! We stayed in a suite on the 3rd floor and it was so spacious. The rooms were really clean and you couldn't hear anything which I loved. We had a few of the Disneyland fireworks and the staff was more than friendly. I would definitely recommend this place to my friends
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay with us.  We greatly appreciate the feedback and we were very happy to hear you had an enjoyable stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Central location to Disneyland. The room was cleaned. Friendly helpful staff. We found the noise from outside did not come into our room. They have a little shop on the ground floor that was open till late at night.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review from your stay.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will keep Castle Inn & Suites in mind for your home away from home.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I was extremely pleased with this hotel! It's a fun place to stay, the outside aesthetic of the hotel is awesome. It was a great deal, especially at this time of year, and there were no hidden fees. I loved the location, just a 5 minute walk from the parks. We had no trouble parking, and the best part was that it was free! The staff was extremely nice and informative as well. Super pleased with the room, it was clean and felt homey. I had previously stayed at the Camelot Inn for a much higher price, and the rooms here surpassed the room at the Camelot! Totally recommend this place.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  It was great to hear you enjoyed our property, location and staff.    We appreciate you taking the time to write your review, and look forward to your next visit at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Angel the representative took care of me and my group fm Las Vegas when I booked the wrong weekend.  I was panicked but Angel was my angel and made our Disney trip so memorable.  Also want to recognize Drake.  What a nice guy and helpful too.  I left my glasses at the counter and he tracked me down to return them.  Not used to that type of hospitality.  These two men made our weekend memorable and we will definitely be back.  Thank you so much... Ps...love the Minnie Bow on the toilet paper.  Magical touch!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to write your review.  It was so nice to hear you had a memorable stay, and our team members were helpful.  We strive to provide top-notch guest service, so thank you again for recognizing our staff.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: On arrival i were greeted by friendly staff,had great stay,Walking distance to Disneyland. and california adventures and resturants in area.Prices are reasonable. Loved the little gift store.Would be  happy to stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide our review from your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: On arrival i  were greeted by friendly staff. The rooms are clean . all Staff are friendly and helpful. I would happily stay there again. It is a 10 min walk to the entrance to Disneyland. if you are on a budget this might be a place for you.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide your review and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Had an wonderful stay with the family. Staff was awesome. The front desk worker Alberta was very friendly and professional. Would take the family back.... I would recommend Friends and family to stay. Walking distance to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and for providing your review from your stay.  We appreciate the comment regarding our front desk staff and we will certainly pass this along.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We spent 4 nights here last week. It was clean, spacious and the employees were really nice. We received free parking and the  4th night was free! It was really close to Disney. We will stay there again!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We greatly appreciate the 5 stars and great feedback.  We hope to see you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed on a Friday night.  The staff is so friendly, very professional and helpful with whatever we needed.  Our room was very clean and comfortable.  This was our first time here and will will definitely stay here anytime we visit Disneyland or Anaheim.  Thank you Castle Inn & Suites for a great place to stay!!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We enjoyed hearing you enjoyed your stay, our rooms and friendly staff.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We rented a family suite for the space with 2 teenagers.  The rooms are dated and to our puzzlement had no in room safe for storing your valuables.  The bathrooms were well maintained.  There is only one elevator for guests & staff so it can get busy in the mornings.  There is no shuttle from this hotel and it is a fair walk but not terribly long.  The hotel across the street had a shuttle though.  Overall the staff was friendly and accommodating.  I would stay at a hotel closed to the entrance next time though.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently for your family birthday celebration.  We have recently updated all of our guest rooms with beautiful, rich made in the USA furniture.  We elected to go with the darker, richer fabric's and furnishing's to compliment our castle-theme property.  We felt going with a more modern look would not do us justice, so we hope you can appreciate that.  We offer 2 elevators on our property, one in each corner of the building's.  We are considered a hotel within "walking distance" so no shuttle is required from our hotel.  Many guest's enjoy the stroll across the street, and you can get stuck in a shuttle and make numerous stops before you hit the main entrance.  Once again, thank you for staying with us, and providing your feedback, we really appreciate it.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We arrived on SAT Nov 19th around Noon.  We had reservation for a Family suite.  We drove down from Nor Cal and we planned on not being able to get into our room til 4pm... to our surprise the room was ready.  The room had a king bed in one room and the other room had 2 queens. It was clean, smelled good too.  Air Con worked fantastic.  Plenty of towels.  Pool was nice and the hot tub was a perfect temp...we used that each night we were there.  Its about a 10 min walk to DL/DCA.  ALL staff were kind and helpful.  I would stay here again in a heart beat.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to write your review.    We were so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we appreciate receiving all 5's.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: The Best Place to stay in the Disneyland area
Summary: When you need an overnight stay in the Disneyland area, you can't do better than the Castle Inn & Suites.  They offer clean comfortable rooms at very reasonable prices.  The friendly staff was extremely helpful.  I especially want to put in a good word for Briana who checked us in.  Another plus is the location:  Literally within a short walking distance to the Main Gate of Disneyland, so you can leave your car behind.  ANOTHER  HUGE PLUS:  My wife is disabled, so any time a Disneyland hotel has elevators to get to higher floors, it's an automatic bonus.....BUT ON TOP OF THAT:  The Castle Inn & Suites offers motorized electric carts for the disabled right in their lobby!  Disneyland charges $70 (including a refundable $20 Deposit) to rent these motorized carts, and they can't
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the wonderful feedback and all 5's.  We strive to insure our guest's are well looked after and have a great stay.    It is always great to provide some feedback from your stay as we know other guest's do read the review's.  Although we personally don't rent scooter's and wheelchair's at the Castle Inn, we do provide our guest's a phone number to organize these in advance so they are waiting for them when they arrive.  We do hear it's much easier than organizing them at the park.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Very nice suite for three people going to Disneyland
Summary: We had a lovely stay in a two bed suite. We were a short distance from Disneyland and restaurants nearby. We would definitely stay here again. The only thing that would have made it perfect would have been a little continental breakfast.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying at the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to the Anaheim Resort.    We feel providing complimentary parking and complimentary wi fi and no resort fee is a better value to our guest's than a free breakfast, due to the fact there are so many restaurants around the hotel for breakfast, lunch and dinner.   We look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great stay and upgrade to boot!
Summary: Stayed here over my fall break for the Halloween fun at Disneyland. Got a surprise upgrade to a family suite!!! Stayed for 4 nights. Everything was very clean and staff attentive and accommodating. Just wish coffee was refilled daily. When I called for more a staff member arrived with reinforcements.  Will be staying here again for the Christmas themed fun at Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your stay in October.  We were happy to hear you received a free upgrade.  When you return in December make sure you let us know you would like extra coffee in your room each day and we will be happy to insure this is taken care of for you.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We recently enjoyed our Disneyland break here. This was our third stay at the property and we were not disappointed.  The staff here are wonderful - friendly and helpful.  Rooms are comfortable and clean. We love the location as it is a short 5 minute walk to Disneyland or if we want to have dinner at a nice restaurant a 5 minute walk to Gardenwalk where you will find restaurants such as Bubba Gumps, Cheesecake Factory and PFChangs. The rooms are a little dark but this didn't bother us as we only sleep in the room.  We would stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently and for being a valued returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.   We understand the comment about the rooms being a "little dark", but we elected to go with the darker, richer fabrics and furnishings to compliment our property.  The more modern, lighter furniture and bedding would just not work at our property.  We hope you can appreciate this, and again, thank you for the feedback.  We hope to see you again, the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I always stay here when I take my niece to Disneyland. First and foremost, this hotel is clean, comfortable and great value. Although the rooms are a little dated and dark, they're spotless. All of the staff are super friendly, and it's closer to many restaurants. It is also only a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland gates.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a valued returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were glad to hear you stay with us when you take your niece to Disneyland.    Although some guests may think our rooms are "dated" they were all actually fully renovated the Fall of 2013, so all very knew and updated.  Due to our castle-theme, we elected to go with the darker, richer fabrics and such to compliment our property.  Once again, thank you for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Below average hotel, with below average price
Summary: I'm kind of confused why this place has such great trip advisor reviews.. We just got home from a 6 night stay at this hotel. I knew going into my stay the hotel was outdated but for the price I thought it'd be worth it. I had two big concerns with this place. 1. When we first arrived, the room was not very clean. There was hair from previous guests all over the floor of the bathroom and on the blankets on the bed. Gross! The rest of the stay the cleanliness was better. 2. The first night all I wanted to do was take a nice hot shower after a LONG day of traveling/ being at Disneyland. Unfortunately, after being in the shower for not even a minute the water went very cold. (My parents were in the room next to us and the same thing happened to them). For the rest of the night the
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for providing your feedback.  We apologize we fell short in making your stay a memorable one.  Our property was recently renovated, so I realize you felt it may be outdated, but it is a castle-theme, with all new guest rooms.  We elected to go with the darker, richer fabrics and furnishings to compliment our rooms, as the white, stark, modern feel would not work well at our property.  We offer complimentary safety deposit boxes at our front desk for wallets, passports, etc.    We are sorry you had an issue with the water temperature, this was an isolated situation and one that could have been easily addressed, so we hope you brought this to the attention of our front desk staff.  Once again, we appreciate the feedback and hope you may give us another try the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Regards,

Summary: I checked out of this hotel this morning after a five-night visit. I am very glad we stayed at the Castle Inn. The price was fantastic compared to other hotels in the area. The free parking was a great benefit and also saved us a lot. The hotel was a ten-minute walk to Disneyland which was closer than other hotels, including some of the official Disney ones. We got a 1BR suite so nap time with our toddler was very easy. The mini fridge meant we could buy milk and cereal to have breakfast in the hotel. (The hotel does NOT offer free breakfast.) We did not use the pool so I'm not sure about that.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to post your review from your stay.  We hope you will keep us in mind the next time you have plans to visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Disneyland vacation. Excellent quality for the price.
Summary: Stayed here 3 nights.  Can't beat the value and location!  Rooms are a bit dated but they are clean, comfortable and large.  Good air-con and water pressure. Rooms have fridge and microwave. Convenience store onsite. Pool and hot-tub area is small and very basic but clean. Kids loved it.  Friendly, helpful staff.  The exterior's castle theme is dated but cute.  Only a short 5 minute walk to Disneyland's main entrance and many restaurants.  Will stay here again for our next family trip to Disney!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to write your review.  We appreciate the great feedback.  We realize many guests assume our rooms are "dated", however, they were all recently renovated the Fall of 2013.  We elected to go with the darker, richer fabrics and furnishings to compliment the castle-theme.  The more modern, white, bedding, and lighter furniture would just not work at our property, so we hope our guests understand this.    Thank you for mentioning our friendly, and helpful staff, we do take pride in the first class hospitality we deliver.  Once again, we appreciate the feedback and look forward to having you return to the Castle in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great place to stay close to Disney
Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites in October our first visit to Arnaheim. It is in a good location with free parking and walking distance to the Disney Parks,there are plenty of shops and restaurants in the vacinity. We had a family suite which was plenty big enough for the 5 of us 1 bedroom with a king bed and the 2nd with two Queen beds and a vanity sink. We loved the theme of the place especially the reception area. We didn't use it but there is an on- site shop,pool and jacuzzi.We found all the staff to be very friendly. Would recommend a stay here excellent value.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us in October.  We appreciate the review and feedback from your stay.  We hope you will keep Castle Inn & Suites in mind the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Boiler went out, no hot water
Summary: After a long hot day at Disney land the first thing you want to do is take a hot shower and climb into a clean bed and sleep. Nope!  No hot water.   Called around 9:00pm, I am writing this review at 11:00pm.   Still can't take my shower.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We apologize for any inconvenience that may have occurred during your visit.  After the initial report we acted immediately to contact our professional boiler repair service.  We were fortunate to be able to get a tech out to the hotel on a Sunday night within a short time.  Within a few hours of arriving to the property the issue was resolved.  The company worked late into the evening and hot water was restored to all rooms at approximately midnight.  We hope that you understand and enjoy your stay at the hotel.  Our staff is available 24 hours per day to assist you.

Summary: We booked this via Trip Advisor a few month early. Looking for a place within walking distance to Disneyland and a space large enough for our family.  We booked the family suite and loved the extra room (with a door) so we all did not have to have the same bed time. It was clean and the staff was very friendly and helpful, from the desk clerks to housekeeping.  We have stayed a few locations near Disneyland and this is the favorite so far for us and our needs.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to the Castle Inn & Suites!  We appreciate you taking the time out to write a review of your stay.  The Family Suite is a great room type as mentioned with a door that separates the two rooms.  With two televisions, two hairdryers, a refrigerator and microwave they have the perfect set up for a family of up to 6 people.  We are very happy to be the new favorite place to stay!  Hope to see you next time you visit Disneyland!

Summary: Was about 5 minutes walking distance to the convention center where i had a to attend a program and was also close to a little shopping complex which had subway and a Chinese restaurant for easy access to food and other things.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay.  We appreciate the feedback and hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Good location to Disneyland, microwave & fridge in room. Clean, basic room. Nothing fancy but a bit more expensive than another hotel we had stayed at. I guess your paying more to be closer and because the outside looks fancy. It's not a bad hotel, but felt like I would get a little more for my money.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for providing your feedback from your stay.  We hope you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Smells and the pipes make noise
Summary: First I have stayed in many hotels in the area and all over the country and I have to say for the price and location this hotel should have been a great experiance for me and my autistic teenager. I arrive in the afternoon early evening. First person i encountered was a young girl with wavy hair with an attitude. The othere women that was there was about 40's between 50's she was very nice to my son. I asked for a quiet area and a room on the top floor. The area was quiet but the fauset smelled like rotten eggs. I called the front desk and told them the issue and they said the maintance person would take a look at it. About 30 mins later a man shows up with a bottle of shout. Yes shout and sprays the sink and leaves. That did not help nor did it fix the problem. The guy at the
Manager Response: none

Summary: 11/4/16- went to the Castle Inn And Suites website to book a room for early December. There was 1 room left and when I tried to book it using the Military Discount the gentleman at the reservation desk said" That since room was the last room of this kind available, that the military discount would not apply."  I quickly told him thanks for supporting the military and told him that I would book a room at another hotel which I did that accepts Military and it was a cheaper price,  This savings allowed me to rent a scooter for my wife from Apple Scooters.  The reservation clerk told me that this was a good and reliable place to rent a scooter so my wife could enjoy Disneyland.  So all you Military brothers and sisters, think twice before booking at Castle Inn & Suites across the
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Castle Inn and Suites are perfectly located with only a 5 minute walk to Disneyland. The rooms are spacious and kept very clean, the front desk staff are so pleasant and more then helpful. It is very close to dining options and convenience stores.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We really appreciate the nice review and hope you will come back to see us the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Room was spacious with both a microwave and a refrigerator. It was actually larger than a well-known Las Vegas hotel on the strip that didn't have a microwave and fridge. Location is perfect, just a 5-minute brisk walk to Disneyland Park. Staff was first class and you can't beat the free guest parking!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review and feedback.  We do think our rooms are very spacious and well appointed.  We hope the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort, you will come visit us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Mahalo,

Summary Heading: Great price and always great service
Summary: We stay here every time we go to Disneyland and we always have a great experience the price is perfect the distance to the park is perfect and it's clean can't ask for much more when you're trying to save some money. Disney can be very expensive you will rarely be at the hotel for a long period so this one is perfect. The only downside is the water temperature can be difficult to figure out my wife never has an issue so maybe it's just me.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We pride ourselves on our great service, so thank you for commenting on that.  We are sorry to hear you had some difficulty with the water temperature.  If you return one day to stay with us and have any concerns at all, we are here 24 hours a day to assist, so feel free to contact our guest service agents at any time to help.  Thank you again,

Summary: We ended up here by chance because the other place we booked didn't have a room the night we showed up. So we booked a night here. Walked in the room and then went back downstairs to book the whole weekend. The room was amazing perfect size for all of us. Staff was beyond friendly and helpful. We will be back in a month and staying here again! Thanks castle inn and suites staff for making it so nice for us! See you soon.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was traveling with my 2 kids aged 8 & 9 and all 3 of us loved our stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!! It has so much going for it - right across the road from Disneyland - Close walking distance to Subway, McDonald's, Denny's, 7Eleven, Pharmacies and lots more - Friendly and helpful staff - Brilliant castle theme & feel throughout - Always clean & great sized rooms with air conditioning, mini fridge and microwave -  Good pool and spa area - A laundry with clothes washing and drying facilities!! I would definitely stay again and will recommend to family and friends :)
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great review and feedback, and look forward to welcoming you back one day in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I am a single traveler and the castle inn has exceeded my expectations! There staff the night of the 26th were amazing and I am so happy I picked here to stay while doing my solo Disney trip! The room was amazing and comfortable. Will stay again!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently and taking the time to provide your review.  We were very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and will come back to see us again.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The hotel is basic but decent.  It's walking distance to Disneyland/California Adventures and the Gardenwalk of Anaheim which has a lot of restaurants such as Cheesecake Factory, Roy's & CPK.  If you just need a place to crash, then this is definitely worth it.  The staff is nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent trip to the Disneyland Area.  We appreciate the review, and hope you will think of the Castle Inn & Suites the next time you visit the area.  Warm Regards,

Summary: Not far from Disneyland and great spot as not congested with every one trying to get in and out of Disney. The rooms were spacious and clean and the theme was cool. Enjoyed the pool and surrounding shops and restaurants which were very handy. The price was right as well good value and the staff all were friendly.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to the Disneyland area.  We appreciate the review and great feedback.    We hope if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort, you will think of the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: The hotel is located right across the street from Disneyland Resort and Downtown Disney.   The staff at reception were great and had a lot of knowledge of the area. We were dealt with quickly and were in our room in no time at all.  We stayed in a standard room which was very spacious, and comfortable at a great price. The room was cleaned each day to a high standard.   We didn't use the pool area due to not having enough time and it also seemed small for the number of rooms. This was not a problem to us as we were not here to lie by the pool. If you are looking for a hotel with a large pool and sun deck take a look at the website first as this may not be for you.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the review and feedback.  We hope to see you in the near future if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: older hotel but price was good
Summary: Walking distance to Disney. Free parking.  Rooms are very dark with dark carpet and decor.  Pool is very small but cooled you off after a break from Disneyland. Asked for a 1st floor room but ended up with second floor, no big deal the elevator was right by our door.   Price was also a plus.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.
