We are actually newer than many of the properties on Harbor Blvd.  We also remodeled all of our guest rooms recently,  and elected to go with the darker, richer fabrics and furnishings to compliment our castle-theme.  We realize many people are used to the white, lighter wood, modern furniture, but this would just not suit our property.    Thank you again for your review and we hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Stayed here for a week with my family. We got rooms next to each other and the staff, as always, was very friendly. They helped us get a tour to universal and they check out and check it ran flawlessly.   Definitely my choice of hotel for Disneyland! Plus, it's a short walk to the parks from the hotel! ;)
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and providing a review of your stay.  We appreciate the 5 stars and feedback and look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here while at Disneyland. It is so close, perfect location. The room was actually nicer than I was expecting. The hotel is older but still very nice. This may be my new favorite at Disneyland. The staff were great, very friendly and helpful. The room was plenty large. I rented a scooter and it fit in nicely.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review.  We were thrilled to hear you enjoyed the hotel and that you will come back to see us again.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Pros - very close to disneyland. House keeping very good and polite, reception staff very very helpful with areas on what to do and where to go. Cons - moldy smell, no fresh air as no windows could be open.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for providing your feedback from your recent stay.  We hope you reported your concern to our front desk staff so we were able to investigate the odor you experienced.  In most cases, it's an easy solution to fix, so we hope we were able to fix this during your stay.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Excellent hotel very clean and staff always willing to help nice pool and close to Disneyland. Staff very knowledgable with local foods and also best ways to get around town and organising taxis for us, will stay again on our next trip.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent visit.  We thank you for the kind words and we look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Our room was depressingly dark even with the lights on - dark furnishings, dark carpet and dark decor.  Not a fancy hotel and a bit older in age, but sufficient for our needs, and it was in a very convenient location to the Disney parks.  I liked that the car parking was free and there were a few shops and restaurants close by.  Couldn't hear the traffic noise at all.  WIFI was very temperamental and best signal was just outside our room.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us in September.  Due to our castle-theme, we have designed our guest rooms in the darker, richer fabrics and furnishings.  The lighter, white furniture would not compliment our theme.  The hotel was built in the late 80's, so we are newer than some properties in town, but we recently did a full room renovation in 2013 and most recently painted the exterior of the hotel.    We also upgraded our WI FI system recently and have very fast connection.  Most guests comment on how great our WI FI is. We apologize you may have experienced an isolated situation, and we hope you reported this to the front desk team so we could have looked in to the concern while you were here in house.  Once again, thank you for the feedback.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Clean, excellent location, all amenities are very close.  No reason not to choose this place.  The pool area is very small but excellent to take a break and cool off between tours.  Walgreens, CVS, take out and restaurants all within a block.  Also a mall, and a ~ $10 Uber ride to larger malls from here.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently, and providing your review from your stay.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards.

Summary Heading: Cleanest hotel I've ever stayed in.
Summary: I stayed here for a Disneyland half marathon and it was perfect!  A short, easy walk to the amusement parks' entrances, plenty of parking, and seriously - the cleanest hotel room ever.  The bathroom sparkled and they even had one of those covers on the remote control which give me so much confidence in everything being germ-free.  The beds were comfortable, I'd describe the decor as "mild renaissance fair," and the staff were extremely pleasant and professional.  I highly recommend Castle Inn and Suites!
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for your kind words and review of your recent stay with us.  We know other guests read review's and we appreciate the awesome feedback and comments you provided.  Thank you so much for the recommendation and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: I didn't know what to expect of the Castle Inn with the mixed reviews but I was pleasantly surprised. I love the layout of the room, having the sink and mirror outside the bathroom was perfect for two 25 year old girls staying for 6 nights trying to get ready in the morning! The rooms are comfortable and clean and the wifi was the best connection we had our whole time in America! We didn't use the pool but it looked decent. Of course it was also so close to the Disney parks, 5 minute walk! My only complaint would be the tv kept freezing when we would try to watch it of a night. I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello from the Castle Inn & Suites,  Thank you for choosing us for your recent trip to Disneyland, and for taking the time to provide a review from your stay.  We appreciate the feedback and hope you will keep us in mind the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We chose this hotel after staying there before through Get Away Today and decided to stay there last weekend since it's so close to Disneyland.  They offer free parking and let us drop our car off before check in.  They even gave us a free upgrade to their mini suite which was very nice.  There aren't a lot of frills with this hotel, but that's okay for us as we are there for Disneyland.  Am planning another trip next month and already booked our room with Castle Inn.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your stay with us recently.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great location and a lovely room
Summary: We stayed Sept 6th - 10th. We started in one room which was ok and ended in a nice suite which was lovely. The rooms were clean and fresh. The staff are very helpful and friendly. We didn't use the pool but it was popular with kids. SO close to Disney that we walked to the main gate. Denny's and Ihop nearby as well as many other inexpensive food places.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the review and hope you will keep us in mind for any future trips to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I booked a trip to California specifically to visit Disneyland, so this review is based on that goal. Castle Inn and Suites is an older hotel that has a fun appearance. We were all adults staying there, but I am sure it would thrill little ones to be in a castle.   Our party arrived about 10:00 am, subsequently  our room was not ready yet. The front desk checked us in a put our bags in storage so we were able to head right over to the park. The map has the distance as .5 miles from the park . We only crossed one street to get to the corner where we crossed to enter Disney property. It was a very short walk, which is so nice when you're feet are tired from walking all day in the park.  This hotel is on the park side of Disney property so you don't have to walk through Downtown
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us in September.  We appreciate the detailed review you provided as we know other guests read the Trip Advisor reviews, you provided some great information.  We were sorry to hear you could not locate the TV channel guide located in the Guest Directory, so if you return one day in the future, please make sure you check the Guest Directory and if it's missing, contact the Front Desk right away.  Our pillows are fairly new, so again, we can always change these out if the ones in your room are not to your liking.  We have many guests that love them, and even want to buy them, where others feel they may not be right for them.  Just remember, we are here to assist when you are a guest in the hotel, and we will insure you have what you need to insure you have a comfortable, and memorable stay.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Highly recommended for location, cleanliness, and comfort!
Summary: We chose this hotel based on the recommendation of a friend through a Get Away Today package. She suggested it based on its location close to Disney. We were pleasantly surprised with the ease of parking on-site, proximity to numerous restaurants and Disney, the little convenience store available, and most of all, the hotel room was VERY clean each day and the beds/pillows were more comfortable than we've had in more affordable hotels. We would go back in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great feedback, and we were happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed the hotel and our location.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great room and SO close to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn due to it's close proximity to Disneyland Entrance.  After reading mixed reviews of many of the hotels/motels in this area,  I was pleasantly surprised by how nice the rooms were for the price!  They were nicely decorated and very clean.  The staff at the front desk were extremely friendly and accomodating.  The very short walk (about a 10 minute stroll)  to Disneyland was awesome!  We loved being able to avoid the shuttle system.  There is a convenience store on property, so it was great to be able to stock up on water/snacks in the morning or late evening.  I would recommend the Castle Inn and would stay there again.
Manager Response: We appreciate the great review and feedback from your recent trip.  It was nice to hear our hotel and our location worked well for you and your family.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Affordable, comfortable, and short/easy walk to Disneyland
Summary: Location is perfect with a 10 min walk to Disneyland! Stayed with husband, 3 kids, and mom in family suite which was comfortable and sufficient in terms of space. Free parking is great too! Market with food and souvenirs onsite. Clean rooms, nothing fancy but when going to Disneyland, we really only sleep in the room so "fancy" isn't necessary. Better price option compared to others nearby.  No free breakfast like many others around which would have been nice to offset high food prices in the parks. But that's not really a complaint, just a suggestion. Pool isn't very appealing as its right in the middle of the parking lot -would be better to plant some bushes/trees around so it has some privacy from cars driving around and doesn't have parking lot view. Also the room view is
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent visit.   We appreciate your feedback and suggestions.     We look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for my son's birthday trip and we all loved it. We were a group of 3 (2 adults and 1 child who turned 4 during the trip) and so we got a double queen room. It was amazing. My son loved it and didn't want to leave. It was maybe a 10 minute walk from disneyland which wasn't bad at all. The only problem I had were the amount of channels there were (as in not enough). But overall I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the review and your feedback.  We hope you will come stay with us again, the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great location for Disney at reasonable prices
Summary: My daughter and i have just stayed at this hotel. We stayed 10days in total. It is nice and close to Disneyland and California adventure park.  Maybe an 8 minutes walk, if that. We loved it. Would definitely stay here again. My daughter also loved it because it looks like a castle.  She loved the pool and the hot tub too.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great review and we were happy to read you and your daughter enjoyed the hotel, the pool and our location.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at Caste Inn, it was good on the wallet and the free and speedy wifi was a plus for me as this is very important when im travelling to have wifi (preferabely that i dont have to pay for) The only downfall was the room was a bit smelly, i think it was the air conditioner so i would go and sit by the pool to get fresh air because it didn't smell very nice. The Inn is old and a bit run down and does need a bit of a pick up in terms of rooms and furniture. But other then that the rooms were spacious and the staff were lovely.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review from your recent stay with us.  We have new air conditioner unit's, so we apologize there was an odor coming from yours.  We hope you notified the front desk so we could address this and insure it's ready for the next guest.  We are just about 3 years in to our newly renovated rooms.  We went with made in the USA top of the line Thomasville furniture and elected the darker, richer fabrics and furnishings to compliment our castle-theme hotel.  Guests that are maybe used to the lighter, stark white/beige theme rooms assume ours are "older" or "run down", but in our case it is the opposite.  We appreciate the feedback and hope you will keep us in mind the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This hotel was a 10 minute walk to Disneyland and I paid $150 a night, which was fair. The room was extremely clean and smelled fresh. AC worked well and blackout curtains were appreciated. However, the beds were hard and only stiff, uncomfortable foam pillows were available. I could hear the guests above us as they walked around their room, so the sound proofing between levels was minimal. The elevator was slow and did not work at all our second day. Free parking was a plus. Overall, I would likely not choose to stay here again, but potentially would if it was all that was available at the right price. My daughter loved the exterior castle theme.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  We have new Serta sleeper mattress' and most guests find them very comfortable, but we also realize not all guests may have the same feeling.  We also have guests from all over the world asking us to purchase our pillows, but again, not all guests may find them to their liking.  We do appreciate your feedback, and hope you will stay with us the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We went to Disneyland and booked via Flight Centre for air and hotel. I chose to stay at this hotel because of the relatively high rating it has here on Tripadvisor,  Pros: Very close to convenient stores such as Walgreens, CVS Pharmacy, 7-11, and a little strip mall with some Chinese Food, Subway, Burger, Mexican and Pizza place to eat. There is also a souvenir place inside this strip mall with some things that you can grab for cheaper than at Downtown Disney, as well as an "A-Mart" beside the 7-11 that sells the same type of souvenirs such as T-shirts, mugs, key chains, etc. As people have mentioned, even though this motel is older, it is kept very clean. I was really happy with the size of the room, we had a 2 Queen room and it was larger than the ones we stayed at before at
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate your detailed feedback as it is very helpful to other guests reading the reviews.    We hope the next time you visit the Disneyland area, you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This was our first stay at the Castle Inn, but definitely not our last!  ENTIRE staff were so friendly and accommodating.  It's only two blocks from the Disney walk in entry, but I asked if they offered shuttle service to the Park.  They don't, because it is so close.  I explained that my wife and I have ADA issues and needed to get to the park to rent Disney ADA carts.  Without hesitation, the desk clerk made a phone call and asked if delivery in ten minutes would work for us!  By the time our bags were in our AWESOME ADA room, our carts had arrived and we were off to the park!  The staff even recharged them, nightly!  :)  BTW, these carts were as nice as the Disney carts...but cheaper and far more convenient!  :)  Thanks, Castle Inn, we'll be back again soon!!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  Your feedback and review was very much appreciated.  Our goal is to always meet our guests expectations, so we are happy we achieved this.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We had a perfect stay here, aside from the obvious age of the venue, it is clean, safe and the rooms are spacious, well made up and the best are soft enough to get a good nights sleep. Staff couldnt be more helpfull and is located less then 100m from disney main entrance and multiple places to eat, walmart and CVS.  did i mention.. .ITS A CASTLE !!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the kind words and great feedback from your review.  We were happy to read we were the "spot" for you and your family.    We hope you will always make the Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Walking distance to Disneyland and to restaurants and supermarkets
Summary: Iconic looking Castle Inn is two blocks from Disneyland, easy walking distance, and close enough to go home for an afternoon nap before returning to Disneyland for the fireworks.  We had two double beds, table and chair setting, as well as fridge, coffee maker and microwave. The Room and bathroom were clean and well kept - with more towels provided than most hotels provide.  There was a pool and hot tub available as well as a laundry room.  Just up the road there are two supermarkets - which have food, drinks, alcohol and pharmacy.  Restaurants are nearby, including subway.  An excellent chinese restaurant is virtually next door - and they deliver to the hotel.  Desk staff were friendly and very helpful for whatever we needed.  We were able to leave our luggage with them for the
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for taking the time to write a review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were happy to hear our location and hotel worked well for you and your family.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Room was clean, staff were friendly. Great location. Only a short walk to Disneyland one way and gardenwalk the other way (restaurants like pf changs, cheescake factory, bubba gump). Close to Walgreens and CVS.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip with friends to Disneyland.  Your feedback is very much appreciated, and we hope you will return one day when visiting the Anaheim Resort.  Warm Regards,

Summary Heading: Excellent spot for Disney Travelers on a Budget!
Summary: The Castle Inn and Suites is a good, safe and clean hotel with a wonderful staff and great location. We stayed for 4 nights and every staff member we encountered was friendly and welcoming. The room was basic, but very clean and comfortable. I had a small, but embarrassing, accident with a window during our stay and the staff was very lovely about it. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay near Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the review and feedback from your visit.  We do hope to see you again the next time you plan to visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed at The Castle Inn and Suites for 3 nights with our children and grandchildren to visit Disneyland. They have rooms large enough to accommodate a family at reasonable prices. The positives- clean, close to the park (10 minute walk),friendly front desk personnel, little mini- mart on site for treats, inexpensive pricing, decent furnishings, flat screen TVs , micro-wave , refrigerator The negatives- noisy parking lot, this is a motel...doors open to outside, many people left their doors open so you could look into their rooms , air conditioning is loud, one very small trash can for the whole room So....if you want an inexpensive place to stay that is clean, with no frills, this is the place for you. If you like perks and deluxe accomodations, this would not be in that
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay.  We appreciate all feedback so thank you for that.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: A really fun place to stay!  I stayed here for a birthday trip to Disneyland.  The hotel knew it was my birthday and even gave me a birthday card and a crown. That was really nice. We upgraded to a suite and had a view of the Disney fireworks from our room.  The room was huge - almost too much space if you could believe that.  There were also two sinks - one outside the bathroom so that helps if you have multiple people staying in the room.  Mini fridge and microwave were great to have as well - we walked to nearby stores and got some food and beverages for the room.  Only complaint is that the room was too dim and there was not enough lamps/lightning.  So it was almost like our room was an upscale dungeon (haha). The medieval castle theme is fun for a few days. You can pretend
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the kind words and feedback.    We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: Great place to say very close to Disneyland and very helpful staff. Great pool .rooms cleaned everyday New towels and clean sheets. No complaints . All restaurants within walking distance.would  definitely make a returning visit.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate you taking the time to write your review and provide great feedback.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We were there for 3 nights and we had a really pleasant stay. It is close to Disneyland and food places. The staff are really accommodating. The hair dryer was broken but they replaced it right away. I will be coming back there for my next visit to Disneyland.  Thank you again for the great service.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the review and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Visited Castle Inn and Suites for a 2 nights while visiting Disneyland for the first time. This hotel is absolutely great for the price. The hotel is castled themed and looks great at night. The room was okay, some outdated furniture but was very clean. I would recommend this hotel to anyone!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Because we are a castle-theme hotel, our decor is in the rich, darker fabrics and furnishings to compliment our theme.  The white, stark, corporate room feel would just not fit with our property.  All rooms were recently renovated and feature made in america top of the line furniture.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This was our first time staying here, and we loved everything about it. The price with our Disneyland annual pass was excellent and the location was perfect. It took us about 8 minutes to walk to Disneyland. I am a huge neat freak when it comes to hotels, and I always check everything the second I walk in. This was one of the cleanest hotel rooms I've ever stayed in. No dust or hair in the corners of the bathroom, and the beds were very clean and tidy. the beds were very comfortable and with the exception of kids running back and forth in the room above us (which the front desk took care of promptly when we called), we wouldn't change a thing. The front desk attendants were extremely friendly and helpful (and the lobby is gorgeous!) We were so happy with our stay and will
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We greatly appreciate the wonderful review you gave us, and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Thank you again,  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay if You Don't Need WiFi
Summary: I requested 2 queen beds in a connecting room and they were able to accommodate.  Rooms 235 & 236 are connecting and relatively spacious.  They do not have rooms that face the Disneyland fireworks show nor do they offer shuttle service.  Each room had a microwave, hair dryer, TV (but some of the channels had buffering issues), mini refrigerator, small table w/2 chairs, and armoire.  The beds were in great condition as well as the pillows & linens. They have a small pool.  We arrived very early in the morning and management allowed us to park and enjoy the amusement parks.  The location to Disneyland is about a 10-15 min walk. They do not provide or offer breakfast.  I would definitely stay there again but I would check to see if Camelot Inn and Suites was available first since
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the review and feedback.  We do our best to provide early check in as much as possible.  If you were here over Labor Day weekend, this may not have been possible due to a busy weekend and the Disney marathon.      We also have enhanced wi fi and never seem to have any issues in this area, we apologize for that and think it may have been an isolated situation.  Once again, thank you for your review and hope to see you again in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Meets all basic needs for a good price
Summary: Stayed here for a week at Disneyland in August 2016. Hotel meets all our basic needs since we didn't spend much time in the room except for sleeping. Room was very clean, a bit larger in depth so it had space for two tables, beds were comfortable, had fridge and microwave, and wifi. Check in and checkout was easy. As our Disneyland express bus pickup was not until 3 PM, we were also able to leave our bags after checkout. Easy walking distance to Disneyland and right across the street is a 7-11, CVS pharmacy and Walgreen for picking up sandwiches, snacks and drinks to take to the park. We were able to book at a really good price at a 40% discount sale.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review and your feedback, and hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Damp smell from the aircon, dark room and old, the bedsheet not fitted. The positive about this hotel is location which walking distance to Disneyland (about 15 minutes) and it has microwave. Mark in front desk is very informative and helpful instead of Alma who doesn't know anything.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback from your recent visit.  We are sorry to hear you had some concerns with your room.  Due to our "castle" theme, we have darker, richer, fabrics and furnishings and realize some guests feel our rooms are dark, but they are intended to be more on the softer side, then the stark, white rooms most hotel's use.  We hope you reported any concerns to our front desk staff so we could assist you while you were still in house.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We only stayed one night, but our experience was good.  It's a short walk to Disneyland from the hotel.  I got to leave my car until 3 PM the next day, which was good for me as a Passholder.  Our room had two queen size beds and plenty of room for 3 people to not run into each other.  We would stay again!
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate you taking the time to write your review and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for 10 days on a joint birthday trip for my sister and my daughter and it was excellent!  We had very comfortable conjoined rooms. The beds were comfortable, they had a crib for my daughter, and a little fridge and microwave for leftovers.  The only issue that we had was that our tub didn't plug and our hair dryer didn't work but we just used them in the other room.  The pools and hot tub were clean and relaxing and conveniently located right next to the laundry facilities, so waiting for a load was a pleasure. Location is a quick 10 min walk to loads of affordable restaurants and the Disneyland main entrance.  It's also very close to the Garden Walk shopping plaza which I highly recommend for you souvenirs. There is an affordable shuttle that picks you and drops
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  It was very nice to hear you and your family had an enjoyable visit.  We hope you reported the few room issues to the front desk so we could get those items fixed for you right away.    We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Wonderful place to stay when at Disney
Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights when going to Disney & it worked really well.  Even though the "castle" look is just an outside theme, our kids loved it.  The rooms were very clean & with a lot of room. I will admit our room had a slight musty smell from the air conditioner but since we were really only in our room to sleep it didn't bother us. The rooms had a microwave & fridge.  It really is located just a short walk to the parks. It had an outside pool that we saw people using but we were always so tired after the parks that we never had time.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review and hope to see you again the next time you visit the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Good price and location for disneyland
Summary: It's a basic hotel behind the facade, however, if you are just using it to sleep and spend your time at Disneyland, this ticks the boxes. The room with 2 queen beds was quite big and room came with fridge and microwave. The location is excellent for Disneyland, only a short walk away and hotel was relatively cheap compared to similiar hotels in area. No issues whilst staying there, however, would have liked a safe in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the feedback from your stay.  We do offer complimentary safety deposit boxes at our front desk, so the next time you visit, don't forget to ask for one of those.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Spent three nights here to take my Grandson to Disneyland. We all loved it!  The staff is very friendly and helpful and the rooms were comfortable, attractive and clean.  We all enjoyed the pool, hot tub, laundry facility and location.  My Grandson says it´s the best looking hotel on the street!  I ended up renting a scooter from the hotel lobby due to blisters from walking around Disneyland.  It was a life saver! With the hotel discount, the scooter was only $42.00 per day. Our entire visit was fabulous!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the lovely review.  We appreciate you staying with us and providing your feedback from your stay.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I stayed at the Castle Inn for one night for a 2-day Disneyland trip. The room was very clean and the location was great. They even have a small convenience store at the front. This place is totally worth the price. And the staff is friendly and helpful. I will be staying here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to Disneyland.  Thank you so much for the great feedback and for giving us 5 stars.  We hope to see you the next time your plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort!  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: No Frills Castle or Glorified Shack?
Summary: Behind the Castle facade is an outdated albeit clean, no frills motel.  Would I stay again? Maybe, if the price is right and I want to be across the street from Disney Resort and I have a vehicle to park.    Pros: Walking distance to all things Disney.  Clean rooms.  Free Parking! Quiet (at least during our 2 nights on third floor halfway between the 2 elevator banks)   Cons:  Pool is small and sits in the middle of the parking lot (we did not use pool but it did not look inviting).  No breakfast or restaurant on site. (Although close to Mimis and Pizza Press which are faves)  Guests smoking just outside their rooms. Mediocre beds.  No grab bars in shower (probably available in handicap rooms).  Needs updating.  Uneven walkways.  Disinterested staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review from your recent stay.  We appreciate the feedback and thank you for staying with us.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Stayed at Castle Inn and Suites for 5 nights in July 2016. Great location only 2 blocks from Disneyland.  Room serviced daily, nice pool, no room safe was the only down fall. There are safety deposit boxes at reception and reception is open 24hrs. Would stay again and recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us in July.  We appreciate the review and feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This hotel was really clean.  I mean really clean and the rooms were nice and big.  The walk to DRL was fine.  I thought it might be a little far but it really was not a problem.  The free parking is the best.  There was always a spot for us to park. We will stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  The review and your feedback is valuable and we appreciate it very much.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Kiwi family of 5 - first time trip to Disneyland
Summary: We arrived to reception with a very warm welcome by the friendly staff. Our room was perfect with two seperate rooms with very comfortable beds, fridge, microwave, air con and a nice bathroom. Very clean and tidy but dated. Nice swimming area with a big pool, hot tub and smaller pool for the little ones. Handy store that sells essentials and souvenirs opposite reception. Within 5 mins walk of shopping mall, so many restaurants and stores and 5-10 min walk to Disneyland.  I would recommend this to any family looking for something affordable in a fantastic location!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great review and feedback.  Thank you for the recommendation as well, spreading positive feedback is always appreciated.  Warmest regards,

Summary Heading: Wonderful staff much loved independent hotel
Summary: We had a problem with our booked hotel and Ray found us a room . We stayed four nights and the hotel is original  it was clean and the staff were just so helpful . They lent me a lap top to buy knots berry farm tickets. The laundry was great well maintained . Pool clean though small.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to post your review.  It was nice to hear that all worked out well for you and your family and we hope to see you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: The hotel itself isn't impressive and the rooms are average but you really can't beat the location, right across the street from Disneyland. I stay here every time mainly because they offer a family suite that has a king bed and a separate room with 2 queen beds. It's incredibly rare to find a room that will comfortably sleep a large family. If you want a safe affordable place to sleep after a long day at the park minus the amenities this is the place. But I will recommend reserving rooms on partner sites. I always booked through Expedia but was told during one stay they offer a discount to re-occurring guests if you book directly through them. So I did and they offered the same rate as Other sites however they didn't tell me they were also charging 2 different room taxes that
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again, and being a returning guest.  We always appreciate it when returning guests book us directly. We charge the tax/fee that is mandatory in the Anaheim Resort.  We charge a 15% Anaheim Occupancy tax and a 2% Tourism Assessment Fee.  This total of 17% is  included in all partner sites we work with.  We realize you may not see it, but the 17% is  there.  We do not charge a Resort Fee that many other hotels in Anaheim charge.  When staying at the Castle Inn & Suites, you pay room and tax, and receive free parking and free wi fi.    Once again, we appreciate the feedback and hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Good room size ,clean and well presented we liked the swan towels ,5 min walk to main entrance of Disneyland plenty of food and other major shops all close by ,free parking and a good pool ,also laundry for guest washing all in all a great place to do Disney from
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback and hope to see you in the near future if your travel plans bring you back to the States and the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: The BEST place to stay on Harbor Blvd. right by Disneyland
Summary: If you aren't wanting to squish a family into a small room with two beds right next to each other, I would recommend Castle Inn and Suites. We reserved a Family Suite and it was AWESOME! We had the main room with a king sized bed and a bathroom. Then we had a connecting door that housed a room with two queen sized beds. The beds were very comfortable, as well as the assortment of pillows on your bed. You control the temperature in your room, so this worked out great for all of us. Each room had a TV with remote, and there was a fridge and microwave in the main room. What I liked was I didn't hear any noise. People were very considerate when walking by your room (not being loud, and no kids were running up and down the walkway). The room would get cleaned each day before 3:00
Manager Response: We would like to say a very big thank you for the great review from your recent stay with us in July.  The feedback and attention to detail you provided is very much appreciated.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites, the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This motel has become our go to for Disneyland. You can walk to and from the park gates or Downtown Disney within 10-15 mins. We enjoyed the small pool and hot tubs during the sweltering heat. The AC worked great. The WiFi works better on the ground floor rooms as compared to our last stay on the second floor. The room has a mini fridge, coffee maker and microwave. The beds were ok. I brought my own towel because I remembered that they were scratchy the last time. There are plenty of places to eat nearby. Good budget motel for family.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review and feedback.  We upgraded our towel's so we hope you found them a bit softer this time.  Also, we have a very high speed enhanced wi fi system so your issue must have been an isolated case, so we hope you reported this to the front desk during your stay so we could have looked in to this for you.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: When looking for a hotel near Disneyland my options were few because I was booking so close to my departure.  Comparing prices for available rooms I settled on Castle Inn and Suites because family booked there, so why not.  The only room available was a mini suite and they were in adjoining rooms queen rooms.    Checking in was a breeze and the people the desk could not have been more helpful.  It is a large property that has parking lot facing room doors and the exterior is a bit dated.  Because of that I expected a noisy environment and dated rooms; I was wrong.  The hotel is quiet and the rooms are clean and inviting.    The suite had a couch which was clean, void of the usual stains found in high volume hotels, more important it was comfortable.  The office chair was
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the nice review and great feedback you provided.    We look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: It is really close to Disneyland which made it worth it. It was an easy walk (maybe 10 minutes) It was nice basic hotel for families.   The wi-fi kept dropping our devices every few minutes which was a bit annoying. I think it worked better on computers.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for posting your review.  We are sorry to hear about your wi fi issues.  We have very high wi fi speed so it must have been an isolated case as we never have wi fi issues.  Once again, thank you for staying with us, we hope to see you in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed at the Castle for the 2nd time over the Tinkerbell 1/2 marathon weekend. However this time we got a suite since two of is were running  and the third can snore quite loudly. One room had a king size bed with the bathroom and microwave and mini fridge.The other room has two queen beds with an additional sink. There is a door that separates the rooms and it does a great job at cutting out the noise between rooms. The hotel was clean and the service was great. This is a definitely a hotel that we plan on staying at again for future trips to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for staying with us during the Tinker Bell Marathon.  It was very nice to hear that the Family Suite worked well for your family.  We look forward to seeing you again when you return to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: We had a family of four with two teenagers stay overnight there. The rooms very clean and the staff very friendly. We requested fourth floor rooms and on arrival it was ready for us. This hotel is short walking distance from Disneyland. They also have a gift shop on location.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My 8yr old daughter could not believe that we were staying in a castle - we jokingly called it Lord Farquads castle from Shrek.  The rooms were spacious, clean, comfortable beds and quiet.  The location is an easy walk a couple of blocks from Disneyland main gates.  Breakfast at the Anaheim Suites restaurant next door is really convenient. It is buffet for 9.99 before tax and children 9 and under eat for free.  Plenty of good restaurants half a block away - we enjoyed a great meal at PF Changs.  Parking was plentiful.   I would definitely stay here again if we were to return.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  It was nice to hear you and your family "loved the Castle"  what a great name to refer to it as.  We do look forward to seeing you again if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel. Easy walk to Disneyland
Summary: My family and I recently visited Disneyland. We normally start at a hotel down the street from the castle inn and always walked by. We decided to try the castle inn. I'm glad we did. Clean rooms. Easy walk. Great rates. And free parking! The staff was very friendly. A bit noisy at times with people walking by your room but that's not the hotel's fault. I think we have found out new go to hotel for our Disneyland trips.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving the Castle Inn & Suites a try on your recent Disneyland trip.  We were very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that we will become your "go to place" when visiting the Disneyland Resort area.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: It is only 5 mins walk to Disneyland very convenient. When we checked in ,the fridge was not working so we called the guy came very quickly to check and than he bought different fridge to replace that one . Clean and customer service is good too.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write your review from your recent stay with us.  We hope you will keep us in mind the next time your visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but a bit overpriced.
Summary: We stayed here 6 nights with our kids, the hotel was nice, it was clean and conveniently located across from the parks, I think it was a bit over priced for this hotel but that's the price you pay for being across the street I guess and it was cheaper than most of the other hotels down the street. The parking is sparse and was not very accommodating for bigger vehicles and the pool is too small for this big of hotel in my opinion but overall a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us in June and providing your feedback from your stay.  We appreciate the review and hope you will keep us in mind if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland area.  Sincerely,

Summary: We booked this hotel through a travel package that included a 3 day park hopper to Disney. The Castle Inn is clean, safe, secure, quiet, great beds, pillows, linens, great customer service from staff and cleaning ladies. Nice pool and two hot tubs. Easy walking distance to shopping, restaurants and Disney entrance. Booked a simple two queen and surprised to get nice suite with living area, couch, etc. So much more than we were expecting. Absolutely recommend
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  It was very nice to hear you enjoyed our rooms and great customer service.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We arrived very early like before noon so we were extremely surprised when they told us our room was ready and we could check in. Our entire stay was very pleasant. We had no problems at all. The little convenience store was perfect. The staff was very nice to us, and we enjoyed the beautiful walk to Disneyland every day.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your stay in May.  We appreciate the great review and feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Great hotel for Disneyland. Not far to walk. The rooms were large and clean. Didn't make use of the pools but the pool area looked good. We used it mainly as a base for Disneyland and so didn't spend much time at the hotel at all. Staff were very friendly and helpful with the storage of our luggage prior to and after checking out.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great review and feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The room was great. Clean, very spacious and the best air conditioner I've ever had in a hotel. Close to Disney and other amenities. There are a lot of different restaurants all within walking distance. The front desk staff was helpful in storing our luggage as we arrived quite a bit before check in.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the great feedback and hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Where to start - it's not a bad hotel so long as you set your expectations. I'd say a few reviews on here are a little generous. To add context to this we had arrived here from the fairmont in San Francisco so this may have affected my opinion.  Anyway - we arrived from San Francisco late one evening and were checked in fairly smoothly. It was a bit like pulling teeth in the sense that I had to ask for directions to the room, for the wifi password etc but it was what it was.  When it came to the room assignment, the travel gods were not on our side. We were put in 316, which is probably the closest room to the elevator and the dreaded ice machine on the third floor. I'm not joking - we were woken by that ice machine at all times of the night - who is getting ice at 5.30am?!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate your feedback.  We realize we may not be the hotel for everyone, but we do receive very positive review's. In addition, we recently received our second certificate of excellence award.  We receive many requests from our guests where some want to be near elevator's and others that want to be away from elevators and ice machine's, so we do all possible to insure we accommodate these request's.  Once again thank you for your feedback and for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Loved it here, great for family and close to the parks!
Summary: Took my toddlers and father to stay here. We had a great time and were able to walk to the park and save on parking! There is a lovely pool and spa, the room was clean and updated, and there was minimal noise. For the price I definitely think it was worth it.  No free breakfast but we didn't mind. The pool and spa was very crowded but what can you expect in southern california?  Will definitely stay again in the future!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you very much for the great review and feedback, we really appreciate it.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights in 2 two bedroom apartments. It was very comfortable and the staff were excellent. The pool is quite small for the hotel size. It is close to lots of restaurants and a short walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay with us.    We thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites, and hope you will keep us in mind the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Nice , fair price Close to Disney
Summary: I was a bit cautious about the place, but it was nice, only con was lack of a Hotel restaurant, but when there are so many of them nearby on a way to Disney, we managed well. It is only 5 mins to Disney entrance. I suppose that the fact that it is a one family enterprise makes a difference, it is a home for them and we felt welcomed. Clean rooms, nice people at the reception. All the rooms look into court, no views to the street or nearby Disney park. Wifi was OK. plenty of parking space.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  It was nice to hear you enjoyed the hotel and felt welcomed.   We look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: First time stay, definitely coming back!!!
Summary: Loved this place! I read so many reviews online and decided to book it. My husband is really very picky when it comes to places we stay at, but even he loved it here! The staff was very friendly and very helpful at all hours! Our little one loved the castle look and feel and said she felt like a princess staying here.     We had two very minor problems/concerns and the staff was very quick to hep! They always had a smile on their faces and when you talked to them, about anything, they actually listened! It was so nice.     The price was great, the location is a lot closer to Disneyland then we had originally thought, the gift shop had almost everything that you could need, and even though we didn't use the pool it was very nice and clean.    We will definitely come back and use
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We were so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay and that you will definitely come back.  We are in the process of updating our website, so yes, all rooms have hair dryers, and a microwave, mini fridge and coffee maker.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Really convenient location to the fun parks.  Whilst an older complex the cleanliness and service made our stay very enjoyable. If you have a vehicle the provide ample free car parking also.  Restaurants options nearby also, walk or drive to a variety of options.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay.  We hope to see you again the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.    Kind Regards,

Summary: This was our second time staying here and we love it. It's walking distance to Disneyland and not so expensive compared to others. We like that they don't charge for parking and that they have a mini fridge and microwave in room. I loved that they had a smaller pool so my two year old could enjoy it and my other kids could enjoy the bigger pool. My kids feel like royalty staying here!!
Manager Response: We appreciate the nice review you provided from your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for being returning guests and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Excellent family hotel.  The staff are so helpful and friendly, nothing was too much trouble. The room was great. Fantastic location, close to Disneyland and to local restaurants. We loved staying here and would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your visit in June.  We appreciate the nice review and look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This hotel is perfect for the budget conscious family. Its close to Disney Land 10 min walk and close to  restaurants both fast food and eat in. Loved the hotel staff especially Almana(hope I spelled it right), who was extremely friendly and helpful everytime I walked in. So the price was right and because its Disneyland your  never in the room much. But it was nice how friendly the housekeeping was and efficient.  We would leave in the morning and if we came back for lunch the room was already clean spic and span. Whenever we ran into any hotel staff they were quick to offer a greeting and see if we needed anything again. Plus compared to the other hotels there were no hidden fees or surprises on our bill. It was nice to spend money at Disneyland and not alot at the hotel! !
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We really appreciate the nice review and feedback. We take pride in our guest service so thank you once again for taking note, and for mentioning this in your review.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Location was very close to the parks and the staff was very friendly.  We had a family suite with plenty of room. The rooms were clean.  There was a small market on the premises for snacks. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and writing a review from your stay.  We look forward to having you stay with us the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This hotel is within walking distance to Disney.  Plenty of choice for meals on the way, also.The rooms were large, we had 2 rooms & 3 beds for 2 of us. It was clean,tidy & quiet at night, we were able to sleep well. The staff were friendly & helpful  . We wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to post your review from your recent stay.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Clean and tidy rooms. Aircon is excellent too.  Great location at just 2 blocks to Disneyland.  Good laundry facilities on site. Nice little pool. Heaps of local restaurants to choose from. A great little convenience store on site. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for posting your review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Castle Inn and Suites is perfectly located close to Disneyland. We walked there easily and enjoyed the accommodation. It is not luxurious, but is spotlessly clean and well maintained. It is ideal for families and groups. There are several restaurants nearby, as well as a large chemist/supermarket. The hotel has a pool (which we didn't use) and a laundry with washing machines and dryers.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to Anaheim.  It was nice to hear you enjoyed your stay and our accommodations.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed at Castle in for 5 nights in June 2016 while on a family vacation to Disneyland.  We had a Parlor Suite, while my granddaughter had a standard room.  Both rooms were extremely spacious, with all the amenities.  We were not disturbed by any noise at all (we were on the third floor).  Each day our room was cleaned prior to our afternoon return.  The hotel is a short walk to Disneyland.  We were traveling with both teenagers and toddlers and had no problems with the walking distance.  We have stayed at numerous Good Neighbor hotels in the Disneyland area over the years and are used to small, cramped rooms as the norm. I highly recommend Castle Inn and Suites!  You will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the kind words and feedback in your review and hope to see you on your next visit to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: We had an excellent stay at the Castle inn and suites. The staff was very customer oriented and the rooms were very clean and good sized also. The hotel is located very close to Disneyland and the prices are very reasonable. I highly recommend to families taking a trip to Disneyland or Southern California to stay at the Castle Inn and Suites.  Thanks Dave Ponce
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing the Castle Inn & Suites on your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you so much for the great review and feedback on your stay.    We look forward to seeing you again, when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Standard room is spacious. Comparing Disney's branded hotels, this is a much better choice.   Pros: close distance to themeparks, nearby food eateries (subway, panda express, mexican), swimming pool, coin operated laundry machines  Value for money!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review from your recent stay.  We feel we have a great product as well, so thank you so much for your kind words and feedback.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We've stayed at a few properties around Disneyland (HoJo, Tropicana, Holiday Inn Walnut) and this one ranks right up there for value and proximity to the parks. The fridge and microwave were very helpful for snacks and light meals. Maid service was always prompt and efficient. We stayed on the 4th (top) floor and the 10ft ceilings made the room feel that much larger (not sure if the other floors had similar ceiling heights). Beds and linens were very comfy. Wifi was good.  There are quite a few restaurants within walking distance. We really liked the Mediterranean restaurant in the little strip mall next door, as well as PF Changs and The Cheesecake Factory at the adjacent Garden Walk outdoor mall. If you really want to get groceries and drinks on a budget and don't have a car,
Manager Response: We all thank you very much for the great feedback and attention to detail in your review.  We know other guests read the reviews and you provided such great feedback so this is always very helpful.  We hope to see you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We had a great stay at the Castle Inn and Suites. This property is simple, but it's very clean and quiet, the AC was good and you can't beat the location for a quick walk into the Disneyland parks! :) The beds were surprisingly comfortable, and the rooms look far better in person than on the hotel's website. No hotel breakfast, but they had mini fridges, and so it was easy for us to keep milk and cereal and yogurt for cheap breakfasts before we went in to the park.  The hotel has a kitschy and fun castle look on the exterior which is great for kids! I was very surprised at how nice this property was for the price, and given the look of the photos on the website. I travel for a living so I can be kind of picky, and this place exceeded my expectations!
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for the great feedback and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I picked this hotel for it's convenience to Disneyland entrance, restaurants and miscellaneous stores. Front staff and all the hotel workers are great and treated as family. We had #416 (great for wheelchair/mobility issues) but it was noisy due to closeness to elevator and another issue. We were moved to #430. Great room with no major issues.(other than other guests not being considerate to other guests...typical)! My only suggestion would be to be sure security bar (at least 1) in every bathroom, not just rooms like #416. My 73 year old husband had concerns to his safety getting in/out of tub to shower. I would consider returning to this hotel (with bathroom improvements.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate your feedback, and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: Stayed for 6 nights at the castle, was a nice hotel staff friendly rooms cleaned daily, even the washing facilities were really good as well. if u want sleep during the day after a long day at disney you will need to wait for everyone to return as kids running up and down all the time is heard through the whole room and if you do injure yourself at disney the walk back maybe to far, i will next time stay a lot closer to the main gate or at disney resort maybe im being lazy!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review from your stay with us in May.    We appreciate your comments and feedback and hope you will return again to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Only 15 minute-max walk from Disneyland. Small, clean rooms with comfy beds. It has a heated pool with a spa, as well as laundry facilities on site. Great restaurants and convenience stores in the surrounding area and a bus stop 3 minutes walk down the road. Friendly, helpful staff, plus it looks like a castle!
Manager Response: We thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your visit this past May.  Thank you for the kind words and great feedback.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This hotel is about 10 mins walk past a few shops to Disney very clean tidy. Make sure to ask for a room away from the elevator as it is very noisy till about 2 am and management couldn't have cared less about people making noise! The pool area is okay a little small but again very clean but not much shade for the little ones.plenty of parking,aircon is a little noisy but really good as it was 100 outside there is a microwave in every room and a good size fridge
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location to Disney at a great price!
Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights during a trip to Anaheim/Disneyland.  We usually stay at a Hilton location, but the prices were crazy high.  We decided to give Castle In. & Suites a try.  It is just a short 10-15 minute walk to the gates of Disneyland and California Adventure and Downtown Disney.  Check in was quick (I do wish an email confirmation would be sent when the reservation is made - make sure to write down your confirmation # when you book your stay).  The front staff was helpful and friendly.  We paid cash for the room and paid it when we checked on - also got a receipt showing we paid cash.  You can buy Disney park tickets at the front desk as well. We were in Room 310 - when we got in the room, we had some trouble finding lights.  There were 3 lamps outside of the light
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent stay.  We appreciate the attention to detail you provided in your review, this can always be helpful for other guests that read our reviews.  We do send confirmation's upon request, and the easiest thing is to just check in with your last name as that makes it very easy for the Guest Service Agent.  Also, when a guest pays cash, we immediately issue a receipt for that cash and if for any reason the guest doesn't want it, we can also provide it at check out as well.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to California.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Family of 4 (two kids.. son 7, daughter 9). Hotel only 15 min walk to front doors of DL or DCA and it includes free parking at hotel (most other close hotels charge an additional fee to park your car, per day!) Rooms are clean, come w/micro wave, coffee maker and small frig. large flat screen, free wifi, AC keeps room cool. Ice maker down the hall. Family would come back to room for a nap around 5PM... Always found room serviced and ready. We spent 6 nights at this location... would do again. Stayed on 4th floor which I think is quieter than 1st floor.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to post your review.  We were happy to hear that all went well for you and your family, and that you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Good proximity to Disney and fits the whole family at a great price
Summary: Hotel is about a 1/4 mile from Disneyland which was nice to not have to pay for parking.  Although the decor in the rooms was a bit dated, they were very clean.  Our family had 6 people and we were able to fit in a suite comfortably (even though some got stuck on a pullout bed).
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to post your review from your recent stay.  We completed a full room renovation in 2013 and furnished our rooms with made in the USA Thomasville furniture, so everything in our rooms are just about 3 years young.  Because of our Castle-theme, we felt the darker, richer fabrics and furnishings complimented our style more than the stark white, or colorless furniture you find in the other hotels in town.    Once again, thank you for your review and we hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Within walking distance of Disneyland, it was great to be able to alk to the park and ot have to plan our arrival and departure times by a shuttle.   The pool area was mall but nice with a great hot tub. Most important, were the CLEAN rooms, and friendly staff.  We had a great experience!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to post your review from your recent stay.  We appreciate the great feedback, and hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay. So Close to Disneyland
Summary: my family stayed here in Sept 2014 and we had a great experience. They upgraded our room upon arrival. We had a parlor suite, which was amazing. we could put our son to bed, and had a living room with TV for us to stay up and not worry about waking him. The room was extremely well taken care of and clean. we are on our way back this November.  The pool area has a large pool, toddler pool and a hot tub!  Great location, with Disneyland 2 blocks away. lots of restaurants close as well.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for writing your review from your stay with us a few years ago.  We are happy to see you are coming back this November.     We appreciate the great feedback, and look forward to seeing you later this year.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great place to stay-ticks all the boxes
Summary: We stayed here last month and found the location excellent-handy to disneyland, restaurants and shops.the rooms were clean and comfortable,and the helpfulness of the staff at reception was outstanding.would definately stay here again 😊
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to post your review from your stay with us last month.  We look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great place to stay close to Disneyland
Summary: It was a really nice place, especially with the kids. There were two rooms with one bed in the first room and two beds and a sink in the back room. The distance to Disneyland was really good. I was a little disappointed that there was not a breakfast, but there was a refrigerator and a Walmart a couple miles away. I liked doing breakfast in the hotel room better.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to write your review from your recent stay with us.  We hope to see you again the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Second Visit to this Hotel in Three years.....Fantastic
Summary: This was our second stay at this hotel in three years. Both stays were fantastic. Cant say enough about the staff. The rooms were very clean and recently updated. We will definitely recommend this hotel to anyone making a trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  It was very nice reading your review and we appreciate it.  We look forward to your third visit at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great place to stay ..very nice staff and convenient to Disneyland. Clean and comfortable.
Summary: The room was very clean and I loved the furniture. Comfortable bed and nice TV for relaxing after the park. Had a fridge that was on and ready to keep snacks cold. Love that the room also had a microwave and coffee maker. They also have a store that has supplies and food. It was open early also. There was some noise but that ended by 12 every night. Over all I will stay here again. Very friendly staff...
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for posting your review from your recent stay.  Thank you for commenting on our furniture.  We like it too, it's Thomasville furniture, made in the USA, and we feel it compliments our Castle-Theme very well.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Affordable, clean, comfortable place to stay for Disneyland!
Summary: My family & I recently spent 6 nights in a family suite at Castle Inn.  We originally planned on staying at the Disneyland Hotel but when the quote came through we just could not justify the cost, so we asked our travel agent to price a few off-site hotels.  The price for a family room at Castle Inn was considerably less than a standard room at other hotels nearby and was a fraction of the cost of staying at Disneyland.  I didn’t have high expectations based on the 2-star rating it was given in a holiday brochure I found after booking it and the price we were paying, however I was very pleasantly surprised and would have no hesitations in recommending it or staying there again!  Positives: -	Our Family Suite was very clean and spacious and had 2 bedrooms separated by the
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for the lovely and detailed review from your recent stay.  We appreciate the attention to detail you paid when writing your review.  We know many guests read other guest reviews, so this will definitely give future guests the re-assurance the Castle Inn & Suites is a great place to stay when visiting the Disneyland Resort.  We hope you have a future holiday to the USA and that you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: After traveling through Europe and the UK we found the rooms at Castle Inn & Suites larger and far more comfortable. Our room was serviced every day with fresh towels and rubbish bins emptied. The service was great and we were even able to store our luggage after we checked out for the rest of the day. Its location to Disneyland and many eating places was wonderful. Thank you for an enjoyable stay it made our time in Anehiem very enjoyable.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the great review and hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Clean, Quiet, Can walk to Disney, Friendly Staff
Summary: I booked this after seeing mostly positive reviews, there were some bad ones too but mostly good.   My biggest thing for a hotel room is to have a clean bathroom, and those were the reviews I was looking for.  We booked a standard room with our vacation deal. We stayed here for 5 nights while we were going to Disneyland and Harry Potter Hollywood.    Room and amenities -Online the info didn't list a microwave with our standard room, and I looked at hundreds of reviews trying to see if it was mention ( it was not ).  We always bring food to make it the room for breakfast and dinner, so I really wanted to have one.  When we checked in around 6:30 pm on a Friday we were given the top floor and to my surprise there was an awesome little microwave!  The struggles to eat as a
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review.  Your attention to the detail's of your stay, the room, and the location and more was fantastic.  We know other guests read review's, so we appreciate yours very much.  We hope to see you again the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.    Kind Regards,

Summary: Great budget hotel, rooms are roomy and clean. A little slow in making up the rooms each day would be the only minor complaint as we came back at 3pm for a break both days and rooms still not done. Location to Disney and restaurants is ideal. Swimming pool was nice to have a break from all the walking around. Staff friendly, would recommend and would stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently, and taking the time to post your review.  We appreciate the feedback, and look forward to seeing you the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The service here was exceptional. Location to Disneyland and local eateries was great.  Pool was good. Early access to our room after arriving on an early morning flight was fantastic. Feels more like a motel than hotel. Great, reasonably priced to stay.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  Thank you for your feedback it is very much appreciated.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: very clean, quiet at night, great location, within 5 minutes walk to Disney, friendly staff
Summary: We reserved this hotel b/c we thought the reviews overall were positive, and wanted to try it out.  We checked into our 3rd floor room, one that we actually requested when we arrived and were nicely moved.  It was a two queen bed suite, with a fridge, flat screen TV, entertainment center, desk, table, sofa, and large bathroom.  The beds were a bit soft, b/c they had those mattress toppers, something we can't stand b/c they take away some of the firmness of the mattress.   The A/C vent had a leak, and the maintenance dept fixed the ceiling while we were gone, tho it turned out that it was a bigger issue than they at first thot, so they had to work on it after we checked out. We enjoyed our stay there, b/c it was great value for the size of the room and amenities plus location,
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to Disneyland.    We appreciate the great feedback, and we were very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that you would come back to visit us.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Some of the reviews on Trip Advisor were not good and I was a bit worried.  Upon entering ,the bedroom smelled like pee.  After spraying Lysol while blasting the air conditioner the odor was tolerable.  The room was cleaned daily and the sheets were satiny.  The stay was fine but they sure need to find the odor
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review from your recent stay.  We receive many positive reviews and we are very happy to be in the top 15 hotels that are rated on Trip Advisor.
