We hope you reported the concern with your room to our front desk staff, so we could address it right away.  Once again, thank you for your feedback.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Not the best... not so good either...
Summary: The air quality in the room was stale/stuffy, when we turned on the wall mounted air, it produced a horrible smell... The hot tub water was slimey/murky. The staff were nice. Old bathtub and walls that were just painted over, but still carried a gross smell. The beds were extremely firm. The rooms were dark, even with all the lights on... very dim. The furniture was newer and the vanity was nice.  The room door had space, so you could see the outside and it didn't have a secure wall latch... We actually left and booked into another hotel around the corner, which was incredible.
Manager Response: none

Summary: When I saw the hotel I cried and tried to find somewhere else to stay. The hotel is next to an ugly vacant lot. The pool was tiny. The only rooms facing Disneyland are suites (not explained on the website). Every other floor had a cement wall in front of the rooms, you couldn't see out. The most disgusting thing to me is that the toilets were dirty. I had saved for this vacation for years, and I was so disappointed. My girls were good sports about it, but I had showed them the website and it was a complete misrepresentation of what the hotel actually is.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Upon arriving at the Castle Inn, it definitely looked like a castle, my son was very happy with the look We were booked into a 2 bedroom family suite, it was cosy, the rooms were neat and tidy, but seemed small, there was a bathroom between the 2 rooms, with a vanity in the second room, which was great at night and early morning for teeth brushing The beds were not great, but not bad, the bed making was not good at all The noise was loud, as we were on the 3rd floor and all you could hear was the floor above, so I am not sure if the floor below could hear us The room was equipped with tea and coffee, but with plastic and paper cups, no spoons, just straws for stirring, very weird The price for the resort was on par with a few in the street, but it was the location you were
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the feedback, and it was nice to hear that your son enjoyed the Castle theme.  We wanted to let you know that it is very standard to provide plastic cups and paper products in a hotel guest room that does not offer cooking facilities.  Also, if a hotel does not offer a restaurant or proper kitchen on site, you can not provide glass or stainless steel products, as you would not have a kitchen facility to wash and sanitize these items properly.  We hope this makes sense.  Once again, thank you for staying with us, we hope to see you again in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: My wife and I attended the Tinkerbell races at Disneyland and wanted a close but inexpensive hotel.  Castle Inn was both of these.  We were also able to upgrade to a larger room when other friends showed up.  The room was very nice and our room on the street side had a window that viewed the fireworks.  Castle Inn appears to be about the age of Disneyland or near it, but is very well maintained.   The pool was clean and fun.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to write your review from your stay with us early this month.  The Castle Inn opened in 1989, whereas Disneyland opened in 1955, so we are a bit "newer" than Disneyland.  We recently painted the entire exterior of the hotel, renovated all guest rooms, updated the door lock's, and added all new air conditioner units in all the rooms.  We are doing our best to keep the castle-theme, but with modern amenities.  Once again, thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you if you are running in the Tinker Bell Marathon next year.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great place to stay thats close to the parks.
Summary: This was our first time staying here. We got a suite, which was great. Our room was clean and quiet. We had worried since our door was right at the stairs but we never heard a sound. One morning we woke up and realized we were out of toilet paper. I called to let them know and within minutes they delivered. We also had groceries delivered before we arrived our first day, and they had already put them in our room and even put the refrigerated items away for us. We have no complaints and will more than likely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and posting your review from your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stay here every year for Disneyland's Tinkerbell Half Marathon. We spend a week and feel totally spoiled. The staff at Castle Inn takes wonderful care of us. It's so nice leaving the room anytime we want, returning anytime we want, and housekeeping has ALWAYS done a fantastic job no matter when we're gone! We are loyal customers, even with a lot of hotel choices in the area.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for being loyal guests at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate you choosing us for each visit, and glad we are able to spoil you during your stay.  We look forward to seeing you next May for the Tinkerbell Half Marathon.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great location and value for money
Summary: We stayed here for 10 days and would recommend it to families wanting somewhere very close to Disneyland.   It was clean and tidy and the desk staff were very friendly and helpful. My only complaint was there was a very noisy family in the room next door but when we asked to be moved, staff were happy to find us a quieter room.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to the Anaheim Resort.  We appreciate your review and feedback and hope the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort, you will think of the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Nice Clean Hotel Walking Distance to Disney
Summary: This was a combo trip of Happy Mother's day and running the Tinkerbell Half Marthon. The hotel is about 10  mins away from the Disney gate (which was not fun to walk after running 13.1 miles) but perfect on all the other days. The hotel is clean with very friendly staff and totally reasonably priced.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review from your stay with us early this month.  We appreciate your feedback, and hope to see you next year if you are running in the marathon once again.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel within walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: This was our first family vacation in a long time and spend 5 nights at Castle Inn & Suites.  It was better than I expected as the pictures on the website do not do the hotel justice.  Every staff member we encountered was very friendly and helpful.  We were upgraded to a family suite at no charge which was perfect for us.  The pool was well maintained and every guest I talked to was so friendly.  There is a little store on site which has drinks, snacks, clothes, etc.  Disneyland was only 2 blocks away which only took about 10 minutes at the most to get to the main entrance.  There were so many restaurants, shops and stores are within walking distance.  Anaheim Garden Walk is a perfect place to go to -- Bubba Gump's, Cheesecake Factory, PH Chang's, California Pizza Kitchen,
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for the lovely review and all "5's".  We strive to be the best we can be and customer service is a top priority for us.  It was so nice to read the detailed feedback you provided, so thank you again.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My family of 4 stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites for 4 nights. Check is was a breeze and the lady at the front desk was very kind. A gentleman came out and brought my two little girls (ages 4 and 2) cute little crowns to wear. My girls thought the lobby was pretty cool, so did I. My girls loved staying in their own castle. Our room was very clean. I was very pleased when we got in there.  Everything was perfect. The housekeeping crew did a wonderful job for our entire stay. The walk was not too bad, its harder at night when you're making the tired walk back from Disney. The best part of our stay was the customer service. My daughter has a little yellow blankie that she loves. She left it on the bed after our first night there. When we returned from a long day at Disneyland, I
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent stay with us.  It was so nice to read all the lovely comments and feedback, so thank you again for that.  I'm very happy your daughter's yellow blanket was found and returned.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Stayed a few nights here, easy to walk to Disneyland, basic rooms, aesthetics were good but kids stayin in room above kept us awake all night other than that no issues. Pool good staff were helpful and easy to get transport
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review from your recent stay.  We appreciate the feedback, and hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: First time to Disney and First time staying at Castle Inn
Summary: Location of hotel was very convienent to get to park area and surrounding food establishments.  Hotel is a bit dated however despite the more aged look and ammenities, it was well maintained and clean.  Provided good value for price and difficult to argue with the convienence.    Would consider staying here again in future visits.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your recent review of the hotel.  We appreciate the feedback.  Being a castle-theme property we realize some may observe us as "dated", however; our goal is to stay authentic, and to also keep the property current and updated without jeopardizing our theme.  We look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Very Friendly, Walking Distance from Disney & Free Parking
Summary: This was the first time we stayed at Castle Inn & Suites and I will definitely stay here again. Very Friendly, Clean & Great Price. Our room had two queens and a pull out couch. It was perfect for our family. They let us park our car in their parking lot the day we checked out and we went to Disneyland for the day. That was so great. We didn't have to move our car and pay for parking in the parking structure. We Really appreciated that.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review, we appreciate the great feedback.  We were happy to allow you to park on your check out day.  This does vary from month to month based on occupancy, but our goal is to always take care of our guest's and do our best to accommodate all requests, so thank you for mentioning this in your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: It's a nice family oriented inn, about 5 minute walk to Disneyland. Staff was very friendly. We were there for 3 nights, and really enjoyed it. Military, active or retired, can go to their ITT to get a discounted voucher. For the location, can't  beat the price. It also has free WiFi.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the kind review and great feedback.  We hope to see you the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This is the 2nd time we have stayed at this hotel.  Family Suite is a very nice size with 2 double beds and a sofa bed.  Rooms are clean, updated, bathroom is a nice size and plenty of room with 2 sink areas.  Fridge and Microwave in room made for easy snack packing for our 2 day trip to Disney.  Hotel allowed us early check in so we could park our car on arrival and not worry about expensive Disney parking. Very easy, convenient walk to Disney from hotel, felt very safe, didn't have to wait for shuttles, and lots of restaurants near by!  Hotel was quiet, staff was very helpful. Fast, free, internet.  We didn't use the pool this trip, but they have a heated pool and a children's pool, too.  Will for sure use them next time we visit Disney - they for sure help make it the
Manager Response: A very big thank you for the great review.  We appreciate the attention to detail in your review and all the great feedback.  Our job is to give you a worry, stress-free vacation, so we are happy we accomplished that for you.  We look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Stayed for 5 nights while we visited Disneyland. As already described, ideally located to Disneyland within a short walk. Reception staff could use some smiling and have a cheerier disposition in welcoming their guests. The rooms were a good size, clean and comfortable. The Wi-Fi was free but kept dropping out all the time. Whilst having the hand basin located within the room was a bit weird, it actually worked well for getting ready in the morning. CVS and restaurants within easy walking distance. Of the four hotels we stayed in, the bed was the least comfortable but still no major issues with it. The biggest issue is the noise from other rooms. I could hear other rooms toilets flushing, luggage felt like freight trains going past our window & door and people walking around
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your review from your stay in April.  We appreciate both the positive and any not so positive feedback as it gives us room for improvement, which we strive to do every day.  Thank you again,

Summary: We have just spent 5 nights here and it was great. The room was very large and super comfortable. We arrived at 830am and were offered a room upgrade at a reduced price so we could get a room straight away, which we jumped at after a 13 hour flight from Australia. The staff are so friendly and happy to help and there is a shop on site to pick up snacks and sunscreen etc. We had free wifi in our room (so important when you travel with teens!). Nice little pool area with a hot tub and we were able to park our car here for free. It is very close to Disneyland, just a 5-10 minute walk. I would definitely stay here again :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post your recent review from your stay with us in April.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Huge room and close to Disneyland
Summary: I had a wonderful stay here. The room is large, and queen rooms include a sofa. Everything was clean and comfortable, and check-in and check-out were fast. Parking was free, and it was easy to find a spot close to my room. There's a coffeemaker and fridge/microwave, too.   They have a nice convenience store on site open 24-hrs, or at least very late, which was a great place to grab water and sunscreen at reasonable prices. There's a CVS down the street but when you've been walking all day, it's great to have something closer. This hotel is just two blocks from Disneyland, and a block away from IHOP, Denny's and Tony Roma's. Another block down is McDonald's and Panera. The Denny's has a (free) balloon artist for kids weekend mornings when there's a bit of a wait.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the feedback and it was nice to hear you and your family enjoyed the hotel, our location, and friendly staff.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Fantastic location for Disneyland and California Adventure without paying the price of Disneyland Resort. Rooms were large and clean. Can be noisy at times with excited children running around, proximity to elevator/ice machine - that is my only complaint! Will stay here again if I come back to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review, and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Nice hotel to stay at since it's walking distance of Disneyland. We checked in late and it was no problem. The room had everything we needed. I would suggest not having a room by the stairs since it was very loud at night with people coming back. The kids enjoyed the hotel because they thought they were staying in a castle. Castle decor in rooms. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us last November.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warm Regards,

Summary Heading: Great stay for 9 nights close to Disney.
Summary: We stayed at Castle Inn for 9 nights in April in one of the family suites. It was perfect for us, two grandparents with two grandchildren of different genders, including a teen. The configuration of our Family Suite worked for us. There were two Queens and a sink in a rear room and a king bed with fridge, microwave etc in the front room with a bathroom in between. Everything that we needed was there, including a little coffee maker. The rooms were spotlessly clean and serviced daily. The beds were comfy, the hot water sufficient and the air-con worked. We used the CVS nearby for basic breakfast groceries and snacks. There are a variety of places to eat or take out within a 2-5 minute walk. The spa and swimming pool were not huge, but perfect to wind down in after full-on days at
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland holiday.  It was nice to hear our Family Suite worked well for you and your family, and we appreciate the great feedback.  We hope you will keep us in mind if your future travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights in April 2016. The hotel is perfect, we got here for 8am, although check in wasnt until 3pm, we were able to get a car pass and head into Disney. Disney is about a 5 minute walk away which is great.   The hotel room was spacious and the bathroom was Ok. We didnt really have any issues with noise or anything like that, also check in was smooth and the parking is free.  Location wise, I'd recommend this place if you are going to Disney. Its a 5 minute walk, and you are close to a Denny's, I-hop, McDonalds and Downtown Disney so you cant fault it.  The price is very reasonable too, would 100% stay here again if I ever go back to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the review and we were happy to hear our location and property worked well for you and your family.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: We stayed here the first time 9 yrs ago, and it was very nice then.  Now it has been redecorated, and it is even better!   My two daughters, and four grandkids, and I enjoy staying here.  We live just an hour away, but sometimes like to make our Disneyland visit a 2 day excursion.  So we book our rooms here, and arrive late afternoon the first day.  We spend a few hours at one of the parks, then spend a comfortable night here.  We always get 2 adjoining rooms (2 queen beds in each) and it works perfectly for all 7 of us!  And, it is an short walk to Disneyland from the hotel.  Even late at night, Harbor Blvd is well-lit, with many people walking to various hotels. Castle Inn and Suites will let you park your car in their parking lot while you visit Disneyland, saving you the $18
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites as your little getaway spot when visiting Disneyland.  We appreciate the great review and all the feedback you provided.  We look forward to seeing you again when you return to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I booked a parlor suite it was very roomy. Room was very clean. No parking fee, No breakfast. The only thing I did not like about this hotel and why I would not return is the lack of door security. I did not like that it didn't have a latch on the top to lock. My 1 year old was able to open the door very easily. We had to barricade the door using stroller and coffee table. Disneyland is walking distance which is a plus.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your recent review. We feel our free WI FI and Free Parking is a better value to our guest's, since there are numerous restaurants surrounding the hotel for breakfast, lunch and dinner options.  The latches you mention in your review could prevent a guest from exiting the room.  Our modern radio frequency locks have a deadbolt, which is stronger than a latch, preventing access from the outside of the room.  However, this deadbolt is designed to release as soon as the handle is turned from the inside.  If there was an emergency, this would allow a guest to immediately exit the room.  In a panic, in the case of an emergency, the latch you mention, may actually prevent a person from exiting the room and getting to safety.   We appreciate your feedback and thank you again for staying with us.  Sincerely,

Summary: I was very skeptical about this hotel but it was great. Nice staff very friendly and helpful with questions. Highly recommend it. Only wish the hot tub was open later at night. My legs were killing me from walking Disney all day/night and it was closed at 10:35.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently, we appreciate the nice review and hope to see you the next time you visit the Disneyland area.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My mother booked 4 Queen suites for our whole family. 17 of us in total had the most comfortable stay at a hotel we can remember.  It was conveniently located to everything we needed and very reasonably priced. Most of us stayed 7 nights and we never had a single complaint about anything. Very, very awesome hotel. Thank you
Manager Response: We would all like to thank you and your 17 family members for staying with us recently.  It was so nice to hear you all had a great time and we really appreciate you taking the time to provide your review.  We hope to see you all the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I booked this hotel as part of a vacation package. Having stayed at several nearby hotels but not this one, I thought it was worth taking a chance on the reasonable deal.   First of all, the website wasn't terribly clear about wifi access so I called them directly and was assured that there is free wifi in each room. Perfect, that's one of my main criteria.  I booked the package on my own and had 2 other family members join me having booked their own flights. When I showed up at Castle Inn with only my name on the booking they were super nice and didn't bat an eye that my family was also going to be staying. Later, when I had friends who wanted to meet up with me for dinner the front desk was very accommodating about allowing them to park for a few hours free of charge (I didn't
Manager Response: Thank you very much for booking your vacation package with us recently.  It was very nice to hear you enjoyed your stay and that you and your friends had a good time in the Anaheim Resort.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This place is awesome!  I have stayed here many times and they never disappoint.  Their rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable.  The staff is alway nice and very accommodating.   It is a short walk from Disneyland, rental cars, dining, entertainment and pharmacy.  Plus my son loves that we get to stay in a "real" castle!  Great price for how close it is to the park.  The only thing that would make it better would be a continental breakfast.  However the microwave and fridge make a great addition.  I would highly recommend this hotel and we will definitely be back again soon.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a valued returning guest of the Castle Inn & Suites.  We loved reading your review and would like to thank you very much.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Excellent Location, 5 mins walk to Disney entrance, restaurants and shops. Plenty of place to get breakfast and 7-11 across from hotel had everything from breakfast to pizzas for lunch, hot/cold food & drinks for cheap price. Hotel was clean, maid service daily, comfortable and had large rooms with TV, free Wifi, Fridge, Microwave and coffee machine (not great quality coffee but fine to just run water through for a cup of tea) Good air conditioning although could be a bit noisy on occasions. Reception staff were exceptional and couldn't do enough for us and had safe deposit boxes for valuables at no extra cost plus vouchers for local deals in area.  Small pool with hot tub (nice and clean), with sun loungers which was great to relax after a long day sightseeing and open until 10
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great review and feedback you provided.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Everything we needed within a hop, skip and a jump of Disneyland
Summary: We had a fantastic stay at this hotel. We purposely wanted to book somewhere within walking distance of Disneyland as we had a senior using an ECV and this meant we didn't need to keep getting it in and out of cars. The walk to Disneyland is incredibly easy and we were at the parks in no time. The staff couldn't have been friendlier and were so helpful if I went into details you'd think they were paying me for this review! Our room was clean and comfortable with the only possible downside being the lack of toiletries. As an international traveller I was banking on using theirs, but there wasn't really enough. Beds were comfy, if a little hard and the fridge, microwave and coffee maker were very helpful for a quick breakfast. Speaking of which there is no on-site restaurant, but
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your visit in February.  We appreciate the feedback, and it was very nice to read all the positive points you mentioned, so thank you again for that.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans brings you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great Hotel , we couldn't have asked for more
Summary: We are a group of 7 Australian travellers , our first time in USA. Late February 2016. Cannot speak highly enough of the entire experience at Castle Inn and Suites, our rooms had lots of space and were immaculately clean, the staff couldn't do enough to help us. They did everything in their power to make our stay excellent, they advised us where to go, what to do, how to geet there and organised anything we asked. The hotel is close to Disneyland and there are lots of eating venues all within a short walking distance. Definitely recommend this hotel and if we ever get back again we will stay there.
Manager Response: We would like to send you a very big thank you for your review from your stay with us in February.  We greatly appreciate the lovely and kind words about your stay, our staff, location and our rooms.  We do our best to go up and above and provide top-notch customer service, so thank you for noticing and thank you for mentioning this in your review.  We all hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites, your home away from home in the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed in one of their family suites (2 queen beds + a sink in the back room and 1 king + microwave & fridge in the front room - one bathroom).  Our room was clean and the decorating was nice.  Everything worked and was in good order.  The housekeepers did a nice job each day (they came kind of late in the day as we found out when we returned from Disneyland for lunch in the early afternoon).  The extra sink outside the bathroom helped a lot when getting ready for bed or ready to leave.  The microwave is a dial type so you can't set exact times (wasn't a big deal).  Some mini fridges have a little freezer at the top but not this one.  The fridge was fairly large for a hotel room but a gallon of milk could be tricky.  We had a half gallon that fit fine.  The beds were on the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a guest at the Castle Inn & Suites this month.  Your review and attention to detail is very much appreciated.  We know other guests read review's and it's a review like yours that I'm sure other guest find very helpful, so thank you for taking the time to write a detailed description of your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are coming to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel - 10 min walk to Disney
Summary: My family of 4 stayed here for 3 nights while we went to the Disney parks. Great hotel, free parking, 10 minute walk to the parks, warm/friendly staff willing to help and put up with my jokes, what else can you ask for? My 6 and 7 year olds slept like babies in the newly renovated room, so that speaks to the quietness of the surrounds. I don't give 5 stars easily, but great location, nice rooms, nice folks. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you so much for posting your lovely review from your recent stay.   We appreciate all the great feedback, so thank you again for highlighting all the positive points you mentioned.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: To Start off I choose this Hotel as it was very close to Disneyland 10 minute walk and it"s free parking. The Hotel is VERY LOUD, It has paper thin walls so you can hear rooms from up and next to you. There are tons of kids that run and stomp non stop. The Walkways outside the rooms are like old Apartment style type made of Concrete, so you can hear people walking and talking. Lots of echoing!!!. Room was remolded and very clean but, a little small thou. The only time you will sleep and get some rest is from 1am til 6am. All the early Disneyland goer"s get up early to get there when it opens. We do not go til around 11am. The shower head in Bathroom is only about 5ft high so it"s difficult to Shower when your tall. It has a small pool and the adult hot tub worked great. Overall
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We are sorry we did not meet your expectations, but thank you for giving us a chance.  Sincerely,

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights and loved8 it, the beds were nice and comfy after long days at Disneyland, staff were all very friendly and helpful. Highly recommended for families would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for staying with us recently and for posting your review from your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Hotel nothing special, pictures make it look nicer that it is.
Summary: We stayed here in March 2016 for 3 nights during Spring Break and found this hotel mediocre. If you just need a hotel to crash in, this works. Our room was at the back of the hotel on the 4th floor. If you’re looking for close proximity to Disneyland than this hotel location is great, only about 2 blocks walking distance from Disneyland and California Adventure.  The customer service was not the best. First, after spending all day in Disneyland we returned to our room but couldn’t get in. We had to come down from the 4th floor which usually isn’t a big deal but when walking all day at Disneyland, it is. We found out that our hotel key card was coded with the wrong dates. The next day I asked the front desk if they could print our boarding passes. They were two of them at the
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to post your review from your stay with us in March.  We understand you encountered a concern with our front desk staff assisting you with your boarding passes.  We do offer on a complimentary basis access to a wireless printer, as most of our guests will have their flight information on their mobile device, and they can print their boarding passes right to our wireless printer.  We also provide a laptop for our guests to use in the lobby so they can access their email with the flight information.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will give us another opportunity to show you our first-class hospitality.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Great value and location for a family vacation near Disneyland
Summary: My family and I stayed at Castle Inn for 6 nights during Spring Break. We stayed in a Family Suite on the 4th Floor. The style of  Castle Inn is "Motel Style".. the rooms were recently renovated, and very spacious.  This is not an amenity rich, upscale hotel; but I found it works really well for families, especially those with small children.  The rooms are very affordable for the area and it is within walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventure.  The staff were wonderful, very helpful. The cleaning staff were also very accommodating.  Wifi was free and there was a cute little convenience store and souvenir shop in the entrance.  Though they didn't serve breakfast, you are next door to many options.  Dennys, IHOP.. .we preferred Panera.   There was a nice pool area
Manager Response: Thank you very much for writing such a lovely, and detailed review from your recent stay.  It was so nice to read all the great points you wrote about, and yes, we do feel we are a great property for families.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you plan on visiting the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: They have already charmed us, and our stay isn't until next week!
Summary: I am so excited to take my family here next week for my wife's birthday. I have had to reach out a couple times with questions about our stay and they have been SO polite! I have heard such good things about their customer service, and so far our interactions with them have been extremely positive.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for posting your feedback from the guest service we have provided to you so far.  We look forward to having you stay with us, and charming you even more.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Best family hotel to stay in when going to Disneyland
Summary: I was shocked to find such an amazing hotel and so inexpensive for what we got: a family suite with 3 queen size beds (2 bedroom suite) so close to Disneyland's entrance at such an amazing price. Its not listed in the good neighbor hotels on Disneyland's website. For a large family on a budget it was just more than amazing price wise. It was even more amazing after a long day of walking in the parks to not have to walk much farther to get back to our hotel. We stayed at another hotel the time before this and we thought our feet were at death's door. Not this time though! The room was lovely and comfortable; has a refridgerator, microwave, desk, table, closet, 2 dressers and a seperate sink (+ coffee) in the 2nd room. The cable was eh but if you plan on watching tv in the room
Manager Response: A very big thank you for taking the time to provide such a great review from your recent stay with us.  We are a Good Neighbor Hotel; we are just not part of the Walt Disney Travel Company program.  In order to sell the Disney ticket's, you have to be a Good Neighbor Hotel, so it's unfortunate they do not list ALL Good Neighbor Hotel's on their website.  We are happy this did not detour you from booking us, so thank you for that.  We hope to see you at the Castle Inn & Suites, the next time your plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Went to California earlier in the year, and had an amazing stay here! Staff was very friendly and helpful. It's nice because there is a cvs right across the street for groceries or anything else for your trip. Also a very close to Disneyland! 100% would come back to stay.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent stay with us.  It was very nice to read you enjoyed your stay and that you will come back to visit us.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I was thrilled Castle Inn provided us with a free upgrade. Staff was very helpful and courteous, room was nice and clean. Walking distance to Disney Parks!! No Complaints here!! Hotel also allowed us to leave our car both days at the hotel even though we only stayed one night.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently and posting your lovely review of your stay.  We really appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Our stay at Castle Inn was a great experience for my wife, daughter and two grandchildren.  The rooms were large & clean and included refrigerators, microwaves & coffee makers.  The hotel was conveniently located across the street from the main entrance to Disneyland with many family-oriented restaurants in close proximity.  The front desk staff was always friendly and helpful.    On the negative side,  the outdoor walkways tended to be noisy at times with kids running back and forth at night.  We would certainly stay here again.
Manager Response: Aloha,  Thank you very much for taking the time to post your review from your recent stay with us.  We are very happy you and your family enjoyed your stay.    We hope to see you again if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Mahalo,

Summary: Staff was very helpful and friendly, rooms were nice and comfy, and a good price ! Very close to the park as well. Perfect for families with small kids that need that afternoon nap ! What more do ya want ? Also close to many different eating establishments.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your family vacation to the Anaheim Resort.  We appreciate you taking the time to write your review and hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We were thrilled with the accommodation provided at Castle Inn & Suites.  It was our first family trip from Australia to the US with 3 kids in tow.  It is a great location, close to Disneyland and just a short hop, skip away from the bus stop - which we used daily to get to all our theme parks. Our kids favourite was Knott's Berry Farm !! Spacious rooms, cleaned daily, with a pool & heated spa, we really enjoyed our stay & wouldn't hesitate to recommend this spot.  Keep up the great work !! Very family friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  It was very nice to see you felt our location was great, and our property worked very well for you and your family.  We hope the next time you come to the Disneyland Resort area you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Basic but clean and excellent location
Summary: I have stayed at Castle inn several times before and it offers excellently located accommodation in Anaheim. The hotel is across the road from Disneyland offering very easy access to the parks, ideal for young families, to make two or more trips in a day, and give the kids a sleep or a swim to keep them fresh. The hotel has excellent family rooms that sleep 6 and offered excellent facilities for a cheap visit.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to write your review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback and hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: First Disneyland & Knott's Berry Farm Trip
Summary: Excellent reception and staff.  Room was clean and cleaned everyday.  The room included 2 queen-size beds, refrigerator, microwave and coffeemaker.  Ice machine and soda machine was at the first floor.  A small convenience store was also located across from the front desk lobby.  Hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland.  Several restaurants are nearby, including IHOP, Tony Romas and Panera.  One of our card keys went missing while at an amusement park but the staff was very kind and simply reset the frequency and reissued new card keys...no extra charge.  There were only 2 issues to deal with.  First, there were the rolling of carts/luggage and walking of other hotel guests can be heard from the room.  Second, we didn't always have the same amount of wash cloths and
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us for your recent visit to the Anaheim Resort.  We thank you for the great feedback.  You highlighted some of our great features, and we know other guests reading reviews find this information very helpful.  We are sorry you didn't receive the exact amount of towel's and wash cloth's each day, but you are always welcome to call our guest service desk to request any additional items for your room.  We are here 24 hours a day and are here to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable, so please keep this in mind on your next visit to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Excellent service by front desk workers and cleaning team. Loved to be able to walk to Disneyland. Pool small but ok. We had the junior suite with 2 queen beds in 1 room (door closes), and pull out couch in living room. 2 TV's a plus. Grandkids watch 1 and adults the other. I would highly recommend to everyone. Walking distance to Subway, Dennys, Ihop, Panera and Mimis.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the lovely review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the great feedback and hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We were a large group(20+) staying for a week. We arrived before checkin and the hotel worked with me to arrange rooms together and allowed us to check in early. Rooms were clean we had six 2 queen rooms and 1 Family suite. We were on 4th floor right near elevator so convenient. I did feel a little bad for the 1 room amongst ours since our group was a Cheer team. The location is great for parks and Convention Centre. Housekeeping was good too if we happened to be in room we received a call to make sure we were okay and asked if we needed anything. We asked for a late check out for Family suite on last day and they accommodated so we could have a room to leave luggage and eat as well as freshen up before our bus picked us up for airport. We would definitely try this hotel again
Manager Response: Thank you very much for bringing your cheer group to the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are always happy to have groups of any size come stay with us.    We hope to see you again if your cheer group returns to the competition's in Anaheim next year.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Nice and close to Disneyland and lots of food. Friendly staff, clean rooms. Probably my only issue is the same with everywhere, why why why are all the showers over baths, what's wrong with a normal shower!!!! And a bath as an option. But defiantly the best place to stay for Disney, good quality low price
Manager Response: Thank you very much for posting your review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback and loved your comment regarding the tub/shower combo.  This is very normal in the States.  There are very few hotel's in the Anaheim Resort that offer a separate shower from the bath, but as long as it wasn't too much of an inconvenience for you, we hope to see you again.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Really nice property for the money.
Summary: My family and I stayed here for our vacation in LA. It's clean, well laid out and has conveniences, microwave and fridge. The staff is attentive and friendly and the location is close to Disney and other theme parks in the area. It is also easily accessible to and from the freeway.  I'd recommend it!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you very much for the review and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Good hotel for the price and location
Summary: Good hotel for the price and location, it takes around 5min walk to Disneyland entrance on S Harbor Blvd (taking in to account wait time to cross the two major intersections). The staff were very friendly and helpful. The room itself is nice, but could do with more lighting (it felt quite dark) and accessible power points.  I also recommend asking for a room on the top floor as I was in the ground and unfortunately I could hear people stomping around upstairs as well as rude people having very loud conversations outside my room in the car park at all hours of the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback and it was nice to hear you enjoyed the location and price of the hotel.    Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed in one of the Suites, it was very well laid out. the beds were great The room was clean. Internet strong. Very close to pharmacy, walking distance to Disney Land. Lots of free parking. Would definitelt stay again
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently, and the great feedback you provided.  We hope to see you again the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: I stayed here 4 nights while attending Expo West. This is close to the convention center, making it very convenient after a long day! It's also across the street from Disneyland! This hotel has a nice outside appearance. The rooms are older, but clean. Staff was very nice and accommodating. Unfortunately housekeeping did not have wash cloths for 2 days. I finally went down to first floor and found these on a cart .It would also be nice if they could purchase new beds as these were hard. It's an average hotel for a short stay.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us during Expo West.  We appreciate your feedback.  In regards to you not having wash clothes in your room, if you called to our front desk at anytime during your stay, we would have insured housekeeping was aware of this, and they would have stocked you up.    We recently renovated the hotel and have all brand new Serta sleeper mattress' so these are less than 2 year's old.  We realize our guest's may have various needs for their mattress' and pillow's, but the majority of our guest feedback is very positive in regards to our mattress' and pillow's.  We hope if you are returning to Expo West next year, you will keep us in mind.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Very clean rooms and friendly staff
Summary: Was very happy with the size and cleanliness of the rooms.  Was actually surprised at the room size when I opened the door.  Though I was alone, it would have been large enough if I had brought the family.  Very comfortable beds.  Staff was very friendly.  Did not go to Disney but the proximity was great, it would have been an easy walk.  Well stocked convenience store adjacent to the lobby.  The staff there was super friendly as well.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently, and taking the time to post your review.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great hotel for the money. Close to the park entrance. The people really make it a wonderful experience. I have watched this hotel transform over the last ten years my kids consider it there second home and don't want to stay any where else
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for the lovely review.  We were so happy to hear that you have staying with us before, and that your kids consider us their home away from home.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Close to Disney, great family suites
Summary: We have Disneyland annual passes, so we stay in hotels near Disney several times a year. This is always our top choice. It is easy walking distance to Disneyland, and their family suites are fabulous (there is a King size bed for me and my husband plus 2 queens for the kids-no pull out beds!) We have stayed here 3 or 4 times now, and will continue to choose it when we return! Also, we have a daughter that does online high school classes and she was able to attend from the hotel with their internet access. It was awesome that it worked so well!
Manager Response: We thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites as your home away from home while visiting Disneyland.  We were very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that your daughter was able to get her homework done while using our enhanced wi fi system.  We look forward to seeing you again, the next time your plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Close to Disney and nice staff!
Summary: I was very happy with my stay here. I wanted something that was close to Disneyland, but wasn't super expensive, and it was perfect. The rooms are a nice size, kept clean, and I never heard my neighbours once. It was nice being able to come back to the hotel for an hour or so while at the parks, it was less than a ten minute walk. Also close to a variety of food places, and theres a CVS right across the street. The staff were super friendly as well. Would stay again, and recommend to anyone with or without kids!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: The staff were very friendly and helpful. The family suite was large enough to fit all five of us comfortably and there were plenty of towels, toiletries, glasses, etc. for all. Our room (251) was in the back of the hotel and very quiet. The rate was great and we will definitely be returning to the Castle for our Disneyland trips!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to post your review from your recent stay.    We hope you will keep us in mind, the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Clean, quiet, location & price. Would Recommend!!!
Summary: I'm sorry but I forgot to take pics. It is set up motel style (with doors facing the outside parking lot/pool) but don't let that fool you, the rooms are clean and comfortable. The room has a mini fridge and microwave. Bathroom was clean and room is quite big (which was great when travelling with a 3 & 5 year old. The only noise issue is when someone drags their suitcase along the hall outside your door it does echo/loud but a few seconds later they are gone. It really isn't a big deal or happen too often.   Staff were very nice. No breakfast option from what we could see though. We didn't use the pool but it is fairly small but clean in the middle of the courtyard.   Pros: - clean, spacious, amenities, location (1.5 blocks to Disney's entrance, about 10-15 min walk and you are
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recent.  We appreciate the great review and feedback.  We hope the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort, you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Nothing fancy, but perfect for a quick trip to Disney
Summary: This was the perfect place for a short stay while visiting Disney with my 6 year old! Nothing fancy, but it served it's purpose. Our room was updated, very clean and comfortable.    It is a short walk to the Disneyland main gate which meant we could conveniently walk back to the room for a short rest in the middle of the afternoon.   The staff was friendly and helpful. We arrived in the morning before Disney opened. We were able to pre-register easily and park our car (parking is included in the price) and then walk to Disney. When we came back to rest, we just stopped in to reception to pick up our room key.  The next morning we checked out, but were able to leave the car parked at the hotel for the day (they said it was no problem since they weren't busy). With Disney parking
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the feedback and we were happy to see you and your daughter enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Clean rooms, Super close to the Park and great price. Staff was friendly and helpful.   We visit often and this has become a family favorite.   The beds weren't the best but they were not the worst either. The bathroom was clean which is HUGE for me.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the review and feedback.  We hope the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort, you will remember the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We recently stayed here for a trip to Disneyland. We are a family of 5 so we got the mini suite. It was spacious and clean! The hotel staff were all really nice except for the man who checked us in. I had parked in front of the hotel and ran in to check in and he just kept saying I would need to move the car because I was parked illegally and how if someone were to drive by the hotel they would hit my car- which I thought was really weird. I was only parked there for two minutes and it was 11 at night so no one was out. He wasn't nice like the rest of the hotel staff. No breakfast sucks, but we brought cereal and danish. Free parking is a definite plus! Free wifi was also great, it was a strong signal unlike other motels. The pool was fun for the kids while I soaked in the hot
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for posting your review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback and hope you will consider staying with us again if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: We didn't want to pay to stay in an expensive hotel, because we are PARK people and always spend most of our time in the parks.  The castle looked really cool and got good reviews, so we booked a room. Upon arrival, at 11:00 am, we asked if we could get an upgrade and have the room ready.  Both requests were granted and it only cost $30 a night for an awesome room.  It was a suite with a half wall and it was probably the biggest room we've ever stayed in.  There were four of us and my son got to sleep sideways on his own bed (pull out sofa).  The bathroom set up was fantastic with two sink and tons of counter space. The very best part was when we reviewed the trip, my ten year old son thought one of the highlights was "sleeping in the castle!"
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites recently.  We were very happy to read that your son enjoyed "sleeping in a Castle".  We appreciate the great feedback and hope you will return to your Castle the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Last minute trip, and we found accommodations here at Castle. Reasonable for a last minute, Saturday reservation. Room is big, with micro, hair dryer, and coffeemaker a plus. Parking situation can be better....  Thank you Castle!!! highly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review and hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stay here every time we go to Disneyland. Very friendly at the front desk. Rooms are always clean. Prices are reasonable and parking is free. Walking distance to the parks and CVS right across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for returning to the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your feedback during your recent stay, and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: Hello.  We are sitting at LAX talking about our great holiday and I decided to do a review.  We had a great time.  The staff are so friendly and helped a lot.  The rooms were good. The rooms were cleaned every day.  New towels were given even when not requested.  The walk to Disneyland was a breeze. The pool was good for relaxing my feet after walking around all day.  We didn't want to leave.  We were there for 22 days.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone.  The subway soup is delicious and just up the road from the hotel.  The cheesecake factory is up by the Garden Walk. Also we didn't discover the CVS pharmacy on the corner until this week.  I recommend that place too.  Its just not a pharmacy so check that out.  Thanks for the great stay.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for taking the time to write your review from your recent stay with us.  You provided great feedback regarding our location and the surrounding facilities, so we really appreciate that.    We hope if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort you will keep Castle Inn & Suites in mind for your home away from home.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The front desk staff was so helpful and pleasant.  We arrived at 10am and they let us park at the hotel for free while we went to Disneyland that day.  We simply walked 2 traffic lights down and crossed the road and we were there at the entrance.  There is a little convenient store that sells anything you forgot or need to pack in your backpack for snacks before heading to the parks as they open as early as 6am and as late as midnight.  The rooms were clean and well decorated.  The housekeeping staff did a great job resetting the room after my twin toddlers threw almost everything on the floor.  The bathroom light needed to be replaced and it was done in a snap.  The beds were comfy and they supplied lots of pillows.  Coffee machine and hair dryer in the room were very useful.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent stay with us.  Your feedback and attention to detail is very much appreciated.  We feel our location is superb, especially with all the restaurants and shops nearby, so thank you again for pointing that out.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Staff is extremely friendly and helpful. Rooms clean. Little store is great for snacks and incidentals.  Pool area is fantastic for family's with kids or not. Big hot tub, kids pool and regular sized pool! Oh and free parking!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent review, we appreciate the feedback and hope to see you again in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: Since check in wasn't until 3pm, I called and asked if it was possible to park in their parking lot while we go to Disneyland for the day. The woman on the phone was very pleasant and open to allowing us to do that. We parked and the front desk young man was very welcoming and knowledgable. Once we got into our hotel, it was VERY clean and everything was just perfect. We had a fridge, microwave, and some coffee in the room. Towels were abundant. They have a cute kids pool that is only a foot and a half deep. After a long day at Disneyland, the walk to this hotel wasn't bad at all. Location is great. Everything about this hotel made our trip very enjoyable! Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for the lovely review.  We appreciate the great feedback you provided and we were happy to hear our property worked well for you and your family.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We were happy with our stay at the Castle Inn and Suites. The hotel is pretty retro, but it was very clean and a great location close to Disneyland and restaurants. It was nice that it had a pool and hot tub. We would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about the hotel.  The hotel is an iconic building in the shape of a castle, right across from the Disneyland Resort.  The pool is heated and open year round.  Cleanliness, affordability and free WiFi seem to be the top concerns of families visiting Anaheim.  The Castle Inn strives to meet or exceed the expectations of all of our guests.We appreciate you choosing to stay with us and we await your next visit to Disneyland.

Summary: I stayed here for 5 nights and chose the hotel because it was on sale, and also a budget hotel near Disneyland.  The front desk really makes and effort to be helpful and the service is good.  The location of the hotel is good as it is a 10 minute walk to Disneyland and there are convenience stores across the street and some inexpensive restaurants next door.  The hotel room is decent enough and I liked the mini fridge.  I found the hotel to be noisy though as people come in groups and pull their suitcases on wheels past the rooms at all hours of the day and night.  And people let their children scream and yell and play without considering the noise level.  And the hotel guests left a lot of various garbage in the pool area still floating in the hot tub for example even though
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites on your recent visit to Anaheim.  The front desk makes customer service the number one priority.  As you mentioned it is only a short walk to the entrance of the Disneyland parks.  Along with the refrigerator, we hope you were able to enjoy the microwave, free coffee, free WiFi and free parking for one vehicle as well.  As with any major city, homeless tend to be in tourist areas.  Though they may be in the area, they are not generally on the property, our staff does an excellent job of deterring any would be trespassers.  We do not have complaints from guests about this issue in regards to the  property.  If we receive a complaint in regards to the area, that information is passed on to the local police force and it is up to the city to deal with the issue according to its policies.  We appreciate the kind words and can assure you the hotel is a safe an secure place to stay.  We hope to see you again if you choose to visit the Anaheim area.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Great Value and Close to Disneyland
Summary: Great staff and wonderful place to stay. So close to the Park a great central location.  Very clean.  Staff is very helpful with questions and directions.  Love the easy check in and check out.  Also love the easy booking through Get Away Today!  This is our favorite and number one place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to the Castle Inn & Suites!  We make guest service and happiness a top priority of the hotel.  We appreciate all of the positive feedback and your stays over the past years.  The hotel is definitely centrally located in the Disneyland Resort area.  Close to the entrances to the parks, the convention center, the Gardenwalk shopping center and plenty of restaurant options.  Thank you for making us your number one choice, we can't wait to see you again!

Summary: For around $150/night and in such close proximity to Disneyland, I was a little apprehensive in regards to what kind of room I'd be getting for that money. I was half-expecting a run-down, out-of-date room with some stiff, dingy towels and discolored sheets. I was very pleased to find a nice, up-to-date room with all of the necessary amenities you'd expect in a modern, middle-of-the-road hotel room. Nothing too fancy, but given the area, and the fact that it is within short walking distance to the Disneyland theme parks, a fantastic value. There is also a gift shop on site with some basic snacks, groceries and toiletries (and beer & wine!) The front desk staff was friendly and helpful as well. If we are ever in the area to visit Disneyland/CA Adventure again, we will be booking
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  The Castle Inn & Suites did a full renovation a few years ago.  At that time the rooms were taken down to bare walls and concrete and all of the furniture, wall paper, the counter tops, beds, all of the amenities etc were upgraded to the modern up to date rooms your party was able to enjoy.  We are happy to hear you found your home away from home in the Disneyland Resort area.  Along with the rooms, we have upgraded our WiFi recently, and we still offer free parking for one vehicle per room.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: The only thing good about this place is: Location to Disneyland!
Summary: Easy walk to Disneyland, as for the hotel: First thing I did was stripe the bed blankets and cover and requested new ones. Long black hair in bed:(. Rooms are dark and the rug was not vacuumed once in our 8 day stay. 4 times I found long black hair on my sheets or towels. The coffee in rooms is gross and not drinkable. 3 times our rooms were not made up by 4pm when we returned to rest. Hot tub had a lot of foamy stuff everywhere when turned on?? Desk staff were ok. Room staff did not understand English. We both woke up sick the first day - ? AC Filters
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  As mentioned the hotel is within easy walking distance to the entrance of the Disneyland Resort theme parks.  Our housekeeping staff works a full day, therefore some rooms are cleaned in the early hours of the day and some in the later hours.  If the front desk had been made aware that you would like to have your room cleaned prior to a certain time we could have arranged it with the housekeeping department.  We make every effort to address any guest complaint immediately, however we must be informed if there is an issue in a room.  In most cases it is a change in atmosphere, climate, or weather which could cause a person to wake up feeling less than 100 percent after traveling from one area to another and sleeping in a new city.  We are glad to hear the rest of the mornings you felt fine.  We hope that you and your family will come back and stay with us again so you can have a more positive memory of the Castle Inn & Suites.

Summary: Me and my fiance stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites for about 2 weeks and we loved it. The staff were very friendly, they have their own market store and self serve laundry room which was very convenient, a pool, a nice big closet for all your clothes, coffee machine, hairdryer, a mini fridge and a microwave, cable TV, great Wifi, table and chairs to eat at, aircon/heater, free parking and they are super quick if you need anything extra brought up to your room. The rooms were quite spacious and kept very clean. Disneyland is a less than 10 minute walk up the road. Everything I could have wanted for a hotel room, and at a good price too! The only complaint I would have is that the rooms are really dark, but apart from that we loved our stay and would definitely visit again!
Manager Response: We are very glad to hear you and your fiance enjoyed your lengthy stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Our staff is constantly trying to give the best possible customer service.  With prompt delivery of requested items, the complete rooms, and the amenities you mentioned in your review, it is an excellent choice for couples traveling, business travelers, or families.  Especially for a 2 week stay, the coin operated laundry is a real benefit.  The hotel decor was chosen in dark tones to support our medieval theme.  The location is tough to beat, close to the parks, close to the stores, close to restaurants.  We hope we made your stay memorable and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great experience at Castle Inn and Suites
Summary: Great staff, very helpful and have very friendly service! The rooms are nice and large. Close to Disneyland and California Adventure park for some fun days out, also close to the garden park which has nice restaurants and shops. Overall we had a great time there, and would definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for the compliments for our staff.  We always appreciate feedback from our past guests.  Friendly service is one of the most important aspects of our hotel.  The gardenwalk is a great place for food and shopping, along with Downtown Disneyland which is also within walking distance.  It is a very convenient location from the Gardenwalk, Downtown Disney, and the entrances to the parks.  We hope while you were here you were able to enjoy the heated pool, free parking for one vehicle, free WiFi and the other amenities included in the room.  We will be here when you choose to return to the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: We got a great price on three rooms through our travel agent. When we arrived in the early afternoon, our assigned rooms weren't ready, but the clerk moved us so we could check in right away and drop off our bags. The rooms were clean and comfortable. There was ample hot water and towels. The staff was friendly. At the end of the day when we were exhausted, it was a short walk back to the Inn. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Castle Inn.  We try to make adjustments when possible to make each guest's stay convenient.  We are happy to hear you appreciated the change by the Front Desk agent to allow your party an early check in.  As mentioned in the review the hotel is only a short walk from the Disneyland parks.  Also within walking distance are several restaurants, movie theater, the convention center and other entertainment options.  We await your next visit!  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel - Anaheim Convention Center or Disney
Summary: The staff is great!  Rooms are very large and are fully equipped for both business and leisure travel.  Very close to the Anaheim Convention Center and Disney.  Great selection of food and grocery nearby.  Excellent staff!  Very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We try to make every effort to ensure all of our guests will have a pleasant stay.  As mentioned the hotel is centrally located between the entrance to the Disney Theme parks and the Anaheim Convention Center.  With one of the fastest WiFi networks available it is ideal for the business traveler or a family with multiple devices in the same room.  The fact that the WiFi is included for free is another bonus of staying here.  We will see you next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary: Sorry my review is so late, I was reviewing pictures and realized I had never raved about our stay. I travelled in June with my 9 yr old and not yet 2 year old as well as my mother who is 72. I was impressed with the mulitiple handicapped parking spots throughout the property. The staff were friendly and helpful, which I totally appreciated. In the mornings, the housekeepers were friendly and many said "have a fun day". Our rooms was clean and comfy and I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for remembering the Castle Inn, we know after a vacation it can be easy to lose track of which hotel stood out in your memory.  We are happy to provide the best customer service we can for all of our guests.  The hotel is very family friendly and for a 9 and not quite 2 year old it is the perfect choice.  We hope the complete rooms with microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, and hair dryer came in handy.  We try to provide all necessary amenities for any guest with a disability including multiple disabled parking spots throughout the property.  Cleanliness and comfort are 2 of the main reasons people choose the hotel.  We hope to see you and your family again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights and found it met all our needs quite nicely. The standout feature was the friendliness and helpfulness of all the staff we met, nothing was too much trouble. We would have rated this a 5 if there was a restaurant on site, but really this didn't matter that much as it is within easy walking distance to several restaurants and takeouts. Only 5 minutes walk to Disneyland and bus stop 20meters from the gate for all other attractions, the Castle Inn and Suites is highly recommended as an affordable family accommodation option.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words about the Castle Inn & Suites!  As you mentioned there is no restaurant on site, however this is due to the many restaurants within walking distance.  The Gardenwalk shopping center right behind the hotel has many restaurants including Bubba Gump's, Cheesecake Factory, P.F Chang's, McCormick and Schmicks, and several others.  There are also many affordable options near the hotel such as Subway, Tony Romo's, Denny's, IHOP, and a new Panera Bread that just opened.  Customer service is a top priority of the hotel and we are glad we met your every need.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Very helpful front desk staff. Loved the gift shop next door. Felt like a king and queen in our castle. Would recommend this hotel for anyone wanting to go to Disneyland with lovely restaurants on the road too. Alberta even helped us with some adjustments to our hire car. Housekeeping was lovely - overall a lovely stay!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review of your stay.  We are always happy to help guests with any service we can provide.  It is true Disneyland and many restaurants are right within walking distance of the hotel.  There are plans for several more restaurants to open up in the area as well!  We hope that during your stay you were able to enjoy the free parking for your one vehicle, free WiFi and of course the amenities inside the room.  We hope on your next visit to Anaheim you will choose the Castle Inn & Suites again.  You will always be treated like royalty at the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: We visited as a family of four adults in a four day trip to Disneyland.  This hotel was excellent for a short stay - within an easy two block walk to the security entrance to Disneyland, spotlessly clean with daily room service.  The desk staff were very friendly and helpful and the amenities were well kept, including the fridge and microwave.  Our rooms were on the fourth floor, and very quiet, the traffic noise from Harbor Blvd. was indistinguishable. We especially appreciated the option to not have the linens and towels changed daily, though the beds were made every day and the room restocked and cleaned. The only negative thing I can think of is the in room coffee and tea were not very pleasant,but this seems common in a standard hotel! This hotel is highly recommended if
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We try to make every guest stay pleasant and memorable.  We are glad you enjoyed the amenities of the hotel including the refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker.  During this time of drought every little bit counts.  By cutting down the amount of linens we have to wash on a daily basis, it can impact the amount of water used and help save thousands of gallons of water over time.  Thank you for your compliments of the staff as well!  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Within a 2 block walk from the main gates, near to restaurants, includes a fridge & microwave for any meals you wish to eat in. Very comfortable & quiet. Staff are extremely helpful, professional, and friendly. There are also 3 pools, all outside - 1 is 5ft deep for swimming, a separate kiddie pool, and a lovely hot tub/jacuzzi.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the great review and all "5's" we hope to see you the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: The worst hotel We ever stay at
Summary: Dark ,Bug bites, Dirty  Stayed here  7 days    I got  bites every single day we stayed It was not  A good  place to stay The Manger was  a little shady when  I came  down to  tell him  What had happen  Know  one in my family was  bitten only me Never again !!!!!!! Very small pool Dirty sheets Blood(( Stained)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your stay.  We apologize that you had an unfortunate experience.  The Castle Inn & Suites uses a nationally recognized pest control service to prevent the type of thing you have reported.  It seems odd that you were the only one in your party who had this experience.  We inspect rooms on a regular basis and we make every effort to address any guest report immediately.  Although attempts to contact you regarding this matter have been unsuccessful, we hope you will give the Castle Inn & Suites another opportunity to accommodate your party so you may have a more pleasant stay like the majority of our guests.

Summary: We were there for the NAMM convention. Hotel is a short walk to the Convention Center. Rooms are clean, comfortable and are set up perfectly for family vacations, not for business. ( No convenient place to charge devices. Television is only basic cable.) The hotel was completely booked and the front desk staff was top gun! Helped us with parking, allowed us to check in a little early, easy check out. Housekeeping was overwhelmed and missed cleaning our room the first day. When I called that evening, the front desk staff immediately had someone from housekeeping come up. Good value. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us during the NAMM show.  We appreciate your feedback.  We were a bit surprised to hear you had problems with outlets to plug in devices, as our recent renovation we added extra electrical outlet's, to make this more convenient.  We look forward to seeing you again next year if you plan on attending the NAMM show once again.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Not fancy but clean and they were nice.  I was there with my daughter, her husband and 5 children ages 15 mos-12 yrs old.  We stayed in a family suite which had 2 bedrooms, 1 bath with an extra sink in the 1 bedroom. 1 king size and 2 queen size beds.  Plenty of towels, a microwave and fridge. The fridge actually was colder than many small ones at other places we have stayed.   We brought food for breakfast and snacks to take into the park. The pool was small and not heated,but there is a hot tub. It was pretty crowded the one night we wanted to go.the weather was pretty cool while we were there, but The kids went one night for a short time.       It was a great location.  There is a group of fast food places just to the right, including Panda Express, Subway, bbq, and a
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the detailed feedback you provided.  Guest feedback is always welcome and helpful so we can continue to strive to be the best we can be.  Our pool is heated year round, so we were surprised to hear that you thought it was cold.  We hope you reported this to our front desk staff as maybe there was an isolated situation that one day.
