Once again, thank you for your review and we hope to see you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Nice, clean and pretty quiet for the most part
Summary: We enjoyed our stay for the clean and quietness for our stay for four nights.  However, staff was very quick to fix a problem on the first day we arrived, but when the problem came up again near the end of our stay, they didn't seem to care, or fix it anymore.  I also noticed the bathtub holds shower water too long to drain, as others have noted.  The beds were comfy, they just need to get new sheets, some days were old scratchy sheets when room was serviced.  They had a convenient fridge, microwave, and coffee single serve.  Carpets were clean, no dirty socks if walking around, and of course it was quiet, not bad at all for sleeping in a bit.  The walk to the park wasn't too far, about ten minutes for us, and close to lots of restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites, we appreciate you staying with us recently and for the review.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We cannot describe how much we love this hotel. We stayed last week for 6 nights. We stayed there december 2014 and were able to get the same family suite. This place is clean and quiet, a great location, with lots of dining options around. Parking is free which is a huge plus. There's no breakfast but we made our own from groceries at target, which is a huge savings. The service from all staff is incredible, a huge shout out to Alberta and all the desk staff. It's close to the park, a 12 minute walk. Stay here, you'll be happy you did!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for your lovely review and comment's.  We will certainly be sharing this with the staff, and hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: It has been 40 years since last in Disneyland in many ways it has changed a lot and yet it has not changed at all. The hotel we choose "The Castle Inn" could not have been better, the staff (and Dave) were great and willing to help when needed. For the price and quality you can't beat it. Disneyland was a 10min walk and there are lot of great places to eat. Need a break from Disneyland, the beach is just an hour local bus ride away.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the great feedback, and comments regarding our staff and location.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Good location for a Disney visit (though the area is surprisingly lacking in good restaurant options, but that's not the hotel's fault). Basic but clean and comfortable rooms. A few very minor problems, such as a slow draining shower, but hardly enough to complain about.    We didn't hear much noise from neighbouring rooms, although the motel-style layout with exterior doors means that people regularly walk past your door and window, which can be noisy at times (and means no privacy if you want your curtains open).  Good service and friendly staff who were accommodating of special requests. Somewhat inconsistent cleaning (a couple of days of our stay, they clearly didn't vacuum), but generally things were fine.  WiFi was better than expected.  Pool area is sparse, and in the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your feedback.    We hope you will keep us in mind the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Do not let the two star rating fool you!
Summary: We stayed for a quick Disney trip, like most reviewers. If it had not been for previous TripAdvisor reviewers, I most likely would not have booked this hotel because it has a two star rating. I usually check three star hotels and up when I'm looking for accommodations, but I am glad that I did not do that this time. The rooms have a motel type setup with doors being on the outside, however they are extremely clean and well laid out. Not to be dismissed is the free parking, free wifi and a short walk to restaurants and the onsite store. We did not try the pool or spa but we could tell it was a very popular  as we saw many families using it. Staff was friendly.After taxes ,on a non peak weekend, our total was approx 250 after taxes for two nights. I will book again!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the review you provided and it was nice to hear all the great feedback you provided.  Thank you once again, and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed here one night with our family. We stayed in the family suite which was perfect for both of our families traveling. The have heated pool and hot tub which the adults and kids enjoyed. They are one block from Disneyland so the walk was so easy. They also offer FREE parking and WiFi which is unheard of anymore. Staff was very nice and answered any questions we had. We will stay here again foresure.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to post your review.  We enjoyed the great feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Castle Inn and Suites Anaheim - Across the road from Disneyland Parks
Summary: The Castle Inn and Suites hotel is perfectly situated, just a five minute walk to the Disneyland Parks, and close to convenience stores and food stores. Once we arrived, we didn't need to use our car to go anywhere. It was all in walking distance from this clean and friendly complex. Great value for money and friendly and helpful staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites on your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review and great feedback.  We hope to see you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great location- large clean rooms and helpful staff
Summary: Stayed during Christmas for two nights. Loved the location comfortable bedding and nice towels.  The staff was prompt and super attentive.  Easy walk to Disneyland, they have a small store on property and a close walk to restaurants and stores.  We will be returning!
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your stay with us in December.  Thank you for taking the time to write your review.  We appreciate the kind words, and look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,

Summary: Spacious rooms, easy walk to the convention center, comfy beds. Good value for the location and a pleasant surprise. Staff is friendly and rooms are clean. The on site store near the entrance is also well stocked and incredibly useful.  If you are coming into town for a convention and aren't planning to spend a lot of time in your room this place is perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and taking the time to provide your feedback.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The Castle Inn was fantastic with customer service and very accommodating.  Perfect location for all the sites.  The staff was very professional, friendly and informative  The room was clean and comfortable, with a refreshing pool and relaxing spa  Highly recommend staying at the Castle Inn
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff here is extremely friendly, helpful, and accommodating. The room was clean,  and had plenty of towels, shower water pressure was excellent, and the beds are comfy. There's also a little mini mart downstairs which is nice to have for last-minute necessities. Highly recommend for convention travelers, and families traveling to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for your recent review of your stay with us during the NAMM show.  We appreciate all the great feedback you provided and hope to see you next year if you are returning to the NAMM show in 2017.  Mahalo,

Summary: We would definitely be coming back. My family really enjoyed the stay and the staff was very friendly and welcoming. It's a walking distance to Disneyland and from Bubba Gumps. This was a our first Disneyland trip so to stay in such a nice place was great. I can't forget all the different restaurants around us. Over all it was a great stay and I can't forget the hot tub my little ones loved it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the review and look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: This is a great location just a short walk from Disneyland. We stayed at another place on our last visit to Disneyland just across the street from the Disney entrance and we decided to go back to the Castle even though its a little further walk. The family suite is awesome. It has two rooms, a large tv in each, with three beds total. Enough room for the whole family to be comfortable. They have plenty of parking with easy access for SUV's (no twenty point turns). The rooms are clean and well stocked. The only issue we had was that we heard a leak one night dripping above the bathroom from the floor above. I notified the staff in the morning and it was taken care of the same day while we were at the Parks. Thanks Castle, we'll be back!
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you so much for your review and feedback.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We are Disneyland season passholders, so we visit several times a year.  However, we live 600 miles away, so a hotel stay is a must.  We like to save money by staying at hotels across the street from Disneyland, and we also try different hotels from time to time, based on Tripadvisor reviews.  We were pleasantly surprised with our stay at the Castle Inn and Suites.  The staff at check in was amazingly friendly.  Our room was not ready, but we were able to park our car, use their clean restrooms to freshen up, and then we walked to the park.  We timed our walk, and were on Disney property at the shuttle drop-off zone in just 7 minutes.  When we returned to the hotel that evening we went in to see what room we were in, and the staff on duty then was just as friendly.  Our room was
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites on your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review and hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: It was our first time to go to Disneyland and we were looking for a place to stay that is comfortable and convenient as we have our 2 year old daughter.  The hotel is clean and spacious. Staff are friendly and accommodating. We always get back to a room that is clean and beddings were always arranged. The only issue bwe had is that the disc inside the microwave was always getting off its base and creating lots of noise when we use it.Nonetheless, its still useful. It's only a few minutes walk to the Disneyland park.There are a lot of stores/establishments to buy food and snacks. WIFI is very good and fast.  It's also close to the drop off and pick up point of Disneyland Resort Express. Will surely use their service again when we go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the feedback and hope you reported the concern with your microwave.  That sounds like it could have been an easy fix, so we hope you reported that to our front desk.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are planning a trip to the Disneyland area.  Warm Regards,

Summary: It's been time to post a review on this hotel.  We have been staying over 18 years here and there. And every time we stay they go out of their way. They lets us check in early to get as much time to visit Disneyland. There rooms are always so clean and the staff are always friendly. Thank you so much!
Manager Response: We would like to say a big thank you for being our guest for the past 18 years.  We appreciate the support and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.Thank you for taking the time to post a review!  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Our wonderful Stay At Castle Inn Hotel.
Summary: The Castle Inn is located a few blocks from Disneyland and is within easy walking distance.   Upon our late night arrival without reservations we were greated by a wonderful staff member. We were given a very affordable price for an upgraded room. The room was very clean, had lovely decor and full accommodations.   The hotel offeres a conviently stocked store with a good variety of items. The parking lot is adequate with a pool and laundry room center stage.The office is lovely, comfortable to relax in and the staff is accommodating.   There is not a breckfast offered but it is conviently surrounded by restaurants and shopping centers.   We really enjoyed our three night stay and look forward to returning soon. We recommend this Hotel to everyone!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Your feedback was perfect, and we thank you.  We hope to welcome you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We wanted somewhere in walking distance to Disneyland, and comfortable enough to accommodate a family of 4 with a 19yo son and a 10yo son without them sharing a bed.  We knew we were going to have a couple of big tiring days. Check in was so quick and smooth and the staff were super friendly. The family suite at this hotel was absolutely fantastic!   When we walked in we had a queen size bed, a fridge/cabinet with a flat screen, desk and chair and wardrobe.  The bathroom was then next just past the queen bed and was really spacious with a hairdryer and had the best shower pressure!!!  Then you walked into a another bedroom that had 2 separate double beds, another flat screen tv, another sink, another hairdryer and another desk and chair.  Both rooms has heaps of storage for
Manager Response: Thank you so much for writing such a fantastic review from your recent stay.  We are happy you enjoyed our Family Suite which offers the King Bed in the front room and 2 Queen Beds in the back room.  Families really seem to enjoy this room type.    We look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans return you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warm Regards,

Summary Heading: Loved the big rooms and easy access to Disneyland
Summary: My husband and I stayed here for our 36th anniversary. Every night Fireworks from Disneyland rocked our room but we weren't able to see them.... However, the room was clean, big and cozy! Easy walking distance into the Parks. Only took us 10 minutes. We wish the laundry had earlier and later hours because we were gone to Disneyland from 7:30 to about 10:00 every day. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for spending your anniversary with us.  We appreciate the great feedback and hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Sincerely,

Summary: I truly did enjoy my stay here.  The rooms were clean and the location was within walking distance to Disneyland.  It was also located near several great eating locations.  The only problem my husband and I had were the uncomfortable large square pillows.  It made it hard to sleep sometimes.  The noise from upstairs could be heard from our room (2nd floor) but nothing that would not let me recommend this hotel.  Overall, I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review from your recent stay with us.  We are sorry to hear our pillows were not comfortable for you.  We have so many guests that want to purchase our pillows that we understand they may not work for everyone.  We do hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Everything we were looking for during our Disney vacation.
Summary: Front desk staff was friendly and helpful on check-in and check-out.  The room was large and tastefully decorated.  They added more towels as our stay progressed, that is always appreciated!  Coffee maker was a bit of a joke.  It was a one cup unit, but I had to run the cycle about 5 times to fill a cup.  Good thing I was never in a hurry..  Beds were comfortable, temperature was easy to maintain.  Free (and fast) wi-fi, free parking and the 3 block walk to Disneyland saved us a lot of money.  We appreciated a nice warm and secure hotel to return to after 2 soggy, rainy days at Disneyland.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the comment regarding our friendly staff and nice rooms.  We are sorry to hear you had some issues with the coffee maker.  These are fairly new, so we hope you reported this to the front desk as we could have replaced it immediately.    We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed at the hotel due to the proximity to Disneyland. The hotel fitted that as it was only 500 metres from the front gate. The rooms are a good size and fitted our needs as we only needed a bed. The room was clean and tidy and was cleaned every day. There was laundry facilities in the complex which is very handy. The staff were extremely helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to the Disneyland Resort.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Our stay was very comfortable and convenient for a 3 day Disneyland visit. The front desk was very quick and helpful, and was able to give us a room when we checked in around 9am on a Friday morning. The room was a good value for the price and for the proximity to the park entrance. I would recommend for a an inexpensive place to stay on a short trip to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate review and hope to see you again in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Great Price for a great location
Summary: I read reviews on line before booking and was hoping for the best.  Boy I was not disappointed.  Checked in with a nice friendly young man, room was clean and all requests were met in a timely manner.  We checked in on December 26th, I knew it would be busy and the property would more than likely be full however I asked for a ground floor.  The 3rd and 4th floor were the only ones available however I was given a room across from the elevator which was quite helpful as I was with two teenage and one 9 year old girl.  Upon entering the room everything was fresh and clean.  The room is quite spacious compared to some of the other properties in the area I have stayed at.  It fit four of us with room to spare, we were not right on top of each other when we were in the room.  My first
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the very detailed review from your stay with us in December.  Your attention to details regarding our hotel, your room, our staff, and location was perfect.  We know many guests read others review's so we appreciate all the points of interest.  We feel our free parking and free wi fi is a better value than breakfast, and as you mentioned, there are numerous places nearby to get breakfast.    We offer iron & ironing boards, so if you do come back and need these, simply call our guest service desk and we will send one right up for you.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Good Location but not so comfortable stay
Summary: I have picked this hotel due to it's proximity to Disneyland, it's actually very close walking up to the maingate doesn't take more than 15 minute. However it's one of the poorest hotels we have stayed in. They say all the rooms are refurbished around a year back, but honestly I think they did a very sloppy job on that. The rooms are smelly and old looking. You can always hear footsteps or trolley car sounds outside your room.  I guess only good things about our stay were, Close proximity to Disneyland Fast and free wifi Easy and free parking
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback from your recent stay with us.  Although the majority of our guests enjoy our property, we realize we may not be the property for everyone, so once again, we appreciate the feedback.  Sincerely,

Summary: I was extremely happy with my stay here, the bed was comfortable and everything was very clean, the maid service did a wonderful job. The hotel was really close in proximity to Disneyland and California adventure which made getting there extremely easy. The staff at the front desk were very helpful and even printed off my boarding pass for me, 110% would stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the review and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Alma at the front desk was very helpful.  We had 3 rooms for 5 nights and they were very clean and comfortable.  Loved the towel swans the cleaning staff created for us.  We arrived prior to check in time and they were very good about allowing us to get a parking pass so we could walk around before we came back to check in.  Very convenient walking distance to Disneyland entrance.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Christmas Vacation.  It was very nice to read your positive review and we appreciate the kind words regarding our front desk staff member.  We look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I would rate this hotel as 'good', so higher than 'average'. The room we had was clean and seemed to be 'up to date'. The hotel itself felt like it was starting to get 'tired' on the outside. Especially along the outside hallways and the outer stairwells. But not a deal breaker. The bathroom, especially the tub, was on the small side, but it met our needs well enough. It's a fairly large hotel and when busy you hear as people travel past your room on the outside hallways. But that's what you get with that style of hotel. Our experience was that it was quiet at night and we had the top floor and so no guest rooms above us.  There was a large-ish wardrobe to hang our clothing. We had a microwave and small fridge which we put to good use. The one thing that I feel could have been
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us this past November.  We appreciate the detailed review and feedback.  We do hope to see you again in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: I stayed here many many years ago and my new partner and daughter have continued the tradition recently in a visit to Disneyland for the first time! Daughter loved this popular castle-themed hotel! Specially its closeness to Disney and remarked on the pools and the super friendly staff! Rooms have fridges soft comfortable beds and big tv's! In her words "really really nice!!" Great example of how an affordable hotel in Anaheim should be run!! Four stars from an Aussie traveller!
Manager Response: We thank you very much for the kind words in your recent review.  It was so nice to hear you stayed with us years ago and that you returned with new friends.  We know you are a long way from home, so if your travel plans bring you back to Anaheim again in the near future, we hope you will make the Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Excelent instalations and service very close to Disneyland!!! The rooms are very clean and they are alweys with a nice smile to help you for any request while we stay in. Definitly we will go back in the next vacation to Disney!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us this past December.  We appreciate the kind words and look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland, good value level hotel.
Summary: The rooms are clean, and well kept. We were there with our two daughters and 3 granddaughters. The heating unit was rather noisy, and the elevators aren't exceptionally well-placed, but it's a family friendly hotel in a very busy location.  The pool area was clean, and the hot tub was a welcome sight for sore feet at the end of a day in the parks.  We arrived before check-in and they gave us a key to the pool area and towels and let us eat lunch and relax while the rooms were readied.  All of our needs were met quickly and cordially.  We'd stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind review.  We really appreciate it and hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warm Regards,

Summary: First entrance into the inn made our trip great from the start. Very warm & welcoming.Front desk host Alberta, including everyone who serviced us throughout our 5 day stay were very nice, personable & helpful. They were kind enough to allow an early check in because we arrived early. That made a great difference because we were really tired from traveling. Our comfortable room was always cleaned & refreshed every time we returned, and the service staff was very pleasant. We rested & relaxed in their cozy lobby & stored our bags in their luggage room, while we waited for our shuttle to pick us up. That was also great because our pick up time was a few hours after our check out time, & due to rain we had to stay in. Our warmest Aloha & thank you to the friendly staff at Castle Inn
Manager Response: Aloha from the Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you very much for the lovely review, we really appreciate it.  We take pride in our first-class guest service, so thank you very much for taking note, and writing about it.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We Highly recommend this hotel.  My Mom and I stayed overnight to visit Disneyland. It was a Wonderful experience.  The location was great, a short walk to Disney Parks and restaurants (Tony Roma's, IHOP, Dennys, etc.) We had a late check-in, when we checked out in the morning, we received a free parking permit, so we didn't have to move our car while visiting Disneyland. The Staff was very pleasant and personable.  Rooms were clean and well maintained. They have an on-site convenience store for those items you forgot to pack.  You won't be disappointed with this hotel or their staff.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the lovely review and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Brought my kids here for new years week to spend time at Disneyland. We arrived before check in and they held our luggage while we walked to Downtown Disney. I like how close it was to Disneyland so I could take my younger child back for naps while my older kids played in the pool. Had a mini fridge and microwave in the room although i only used it one time. Lots of restaurants within walking distance. Most of those even had free room delivery if you choose. All the staff was very friendly. Only thing I have negative to say is that the walkway to the rooms were kind of like a rollercoaster. Not sure if that was how it was built or if it needed repairing. We stayed on the third floor. The stairs were much quicker then the elevator. Housekeeping came later into the afternoon while
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the feedback.  If you do return to the Castle Inn & Suites, feel free to call the front desk each day to request maid service at a specific time, we are more than happy to take those requests.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This is the second time I have stayed at the Castle Inn. I found it a good hotel for my family of 4 with the rooms large, clean and an outdoor pool and laundry. The biggest positive is that it is walking distance to Disneyland as well as local restaurants. Main negatives, really small bathroom and no fridge,microwave or safety deposit boxes in the rooms.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for being a returning guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your review so thank you for posting this.  We were a bit confused regarding your comment on the microwave and refrigerator.  All guest rooms at the Castle Inn & Suites have a microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker and hair dryer.  We offer complimentary safety deposit boxes at our front desk.  The microwave and refrigerator are right under the TV.   Once again, thank you for your review, we hope to see you again.  Sincerely,

Summary: My family and I stayed at Castle Inn & Suites for 3 nights/4 days during New Years. The front desk staff were very polite and helpful. The room was clean and comfortable. They offer refrigerator and microwave which was a plus for families traveling with children. Free parking, free Wi-Fi, and you can walk to Disneyland. Definitely saved lots of money staying there. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for making the Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home while visiting the Disneyland Resort.  We appreciate the kind review and look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We booked a twin double for our family of four. The room was extremely spacious with two lovely queen sized beds, lovely table and chairs with a fridge, microwave and mini coffee machine. It also has excellent quality laundry facilities at a very reasonable cost. It was only a 10 minute walk from Disneyland with lots of restaurants nearby. It also has a pool and spa. the staff were wonderful and so helpful. Would definitely stay there again if we visited Disneyland in the near future.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and were able to relax.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Warm Regards,

Summary: This is a good hotel if you just plan to sleep and go to Disneyland.  The rooms are a good size. Microwave and mini refrigerator, coffee maker in room.  I did not like that there was not a good deadbolt lock on the door. The doors can be opened by the handle from inside the room---NOT good if yo have small children who try to open the door. Because they can open it and go out. Four story hotel. One elevator broke so a long wait for the was was working. You can hear housekeeping rolling their carts in the hall. Average price for the room.  Nice, friendly staff. Free parking but no shuttle to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your review from your recent stay with us.  Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate it.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Good hotel to stay near disneyland
Summary: Hotel looks like a castle from front. The rooms are big with all facilities that you will get in other hotels. There is a store inside this hotel where you will get drinking water bottle at reasonable price compare to other stores. Overall a good place to stay if you are planning to stay at a walking distance from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to provide your review.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Newly renovated motel room for decent price
Summary: Stayed one night at the last minute in a family suite. Loved the layout of 2 queens and 1 King! Rooms were in fine shape, nicely renovated motel is where I classified them. We were woken at 6:15am as families started leaving for Disneyland by the pounding of children's feet. We could hear every kid who ran down the outside corridor on the 2nd floor and we were out on a wing. Ultimately I felt safe at the property & slept fine. There was a pool and hot tub in the middle of the U shaped complex's parking lot. Would recommend for families on a budget looking for more space and for those looking to grab a single night in Anaheim at a decent price with space for everyone.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and providing your review from your stay.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed at the Castle inn for 8 nights and had a wonderful clean room and excellent service from the front desk. Very convenient location for Disneyland and family friendly budget oriented places to eat. Nice little pool area for the children, handy laundry facilities, and wifi included. We will definitely go back to the Castle again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the review and look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: A great stay but probably will do a different hotel next time for a couple reasons.
Summary: We had a very pleasant stay at this hotel for our trip to Disneyland. There were pros and just a couple cons for me. Though it looks very dated from the outside, the rooms inside are very updated! We stayed in a 2 room family suite  and it was perfect for us. In the second bedroom was it's own sink and vanity, which is very helpful when sharing a bathroom. The front desk was very pleasant, helpful, and accommodating. There was a small market at the hotel, that was good to have whenever we needed to get snacks or drinks and didn't want to spend 3 times as much at the park. There were only 2 things that were cons for me. In a lot of the reviews, it says its a 7-10 walk to the park, however, with all the traffic lights, it takes more like 20 minutes. I was under the impression from
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your recent review from your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the feedback on our pleasant and helpful staff, and recently renovated guest rooms.  We have a castle theme exterior, so although it's not modern many assume it's dated, but it has its charm we feel.    Our Staff has taken the time to walk to the main entrance to Disneyland so we have the appropriate time frame to provide our guests. We do not take the light's in to consideration; of course this would vary. Our average walk time is 7-10 minutes.  Our property does face the back of California Adventure, so we are considered "across the street".  We provide complimentary in-room coffee and are surrounded by many restaurants for breakfast, lunch and dinner choices. There is even a Coffee Bean nearby.  We feel the complimentary parking and free WI FI are a better value to our guest's.  Once again, thank you for your feedback.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I have stayed at the Castle inn many times. staff is always helpful and friendly, a short walk to Disneyland. Close to many restaurants and convention center. I find the price very reasonable rooms are a good size and we'll kept
Manager Response: Thank you very much for being a repeat guest of the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great Stay for a trip to Disneyland.
Summary: This is a great location. Just a short walk away from Disneyland. The rooms were clean and with plenty of room. We called ahead to make sure we could park before checking in time. We arrived and our rooms were already ready and were able to check in early. The staff was very friendly and helpful.  We were given rooms near the elevator and that wasn't a problem. We were however were on the same floor as the maid's carts are stocked and stored and they were left out in the walkway most of the day. However that has not deterred us from booking another room there for our next planned trip down to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for providing your review from your stay with us in November.  We appreciate the kind words regarding our location, our easy check in process and or friendly staff.    We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans return you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Comfortable room, Priced right. Convenient access to main entrance of Disneyland. Varied restaurants/bars within walking distance of hotel. Shuttle transport to and from airport, although not right st the hotel, is a short walk to Bus Stop near the hotel. Will definitely consider booking again. Sorry no comments on the pool or hot tub, didn't use them this trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the feedback from your stay, hopefully next time you will be able to relax by the pool.  Once again, thank you, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We wanted a budget friendly trip to Disneyland this time so we looked at economy hotels. This hotel was definitely in our price range and we were surprised at the rooms. Very spacious and newly renovated. Beds were very comfortable and rooms were clean. Bathrooms could use a bit of a renovation but the rest of te room did not disappoint. It was roughly about a 5 minute walk to the Disneyland main gates which was ideal and located across the street from a CVS and the ABC Mart. The hot tub was nice after a long day at Disney. We arrived an hour before check in and were checked in immediately upon arrival by a very friendly staff. Although they say the outdoor pool is heated, I'm guessing it's likely not. The temperature in the pool was so cold you could hardly get in it. But since
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide a review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the kind words regarding our rooms, location and the ease of your check in process.  We have had numerous cool days this December, so although our pool is heated year round, we can see where it may have felt cold.    We hope you will keep us in mind if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great place for large party of guests/family!
Summary: This was our 2nd stay at the Castle Inn for a visit to Disneyland. The family suite was perfect for our party of 3 adults and two children. The gift shop had snacks, sodas, and souvenirs which was perfect for getting milk for my toddler. The room included a refrigerator and microwave. There were two vanities which allowed us all to get ready at the same time. My only negative would be that I like a softer bed and the bed was a little firm. I would definitely stay again and would recommend for Disneyland visitors.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  It was nice to hear our Family Suite worked well for you and your family.  Our beds are just about 2 years old, and most guests have complimented us on our mattress, so much ,where they want to purchase them, but we understand that everyone has a different comfort level on various mattress', so thank you for not having this prevent you from returning to the Castle Inn & Suites on your next Disneyland visit.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The location is fantastic for Disneyland.  However, we called ahead and asked if we could park more than one car in their parking lot, and they said absolutely.  As a result we took two cars with us, since we were two couples traveling and meeting there.  When we got there, a woman who seemed to be a manager told us that wasn't the policy.  She allowed us to park the second car for one day, and told us we could check in each morning to see if there was room, although she was not polite about it.  Each morning when we checked to see if there was room they gave us a really hard time, and really put some stress on that part of the trip.  I feel that even if there were a discrepancy between the person we spoke to on the phone and the policy, there were far kinder ways to have
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your feedback from your recent stay with us.  Thank you for commenting on our fantastic location.  We understand there was some confusion regarding our parking policy.  We allow 1 complimentary vehicle per registered room.  Our Reservation Staff and Front Desk staff are fully trained on our policy regarding parking, so it sounds as if there was some confusion on who you spoke to.  December has been fairly busy, and we make all concessions to allow for extra vehicles when we can, however; when we our projected to be sold out, we must insure we have a parking spot for all guest arrival's.  We are fortunate where we are adjacent to the Anaheim Garden Walk where public parking is available.  It sounds as if you did not have to move your second vehicle off site, so we must have made a concession for you to keep your second vehicle on property. We are sorry this added stress to your stay, and hope you will understand our position,we are only looking out for all hotel guest's.  Sincerely,

Summary: This hotel is very convenient to many restaurants,  pharmacy and a short walk to Disneyland. We had a large room which was great to spread out in with a family of 4, large bathroom and vestibule area. The staff are very friendly and helpful. My only complaint was how dark the room was, often some of our lighting didn't turn on which was annoying. Apart from the dark room it is a lovely comfortable place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for writing your review.  Thank you for commenting on our location, room size and friendly, helpful staff.  Our room decor is in the darker, richer fabrics and furnishings to compliment our castle-theme, so we are sorry if the lighting was not adequate.  We hope you contacted the front desk right away, as any item not working in a guest room would be addressed immediately.  We thank you again, and hope to see you in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: A repeat visit and like always, very pleased.  Stayed on second floor, quiet all around meaning no noise even through ceiling above.  Very clean, well appointed rooms.  Beds VERY comfortable.  Plenty of room to stretch out and be comfortable.  Frig and microwave, plus ice machine close by.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for being a returning guest.  We appreciate the lovely review and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Highly recommended this Hotel. Staff are friendly and helpful, Rooms are clean, comfortable and location is great.  There is a pool and shops and restaurants are close by.  Disney is only a 5 min walk.  Thank you for a great start to our visit to California.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for staying with us recently, and for the nice review.  Your feedback is valuable, and we appreciate it very much.    We look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Once again a great night's sleep near Disneyland
Summary: We visited Disneyland from November 30th to December.  We called Castle Inn itself and got our favorite mini suite room at a great price.  When I checked in, the manager, Marc, was there to say hello.  We stayed three nights in a very clean room filled with lots of clean towels.  The beds are very comfortable.  My daughter, my self, and her three toddlers love the first floor mini suite.  They have room to run up and down the length of the suite and look out the tall floor level window.   The hotel is actually a twelve minute walk to Disneyland. We found the hotel very quite. They have plenty of free parking.  We did not use nearby eateries because we used the fridge & microwave. We ate one meal a day at Disneyland.   This is the the only hotel I will stay at Disneyland.
Manager Response: A very big thank you for your lovely review of your recent stay with us.  We appreciate your feedback and it was nice to read all the lovely points of interest you pointed out.  We look forward to welcoming you back when your plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We have been staying at this hotel for several years.  There has been recent renovations, which have helped to freshen up the rooms.  Free parking is hard to come by at hotels in this area, so being able to park our car for free and walk to the parks is a huge plus.  The staff was very friendly!  We will continue to frequent this hotel in the future!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the kind words and look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Excellent location to visit Disneyland. Fridge and microwave was nice and comfortable beds.  Very handy to many restaurants, fast food, 711, ABC and pharmacy within a 5 minute walk. Great service. Outdoor pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great review and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed four nights with four teenagers in a parlor suite room. It was big enough when we slept in the room. Very convenient to Disneyland. We had a room overlooking the street. I was worried it would be noisy but it was not. Would defiantly stay again. Only bad was the frig did not get very cold. Was afraid milk would spoil. But with four teenagers it never lasted that long.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent review from your stay with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  It was nice to see that our Parlor Suite worked well for you and your family.    We hope you will keep us in mind when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Right across the road from Disney land. No restaurant at the hotel, quite a noisy hotel. Plenty of parking. Eateries near by. Unfortuneately a long drive to the city and beaches. Suggest stay near the city and do all the attractions there and then Anaheim on the way out.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide your feedback from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Anaheim is centrally located and within miles from the Beaches, Los Angeles and other surrounding cities that offer attractions. and shopping.    Majority of guests coming to the Disneyland Resort stay in Anaheim as their home base and select day trips to the Beach, Knott's Berry Farm, Universal Studio's and San Diego.  We understand the location may not have suited you and your family, but hope you will consider staying here again, if your plans bring you to the Disneyland area in the future.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: Great location, spacious rooms and exceptionally friendly and helpful staff. 10 minute walk to Disneyland and minutes to restaurants & shops. Bus stop almost directly outside the hotel gives you access to the local buses and makes an easy pickup and drop off point for tours and other transport.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your recent review from your stay with us.  We appreciate the time you took, and providing your feedback.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Amazing Service from start to finish
Summary: I can not say enough positive things about our stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. There service, friendly staff and surprises from the housekeepers.  We started our week vacation on a bad note when I forgot our stroller at home and we did not realize it until we were at the airport. I was stressed and worried about all the walking the distance from the hotel to the park and to downtown Disney without a stroller.  Planning on using a chunk of our spending money to go buy a new one the hotel offered me a free one to use for our stay. I was so relieved and thankful. It was a huge blessing to us. Knowing that they save strollers that may get left behind for other families impressed me greatly. They also gave my daughter a paper crown which she of course loved.   Our room was very
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the great review and feedback.  We take pride in our guest service, and we do feel we have a great value to give our guest's when they stay with us.  Thank you for the recommendation, and we look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Super convenient, spacious and clean family suites
Summary: A large group of family traveled to Anaheim to enjoy a full day at Disneyland and we opted for a few family suites at the Castle Inn due to the proximity to the park and the ability to fit our entire group (24 ppl) across a few rooms.   The location certainly can't be beat - I think there's only one other hotel that's technically closer to the main entrance (of course excluding the Disney hotels on property). It's a short two block walk to get to the main entrance to both theme parks and it was super convenient to walk back to the room when young kids needed a nap. You can also park a vehicle on the lot for free with your stay.   In the past we've stayed further away and while the buses are pretty frequent and generally easy, waiting on a jam packed bus full of melting down
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for the detailed review you provided from your recent stay with us.  It was nice to hear that you had several rooms booked with us and the location worked well for you.  Our guest rooms are just about 2 years old in regards to "newly renovated".  We completed a full room renovation the end of October 2013.  Guests may think because our decor is with darker fabrics and finishings, we are "dated" when in fact, we are fairly new with our rooms.  Due to the fact we have the "Castle theme", we felt the lighter furniture, or white bedding many hotels use these days, would not compliment our theme.  Again, thank you for staying with us, and we hope to see you again in the future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland, basic and easy
Summary: Nice large quiet, clean and tidy rooms complete with a fridge. House keeping were great had fresh towels daily unless specified otherwise. Reception staff were more than helpful. Nice pool area. Just a short walk to Disney resort and restaurants. Would recommend to small families and couples who just need somewhere comfortable to sleep and won't be spending a lot of time in the room. You can hear the fireworks at night so be prepared for a few big bangs. Would definately stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: A beautiful castle hotel for your whole family . . . friendly staff, comfortable room, short distance walk to/from Disneyland Park, different cafes/restaurants to choose from and a nearby pharmacy if you need one.  What a great way to spend it with your children & grandchildren!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us last month.  It was nice to see you enjoyed your "Own Castle" we appreciate the great feedback and look forward to welcoming you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites during the Thanksgiving Holiday with the family; which we found to be adequate for our needs…. The hotel is about 2 blocks away from the Disneyland entrance which was an easy 10 minute to and from the park.  There is a strip mall beside the hotel filled with restaurants, so you can get away from the hustle and bustle of the packed restaurants in the park.  There is also a nearby CVS and 7-11, in case you forgot to pack something for the trip. Parking was plentiful, but could be wider for today’s SUV’s.  The rooms were spacious enough for our family of 3.  The room was clean and in good condition, had an issue were our room wasn’t cleaned until almost 5pm?  We normally go into the park early, then take a break during the afternoon and return
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your recent review of your stay with us last month.  Thank you for all the great feedback and points of interest you highlighted in your review.  We do feel the complimentary parking and free wi fi is a better value for our guest's so that way guests can have breakfast on their own at the many choices in the area.  We look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: The staff was really friendly and super helpful ! The location is great, maybe a 10 min walk to Disneyland.. Lots of restaurants and a CVS pharmacy within a 5 min walk. Rooms are spacious and clean. My only complaint is our beds were really hard, Not exactly comfy after a long day of walking around the parks. I would stay here again in a heartbeat !
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write your review from your recent stay.  We were sorry to hear you felt our mattress' were hard ~  we realize that every guest has a different preference, but the majority of our guests love our bed's.  We've even had to provide the make and model of our mattress' so guests can purchase them for their homes.    We appreciate the fact that this will not keep you from returning to the Castle Inn & Suites, so we look forward to welcoming you back.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My family stayed here the last three days . I was concerned with the location being far with toddler twins.  This was a great choice . It was totally doable with a stroller . It was maybe a ten minute walk with waiting for crosswalks.  I would definitely recommend this hotel for your Disney vacation . It was clean and comfortable . I agree with the past reviews it is dated , but nothing lacked. It also has a tiny baby pool with the regular pool which was a plus . We would for sure stay here again!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  It was nice to hear our location worked well for you and your family as well as our pool area.  We recently finished a room renovation on all guest rooms, and painted the exterior of our building.   We are a "castle-theme" hotel so although some guests feel we are "dated", we really are not, but we totally understand the perception.  We hope you will keep us in mind if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I chose this place to stay purely because I thought a castle hotel was pretty unique! I was expecting the actual rooms to be pretty average, but they were actually quite good. Spacious, a big tv, and nice and clean. Only a short walk from Disneyland and other cafes/restaurants too. The hotel is very pretty to look at, especially at night. The traffic around the hotel is also pretty good compared to the ones that are super close to the theme park.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We loved your comment about how we look at night.  We too feel the property looks pretty amazing at night.  We are also happy that you found our rooms to be quiet good, so thank you for that.  We hope if your travel plans bring you back to the USA, you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind as your home away from home.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The location of this property was ideal for walking to Disneyland, approximately 10 minutes to the main gates.  The room itself served its purpose; it was definitely dated but clean. It was nice to come back to our room after a long day of walking around to find the beds made and the towels refreshed. It was helpful to have a fridge, microwave, and coffee maker to use as we spent a week at this property. We traveled with small kids so being able to feed them breakfast in our room was great. The staff was friendly and very helpful with giving directions, ordering a cab, or advising on activities in the area. The laundry facilities on site were also very handy. The machines were inexpensive and very quick.  To sum this up I will definitely say that this property is dated and has
Manager Response: We appreciate the recent review you have provided from your stay with us early this month.  Your feedback is valuable.  We are a castle-theme hotel, and recently renovated all of our guest rooms with top of the line, made in America, Thomasville furniture.  The more traditional or modern furniture would not have complimented our theme.  We recently painted the entire exterior of the hotel, to keep our Castle looking as fresh as possible.  We hope to see you on a future visit to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We were in town to run half marathon. The staff was friendly and very helpful. The hotel was within easy walking distance to Disney and restaurants. The room was clean. And the small market on site came in handy for snacks, etc. We enjoyed our stay and wouldn't hesitate to stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent marathon.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Walking distance to Disneyland. Spacious rooms perfect for family.
Summary: Location is great for Disneyland with a 10/15 minute walk... Though after a long day walking around Disneyland it was a reasonable walk. There are many restaurants nearby and ABC Market and CVS pharmacy across road. We had a family room which had a separate bedroom with 2 beds for our daughter off the main entrance bedroom. fridge microwave and coffee machine were great. Rooms are clean and have very good wifi. The only issue we had was noise of other guests but this is standard for hotel close to Disneyland. But made worse by the laundry(?) trolley rattling up and down at all hours. Staff were very friendly and helpful. We also went to the Westfield Mall and outlets and rode the ART. Buses from Disneyland...$5 for a day...much cheaper then a taxi. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  Your feedback is valuable,     We look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect for a visit to Disneyland
Summary: My teen daughter and I stayed here in the heat of July. We stayed here for 2+ nights. The room was nice and cool as well as clean. Basic amenities for a hotel room; nothing special but the price was right. It was an easy 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland which made it so nice with a Park Hopper pass. If we make it to Disneyland again then I would elect to stay here.
Manager Response: We appreciate the recent feedback from your stay with us this summer.  We look forward to seeing you again, if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect Stay for a perfect trip!
Summary: We stayed at Castle Inn & Suites at the end of October for the Disneyland Halloween bash.  Initially we drove to Disney (and paid for parking) because we just weren't sure how far 'down the road' was - big mistake as it is literally down the road!  No need to pay for parking - and most of the road was just the entrance to Disney.  Rooms were neat and clean.  Pool and jacuzzi were fabulous.  All in all it was a great stay.  I will add that we were only there for 4 days and 3 nights but they did have a small fridge and microwave so it was perfect to heat up some left overs one night and not have to purchase food a second time.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your trip to Anaheim this past October.  We appreciate the review, and hope to see you again in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Perfect for trip to BlizzCon (or Disneyland)!
Summary: We booked Castle Inn and Suites for our trip to BlizzCon 2015 because it is within 10 walk to the Anaheim convention center. And it's quite convenient for trips to Disneyland too. There are also several great places for dining around the inn, and a drugstore to purchase some supplies. The free parking and wifi are other great advantages as well. The room was nice, clean and comfortable, and had a fridge to store some food/fruits.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites during Blizzcon.  We appreciate the time you took to provide your review from your stay with us.  We hope to see you next year during Blizzcon, or before.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Clean room and walking distance to Disneyland.
Summary: We stayed at Castle Inn and Suites from November 9-12. This was our second family trip (2 adults, 2 children under 8) to Disneyland and we needed to stay at a hotel close enough to the park so we could walk instead of drive and park. The location of the hotel is roughly a 7-10 minute walk to the park entrance.  We found the hotel room to be clean and comfortable and included a fridge and microwave. These are useful if you'd prefer to buy food and store it at the room instead of buying meals at the park. The hotel has a small convenience store on site and is within walking distance to various restaurants and convenience stores.  The only drawback is that you can hear guests pulling luggage along the walkways outside of the hotel room which isn't a huge problem as most check in
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your Disneyland trip this month.  We were happy you elected to stay with us, and we appreciate all the great feedback you provided.  We look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Once in a life time trip
Summary: All the staff were friendly and helpful from the get go. Any question we had they answered it straight away. The rooms were newly renovated, they were beautiful and clean. The hot tub was brilliant at the end of a long day. The bonus was the location, it was a short stroll to the entry gates off Disneyland. I will definitely recommend this hotel to all my family and friends. Thank you for the wonderful service.
Manager Response: We would all like to say a very big thank you for your lovely review.  Your kind words and valuable feedback go along way so thank you again.  It was so nice to read all the great points you covered in your review, as the majority of our guests also feel the same way.    Thank you for recommending us to your family and friends, and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This place was OK.  We stayed for 4 nights on our recent disneyland trip.  Not as close to Disneyland for a family with toddlers  I had a family suite consisting of 6 people.  My family with my wife and I and our two kids stayed in the room with two queen sized beds and a table, and my parents had the other half with the king size bed.  First off, the bed sizes i feel were wrong.  The king size felt like a queen, and the queen sizes felt like full size or double.  No a lot of amenities.  I had to go searching for the ice machine.  No maps or any other ways of finding stuff.  In our directory "binder" in the room it had the same page in there 3 times.  We had zero view of anything except the hotel parking lot directly behind us.  And with our bigger family we had 2 cars and they
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we are sorry we were not the property for you, but we do appreciate the feedback.  Regards,

Summary Heading: Great Hotel and Amazing Customer Service
Summary: My husband and I stayed at Castle Inn and Suites while we went to Blizzcon. As soon as we arrived, all of the staff in the lobby was very nice and helpful. I arrived around noon and asked if we could check in early. Our room was already ready so we were able to do that. They also gave us a free upgrade in which our room came with a sofa. I loved the atmosphere of the hotel. Also, a benefit is there is no charge for parking. One of the days while we were at the convention, we called and asked about printing documents and they informed us that we could print up to 10 pages for free. They also have plastic utensils in the lobby if you need them. The bathroom was clean. The water did take awhile to heat up in the shower. The AC was noisy but functioned perfectly. Everyone there was
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Blizzcon is a very fun convention for our staff and we look forward to it each year. We are glad you mentioned how the amenities made your trip that much better and we could check you right in when you arrived. We hope your next stay in the Anaheim area is at the Castle Inn & Suites.   Regards,

Summary: Across the street from Disneyland main entrance.  Walk to the park was five minutes, quicker than the entrance line.  .  Very quiet inside and staff was most helpful.  Storage of bags on last day was quick and easy.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your kind words on your recent stay with us at the Castle Inn & Suites. We hope to see you again in the near future.   Warm Regards,

Summary: We stayed at the end of October for three nights - this hotel is just a short walk away from Disneyland so it was great for us. There are many convenient places nearby like CVS, souvenirs and lots of places to shop and eat. We stayed on the third floor and the room was very spacious and beds were super comfy! The only negative we found was the noise - we could hear other guests talking outside our room but it felt like they were in the room with us, as well as kids running down the balconies screaming (which we completely understand, it's just the lack of soundproofing) and the cleaning carts and people rolling their luggage around made it impossible to get a decent sleep. Other than that, the staff were incredibly friendly and helpful and we loved our stay at the Castle Inn!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback and overall comments you provided.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed at Castle Inn for our recent family trip to Disneyland. We had 2 rooms, both clean and comfortable. Across the road from disneyland and even our rooms had views of the nightly fireworks. Short walk to the disneyland entrance each day, restaurants and small shops for drinks and snacks.  Staff were pleasant and helpful. Would defiantly stay again and recommend to all. Only complaint is the in room air conditioner was noisy.
Manager Response: We appreciate you for taking the time to review your stay with us here at the Castle Inn & Suites. The Executive Suites continuously show to be a guest favorite especially when you are able to view the Disneyland fireworks. We hope you were able to report the noisy AC so we could resolve the issue during your stay.   Thank you, and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warm Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for 6nts in late October. Our room was perfect,we had 2 x Queen Beds for the 4 of us 2 adults & 2 Kids. Room had heaps of room. One of those hotels where it felt like home. Reception staff where amazing so helpful in every way possible. Short walk to Disney so that is perfect too. Cheesecake Factory,PF Changs & Bubba Gumps just around the corner. Had a laundry which was handy. Pool was super basic that was the only downfall,but yr not there to swim a lot anyway. Everyone in staying in hotel was friendly which was nice also. This hotel is nothing fancy but could not speak highly enough of it. Will recommend everyone to stay here to visit Disney. Thanks Castle Inn 😀
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words on your recent stay with us. We are very happy our staff amazed you and pride ourselves on great customer service. Our hotel provides a variety of amenities along with an excellent location between shops, restaurants, and Disneyland. Hopefully your next trip to the Anaheim Resort brings you back to the Castle Inn & Suites.   Regards,

Summary: Easy to find using google maps, close walk to Disneyland. Loved how it looked like a castle. Good rates. The room was clean w/ 2 queen size beds, great amenities,  refrigerator, microwave & laundry facilities, as well as a pool & spa, free parking & Wi-Fi. There were a lot of restaurants to eat nearby, did not necessarily have to eat at Disneyland. It was easy to check in and out. Staff was very friendly & helpful.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for writing your review on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate all the great feedback, and hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for our recent trip to Disneyland, and we couldnt have been happier with it. We arrived early thanks to our early arrival into LAX and quick transfer, but they already had our room ready for us to go into, which is a great thing after being stuck on a plane for close to 14 hours. The pool is great for a quick cool off after running around the parks all day, the small convenience store attached to the hotel has just about everything you would need, (there is a CVS pharmacy/supermarket type shop less than 5 minutes walk for anything you cant get there).  Only downside for me was that the free WiFi was a little sketchy, and would keep dropping out while we were making facetime calls to family back in Aus, but its not really something that will detract from the
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay with us.  It was nice to hear we were able to get you right in to your room when you arrived from your overseas fight.  We are sorry to hear you had some issues with face time.  We upgraded our WI FI last year and have had nothing but rave reviews about how fast it is,  so it may have been an isolated situation.  We will check this out.  Once again, we look forward to seeing you again if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed here as a base for Disneyland, LA tour and Universal Studios and it was perfect.  A short walk to Disneyland and a very short walk for the bus pick ups for our other tours. Free coffee in the room, near to all the local restaurants, safety deposit boxes at reception.  The bed was extremely comfortable.  I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the time you took to write your review regarding your stay and thank you for the recommendation.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This was my second stay at the Castle Inn and Suites (2015) and i highly recommended this place, Amazing staff, spotless rooms ,very comfy beds, and has all facilities and its the perfect location. All staff and management are so helpful and could not fault this place in any way.  Perfect location to Disneyland (10 min walk) all restaurants walking distance its just perfect  Cant wait for my next stay here in 2016.. So thank you Castle Inn and Suites for making my holiday Perfect !!
Manager Response: We thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to the Disneyland Resort.  Thank you for the lovely review and feedback regarding our property, location & staff.  We look forward to seeing you again in 2016 when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My family stayed at the castle inn and suites when we was at Disneyland. The room was very clean. I played like the host off of hotel impossible and expected the room. couldn't find one item wrong microwave, coffee make and refrigerator  was all very clean. Walking distance to the parks. A small store so if you for got something or needed milk for breakfast . Staff was very friendly allowed us to leave car in the parking lot before check-in so we could take advantage of every day there we arrived 4hrs before check-in.  I would not think twice about staying here again
Manager Response: We were very pleased to see you had a relaxing stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  It was very nice to see that all went well with your stay and you enjoyed our rooms.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel within walking distance to everything
Summary: I was pleasantly surprised with Castle Inn & Suites and thoroughly enjoyed our four night stay.  Our room wasn’t ready when we got there around noon so they stored our luggage and we went to the park on the first day.  Had no problem getting the room when we got back that evening from the park.  It is an older motel style hotel within about a 5-10 minute walk to Disneyland (depending on how quick you walk).  The furnishings and fixtures in the hotel have been updated.   There are lots of food options around (Denny’s, IHOP, Tony Roma’s, Subway, a number of convenience stores are close as well).  It was also a 5 – 10 minute walk to the Garden Walk in the other direction and around the corner which have some nicer restaurants like Bubba Gumps, Cheesecake Factory etc.  The hotel
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Your feedback and details about your stay were very much appreciated.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Stayed here for two nights in october as a base to go to disneyland  The location is fantastic with only a 10 min walk to the front gate of disneyland.  The hotel itself is actually pretty good also and the room clean and well laid out  As others have mentioned if you are arriving early beware there is no checkin until 3pm but you might get lucky like we did and get a room at around 1pm  There is also no room service but plenty of restaurants and fast food very close by (iHop is just up the road)  The staff are very polite and welcoming also  Would definitely reccomend staying here if going to disneyland
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for taking the time to post your review from your stay with us this month.  We appreciate the great feedback.    Like every hotel in the Anaheim Resort,  check in times range between 3:00 PM and 4:00 PM.  We make all efforts to allow for check in prior to 3 pm when available.  When the hotel is sold out it can be very difficult to have access to the room prior to 3 pm.  We were happy to see you were one of the lucky ones.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed at castle inn & suites for two nights in October. We arrived very late & tired, we were warmly welcomed despite it being close to midnight & was offered an upgraded room. The crib was set up for my son who was asleep. The room was immaculate & had a wonderful bathroom with great quality products. We also found the beds & pillows very comfortable. Our friends who came to visit were also well looked after despite not staying at the suites.  We looked into other more expensive properties but found the location, property & staff to be at the highest level including maintenance staff. Thank you for making our Disney experience so enjoyable! Nothing was a problem! We will return anytime we come back to disneyland.
Manager Response: We appreciate the lovely review you provided.  We work very hard at making sure our guests are well looked after and we appreciate you taking the time to point out some of the services you received by being our guest.  We look forward to seeing you again, when your travel plans bring you back to the states and the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This place is by far the best place I have stayed, the rooms are serviced daily as you can see by my photos; the beds are really comfortable and they have air con and a fridge too as well as complimentary coffee also its only a 5 minute walk away from Disney land and earing places are all around you; would I stay here again absolutely oh and it has a pool and also a laundry
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for spending your 40th Birthday with us.  We appreciate the great feedback you provided and the kind words.  We hope the next time you are in the states and coming to the Anaheim Resort, you will make the Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home.  Kind Regards,

Summary: great hotel, nicely, newly renovated. The staff were good and friendly, our room was spotless when we arrived, the parking was a bit of a problem, but only because we had to park a few doors down. Best of all was the location, less than a block from the nearest crossing to Disneyland, the Happiest place on Earth!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write your review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the great feedback on our location, rooms and staff.    We are happy to provide free parking for 1 car per room for our guest's, and although it's open parking, some guests are able to park close to their rooms, while others may have to be a few doors away, so hopefully this wasn't too much of an inconvenience for you.   Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Perfect Inn for a Family trip to Disneyland
Summary: This was my First time to Disneyland, The Hotel was excellent for the price and the location. It was only a 10 min walk to the park and there are lots of Restaurants close by.   The kids where so excited to stay in a Castle, and the pool was very nice, The kids where a little disappointed that there was no slide, but we only used the pool one night out of eight nights stay.   We will be staying at this place again when we return to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent family trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the feedback and thank you for making us your "Perfect Inn for your Family".  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Amazing staff, had a great time!
Summary: Mom and I stayed here October 20-25. We loved it! The staff was very friendly and polite. Eric helped me when I needed to make shuttle reservations at 2 am and he was very patient and kind to me and my mom.   The beds were comfortable. The  bathroom was clean. The TV was awesome, room had enough space to move around comfortably.   My only complaint was the room's lack of light. While there were many lamps around the room they simply weren't enough to light up the entire room. There was no lamp on the ceiling. :/ And while mom and I dealt with it just fine, I know that someone with poor visibility would have a hard time trying to find their stuff around the room.
