I want to take my grandpa to Disneyland but while this hotel was great, the light issue might make me reconsider my
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post your review from your stay with us this month.  We appreciate the feedback, and will certainly take your comments about the lighting in the rooms to heart.  We typically do not hear this comment, but we thank you for your comments.  We do hope this will not affect your decision to stay with us again.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We are annual pass holders and came out for Mickey's Halloween Party. Room was ready on time but unfortunately not a minute before. We had a 2nd floor room and it was very spacious. Could use more lighting. Being an all girls trip, we appreciated the extra sink/mirror outside the bathroom. Great location-a less than 10 minute walk to the gates. We did not use the pool. It looked small and cramped, but kids would enjoy it nonetheless. Breakfast isn't included but for the money we saved on the room, we were able to buy our own food. Overall very pleased with our stay and we will definitely be back!
Manager Response: We appreciate the review you have provided, and thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  Feedback is key to our continued success, so once again thank you.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel for a family trip to Disney!
Summary: I stayed in this hotel purely for the novelty of sleeping in a castle. The room did not disappoint! My three year old son was so excited when we pulled in. The room was decorated just as regal as the outside. The check in area had beautiful decor and a very nice staff.   There's no free breakfast, but there is a little shop to buy food or essentials. I got a coffee and muffins for us in the morning.   The bed and pillows were very comfortable. The room had great temperature control and a cozy feel.   Very close walk to the park. Not as close as some hotels, but it was worth it since the hotel was so cool.   I will most likely stay here again and would recommend to families with kids who will love the idea of sleeping in a castle.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us in February.  We appreciate the review and great feedback you have provided.  We look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This is the third time we've stayed at this hotel as the location is ideal for Disneyland. The rooms on the ground floor are little dark but are always clean & tidy. There is a fridge & microwave in the room but we tend to eat at the parks or the many restaurants close by. The decor in the rooms is looking a little dated but for the price this is a great hotel.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you being a returning guest, and taking the time to post your review.  We updated all of our guest rooms about 2 years ago so everything is new and fresh.  Keep in mind we are a castle, so we elected to use the darker fabrics and furniture to compliment our theme.  We look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed here 10/19 - 10/20/2015. Room 340. Was presently surprised by the room cleanliness and decor. Very cozy. Slept like a rock which is the main requirement after very long days walking around at Disney. Room had small fridge, microwave, AC (worked great) and blackout curtains (a must!). Saw a couple of reviewers complain about hearing upstairs guests stomping around but it wasn't an issue for us. I heard them but it didn't bother me.Also, I didn't hear any noise thru the walls on either side which was a plus, sometimes that can get awkward. Would definitely stay here again. Front desk staff was very polite as well. Denny's is down the street as well as the main gate entrance to Disneyland. My phone said it was a 6 minute walk.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your review.  You provided such a great detail of our rooms, the location and staff, so thank you for that. We also appreciate the fact that you noted we are only a 6 minute walk to the main entrance.  We do get many variations of this, so thank you for putting that in your review.  We look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to Anaheim.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I've stayed in this hotel many times, and I keep coming back. We live in the Southern Cali area and have an annual pass. This is my favorite hotel in the area for the price. The rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable. You don't have to pay extra for a refrigerator or anything that you do at some hotels. The pool is nice, although smaller, and easily seen from the rooms. The beds are comfortable, and the showers and A/C units both work well. I've even asked for a crib in the room before and they've provided nicely.  A nice sized parking lot with FREE parking is a luxury in the area as well.  The staff is always very accommodating when we arrive prior to check in, and they'll give us an open room or watch our luggage while we wonder around the area.                   It is an
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for being a returning guest, we hope you always come to the Castle Inn & Suites as your home away from home.  We appreciate the attention to detail you provided in your review, this is always helpful to other guests that are reading review's, so thank you very much.  We look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: We stayed here 3 nights and loved it. It's so close to Disneyland (about a 10-15 min walk) and also to a variety of shops and restaurants. And there's free wi-fi!  Our "Executive Suite" room on the 4th floor was roomy and comfortable, with the little wall between the 2 Queen beds and the lounge area a nice touch. The lighting is a bit dim, but it's an older style hotel and the relaxing, almost old-world luxury style more than makes up for that. The beds were very comfortable, and we felt cozy and secure. The only noise we heard from outside was a little bit of very-excited-kids-noise around 8 am or so, as families started out for Disneyland.  Then there's the service! All staff were so wonderfully friendly and proactively helpful. When I couldn't get the tv to work and rang the
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  It was very nice to see you enjoyed your stay and found our staff friendly, and helpful.  We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Would take a smokin' deal from another hotel to convince me not to go back to Castle inn and Stes
Summary: Staff was great (not afraid to chat you up ((including a maintenance guy)). Room was clean, comfortable, modern (despite motif), and everything worked. Pool and Jacuzzi clean and work. 12 minute stroll to Disney/CA Adventure gates. Maid service excellent. Walking distance to numerous restaurants. "Gift" shop has almost everything you may have forgotten, including adult bev's at a price that's a bit more than you'd pay at a common grocery, but not bad. Ample free parking for guests. We showed up earlier than check in and they had no problems issuing us a parking pass for the day while we went to the parks. Couldn't be happier.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciated the great feedback,  we were very happy "you were happy".  Look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Average travellers with an honest review.
Summary: Stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites in Anaheim for 8 nights with a party of 10 in 4 rooms. We arrived and were greeted by 2 smiling front counter staff. They quickly processed our vouchers and directed us to our rooms which were 131, 132, 135 and 136 on the ground floor, in the centre directly across from the pool. Rooms were as expected and shown on their website. Air conditioning was excellent. Lighting is typically dim inside the rooms. Beds were comfy with lots of pillows. Fridge, microwave and coffemaker were all great. Flat screen TV with plenty of channel selections for those that my need them! Room quality was what I expected at this property. Housekeeping was awesome! (Left gratuity daily and some did not, but all received excellent service!) The convenience store/gift
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to the Disneyland Resort.  Your review was wonderful, detailed, and the feedback awesome.    We wanted you to know we greatly appreciate your kind word's, and look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites, where we treat our guest's like Royalty!  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Close to Disney & Clean, but Not Happy Overall
Summary: We were on the 4th floor of the hotel and were pleased with the cleaning staff and cleanliness of the property.  The free parking was a huge plus and parking was convenient most nights.  The location of the hotel is approximately two blocks from the park, but due to having small children (with tired feet) we chose to park at the parking lot for Disney on Harbor Blvd about a block away and ride the bus.  The room was clean and the staff was kind enough to leave an anniversary snack (cookies and water) for us.  The beds were fairly comfortable and we always have plenty of towels.  We were happy with the layout and amenities, as we were only there to sleep.  But due to the huge gap under the door and outside humidity and heat, the wall air conditioner could not keep up and our room
Manager Response: We were sorry to hear you had a few concerns with your visit recently.  We hope you reported the concern to our front desk as it could have been a very easy fix.    We do appreciate all the kind words on the overall property and location, so thank you for that.  We hope you will give us another opportunity so you can experience the true hospitality and room quality all guests deserve.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Beautiful place! And what a price!
Summary: I was so happy to book this hotel at first, mainly because it was so close to the Disneyland gate, the great price, and the cute castle setting outside. I was very happy and surprised to see the cleanliness of the rooms, the large size of the rooms, and the friendliness of the staff! (Gravy!) We will definitely be back to this hotel on our next Disneyland visit!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently.  We were very happy you elected to stay with us and experience the Castle Hospitality!    We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Family holiday venue within walking distance of Disneyland
Summary: We stayed 11 nights at this hotel in a family suite. The suite has a king bed in the front room and two queen beds in the rear room. The two rooms are separated by a door so there is privacy for all. The staff and amenities are excellent, with the cost being less than half of a Disney Hotel. Some Notes: check in is at 2pm so if you are arriving from Australia in the early morning, your room will not be ready, you can however, talk to the hotel in advance to arrange an early check-in. They have a nice pool and laundry facilities are available at about $1.50 per load. There are not outside clothes lines, so make sure you pack clothes that can go in the dryer.
Manager Response: We appreciate the recent review of your stay with us.  Our check in time is any time after 3:00 pm in the afternoon, as most hotels in Anaheim are, however; we always do our best to accommodate early arrival's.    Thank you again for taking the time to post your review and if your travel plans bring you back to the USA in the near future, you will keep Castle Inn & Suites in mind!  Kind Regards,

Summary: My family and I stayed at this hotel for 11 nights, from September 29-October 11. My two children and I arrived at the hotel at 9 am. We were greeted by Alberta who works at the front desk. Alberta did say that there was a room available if we wanted but because it was a smoking room, I opted to wait for a non smoking room to become open. She volunteered to hold our luggage in a locked room, and allowed us to return when we were ready.  We took the one block walk to the Disney Downtown District where we ate and had an opportunity to do some shopping. This hotel's location is within a close proximity to Disneyland and is also convienently located across the street from CVS, and adjacent to several eateries.   Our room was cleaned everyday, the beds were made, towels and bedding
Manager Response: We thank you very much for booking your 11 night stay with us in September.  Your review was awesome, very detailed and very much appreciated.  Our main goal is to take care of our guest's and we are so happy you were well looked after and took the time to post your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.!  Sincerely,

Summary: This is a lovely hotel, one street away from the main gates to Disneyland. The rooms are big with great air conditioning. Beds are really comfortable. It also has a guest laundry which is great when traveling and not expensive. Staff are extremely pleasant and attentive. Restaurants are all close by. Coming back to Disneyland in 3 years and we will definitely stay here again! The pool is wonderful after a busy day in Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback from your stay with us recently.  We were very happy to see you enjoyed your stay and our property.  We look forward to welcoming you back in 3 year's when you return to the Disneyland area.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed 3 nights as we had a 2 day park hopper pass for Disneyland. Perfect location as only about a 5 minute walk to Disneyland. The rooms are average but clean and comfortable and there is a pool and wifi. Apart from Disneyland there isn't a whole lot that we could find in Anaheim. It was however only a 10 minute drive to the Outlets at Orange and Knotts Berry Farm theme park which are worth visiting if you have time.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review from your stay with us this month.  We hope you will keep us in mind for your next visit to Anaheim.  Regards,

Summary: This nicer motel is walking distance to Disneyland. It has cozy (not super roomy) family suites that are updated. The shower temperature fluctuated a bit, but was tolerable. Beds were very comfortable. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to the Disneyland Resort.  We appreciate your review and look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Just what we wanted, better than we expected.
Summary: Our family has made travel to Disneyland a tradition. We have stayed in Disney hotel properties and in those run by others. On our most recent trip we looked for inexpensive, but roomy accommodations within walking distance of Disneyland and the Anaheim Convension Center. Places we previously stayed already were sold out, so we took a chance on Castle Inn & Suites. We booked a family suite with two queen beds and a sofa-bed.  We're glad we did. The room was huge, the parking lot was generous, we had two sinks, and the location was midway between Disneyland's gates and the convention center. There were four adults in our party. Those getting the queen beds slept comfortably, the one who got the sofa bed, not so well...the fold-out mattress was well-beyond its useful life FOR AN
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for the detailed review you recently posted.  Your feedback was very much appreciated.  It sounds like you were in one of our Parlor Suites as these rooms offer the sofa bed in the front room and 2 queen beds in a private room.  These sofa bed's are just about 2 years old, so we appreciate the feedback.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This is such a cute little hotel. Only a stones throw from Disneyland - down the road and across the street. Very clean and roomy. There is a pool in the middle of the parking lot. There is also a little store downstairs if you need to pick up any souveniers or a snack. Plenty of restaurants and shopping within walking distance. We even walked down to Angel Stadium. Great location. We would stay here again!
Manager Response: We would like to say a big thank you for your lovely review.  We love our cute hotel and we were happy to see you did too.   Thank you for providing the feedback regarding our location, and the restaurants that are around the hotel.    We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: If you are about location, then this is the place for you! 2 blocks to Disney! Refrigerator and microwave and coffee pot in room.. very helpful! Free parking.. BONUS.. plus if they have space, they will let you park for an extended amount of time even after check out!!  clean rooms but need to get double pained glass windows and a better sound barrier between floors... hearing kids running and crying do not make me happy....  Nice staff.. overall good deal.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your stay with us this month.  Thank you for pointing out our in room amenities, our free parking and our location.  We hope to see you again, if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near disneyland!
Summary: This is our second time staying here and both times have been great.  A short walk to disneyland , next to a small strip mall with Mexican,Korean,Mediterranean ,pizza ,burger,subway places to eat, cvs, 7/11 across the street . Front desk is awesome, so nice and friendly!   Nice,very clean rooms,with fridge,microwave. They also have a pool and free parking,New ac units and wifi.Great rates, well worth it!  If you're staying off property, you definitely should consider this place.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us again recently.  We were so happy to read your review and all the nice things you had to say.  We appreciate the feedback and recommendation to stay here if you aren't staying at one of the Disneyland properties.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: On our recent family vacation to Disneyland we stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites for 4 days. Our room was very spacious and clean. The staff were all friendly and courteous. It was a short walking distance to the Disney Parks which was very convenient considering we had small children with us. I will definitely be staying here for future family vacations.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent family vacation.  Thank you for posting your review, we really appreciate it, and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: Everything about our stay here was terrific.  We were impressed by the special touches like the toilet paper and tissues formed in the shape of roses.  The towels were folded like swans.  The beds were comfortable and the room clean.  There was in-room coffee and a refrigerator and microwave.  The pool area offered options of a swimming pool, a wading pool, and a spa.  There are also two sun decks above the pool area with tables and lounge chairs that would be a nice place for a picnic meal and probably would afford a view of the Disneyland fireworks, although we didn't check that out.  It's easy walking distance to Disneyland. The staff were pleasant and helpful at check-in.  The castle theme is consistent throughout, and our granddaughter was SO excited to be staying in a
Manager Response: A very big thank you for the lovely review you recently posted.  We were happy to see you enjoyed the small touches we do in our guest rooms, thank you for noticing we appreciate it.  We were happy to hear your granddaughter was excited to stay in a real Castle.  We look forward to seeing you again, when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Our families first visit to Disneyland and this was a great spot to stay. Plenty of options nearby to eat. Only a short walk to Disneyland. Staff I encountered  upon check in and check out were wonderful as well. My only complaints are the two floss picks left by previous guests, that were still there the day we left. The size of the pool is a bit deceiving from photos and it's a little to cold, which on a hot day is probly ok. We hit the pool in the evening after a long day hot day at Disney, kiddo didn't mind the temp and mom enjoyed the hot tub. In the future I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide your review.    We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We had a family of 7 stay in late August good sized rooms clean and tidy we had joint room access which so convenient. Free wifi was a hit with our teens. Basic tee coffee in room. Fridge and microwave. Located in a great spot walking distance to Disney, garden walk shopping, the corner shop/pharmacy,  fast food, convention centre also the bus stop. The Swimming/spa pool were awesome laundry room right next door both easy to access. Front desk staff were very helpful with booking our daily activities also when my package didn't arrive before I checked out spoke with the staff and when it did arrive they promptly forwarded to me in New Zealand no hassles. Overall stay was pleasant would not hesitate to stay again. Perfect for us.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for staying with us in August.  We enjoyed all the feedback you provided and we were glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and that you would stay with us again.  We look forward to seeing you again if your travel plans bring you back to the USA in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: In visiting last weekend (1st weekend in October) our first night was just fine, no problems and we were happy with our room.  The next night after a long day at Disney we found tiny ants all over our sink and sink area (walls, light switch, floors, sink...) in our 3rd floor room.  Disgusting! They looked like they were coming in not from outside but from a small gap between the base tile on the wall and the floor. In talking to the hotel management they were luckily able to move us to a nearby room at 1:30am for the night.  But the conversation about the ants was concerning because they said they normally only see them in the bathroom after a hot shower or during the summer... It is disgusting to know that they know they have an ant problem in their hotel but just kind of shrug
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We apologize for the inconvenience of moving rooms due to ants.  At the Castle Inn, we are very proactive when it comes to any pest control.  We have a regular service which is nationally recognized.  We treat every room in the hotel multiple times per year.    We do not have an ongoing ant problem at the hotel, however; on rare occasion an insect may get into a guest room.  Once this is reported by the staff or guest we make every effort to eliminate the problem, including calling in a professional service to ensure the problem has been fully taken care of.    We are glad to hear that the room you moved to had no issues, and the first night went well.    We hope you will come back to stay with us again so you can have a much better experience.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Comfortable family rooms close to the Disney action
Summary: Spacious room for our family of four for our recent trip to Disneyland. Pluses included great water pressure, great speeds on the free wifi and views of the fireworks. Bus service was friendly and convenient.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for the lovely review.  It was so nice to see all the great comments and feedback you provided.  We hope you will keep us in mind if your future travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Our room was spacious and, most importantly, it was clean and we were very comfortable. We found that we needed a crib in the middle of the night and the staff graciously brought one to our room immediately.  This is the place for us to stay whenever we visit Anaheim again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for posting your recent review.  We thank you for the nice words and look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Stayed here with our family of 4. Very comfy beds, noise level was quite minimal so that was nice. We had a ground floor room which was appreciated after a long day in the parks! Ample parking (which we didn't need as we didn't have a car this trip), no breakfast though. Nice big bathroom. Short 8-10 minute walk to the park maingates. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We really enjoyed reading your review and we appreciate the kind words and look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This was a very fun hotel to stay at. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and had plenty of towels. The pool was fun and relaxing. My kids have always wanted to stay here because it looks like a castle. We all really enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were very happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We were upgraded to an executive suite and the room was HUGE! Would be excellent for a family, though this trip was just my husband and myself. The bathroom was spacious with plenty of counter space. Reliable wifi (though a little slow) and friendly staff. Air conditioner was noisy and woke up up a few times during the night when it kicked on. Room decor is not as cheesy and dated as it appears in photos.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for posting your recent review from your stay in September.  We were happy to hear you enjoyed the upgraded room.  Thank you for the nice comment about our room decor, we feel our rooms are lovely and compliment our property very well.  We hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: I love this place! Third time staying here, walking distance to Disneyland, and other restaurants! Nice big rooms, staff very friendly! They even have a little shop in the lobby that had food, drinks, clothes, even luggage!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the kind words and great feedback.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Sincerely,

Summary: Staff friendly, helpful and able to organise hire of wheelchair from property which helped our stay. Rooms large, clean. 1.5 blocks from Maingate of Disney. Also helpful in organising other tours of Hollywood, Bevely Hills, Rodeo Drive etc. Good family hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for posting your review from your recent stay.  We appreciate the feedback and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Walking distance to Disneyland resort and downtown Disney. The staff were lovely and very accommodating and the rooms spacious and clean. Very nice hotel for families or couples and was very easy to find.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your recent review.  The feedback was great, and we look forward to seeing you again if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Regards,

Summary: The room was very clean and we had an excellent experience. This hotel is nice and close to walk to Disney. Highly recommend the Pizza Press restaurant a few blocks away. We would definitely visit again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  It was nice to see the great feedback you shared, and we hope to see you in the near future.  Regards,

Summary: Location is good. It's close to Disneyland . The room is big and bed is comfy. Service is great.  The Building is nice and clean. I'll recommend Castle Inn and Suites to my friends if they are going to Disneyland in Los Angels.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for writing your review from your stay with us recently.  We thank you for recommending us to your friend's, and we hope to see you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Room was very dark..brown walls, dark red carpet and bed covering, minimal light from 2 lamps and light over sink.  Bedding did not get changed in the 5 nights we were there...not a big deal, but would have liked the carpet to be vacuumed and the bathroom floor swept.  Only housekeeping seemed to be changing the towels.  Stairwell and outside hall smelled faintly of urine.  Pool very small, but we did not use it.  Close walking distance to Disney, good for a sleeping place.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your recent review and feedback from your stay with us.  We are sorry you found our newly renovated rooms too dark.   Because of our Castle Theme, we went with the darker, richer fabrics and finishing to compliment the Castle.  Housekeeping cleans our rooms daily from changing the bedding, making the bed's, changing the towel's, vacuuming and cleaning the tile floor.  We have energy systems in place so if the water saving cards were placed on the beds they would have only been made, the sheets would not have been changed.  Again, we thank you for your feedback.  Sincerely,

Summary: We stayed two nights for a Disneyland visit. The room was clean and  comfortably furnished. The staff was friendly and very helpful. There is an ART stop close by, but we walked back and forth to the parks. Great place, great value.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay with us.  We hope to see you again on a future visit when visiting the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We spent 2 weeks in September travelling around California and Nevada - this was by far the best hotel which we stayed in. Friendly, very helpful staff - nothing was too much trouble. We called on reception several times with enquiries and requests and they were always very accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  It was so wonderful to hear you enjoyed your stay and that we were the best hotel you stayed in during your 2 week trip in the USA.  We certainly hope you will come back to see us in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I loved the location of the place. It was very clean, plenty of towels &&very cold AC. The beds and pillows were very comfortable in my opinion, we all slept very well. I love how it's quiet &&you can't hear through the walls like other places I've stayed. The day of our checkout my 3 year old daughter got sick &&made us check out a little past 12pm &&we called front desk &&they were very kind &&let us check out with no extra charge or any problems. This is going to be our place to stay when we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your lovely review from your recent stay with us, we really appreciate it and we are happy you are going to make the Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We booked Castle inn and suites for our first visit to Disney and it couldn't have been better , the hotel room was clean spacious and with two large double beds, we had a fridge lots of storage space , coffee machine and microwave and a really efficient air conditioning unit. As there are no cafe services on site we found the nearby buffet breakfast was fabulous and kids breakfasts were free, after a long day in Disney we would return to the room and refresh in the pool , although I felt the pool to be a little small there was also a warm jacuzzi pool, and plenty of chairs , I would definitely recommend this hotel and if we return to Anaheim I would stay here without a second thought ,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites on your recent visit to Disneyland.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back on a future visit to the Anaheim resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: An island of character in a sea of sameness
Summary: This property went through a major renovation a couple years ago. While it's an older building, the rooms are very clean and spacious. Comfortable beds and pillows, outdoor pool and hot tub, small store on the premises. The only drawbacks I saw were the small fridge with no freezer and a sticking bathroom door.  The location is great. Just a couple blocks from the main Disney entrance. I rented a scooter through Apple scooter. They delivered it to the hotel and picked it up after we left.  Since this is an older motel building, don't expect the Monte Carlo. But, the price is very reasonable and the rooms are comfortable.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay with us.  When we renovated we installed energy efficient refrigerators in our guest rooms which are extremely quiet, but yes, they do not have the freezer section.  We hope you reported that your bathroom door was sticking.  These are all new door's so it could have been an easy fix.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Vincent at front desk is great!!! From there it goes down hill. Room had an odor. Did not want to open windows, no screens. Asked manager, in the morning, please fix bathroom fan and light, got back at 10:00 PM, it was not fixed. Bathtub had black stains on the bottom of it. Sheets were so thin you could almost read newspaper through them. It was a nice walk to and from Disneyland but we will never stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review.  We do apologize for the inconveniences, however; we did follow up on your requests.  When our staff tried to address the GFI issue, there was a do not disturb sign on the door.  Several attempts were made to contact the room, however; these attempts were unsuccessful.  We will honor a guests wishes to not enter the room when a do not disturb sign is displayed, unless we are given authorization to enter, or if there is an emergency situation.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity to make a future stay more enjoyable.  Sincerely,

Summary: We booked two rooms connecting and they were great. Spacious, clean and close to everything. Easy walk to Disneyland , shops and restaurants. Has a fridge in room which is handy for buying drinks at local shops and it has a laundry as well. Great for families. Highly recommend this hotel, would definitely stay again. Also has a pool which is fantastic after a hot day spent at Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to write your review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the great feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed 3 nights for our Disney trip. We were nice and close to Disney which was perfect, and the main reason we chose this hotel. We didn't do more here than sleep and recover, but it fit the bill for this perfectly. The hotel had a pool which we didn't have time to use, but could be good for a recharge mid afternoon. Rooms were big, and clean, and had a great AC unit. There was a fridge and microwave in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the great feedback and hope you will keep us in mind the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed in a family suite and the price was excellent considering proximity to the Disney main gate.  The outside is older looking but our room was clean and well kept.  The grout in the shower is starting to look like it needs to be refreshed, and the carpet is super ugly, but that's just cosmetic.  The back bedroom is a completely separate room, with a door, so perfect for kids who go to bes early or sleep late. It had a sink, tv, dresser, table with two chairs, two queen beds and a nightstand.  The main room had a desk, tv, dresser, king bed, nightstands, and the door to the bathroom. The beds were very comfortable. We requested a crib for our infant, which is an additional charge.  It looks like something from an orphange, but I suppose it holds up better than a pack 'n
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for providing a detailed review from your recent stay with us.  It was very nice to hear you enjoyed the family suite.  The cribs we provide our mandated by the State so unfortunately we can't do much about that.  Once again, thank you for your feedback, and we hope to see you again if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Affordable and within an easy walk of Disneyland. The two bedroom family suite is the way to go for a family. Highly recommend this place. The rooms were clean and the staff very helpful. Having an onsite shop was ideal for purchasing food for breakfasts.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write your review from your stay with us earlier this month.  Thank you for the recommendation, we really appreciate it.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great Value Option for a Disneyland visit
Summary: I recently stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites when visiting Anaheim for both the D23 Expo at the Anaheim Convention Centre and of course, the 60th Anniversary celebrations of the Disneyland Resort. I could not fault my stay here - and the proximity to both the Anaheim Convention Centre - and the Disneyland Resort (both approximately a 10 - 15 minutes walk away) is terrific.  Whilst the rooms are clean, comfortable and offer all the basics you would hope from a 3-star hotel - the service of the staff was terrific, and the hotels quirky medieval theme is fun for kids.  I would have no qualms at all in staying at the Castle Inn again - and likely will!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us in August while you attending the D23 Convention and enjoyed Disneyland's 60th Celebration.  We appreciate the kind words and feedback from your stay.  We look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans return you to the USA.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This past week is the fifth time I've stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites. We arrived early and were immediately checked in. We'd reserved two rooms and were given adjoining rooms on the second floor close to the elevator. Both rooms were clean and comfortable. The housekeeping staff was friendly and accomodating. The front desk staff was friendly and knowledgeable about the area, bus schedules, Disneyland hours, etc. I have stayed at several other good neighbor hotels near Disneyland, but keep coming back to this one. The walk to the park is only a couple blocks and a taxi is only $6 if you're too tired to walk back. I will be back!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for being a returning guest, and for taking the time to provide your feedback from your most recent visit with us.  Thank you for the lovely feedback and for commenting on our staff, accommodations and location.  We look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Very satisfied with our stay at the Castle Inn! We will be back.
Summary: We booked only a few weeks ahead at this location. Having been to Disney twice before and staying on the property...was not sure what to expect being outside the park- but VERY pleased with this hotel. The location is fantastic, the staff were very polite and the rooms were exactly as described. The patio area is small, but with a very nice, warm salt water pool.  Considering you are mostly away from the hotel most of the day  - this suited our needs perfectly. There were many economical food options next door (which is not as easy staying in the park), as well as an ABC and CVS just across the street . Everything you need. The hotel is VERY wheelchair accessible as well - was very impressed with this. Even a lift into the pool.   For the price, this was a very reasonable deal!
Manager Response: We appreciate the review you recently posted from your stay with us in August.  Your feedback was well received and we thank you for that.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Everyone was very polite. We arrived earlier than check in time and they accommodated us right away & let us check in early. Continental breakfast would be nice but overall very pleasant stay. Walk was a little far from Disneyland especially after walking all day but wasn't bad for the price. A shuttle wouldn't have hurt.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate your feedback.  We do feel by providing Free Parking and Free Wi Fi this is a better value than a breakfast since there are so many options for breakfast in the area.  We are also considered with "walking distance" to Disneyland so we are not part of the Anaheim Shuttle system.    Once again, thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: If your after a hotel that wont cost you an arm and a leg and that's close to Disneyland than Castle Inn and Suites is the place for you. The only thing is that there is no safe in the room, however they do have safety deposit boxes at reception, the staff are great and can not do enough to ensure that you enjoy your stay. PS. And it's only a short easy walk to Disneyland. We were there in May this year and enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend it. Jeff and Jenny Logue Australia
Manager Response: Thank you so much for providing your review from your stay with us this past May.  It was very nice to hear you enjoyed your stay and found our location to be fantastic.  We hope the next time you are in the USA and more importantly, Anaheim, you will come back to see us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Birthday surprise fit for a Princess
Summary: We've looked at this property many times on our Disneyland trips & thought the real "Castle" appearance would add to the magic of the stay. This year my sweet husband surprised me with a birthday trip during Disneyland's 60th Celebration & planned the entire trip! The Castle Inn was great for a short walk in the afternoon to rest/eat snacks with the microwave & mini fridge! The A/C was great & cooled the rooms quickly. On our final day of our stay our truck battery was dead & one of the receptionist (I wish I'd gotten his name) offered to use his personal vehicle & jumper cables to assist us!! They also allowed us to keep our parking through Disney's park hours so we didn't have to hassle with moving our truck & still had time to make it to use our early morning entry!! It made
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback from your stay with us this month.  It was nice to hear you enjoyed your stay and we were even able to help you out with your dead battery.  We updated and remodeled all of our guest rooms less than 2 year's ago, so we don't understand those comment's either, but thank you for pointing out our top-notch customer service.  We look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The rooms were clean. The girls liked the ambiance. The staff was amazing. I had a couple requests that I thought the answer would be no, the answers were always yes. My three month old truck battery died when we were ready to leave. Wait for AAA? Nope one of the desk clerks actually had his own jumper cables and used his personal vehicle to get us going again. We'll be back for sure! Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for writing your review from your recent stay.  We were happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, and that we were able to assist you with your car battery.  We pride ourselves on our guest service, so thank you for mentioning this in your review.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for a week.  The hotel stands out because of it being designed on a Castle.  The rooms are were clean and comfortable and there was plenty of room for the 3 of us.  The location of the hotel is great for Disney which is only a 10 minute walk so we did not need to take the car.  There is free parking at this hotel unlike some of the other hotels in the area.  The hotel also has it own shop.  There are plenty of places it eat near the hotel so you don't have to stick to downtown Disney.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us in August.  We are very glad you enjoyed your stay.  We hope you will consider returning to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: loved my stay at Castle Inn Anaheim, CA
Summary: we had the best time it was within walking distance of Disneyland. lots of nice restaurants nearby. Felt like we were right inside Disneyland !  Very clean rooms ready before check in time , friendly staff!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay with us.  We look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We had 2 nights at Disneyland and chose this hotel mainly because it's only a 10 minute walk to Disneyland & California Adventure Park. We had a great stay - really comfortable bed, great air con, 2 chairs and a table was a bonus. The staff were so helpful and the cleaner was the best we had in our 4 week USA trip. Both days the towels were folded into swans!! So much effort to make our stay more enjoyable. Unfortunately we didn't get time to use the pool but it looked beautiful! Between Castle Inn and Disney is a breakfast buffet for $9.95 which was great!
Manager Response: We would like to say a big thank you for writing such a great review of your stay with us recently.  Thank you for pointing out all the great features of your stay with your room, the hotel itself, the surrounding area and more.  This is very much appreciated.  We will definitely share your review with our Housekeeping staff so they know their hard work does not go unnoticed, so thank you for that.  We hope to see you again if your travel plans bring you back to the USA and more importantly, the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed her last year on the same holiday weekend and liked it well enough to return, hoping to have a repeat experience: which we did! Check in is fast and friendly. Room is spotless. Bed is comfortable. Plenty of towels. We had booked for two night's but wanted to cancel the second night, but I had forgotten to call ahead. On our day of arrival we asked to cancel the second night which they willingly did with no penalty fee! How's that for taking care of customers?! Also, we had run a half marathon the morning of our check-out: as a result we got delayed and had to unexpectedly check-out late. Again, there was no attitude or fee from the clerk. We will definitely stay here again! It is about one block from the Disneyland Main Gate; there are half a dozen nice places to eat
Manager Response: We thank you very much for writing a detailed review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate all the feedback and attention to detail you provided, we know other guest's love to get this kind of feedback as well, so thank you.  We hope to see you next year for the Disney half marathon, and until then, have a great day, and thank you for being a guest at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We have travelled from Australia to do a road trip around the USA with our 6 & 10yr olds. This place was great! One block from Disneyland and California Adventure Park and lots of family friendly restaurants in the area. Most importantly though, it was super clean, well maintained  and very affordable!! The pool was also a big hit with the kids!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate you taking the time to write your review and we hope your journey around the USA has been memorable.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: A jewel in the mists of the glitter
Summary: Castle Inn is centrally located in an excellent location to access theme parks, shopping and dining districts. Staff not only friendly but also efficient Castle Inn may be one of the "older" accommodations in the fast paced area but still can hold it's own with the "big boys". Value for money, I will recommend Castle Inn to my travle clients.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your lovely review of your recent stay with us.  We loved your tag line, and it made our day.  We appreciate it, and once again, thank you, and look forward to seeing you again at the "jewel in the mists of the glitter".  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We had a great stay at the Castle Inn and Suites! Our room was spacious and had everything we needed- comfy beds, mini fridge, plenty of towels. The air conditioning worked really well and the (free!) wi-fi was great. There was plenty of (free!) parking. The front desk employees were all very nice and accommodating and friendly. The walk to Disneyland wasn't bad at all. Great stay!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your visit to Disneyland last month.  We appreciate the review and hope to see you again in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Perfect for walking to the Park!
Summary: I was very pleased with our stay at the Castle Inn and Suites.  Relatively easy walk to Disney.  Appreciate the military discount and thought the price was very, very reasonable for the location.  It was very clean, although a little worn. Kids loved staying in the castle.  Pool was pretty small, but the kids didn't seem to mind. I love the old "motel' style since it is easier to get things in/out of the car!  Would definitely stay here again!  Thank you!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your recent review of your stay with us in August.  Thank you for the feedback and stating you would definitely stay here again.  We look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great location to Disneyland, large, clean rooms & friendly staff
Summary: After travelling around the U.S for a month Anaheim was our last stop and we stayed at Castle Inn & Suites.  The bed and pillows were so comfortable and we had the best sleep we had all trip.  The rooms are very spacious and very clean.  The towelling was new, thick and fluffy which I find important.  The hotel offered free wi-fi which was fast and handy.  There is a store onsite for any snacks or items needed.  The reception was 24 hours and staff very friendly.  There in an onsite laundry which was also very handy after a month of travelling.  There is a family friendly pool onsite.  We had a very relaxing stay and would definately recommend and return to this hotel.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to the Disneyland Resort.  It was very nice to hear you enjoyed our pillows and bed's, we do get a lot of great feedback about them, so thank you for the comment.  It was also nice to see all the great feedback you mentioned in your review regarding our staff, location, laundry facilities and more.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the USA and the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: There was a place to sleep at night and they had air conditioning, which was great. I never really got to use the pool though because it was always loaded with screaming children and drunk adults, which was too bad.  It was clean, cheap and near to Disneyland. It was all I needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and taking the time to post your review regarding your visit.  We hope you will consider the Castle Inn & Suites again, when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: This hotel surprised and delighted us when we arrived. The location directly across the street from Disneyland made the walk there only about 10 minutes total. Our room was fantastic - as others have mentioned, housekeeping folds towels into swans. We always got fresh towels each day, even if we hung them up to re-use. The room had a large tv with many stations and also had a mini fridge.  Plenty of parking for your vehicle. We did not use the pool, but it did look inviting. We will definitely stay at Castle Inn and Suites again! Great price for location and amenities provided!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us for your recent visit to the Disneyland area.  We appreciate the lovely comment's and feedback you provided, so again, thank you.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Clean - Good Beds - Practical - Nice Staff - SUPERB Location for DisneyLand
Summary: Stayed here one night with children. Checked in late at night, parked the car (good+free parking) got a nice room on the second floor. This hotel does not offer any breakfast or dining facilities. The hidden gem with this property is it takes only 5-8 minuttes to walk to the Disneyland entrance. On the way you pass two breakfast restaurants, one being Denny's (always open) so it is also very practical for families. We had no problem in checking out and leaving our luggage in the car. We felt the parking was secure. The staff was very helpful and accomodating.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your visit this past July.  We were happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and you enjoyed our property and location.  We hope to see you again on a future trip to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Good motel, very close to Disneyland and FREE parking.
Summary: Stayed for 5 nights. We had a two room suite (king bed in one room, two double beds in the other) which was spacious and comfortable.Disneyland is only a 10 minute walk away, so close in fact that you can see the fireworks from the top floor. Room was well equipped with fridge, microwave, coffee maker etc A/C was excellent but a bit noisy. Car park is large enough that there wasn't a problem finding a space even at 1.00am Price was reasonable for the location. I would recommend the IHOP opposite the Disneyland entrance for breakfast.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to write your review from your recent trip to Anaheim.  We appreciate the feedback regarding your stay, and we hope you reported the issue with your A/C to the front desk as it could have been an easy fix.  We just installed brand new A/C self-control units in all our guest rooms and they are very quiet, so we apologize you had a concern with yours.  We hope to see you again if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Very good motel. Clean, Nice and GREAT location.
Summary: My sister, my niece and me stayed  in the Castle Inn & Suites in Anaheim, Ca. in the middle of July 2015. The Motel is with a big car parking surrounding with a 3 stories high of rooms with an elevator.  The room was big with two Queen size beds.  Clean and nice like a typical American Motel, slightly outdated and old . The Motel is in GREAT location just across  the other side of the road from the Disneyland entrance.  The price was a little bit above what I think is a good value,  but considering  the HUGE  demand of tourists in this time of year its understandable.  All in all - between Average and Very Good.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us this summer.  We appreciate your review, and hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Lengthy and enjoyable stay at Castle Inn
Summary: We have been staying here for the last two weeks, will be checking out tomorrow, and have had a lovely time here. The room is spacious, with two double beds, a wardrobe, drawers, TV, fridge and microwave. A side table for our junk, and a small table with two chairs. There are quite a few power points in the room, which has been handy for charging our various devices.   The bathroom is clean, and while the toilet has had a couple of minor glitches, a little patience and everything was running smoothly again. It wasn't a big enough problem to bother the front desk with. there is a good sized vanity in the room with a hand basin and plenty of towels. Coffee and tea making facilities are also in the room and we found this very handy for making tea. The room is clean and the aircon
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a detailed review of your recent stay.  We appreciate all the great points you mentioned, and we think this also helps other guest's when reading the reviews, so again, thank you for your attention to detail.  We hope you will keep us in mind if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here in June/July and were very happy with the quality of the hotel. A quick walk to Disney, nice and quiet, and staff always happy to help out with every request.    After flying from Australia and landing at 6am, we were exhausted when we arrived and the staff stored our bags while we went for a walk and shop in downtown Disney. We asked if it was at all possible to get into our room early, and they moved mountains to get us a room as early as possible, so when we returned after lunch at about 1pm, we were able to have a shower and a sleep.   Cannot fault the customer service here.
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for taking the time to post your review from your stay with us earlier this summer.  We were happy to hear we were able to get you in to your room prior to our 3pm check in.  We do all possible to accommodate our early check in's, so we were glad this worked out for you.  We hope if you return to the States in the near future, you will make Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great location!  Easy walk to Disney!
Summary: We were very happy with the Castle Inn & Suites.  Room was clean and comfortable, despite being slightly outdated.  Excellent location if you are planning to visit Disneyland.  Free Wifi & parking added bonuses!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the review and hope to see you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here 2 years ago, and I don't know why we ever stay any where else. Staff is friendly and helpful, room spacious and clean. Quiet and convenient. Easy walk to Disneyland and Convention Center, drug store, food, Garden Walk.  My family really enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently, and posting your lovely review.  We really appreciate the great feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Much like many people's experience,  ours was no different, it was great. Visiting from Texas, the location is so convenient.   We arrived with plenty of welcoming smiles. We stayed for 4 nights with 2 teenagers.  The room was super clean and the beds were comfortable with plenty of pillows for all. The availability of a frig and microwave was a perk and were used.   The location was super convenient. Plenty of restaurants near by and of course Disneyland a block away. Access to major highways are easy to get to. Had no problems getting to where I wanted to get to.   Overall our experience was exceptional. Front desk was courteous and helpful.  They provided a laptop and printer to print our boarding passes which very nice of them. Will definitely stay again and I truly
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for your lovely review from your recent stay.  Your feedback is essential to our continued support of our first class customer service.  We pride ourselves on this, so thank you very much, and thank you for your recommendation.  We look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We had a 5 day pass for Disneyland and this hotel was nice and close to be walking back & forth. Only took us approx 10-15 minutes to walk over so was in a great position. Staff were very helpful and room was very comfortable and clean. Has a fridge, coffee machine and even a microwave. Also has a laundry so was handy to do a load of washing. Did have a small shop onsite for essentials but we found it cheaper to go to 7-11 down the road. Good spot for restaurants too.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to the Disneyland Resort.  We appreciate the great feedback and look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: I came up to go to Disneyland for 2 days in Aug. 2015. I got there early and since I couldn't get my room until 3 pm  they allowed me to check in and then leave my car there while I walked the 2 short blocks to Disneyland. They were so cordial and I appreciated that. They answered all my questions without seeming to be put out. I am 64 yrs. old and enjoyed every minute of my stay. My room was so clean and came with a microwave and refrig. at no extra cost. My sister came up to see me my second day and the office told us about a place 2 blks. away where she could park her car overnight since the hotel was booked and only one car per room is allowed. I love this hotel and will use no other when I go up to the Disneyland Resort. Thanks Castle Inn for a enjoyable time there. Joyce
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were very excited to hear we were friendly and helpful and that you will only stay with us when returning to the Disneyland area.  We appreciate our guest's taking the time to provide their feedback from their stay with us, so thank you again.;  Have a great day,  Kind Regards,

Summary: I've known of the Castle Inn and Suites for many years, but had never stayed there.  My daughter and I were in Anaheim to attend VidCon at the Anaheim Convention Center.  I booked at the Castle Inn and Suites mainly because of the price and the location.  We we a block and a half from the convention center and the room rate was reasonable.  We we just hoping that the room would be as nice as the photos made it appear.  We were not disappointed.  Although the Castle Inn and Suites is showing some signs of age on the outside, our room was exceptional.  Clean and pleasant and very well kept.  The beds were comfortable.  Everything worked.  There was a microwave oven and a mini-fridge.  No charge for parking.  A decent-sized pool.  And best of all, it was QUIET!  You could stand
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for your review from your stay with us last month.  We really appreciate the great feedback.  It was very nice to hear you enjoyed the hotel, the location and found our staff incredible.    We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Hot & Cold Water on the Shower
Summary: We stayed in an Executive Suite-Mini Suite at Room 160. The room is clean; however, the hot/cold water in the shower is not working well. At first, its ok but when you're in the middle of your shower the water will suddenly turn cold. I reported it to the receptionist the next day but was never fixed. We have to endure the cold water in the shower.  The toilet is not working properly also. You must be a handy man; otherwise, you need to call for maintenance every time it brakes. Avoid Room 160.
Manager Response: We thank you for providing your review from your recent stay with us.  We apologize for the inconvenience caused with the shower temperature.  This was an isolated concern and has been addressed and repaired.  We hope you will consider giving us another opportunity to make your stay more comfortable in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: We stayed in the 1 bedroom suite.  It was perfect for our family.  The twin beds in the bedroom are more like full beds, so there is more room for our kids to toss and turn and not fall off.  This hotel has a theme and appropriately styled.  Air conditioner works great.  There is plenty of towels and wash cloths.  We love the swimming pool.  There is a one foot deep pool for small children, a large swimming pool and a hot tub.  If you have kids, opted for the one bedroom suite, so you and partner can enjoy some privacy, while knowing that your kids are safe.  The best thing about this hotel is that they understand me as a mother when I need quick assess to a room to get my son washed up.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to post your review from your stay with us last month.  We were glad to read you enjoyed our Family Suite which offers 1 King Bed and 2 Queen Bed's.  Our guest that book this room type really seem to enjoy it.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I enjoyed my time at the Castle Inn.The manager and his staff were particularly helpful and friendly.The rooms were clean and well maintained and it was very convenient to Disneyland.Highly recommended
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland visit.  We appreciate the lovely review and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Pleasant stay clean room walking distance to theme parks
Summary: The rooms where clean, check in was easy and very friendly staff. Over all my son and I enjoyed our stay only downfall is that you can hear the water running through the pipes every so often but the hotel Is  much older so it's expected but we will return
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and staying with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Kind Regards,

Summary: It feels like too old, my room didn't get clean the first day (after sleeping the night before). The cleaning lady showed up around 4pm, we ask her not to do it, It was too late and the girls needed a nap.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your review from your recent stay.  We apologize your room did not get cleaned earlier in the day.  Our housekeepers work until 5:30 pm most day's. We are always happy to accept requests from our guest that would like their rooms cleaned at a specific time.    Once again, thank you for providing your feedback.  Regards,

Summary: Was searching for hotels near Disneyland and found a decent deal for Castle Inn. I did my homework and visited a few sites to see how it is. Plus we always walked by it and it looks pretty cool from the street. We ended up booking the family suite for my family of six, two girls (teens) and two boys (pre teens).  We come to Disneyland once a year and have been to a few different hotels including the Disneyland Hotel and the Grand California. Those two are very expensive but well worth it. Now back to the Castle Inn.  My first impression of the place was lackluster. They try and go with this castle theme but it honestly just comes off a bit tacky. The front desk staff was prompt and courteous though. They gave us a three room keys and sent us on our mission across the hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review from your recent stay.  We review all positive, and not so positive reviews and insure all issues or concerns are handled immediately.  We hope you contacted our front desk staff right away so your issues could have been addressed while still in house.  We were sorry you felt we looked "pretty cool" from the street when you would walk by, but then did not meet your expectations when you were here.  Majority of our guest's like the look and feel of our castle-theme, however; we realize we are not the property for everyone.  We were a bit concerned about the comment you made that your room was 300 yards from the lobby, when our hotel is just a little over 500 feet deep.  Once again, thank you for providing your feedback.  Sincerely,

Summary: We stayed at the Castle the weekend of July 16 - 19, 2015.  We stayed in the family suite which had 1 king bed in one room and a separate room with 2 queen beds. The room was very clean and had plenty of room, each had its own temperature control.  Beds were comfortable and the shower worked well and had an adjustable shower head, and furniture was in good shape.  We really liked that there is a mini fridge and microwave already in the room.  The desk staff was very friendly.  One of the hair dryers in the queen bedroom did not work, we reported it on our way out in the morning and it was replaced by the time we got back in the evening. Overall very pleased with everything.  By the way, coffee maker was the typical tiny type found in most rooms.  Not nearly big enough for us (3
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review.  It was so nice to read all the great feedback you provided from your visit with us.  We are sorry you found our new single cup coffee machines not sufficient enough.  Most hotels these days are switching over to the single cup coffee maker's for hygienic purpose.  Keep in mind, we are always willing to provide more coffee packet's and cup's, so if you return to stay with us, please keep this in mind.  Have a great day, and thank you again for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  Sincerely,

Summary: stayed for a week in may rooms were very clean and comfortable, this was the 2nd time my family has stayed there for a week, will continue to stay there for our extended vacations only complaint would be no breakfast like the others near by
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Our family recently stayed for 5 nights at the Castle Inn and Suites so we could visit Disneyland. We could not have picked a better place. It was 10 mins. walk from Disneyland. The room was lovely and the staff very friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend it to our friends.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the lovely review.  It was so nice to hear you had a great stay and that you would recommend us to friends.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next Disneyland Holiday!  Kind Regards,

Summary: First off, the location is fantastic.  Hard to get any better without staying at a Disney branded hotel.  The hotel is self is nice.  It is clean and well taken care of.  My only complaint is that the sound proofing isn't the best.  We had a room right be the elevator and could hear people  walking past when they were talking.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write your review from your recent stay with us.  It was nice to hear you enjoyed our hotel, and location.  If you do come back, you can request to be away from the elevator and ice machines, as all efforts to grant requests are given.  We hope to see you again,  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Location and price are a no brainer
Summary: Felt like a 5 minute walk to the entrance of Disneyland and the price was so cheap for the location and the standard. 24 check in made it so great as our flight got in so late, check in guy could have used a friendly smile when checking in but it was late so we didn't mind. So close to subway and a great little Chinese take out too, and CVS as well! If you get the ideal facing room, you can watch the night fire works show from your room! Beds were so comfortable and air conditioning in rooms was perfect. Free wifi major bonus too! You get more than what you pay for with this place. It was excellent. Came recommended by a travel agent friend and wouldn't hesitate in recommending it to everyone I know even just for a night.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for mentioning how close we are.  Our rates do vary from day to day and month to month, so it's always a plus to book early as that's when rates are usually a great value.    We are so happy a travel agent friend told you about us, that's always nice to hear.  We hope to see you again if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland,  literally a 10 minute walk. Free parking was a big plus. The price they offered me was outstanding. The only downside was that the room smelled and I couldn't figure out what it was. We stayed for five days and overall the stay was very pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We are sorry you experienced an odor you could not identify.  We hope you brought this to the front desk attention so we could have addressed it during your stay.  Again, thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again.  Regards,

Summary: When I first got here I noticed that the floor at the top was slanted like it was about to fall but I didn't think to much about that. I've passed by it a lot before and never was like I HAVE TO STAY THERE!!!!!! My mom got a good deal on this place so we decided to check it out. It didn't have anything real fancy amenity wise (other than a fridge and I believe there was a microwave)  but it was a nice and comfy room where you could stay all day and be relaxed. It's cleanliness was above average and it was walking distance to disneyland too which was really nice. I would come back and totally recommend this place.👍
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your recent review.  We appreciate the feedback and recommendation.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Regards,

Summary: This place was clean, staff were very friendly and helpful. The place is well situated for Disneyland and access to local transport and shops. There's plenty of good eating places within walking distance of here.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland visit.  We appreciate the review and for mentioning our convenient location and access to restaurants within walking distance.  We look forward to welcoming you back if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We chose this hotel for its theme and close proximity to Disneyland. Everything was great! It was very clean and comfortable. I really appreciated the mini fridge and microwave and caring touches like swan-folded towels. The onsite market was a lifesaver for band aids, Advil and souvenirs! Thank you! Will stay again
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to write your review from your recent stay with us.  The feedback is appreciated, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Helpful reviews. We are very excited
Summary: My wife and two kids are very excited to stay here in August as it is our first trip to Disney. I have been updating the reviews on a daily basis and see nothing but positive comments which is reassuring as we are staying for 13 days from Australia. Can't wait. 😄😄
Manager Response: Thank you very much for posting your comments about our positive review's.  We are very happy you chose the Castle Inn & Suites for your upcoming August visit.  We look forward to welcoming you and your family to the hotel. We know you will have a great stay while visiting the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Very clean and friendly hotel. Close to disney.  Lil shopping center next door of hotel for pizza,tacos,Chinese or sandwiches. I would definitely stay again! Stayed in a standard room that had two queen size bed,a sitting area with a table and a desk for business. Room also had a microwave and refrigerator that was very useful. Beds were very comfortable. Thanks to all staff for making our stay a great one.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent stay in the Anaheim Resort.  We appreciate the feedback and thank you for pointing out all the great restaurants in the area, and that you enjoyed your room.  We look forward to seeing you again if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warm Regards,

Summary: Glad to see the positive reviews as will be staying here with my husband during August in transit from Boston back to Australia. We have previously stayed here on two other occasions, hence the return trip. The location is great and have always found staff helpful and cheerful. Looking forward to our visit and a great break in Anaheim before the long flight back to Australia.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for posting such a lovely comment on Trip Advisor.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites next month.    Safe travels and we will see you soon.  Warm Regards,

Summary: The people who worked at the front desk were welcoming, knowledgeable and helpful.  The rooms at first seemed dark but they were clean and spacious.  The best feature of all was that it was walking distance to Disneyland's main gates
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We renovated all of our guest rooms in 2013 and we elected to go with made in America Thomasville furniture, which features the darker, richer furniture, as we felt it compliments our Castle Theme.  We realize many hotels go with all white bedding and lighter furniture, but we just did not feel that would work best with our property.  We appreciate the feedback.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Great hotel, especially the Junior Suite which has a lot of room space and comfortable beds.  Great having a refrigerator and coffee machine.  Short 5 to 6 minute walk to Disneyland Park entrance.  Has it own mini store on the property and laundry facilities.  Second time stayed there and will do so again in the future.
