Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit.  We were happy to hear the Mini Suite worked well for you, and that you will return in the near future.  Once again thank you and we will see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: For our annual trip to Disneyland, I chose Castle Inn and Suites because I found a mini suite for the same price I paid for a standard room at other hotels.  I called before to confirm my reservation and tell them we would arrive early.  The room was very clean and spacious.  It was on the first floor as requested and ready when we arrived.  The pool was great.  The toddlers love the baby pool and the space was hot!  It was in walking distance to Disneyland.  We liked it so much, we reserved the room for next year.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind review from your stay with us recently.  We appreciate the great feedback and we were glad to see you enjoyed your stay, and the Mini Suite worked well for you and your family.  We look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Pros:  Roomy 2 bedroom, nice large vanities, close to parks, newish furniture, quiet.  Cons:  Shower leaks, bathroom door doesn't close, housekeeping forgot us completely one day and came when we were in our rooms for a late afternoon break all the other days.  So in 5 days we got it cleaned twice, both when we called and requested it.  Some employees didn't speak English.  Both A/C units in room were changed during our stay.  One bed was left pulled out from the wall.  Elevator smelled bad so we walked up to 4th floor all but first day.  Exterior was being repainted but had some tired features, like the walkway to our room was slanted.  Beds are hard.  Towels are thin and scratchy.  Pillows are thin foam.    Now I know why the Tropicana is always booked.  It's a lot nicer than
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we apologize we did not meet your expectations on your recent stay.  Our guest rooms are cleaned daily unless guest's are in their rooms or place a do not disturb on their door.  We are always happy to assist with a time frame that works best for our guest's, a call in the morning before heading out for the day would accommodate this.  Once again, thank you for feedback.  Regards,

Summary Heading: Convenient location with spacious family suites
Summary: We stayed here in June 2015 for a family visit to Disneyland and it proved to be a great choice.  The Castle Inn is a short walk from the main entrance.  There are several restaurants close by and a well-stocked store on the property.  The pool isn't large, but our kids still enjoyed cooling off after long, hot days in the parks.  We would stay at the Castle Inn and Suites again in the future.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for writing your review from your June stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I spent five nights here with my granddaughters, who are 9 and 5. I chose this hotel because of its proximity to Disneyland (less than 2000 steps).   The is an older, fairly well-maintained hotel. Our room was clean, comfortable and big enough for the three of us. The pool was small, but the kids didn't seem to mind. The hotel was a little loud, but not unreasonably so.  Staff were courteous and friendly. Disneyland tickets were available at the front desk. There is also a 'mini' mini-mart on-site.  There are numerous restaurants within walking distance including a Denny's and IHOP, which is helpful since the hotel does not serve breakfast.  If you are merely looking for a place to sleep and shower while visiting Disneyland, this is a solid choice for the money.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing to bring your grandchildren to stay with us recently.  We appreciate the review and feedback you provided.  We love how you mentioned the number of steps we are to the main gate, this is very helpful I'm sure to other guests who may read your review.    Once again, we hope to see you in the near future if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Nice place within walking distance of Disneyland
Summary: The LOML (Love Of My Life) and I stayed here just before the Fourth of July. It was a very good place to be able to walk to the parks and back at the end of the day. The rooms were always clean and the beds made up nicely. The free parking space for guests was also of great benefit. While we personally didn't have a vehicle, we had family staying further away that did so they drove to us here, used our space, and we all went from here. About the only thing that I can think of that was slightly negative was that the bathroom door stuck a bit on the floor when opening it all the way. But that is minor.    Overall, it was a VERY good place for the time that we spent here. I'd stay here again.
Manager Response: We are so happy you and your LOML stayed with us this month.  Thank you for the lovely review and feedback.  We are sorry your bathroom door stuck, we hope you reported this to our Front Desk Staff so we could have a chance to check that out.  We renovated all of our rooms less than 2 years ago and this included all new door's, so they may still be working themselves.  Once again, thank you for your review and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warm Regards,

Summary: This hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland.  We were in a family suite.  Two queen beds in one room and a king bed in the other room.  Two t.v.'s, a microwave, and a small refrigerator.  We had a lot of room for two adults and two teenagers.  There was an extra sink, mirror, and counter in the second bedroom which allowed everyone to get ready faster.  Hot water was the only issue.  If you took a shower in the morning it was fine.  In the evening the shower was cold hot cold and so on.  It would have been a perfect stay had it not been for that.  That is a huge deal breaker.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your visit with us this past March.  We appreciate the feedback, and we were sorry to hear you had some hot water issue's. We hope you called the front desk to report this, as it could have been a very easy fix and something we are sure was isolated.  Once again, thank you for your review.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: A great place to stay for your Disneyland Experience
Summary: We spent 2 nights here on our recent trip to Disneyland and found it to be a fabulous hotel.  The walk to the Disneyland gates is about 10-15 mins depending on your fitness levels and whether or not you have little ones in tow! We could have stayed closer in, however like anywhere, the more central you are to an attraction, the more money you pay, and I was more interested in spending my money in Disneyland, not to sleep!  And what little girl doesn't grow up and want to live in a Castle? So the chance to fulfil a childhood dream of going to Disneyland, and getting to sleep in a Castle were fulfilled in one stay :)  Having already been in the USA for a week, the chance to do my washing was welcomed, with a clean and tidy laundry that cost $1.25 to do a load and $1.00 to use the
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time the provide such a great detailed review from your stay with us in June.  The attention to detail you provided was very appreciated, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Good choice for our family for a Disneyland trip.
Summary: Our family was here for 8 nights while going to Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm and Universal Studios.  The room was surprisingly quiet, except when someone was talking immediately outside.  We were on the 4th (top) floor.  The beds were firm; no sagging in the middle and the pillows were acceptable (not flat, not hard . . .)  The building is obviously older, but it was clean and had been kept up and at least our room was updated.  The air conditioner cooled off the room pretty quickly and kept it at the temperature we plugged into it.  The refrigerator and microwave were acceptable; no freezer in the refrigerator and the microwave was pretty small, but warmed up food OK.  The housekeeping staff was very good and the front desk was also competent and cheerful.  There are only 2
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the attention to detail you provided.  We do provide the standard refrigerator, microwave and wastebaskets for the hotel industry.  We just replaced the refrigerators with the energy-saving system which makes for a quieter refrigerator, but does not come with the freezer section.    Once again, we appreciate the feedback and was happy to see we were a good choice for you and your family.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Had a good stay here this past week. Next visit I'll try for a place closer to the Disney entrance or further away. This location is this hotel is just far enough away to make is a challenge walking with small children in hot summer heat. Yet this hotel is not far enough away to provide any shuttle service so we had no options.  We brought swim suits, but opted not to bother once we saw the pool. It seems like an after thought in the middle of the parking lot.  Room was clean, but dated furnishings and not enough light. The room was dark even with the curtains open and all the lamps turned on.  California is in a drought. The signs in the bathroom indicate they are aware, yet The bathroom faucet had a constant drip that turns into a good size flow as the day goes on. Hope they
Manager Response: We thank you for your recent review.  We are sorry we fell short in some area's, and realize we are not the hotel for everyone.  The majority of our reviews are 4-5 Stars with our location being not an issue, but we understand this perception varies between every guest.  We completed a large renovation the end of 2013 and purchased " made in america" Thomasville Furniture.  We elected to go with the dark fabrics and furnishings to compliment our Castle Theme.  The white bedding and lighter furniture that most hotel's do these day's would not make sense at our property.    Once again, thank you for your feedback.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland - but not too close!
Summary: The location is just OK and the staff is OK.  My family stayed three nights and the room was comfortable, but nothing too special.  The refridgerator was super-small and there was no iron or board.  We called for them and they quickly delivered them - even the ironing board was 1/2 size!  Not enough towels and running kids outside were really loud (but it's Disneyland area).  Parking lot is horrible - if driving - be aware!  The parking spaces all seem to be for compacts - our truck was a problem.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback you provided from your recent stay.  We wanted you to know, we do provide the Hotel "standard" size refrigerator in our rooms, as well as sufficient towel's. We are always happy to provide additional towel's when requested.    We provide complimentary parking, which is a huge saving's in the Anaheim market, and our spaces are "standard size" and work for 99% of the vehicles that park onsite.  We apologize if your truck was too large for our spaces, we hope you were able to make it work.  Once again, thank you for your feedback.  Sincerely,

Summary: We stayed 3 nights at the Castle Inn.  Our purpose was a place close to Disneyland.  It is about 2 long blocks from the Disney Property.  Lots of places to eat on either side of the hotel.  The hotel had a little store with some groceries, but it was closed at the posted time.   Our room was clean, big and comfortable. There was a fridge/micro.  Staff was ready to help and greeted us on our arrival.  Disneyland tickets are available on site in the front office, which is convenient.    Hotel staff called to confirm our reservation days before.  It was easy to change our dates prior to our visit.   There is a descent pool, but no pool towels.  I went to the housekeeping area and they were very willing to give us extra towels.  The best part of this lnn is the location and the
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing to stay at the Castle Inn & Suites recently.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay and found our location convenient and our staff helpful.    We are considering to put pool towels in the pool area in the near future, so thank you for this feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My friend and I stayed there last week for 3 nights and it was great. For the first time in a while I could not find anything structurally wrong with my room. Everything was as it should be. What I liked were the blackout curtains for when you want to take an afternoon nap and the air conditioning set to automatically keep the room cool for your return. It was close to Denny's and IHOP, Anaheim Garden Walk and of course, a 10 min walk to Disneyland. The one thing I wish it had was a room safe. Other than that, no complaints. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently, and for the lovely review.  We really appreciate it, and hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Room is just OK.  There were not enough towels, no iron or board and the refrigerator is very, very small.  The room seemed to trap the moisture from showering and never really was comfortable. Despite the 'castle' look - it was just OK for the high price. Staff was OK but parking is horrible...so if driving be aware.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for providing your review from your recent stay.  It appears you had a few challenges during your visit so we apologize for that.  We provide sufficient towels in every guest room and always happy to provide more when guests call to request additional towels.  In addition, we provide amble parking for all guest's.  We do provide complimentary parking for 1 vehicle per registered room, and to date, we have not had to direct guests to park additional cars off site, so we apologize if there was an isolated situation with our parking during your visit.  Once again, we appreciate the feedback.

Summary: Lovely and clean rooms w/ a tv and great sized washrooms, loved the Castle theme! the pool and hot tubs were lovely also. Very kind staff. Super close to Disney, less then a 10 minute walk. Lots of places for food right beside it, really great location! Just recently booked to come again to Disney as well as stay here in August!
Manager Response: A very big thank you for your lovely review from your recent stay.  We were so glad to see you had a good time, you enjoyed our pool , and found our staff kind and our location convenient.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great deal, spacious, clean rooms and close to Disneyland
Summary: The rooms were spacious and clean.  Staff was friendly and knowledgeable of area.  Price  was really good.  Have stayed in quite a few different hotels in the area over the past 30 years and i have to say that this is one of our favorites.  Lots of shops and restaurants close by.  I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland visit.  We were very happy to see you enjoyed your stay, and that you will definitely stay with us again.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: HSKP was top notch and a special call out to Ruth. Everyone we were in contact with was friendly and very helpful. Rooms were clean and comfortable and the distance to Disneyland and restaurants was perfect. Overall a really nice experience and would book there again
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write your review from your recent stay with us.  Thank you for spending your Honeymoon with us.  We will make sure we share your review with our Housekeeping Department.  We hope to see you again in the near future, maybe on your anniversary!  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Less money, more comfort and luxury
Summary: The best part about this place is its location. It's like half a mile from disneyland. There are shops and restaurants all around the hotel. At night you can see disney fireworks from the room itself. The rooms are pretty big. I really liked it. Money's worth
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for providing your review from your recent stay. Our location is great as it's about 200 yards from the main entrance, and guests really enjoy the convenience.  Although we don't have rooms where you can see the firework's, many of our guests will stand outside the front entrance for the great view of the fireworks.  We hope you will come back to see us if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort!  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great place and easy walk to Disney
Summary: The hotel was nice.  The rooms are a pretty good size and clean. The front desk staff was very good with advice about the area and Disney.  It is very convenient to restaurants, convenience store and of course Disney/California Adventures.  If you have young kids, they'll love the castle theme.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your review from your recent stay.  We appreciate it and hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We had a great stay. Would recommend to all. 6 min walk to the park, 10 min walk to restaurants. Stores and drug store across the street. Room was clean and tidy, staff was very helpful. Pool is great for the kids and cooling down. The store is great for the quick items you need. Will stay here in the future.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites on your recent visit to the Anaheim Resort.  Thank you so much for all your kind words and great feedback regarding our location.  We look forward to seeing you again if your travel plans bring you back to Anaheim.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We simply loved staying here! So close to Disneyland :-).  Service fantastic in every way, pool good for kids & laundry amenities just spot on. The room was so spacious & comfy.  On day of arrival our son fell & fainted hurting his hip, lip & bumped head (clumsy boy & jetlag not a good mix), staff from the office saw & were so helpful with ice & offering to call medical assistance. Brought us ice to our room for him & extra washers. Advised us on hockey tickets & transport, shopping trip transport, just everything was great. Thank you Castle Inn & Suites
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us last November.  We were very happy you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to assist you with your son.   We hope if your travel plans bring you back to the USA and Anaheim, you'll keep Castle Inn & Suites in mind, we'd love to see you again in the future.  Sincerely,

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at Castle Inn & Suites in Anaheim, California. The rooms were very nice and clean. The staff was very kind and helpful. It was very family friendly. We loved that it was within walking distance to Disneyland and to many restaurants. Would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites and for staying with us this past May.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We really enjoyed our trip! We had two rooms. We arrived very early. Our rooms were not ready but we were offered an upgrade( for a small price) and wee were able to get our rooms. We were traveling with 8 people so to have more space was a welcome treat. We had suites on the fourth floor and a street view, looking into the parks. We were in 410 and 411. The rooms were spacious and clean. My only small complaint would be the towels could use fabric softer. Seriously that's it! Our stay was wonderful. There is no breakfast but with Denny's and other restraunts near by that's an easy fix. The walk to the park takes about 7-10  minute. At the end of the day it could be much for little ones or maybe the grandparents. Overall we had a great time and we would choose staying here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your reveiw from your stay with us this month.  We appreciate all the great feedback, and look forward to seeing you when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Perfect walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventure. I would like thank Alberta for her helpful service. Eateries, like pizza and chinese, is less then 5mins. away. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review of your stay with us recently.  We will pass on your kind words to our staff member.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We chose this for it's location to Disney and we were pleasantly surprised. The room was big and spacious and doesn't feel like a motel room. It's a maximum of 10 minutes to Disney door to door and the free parking is a bonus. They let us keep the car in the car park even after we checked out so we could go explore Disney for the rest of the day. The only negative is the noisey fridge which you can't seem to unplug. For the price we paid you can't go wrong!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the great feedback on your stay.  We installed energy efficient refrigerators last year so they are more quiet than those with the compressor's.  We are sorry the refrigerator in your room seemed to be noisy.  We hope you reported it to our front desk so we could replace it for you.    We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The 6-person suite was clean and the staff was friendly. Within walking distance (10 min) to Disneyland, so easy to come back for lunch. Used the fridge in room for 6 people. No freezer in fridge so couldn't refreeze blue ice for taking lunches anywhere. One bathroom was fine for the 6 of us since there was an extra sink. The price was quite reasonable and fit our needs. Would definitely stay here again. There was some repainting to the front when we were there so it is kept up and looks nice.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites recently for your Disneyland trip.  Thank you for the great review and we look forward to welcoming you back.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Great location and great staff to boot, we stayed for a couple of Days to visit Disneyland and it's location was only 5-10 mins away, the staff checked us in early and upgraded our room to one with a view at no cost.  The laundry was a great extra as all other hotels advertise Laundry services at dry cleaning rates i.e. $70.00 for your jocks and socks, room was was big and clean and allowed us to live in comfort.  Will recommend this Hotel to all our friends and family if visiting this location in the future, excellent price, location and amenities.
Manager Response: A very big thank you for your review you posted, we were happy to hear you were well taken care of. We take pride of our guest service, so thank you very much for pointing this out.  We were also glad to see you were able to use the laundry facilities while you were here, and found this a big help and big saving's.   We look forward to you returning to your "Aussie Paradise" in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Inexpensive and short walk to Disneyland's front door!
Summary: I read a lot of reviews before choosing this hotel and I was quite pleased once we checked in. The staff was friendly, room was spacious, clean, and quiet, and the walk to Disneyland was quicker than what I had read online. The only downfalls were that this hotel doesn't offer a continental breakfast and the pool closes at 10. We stayed for 8 days and hope to stay here again during our next trip.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We were happy to hear you found our rates a value, and our staff friendly.  With so many choices in the area for Breakfast, our guests like the options each day.  We find our Free Parking and Free WI FI is a much better savings!  There is a "quiet down" at most Hotels in Anaheim, so pools closing at 10 pm is the norm for this area.    We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Was very happy with Hotel and the Price was Great!
Summary: I have stayed at many hotels at Disneyland and this was by far the best hotel for the price.  I don't know if I just got an exceptionally low price, but I would stay there again, if the price is right.  It was clean, and quiet (top floor) and walking close to entrance to Disneyland.  Pool and Jacuzzi were too busy most of the time there, but that was okay this time.  It wasn't a Marathon weekend, when I need the Jaccuzzi.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were happy you found a great rate with us and enjoyed our location.  Rates vary throughout the year, so it's always a good idea to book early as rates will increase based on demand.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Cheap, clean and only 10mins from Disney
Summary: Why wouldn't you want to stay here!? From the outside it looks like a tacky 70's motel, but the rooms are nice and large enough, if only slightly dark.  The main draw card though, is the location just a short walk to the Maingate. Also try the handy Mi Casita for early breakfast, only $25 USD for a full buffet for family of 4
Manager Response: We appreciate your review from your stay with us earlier this month.  It was nice to hear you enjoyed our "Fun Castle" theme, and that you found our rooms nice and large.  The dark accents were intentional as the stark, white bedding most hotels go with would not fit our theme as well.  We are glad you found a nice location to have breakfast every day.    Once again, thank you for your review.  Sincerely,

Summary: My 10 year old granddaughter and I spent 3 days at Disneyland and California Adventure Park.  We spent 4 nights at the Castle Inn, short walk to the parks so very well located.  The rooms were clean and the staff was friendly and the cost was reasonable.  Great location, I would recommend this hotel to any family on a budget when visiting the Disneyland parks.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write your review from your stay with us last month.  We appreciate the recommendation, and look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Nice motel, however, don't leave valuables in your room.
Summary: This was an average motel a few blocks walk from Disneyland.  Rooms were clean and fairly spacious.  We had two teenage daughters coming with my husband and myself so we had a room with two bedrooms.  One downside was there was only one bathroom so all four had to share.  Pool and jacuzzi were nice, no poolside towels though.  Front desk was very helpful with information in regards to renting mobility chairs.  It was delivered to the motel and they keep them in the lobby for us each night.  The only problem we had was one of our daughters had her very expensive ear buds taken from the room.  Management did look into it, however who in their right mind would admit to taking them?  So...this is the reason i have not rated the Inn any higher than 3 stars.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are happy you found your suite clean and spacious. Most suites in the Anaheim Resort offer 1 bathroom, so hopefully the small vanity area in the back room with the sink, mirror and extra hair dryer was useful.  We may consider adding pool towels in the future; however, most of our guest just take their towels from their room and have them replenished after their time at the pool.  Like many hotels, we have valued employees that cherish their jobs, and would not jeopardize their employment by taking guest item's.  Guests have left laptops, cell phones, wedding rings and many other very expensive items in their rooms and we personally mail these items back to our guests via priority mail.  We have even discovered items left in the room and phone the guest before they call us, which many guests have commented on this service right here on trip advisor. We hope that maybe they have turned up, or perhaps the earbuds were left at Disneyland or somewhere else during your visit in Anaheim.  Again, thank you for providing your review.  Sincerely,

Summary: After the many times we have stayed on the Blvd I was always leary of this hotel, I will admit I thought the castle theme was a little cheesy. HOWEVER! I was very pleasantly surprised by the cleanliness of this hotel. We were in rm 141 on the first floor which I loved after long days on my feet. Maybe the only downfall of the 1st floor is if you had noisy people above you, we heard a few bonks but nothing that bothered us. Totally within walking distance (2 blocks) of the park, even with a 3 and 7 year old. Free WiFi to upload all your pictures from the day and a refrigerator for all that you might need that for.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your nice review you provided from your stay with us last month.  We appreciate the feedback and hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Good hotel right next to Disneyland!
Summary: Finally took the kids to Disneyland and found Castle Inn and Suites. It is less than a 10 minute walk from the park, meaning you can be on rides in no time. Along the way, you can stop at a handful of restaurants to eat. They have a TON of free parking, they sell Disney tickets on-site so you don't have to waste time standing in line (EXACTLY the same price as if you bought them at the park entrance). The pool was good. A little on the smaller side, but since few people use it at a time, no problem. A TON of restaurants nearby, less than 5 minutes walk. Staff is very friendly, room was good, and the hotel LOOKS like a castle! (My son pronounced the whole place "Fit for a King!") The WIFi was probably the BEST I have ever experienced at a hotel. Fast, easy, reliable. Also, VERY
Manager Response: We appreciate the great feedback you provided from your stay last month.  We loved the attention to detail you provided regarding our location, parking, staff and most of all our great WI FI.  We get rave reviews about our WI FI so thank you for mentioning this.  We were happy your son felt like our property was "Fit for a King".  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Alma at the front desk was amazing. She was Very understanding and helped us with parking on multiple occasions. We were allowed two cars even though the contract specifically stated that we were only allowed one.  Thanks Alma!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review from your recent stay.  We appreciate the kind words you provided regarding one of our staff members, we have passed this along to her.    We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The second week of May 2015 we stayed at Castle Inn in anaheim California while we enjoyed our Disneyland trip. Castle Inn was a great place to stay. The rooms were very clean, the people that work there were very accommodating. When we arrived our rooms were not quite ready for us to go into so the desk personnel stored our luggage for us till we returned. The rooms were cleaned early daily, when we asked for extra items like towels or cups they were left in the room. My husband and I have asthma and need smoke free rooms and sometimes you don't get that. Our rooms were great and fresh smelling, AC worked great, fridge and TV and quiet. We rented a wheel chair from a business that delivered it right to the office and when we were done we just left it in the office to be picked
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback from your stay with us in May.  All of your points were detailed and appreciated.    Thank you for the recommendation, and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect for the family Disneyland visit
Summary: I can't say enough good things about this place!  My boys (ages 8 and 5) loved that it looked like a castle.  We had a corner room at the front of the building which I highly recommend.  Even though our room was on the main road we did not hear any street noise.  The room was very spacious and spotlessly clean.  The beds were very comfortable and when I stripped down the bed I noted that they were only a year or two old.  The staff was very friendly and accommodating.  My son lost his favorite stuffy and when I approached one of the cleaning staff to see if it had been accidently picked up with the laundry he immediately telephoned his supervisor to try and locate it!  The walk to the park only takes about 5-6 minutes.  We will definitely stay here again and would recommend it
Manager Response: A very big thank you for your lovely review from your stay with us this past February.  We really appreciate all the comments and details you provided while staying with us.  We were happy to see your boys liked our Castle exterior.  Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to welcoming you back.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The hotel was clean and moderate close to disneyland which made it nice right by shopping and restaurants a clean cheaper hotel to stay in while in disneyland its a clean place to sleep if your not worried about all the extra amenities the pool and hottub were very well kept also
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for posting your review.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We used to stay at this property several years ago when visiting Disneyland. We decided to start using other properties due to the mustiness and run down look of the rooms. Memorial Day weekend, we ended up staying here (our normal hotel was full), and was delighted to see a vast improvement in the rooms. A lot of renovation has gone on. Everything in the rooms has been updated, and the mustiness is gone.  The staff was fantastic (even only charged us half a day for the last day when we had to leave early). My kids have always loved the themeing of this property.  Now that the rooms have been updated, it's hard to pass up this property, especially for the price ($100 on average cheaper than rooms one block closer to the entrance, and $200 cheaper than most Disney properties).
Manager Response: Thank you very much for giving us another try after staying here years ago.  We were glad you enjoyed our new rooms.  We were happy to see that your kids have enjoyed our Castle theme.  As word gets out about our new rooms, are enhanced WI FI, free parking and more, rates are increasing.  We will still continue to provide value for our guests, so book early and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Nice hotel close to Disneyland!  The staff was very friendly and the rooms were great!  Nothing super fancy but good enough!  There was also an elevator and free parking!  Do not book through Expedia though.  Check the hotel's website first.  They had a better deal than Expedia.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review of your recent stay.  We look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Sincerely,

Summary: I got lucky and was able to snag this room over Memorial Day weekend.  I was traveling with three kids and was not looking forward to a single room.  The girls had a great time.  I kept my sanity.  The room was fine and spacious enough for five people and the towel doves delighted the girls. Our only regret was that we did not get to swim.  We simply ran out of time.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your Memorial Day visit.  We were happy to see you were able to find a room with us, and that you had a good time.  We hope you will keep us in mind if your travel plans bring you back to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My family and I just stayed at the Castle inn & suites this past week while we were visiting Disneyland and had the best experience at this hotel. The housekeeping staff were amazing and would even put towels in fun shapes like birds or fans. The room was so clean. The beds were extremely comfy with lots of extra pillows and we slept well every night. The room had  a small refrigerator, microwave and flat screen tv as well as a armoire to hang clothes. They also have a small laundromat, store, and 2 pools and a hot tub. Easy walking distance to Disney too!The front desk staff were wonderful as well! This will be the  hotel we will always choose anytime we visit Anaheim.
Manager Response: A very big thank you for your lovely review of your recent stay with us.  It was so nice to read all the great points you provided regarding our housekeeping department.  They do pride themselves on doing a great job for our guest so thank you so much for commenting on this, as well as our Front Desk Staff.  Once again, thank you very much and we look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My family and I stayed at this hotel while travelling during christmas to the happiest place on earth. My children are young (10,5,3 and 2) at the time of travel, and this place was perfect! although dated on the outside, our room was big clean and comfortable. My kids loved it and so did my husband and I, the set up for the family room was perfect and the price was definitely right (especially for that time of year) The location is also great. Even though the hotel isn't attached to any restaurants, there is a denny and Ihop up the street right across the street from the disneyland gates. Will definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent review.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My husband, daughter, grandson and myself  stayed in this wonderful hotel for a week in May this year. The staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful,  the rooms were clean and nicely decorated. They have a heated pool and hot tub which I saw cleaned daily. My grandson was sick one night and they even came to our room at midnight to give us clean bedding, they wouldn't let us re make the bed ourselves, we had to let them help. Such excellent service, much better than we have ever had before.We arrived early in the morning for a 3pm check in and as they could see we were jet-lagged they had us in a room before midday. Very short walk to Disneyland and surrounding restaurants, nice views from the balcony.  Highly recommended !! they even offered me a special something for my
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your May Holiday.  Your feedback was so nice and we really appreciated it.  We pride ourselves on our guest service so thank you for pointing this out.  We look forward to seeing you again if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We had a 21 night stay here for our trip to Disneyland and Hollywood area, we had 6 in our group and got a suite. Now the hotel was ok it done the job of getting a night sleep if you like hard beds but that was it. I wouldn't call it a suite as it was small for the amount of people we had, in our 21 night stay our bed linen wasn't changed which was in my opinion a bit unhygienic. They supplied tea and coffee but unfortunately we only received it when we arrived and none any other day which isn't a big deal but would have been nice to have a cuppa in the morning. So overall it is an average hotel if your after a sleep.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for providing your feedback from your recent stay with us.  We apologize we did not meet your expectations.  Majority of our guests rave about our beds and want to know where they can purchase the mattress' but we understand not everyone has the same opinion.  Our housekeeping department changes bedding daily.  We do have the water conservation system in place, so if you placed your cards on your beds than your bedding would not be changed.  However, if not, you would definitely had your bedding changed during your 21 night stay, this is hotel standards.  Again, we are sorry we fell short on your experience and thank you for the feedback.  Sincerely,

Summary: My 10 year old daughter and I went on a mother daughter trip to Disneyland. For the past 52 years I've visited the park aand surrounding hotels each year and often twice a year. I had always wanted to stay at The Castle Inn and Suites and this year I finally booked a room. The price was fabulous for what we received. The room was very modern nd possibly remodeled, the room service was great, the beds were one of the most comfortable I have encountered at a hotel of this price, I actually have paid double for the same quality room. The staff at the front desk was so professional and had the "Disneyland Courtesy" you find at the park hotels for 3 times the cost. They had a little store that served excellent coffee but also had snacks and other items that you may need on a moments
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your lovely review from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate all the great feedback and we were happy we could make your stay memorable.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Can''t fault this place for the price
Summary: We only stayed for a single night whilst having a stop over on our trip from Australia to Miami.  Simple clean lodging with spacious rooms and friendly staff. An easy quick check- in and luggage storage after our check out.  Walking distance from Disney meant it was easy for us to come back to our room for an afternoon nap before hitting the park in the evening.  Surrounded by lots of cheap eats.  The hotel was also able to hold a car seat that I ordered online with Walmart which made our travels easier.  We would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent one night stay with us.  We were happy to see we did not disappoint.  We hope you will come back and see us again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We strayed here May 16th thru the 20th. Everything was so nice from the time we arrived. We arrived at the Castle Inn about 10:30 in the morning. A room on the ground level would not be available till in the afternoon but if we wated to change to a single queen they had a room on the 4th floor that we could get in right away. We took that room, it was right off the elevator. Room was nice and very clean. Everyone we encountered here was so nic ans so professional. Th only issue we had was our last night there, housekeeping did not leave any coffee or be cups. We had 2 cups that we were using for water so we used them. My husband had thrown in a couple single serve packets of coffee when we left home, so he was good for the next morning. We didn't use the hot tub or pool as they
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for writing your review from your recent stay with us.  Thank you for spreading the word to your family and friends about our property, we really appreciate it.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The hotel more than met my expectations!  The front office staff were very helpful and answered our questions. The rooms are very spacious.  We had two queen sized beds, refrigerator, microwave, desk, coffee pot, and table along with 3 chairs.  The beds were comfortable with 4 fluffy pillows.  There are four floors with a couple of elevators. The air conditioning kept the room cool.    We left a personal item behind and the when I called the front desk they had it there and told me that they would ship it to me promptly. Well above my expectations and quickly handled.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review you provided.  Your feedback regarding the hotel was great, and very much appreciated.  You highlighted all our features we get great reviews on, so thank you very much for that.  We were more than happy to return the item you left behind, this is part of our guest service.  Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Our family of 7 from age 7 to 72 enjoyed our stay at the Castle Inn.  Clean rooms with fridge & microwave,  friendly helpful service, pool area clean and safe.  Not fancy, but suited us.  Close to many restaurants and stores.  Easy walk to Disneyland.  Thank you Castle Inn Staff for a friendly comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write your review from your stay with us this month.  We appreciate the feedback, and hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here two weeks ago while visiting Disneyland.  We only stayed one night but would have stayed the other four if they had vacancy.  It has been recently remodeled.  Beautiful rooms.  Super friendly staff.  The walk to Disneyland was about ten minutes.  They also let us keep our car parked there til we could check into our other hotel, which was so nice and helped us avoid parking at the parking garages at Disney.  However, what impressed me the most was we left our iPad in our room after we checked out.  We didn't realize we had left it until very late at night.  We called them and they had it!  I appreciated their honesty so very much.  I highly recommend Castle Inn and Suites.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for providing your feedback from your stay with us earlier this month.  We appreciate the comments about our newly remodeled rooms and friendly staff.  Thank you for the recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This hotel is as great as everyone says. This was my first time to California and To Disneyland. I came to run in the Tinkerbell Half Marathon!!! Helpful staff, very clean and extremely close proximity to Disneyland!!! The WiFi is FANTASTIC,and not just for a hotel. It was just as good as wireless internet at home. The pool is small but nice. The only complaint is that the "Queen" beds definitely are't queen, they are a small double at best and very cramped to sleep two adults in, although the mattress was comfy.  The pillows were wonderful though and in room fridge and microwave were in excellent working condition. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for the great review you provided.  We really appreciate all the kind words about the property and staff.  Thank you for pointing out our fantastic WI FI.  We recently upgraded it and have extremely high speed, and our guests have been raving about it, we've also been told we have the best WI FI in the area, so thank you for pointing this out.  With our remodeled rooms, we did purchase all new queen size Serta mattress' so we are sorry you felt they were a bit small, but they are official queen size mattress'.  We do offer King Beds in our Family Suites, if you wish to try that room type next time.  Thank you again,  and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Great stay, walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Not a single complaint or issue at this hotel. We stayed three nights, and the room was very clean and comfortable. The front desk was very helpful when we told them about the car accident we'd been involved in during our drive to California, and gave me a coupon for a scooter rental that was very reasonably priced, to make our excursion to Disneyland more comfortable for me (I was pretty bruised and sore after the accident). The scooter rental was half the price that the ones in the park go for, and was perfect.  There is a pool, hot tub, and kiddie pool in the center of the property, and the hot tub was MUCH appreciated after a day of walking. There are also laundry facilities, but I didn't make use of them. Who does laundry on vacation?! It was good to know they were there if
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for the lovely review you provided.  We especially appreciate the kind words regarding our clean rooms, the convenient pool area, and gift shop and that we were able to assist you with getting a scooter during your visit.  Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We travelled to Disneyland for our first ever visit with our 1 and 5 year old kids. Number one thing about this hotel was its location. It's actually closer than it seems and its a huge advantage for families to have it so close. The staff were all great to us and super friendly. Our room was quiet and not a lot of disturbances at all. I would have loved to have been able to have a window or a spot where we could have seen the Disneyland fireworks at night, but the hotel faces the other way, and its asking a little much to change that! The rooms were great! We felt right at home. They were very clean, very new and modern, and were much larger than we expected. With two little ones running around, we appreciated the extra space. Best of all about the rooms, aside from the free
Manager Response: We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for writing your review from your recent stay with us.  It was so nice to see all the great features you highlighted, so again, thank you for that.  It was nice to hear you felt right at home with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Thank you for letting us know about our Gift Shop, we have spoken to our staff to remind them to insure all guests know about our property amenities, so we appreciate this feedback.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Good Hotel close to the happiest place on earth.
Summary: We just got back from four nights at this hotel.  The location couldn't be better, just a 10 to 15 minute walk to Disneyland Park.  Check in went smoothly and the staff are very helpful and friendly.  Our room was very spacious compared to other hotels that I have stayed in.  As well, the room was very clean.  The only issue I had was one late night of loud thumping in the room above us but overall I was very pleased with our stay here and would definitely recommend it for it's location, cleanliness, value and good customer service.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to write your review from your recent stay with us.  Thank you for the recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: A nice place to sleep after a long day at Disneyland.
Summary: The hotel is clean and the price was very reasonable. You get free internet and parking, so you save some money there. The walk to Disneyland was easy, 10 minutes or so. They don't serve breakfast, so I loaded up on fruit, yogurt, boiled eggs at the nearby 7-11 to help start the day. The rooms are spacious and the bathroom mirror is huge, easy to keep on eye on the kids. Overall a good option for my next Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the nice review you provided from your stay with us this month.  We appreciate the attention to detail you provided on how close we are to the park, and our free parking and WI FI.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Clean Place to Sleep; Closer to Disneyland than it Looks
Summary: We stayed here because we got a good deal on the web. It's actually closer to the front gates of Disneyland than it looks.   First thing is that this hotel is squeaky clean. It's clearly an older hotel, but the rooms are very well kept. The beds were comfortable and the bathroom area was immaculate. If you're visiting Disneyland, you're not really spending a whole lot of time in your room anyway, so this is the perfect place to crash after playing all day in the park.  We have stayed at the Fairfield down the street, and after you consider walking the distance to the road from the hotel, Castle Inn and Suites is just as close. It only takes about 7-10 minutes to walk to the Entrance Plaza of the Disney Parks.  All in all, this was a great place to sleep. We didn't spend any time
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for providing your detailed review from your stay with us this month.  We appreciate all the kind words, and feedback regarding room location.  We look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Very Nice Place and great people
Summary: We really like this hotel. It was about a 7-10 minute walk to the parks. Great location close to a subway and also restaurants like cheesecake factory and California pizza kitchen with in walking distance. The room was very very very clean. The bathroom was also very clean. you could tell that it was newly updated.Staff was very friendly and super helpful I wish I could remember all there names! Would give us as many towels as we asked for never a question. Wifi worked good. Free parking we felt very safe leaving our car there and walking to the parks and restaurants. Pool is small but jacuzzi is nice and warm and watching the kids there they didn't seem to mind  We were on the first floor and there was a bit of noise but I do understand that everyone is excited to go to
Manager Response: Thanks for writing a review of your stay!  We always appreciate the feedback from our guests.  The staff is very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we will always go out of our way to make your stay special.  The location of the hotel is very convenient for guests visiting Anaheim for any number of reasons.  The upgraded Wi-Fi has been a guest favorite for the past few months, often it is the most important amenity we offer.  On your next visit you may want to try one of our Family Suites which includes one King bed and a second bedroom with 2 queen beds.  Beds can be a personal preference, when the hotel was renovated all of the beds were replaced with Serta perfect sleeper mattresses.  You are correct that the size of the beds in the standard rooms are queens.  Free parking is another amenity offered by the hotel, so once a guest arrives they can just leave the car and walk to all the places you mentioned. Thanks again for taking the time to write a review for the Castle Inn & Suites.  We hope to see you again the next time you come to Disneyland!

Summary: We stay here from May 1st until the 4th and it was great. The service was incredible, the beds are comfy and its a great place to stay with your familiy. Its within walking distance from Disneyland, and it has a great value for everything. As a travel agent, I would definitely recommend this hotel to my customers.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review about your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!  The staff makes guest service a top priority.  The hotel has one of the best locations, right in the heart of the Disneyland Resort area and walking distance to restaurants, the parks, and shopping in the area.  We are very happy to hear you will recommend us to your clients too! Every room comes complete with a refrigerator, microwave, hair dryer and coffee maker. With free parking, free Wi-Fi, and no additional resort fees, it is the perfect place for families to stay when visiting Anaheim! Thanks again and we will see you on your next visit!

Summary Heading: good place to stay while visiting Disneyland
Summary: get what you pay for, basic clean accomadations with a good location, short walk to Disneyland, free parking is a great bonus. Easy access to the Freeways and shopping and food near by. Would not hesitate to stay here again
Manager Response: Thanks for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and could take advantage of the location of the hotel.  We make every effort to ensure guest rooms are clean, the staff is friendly, and we can make every guest stay memorable.  We hope you were able to use the free Wi-Fi along with the free parking.  We look forward to accommodating you on your next visit to Disneyland!

Summary: We book the castle inn and suites at Anaheim before we left Australia Disneyland was our last stop before Hawaii. The hotel was across the road from Disneyland.   but the rate I book. was not the rate we got when went to sign in. I question this the next morning (late and tired) the manager said would look into it but alias said due to the Star Wars convention the rates have been increased. I have never book a room nor paid for a room $178 for a night and we book for 6 nights   The rooms are basic but good. We did have a large room. There is No breakfast or anything else. can make coffee.   Ps hotel .com was showing the room at 122 per night we did get a tiny discount but no where near acceptable. Had us over a barrel  See other blogs coffee and food at Disneyland. Vegas. Palm
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay.  We are glad to hear that you appreciated the large size of your room.  As you mentioned you were here for the Star Wars convention in Anaheim.  The room rates were contracted in advance with the convention, which does not allow us to change the rate for attendees due to the contract.  All guests who booked through the convention received the same rate.   Due to the changing supply and demand for hotel rooms in the area, rates are dynamic, fluctuating day to day or even changing from one hour to the next.  The hotel industry, like the airline industry is based on a dynamic rate scale.  We hope that you enjoyed your stay and will choose the Castle Inn & Suites the next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary Heading: hotel was nice but got the worst room
Summary: We stayed there for 2 nights.  Do NOT stay in room 131.  You can hear every noise outside of the room.  Since it is right in front of the stairway, you can hear people talking loudly/screaming early in the morning and late at night when they walk by.  You can also can hear people running up and down the stairs and the thumps of people carrying their luggage.  They also charge $6/night to rent a crib which I think is ridiculous.  All the hotels I have ever stayed at, including downtown LA, has never charged us to have a crib in the room.  Other than that, the hotel is at a nice location that is close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are happy to hear you thought the hotel was nice, and the location is tough to beat!   We are sorry to hear the noise level bothered you during your stay, it may be due to the other guests around and the dates that you stayed.  If there is a noise issue the front desk staff will be happy to address it, but when kids are excited for Disneyland they tend to be a little noisy on the way to or from the parks.  For a future stay we could request a room in a quieter location to better accommodate you.  Though the hotel has a fee for a crib, we try offer other things like complimentary parking for one vehicle per room, free Wi-Fi, and we do not charge a resort fee.  We hope that you will give us a chance to enjoy the hotel again on another trip to Disneyland!

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights at the end of April this year. Staff were friendly, rooms were clean and very spacious, had nice size beds and TV. The pool was sufficient for our needs. And the price for what we got was a good value. I would stay here again for sure. And the convenience of a 5 minute walk to the entrance was awsome.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay!  The hotel is located close to the entrances of the parks, the convention center, and the Gardenwalk shopping center.  The short walk to and from the parks definitely comes in handy after a long day of fun.  The heated pool and jacuzzi are another added comfort after walking in the parks all day!  Free parking and free Wi-Fi can come in handy too.  We look forward to seeing you soon for your next stay!  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Bed too hard, aircon too noisy
Summary: We chose the hotel based on price and good reviews. Overall the hotel was really nice, it's a large motel style with close proximity to downtown Disney and 10min walk to Disneyland. Walking distance adjacent to lots of take away shops. Overall the hotel rooms are quite nicely appointed and clean. To the bad and perhaps I got unlucky; The beds were rock solid hard and I couldn't sleep on them properly giving me a terrible sore back. The aircon only had one setting, gale force speed. It blew so hard and strong it was deafening noisy and rattled. I asked it to be fixed but nothing changed. Combination of a hard bed and the noise I simply could not sleep. Second concern - I had a parcel delivered to the front desk. When I asked for it I was told it wasn't there. I saw the parcel
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites and taking the time to write a review of the hotel.  We appreciate your compliments about the hotel being really nice.  We are in a very good location in the Disneyland resort area, close to the convention center, the theme parks of course, and also the Gardenwalk shopping center right behind the hotel.  We hope that throughout your stay you were able to take advantage of the free Wi-Fi as well.  As for the beds, we recently renovated the hotel and replaced all of the mattresses at that time.  They are U.S made, Serta perfect sleeper mattresses designed specifically for the comfort of guests in hotels.  The maintenance staff did investigate the report about the air conditioner.  The room type has a central air conditioner, and the staff tightened any parts that may have caused additional noise.  It seemed to be working with the normal amount of noise produced by this type of air conditioner when they finished.  We take the delivery of guest packages very seriously, as you may have noticed that we have a log that accounts for every package that comes across the desk.  If an employee was unable to identify the package as yours, it must have been an honest mistake.  We apologize for the inconvenience of having to come ask for your packages, we attempt to contact guests as soon as we can when a package arrives in their name.  We hope that your opinion of the hotel is not negatively affected and we will have an opportunity to accommodate you again in the future.

Summary Heading: not luxury, but not a no tell motel.
Summary: beds are comfy, rooms well appointed, staff friendly, minimal noise (even being right in front of the elevator), coffee machine is pretty worthless, but they have coffee at the market (be prepared to spend $3+ though), pool is clean and warm, short walk to the parks, a few local restaurants (I did not rent a car, so this was important)..... no complaints!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay.  The hotel was recently renovated, about a year and a half ago, which included new beds, furniture, new appliances, carpet, etc.  We are happy to hear you had a good night's sleep and enjoyed the decor.  The coffee makers were replaced at the same time.  Most hotels are now changing to the single cup coffee makers for environmental, economical, and cleanliness purposes. We are happy to provide free coffee for the room to make as much as you would like. In the future if you return and decide to rent a car please keep in mind that we do offer free parking for one vehicle per room along with the free Wi-Fi.  We look forward to your next visit to the Castle Inn & Suites! Thank you!

Summary: We LOVED everything about our stay at the Castle Inn last week! We flew in early to LA and planned to spend the day at Disneyland. We arrived before check-in, but the hotel staff were more than accommodating with our plans/stay and arranging an early check-in as we needed. The walk to Disney was perfect! The rooms were clean and newly updated, fridges and microwaves in each room, and plenty of space! The front desk staff were so helpful anytime we would call or ask for directions/advice/etc - they truly went above and beyond many times! We would stay here again in a heartbeat! What a fantastic start to our vacation! Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for you kind words.  We try our best to give every guest a special and memorable experience.  The entire staff makes guest service a top priority.  We hope that you were able to take advantage of the free parking and free Wi-Fi during your stay as well.  While early check in is not always available for our guests, when it is we are happy to offer the room early.  We have found that many of our guests appreciate having the fridge and microwave in the room to save time in the mornings, or re heat leftovers in the evenings.  The walk to the parks is short, and the walk to the many local restaurants is even shorter, we are glad to hear you had a perfect stay and hope to accommodate you and your family again next time! Thanks again!

Summary: We just got back from our stay at Castle Inn and Suites. The location is great, just a short walk to Disneyland. The staff was very helpful and friendly. The rooms were clean and comfortable. It was just my son and me on this trip, so feeling safe was very important. The property is well maintained, well lit, and feels very safe.  I appreciated the free parking. There were no surprise charges on our bill. I feel it was an excellent value for the money.
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for your lovely review.  We appreciate your time and great feedback.  We hope to see you at the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel at a great price for a Disneyland trip
Summary: the walk to Disneyland is quick and easy. The hotel staff is fantastic and accommodating. All for a great price. We would strongly recommend the castle inn and suites for any family planning a trip to Disneyland!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for the nice review we really appreciate it.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My son and I recently stayed at this hotel for four nights while visiting Disneyland. It's a great location, located just two blocks south of the main gate, about a 10 min walk. Hotel staff were very friendly and helpful when needed, beds and pillows were very comfortable and pool was clean. The rooms are very dark and the hotel is quiet so I slept very well there. Would recommend to friends and would stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to post your recent review from your stay with us this month. It was nice to see you had a good night sleep and you would recommend us to friends.  We hope you liked our darker, richer fabric's and furnishings.  We feel it compliments our Castle-theme, more than the stark white bedding most hotels use these days.  Once again, thank you, and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future  Kind Regards,

Summary: I was nervous about trying a new place, esp. since it was so reasonably priced, since I have had a couple not so great surprises finding a hotel for my frequent visits to Disneyland. Some hotels will say they are across the street, failing to mention that doesn't mean you can enter from there....and some are just gross. This hotel was so conveniently located, free parking and wi if and amenities, a convenient market on site, and on top of that the fun Castle theme! I felt safe and the room was very clean and comfortable, bed was cozy, everything worked and I wasn't afraid to walk on the carpet! The furnishings and linens felt fairly new so perhaps this place has been recently renovated...there was some construction going on outside but I never was disturbed by noise or any
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate the kind words and feedback.  We renovated all of our rooms the fall of 2013, so everything is still pretty new & fresh.  We started painting the exterior to the property earlier this month, as we continue to make improvements  both inside and outside.  We look forward to your return visit, and thank you again for the recommendation.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great place walking distance to Disney
Summary: I stayed here with my 3 year old and husband. It was very convenient to stay near the parks. The only thing I would want there was a restaurant at the hotel. But, there are a variety of places walking distance to the hotel. For the price it was great! Plus free parking!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review from your stay with us this month.  We were happy you selected our property and we hope to see you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: For starters, you have to realize that most places near Disney are motel style. They aren't usually full of bells and whistles. You mostly pay for a place to shower, sleep and the location.   That being said this a very good choice. I actually choose this one based on the parking lot. We received car damage the last visit at another hotel with a very tiny lot and this parking lot was bigger. We had no issues parking and once we parked the car we left it in the same spot until we checked out. The free parking is a nice bonus too (one car per room).   Location is good. You are within walking distance of a few restaurants; Denny's, IHOP, and Tony Romas come to mind. It is a downside that this place does not have free/included breakfast, but there was a mini fridge in our room, so
Manager Response: A very big thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review from your stay with us this month.  Your feedback is vital, and we appreciate it very much.  We apologize for the noise, we obviously catering to families, and the noise level does vary based on the time of year.    Once again, thank you for your review.  We look forward to a future return stay.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We are a family of 4 and stayed at the Castle Inn for 4 nights. It is in a great location, just across the road and a 10 min walk from the Disney parks. Our kids loved the castle facade. The rooms are quite basic, but comfortable, clean and fairly recently and tastefully updated. There is a fridge in the room, so we bought breakfast items ahead of time and ate in our room. There is a pool but we were so tired from our long days at the parks that we didn't even use it. The staff at reception are very friendly and helpful. We bought our Disney passes there. They called a taxi service for our return trip to LA and advised us to ask for an agreed rate ($130). This was a great idea as the traffic was so busy, it took close to 2 hours to get to West Hollywood. I would recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your stay with us in March.  We appreciate the great feedback.  We were glad to see your kids enjoyed the Castle facade.  It was nice to see having a fridge & microwave in your room helped with those quick breakfast items for the morning.  Thank you for the recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Location, value, service - it's all here!
Summary: I stayed here with my wife and three kids, and chose the hotel for its location. We drove in from Palm Springs with the idea of getting to Anaheim around 10am Monday, and weren't sure about where we might park while we visited Disneyland.  We actually arrived at 11am, and on a lark decided to stop by to see if we might park in the lot, then check in later.  As it turned out, our room was ready!  We parked, and headed out immediately without looking at the room (the kids were too excited!).  We finally got back about 10pm.  We stopped in the little convenience store across from the lobby and picked up breakfast items for the next morning, which was perfect, as we were able to avoid restaurant waits and prices and we could get back to the park early for "magic hour."  Good
Manager Response: A very nice thank you for your lovely review from your stay with us earlier this month.  We appreciate all the great feedback and highlights from your stay.  We do our best to accommodate our guest's and we thank you for pointing this out.  We hope you will keep us in mind if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: excellent value and friendly staff, very clean
Summary: This was a great stay for Disneyland. The hotel is right across the street an surrounded by restaurants. The rooms are well maintained and very clean. The staff were all very helpful and friendly and worked to accommodate our needs.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent review.  We thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites, and hope to see you on a future visit.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Agree with most reviews: - check in efficient and friendly - room was spacious and clean but dark - furniture and fixtures old but all working, good shower - great location, easy walk to Disneyland and cvs pharmacy that had basic snacks, food and necessities  But the noise was a huge issue for us: - walking upstairs sounded like stomping (woke up every time someone got up in the middle of the night) - kids yelling as they ran up and down the halls (we don't begrudge the kids, just the lack of sound proofing) - the cleaning carts sounded like freight trains (seemed to start around 6 am)  Unfortunately, I don't think there is much they can do about the noise in such an old building. Perhaps if our room wasn't next to the stairs and if we had been on the 4th floor there would have
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback from your stay with us this past February.  Thank you for your nice words regarding the rooms and location.  So you know, all rooms were completely remodeled the end of 2013, so there is nothing "old" in our guest rooms.  We went with the darker, rich fabric's and furnishings since we are a Castle-themed hotel, and all furniture is less than 2 years old and made in the USA.  We are sorry the noise was a concern.  We have many reviews that state noise is not an issue, where other's do find isolated cases of noise.  We are sorry you won't be back, but wanted to thank you for the review.  Sincerely,

Summary: My husband, daughter and I stayed at this little hotel over Easter for a week. We were able to book my parents and my brother and his family in the same place as well. The service was very friendly, the room was clean and modern, the beds were very comfortable. The pool and hot tub were in good repair. The place is very close to the main gates of Disneyland and California Adventure, and there were many restaurants to choose from at many price points. We loved being able to jump in the hot tub after a day of Disney. Parking is ample, and the place well maintained overall.   If I had a beef, it would be very minor, in that the place is not very sound proof, but bringing a white noise machine and ear plugs fixed that no problem. You can hear people starting their day very early to
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your Easter vacation.  We appreciate the great feedback on our rooms, staff, pool and location.  Thank you for letting us know about the noise.  We understand this may be an isolated concern with some guest's, as we have many guest's stating no noise concern's.  The fridges in the hotels in the Anaheim Resort would all be the same size.  Large fridges would be found in the long-stay properties, not a property like our's and most of the hotels in town.  Since we do not provide a "kitchenette" set up, we would not provide bowl's, spoons and such.  The microwave would be for heating up food and items that would not require cutlery of any kind.   We thank you again, and look forward to seeing you on another visit when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Stayed here while on a family vacation to Disneyland. Everyone here was helpful and courteous. No fees for parking. Loved that there's a kiddie pool for the little ones who can't swim yet.  They let us check in early and we were upgraded to the family suite. To top it off, the last day they let us keep the car there so we wouldn't have to park in disneyland parking. Walking distance to the parks, even with small children. Several places to eat within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for providing a review from your recent stay.  We appreciate the fact that you mentioned how we allowed you to leave your car in the parking lot after your check out.  This is a policy we try to allow when we can, so thank you for pointing this out.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I was encouraged by all the positive reviews I read about the recently renovated Castle Inn near Disneyland. Sadly, I guess I'm just used to nicer hotels. This definitely did NOT rise to the level of a 4 star hotel. The room was pretty clean and updated. It's also pretty close to Disneyland. I was just disappointed with the bathroom (older, grimy shower tile), the quality of the bed sheets, and the weird smell in the lobby and hotel room. Not a bad hotel, just not worthy of a better rating than 3.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent feedback from your stay with us.  We apologize we did not meet your expectations.    We thank you again for the review.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Close to Disney and Convention Center
Summary: We stayed here with a large group from the 9th thru the 13th of April.  My daughter's cheer team was here for a competition weekend.  I was pleased upon pulling up to see it was a close walk to either Disney or the Convention Center where we'd be spending most of our time.
