Check in was super easy and our group was mostly kept together in close rooms.    The room itself was very large.  Which was nice as I was a chaperone rooming with my daughter and two other girls.  Most rooms we've stayed in this year are very cramped when the girls spread out and their stuff all comes out.  There was a microwave and fridge which was nice to have.  Not only was there a desk but also a nice size table with 3 chairs.  Two double beds made for ample sleeping space for everyone.  I like that the
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for choosing the Castle Inn during the Cheer competition in town the first week of April.  We appreciate the great feedback and kind words regarding our spacious rooms and amenities.  When we remodeled all of our guest rooms the end of 2013, we did elect to go with the darker, rich fabrics and furnishings as we are a Castle-Theme property and the white/stark bedding most hotels offer in town would just not go with our property.   We have not had any issues with lighting in our rooms, so we apologize for that.  Once again, thank you for staying with us, and we hope to see you again next year when the cheer competition returns to Anaheim.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Disappointing experience; Don't assume you can leave your car.
Summary: We stayed at Castle Inn and Suites in March. The only reason we chose this motel was because we thought we could leave the car in the parking lot and walk to Disneyland the next day. Upon arriving we were informed that they had several tour buses parking in the lot the next day and that we wouldn't be able to leave the car while we enjoyed Disneyland the next day.  I will say the staff at the front desk was friendly enough, but I wouldn't choose to stay at this motel again. The rooms are noisy and have an odd smell. The place in general is just run down and old. Location is great, but when you can't leave your car in the lot it is pointless since we had to move it anyways and park at Disneyland.
Manager Response: We thank you for providing your review.  We are sorry we did not meet your expectation's.  We understand we are not the property for everyone.  We do allow guest's to park before check in time and in many cases after check out which is not the norm for this area.  There are no hotel's in this area that would allow you to park in their parking lot after you check out, so we are sorry you were under this impression.  We just renovated all of our guest rooms in the fall of 2013 and we have just started painting the exterior of our property, so we are sorry you felt we are "old and run down" as this is not the case.  Sincerely,

Summary: This is a great hotel to stay at when visiting Disneyland. The location, price, and quality of the hotel is awesome. The staff and management team is very friendly and helpful.  One person in particular, Alberta greets you like you just got off the airplane in Hawaii, with a warm smile and hello. Alberta as well as the rest of the staff does a great job with helping all the guests that comes into check-in or check-out. Their customer service is first class without paying Hilton prices.  My family and I stayed here many times, and was not disappointed once.  I would like to thank Alberta, Mark, and everyone at Castle Inn for making it feel like home every time we come down to visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: A very big thank you for your kind words regarding your stay with us early this month.  We will pass along your review to our staff member's.  We do value our guest service and we appreciate you taking note of that.  We look forward to welcoming you back to your home away from home on your next visit to Anaheim.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Castle Inn and Suites looks like a castle. Nice room within walking distance to Disneyland's front gate. Motel rooms have refrigerator and microwave and free parking. Many restaurants are near by. I'll be back.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Stayed here early April 2015 to visit Disneyland. If you are looking for a place to sleep for a family stay to Disneyland, this may be what you are looking for. It isn't a long walk to the park, but it isn't really close either. You make the call on if that is right for you. If you have a bunch of younger kids, they probably won't be too happy with the walk. We were all OK with it, but it certainly isn't "just across the street". As for the place itself, it is an old-school motel type place. All rooms are outside entrance, the texture on the walkways makes a loud annoying sound when a suitcase comes rolling by or when the cleaning crew brings their carts down the walkway. If you plan on getting up early to get to the park, or getting to sleep late this probably isn't an issue.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review from your stay with us this month.  We realize we are not the hotel for everyone and appreciate your feedback.  We are currently #10 out of 112 Hotels reviewed in the area, and we continue to improve on our services and amenities.  We have ongoing enhancement projects in place so we are looking at adding pool towel's in the future.  Our guests simple call down to the front desk and ask if they should take the towels from their room for the pool.  Once the guest return to their room, we have them replaced for their convenience.  In reference to the pool lighting, we have an outside company that services our pool, and the part has been ordered and will be replaced with the LED bulb this week.  We apologize this was out during your stay.  Once again, thank you for your review.  Sincerely,

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn on Easter Weekend (4/3/2015- 4/5/2015). We had such a great time! The hotel was clean, the air conditioning worked well, you don't have to pay for parking, and the location is incredible! My husband actually forgot his laptop when we left, and they called my Dad and let us know they had it and we could come back and get it. Amazing service! I don't have anything bad to say about this place. I would stay here again in a heart beat!
Manager Response: We would like to say a big thank you for your lovely review from your stay with us over the Easter weekend.  Thank you for your kind words about our property and service.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We have stayed at just about every hotel/motel on Harbor inc.Grand, DLand Hotel and paradise pier or so have much experience with all types. We booked really last minute so I didnt have my normal huge debate usually comes down to bang for buck- where am I going to get best value?  We are family of 2 aduts and two almost adults and an additional almost adult came with.  We booked the biggest room - the family suite which would have been perfect if; king bed was the one in the back bedroom and there was an additional bathroom,not just additional sink and mirrors no the queen room as it got busy with everyone trying to gets easy at same.    Otherwise kudos to check inn staff great!  We arrived at 10 am and our room was ready( I suspect the big suites aren't always rented) so they
Manager Response: Thank you for making the Castle Inn & Suites your choice for your stay with us this month.  We appreciate the feedback on our Suite.  The majority of our guest's appreciate the King in the front room as this is where the parents would stay and it's closest to the front door, making the parents feel a bit more safe & secure with the children or grandparents in the back room.  We realize this isn't the same feeling with all guest's, but we do appreciate your feedback.    Thank you for pointing out our great desk staff, and we were happy to accommodate you as soon as you arrived.  We do hope you will keep us in mind if your plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: We went to California on vacation and decide to stay at the castle inn! It was very clean.and the location was very close to the disneyland park . we have finally found a great place to stay with reasonable prices  We are going back to California in October and planning on staying here again !
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us in February.  We were happy to see you considered us the "best place to stay at".  We look forward to seeing you again in October.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: A must stay if you have little girls.
Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn for 3 nights while we went to Disneyland. My 2 year old daughter loved staying in her very own castle. The kiddie pool is great for young kids (or older ones that dont swim). The hotel is a short 5 - 10 minute walk to the Disney parks. I had no negative experiences with any of the staff. With the condition that we left our room in each morning, the housekeeper did an amazing job. There is plenty of food places within a short walking distance and a CVS and 7/11 on the corner.
Manager Response: We are very happy you and your girls enjoyed the Castle Inn & Suites.  We love hearing from our guest's, and we thank you for writing your review.  We look forward to you returning to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: We had two suites at the Castle Inn for our families 1st trip to Disneyland.
Summary: The two rooms were large,very clean, side by side, (which was convenient). The service was excellent over our 7 day stay. Disneyland,shops and restaurants were all close by which was handy. Thanks for making our trip so memorable
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites, we appreciate your feedback, and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Castle Inn and Suites, great location, perfect for families
Summary: We stayed here in February for four nights. The rooms were great, very clean, comfy and they provide free wifi that surprisingly worked really well. We drove down in the middle of the night and arrived close to 9am and we were able to do the check in paperwork then and pickup our room key in the afternoon. Loved that we were able to take advantage of their free parking right away. The hotel was a little more than a 10 minute walk to Disneyland for us. Great location, close to the parks, restaurants... Great customer service too!!! The pool was kind of small, but not a deal breaker for us because we spent most of our time at the parks. We will definitely stay her for our next Disneyland trip!!!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your stay this past February.  It was nice to hear you enjoyed your stay, and that you found our WI FI worked very well, and our free parking, customer service and location were a plus.    We look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Friendly staff, pretty decent space, updated. Great walking distance from everything you need, whether you are at the convention center like we were, or Disneyland or walking to food 😊 the pool is small and parking is usually full, but that's the same with every hotel in the price range as we have travel yearly around spring break for dance competition.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites during the dance competition at the Anaheim Convention Center.  We appreciate the feedback,  and hope you will keep us in mind if you are returning next year.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a night in town for the ice hockey
Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites on the 18th of March for just 1 night while we attended the Ducks VS Kings game at the Honda Centre. It is more a motel style than a resort/hotel style. We have stayed at the Holiday Inn Hotel and Suites but found this hotel to be much closer and more convenient to Disneyland park entrances! Staff were helpful and you are able to park your car there whilst staying which is helpful. I would stay here upon my return to Anaheim! They price was right and it had everything we needed.
Manager Response: We appreciate the lovely review you gave us from your stay in March.  We are glad you found the hotel convenient for your visit to the Honda Center as well as for Disneyland.    We look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites!  Sincerely,

Summary: I was happy with my say there. Nice and clean. Lots of eating places nearby. 2 blocks from disney. Definitely will stay there next time. Stayed at fairfield,Camelot and tropicana. Would say that castle inn is better
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent review.  We appreciate the feedback from you stay, and we are happy you enjoyed our property.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Clean, Convenient, Safe, and Very friendly and helpful staff
Summary: The hotel rooms are very clean and comfortable, the exterior was being painted during our stay so starting to look fresher on the outside too. The staff were ALL very friendly and helpful, the location is a quick easy walk to main gates disney and many restaurants, and there is a bus stop in front that takes you straight down to Newport Beach very easy to navigate a week long stay. My daughter loved cooling off in the pool and we appreciated the convenience of the market which had good prices and everything we forgot to pack,all the important things in a hotel for us were covered here.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent stay last month.  Thank you for the great feedback, and detail's you provided from your stay.  We hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Going in with expectations that come with an exterior room-access motel, I was impressed by the care they give the newly remodeled rooms.  Attentive staff make sure you are well accommodated. The walk to the Disneyland gate was a bit more than other options up the road, but not a big hassle.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review from your stay with us recently.  We appreciate the feedback on our nice rooms and attentive staff.  We look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great location, super friendly staff, very clean and well maintained hotel
Summary: Easy 10 minute average walk to the Esplanade. Amazingly reasonable rates considering how close it is to the parks. Very clean and well maintained rooms, and outside areas/landscaping. Parking is free and plentiful. Wifi is also free and very fast/reliable. The staff is all exceptionally friendly and helpful.   I would recommend requesting the top (4th) floor if you're a lighter sleeper, as the excited children running around in the early hours heading to Disneyland do tend to stomp around on the outside leading to the elevator/stairs.   All said, I'd recommend this hotel to anyone, even over the Disney-owned hotels.
Manager Response: We would like to say a very big thank you for your lovely review of your stay with us this month.  We appreciate you highlighting our clean rooms, well/maintained landscaping, free parking and very fast WI FI.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time your plans bring you to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: First time ever at this hotel and the stay was wonderful. The staff are very friendly.  I want to say a special thank you to Alberta who work at the front desk in the morning for her kindness and advice for places to go around the hotel.  The location is also close to Disneyland.  Just a walking distance away.  I would definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind words about our staff, we pride ourselves in going above and beyond to assist our guest's.  We appreciate the recommendation, and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Right next to the most expensive place on Earth.
Summary: Clean hotel that is right across the street from Disneyland. Nice because you did not have to pay (even more that you already have) for parking. A bit older hotel, but clean & safe for a family. Easy walking distance to Park entrance.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate you found value in our property.  We hope you will keep us in mind when booking your next vacation to Disneyland.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Having taken several grandchildren to Disneyland we have chosen a differnt hotel each time. This was the closest and even though a little tired looking on the outside the rooms were a good size with a bath and a microwave. Two things most needed when traveling with children. Plenty of parking. No breakfast but many places just outside. If you have a tight budget this is ideal in my opinion. The wifi included and worked well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review from your stay with us in February.  We are currently in the process of painting the exterior of our property.  We appreciate your feedback.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: The most convenient hotel  to stay at.
Summary: Super short walk to Disneyland and they let us keep our car parked there all day after we checked out. We only stayed one night but it was worth it. Debated on many other hotels but so happy we chose this one.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words about your recent stay with us.  We are so happy you selected the Castle Inn & Suites.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Family friendly and close to everything
Summary: This was a fantastic place to stay whilst visiting Disneyland. 5 minute walk to Disneyland and close to shops and restaurants. Room was clean and very family friendly. Staff were very welcoming and helpful. If I go back to Anaheim I will have no hesitation staying here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review you posted recently.  Thank you so much for the kind words, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: A group of friends and I stayed at Castle Inn & Suites in March. The property is in a great location, close to bars, restaurants, and less than 10 minute walk to Disney.   We had a family suite which a good size for our party of five. No issues with the beds and the room was very clean.   A big plus about Castle Inn is the complimentary parking for guests.   Would definitely stay here again when visiting Disney.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  Thank you for highlighting our Free Parking.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We arrived on Tuesday March 10 around 10 and the first impression was good. Friendly staff that were quiet quick with getting our keys. We got the room and all seemed fine except we discovered a lot ants in the bathroom. A quick call to the front desk and the maintenance guy turned up quick. He said yes lots of ants, best to go to the front desk. I went and they gave a another room after apologizing for the inconvenience. Next room had a couple of ants in the bathroom but we did not complain and went out for dinner.   Room service was good with clean rooms, lots of towels and bed made when we returned from Disneyland. There is also a very handy, well stocked market at the hotel. The market has fresh milk and lots of individual cereal boxes and FREE spoons on request. Walk to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your stay with us this month.  We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced when you got to your room.  We are happy to see that we took care of you and we hope the rest of your stay was enjoyable.  We look forward to seeing you again if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: So many good things about this motel
Summary: My daughter and I stayed here for four nights to enjoy Disneyland.  There were so many things we loved about the motel but one big thing we didn't - which makes me sad because I won't stay there again.  The beds were horrible!  They were as hard as a rock - quite surprising!  So I guess if you like a REALLY firm mattress then stay here because everything else was terrific.  The staff was really great.  The room had a fridge, microwave and coffee maker.  They made us towel animals!  The room was CLEAN and attractive for the price point.  The little store in the motel was perfect - lowest prices compared to the surrounding options and just about everything you could need.  So convenient!  It was only a ten minute walk to Disneyland.  One night we had a midnight breakfast at the
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to provide your feedback from your stay with us this month.  Thank you for highlighting our friendly staff, our in-room features and the convenience of our Gift Shop.  We are very sorry you felt our mattress' were not comfortable.  All of our mattress' are new top-of-the-line Serta mattress'.  The vast majority of our guests actually love them and want to purchase them.    Once again, thank you for your feedback.  Sincerely,

Summary: My family and I stayed here in October and it's the 3rd time I've stayed at this hotel. I was pleasantly surprised about the updated rooms. They are awesome. I lost my room key and was very relieved on how easy it was to get a replacement!  No fee either! We rented a crib for our room and it worked for our stay. The maid turned off our AC one day while we were at the park which was annoying but it is what it is. The only complaint I have is the pool closing so early. It would have been amazing to sit in the hot tub after a long day at the park but we never had time. Office staff was always helpful and courteous.  We plan on staying here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to write your review from your stay with us last October.  We are glad you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms.  Our staff is instructed to turn off the A/C in our guest rooms for energy efficiency and to insure they don't freeze.  On your next visit, just contact the front desk, and we will be happy to assist you.  We do close the pool at 10:00pm nightly to minimize noise concerns.    We appreciate you stating you will return to the hotel one day, we look forward to welcoming you back.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Got down to LA at 5 a.m. to the hotel I was originally staying at. The first room smelled of pot and smoke, and the second had no smoke detector and smelled of smoke. So at 5:30 a.m. me and my friend we stuck without a place to stay. We called up the Castle Inn and Suites and were told to come one over by Eric the night auditor. When we got to the hotel Eric was amazing with getting us a room up on the top floor so we would be able to sleep and not be woken up by everyone getting up as we were going to sleep. Next time I am traveling around Disneyland with be going back to this hotel.
Manager Response: A very big thank you for your lovely review of your recent stay with us.  We were very happy to hear that our staff member took good care of you and got you into a room so you could rest.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time you are planning a trip to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: its an easy 6-7 minute walk to the parks, which is perfect. The rooms were on the smaller size and really dated, guessing the 90s was the last time these rooms saw any upgrades. I had a good rate on hotels tonight, so I was not that worried about the room. If you are in the parks all day and night, these rooms are beyond adequate. I just always wanted to stay here as a kid, as an adult, not so much.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review.  It was nice to hear you received a good rate via Hotel Tonight.  We apologize you felt our rooms were "dated"  We actually finished a large room renovation in the  Fall of 2013.    We are a castle-theme property so the stark white bedding that every other hotel in town offers, would not compliment our rooms, therefore, we elected the dark, rich fabric and furnishings, and top of the line, made in the USA Thomasville furniture.  Once again, thank you for your feedback.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed here recently on a family trip to Disneyland.  Front counter staff were friendly and helpful.  Room was clean and tidy.  Room was cleaned great each day and none of our personal affects were rummaged through. Pool and pool are were nice, only downside was you had to go to the front desk to get towels for the pool. They do not have a continental breakfast which we knew ahead of time but we did miss having breakfast on site. Overall would recommend the hotel to others.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for providing your feedback from your stay with us recently.  We appreciate the "recommendation to others" and hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: A great hotel for your family.
Summary: This was a great hotel. We were a family of four and stayed in a mini suite. I was surprised about how large the room was. It was very clean and the staff are very friendly.I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for writing your review from your stay in February.  We appreciate the fact that you and your family found our hotel a good choice and that you will return one day.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect if you're just going to Disneyland
Summary: Alright, I don't have too much to say.  It's a fairly basic hotel room, clean, close to the Park.  The staff were always friendly and helpful and the room always clean when we'd get back.  I wouldn't come to this place if it was a honeymoon or if you really need high end but it was perfect for us as we were spending 12 + hours in Disneyland etc..  As a place to sleep with a pool and hot tub available (we didn't try them we were always too tired.) Lots of other did try it and loved it from the sounds of it.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback from your stay with us in February.  We understand we are not the hotel for everyone, the majority of guests that select the Castle Inn & Suites come here for location, our service, our value added amenities like free parking and free wi fi.    Once again, we appreciate the feedback.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This is our 2 time staying here and it was just as good as our first... The staff at the front desk are really friendly and are always willing to help.  We stayed for 4 nights in a family suite which was located on the 3rd floor at the back of the hotel, it's a great spot with no noise. The rooms were very clean and tidy and the beds were comfy.   The location is fantastic for Disneyland with just an easy walk to the main gate. There are lots of shops and restaurants close by with our favourite "Cheesecake Factory" just around the corner. And a 7/11 across the road.  This hotel is great value for money couldn't ask for a better position!!!! Would defiantly stay here again ...
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to write your review regarding your stay with us this month.  We appreciate the feedback, and we were happy to read that our location works well for you and your family, and our close proximity to restaurants and shops.  We look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: When we pulled up to Castle Inn & Suites, my daughter asked if we were at Disneyland.  Not sure if I was that impressed, but the hotel does look well maintained.  We were going to Disneyland all day and asked if we could park our car despite not having checked in yet (check in is at 3 pm) and we were told "No problem."  Same answer for leaving our car the second day (check out is at 11 am).   The room is clean and the beds were pretty comfy.  We had 2 double beds and there was a nice little table with chairs.  Perfect for our family to eat dinner and breakfast.   For the price, we were very satisfied.  Disneyland is within walking distance (save on parking!). You are close to a CVS, taco shop, pizza, Denny's, & McDonald's.  We did not check out the pool, but there were people in
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you for providing the feedback on our property, the location and all the surrounding restaurants within walking distance.  We look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This worked perfectly for our family of 4. We got the family suite which has a door in between 2 rooms so that the kids had their beds and we had our king size bed. That way we can put them to sleep and still read/watch TV, etc. Also, the shower had the perfect amount of pressure, which is important.   For breakfast, hit Mi Casita next door to the hotel. $9.99 breakfast buffet and kids are free. Amazing! It isn't just bacon and eggs either, it's a full buffet of pancakes, french toast, 3 breakfast meats, eggs, potatoes, fruit, yogurt, cereal, breads, etc. Perfect for getting you ready for a day at the park.
Manager Response: We appreciate the great review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  The Family Suite is a great way to go when bringing children to Disneyland.  As you mentioned there is a door to separate the back room of two queen beds from the front room with one king bed.  The two televisions also come in handy in case the kids want to watch the Disney Channel and the adults want to watch something else.  We hope the free parking and free WiFi came in handy for your family during your stay as well.  There are several restaurants in walking distance, for dinner options try the Gardenwalk shopping center which is located right behind the hotel.  We hope that the next time you visit Disneyland you will choose the Castle Inn and Suites again!

Summary: We just checking out of this wonderful hotel, very convenient hotel if you are going to Disneyland. The front desk staff parth and shyam. And everyone of the desk were awesome. I would specially like thank Marc the manager who was outstanding in guest service. We will surely be coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to put a review online!  We always try to provide each guest with the best possible experience at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Your compliments are much appreciated by all of the staff.  As you mentioned the hotel is very conveniently located in relation to Disneyland, only a block from the main gate of both parks.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: We stayed here in January for six nights and found it to be very convenient to Disneyland and California Adventure Park - within walking distance.  We had a two bedroom suite. Beds were very comfortable. It was quiet. Got a great view of the Disney fireworks display from the balcony.  The bathroom was a bit dated and the bathroom fan was shocking.  Lovely pool and spa area which we made the most of - even on our last day after we had checked out.  We had a couple of hours to kill before our coach arrived so front desk gave us a key to use pool area which was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the hotel, we appreciate the feedback.  The two bedroom Family Suites are great!  With a king bed in one room and two queen beds in another room, it is the most comfortable way to sleep a larger family!  We are happy to offer our guests the use of our pool and jacuzzi facilities prior to check in if the room is unavailable, or after check out as your family used it.  We hope that on your next visit to Disneyland you and your family will come stay with us again!

Summary: I picked this hotel for a large family group.I have stayed in quite a few motels in the area and was concerned because so far haven't found one that met all my wants. This one was great we had the parlor suite. Which has two rooms. I didn't even think about both rooms needing air conditioning while making my wish list, so when I walked in i was surprised but happy to see air in both rooms.It was spotless including laundry room, pool ,lobby etc. Last time we stayed at howard johnson some one broke into our car broke the ignition out and tried to hot wire our car. I had choosen that hotel because of security only to find out they had no working cameras and there security team left at MIDNIGHT. I felt very comfortable at castle Inn you have to pass by the check inn area to get to
Manager Response: Thanks for the review Sherry!  We are very happy to hear that we met your wish list for yourself and your family!  Yes the Parlor Suite offers 2 air conditioners, one in each room, but also 2 hairdyers, and two televisions which can really come in handy when traveling in a large group.  The staff is on duty around the clock in case guests ever need anything.  We hope the free parking and Wi-Fi was another bonus to your wish list.  When on an extended trip the coin operated laundry definitely comes in handy, along with the jacuzzi after a long day at Disneyland. We hope you have found your new favorite hotel in Anaheim and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Very clean room, walking distance to Disneyland. Only downside is no continental breakfast. If they had that it would be a great perk. Employees were very helpful. It was great to have free parking. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out to do a review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  We are happy to hear you appreciated the free parking, the hotel offers free Wi-Fi as well.  Though there is no breakfast, there are refrigerators, microwaves, and coffee makers in every room, and several restaurants on the way to the park.   The staff is always focused on providing the best customer service possible and is pleased to hear your compliments!  We look forward to accommodating you again next time you visit Disneyland!

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn & Suites in one of the parlor suites. It had two beds, and a living room with a sofa bed, fridge and microwave. The room was clean, and house keeping brought new towels and made up the room every day which was nice. The extra sink in the room was also nice for getting ready in the am. There is no free breakfast at this hotel, but since there was a small fridge that was no big deal. You do have to bring your luggage to your room by yourself, so keep that in mind. We checked in late so the 24 hour check in worked great, the guy at the counter was very polite and offered us a cart for our luggage. The kids really liked the castle look of the hotel and were happy with all the space. We would stay here again int he future
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  The extra vanity can definitely come in handy, especially the second hairdryer in the room when needed.  The Parlor Suites are very comfortable for up to 6 people, with a door to separate the living room from the bedroom and 2 televisions, there is plenty of room to spread out.  We hope your family was able to take advantage of the free Wi-Fi during your stay as well.  We can't wait to see you again!

Summary: My wife & I stayed here a number of years ago & were so glad to return, it was just as we remembered. The suit of armour still stands proudly in the lobby. We were there to celebrate my wifes 60th at Disneyland and so the loction is ideal. No having to wait for a shuttle bus, just cross the road & you're there. The facilities are great, travelling in Feb we didn't take swimmers but the pool is heated & we could of used it if we wanted. The hotel wasclean & the staff very friendly. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming back and staying at the Castle Inn & Suites again!  The knight in the lobby's name is Rusty and he will be proudly standing guard for years to come.  Hopefully next time you will be able to use the swimming pool and jacuzzi.  We hope you were able to take advantage of the free parking and free WiFi during your stay as well.  Besides the short walk to Disneyland, there is also a shopping center right behind the hotel called the Gardenwalk.  Rusty sends his regards and we will all be waiting for your return!

Summary: Five girls under 13 for a night. Great location, pool and hot tub, parlor room with a door to SEPARATE from the adjoining room.  Didn't hear anything next door.  Sure there were two tv's, but THERE WERE TWO HAIRDRYERS!!!  It fit our needs perfectly and gave us late checkout.  Plus, THE PRICE.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are very pleased to hear the birthday girl had a blast!  All of the rooms on property have a hairdryer, but as you mentioned the suites have 2!  This definitely helps when there are 5 girls getting ready at the same time.  We also hope that they were able to take advantage of the free Wi Fi during your stay as well!  The Parlor Suite and Family Suites all have a door to separate the front room from the back, and the two TV's really come in handy for larger families.  We hope to celebrate another birthday with you soon!

Summary: This hotel is great for a family Disneyland stay.  It's an older property that has been remodeled.  Our room was newer decor, newer beds, furnishing we all in good condition.  It was very clean.  The hotel is located about 1.5 BLOCKS from the Maingate of Disneyland.  Keep in mind these blocks are larger blocks, but very doable for our 6 and 9 year olds.  We would go to Disneyland in the morning, come back for the pool and go back to the park.  Pool is smaller.  Hot tub is great.  The hotel is laid out like a motel, so you don't go in through a lobby.  I didn't have any noise issues. I would definitely return to this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to do a review of the Castle Inn & Suites!  We appreciate the feed back and are happy you enjoyed your stay.  The rooms were remodeled a little over a year ago and the housekeeping staff does a great job of keeping them up.  The location is a great feature of the hotel, from the Disneyland resort to the Gardenwalk shopping center to the Anaheim Convention Center.  It is all within walking distance.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: We just spent 11 nights at this hotel, after reading some reviews on it I was worried about staying there, we went with a cheaper hotel than normal due to the time we spend there. I was pleasantly surprised with the place. The staff at the front counter (Parth and Shyam) were the best, no matter what stupid question I had, or tour to book they helped in every way they could, we were only sorry we did not get to say goodbye to them and thank you. The accommodation was clean neat and tidy, which is all you want ! we had fridge, microwave, tea and coffee and a laundry room which are all essential when away for a long time.We had no problems with noise even being 3 doors down from the lift, but I think being on the top floor helped with that. But really I think sometimes it boils
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time out to review your stay.  The Castle Inn & Suites is ideally located in the Disneyland Resort area, close to the parks, but also close to shopping and dining options in the area.  With such a long stay we hope the free parking and WiFi also came in handy along with the other amenities.  The staff at the front desk is always happy to help in any way they can, but we will pass on your thanks to Shyam and Parth!  We hope to accommodate you again when you decide to visit Disneyland in the future.  Thanks for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: The rooms appear to have been recently, within a year, renovated.  We were pleasantly surprised at how quiet our room was and the hotel was fully booked.  We had one bedroom suite on the second floor in the back away from the highway.  Easy walking distance to Disneyland.  Housekeeping was above average.  Absolutely no problems with our stay.  We would return and recommend others to book.  Oh!  They offer free wireless and free parking.  My in laws stayed at a different hotel a little further away and a "partner" of Disney.  Let's just say that they were not happy and actually regretted not following our advice of checking Trip advisor.  Lol
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Castle Inn & Suites!  We appreciate the online review as well. We offer free parking, free WiFi, and in addition there are no resort fees with our hotel.  The housekeeping staff is very happy to hear they exceeded your expectations.  We hope that you have found your new home away from home when you come visit Anaheim.  We look forward to accommodating you for your next stay!

Summary: The hotel is situated over the road from Disneyland, my boyhood dream came true at last by getting there! My wife found the Castle Inn on line and my travel agent got us an awesome price. Why am I shocked...the price was awesome, the management and staff were just fantastic and the room was so big, we had double Queen beds, one for us the other for the luggage! The rooms are very clean and each room has a TV, microwave, tea and coffee making facilities and a full size bath and shower. The hotel is situated smack bang in the middle of Anaheim and we felt so safe walking the streets at any time of the night and day. It is within walking distance of Disneyland and restaurants and shops. Nothing was to much trouble for the front desk staff, ordering cabs etc, they were just so good
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review!  We are happy to hear we fulfilled your dream!  The gargoyles eyes is definitely a feature that can be overlooked at times.  Thanks for noticing even the small touches.  The staff is always accommodating and happy to help in any way we can.  Early check in is possible based on availability, and though you may not have needed it on this trip, we offer free parking for one vehicle per room as well.  Hopefully you will be back in the USA again soon, we look forward to seeing you!

Summary Heading: Another awesome stay at the Castle!
Summary: My family and I experienced another great 5 days at the Castle Inn and Suites while visiting Disneyland in February.  Once again, we had great service which included being upgraded to a suite at no additional cost, since the suite was available.  The staff arranged for taxi service to the airport for us, and also stored our luggage when we arrived before our room was ready on our first day. Everyone is always accommodating and pleasant.  We love the Castle and will always choose it first as our Disneyland destination hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Castle Inn.  We appreciate your continued support throughout the years.  We are happy to provide you with a familiar and comfortable place to stay when you visit Anaheim.  The staff is always happy to arrange transportation to attractions, airports, or anywhere else a guest wants to go.  Luggage storage is also available even after check out if you have a later flight.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Disneyland!

Summary: The rooms have been recently updated, except for the bathroom in our case.  They are clean and have everything you could need to be able to visit and enjoy Disneyland.  I agree with the comment about outside noise when people are coming and going from the hotel along the walkways.  On our last night we were awakened at 7:00 a.m. by a young child stomping along the walkway outside our room and then screaming at the top of his lungs "DISNEYLAND!!". Because we enjoy Disneyland so much we had to laugh but it was like he was in the room with us. We found the staff very friendly and helpful anytime we needed help.  One thing we didn't like was that of the 4 nights we were at the hotel our rooms were not made up until late afternoon on 2 occasions which was when we were back for a rest
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out to write a review of your stay.  We try to provide each guest with a pleasant experience.  The hotel is located very near the entrance to Disneyland parks, just a short walk away.  In the future if a request is made for early service we will be happy to clean the room prior to the guest's return to the hotel.  We are glad you are such excited Disneyland fans!  We hope to accommodate you next time you come to town!

Summary: The castle inn was in a great location. However it was noisy with a loud fridge humming all night and guests walking straight past our room to get to the lifts / stairs at end of balconies. The staff were mostly friendly however I was travelling alone with 3 kids and was not offered any help to get 4 large pieces of luggage to my room. In fact the man who checked us in waved towards the luggage storage and said there is your luggage and sat back down behind a desk. We then did a comedy routine of one woman and 3 kids trying to wheel a faulty trolley past the window while he pretended not to notice.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, we apologize we did not meet your expectations.  We hope that this will not permanently alter your opinion of the hotel.  Perhaps in the future we could try to request a room for you and your family in a quieter area of the hotel.  We hope to have another opportunity to accommodate you in the future.

Summary: We stay here from feb 9-15, 2015..it was awesome!    We had a family suite and my girls, ages 12 & 10, loved having their own room..lol  ROOMS:  While its true that the rooms are dark, we felt it enhanced the whole experience for us.  The rooms were clean and the beds super comfy.  Plenty of hot water and the wifi was great.  Plus there was no street noise from our room    STAFF:  I can't say enough great thing about the staff.  From the front desk to tge housekeepers...SUPER FRIENDLY.. THEY GO OUT OF THEIR WAY TO MAKE FEEL WELCOME!!  POOL:  was small..but plenty of chairs to sit on.  Besids, the guests we enjoyed the pool with were always very friendly..lots of laughs in that little pool..  DISNEYLAND:  We timed it...with our 2 girls it took 7min to get to the corner entrance
Manager Response: Your review of your stay was very much appreciated by the staff.  We make every effort to make each guest feel welcome, and each stay memorable.  You are definitely right, the location can't be beat!  Walking distance to the restaurants at the Gardenwalk shopping center, the Anaheim Convention Center, and of course the Disneyland Resort.  The WiFi was upgraded last year, we are happy to hear it was working great for you!  We can't wait to see you again the next time you visit Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Great staff/location - especially for the price!
Summary: Stayed here over Star Wars weekend... the staff really made the stay wonderful. They went above and beyond to make sure we were happy and accommodated - even as far as printing out some things that I had forgotten at home for free! The on-site mini-mart was also a plus, since my son had a cough that would just not go away and I didn't want to drive all the way down to Target to get cough syrup. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind works posted on Tripadvisor.  The staff always tries to go the extra step to accommodate our guests.  The Star Wars marathon was a lot of fun for everyone!  The gift shop is a convenience for all of our guests for quick snacks, first aid supplies or beer and wine.  We will be waiting for your return, hopefully before next marathon.  Until then, may the force be with you.  Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.

Summary: This was our first time back at the Castle Inn and Suites in several years.  This time, because the price was SO right and when we heard they had totally redone all the rooms, we thought we would give it a go.  We were NOT disappointed!  We very much enjoyed the new decor.  The rooms are spacious and the walk to Disneyland was a piece of cake.  Best thing though - the new beds are super comfy.  I slept as well as being in my own bed at home.  Our room was clean and the front desk service was spot on.  We will definitely be choosing to stay there again.
Manager Response: Welcome back to the Castle Inn & Suites!  Thank you for coming back and staying with us again.  Thanks as well for your online review.  We did renovate the rooms recently including all new beds, and we are glad you got a good nights sleep!  The location is tough to beat, close to everything the resort area has to offer.   Hopefully it will not be several years before we see you again.  The front desk staff is very pleased to hear their services were spot on, customer service is a priority of the hotel.  Hope to see you again when you come back to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: First time and a great time
Summary: We found the Castle Inn and Suites a great value; the location to the Disney Parks was good, the amenities to other services (restaurants etc was fine too), the rooms were clean and the house keeping service was top notch, front desk was always friendly and helpful I would return here without second thoughts.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  The staff at the hotel is dedicated to providing a fun, happy, and memorable experience for all of the guests.  We are glad to hear we did not disappoint!  The housekeeping staff works diligently to get all the rooms clean and keep them in the best condition possible.  Next time you visit Anaheim, make sure to come back to the Castle Inn & Suites!

Summary: First of all it's a castle that's pretty sweet! The room was fresh and well put together. I believe it has been renovated recently if not it feels like it. They let us check in at 10am that's pretty sweet to. The room itself is a little dark everything in the room is a very dark brown. There is good food next door and a 7-11 across the street. About a 10 minute walk to Disneyland. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the time you took to provide your feedback from your stay.  We are glad you enjoyed our castle-theme hotel, and that you will stay here again.  We recently updated all of our rooms, and because we are a castle themed property, we elected to go with the darker, richer fabrics and furnishings as it compliments the castle theme, rather than the stark white bedding every other hotel has in town.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Moderate price, good service, clean rooms
Summary: This is a good value hotel. I didn't expect it to be this nice for the price. I paid right around $100 per night. It is a close walk to Disneyland. The room was clean and spacious. The pool and hot tub are across the parking lot which is a little awkward and inconvenient. The staff were very nice.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback from your recent visit.  We hope you will keep us in mind for your next trip to the Disneyland area.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We visited Disneyland and stayed at the Castle Inn & Suites over Christmas. The walk with our 10 & 3 year olds to the park is manageable even after a tiring day at the parks. We were upgraded to a suite that had a seperate bedroom for the kids.  The rooms are clean with what I would call darker, medieval times type of decor (Dark Brown and purple).  The kids of course got a kick out of the exterior castle theme. Staff were helpful with questions we had during our stay. Overall, two thumbs up for our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing our castle-themed property for your stay with us in December.  We appreciate the fact that you enjoyed our "medieval type color scheme" so thank you for pointing that out.    We thank you for the "2 thumbs up" and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This was our first time traveling to Disneyland with toddlers.  I picked the Castle Inn and was not disappointed!  Upon arrival we asked if we could change our room to a family suite- this was ideal as it has 2 double beds in one area and a king in another, connected with a door.  (We came in low season and the fee to do this was very reasonable!)  There was plenty of room for a crib they brought up immediately.  The room had a fridge, microwave, and coffee maker.  We used the fridge and microwave, they came in handy for breakfast items and snacks.  The rooms also have very fast wifi which is nice!  Our room was very clean and housekeeping did a great job. The beds are comfy.  There is a nice little pool that was empty for most of our stay.  The grounds are very clean and well
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your great feedback from your stay with us recently.  You pointed out some great features of the property and our location, and I'm sure other guests reading the reviews will find this very helpful.  We look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans return you to the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I have stayed here many times before and always loved the hotel and the location. Walking distance to Disneyland. They recently remodeled the rooms and now I love it even more! Very, very clean with great amenities. Also, the rooms are very large and give me lots of room for the whole family. This is the only place I will stay at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review, and for being a returning guest.  We really appreciate the kind words and are happy to see you enjoy the new rooms.  Once again, thank you for making the Castle Inn & Suites the only place to stay while visiting Disneyland.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Best Disneyland Hotel I've stayed at.
Summary: My family has stayed at Disney Grand before and the Fairfield Suites before and this hotel is far better than both. If we needed something they took care of it right away. The staff was always pleasant. Like the actually enjoyed working there. From housekeeping, maintenance and check in.the rooms were cleaned for us daily. I will definitely stay here again. One thing I will note is that the GFCI outlet in the sink area kept tripping when using the blow dryer. This did not affect our stay in any way. I forgot to mention it at check out.
Manager Response: We appreciate the lovely review you posted recently.  We were very happy to see that we out did the Grand California Hotel and Fairfield.  We pride ourselves on our guest service as well as maintaining our product for our guests to enjoy, so thank you for noticing.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you plan your Disneyland visit.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: A hotel that prides itself on customer service
Summary: This hotel is an older property, just across the street and down a block from the Disneyland main entrance. But just because it's older doesn't mean a thing. The room was big, the beds very comfortable, the bathroom and separate sink and counter were all nice. But beyond that, this is a hotel where the employees are eager to help. We had a small issue with the toilet not flushing and, at about the same time, discovered we only had decaf coffee stocked in the room for the in-room coffeemaker. We called separately down to the front desk about both things, and very shortly there arrived a smiling man with a plunger and four packages of regular coffee. We're still smiling about that. The front desk folks are super nice and accommodating, and this is one hotel we will book again and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback from your stay with us in January.  Your lovely comments are what keep us ahead of the competition and to continue to strive to be the best we can be.   We look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Family friendly and super close to Disneyland
Summary: My 4 kids (ages 3,5,6 and 13) and I stayed at Castle Inn during Marathon weekend and loved it.  The suite was huge, staff friendly and very close to the park.  Even though there is not a breakfast the rooms have a microwave and refrigerator I was able to bring in my own food and we ate a small meal and larger lunch and dinner at the parks.  The staff was always friendly, rooms were super clean and the suite was huge!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for posting your review from your stay with us during the marathon weekend.  We hope you will keep us in mind when your plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Stayed here during a convention. (January 23-25) The location was very convenient being only a couple miles away walking distance. The room was nothing special, some of our towels were not washed (hairs on them) and the floor was not vacuumed properly. My only real complaint is that the maids would stand out side of our room for hours talking very loudly (this happened on multiple occasions). I find this VERY disrespectful. For someone who works at a hotel I would think that they would know that people are sleeping at 6-7AM! AND if the do not disturb sign is on PLEASE DO NOT DISTURB by banging on the door!  Would I stay here again? Probably not.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback from your recent stay with us.  We were a bit perplexed regarding the timing you stated our Housekeeping staff was outside your room.   Our staff does not start until 9am, so we apologize if it happened to be guest's outside your room speaking loudly.  We are always happy to accommodate our guests if they call the front desk to ask for their room to be serviced at a later time.  Again, we apologize so some inconveniences you encountered while staying with us, and we thank you for bringing this to our attention.  Sincerely,

Summary: I always stay at the Castle Inn when in Anaheim. Friendly, helpful and knowledgable staff, clean, modern rooms, a great value! I will be recommending to my sister in-law and her family when they visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the wonderful review and great feedback you provided.  We look forward to welcoming you back next year.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at Castle Inn and Suites this past weekend. We did not spent much time in our hotel suite, as we were at one of the Disney parks from opening to closing each day of our trip. We found the hotel staff to be friendly and helpful. We called late one night for extra towels, and they were delivered by housekeeping within five minutes. Our neighbors were loud and smoking right outside our door, so we probably should have requested a room on a higher floor. One of my family members called the reception desk when our neighbors were getting too loud, and we didn't hear any noise after that. This is a great option for a trip to Disney.   If you are going to need a stroller for the Disney parks, make sure to call City Stroller ahead of time. They deliver straight to your hotel
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for providing your review from your stay with us this month.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We just recently sstayed at Castle Inn and we were very happy there. The rooms are great and clean, location is amazing, very close to the park and the staff is extremely friendly and helpful. We will certainly be returning to this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your review and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This hotel was awesome and this is coming from a Hilton Gold member! The staff couldn't have been nicer, the rooms and grounds were very neat and clean! I would recommend this hotel for all! It was a very short walk to Disneyland with many conveniences within walking distance!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate you taking the time to post your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I love this hotel, my only complaint is that the ledge leading to our room was very wobbly. There was also a large gap under our door so we could hear everything going on outside.But everything else about this place is fantastic. The staff are incredibly friendly and helpful. The location is ideal. There is a CVS and 7-11 across the street. You have 2 IHOP ' S and a Dennys within a 1 block radius. There is also a shopping center 5 minutes away as well. Plus Disneyland is a short walk away too. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the great feedback, and it was nice to see that you found our staff friendly and our location worked well for you.  We do hope to see you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My friend and I recently stayed here with our 2 little girls and we couldn't have made a better choice. First of all the wow factor of the hotel looking like a castle was awesome, our girls were in awe when they realized we were staying at a "castle". It was nice to have free parking which is rare amongst Disneyland area hotels, check in was pretty quick so we were happy about that as well since we were pretty tired after our flight and the drive. I had called beforehand to request a room on the 4th floor and close to the lobby, and that is exactly what I got which was nice. Our room was larger than expected which was nice, and the small fridge and microwave were a nice bonus, wifi worked great too. The beds were comfy, so no complaints there. I had to print off something and
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for making the Castle Inn & Suites your choice for your recent Disneyland trip.  Thank you so much for pointing out the attention to detail our housekeeping gave your room, and that you found our staff friendly and helpful.  We apologize for the service you had in the gift shop.  We do not run our gift shop but have spoken to the tenant about your feedback.  We look forward to you returning to the Castle Inn & Suites on a future visit to the Disneyland area.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We travelled with my mum, hubby, and three children from Australia. The outside of this place looks really cool. The front desk staff were always really helpful and went out of their way for us. The rooms were clean and tidy. We stayed in a family room, which had one room at with two queen sized beds, and the other room with one queen sized bed. There was a TV in each room, and we had a mini fridge. The beds were really comfortable, and we slept well in them. It was just a little difficult with the three kids and my mum, as my mum had to share a bed with one of my sons, and my other two older boys also had to share a bed, and spent a bit of time kicking each other in bed and arguing as one was hogging the bed ect, so i think it would probably be better, being a FAMILY room if
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for staying with us last May.  Your review was very detailed and provided great feedback, so thank you for that.  We hope you may have another opportunity to return to the States in the near future, and please keep Castle Inn & Suites in mind when choosing your hotel arrangements.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Front desk staff was awesome! They let us check in early and gave us great advice on restaurants that delivered to the hotel. Five minute walk to Disneyland. There is a store on the property that has the essentials. They wanted $7.00 per person to print a boarding pass but at the end of our stay it was down to $2.00 per person. They are free at the airport. Cleaning staff could have been better but if I had brought it up to the front desk I am sure it would have been taken care of right away......I chose not to.....it wasn't that bad. We will stay there again and would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for your recent review of your stay with us.  We appreciate the details and feedback you provided.  We do provide a service to our guests of printing boarding passes free of charge, so if you return one day, please keep this in mind.  The gift shop on property is separate from the Hotel, so they do charge a fee for this service.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: 2ND STAY JUST AS GREAT AS THE FIRST STAY
Summary: I first stayed at Castle Inn early Oct 2014 and returned just before Christmas 2014. I loved this place the first time and certainly was not disappointed on my second visit. The rooms are great, very roomy. Two queen beds - very comfortable. The pillows and sheets very soft. Nice size TV, remote control, small refrigerator, and microwave oven. The property does have a pool and Jacuzzi and small store on the premises. The Castle Inn does not have a restaurant but there are ample places to eat within a short walk. The staff of the hotel are extremely pleasant and always helpful. I needed to leave my luggage as I checked out early to go to Disneyland and they have a large storage area right off of the front desk. The hotel is 3 levels and there is an elevator if steps are difficult
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites on your stays in October and December of last year.  We appreciate you returning for your second stay, and that you were just as happy as your first stay.  Thank you very much for the detailed feedback it's very appreciated.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect place for a Disneyland vacation!
Summary: Our entire family (19 total) stayed here for a trip to Disneyland over the Christmas holiday.  It was the perfect place for our trip.  The hotel staff was super nice, helpful and accommodating.  Check-in was easy and there was plenty of parking--even over the busy Christmas holiday. The rooms were clean & spacious, the beds were comfy and there was a mini fridge and microwave in each room--which made eating breakfast before going to the parks easy and affordable.  There is a mini-mart located on property for any essentials you might need.  The hotel is also located very close to the entrance of Disneyland--which was a huge plus, in that we could walk and not take a shuttle.  It took us about 10 minutes to walk to the entrance of the parks.  All in all, the Castle Inn & Suites
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for selecting the Castle Inn & Suites for your family of 19 that stayed with us in December.  We were very happy everyone had a good time and that you found our location convenient to the park and other facilities around the area for meals as well as shopping.  We look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed for 8 nights in January 2015. We were upgraded to  Parlor Suite which was very big and came with mini-fridge and microwave.  The staff were very friendly and helpful. Had to get assistance with the air conditioning and the staff were quick and helped get it going quickly.  The location was a nice 15 minute walk to Disneyland and had lots of restaurants and stores within walking distance.  Would stay here again!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your recent review from your stay with us this month.  It was nice to see that the Parlor Suite worked well for you and your family and that you found our staff friendly and helpful.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: A good time had by all
Summary: This hotel was an excellent choice for our Disneyland trip. It took about 4 minutes to walk to the parks. The rooms were clean and very spacious with a bonus of a refrigerator and microwave, which helped us with breakfast. The snacks we got from the convenience store that was on the bottom level of the hotel.  The thing that pushed this hotel over the top for me was that you can ask the front desk to keep your bags after you check out. It was great since our shuttle didn't pick us up for another 3 hours after check out. It gave us a chance to explore without having to carry our luggage around.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently, and taking the time to provide your review.  Your feedback is appreciated and we look forward to you returning in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: Stayed here last November for 10 days. The reception area was smaller than it seemed in pictures but not a problem. Staff friendly and got us checked in or anything else we needed very quickly.  We were in room 342 and it was lovely. Really spacious and had TV, hairdryer, microwave, fridge everything you would really need of a hotel room. The beds were huge and comfy and the room was clean. The only negative was the toilet didn't have a large flush so you couldn't put any paper in the toilet. There was wifi in the room and never had any problems using it either.  The hotel itself was mostly quiet while we were there. There was the odd night with a child running up and down the corridor but otherwise not problems with noise. There was a small pool area but the morning I went down
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your stay last November.  We appreciate the great feedback.  We have the energy efficient toilets at our hotel, so although they work very well, some guest's do find them a little different than the older models.  Our pool is open from 8am - 10pm,  if you did attempt to go in prior to 8am you would have found it locked until 8am.    We thank you for stating you would definitely return to the Castle Inn & Suites, we look forward to welcoming you back.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Very nice rooms that are surprisingly quiet
Summary: Our family stayed at this hotel for a few nights during our stay in Anaheim. Our room was on the front and was very quiet! There was a lot of space in the room and the beds were comfy. I do wish they would allow their windows to open more than just a couple of inches...as after a full day of walking, more air in the room is needed! LOL We found the staff to be quite helpful and ready to serve. The hotel doesn't offer breakfast but IHOP and Denny's are just a block away. We would happily stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your stay with us this month.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay, and found our staff helpful, and plenty of breakfast options in the area.  We look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Stayed here in 2007 and loved the very close and easy access to Disneyland via California Adventure.  The staff were wonderful, pool was great and easy access to other ammenities made our trip to Disneyland a fabulous and memorable time...7 years later, we would like to take our GRANDdaughter for her very first trip and it is definately Castle Inn and Suites for this adventure!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for providing your review from your stay with us last June.  We were very happy to see you returned to the hotel after 7 years.  We are sure you saw many changes at the hotel.  We hope it won't be another 7 years for you to return, so we look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We've stayed here twice in 2014 and I just booked another stay for March of this year. The rooms are clean and comfortable with both a microwave and mini fridge in each room. The whole place was recently renovated so nothing is old or run down. The hotel is walking distance to Disneyland and there's no extra charge for parking which is a big plus. Staff is friendly and helpful. I call in each time to request the handicap room as I'm wheelchair bound and they are always friendly and accommodating. My only criticism is that a continental breakfast or even just coupons or vouchers to the Denny's down the street would be a nice addition.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for being a returning guest of the Castle Inn & Suites, and we look forward to welcoming you back in March.  We appreciate the feedback from your recent stay.  Although we have never offered a Continental Breakfast at the Castle Inn, we do feel offering free parking and free WI FI gives our guest a better value, that way our guests can pick their location for breakfast since there are many choices around the hotel.  Thank you again, and we'll see you in March.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This was our first time staying at this hotel and was reasonably priced as New Years was a busy time and the price at other hotels were outrageous. Super quiet location. Used to staying at hotels across the street from Disneyland and there's always a ton of activitiy outside of those locations but this hotels location is more calm. Quick walk to 7eleven, CVS and Subway. Rooms were nice and clean. Stayed on the bottom floor and of course you can hear little runs running around upstairs, but that's pretty typical at any hotel, especailly on the bottom floor. Also loved how they had a night time window for the lobby incase you needed something. Staff was nice and parking was FREE! Yes...FREE! Not $11 or make you park at the Gardenwalk. Huge plus.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for the lovely review from your stay with us recently.  We were glad to see you were impressed with our property, location, and staff.  Thank you for commenting on our Free Parking as well, we do feel this is a great value for our guest's.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites, if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I will admit that I had booked this hotel simply because of price and proximity to the park. I was meeting my parents who had booked an earlier vacation at another hotel nearby. While they paid many times the amount, in many ways the Castle Inn & Suites was better! My suite offered more amenities (such as the microwave) and was much more spacious. The unit was lacking a safe but the staff kept valuables secure at the front desk. Recently updated, clean and comfortable interiors, excellent (FREE) wifi and friendly and helpful staff. Located a short walk from the park entrance and close to convenient restaurants, a pharmacy and stores.  Perhaps what stayed in my mind most about the visit was the attention to detail, from the kitschy medieval decor to the swan towels (I have never
Manager Response: We would like to say Thank You for posting your nice review from your recent stay with us.  We are so happy you had a pleasant experience and felt you received a great value for your money.   Thank you so much for commenting on our location, staff and Free WI FI.  We were also happy to see you enjoyed the attention to detail our staff gives to our guest rooms in preparing our rooms for our guest's.  We do hope you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim area.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 2 nights and we were very pleased because it was comfortable, clean and so close to the park. Our bedroom had a fridge and a microwave, which was very convenient. It was only a 5 minute walk to disney, so it was excellent for us.
Manager Response: We thank you for posting your review from your stay with us.  It was nice to see that our lcoation worked well for you.  We hope to see you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: From the outside this hotel doesn't look impressive but I was pleasantly surprised by the rooms.   It was clean, comfortable, and updated.  There was a refrigerator and a microwave.  The only thing missing was a safe.  It was an easy walk to Disneyland too.  I'll definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This hotel is a great find.  Really close to the main gate.  We got a huge room. Comfy beds, clean throughout ... Could use some paint in the hallway leading to the room.  But that is minor.  Highly reccomend this hotel !!!!
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for your feedback from your stay with us this month.  Thank you for the recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back.  Sincerely,

Summary: We always stay here when visiting Disneyland. It is across the street from the park, and next door to 24 hour Subway, CVS pharmacy, and other stores. On our latest trip, we were upgraded to an executive room at no charge. These are excellent accommodations at a budget price. I recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We thank you very much for your review from your stay with us this month.  We were glad to see our location and our accommodations worked well for you and your family.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warm Regards,

Summary Heading: Clean & comfortable, friendly and helpful staff
Summary: We spent two night here last week and had a good time.  Whilst its not the most modern hotel, it is roomy and comfy and has everything you need.  Plenty of room for a family of 4.  Staff were always so helpful with our requests.    Neg - It could be a little noisy with kids running along screaming and carrying on at 630am on their way to I was thinking to a Disney breakfast.  We probably wouldn't stay here again but rather opt for one of the hotels further up the road closer to Disneyworld.  It you want budget at a reasonable price, then this place wont disappoint.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review from your stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Didn't meet expectations this time around
Summary: My boyfriend and I stay here every time we come to california to go to the parks. This is our 3rd or 4th stay here, and this time was unfortunately not as amazing as the last few times we stayed. We arrived at 7am - check in time is not until 3pm, so they couldn't accommodate us. This forced us to sit in the lobby for 8 hours waiting for a room, and even though there were at least 10 families that have checked out in that time, they insisted we were not able to get a room until 3. It just made the whole experience less pleasurable. I know the front desk people are just doing their jobs, but if there are open rooms, why make a couple wait 8 hours? I don't want to say this ruined our whole trip, but it definitely made us not want to come back to this hotel which is a shame because
