Manager Response: We thank you for providing your feedback from your recent stay with us.  We were sorry to hear we were unable to accommodate your 7am arrival to the Hotel.  We experienced very high occupancy from Christmas to New Year's, so it was very difficult to accommodate early arrival's.  Most guests that arrive before our 3pm check in, store their luggage, and either go to the Park for the afternoon, or organize a tour, or shopping to help pass the time.  We were sorry to hear you did not take advantage of any of these opportunities.  Please keep in mind that our check out is 11am, and we need a minimum of a few hours to clean rooms and prepare them for our 3pm arrivals each day.    We do hope you will give us another opportunity in the near future.  Please keep in mind, traveling over peak times in the Anaheim Resort does not afford many opportunities for early check in, but all efforts are given to accommodate our guests.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel and Very Friendly Staff!
Summary: Hotel rooms were very clean and worth the money we paid for our rooms.  The staff were very helpful and accommodating!  If you ever visit Disneyland and need a hotel, I would definitely recommend here!  It's about a 10 minute walk to the front of Disneyland and very conveniently located.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the review your provided from your stay with us in December.  We appreciate the kind words, and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My family had their first family vacation to Disneyland. We chose this hotel because it was so close to come back to room in the middle of the day. However when we wanted to come back around 1 to have lunch and our room still hadn't been touched. However the day before they were pushing us to leave about 9am so they could get to our room. It was pretty disappointing.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback from your stay with us recently.  We understand you had some concerns with your room being serviced during your stay.  Most housekeeping departments in the Hotel industry start their rounds around 9am.  When a housekeeper knocks on your door and you are still in the room, they of course would return later.  You are always welcome to contact the front desk at any hotel where you stay, to let them know you are leaving your room and would like service.  We are sorry we were unable to meet your expectations in this area.    We do hope you will give us another opportunity in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Our family are annual passholders and we absolutely love staying here. Mark and his staff are always helpful, friendly and try their best to accommodate my families needs. The rooms are large, clean newly renovated and my kids love the fact they can stay in a castle.  We have stayed at multiple places but have found our home away from home in their castle.
Manager Response: A very big thank you for making the Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home.  We enjoy giving our guest's "royal treatment" whenever possible, so thank you very much for highlighting this in your review.  We look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay for the Disney Adventure
Summary: This was a nice, comfortable place to rest on our Disney adventure.  The beds were comfortable. The room was clean. The bathroom was clean, and the water was just right.  The towels were a little on the scratchy side but they did the job and the price was right.   It only took at most 10 minutes to walk to the gates of Disney.  Denny's and IHOP were only 3 minutes away and if you wanted something a bit more - there were plenty of choices on the walk.  We chose to eat in the park for all but three meals.  We were given great suggestions for delivery food service - but we didn't try any.  The tv worked well. There was a fridge- which we did use, and a microwave which we didn't.  There was also a great closet that helped keep our clothes ready for the next day.    We kept the air
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review from your stay with us in December.  We appreciate all the great feedback and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I stayed in this hotel while attending a convention. The host hotel was full. I was somewhat concerned about the quality of the hotel, as it was not a name brand.  I was very pleasantly surprised. The room was very clean and well maintained. Parking was free. There was asmall convenience store on site. There was a strip shopping center next door with decent restaurants. It was a short walk both to the convention center (about 1 mile) and to Disneyland (about 1 mile).  Maid service was very good. Checkout was excellent, I was allowed to extend checkout a couple of hours. Only service complaint is that they were very rigid about early check-in. 4 pm, on earlier.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your recent review from you stay with us during the December convention in Anaheim.  It was nice to see you enjoyed your stay.   Again, thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  Sincerely,

Summary: We're a Disneyland Annual Passholder Family & we visit the parks a few times each year, staying for several weeks each trip. We have our preferred area to stay, that being, as close to the Parks as possible! Over the years, we have stayed in most of the hotels along S.Harbor & Katella. Our must-haves include Queen size beds, Fridge, Microwave, TV, WiFi, Pool, Laundry Facilities, Castle Inn meets all of the above & then some. I especially enjoy the set-up. The bathroom is just that ~ a bathroom. The vanity, sink, hairdryer etc. are outside the bathroom which makes life far better for a family of 4, getting ready to go out at the same time. Complete w/Pool, Kiddy pool & Hot tub. A/C, Free WiFi. Free ice (yes - some places actually charge for ice!), Free parking ...The rooms are
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your lovely review from your recent stay with us.  Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  It was nice to see that we had many of the features and accommodations you look for when visiting the Disneyland Resort.  We look forward to your next visit to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My family and I stayed here last week for 5 nights. We found it to be good for what we needed it for. The walk to the park was about 6-7 mins who doesn't love that.  The room was clean but my husband and I both said to each other "what did they look like before the remodel???" I hate the old comforters and always take them off the bed. The pillows were ok and the bed was ok. In the grand scheme of things we were in the room 6-7 hours just to sleep. The walls I warn you are THIN. You can here everything that the people next you are doing. We were on the 3rd floor and I swear at times I thought the people above us were going to fall through. I know it's not there fault how rude people are being loud and running down the halls at 6 am but I have to say that was our biggest
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for your recent review.  We appreciate the feedback and will share this with our team.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,

Summary: Friendly staff, clean and spacious rooms.  Nothing fancy, but very practical and just a short walk to Disneyland. On my last day/night there, I had gone to Disneyland and it was so packed you could hardly move, so I decided to leave.  I checked out of the motel at 1:45pm, and was surprised when they didn't charge me for that last night.  I would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to provide your feedback from your recent stay with us.  We were sorry to hear the park was too busy for you to enjoy it fully, but we were happy to help you out on your early departure.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the future.  Sincerely,

Summary: My family simply just enjoys this hotel! The staff and management is spectacular!! All of the amenities needed are in the suites with plenty of parking,I personally have stayed there for over 25 years, off and on by Random weekdays and weekends. The hotel had a renovation (updated stuff) and its so sweet, contractors did a good job!  Best Stay in Anaheim California ever!!   P.s.   Do not waste your time anywhere else
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for the great review from your recent stay.  Thank you for commenting on our newly renovated room's, we are glad you enjoyed them.  We appreciate you being a returning guest of the Castle Inn & Suites, and we'll see you on your next visit.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed in a 3rd floor parlor suite that could accommodate my family of 6 and faced harbor blvd. The room was perfect with 2 full beds, tv and a sink in the back bedroom. The entry area living room had a pull out couch, tv , fridge and the full bathroom. Awesome location within walking distance to Disneyland resort, restaurants, and shopping. There is free parking, service was top notch, and room was super clean. Only complaint is no breakfast. Would definitely stay here again with its military discount and value.
Manager Response: We were happy to see our Parlor Suite was "sweet" ~  thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.    We appreciate the great feedback, and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Mark and his staff are exceptionally friend and go above and beyond for their customers. The rooms are clean and spacious. My kids love staying here. This will continue to be our #1 choice when staying in Anaheim.
Manager Response: A very big thank you for your lovely feedback you posted recently.  We appreciate you making us your #1 choice when visiting the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Very friendly staff let us check in early and upgraded us to a bigger room because one of our kids had been sick on the flight over. Room was very spacious and comfortable and importantly, it was clean! Would recommend this place to family and friends visiting Disneyland in Anaheim for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review of your stay with us this month.  We appreciate the kind words, and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We spent 8 nights here on our Disney trip. There were 5 of us, 2 kids and 3 adults, so we chose the family suite, which worked well.  The room was very clean and the beds are comfortable. The bathrooms are dated but everything is functional and works fine. There is a microwave, fridge and coffee maker. We drove to target and bought some groceries for breakfast and to pack lunches and the fridge was large enough. The location is excellent, a 10-15 minute walk to disneyland, across the street from cvs pharmacy and walking distance to restaurants, most importantly PF Changs and Cheesecake Factory.  The staff are incredible, in particular Vincent, Eduardo and Carmen. My sons stuffy went missing and they searched the dumpster (yes climbed right in!) and turned housekeeping and
Manager Response: We would like to say Thank You for providing your review from your recent stay with us.  We were happy we were able to find your sons stuffy.  Thank you also for the great feedback on our property, location and staff.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Rooms were very clean and comfortable. Access to disneyland was perfect and lots of restaurants within walking distance. We will be staying again on our next trip. We came with another family and they were able to put us next to each other. Would recommend to anyone looking for a hotel by Disneyland.
Manager Response: A very big thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites on your recent Disneyland trip.  We appreciate the great feedback, and we are very happy you enjoyed our property and location.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future if your travel plans return you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites in November and had a fantastic time. I am a travel agent and have stayed in many properties around the world and this property is right up there. The staff were so friendly and helpful. We stayed in a family room which had so much space and the beds were so comfortable. The pool area was great and the location was a few minutes walk to the main gate of Disneyland. Also you get an awesome view of the fireworks display from Disneyland. Lots of fantastic restaurants are only a few minutes walk away. I would definitely recommend this hotel to my clients.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your lovely review from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  It was so nice to see you enjoyed your stay, and you enjoyed our property.  We appreciate your support and confidence in selling our property to your future clients.  We hope you can come back and see us again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Booked a 2 room family suite. Hotel wouldn't let us park 2 cars on site the first night although we arrived at 10am, so had to pay $36 to park at Garden Walk Mall. Not cool. The  end aide table lamp didn't work properly. The refer in the room didn't get cold enough to store our toddlers milk at a safe temperature. I reported these to the desk manager upon checkout who didn't seem to be very sympathetic. Nor did he offer to replace our gallon of spoiled milk. Lastly, there is a huge pothole in front of our room (155) that my daughter stepped in and twisted her ankle. She reported it to deaf ears. We will NOT be returning to this hotel. The room itself was okay.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback from your recent stay with us.  Thank you for advising us at check out about one of the lamps not working, this has been fixed.   If you would have reported this concern during your stay, we would have fixed this immediately, but thank you for letting us know.  We do provide complimentary parking for 1 car per registered room.  Most properties in town charge for 1 or more vehicles.  When parking became available, we did allow you to park your second vehicle for the remainder of your stay, so we hope you found this savings helpful.  Sincerely,

Summary: I travel professionally all over the USA and this family vacation stay at the Castle Inn and Suites was great.  What sets this property apart from the others was the over the top service from everyone encountered.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide a review from your stay with us this recently.  We take pride in our guest service, so thank you for commenting on this.  We hope to see you again in the near future when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Our stay was really good.   It was really close to Disneyland and a walk to the corner to catch a bus to go to Hollywood.   Restaurants only metres from the Motels as well.  Overall very impressed.  Thankyou
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We are glad you found your accommodations cozy, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This place is total cheese, but still, a great place to stay.  The whole Castle motif will drive Disney hounds batty with joy.  For sure within walking distance of Disneyland but don't make the mistake of bringing two cars if you book the family suite.  That extra ride will cost you $25 per in the adjacent lot.  Elevator yes. Great customer service yes. Style points, well, yes, if you love the whole medieval Disneyland thing.  I would recommend a stay here.
Manager Response: We thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites recently.  We appreciate the "colorful" review you provided, so thank you for appreciating our "Fun" Castle.    We allow complimentary parking for one vehicle per registered room, which many properties in town charge for 1 - 2 cars per stay.  We also provide complimentary WI FI which we believe offers our guests a great saving's.  When required, we do have an option for our guest's to park additional vehicles nearby, which again, many hotels do not offer this, so we hope you found this convenient.  Thank you for recommending us, and we hope to see you again at the "Fun" Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Stayed here for its convenient location to the Anaheim Convention Center - but found it was convenient to pretty much everywhere else (like Disney)! Also right down the street from a good selection of restaurants (i.e., P.F. Chang's, Cheesecake Factory, etc.) and a 24hr Subway about 3 steps away from the hotel - loved it!  Front desk staff was wonderfully helpful and polite-  made great recommendations on where to eat, not afraid to tell you, "Don't eat there!" and very accommodating of requests. Pleasantly surprised by the utility of their in-house "Gift Shop," which sells the requisite t-shirts and key chains, but all the little things you might forget - or suddenly find yourself in need of - on a trip, like toothpaste, ponchos, AND canned foods, water, frozen dinners, etc.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for staying with us during your recent trip to Anaheim for a Convention.  You provided great feedback, and we appreciate all the attention to detail you gave us.  Thank you for the recommendation.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Stayed at this hotel while attending a conference in Anaheim. This was the perfect location to the Convention center (~6 minute walk) and also to disneyland (~8 minute walk).  Overall this hotel was very clean, comfortable, and reasonable priced. No complaints here.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the feedback and we are glad you enjoyed your stay, and that our location worked well for you while you were here attending a convention.  Sincerely,

Summary: l stay at the castle inn at Anaheim  3 to 4 times a year for work the rooms are very clean the staff is pleasant and helpful they  always have a smile the beds are comfortable . the front desk staff is always helpful  l will keep coming back see you guys soon
Manager Response: Thank you very much for providing your review from your recent stay.  We thank you for being a returning guest and look forward to your next visit.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great location, newly remodeled, decent price
Summary: We got this place for a great deal and that made it an awesome place to say. The walk was really short to the parks and the rooms were clean and more spacious than I anticipated. Fridge and microwave were nice bonuses. The water pressure was good which is usually not the case with older hotels. Though the remodel is really nice the exterior, air conditioning, and shower fixtures show the age of the place. But overall it was a great place to stay!
Manager Response: We appreciate your time in providing a review from your recent stay with us.  Your feedback is valuable and we thank you.  Sincerely,

Summary: I absolutely loved our stay here. I've stayed at several of the hotels in the area and Castle Inn is always an excellent choice. It's a very close walk to Disneyland, the front desk staff are amazing, the rooms are clean and comfortable, and spacious as well. The front desk staff was always very helpful. There was one evening when a crowd of very inconsiderate parents and their kids were in the pool and being VERY loud late at night, it was going on ten thirty, I believe, and one call down to the front desk and it was all taken care of. There are a lot of restaurants around that deliver, so that was convenient as well, though the hotel is very close to many places to eat and shop. The room has a mini fridge and a microwave, which was very nice. There was a small issue with our
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the lovely review from you stay with us earlier this month.  We were so happy to read all the great feedback you provided.     We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My experience staying at the Castle Inn was great!  The staff was very accommodating and friendly, the rooms are spacious and clean.  Great for families! Very close to Disneyland and there are lots of restaurants close by.  I would definitely recommend this hotel!   Yanira S.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and providing your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: When we booked our vacation this hotel was the cheapest and we got the fourth night free! It was just my husband and I and our first time to this hotel!! We loved the location with many shops and resturants close by and only a 8 min walk to the main gates! Our room was very spacious and very clean! The staff were pleasant and very helpful! We really enjoyed our stay!! My only thing that I would change would that one day they brought in contenential breakfast!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  We find that offering Free Parking and Free WI FI is a much better value than providing Continental Breakfast when they are many choices for breakfast around the area.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel for an awesome price.
Summary: I stayed at the Castle Inn on Halloween week. My experience was very good and I would definitely recommend this hotel. Rooms are not fancy but good enough to relax. It very close to Disneyland and the customer service is great.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for posting your comment from your recent stay with us.  Thank you for the recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Hotel is pricy for the modest rooms. There is NO parking and one vehicle per room if you can even find a spot. Staff was friendly but not accommodating as we needed a first floor room for a handicapped family member and they could not provide us with one. We managed but had a hard time getting up to the second floor. The hotel looks better from the outside than the older inside of the hotel rooms. I will definitely stay somewhere else next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent feedback.  We are sorry you had some concerns with parking.  We  provide amble parking for one car per registered room.  We are sorry we fell short in your expectations, but thank you again for providing your feedback.  Sincerely,

Summary: I was there on my own a present from my  hubby from 31st oct to 10th nov, when I arrived from a long trip from Brisbane Australia I was upgraded for free to an executive room room 414 big room two queen beds and little lounge area with a coffee table and sofa bed for little ol me lol that nite tho was bad the air con on the roof kepted cutiing in and out at first sounded like a mack truck idling turing into a mack truck reving worked out it was the air compressor cutting in and out,, next morning I went down and explained what happened and ask to be shifted to another room even a standard one I was there for 10 nites I need sleep they said not a problem would I go for coffee and come back in about 1,5 hrs so they could get me another room brought my bags down they held on to
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for your lovely review from your stay with us in Oct/Nov.  So nice to hear you had a good time, and that we got you all sorted out with a lovely room where you could get some sleep.  Thank you for highlighting our Staff Member, we will certainly pass this along to him.  We take pride in our customer service, so we appreciate you highlighting this in your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back one day from the world down under.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Over Thanksgiving week my Mother, Father and I went to Disneyland.  I used a promotion through my credit union. I was a little concerned but it was the easiest thing I have done like this.  It was nice that the people behind the counter knew exactly what to do.  We got a choice of up stairs or down stairs.  The room was clean and updated.  We only used it to sleep in so we didn't need anything fancy.  Being clean and well kept was our main priority.  A few things they could improve on is there is no breakfast of any kind, they do provide coffee, a microwave and a refrigerator.  There are restaurants close by but it would have been nice to grab a little something and head out to the park instead of having to drive somewhere to eat breakfast.  The parking was ample but the spaces
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent review from you stay with us.  Thank you for your feedback on various area's of your stay and our property.  We feel by offering complimentary parking, Free WI FI and no resort fee's, gives our guests that savings to enjoy one of many restaurant choices within walking distance.    Thank you again, and we hope you will keep us in mind when your next trip brings you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The hotel is looking a little tired but the rooms were clean and spacious. A short walk to Disneyland and close to nearby restaurants. Had no problems at all. Staff we encountered were pleasant and helpful. Managed to get a 1pm check out and they stored our luggage until transfer vehicle arrived. The only thing needed is in room safes and having to go to reception any time we wanted something from the safety deposit box was a little bit annoying, Would think about staying here again if we travel to Disneyland again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent review, we appreciate you taking the time to provide your feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Arrived early and they let us check in early and even upgraded us to the executive suite. The location is excellent for Disneyland. Just a 2 block walk. Front desk was superior, friendly greeting and welcoming. Rooms clean and comfortable. Couldn't have asked for more!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for being our guest recently at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were happy to see you received our "Royal treatment".  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: If I could give it zero stars I would.
Summary: Came for a family vacation and got my Pandora Bracelet ripped off. Word of advice:  don't have your room cleaned by housekeeping or better yet, don't bring any valuables!!  Definitely ruined our vacation. The hotel staff is useless and couldn't care less.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are very pleased to hear the birthday girl had a blast!  All of the rooms on property have a hairdryer, but as you mentioned the suites have 2!  This definitely helps when there are 5 girls getting ready at the same time.  We also hope that they were able to take advantage of the free Wi Fi during your stay as well!  The Parlor Suite and Family Suites all have a door to separate the front room from the back, and the two TV's really come in handy for larger families.  We hope to celebrate another birthday with you soon!

Summary Heading: Good property for a family visit to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here with a family of 6 so got the Parlor Suitr. It worked out perfectly. The beds for adequately comfortable. Everything was clean. The rooms look nice. The free parking and location are great. We brought our own food to have in-room continental breakfasts using the refrigerator and microwave. We got a room at the front facing the park based on other recommendations. However as a light sleeper, I recommend being further to the back. Our bedroom was right above the street and the traffic was noisy: our living room was very quiet because it was away from the street so the back of the property would have been perfect. From our 3rd floor room there wasn't enough of a window or view to see anything worthwhile at the park.   The only thing I would like the motel to improve
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review from your recent family visit to Disneyland.  We appreciate your feedback and comments, and hope you will keep us in mind for a future visit to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We visited Anaheim/Disneyland last week and stayed at this Hotel for 4 nights.  Our main objective was value and walking distance to Disneyland, both of which this property offers.  It was our first time staying here, however we have stayed at many of the properties that are truly 'walking distance' from Disneyland.  Overall, we were happy with our stay.  A couple of things to be aware of if you are going to book this Hotel: The beds are on the soft side.  They were fine for the kids + myself, but not good for my spouse who has back issues. The Vanity area (including the coffee pot) is part of the main room (only toilet + shower behind a door), and the light over sink area is quite bright, so getting up early to make coffee is pretty much out, unless you want to wake everyone.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  We appreciate the detailed feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Meh. Location is the Only Benefit.
Summary: Overall, our recent stay at the Castle Inn and Suites was nothing special.  My family traveled with my parents and we sprung for the family suite.    POSITIVES:  We chose this location specifically for its short, easy walk to Disneyland.  The walk to and from each day was convenient.  Overall, the room, towels, and linen were clean.  We were on the 4th floor and did not experience much noise from other guests.  NEGATIVES:   Despite the convenient location, our stay was certainly not worth $200 per night.  No breakfast service of any kind.  The building is old, and feels old -- presents itself like a run-of-the-mill value motel.  Pool and hot tub area were tiny and underwhelming.  Elevator crawls at a glacial pace.  Castle theme is just average -- nothing impressive.  The family
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent feedback from your stay with us.  We realize we are not the property for everyone, and despite the feedback you provided, we thank you for giving us a try and hope you may consider a future stay with us.    Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Everything about my stay was perfect, Mr. Marc and Ms. Mari were very helpful in anwsering my question and concerns.
Summary: Perfect place to stay if your plaaning to go to Disneyland. Rooms are more than clean, beds are very comfortable. Personal working there are very nice and more than happy to help out. If you planning on staying at castle inn Mr. Marc and Ms. Mari are the people you want to speak to!! Opun arrival they were very helpful and happy to awnser all my questions. Castle inn is the bomb!!!
Manager Response: We appreciate your lovely review of your stay with us earlier this month.  Thank you very much for commenting on our Front Office Staff.  We do pride ourselves on top-notch customer service, so thank you very much for pointing that out.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: It has been a few years since I stayed at this location and they've completely redone their rooms. Our room was nice and the location is only a few blocks from the park. I wish it was about twenty few dollars a night to compete with the place across the road but overall it's a nice place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate your feedback on our new rooms.  We hope you will keep us in mind when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Spent a week at this hotel.   Pros: 1.  2.5 blocks to entrance of Disneyland and California Adventureland. 2.  Restaurants nearby. 3.  CVS, 7-11, small souvenir shops are all within one block of this hotel to pick up any food, drinks, essentials.  4.  Room was always made nicely. 5.  Pool was nice for the kids. 6.  Good value. 7,  We took the Disneyland Express bus to and from LAX.  The stop for the bus is just outside the entrance of the hotel.    Cons: 1.  If you have young kids (under 3) it may be far for them to walk.  My 4 and 6 year old did not have any problems and we did not use a stroller.  If you have a stroller this will not be an issue. 2.  Breakfast choices are restricted to IHOP and Denny's.  I found that service at the Denny's was much better although the kids
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your detailed review from your stay with us this month.  The Pro's and Con's list was very informative.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Helen and I stayed here 8 nights. This hotel is perfect for young couples and families. The rooms are very clean and spacious. The hotel has a night store with cheap food, gifts and drinks. If you can't find what you need, there is a 7/11 and numerous food places within 1 mins walking time. Disneyland is a short 5min walk away. We traveled to Anaheim from New Zealand specifically for Disneyland and we weren't let down! This hotel is the perfect place to stay if you are in the same boat as we were.  Mark on the front desk is fantastic! Talk about service. Mark wanted to help us. He went out of his way to ensure our visit was a success. Thank you Mark, you went above and beyond duty - you are by far the best at what you do!   Castle Inn also offers free wifi - A big bonus! You
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your lovely review you provided from your November visit.  Thank you for the great feedback on our staff member.  We pride ourselves in our guest service, so we truly appreciate you noticing and providing your feedback.  We look forward to one day welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Very clean, quiet and spacious suites
Summary: We stayed there for 4 nights mid Nov. There were 5 of us, 3 adults and 2 small kids. Room had everything we needed. Fridge, microwave, comfy beds, very good Wi-fi and great water pressure. Has a pool but never made it in. The location is only minutes away from Disneyland and our 4 and 6 year were able to walk back, even after a full day at the park. The store has everything you need from toiletries to food and beverages and is open really early and stays open late. This was our first stay at this hotel but will definitely be back
Manager Response: Thank you very much for providing us your feedback from your stay with us this month.  We appreciate your review and look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: First off I want to state that I am a travel agent and had many options at my disposal for our trip to Disneyland but because there were 3 adults and 2 kids travelling we wanted something that was large enough that we wouldn't be tripping over each other but was close to the park to walk. I had seen the recently renovated Castle Inn in June on a fam trip and loved what they had done to the place!  We booked into a family suite that had one king bed and 2 queen beds in a separate area with plenty of space to spread out. The beds were SOOOOO comfy!!  I wanted to pack it up and take it home with me!  The bathrooms have been updated and the shower pressure was great!  There is a fridge (and microwave) if you need it but we only used it for water for the next day (buy water offsite
Manager Response: A very big THANK YOU, for providing such a great detailed review of your stay with us this month. We appreciate our travel partner's and we were glad you had a chance to stay with us.    It was very nice to read all the great feedback and details on the area you provided.   Review's like yours helps future Castle guest's know what to expect when they stay with us, so thank you again.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: A group of 11 of us stayed with the Castle Inn and Suites! The layout of the property and the design is what makes this property very unique. The staff are so welcoming and lovely! The rooms were spacious, clean, comfortable and loved the new towel ornaments we had waiting in our rooms when getting back from Disney. Only 5 minutes walk to Disney, so close to Denny's diner, The cheesecake factory, 711, the chemist and so much more.  .  If you are looking for a property that is within walking distance to everything (Not just disneyland) This is a fantastic option. There isnt a resteraunt on site or a fitness centre etc however there is so many dinning options surrounding the hotel that this didnt bother me at all.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your lovely comments from your visit to the Castle Inn & Suites this month.  We appreciate the feedback, and hope to see you again if your travel plans return you to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We had such a wonderful time! It is our second stay at this Hotel and we love it! The rooms are just perfect for our family, we would have to pay for more rooms if we couldn't get the suites. We just love staying there!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for writing your review from your stay with us this month.  We were happy to see you and your family enjoy staying with us, we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Just got back from a week at the fabulous Castle Inn and Suites. My stay was perfect. We, a family of four with two teenagers, had an executive suite that overlooked Harbour Blvd. The room was spacious and quiet - street noise was not an issue. We were located across from the back of California Adventure's Tower of Terror and had a great view of the fireworks on the nights we headed back to the hotel early.   The location is amazing! We walked to everything! We went to Disneyland and California Adventure, IHOP, Denny's, Cheesecake Factory, The Rainforest Café, Avis to rent a car to head into L.A. for a day... even Shakey's Pizza was an easy walk and highly recommended!  The lobby was nice and clean. Our room was clean and well maintained. The housekeeping staff did an amazing
Manager Response: A very big thank you for our lovely review and detail's of our location, rooms, neighboring stores, shops, restaurants etc.  We appreciate you staying with us, and we are very happy you had a great visit.  Thank you for posting your feedback on our WI FI as we upgraded it in September and we are receiving rave review's.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Not much I can add that hasn't been said already. We were there for the week of October 21 and have not one complaint. While the hotel is showing some wear the best thing -- bar none -- is the comfortable beds and pillows. We walked miles every day and the only thing that saved me was a wonderful sleep every night. The rooms were very clean, all the maids were nice and friendly and the staff at the front desk could not have been more helpful. We had to drive into Burbank for the Ellen show and looked into different ways of getting there ($$). The fellow at the front desk suggested who they use -- Tony was his name and I feel bad I've misplaced his card to mention the company name. Definitely use this fellow if you want AMAZING service and cost. Maybe someone at the hotel will
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for posting your feedback from your stay with us in October.  It was nice to hear you enjoyed our comfortable  beds and pillow's, and you had a great sleep every night.    We will pass along your note to Classic Transportation, the company you commented about in your review.  Thank you again, and we hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn and suits for 4 days and let me tell you we could not be happier. We make a trip to Disney every year staying at different hotels every time and this was the best experience we have had, even better than the over priced Disneyland hotel.  This hotel is very clean, has free parking, free wifi, and it's only a 7 minute walk to Disneyland. We timed ourselves walking with three kids including pushing one on the stroller.   But the real reason that I'm writing this review is because of their customer service. They are very professional and very helpful in every way they can. My father in law had issues with his military voucher for the hotel. At the base that he went to purchase the vouchers at, they told him that he did not need a voucher anymore even
Manager Response: We would like to say a very big Thank You for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites, and writing your lovely review of your stay with us.  We appreciate all the kind word's, and comment's and it makes us realize we are doing what we are supposed to do and that is, to take care of our guest's!  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Happiest Place on Earth.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We were looking for a good place to stay for our Disney vacation. We wanted something near the park and at a good value. We found that at Castle Inn. When we arrived, we were upgraded to one of the Executive Suites for the 5 nights we were staying. The room was very spacious, clean and very well kept. It is an easy walk to Disneyland, and also the Garden Walk which has many stores and restaurants. I have heard the wi-fi can be weak, but we did not have any problems with it at all. The only drawback was the beds were a little bit firm, but not to the point of being impossible. All in all, I would stay there again without question.
Manager Response: We appreciate your time in writing your review from your recent stay with us.  It was nice to see that you enjoyed your stay and thank you for the comment regarding the WI FI.  We upgraded our system in mid- September, so all is good to go with the WI FI.  We are also glad you enjoyed the upgrade to the Executive Suite.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The hotel itself is very affordable and located close to BOTH the Convention Center and Disney.  The Staff is very friendly and the property is clean, secure and safe.  The rooms are a bit Sparten with minimal features, but does have a micro and small fridge.  The television is a new LCD and the channel selection is basic.  The bathroom/shower area is clean and there is a ample supply of linens.  The pool area is small but tastefully laid out.  There is an on-site store that most everything you will need.  The hotel is next to a shopping center that has six different places to eat and there is a rite-aid and 7-eleven 1 block away.
Manager Response: We appreciate the recent review from your stay with us this month.  It was nice to see you enjoyed the accommodations and location of our property.  We are very excited to have the CVS/Pharmacy right across the street, so we are happy you found that store and other's convenient.  We hope you will keep us in mind when booking your next visit to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: We had a good time at the Castle Inn and Suites in mid September. The room was a good size with a microwave and fridge.  We used the laundry which was very helpful. The exterior of the hotel is looking tired but the rooms were fine, if a little dark.  You couldn't really open the curtains as the walk way is directly outside the window. I think I prefer hotels with interior halls and windows the other side of the room from the door.  Sometimes the elevator didn't work.  Internet speed and connection is not very good.  It's close to the park and we walked there every day.  There are a few stores opposite and one on site - useful for essentials. We stocked up at Target for our park snacks (you can catch a bus there quite easily).  The hot tub was a little too hot for comfort and
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We realize that having outside entrances may not work for all guest's, so we  appreciate your feedback.  We upgraded our WI FI system in September, so you must have stayed with us right before the recent upgrade.  We have resolved that concern, and now receive numerous comments about how fast our WI FI is compared to full service properties, so we are very excited about this recent enhancement.  Once again, thank you for providing your feedback and we hope you will give us another opportunity on a future visit to the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We were just coming to Anaheim for 2 nights, unfortunately the same 2 days BlizzCon was on it seems. All the hotels had jacked up their prices considerably and then I chanced across Castle Inn and Suites at a regular price. The kids were also excited as they remembered the castle hotel from staying nearby previously!  For 2 nights it was a great stay. No complaints. Room was fresh and clean. Wi-fi worked well. Can't comment on the pool and spa as we didn't use them (apart from noting that the pool is quite small).  Quick walk to Disney and all of the restaurants on offer on South Harbor and Katella.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review.  We were happy you found availability with us over the busy dates when the Blizzcon event was in Anaheim.  We hope you will keep us in mind if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Very clean, microwave and fridge, free wifi, very helpful staff and amazing proximity to Disneyland/Anaheim Convention Center. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the Anaheim area.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent stay in Anaheim.  We appreciate the review and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: What impressed me most about this hotel was the service. I cannot recall receiving more helpful, friendly service anywhere, and each staff member I encountered seemed genuinely interested in being helpful. The rooms were clean, tidy and comfortable. It is located 2-3 blocks from the entrances to Disneyland and California Adventure Park. I would gladly stay here again, in fact it would be a first choice.
Manager Response: We want to say thank you for posting your review recently.  We enjoy the feedback from our guest's, and we hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Price was excellent but best thing was that's it's only a 7 to 8 minute walk from Disneyland! ! Also parking was free amd they have a guest  coin laundry room and convenience store on site . It's across the street from California Adventure and did I mention a short walk to Disneyland. .lol.. Only two things we didn't like were the mini fridge was engery efficient so had no real cooling poor, so good thing we had a ice chest and the mattresses were to firm not as comfy as I like them.  McDonalds,  Dennys n subway are also close enough to walk to, so it was nice not having to drive anywhere ;)  Well return in the near future since we are Annual Pass holders The Montalvo Family
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites for your Disneyland trip.  We welcome all feedback.  We understand the energy efficient refrigerator's may not get as cold as some guest's like, but we typically do not have any concerns with these, so hopefully your refrigerator was just an isolated situation.  Keep in mind, when traveling, you are always more than welcome to contact one of our guest service agent's if you experience any concerns during your stay, as we are here to assist you.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Kind Regards,

Summary: Having stayed here 14 years ago, we decided that when we came back this year, we would stay there again and see if it was still the same. It is a cheaper alternative to staying at one of the Disney hotels. Valet is charged automatically to your bill, but, our car was parked too far away from our actual room. It is very close to Disneyland itself, as well as downtown Disney. McDonalds is right next door and is great for a cheap yet filling breakfast before you start your day. Also comes in handy for late night snacks! We did stay at a couple of the Disney hotels and of course they are better, but if you want a cheaper option, without the bells and whistles, then this hotel will give you somewhere to sleep and recoup for the next day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review from your Disneyland Trip.  The Castle Inn & Suites offers Complimentary Parking for 1 car per registered room, we do not offer Valet service, and the closest McDonald's is next to the Camelot Inn & Suites.  We assume you stayed at the Camelot, but wanted to make sure we got you off a note from the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Was down visiting Disneyland with the kids (I don't think one would stay on the Anaheim strip for any other reason?)  The hotel at which I typically stayed was booked, so I booked the Castle Inn largely based on Trip Advisor.  They did not dissappoint.  Our flight got in late - there was no problem.  The room was nice sized.  Two queen beds and a sofa bed - not a super comfortable sofa bed, but comfortable enough for a 10-year-old.  We didn't have an official suite, but there was a fridge and a microwave.  There is a little store right across the driveway but a better more thoroughly stocked place just down the block.  We got breakfast stuff and snacks there.  Also had a delicious burrito at the Mexican place in the same little strip mall.  I can't remember the name of the
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your trip to Disneyland recently.  We appreciate the feedback and great comments you provided.  We were glad to see the numerous restaurants and shops in the area, worked well for you and your family.  We pride ourselves on our guest service, so thank you for pointing that out in your review.  We look forward to seeing you again when your travel plans return you to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great place for a trip to Disneyland!
Summary: My husband and I recently enjoyed and adults only trip to the Disneyland resort and chose the Castle Inn and Suites as our hotel this time around.  We were not disapointed!  The room was very clean and spacious.  We were on the 3rd floor with a 2 queen bed room.  There was a flat screen tv, two tables along with chairs, dresser, hanging wardrobe, microwave and small fridge.  The beds were comfortable, plenty of pillows!  There are drink machines located around the hotel as well as a great little convenience store on property.  While we did not have time to hit the pool, it looked like a nice little area if that is something you are looking for.  Not a huge pool, but enough for a mid-afternoon dip.  The walk to Disneyland took us maybe 10 minutes(we are faster walkers).  The
Manager Response: We appreciate you selecting our Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland .  Thank you so much for the lovely feedback on our property, location, and rooms.    We do hope you and the entire family will come back and see us on your next trip to the Happiest Place on Earth.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: It is always a pleasant stay at the castle inn, customer service is top notch always! Clean rooms with a great pool, free internet for guests, nice flat screen television, two large queen beds, a desk with chairs and lots of space for a family to enjoy! Disneyland is 15 minute walk to front gate, so the location is excellent! I have stayed with the castle inn for ten plus years and it was always a wonderful stay! Castle inn gives you a nice refrigerator and microwave in room no cost! They never charge you for hidden fees like parking or resort fees? The price you book for is what you pay! No surprises... I will always return to castle inn with my family for our vacations! Always a pleasure castle inn...keep up the great work!
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for your recently review of your stay with us.  We appreciate your feedback and you great points you highlighted.  We look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans return you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This hotel is an older hotel but the rooms are clean and comfortable. The location is great if you are going to Disneyland. It's about a two block walk to the entrance and you'll save money by not paying to park. We experienced great customer service at the front desk and would stay here again next time we go to Disneyland!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for writing a review from your stay with us last month.  The feedback we receive from our guests is always valuable, and we appreciate it.  We look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I love this place!  We've been staying here for years, and they are consistently good, well above average!  Everything is so comfortable and interesting to look at!  They even switched to these new massage soap bars (pictured), just another way that the castle goes above and beyond.  We find the castle to be cleaner than most hotels in the area, especially within their price range.  We get the best deals from them, get the most amenities, best customer service, and literally the best nights sleep.  Thanks for yet another perfect vacation!  See you again real soon.  ;-)
Manager Response: A big thank you for your lovely review from your stay with us last month.  Your comments were fantastic and feedback like that goes along way, so we really appreciate it.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: They say your home is your castle.... this one ticked the boxes !
Summary: For three nights it made a great base camp for us as a family to enjoy Disney, which is close walking distance.   Good sized room, with fridge and coffee maker, essential if travelling with family/ kids.  Decor is a little dated, think heavy dark 80s style wood,  but it  worked for us, as there was a dining table for the takeout meals.  Beds were comfy and room was clean.   Rooms are quite dark however, as the only window faces out onto a covered balcony, so can be a little gloomy,   Enjoyed the pool, it was hot enough for swimming in October ! it is very much a family hotel, I can see why it appeals.  as its good value, provided the amenities you need for a short stay.   Food places withing a very close walk, there is a great little Mexican takeout restaurant just down the
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for taking the time to write your review from your visit with us last month.  We appreciate the fact that our Castle made you feel at home.    We completed our renovation a year ago last month, and replaced all the older furniture with top of the line, made in the USA ,Thomasville furniture.  Because we are a Castle-theme property, we elected to go with the darker, richer furnishings and fabric's and not the stark white or lighter furniture, as we did not feel it would complement our property.  We hope you notified our front desk of the air con trouble you were having as we would have been more than happy to fix this for you.  We do hope you will keep us in mind if your travel plans return you to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My boyfriend and I have stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites twice now through GetAwayToday. The price was great, better than staying across the street from the enterence of Disneyland for way more. I was very impressed because the TV was big, the beds were comfortable, and the service was great! The only scary thing, which has nothing to do with the room, is the uneven, leaning balcany that made me feel like it was going to collapse at any moment. Other than that, the Castle theme definitely keeps the magic alive once you leave Disneyland. I definitely plan on staying here again for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback during your stay with us recently.  It was nice to see you enjoyed the flat screen TV and found our beds comfortable.  We understand you felt uneasy about our decks,  but they are perfectly safe and sound, and thank you for stating you will be staying here again.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for 6 nights, Hotel manager is kind enough to assist me on 2 night extension with a friendly rate. Room is spacious with double queen bed, clean and tidy. For what we get versus the rate, there is no complaint.  Walking distance to Disneyland, free parking, close proximity to food and daily essentials. Security is good, hotel is situated just besides the main street and yet not noisy.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for writing your review from your stay with us in October.  We appreciate the feedback, and it was nice to see you found value in our rates and our location.  We hope you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We booked our trip through GetAwayToday, and chose the Castle Inn to stay at during our 4 day adventure at Disneyland. The location was perfect, a short walk to the park, and lots of convenience stores and a pharmacy less than a block away. The room was spacious and very clean, much larger than other "Standard" rooms we've stayed in. The staff was friendly and very helpful, printed our boarding passes for our return flight and stored our luggage with a smile. We will be going back, and we will chose  to stay at the Castle Inn again.
Manager Response: A very big thank you for taking the time to provide your review from your recent stay with us.  Thank you for booking our property through Getaway Today and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: great place to stay.  Rooms were larger than most economy rooms. Rooms were clean and pool was nice. We stayed 4 nights when visiting disneyland.   It was about a 3 block walk to disney.  Lots of local restaurants and a CVS pharmacy.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent review.  Thank you for the feedback and commenting on the new CVS Pharmacy across the street, as well as many restaurants in the surrounding area.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: A Great Stay! Will be back next year.
Summary: My boyfriend and I booked a Disneyland trip for last week throughGetAwayToday and at the Castle Inn and it was perfect. It was a short walk to the park, staff was friendly, parking is free which awesome and the rooms were clean and comfortable. We did have a problem with the fridge in our room but I called down stairs and they brought a new one within minutes. Everything was clean which is the most important thing for me! My only problem with the hotel which is minor, are that the walls are thin so when the guest next to us turn on the shower we could here it and when people were walking by it was loud. Not a big problem when you're at the park all day. Yes the outside could use a makeover but the rooms themselves are great.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide us with your feedback from your stay in October.  We recently completed our room renovations, and will be looking to do further enhancements to the exterior of our property, so thank you for your feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights.  We were getting in to Anaheim before check in.  I called the hotel to see if we could check in early.  They apologized for not having a room, but told me we could get a tag for the car.  That was great, saved us money.  They are so close to the park we could walk back for lunch or if we forgot something.  The room was always clean.  The room was very quiet.  The staff was always helpful.  I had read the Wi-Fi wasn't that great, but it was great for us.  We have multiple devices and had great connection speed.  Would stay there again.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback from your stay with us in October.  We were happy to see that you enjoyed our newly enhanced WI FI system, so thank you for commenting on that.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I've always enjoyed staying at Castle Inn.  Since the renovations it has been even more pleasant. The staff is always very polite and although I'm never in my room when housekeeping shows up, when I return, the room is always tidy and clean.  Also, the location to the theme parks and shops and restaurants can't be beat.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent review.  Your feedback was appreciated, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This is the second time we have stayed here with our family, once in 2000 and 14 yrs later we came again with our kids and now grandkids. All nice and remodled, stayed in the executive mini suites, super nice! clean, comfortable beds and quiet rooms. Kids loved the pool and hot tub very accessable to all the restaurants and Disney. We love this hotel. We will definately stay there next trip. Thanks to the accommodating staff, Marc was especially friendly.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for coming back to the Castle Inn & Suites this year after staying with us in 2000.   We were happy to see you enjoyed the new rooms and found our staff accommodating and friendly.  We look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans bring you back to Anaheim.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Very good hotel and very close to Disneyland
Summary: We, a family of four, just recently stayed 5 nights at the Castle Inn and found it to be a comfortable and clean hotel with a short 10 minute walk to the entrance of Disneyland, as well as being close to some shops and eateries. We stayed in one of the back rooms overlooking the carpark and found the room to be very clean, comfortable and well kept. Ours had a king size  bed in the front room and two queen size beds in the other. Our room was made fresh everyday and the staff were very friendly and helpful. They even allowed us to store our luggage at no  for the day when we checked out (by 11am) as our flight wasn't until 11.30pm later that night. The laundry facilities were good and cheap to use. The pools are not huge but nice. Carpark was a good size and free too. The only
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  We were happy to see you enjoyed our Family Suite, and found our property and guest amenities welcoming.    Thank you for the recommendation, and we look forward to seeing you on your next Disneyland trip.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The castle inn was only a ten minute walk to the entrance to the Disneyland resort and Downtown Disney. We were in one of the back family rooms overlooking the carpark. It was relatively quiet apart from noise from our neighbours whose children woke at 5am screaming each day and insisted on banging loudly on doors and walls. Apart from that the room featured one large king bed with fridge, television and bathroom and the back bedroom had two double beds, sink, coffee maker and television. It was very comfortable and clean. Beds were always immaculate and bathroom fresh. We chose to eat breakfast at the local ihop and Dennys which are also adjacent to the entrance. You can purchase your Disneyland tickets direct with the hotel if required. Only major downfall is there are only
Manager Response: We wanted to thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback on your recent stay with us.  It was nice to see our Family Suite worked well for you and your family, and you found the nearby restaurants convenient.  We do offer 2 elevators on property, one on each end of the Hotel, we apologize you were unable to locate them for your convenience.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,

Summary: Our room was clean and easily slept six. The motel is an easy walk to Disneyland. The staff was always friendly and helpful. We had such a great time that two nights into our four night trip, we asked if we could stay a fifth night and they were able to make it happen. They even let us hang out at the pool after we checked out and with the large changing room/toilet in the pool area we were able to swim and change before we left Anaheim. It helped to ease our way back to reality. We will return!
Manager Response: We appreciate the great feedback from your stay with us this month.  We were glad you were able to "hang out" at the pool and enjoy the facilities before you had to leave Anaheim.    We look forward to your return in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: It was an easy walk to Disneyland from hotel.  We were allowed to check in early to our room.  The room was newly remodeled.  The staff was very friendly.  Free parking was a plus too!  Plan to stay here again when we visit Disneyland next!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we appreciate it and look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warm Regards,

Summary: This was our second stay and we loved the room renos! Close to the park, fantastic staff, everything you need (shopping, food, etc.) close by and totally reasonable. This was our first visit with a toddler and he had lots of room to run around & loved the kiddie pool. We can't wait for our next visit!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to write your review from your stay with us this month.  Thank you for being a returning guest, we appreciate it.  We were happy to see you were able to bring your toddler for the first, and we look forward to you all returning in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Great overall place ,staff very friendly, we came in early around 9:00 am and were greated by a friendly hello, said we could check in, but our room was not ready yet, we drove and was told to park our car and return around 3:00 to get our room keys. Room was large,clean and nicely decor. Bed was comfy and clean. Refrigerator, microwave and coffee machine in room. Bathroom was nice size, had normal motel shower problems with water pressure during peak shower times, early morning, late evenings. Pool area was very nice, hot tub was great after long day walking around Disneyland. Parking was not a problem for us.  Maid service was great, room well prepare in a timely manner. Front desk was informative and helpful with all questions. Will stay again. Would recommend to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying your first time at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your kind feedback and recommendation to others.  We look forward to welcoming you back when your travel plans return you to the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: our Castle Inn 5 night holiday was at the end of 3 weeks travelling the West Coast USA , we found the rooms to be a good size , easy walk to Disney Land , pool was ok , plenty of eating options close by , but the staff were extremely helpful , nothing was a problem & they even went out of their way to secure baseball tickets for us . very happy & impressed , we'll be recommending Castle Inn to anyone & everyone . regards Family Browne
Manager Response: A very big thank you for your lovely review of your recent stay with us.  It was nice to see that our location, staff, and rooms worked well for you and your family.  We hope you had fun at the Baseball game as well.  Thank you for your future recommendation, and we hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This is the second time I have stayed at the Castle Inn and both times have been great. The rooms are large with lots of space for little ones. The beds are comfortable and the room is very clean. We had a problem with the shower pressure and within 30 minutes we had a new shower head installed, excellent customer service. The front desk staff have been very friendly, helpful  and have lots of information. The airport shuttles and the Anaheim Resort Transit both stop just steps away. The walk to Disneyland is not hard at all even after a very long day at the Parks. I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your visit to the Disneyland Resort.  It was nice to see that you found our rooms spacious, our staff friendly and location convenient to the park entrance.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We recently stayed at Castle Inn and Suites for the Disneyland Half Marathon. Very close walk to Disneyland and DCA. When we checked in the staff was very friendly and accommodating to our group. The rooms were in good shape. Overall, we enjoyed our experience and will likely return.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us during the Disneyland Half Marathon.  We appreciate your feedback and nice comments.  We do hope you'll return next year if your plans bring you back for the Marathon, or just to visit Disneyland.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My family stayed at Castle Inn & Suites and was happy with the pretty spacious room and close proximity to the pedestrian entrance to Disneyland and California Adventure parks.  Overall, great experience!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review from your stay with us this month.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: needed handicap room for adult son,confirmed it a still didn't get it,son went 3 day's without shower spent over$1200.00 and no handicap room front desk said not their fault,elevator by room out of order water in room would go from hot to cold to hot to cold,would not stay again.
Manager Response: We apologize you were disappointed in your stay.  The Castle Inn & Suites makes every effort to meet all requests made in advance by our guests.  All of our guest rooms are wheelchair accessible.  We have a limited number of rooms which have a roll in shower.  The original reservation, made through a third party did not have any special requests.  Once we were made aware that a roll in shower was required for one of the members in the party, after check in, we offered to move the party to a room of this type.  This offer was declined.  We apologize the elevator was out of service, it was repaired as soon as possible.  Another elevator was available which provided access to all floors.  Again we apologize for the inconvenience, we hope you will give us the opportunity of staying with us again.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for four nights in October while visiting Disneyland. The main reason we booked this hotel was for the free parking. While researching other hotels in the area we discovered that a lot of them charge for parking even if you are a  hotel guest.  We also discovered that the front gates for Disneyland/California Adventure are about a 10 minute walk from the hotel which was great. Our room was very nice. We knew the room was going yo come with a refrigerator, but we were pleasantly surprised that it had a microwave as well. CVS pharmacy was right down the street so we went and got some groceries so we could have meals in our room instead of eating at the park for three days. After returning from long days at the park, we came back to a clean room stocked
Manager Response: A very big thank you for your lovely review from your stay with us this month.  We were happy to see that you appreciated the Free Parking, the location to the main entrance, and found the newly opened CVS Pharmacy a convenience for picking up some goodies for your room.    We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We have been here a few times. Really love the remodel. Staff is always helpful and friendly. Rooms are clean and beautiful. The price is pretty fair for the convenience  to be able to walk to Disneyland. What would make this the perfect place is offering a free breakfast. We highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for being a valued guest of the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were happy to see you enjoyed our newly remodeled rooms, and our friendly staff.  We appreciate the comment about Breakfast, but we feel the value in Free Parking and Free Wi Fi is more appreciated by our guest's.  Thank you for your recommendation, we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here a couple of years a go, but still think that it is one of the better value for money places in Anaheim. Rooms were clean, bed was comfortable & the staff was friendly. Do not expect luxury but the room was ready when we arrived (a little early due to the flight in) & was stocked fresh with everything. There is a lot of info on hand at reception & staff will help with arranging day trips etc. Castle Inn is very convenient to walk to Disney although if you have very small kids & may come home with loads of bags, perhaps the shuttle might be better (the Anaheim shuttle - not a free one). We enjoyed our stay here & would stay again. There are also a lot of very good restaurants, diners etc close by so eating is not a problem.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your stay with us last November.  We appreciate your review on our value, location, and proximity to local restaurants.    We hope you will keep us in mind when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: I have stayed at the Castle Inn & Suites once before and it has always been great. This time the room was clean, spacious and we still love the theming. No frills when it comes to the hotel itself, but I really just wanted a comfortable place to sleep close to the parks. If you want a great place to stay, for a great price, within walking distance of Disneyland and California Adventure, this is the place to go! The staff is also great - nice, helpful and efficient! Thanks again for the wonderful experience!
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent review from your stay with us this month.  It's feedback like yours that keeps us striving for excellence.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here a couple of weeks ago and found it was great prices,  location and clean. Under a minute walk to the airport shuttle. Close to all the action of disney, Eat outs and also convenient to access the motorways. FRIENDLY STAFF. Would recommend. We would stay there again happily.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us in September.  We appreciate your comments and look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I chose this hotel because of price and according to what I read - it was in a nice location. When I arrived I loved the castle exterior - very fitting for the Disneyland area. Check in went very well and very welcoming staff. My room was very clean - everything well stocked. The beds very comfortable, pillows so soft. Room was very spacious. Although I did not have a car I could see that there was definitely ample parking for guests. Pool area very nice - very clean. The hotel is nicely located to Disneyland - no more than a 10 minute walk to the entrance to Disneyland and Disney California - and plenty of eating places in the area as the Castle Inn does not have a restaurant. There is a mini-market on the premises. When I go back to Disneyland again, I would definitely choose
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your visit this month.  Your feedback is very valuable, and it was nice to read all the great comment's on our beds, pillows, location and staff.    We are glad to know we made this visit very memorable for you and your family.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: A couple weeks ago, we wrapped up our second stay at Castle Inn and Suites this year. Both times, we booked through GetAwayToday.com and took advantage of their 4th night free offer.  Thankfully, Castle Inn had fully completed their renovation before our first stay there back in February. Their website still had outdated photos at the time, and it certainly didn't look like a place we would find acceptable, but we took a chance based on the photos and reviews by recent customers. We were very happy and decided to stay there a second time in September.  The rooms are clean and well equipped with a nice TV, refrigerator and microwave, pillows are plentiful (a little small, but almost all hotel pillows are, for some reason), and the beds are quite comfortable. One of the best parts
Manager Response: A very big thank you for your detailed review of your stay with us in September.  We appreciate you coming back to stay with us and were able to experience our new rooms.    Since you stated you will come back to see us when you visit Mickey again, we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My Wife and I wanted to find a affordable hotel within walking distance to both Disney parks. The Castle Inn is right across from the parks. We checked in at around 6 pm and the front desk staff were very friendly and the process was fast and efficient.  The room was very comfortable. Flat screen TV, frig and micro. It was very hot this weekend and they had turned on the AC in our room before we arrived.  We walked to the park the next day, so we asked to leave our car parked in there parking lot and it was not a problem.  Clean room, lots of towels, my wife was happy and so i was!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for posting your review of your stay with us this month.  It was nice to see that our check in process went well, and you found our rooms comfortable and staff friendly.  We hope you will keep us mind when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My son (8) and I stayed  at the Castle Inn and Suites for 7 nights on our recent trip to Disneyland.  I booked this hotel from New Zealand based on PRICE first and then proximity to Disneyland and I wasn't disappointed.
