I found the hotel to be in a perfect location not only to Disneyland (10mins walk at the most) but also to the bus stop (right on the corner of Katella & Sth Harbour Boulevard) and eateries just to the left of the hotel (from memory there is a Pizza, Subway and Chinese shop  along with a souvenir shop). The 7/11 and ABC store across the road and The Gardenwalk  shops which is about 5-7 min walk.  The location was perfect.    The Front desk staff were more than accommodating when I asked for a top floor room upon check-in and they were very friendly as were the
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for selecting the Castle Inn & Suites for your visit in September.  It was nice to see that our location worked well for you and your family.  We look forward to saying Kia Ora when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort!  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I booked 3 rooms for my two adult kids and their families and myself.  We requested our rooms be together and they were.  The rooms far exceeded our expectations and especially for the price, they were wonderful.    The staff and the front desk were friendly and professional.  The cleaning staff went out of their way to make sure we had what we needed.  Everything was clean and the rooms were more than adequate in size.  We enjoyed the pools.  The wading pool for the little ones was a bonus.  The TV's are a very nice size and worked great.  The beds were comfy and the pillows not bad at all.  We left an item behind and when I called the desk this morning, they were quick to retrieve my item and really wonderful about handling it.  We will definitely be returning to this Hotel on
Manager Response: We wanted to say Thank You for the lovely review from your stay with us in September.  We were happy to see that we far exceeded your expectations and that our staff was friendly and professional.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Perfect hotel for a family on a budget.  Clean room, nice staff, and good maid service.  The only thing we didn't like were the pillows.  Hotel room pillows are not known to be the best pillows in the first place, but the ones at this hotel seemed especially bad. It felt like you were sleeping on decorative pillows rather than pillows meant for sleeping.  I would stay here again but bring my own pillow.
Manager Response: We wanted to thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback from your stay with us in September.  We understand hotel pillows work for some guest's and not other's, so we appreciate the feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,

Summary: Front Desk: When we arrived the gentleman I spoke to was so friendly and accomodating. I asked about their family suites and luckily there was one still available on the top floor. He offered it to me at half of the price! Best customer service! Room: Was very surprised at the size, it was big!! The room was exceptionally clean, with towels made into swans etc. It was great having two TV's for when we wanted to come home and relax. Loved the colours and thought everything was quite nice. Bed were comfortable and it was very quiet on the top floor. The only problem we had was that the air conditioner was so noisy, kept us up at night.had to turn it off.it was very hot on this particular September weekend, so it would have been better to have it left on. We called to have it
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us in September.  We appreciate your feedback, and thank you for the review.  We were sorry to read you had an issue with your A/C, we hope you reported this to the front desk so we could have resolved this for you.  We appreciate the feedback regarding our pool.  We realize our pool works for some guest's and maybe not for other's.  Majority of our guests are gone all day at the park, so a quick dip in the pool is what our guests seem to enjoy.   Thank you for recommending us, we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed for 10 day. Amazing staff. Alberta was so friendly,  we got to see her every morning and she made you feel like you were at home. The rooms were great and very clean, so was the price. It is a very short walk to disneyland. I recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: A very big thank you for your review from your 10 day stay with us.  We appreciate your kind words about our Hotel and Staff.  We will certainly share your review with our staff, and look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This hotel is conveniently a 10 minute walk to Disneyland & several nearby restaurants. We parked there on the first night & didn't need to drive for 4 days. Saves money and time versus  parking at Disneyland Older but very clean & the kids enjoyed the pool & spa.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for providing your kind words from your recent stay with us.  It was nice to see you felt the hotel had a good location and several nearby restaurants to choose from.  We hope you will keep us in mind if your plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The room was very clean and newly remolded. I was very impressed with the room and hotel overall. Plenty of pillows and very comfortable bed. They not only have a pool and spa but they have a kiddie pool for little ones. The staff was very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words and great feedback from your recent stay with us.  We were happy to see that your family enjoyed the pool area.  We hope you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind when returning to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights in March. We loved the theme with a 3 year old boy. The rooms have been recently refurbished and you can tell which is great. The room was clean although there was an overly smell of bleach. Which while smelly at least you know the room is clean.   The staff were friendly and checkin fast. We did return on 2 occasions and the rooms had still not been cleaned but by bedtime it was always done. we like the location being a little walk to Gardenwalk and about 10 mins to Disney.    We do like the hotels slightly closer but will consider starting ere again when booking.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your 4 night stay with us in March.  We were glad you enjoyed the "theme" of the Hotel, our friendly staff and location.    We hope you will consider the Castle Inn & Suites if you plan to return to the Disneyland Resort in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: Stayed 6 nights on our trip to Disneyland. Close to restaraunts and close to park entrance. Staff very helpful and pleasant. Would recommend to anyone going to Disneyland parks. Good value. WiFi worked well.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  We appreciate your feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We, Daughter and her 2 Sons, stayed there for 7 nights and found the Inn to be in a great location to Disneyland and also for eating, especially the shops to the left of the Inn. Wifi was adequate because we were only there to sleep and shower. The staff were amazing. The youngest Grandson, 8 was quite ill with a bad cold and within 30 minutes of us arriving 1 of the staff had suggested and organised a wheelchair so we could get around and that proved invaluable. We were then able to spend our 4 full days at Disneyland where we saw and did everything we wanted,  and  didn't have to take him back to the Hotel when he was tired, he just rested. I would highly recommend the Castle Inn and would stay there if ever the chance to visit Disneyland was available. The rates are very
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Castle Inn & Suites for your Disneyland vacation.  It is great feedback like yours that continues to help us strive to be the best we can be, and to insure all guest's have a great experience.  We appreciate your recommendation, and welcome you back the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My third stay at this hotel and gets better each time. Continually improving and could not find better for the price. 10 min walk to Disneyland and staff are great, very helpful and courteous. I was on holiday with 2 sisters, we are mature age and had a wonderful time. Would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for providing your feedback from your recent stay with us.  With your feedback we are better able to improve upon our services to better help you each time and our other guests in the future.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you return to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: Stayed in a family suite for 7 days. Wonderful hotel staff made the stay very pleasent taking care of our needs including responding quickly and changing the refridgerator that wasn't cooling as well as we wanted. They helped with finding a stroller for us to rent. They actually booked it for us and had it in the lobby waiting for us the first morning we needed it. Turned out to be about half as much as renting one at Disneyland. Just about everything I inquired about , they were able to take care of right there. Would definately stay there again
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently.  We are very glad to see that you enjoyed your visit.  You are our best way to evaluate our service and we always appreciate feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at this hotel in June.  Position of hotel is great for walking to disnelyand/downtown disney and the many restaurants surrounding Disneyland. It is also just ten minutes walk from The Garden Walk which has heaps of eating spots and a movie theatre.  Hotel was super quiet and reception staff were excellent.  The only negative was the slow wifi.  We had a family suite, which was quite roomy and good value for money.  There is a bus stop just out the front of the hotel. We had a fantastic stay.  This hotel is older but has all you need in a hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites on your recent Disneyland Holiday.  It was nice to see that our location worked well for you and your family, and you found the Garden Walk to be convenient.  We recently upgraded our Wi Fi so good news with this.  We hope if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort, you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I've stayed here every visit I've made to Disneyland.  I am never disappointed!!! I will be staying there in October this year 2014 and I'm sure they will be awesome as always.  They will bring you extra towels if you ask for the pool. They clean the rooms everyday.  They are just awesome and never disappoint. Oh and the price us amazing!!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently.  You are our best way to evaluate our service and we always appreciate the feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back in October!  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Usually fly in from Hawaii to LAX. This time we flew into SFO and miss Disneyland that we decided to drive over to Anaheim. Oh yes while driving through California I made my reservations online and my fat fingers pressed the wrong buttons and ended my incomplete reservations so I called and spoke to the very nice and helpful Alberta at the front desk to see if my reservation did come threw and sure it did but with the wrong dates and the lovely Alberta fixed it all for me. I am always speechless at the upgrades to the rooms and parking - always free! Can't wait for my next stay in 2015 with the 'ohana.
Manager Response: Mahalo on your recent review you provided.  We appreciate your feedback very much, and will certainly pass along your nice comment about one of our team members at our front desk.  We look forward to welcoming you back in 2015!  Mahalo & Aloha,

Summary: Just visited Anaheim with my sisters and stayed. Great place with friendly and helpful staff who are full of local knowledge. Rooms are clean and it's a very short walk to Disneyland. Wifi fast and they are upgrading facilities all the time. Bottom line, it's clean, it's safe, it's local and the price is right. Loved it and would stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for selecting the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland visit.  We appreciate the great feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We enjoyed our three-day vacation to Disneyland which was made even better by our accommodations at Castle Inn & Suites. The rooms were comfortable, and the staff were very helpful. There were 5 adults, and we all give our experience 2 thumbs up.
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for your nice words you posted from your recent stay with us.  We were very happy to read the suite you stayed in worked well for you and your family, and thank you for the "2 thumbs up".  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Will stay here again when we go back to Disneyland.
Summary: Very clean,quiet, close to Disneyland (we walked both day we went)and little mom and pop restaurants. Staff is very friendly and helpful. The Manager Marc Timanus really cares about the customers and service they give. Parking is free which is always a plus.
Manager Response: We wanted to thank you for your recent review of your stay with us here at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you so much for the "4's" and "5's" you gave us.  You are our best way to evaluate our service and always appreciate the feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: This place was close to Disneyland and room was spotlessly clean every day, the hotel accommodated us very well with parking and let us if needed to check out later as our flight was a 10.30pm flight. They were friendly and we as a family were very impressed with the room and facilities so close to everything.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent review from your stay with us in August.  We were happy to see our location worked well for you, and we provided adequate parking and a late check out for your departure day.  It's positive feedback like yours that allows us to progressively grow better and better and we look forward to wow you even more with future stays.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: In town over Labor Day weekend to participate in a Run Disney event, this was a perfect location and price point for our group. The room was clean and comfortable for all five of us, mini fridge so we had cold drinks ready for our run & there was also a microwave. Plenty of restaurant choices within a short walk and two blocks from the entrance to the Disney parks. Staff was super accommodating - extra towels were provided promptly upon request, after the race they were very gracious in offering a late checkout so we all had time to shower. Our luggage was locked in a secure storage area so we could enjoy the day until our late afternoon shuttle to the airport. There is not a computer / printer in the lobby but the staff offered to print my boarding pass so that I didn't have to
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for the Disneyland half marathon event.  We are glad you enjoyed our location, convenience of numerous restaurants in the area, our accommodating staff, and the free late check out we were able to extend.  We are always happy to assist our guest with printing boarding passes, and we will pass on your nice comment about our front desk staff and manager.  We recently upgraded our Wi Fi, so this is good news to all future guest's.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: If you want a cozy hotel within walking distance of the Disneyland Resort and with a hint of fantasy atmosphere, but want to avoid resort prices, this is the place to stay. I have returned to Castle Inn and Suites on many a Disney trip, and will continue to do so in the future. They always show me a great time, with good-sized rooms, polite staff, plenty of parking, clean premises, and a suit of armor in the lobby!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the lovely review, and for being a return guest of the Castle Inn & Suites.   We appreciate your kind words and feedback, and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: A beautiful hotel! It honestly does look & feel like a castle ! Surprisingly, the location is actually VERY quiet. It's a great place to relax & enjoy luxury.  The rooms are pleasantly up to date and clean. The price is unbeatable. I know this because I originally checked quite a few hotels Further from Disneyland, as I presumed they would be less expensive. That isn't the case here. This is a steal even on Labor Day weekend ! The staff is extremely friendly and accomodating. They welcome the business and really make you want to stay at their property. I would especially like to mention Shyam, a very nice employee of the Castle inn for his hospitality and kind nature.  The only negative about this hotel is it's "one car per room policy." While I understand their large number of
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate you taking the time to write your review on your stay with us.  Thank you for mentioning one of our staff member's, we have passed this along to him, and we were happy he was able to allow you some extra parking during your visit.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: What nice staff and a great location!!  It is about  7 minute walk to DisneyLand main gate.  The room was clean(newly renovated)  and had a mini fridge and microwave (which made it great for making breakfast in the morning and keeping water cold for the next days adventure). The pool was a little small but I wasn't there for that.  If you are looking for a clean, affordable room, close to the park , this is the place to stay.  The staff had no problem extending my check out time by one hour, as my shuttle pick up time was an hour after check out.  I would highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  We appreciate the great feedback, and thank you for acknowledging our great staff and location.  Thank you for the recommendation, and we look forward to you returning to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed a week and enjoyed our visit. The rooms were cleaned daily. The pool was wonderful and clean.  I enjoyed the fact that there was laundry facilities to do our own laundry. Would recommend to friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review of your stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Everyone went out of their way to accommodate & make you feel special. The rooms, newly & completely renovated, were beautiful & extremely comfortable. I highly recommend staying at The Castle Inn & Suites.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the hotel! Guest service is a top priority for all of our staff.  We are very pleased to hear your comments about the newly renovated rooms as well.  We hope to be your hotel of choice for all of your future visits to Anaheim and the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights. It was the first time we've stayed at this hotel. We've stayed at a different hotel every stay which we frequently do as we are from Northern CA and LOVE DISNEYLAND! The look of the hotel from the outside is cute,(Cos it looks like a CASTLE !) & you expect your room to be all castle-y too but its sadly, not!  Thats okay though ..This hotel is walking distance to Disneyland and neighboring restaurants. The room was CLEAN, you have free parking & wifi(a little slow which is expected) microwave and fridge. No breakfest. Didn't have any issues, staff was nice. This isn't a 5 star hotel, BUT Its really decent for the price. Would recommend to friends!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments about the hotel. The rooms are not themed as you mentioned, however we just renovated them last year and are very happy with the results!  As always guest service is a priority for all of our staff.  We try to provide the other added values in place of breakfast, like the free parking for one vehicle per room, free wi-fi, and we also do not charge a resort fee. There are however many restaurants within walking distance of the hotel for breakfast, from small cafe's for orders to go to sit down restaurants.  We are happy to hear you would recommend us to your friends and look forward to accommodating you again soon!

Summary: Stayed in a 2 room suite with my husband and 2 kids.  The suite was a great option for us since I like to stay up later than the rest.  We could easily close the door to the large bedroom.  Decent size mini fridge and microwave were included in the suite.    The room wasn't dirty but furnishings and carpet seemed old and dingy.  I didn't find the beds to be comfortable at all.  Personal preference I suppose.    I did not enjoy the varying water temperatures while taking a shower.   Be ready to jump out of the water stream at any given moment.  Good point = easy walk to Disney.  I would guess about a mile from room door to turnstiles.  I walked it solo after dark and felt safe doing so.  We also walked to the Anaheim Garden Walk restaurants for dinner at California Pizza Kitchen.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to write your review from your stay with us this month.  We were happy to read our Family Suite worked well for you and your family.    We were sorry to read that you felt our rooms/carpet appeared old and dingy.  We completed our room remodeling in October 2013, so everything in our guest rooms is less than 1 year old.  Because we are a castle-theme Hotel, we elected to use the darker, richer fabrics and furnishings, rather than the lighter furniture or white bedding a lot of hotels use.  Once again, thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites, we hope you will consider another visit if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Regards,

Summary: We were in Anaheim to attend a Anaheim Angels baseball game and decided to get a hotel at the last minute.  We stopped at five hotels looking for a room before we stopped at Castle Inn.  They did have a room available so we took what they had. The room was small and had two double beds.  The internet was very poor.  It is a basic old style motel with a castle design on the front of the building.  I am sure small kids love to say they stayed in a castle.  No internet service, no breakfast, no business center, no extras.  Just a bed and tv close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites when you were in the area earlier this month.  We are a select-service property which means we do not include Breakfast or a Business Center.  The Gift Shop on property does offer business services, in addition to the hotel offering to print boarding passes when requested.  We offer complimentary Wi-Fi, and we understand at times it may not be available due to high usage, but we do offer this service and we are currently in the process of updating our Wi-Fi for better connectivity.  We understand we may not be the property for everyone, but appreciate you giving us an opportunity and if you feel you would like to give us another chance, we welcome you back at anytime.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Clean, comfortable and well maintained. Friendly and courteous staff. In-room fridge and microwave a bonus. FREE parking! On-site mini-mart a great place to pickup an adult beverage after a long day at Disneyland with grand kids :)  They participate in the military MWR lodging voucher program providing a discount to active duty and retired members in recognition of our service and sacrifice.
Manager Response: We would like to say a big thank you for your lovely review from your stay with us this month.  We absolutely recognize our military families and always welcome them to the Castle Inn & Suites.  We look forward to you returning to the Hotel the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: All I can say about this hotel is that it was decent.  They could go a little further with customer service.  We tried to check in 3 hours early as we had just arrived after a long flight and wanted to use the rest room and change clothes before heading to Disneyland.  Whenever possible, hotels have accommodated me for this type of request, but here I was told "Check in is not until 4pm."  End of conversation.  OK so we waited in line to use the lobby rest rooms, then I asked if there was a shuttle to the parks.  I was told that the town or specific commercial district did not allow shuttles on that street (except I later saw the hotel next door has one).  So we walked.  It was not too far, but might be for families with younger kids.  We didn't end up checking in until after 10
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback from your recent stay with us this month.  As you may know, August is high season in the Anaheim Resort, and all efforts to give our guests access to their rooms by 3pm is given. We have guests arriving from all over the world and understand they may not get into their room before 3pm.  We offer assistance with storing luggage and we do have 2 restroom facilities on property where guests can freshen up before they go out for the day.    Our property and most of the properties on Harbor Blvd. are considered to be "walking distance", so the area shuttle service does not service the majority of properties on our block.  I am not sure what shuttle you would have seen next door, but there could have been a shuttle that stopped there, but is not a scheduled service.  July and August are very busy month's so our pool would have been very busy, and we inform our guests to take their room towels to the pool and they will be replaced when requested, so we are sorry this information did not get relayed to you.  Once again, we appreciate the feedback.  Sincerely,

Summary: Visiting DL every yr for 52 yrs. This hotel was fab, clean, fresh, and staff was super. Free safe security box at front office. ART right next door to ride into DL. Pools well maintained. Visited 8/14
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review you provided recently.  We greatly appreciate the wonderful feedback.  We hope to see you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Stayed at the hotel for 3 days with my family of 3 young kids and the 2 adults. Our stay was made extra special by being upgraded to an executive suite. The room was really good and location was pretty convenient, only about 300m from Disneyland. Staff was very friendly. No hassles at all.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your review and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Once again, thank you!!  Kind Regards,

Summary: As always they never disappoint!!! Always clean, friendly staff, not over priced!! Our family stays here at least 4-5 times a year and it has always been a wonderful stay , never ever any problems with check in or check out!!! Great walking distance to disneyland and a corner store with food places within walking distance that won't break the bank!! Thank you castle inn and suites!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for being a loyal guest of the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your kind words, and great feedback from your stay with us.    We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Once again, thank you!

Summary: My daughter's and I have stayed there twice and just booked it for Halloween night!  Would highly recommed this hotel.  Its so close to Disneyland's entrance. Also they don't charge for parking!!  We had an issue and the housekeeping staff took care of it immediatly.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for being a return guest of the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your kind review, and we look forward to seeing you again in October.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great place! Close to disney main entrance but not too close
Summary: Close to main gate but far away enough that the fireworks aren't too loud. Rooms are really spacious. Staff were really helpful on the many occasions I went to the front desk. Will be coming back on our next trip to try out the family room......
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent review.  We look forward to welcoming you back so you can try out our Family Suite.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I am VERY picky about cleanliness in a hotel......I check corners, especially in the bathroom.  This hotel was very clean. The staff was very friendly.  The hotel is older, & doesn't have a lot of amenities, but for sleeping, showering, & walking to several different places to eat, & to go to Disneyland, (which is right across the street), it is perfect! We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  We appreciate your feedback, and thank you for commenting on our clean rooms and friendly staff.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed here by chance due to my wife's bad leg.  Hotel staff was excellent & location is great near fast food places. Got to park car before check in with out being charged like other hotels.  Extra pillows with out asking. We've been to other hotels but by far this place is the best. My new hotel every time.
Manager Response: We would like to say Thank You for your feedback on your stay with us this month.  We were very happy to read that we will be your "new hotel" every time you return to the Anaheim Resort.  Once again, thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Stayed here for 4nights.  Staff very friendly and helpful.  Any and all requests were taken care of immediately.  Room was nice and clean.  Price was very reasonable.  We had a family suite which was very nice, as the second bedroom had a door to separate from the other bedroom.  Apparently other hotels charge for internet and parking.  So very glad that was not the case here.  Walking distance to Disneyland.  I actually used a cab a couple times.  Cost $8.  So no problem with that.  There is an onsite mini store so that was handy.  Would stay here again.  No traffic noise.  The air cond. worked great.  Had no complaints. Close to IHOP, Dennys and McDonalds.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites recently.  Thank you for your great feedback and detailed comments on your stay.  We look forward to you returning to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: Very nice hotel, friendly, prompt service when needed, free upgrade.  They recommended a rental service for a mobility scooter and therefore we received a discount by using their recommendation.  We had a couple issues that were handled promptly.  No resort fee plus free parking, unlike other hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for writing your review from your recent stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warm Regards,

Summary: We had a spacious family suite for two nights which accomodated easily our family of two adults and three kids. Walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventure park main entrance. We even went back to the hotel for a quick break at the pool (which was a bit crowdy, but ok) and returned later to the parks. Parking available. I would definitely recommend the Castle Inn and Suites.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you for your review and recommendation.    We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Room was clean, well stocked and everything worked perfectly. Couldn't find a better deal in town. Beds were comfortable, A/C worked great and surroundings were very quiet. Will most likely stay here every time we go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent review of your stay with us this month.  It was so nice to read that you had the best trip with your family in year's. We hope to continue offering you the best accommodations and best service in the Anaheim Resort if and when your travel plans bring you back to the area.  Once again, thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Fit my price and location requirements perfectly
Summary: Purpose of this trip was a family trip to Disneyland with many generations. Location is two short blocks to Disneyland main gate and California Adventure. I had granny and a 4 year old with me and we got to and from the parks and nearby restaurants by walking quite quickly and easily over the two day park passes. Check in was a breeze, though front desk staff were not as warm and friendly as others have commented. Give them your plate number if you need to park a vehicle because each car gets a parking pass. We flew in though and Castle Inn is the first drop off spot for Supershuttle from SNA and the very last pick up going back to the airport, super convenient and only 20 minutes away. Housekeeping was warm and friendly. Room was clean and spacious. Beds and pillows were comfy.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your Disneyland trip with your family of many generations.  Thank you for your feedback on both your positive area's, and those area's that may require a bit more attention.  All feedback is always welcome, so thank you again.  Thank you for your recommendation of our property, and hope to see you again in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: A second trip, a great experience
Summary: At the offering of a wonderful staff member of Castle Inn And Suites, we returned for another stay to try it again. I must say our experience was so much better than the first! I was extremely pleased with the staff, how courteous and polite they were, even apologizing that our room wasn't ready yet (we arrived early!) and making sure we had everything we needed. Our room was immaculate, we even had cute little towels designed as a basket, and a swan in the different rooms. I must say this experience more than made up for our first trip. Thank you so much!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your feedback from your recent stay with us.  We were very happy to read everything worked out well this time, and we appreciate you giving us another chance.  We hope you will keep Castle Inn & Suites in mind if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Outstanding Service from the time we walked in to checkout.  Thank you Regina and others at the front desk for taking care of whatever we needed, explaining fully the details of late checkout and then allowing us to stay an additional day.  Thank you to the housekeeping staff - Outstanding - for their immediate response to give additional towels, for changing the bedding, for additional blankets.  There was no waiting. We have often stayed at Howard Johnson, Fairfield Inn walking distance to Disneyland, however this trip was at the last minute. It was our first stay to Castle Inn & Suites we needed the room for 6 people three boys and three adults.  I am not sure what it was like in the past, but we appreciated that we had a renovated room, very clean, a bedroom that was
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic feedback from your stay with us in July.  We appreciate your comment on our "Outstanding" service, from the Front Desk to Housekeeping.  This is very much appreciated and shared with our team.  We hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites, if your travel plans once again brings you to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Arrived very late in the evening hoping my sons crib would be ready as I had requested previously. It was not set up but we didn't have to wait long and check in was quick. Good location to Disneyland. A little bit further than I usually like. Pool is nothing great but was pleased that it was salt water and very clean. Fridge wasn't very cold but they did maintenance to it that seemed to make it a little colder. Beds were extremely comfortable and A/C is very cold! Great to come back to and relax. I would recommend staying here for the price.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your Disneyland trip in June.  We appreciate the review and feedback regarding your stay.  If your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort, we hope you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great spot has all you need and more!
Summary: Stayed here by second choice, this is now my preferred and I'll recommend to many! Easy access off fwy, close too all attractions. What impressed me the most- the staff! A HUGE shout to Eric (he does the graveyards) take the time to chat to him, he has some great local knowledge and can help you out! The fact he has worked at Castle Inn for so long is credit to him and Castle Inn benefits from his service! Not to take it away from everyone, I was just blown away by Eric. Well done mate, pleasure to have met you! Alex
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review you posted from your stay with us in July.  We really appreciate the great feedback, and the "shout out" about our team member.    We hope you will return one day to the Anaheim Resort, and make the Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Hotels near Disneyland can vary in price tremendously. But don't pick 100% by price, two of the cheapest are really horrible.  But Castle Inn can be a good selection when the price is right. We have stayed several times, and never a bad experience. Always clean, not a long walk, and decent amenities. No, it's not a ***** hotel by any means, but it has a nice theme.  So, do price shop,but be sure to pick a nice clean comfortable hotel- which this is.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your recent review.  We appreciate the great feedback.  Thank you for being a repeat guest and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: NOT bad, NOT a five star
Summary: overall we needed a hotel with a room that would fit a family of sic comfortably. this hotel did it. plus only a few minutes from Disneyland and great stores, markets, and restaurants. reasonable pricing that's for sure! Hotel was clean and cleaned every morning. Front counter was always very helpful.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent review of your stay with us in June.  Thank you for the feedback, and we hope you will keep us in mind if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My husband and I reserved a parlor suite May 23-25 2014.  When we arrived the clerk upgraded us into a 2 room suite at no additional cost.  It was very nice but we really didn't need 2 rooms. The room looked like it was updated recently.  Things seemed to be clean.  The flat screen TV in the connecting room didn't work My son and daughter in-law had a room 2 doors down the hall and they found a used sanitary napkin under the bed.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I recently stayed here with my boyfriend and it was a wonderful experience. They even upgraded our room! As soon as we entered we were pleasantly suprised by the style of the room, very modern and everything was very clean. At night it was quiet and we had no problems. Very close to Disneyland and many restaurants which was very convenient for us. We had a blast and the customer service was excellent,  very professional and kind. We can't wait to come back for another vacation! Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your recent review of your stay with us earlier this month.  It was nice to hear that your room was upgraded, and you enjoyed our newly renovated guest rooms.  Thank you for mentioning our customer service, we do pride ourselves on this and appreciate you pointing this out.  Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Our stay at the Castle Inn and Suites was awesome! The rooms were great especially for the price.  The staff was very friendly and our rooms were very clean. The beds were comfortable and the pillows were amazing. Usually I do not sleep with the pillows provided but these were great for a good nights sleep after a long day at Disneyland. I love that it was super close to Disneyland and California Adventures. We will definitely be staying there again for our next visit to Disneyland. Thank you for a great stay!!
Manager Response: We appreciate the lovely review you provided on your stay with us earlier this month.  We were glad to read that you enjoyed your room, and found our staff friendly.   We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The Castle Inn and Suites provided a pleasant stay for us. Not a lot of bells and whistles but for the money, the accommodations were great. Our function in life was to hit Disneyland and California Adventures hard for two days and merrily wanted somewhere to get good rest with a good clean pool. Mission accomplished. What catapults the CI &S over other similar hotels were the staff. Not only were they professional but they were personable and sincere as well. When asked about local dining they bent over backwards to make sure we knew what the locals knew. A big thumbs-up goes out to Vincent for going above and beyond from phoning in the reservations to when we checked out. We will be staying there next year!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the great feedback on your stay, including the mention of our staff member.  We hope you will keep Castle Inn & Suites in mind when making future travel plans for the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed in this hotel on our kids first trip to Disneyland. To them it looked like a magical castle had them won over instantly.  The staff we came across throughout were the best, beyond friendly and helpful. Will definitely use this hotel on our next visit as well as recommend to friends and family.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing our "magic castle" for your recent Disneyland trip.  Thank you very much for the great feedback on your stay.    We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: After travelling on a long flight from Australia, we were excited to finally be at our first destination, Castle inn and Suites. Our room was on the first floor near the elevator, which was the worst position as it was very noisy with people walking past in the early hours and late at night, it sounded like a heard of animals running up and down, the room also smelt musky. The room was clean but outdated, location is fantastic as it is in walking distance to great restaurants and Disneyland. If you had children it would be a perfect place as it is affordable. Also I am a tea drinker and when I requested some fresh milk,( did not notice that powdered stuff they put in motels) i was told to buy some. The girl on the desk was abrupt when she told me,thankfully, this is not the
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent review on your stay with us in May.  We are sorry you were placed by the elevator.  We would have moved you immediately had you let us know this was not a good location for you. In May we had a lot of kids attending their graduation celebration at Disneyland, so there was probably more noise than usual.    We currently offer the powder milk for coffee/tea - this is very standard in hotels in the Anaheim area.  We do have a gift shop on property where milk could have been purchased and placed in your refrigerator for your stay. We apologize our staff member did not explain this to you properly.  We hope if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort, you will give the Castle Inn & Suites another try.   Warmest Regards,

Summary: We have used this hotel for many years and have had no complaints.  The staff has always been helpful. The service has always been great!  Have always been pleased with the overall stay on our family Disneyland Trips! Thank you Castle Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for allowing us to be your "go to hotel" while visiting the Disneyland Resort.  We look forward to you returning when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: enjoyed my stay at the Castle
Summary: This is our family choice of hotel to stay at every time we visit Disneyland. The remodeled rooms are very nice, clean, and the staff is very friendly, efficient and helpful especially Alberta!! (I likelike). We also enjoy our stay here at the Castle because of the affordable prices, which makes it possible for us to return to Disneyland ~8 to 12 times a year.  Thank you Castle Inn and Suites and the great staff for making our stay in Anaheim enjoyable and memorable.
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for your review.  We appreciate the time our guests take to provide us their feedback.  We are happy to be your families choice for the Disneyland area.    Again, thank you for being our guest and making the Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home.  Kind Regards,

Summary: After a long drive and fighting California traffic, I was not impressed with the welcome I received when checking in.  The blonde young lady with glasses was not friendly at all.  I had pre-booked and been quoted a specific amount.  She presented me a total that was much higher.  When I asked why there was a difference, she didn't attempt to even figure it out for me.  One of her associates stepped in to figure it out.  Then the manager stepped in.  They acted annoyed while trying to figure out the discrepancy.  They did adjust it to the correct amount, but there was not an apology given.  So that set the tone for our stay.  The exterior of the hotel needs some work.  While walking to our room on the second floor the exterior hallway has some severe bowing.  I almost tripped and
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here with my husband & daughter between the 10th-13th of June 2014.  Upon arrival we were upgraded to a larger room, 115 on the ground floor and we were really thankful for this as we had been travelling for over 24hrs and we were exhausted.  The room was huge, clean with two really comfortable beds.  The location is excellent as its close to the Disneyland entrance with various shops & restaurants close by.  However, on the evening of the 12th we returned to our room to find out that both room keys did not work.  When I approached the staff at reception, they didn't know why the key cards were de-activated & they seemed to be more interested in checking me for ID, then sorting out the issue. And they didn't seem bothered in apologising. Our IDs were in their safety
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for providing your feedback on your recent stay with us.  We were happy we could upgrade you and get you some extra space.  Thank you for the nice feedback on your room and our location.  We are sorry you felt our customer service was less than perfect.  Hotel's have standard operating procedures when it comes to guest safety.  Any guest asking for a key to be re-issued for any reason, would need their ID to be checked against the records on file.  Not only does this protect you the Guest, it protects the Hotel.  If you travel anywhere and a hotel re-issues you a key without checking your ID, you should be very concerned.    Again, we are sorry you felt we did not handle your key situation to your satisfaction.  Sincerely,

Summary: We had reserved this room a month in advanced because we were planning on coming to California adventure. A friend reserved two rooms for us. We arrived around 4-5pm and checked in. I'll admit that the exterior of the hotel made my heart sink. I've stayed at some pretty horrible hotels so I was definitely nervous. They promptly checked us in and we got our keys. 3rd floor. The parking lot seemed too small for the amount of rooms so we ended up parking across the lot (pretty far away from our rooms). We took our stuff up to the rooms and I was pleasantly surprised by the appearance of the interior. It was. Wry nice looking and updated. My only complaint was a stinky skunk smell in our bathroom but we were in such a rush to explore LA and get something to eat we promptly left. We
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to write your review on your stay with us recently.  We are aware our exterior needs a minor face lift, so we are going to be addressing that in the near future.  We just completed the in-room renovations end of last year, and we will be sprucing up the exterior within the next year.  We apologize something was missed by housekeeping in your room.  This is the first of this scenario that has been brought to our attention, so trust that this was an isolated situation and not a usual occurrence at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you again,

Summary: This is not the first time I have stayed at this Hotel but it is the first time since the room renovation. It was a lovely, clean and comfortable room. I found all staff to be very accommodating and respectful. It was great to see that guests are now issued with a parking voucher to place in their  car insuring a parking space. Would I stay here again, yes! I would also recommend this Hotel to friends back in Australia, although I think Graeme Webb highly recommends Castle Inn and Suites to lots of Aussies.
Manager Response: We would like to say Thank You!  Thank you for posting your great feedback from your recent stay with us.  We welcome a lot of Aussies throughout the year, so we are happy you were a new visitor to our Hotel.  Mr. Webb is indeed a long time supporter of the Castle Inn & Suites.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Upon initial view of the exterior of the hotel, I was a little nervous.  It's older and could use a new coat of paint.  However, since I have stayed at just about every hotel near Disneyland, I wanted to give it a fair shot.  Check in was easy and quick.  Got to our family suite (2 rooms with 3 sleeping surfaces - 1 king; 2 queen beds) on the 4th floor.  The suite was clean with plenty of towels.  The beds were fairly comfortable and there were plenty of pillows and room for 2 adults and 2 older children.  There were two sinks which made getting ready easier.  There was a microwave and little fridge.  When we checked in there was very little parking and the parking stalls are tight, but we finally found one (the hotel was booked).  Even though the hotel was full, the rooms were
Manager Response: Thank you so much for posting your review from your recent stay with us.  We recently finished our in-room enhancements and will be addressing our exterior and common area's in the near future.   Thank you for letting us know your Suite was quiet and that our front desk staff was very helpful.  We hope you will keep us in mind when booking future Disneyland trips.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My wife and I are acustomed to high end hotels when we travel, so to say we were annoyed to no end when we arrived at what West Jet vacations said was a great HOTEL close to Disney, that was actually pretty well defined as a motel, would be an understatement.  We checked in and were greeted by Alberta, a very pleasant and welcoming member of the staff.  The room was very large and has a fridge and microwave...we did not make use of these things because the "Garden Walk" has a plethora of fine dining and is only a 5 minute walk away.   The room was clean and fresh, plenty of hot water for our shower and a descent little hot tub and pool.  One thing I would say is a bit of a negative for us other than the usual amenities we are acustomed to, I found it a bit of an inconvenience
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback from your recent stay with us.  We realize we are not the property for everyone, so thank you for giving us a try.  We were happy to read that you found our staff friendly, we offered you a clean room, with plenty of hot water.    Our property is a favorite with WestJet Vacations, but again, we understand you were looking for a different type of property.  Once again, thank you for the opportunity and providing your feedback.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Clean and real good for Disney
Summary: Price was very reasonable. Room seemed to be very clean and smelled clean. Walk was not too far from Disney, about two long blocks. The staff was super friendly and helpful. Room had fridge and microwave and was a good size for four. We would stay again. Excellent mattresses and pillows for my back. Happy!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  We appreciate the review and feedback regarding your stay.  We hope to see you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect spot for walking to Disneyland
Summary: Recently stayed at the Castle Inn with my husband and two children for 4 nights. The outer appearance of the property is a little dated, but the rooms have been remolded and are actually very nice. The decor is nice, and the beds were very comfortable. We had a standard room and it included a microwave and a fridge. This property is two blocks from the entrance to Disneyland and literally right around the corner from any kind of restaurant that you would like. Everything from fast food to high end seafood. The only time that we needed our car was to go the beach or to Walmart grocery which was about a 5 minute drive away and very convenient considering we had the fridge and microwave. This was our first family trip to Disneyland and I was very nervous because I was not familiar
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for your recent feedback from your stay with us.  We will be doing enhancements to the outside of our property as time permits throughout the next year. Thank you for the feedback about our décor and our beds, we really appreciate that.  We hope you will keep us in mind for any future visits to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Checked in Saturday evening, checked out Friday Morning.  Room appeared to be recently renovated and was clean, no stains on sheets, towels or carpets. Beds were firmer than most, but not unacceptably so. Plenty of towels, face towels, wash cloths, and pillows and we use a LOT of pillows. Wifi was so slow as to be unusable.   Staff was VERY accommodating to all of our requests.   Short walk, about 10 minutes, to Disney entrance. Lots of eateries within 5 minute walk.  I would give this place 5 starts if not for the Wifi issue.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent comments from your stay with us this month.  We appreciate the details you provided on the towels and pillow's.  We recently upgraded our Wi-Fi, and are in the process of doing another upgrade, so we are aware of this concern.  Thank you again, and we hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed for one day as we wanted to check out Disneyland. Very happy with everything. The staff were friendly and enjoyable and the room was clean and very well appointed. A ten minute walk to Disneyland and easy access to anything else we needed. We would stay again!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to Disneyland.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Great location, clean and friendly staff.
Summary: Just stayed 3 nights, room was clean with comfortable beds.  About 10 minute walk to Disneyland entrance.  Great value for location.  Front desk is really customer oriented.  Would defenetly stay again.  Only thing would probably be outside needs updating.  When I was looking for a room I saw a lot of hotels charge for parking but parking was free.  Breakfast is not offered but Denny's, Ihop is about 5 minute walk.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate your feedback, and we will be doing some outside refreshments as time allows this year.  We are happy that you enjoyed our rooms and found our staff helpful.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Stayed here for 5 days. They did a great job on the remodel. Furnished nicely and clean. Comfortable bed with lots of fluffy pillows. About a ten minute walk to disneyland. Microwave and fridge even in the standard room.  The fridge wasn't working well but the front desk quickly took care of it after I called .Free parking. Plenty of eating places to choose from even good old Micky D's. The pool and hot tub were clean and there is even a foot and a half wading pool for the little ones. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your Disneyland visit.  Thank you so much for providing your comments.  We appreciate the feedback on our remodeling we completed end of last year.  We do hope you will think of us next time you are in the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed for ten nights in this newly renovated hotel.  It was great.  The rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable.  I am picky about beds and pillows but I was very satisfied.  Our walk to Disneyland took ten minutes at the most.  The staff were all very courteous and helpful.  They couldn't do enough for us and we felt very welcome and at home.  Vincent at the front desk went out of his way to help me with my boarding information for the airport the next day.     We rented two rooms and the door adjoining the two rooms was a great feature.  We will be back!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the great review you provided from your stay with us this month.  Ten nights is a long stay, so it was nice to read that everything worked well for you and your family.  We appreciate the feedback on our staff as we do pride ourselves on top-notch guest service.  Once again, thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time your visit the Happiest Place on Earth.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Best place I've ever stayed while visiting Disneyland!
Summary: The Castle Inn and Suites is a close walk to Disneyland with a nice little store on site.  The rooms were huge and very comfortable..extremely clean!  The best part of it was I left a charger and my KEYS in my room!  Once all the way to Merced on my way home I realized this and I called the Inn. The sent my stuff to me free of charge next day priority mail! Needless to say, I was just tickled that they helped me out so much!  I will stay here for sure the next time my large family and I go to the happiest place on earth  :)  Much thanks  to the friendly staff at Castle Inn and Suites!!!
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you for your lovely review on your recent stay with us.  We were more than happy to return your items you left behind.  We do look forward to you returning in the near future and making the Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home.  Once again, Thank You!  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: I M P R O V E D ! ! ! ! ! !
Summary: This hotel was once run down not only on the outside but the inside as well, at best was a last resort for a cheaper stay if the price was right that was across the street.   Recently I stayed at this hotel after recent renovations to the rooms. Great improvements, staff was very accommodating and if there was an issue it was resolved ASAP!  Great job! Keep the prices low and I will continue to consider this location!  The only issues with this hotel is the outside is still a little run down, the sprinklers have HARD water I had to buff out when I got home, and the elevators seemed to be hit or miss.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent review on your stay with us in May.  We appreciate the feedback regarding our remodeling, and we are looking to continue with enhancements on the exterior throughout the year, so thank you for your feedback with that.  Once again, thank you and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: SUUUUUPER close walking to everything- fantastic eats, the parks, groceries etc. Pool was always clean & the staff were amazing keeping our room clean & the towels well stocked etc. Amazing prices :) Beds were comfy, linens were nice. Kids loved staying in a "castle"!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent review of your stay with us.  It was so nice to read that you and your family enjoyed your stay and the property.  We are pleased that your kids loved staying in a "castle".  We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Good thing its an awesome location
Summary: Arriving to have a desk clerk tell us to move back and wait as I was crowding the counter...1 person? To having a stuffy moldy smelling room. They are very basic, but location is fabulous. The wash and dryer faculties were great, very good price. The decor needs an upgrade, the front is a highlight but the theme doesnt really run throughout the rooms. The rooms are extremely dark and a need to have every lamp on to allow adequate lighting, also very noisy and often bangs on walls gave us a fright from next room, or cleaners trollys rumbling along. The market store on property was great, and the older gentleman was fantastic! So helpful and lovely. Couldnt rate him any higher! Works for a cheaps night stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review.   We are sorry we did not meet your expectations, but thank you for providing your feedback, as we do use all feedback good, bad or indifferent to improve our services and facilities.   Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Can't go wrong with this hotel for your Disney trip. Best Disney value!!!
Summary: Rooms are clean!  Location is just a 10 minutes walk from Disney. Easy to park. Customer service is always top notch. Marc the front desk manager is extremely helpful and goes out of his way to make your stay enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your Disneyland visit.  We appreciate the great feedback on our rooms, and our Front Desk Manager.  It's always appreciated when our guests provide valuable feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: Just returned home after 6 nights at the Castle Inn....we checked in and on going to our room, we decided that the AC was so noisy we wouldnt be able to sleep, so asked for a different room....had to take an upgrade and pay more, so moved to room 306 on 2nd floor. Much better! There was a separate bedroom , lounge and bathroom. So that was fine. We did have a towle rail fall off the wall and you couldnt plug the coffee maker in on the table- had to put it on the floor to reach a plug.....very good location, close to Disneyland, Restaurants, and two grocery stores across the street. Also local buses available on the corner My only negative things were.....1. the reception area has a very musty smell about it and 2. the whole building exterior needs waterblasting (cleaning) Maybe
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your valuable feedback from you stay with us recently.  We are sorry to read that you had some concerns during your stay.  Providing the detailed feedback assisted us in correcting those area's that needed to be addressed.    We recently finished our in-room renovation's, and will begin doing some exterior improvements throughout the year, so thank you again for providing your feedback.  We hope you will consider coming back to stay with us if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed there for 4 nights. It was clean, spacious, close to the park, and had everything we needed in the room. The pool and area was also clean and the staff was friendly. It was awesome for the price we paid.
Manager Response: We wanted to say thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your review and hope to see you again when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Well the hotel looks nothing like the picture it was a dump.! manager was very rude!! then when we got to our room it  smelled horrible I had to change my sheets and in doing so I noticed that the pillow had blood stains horrible !!!!!! My Family and I will not be returning to this dump
Manager Response: We are sorry we did not meet your expectations with your recent stay.  We make all effort to insure our guests have an enjoyable visit.  We do understand we can fall short and we apologize.  Sincerely,

Summary: stayed for a full week for a Disneyland vacation, rooms were clean, location was about a 10 min walk to Disney parks, only negative would be there is no complimentary breakfast as most do in that area,
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for providing your feedback from your visit this month.  We have never provided breakfast, as we feel the complimentary parking, and free Wi-Fi provides a better value to our guest.    Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites, and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: we had a wonderful stay at this hotel. Front desk staff were excellent, room very clean and comfortable pool and hot tub great. I would highly recommend this hotel to others, short walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent feedback from you stay with us recently.  We appreciate your time, and look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: I thought I'd try out this hotel on our recent trip to Disneyland due to a friend's reccomendation. Booked a regular room but had to upgrade to a larger room at the last minute due to an extra person who joined our travelling party and was accomodated.  We were assigned to a room on the 3rd floor next to the elevator and the ice machine and it faced the street.  The room was very sound proof - there was no noise from the street and if someone used the ice machine or the elevator the sound was not loud at all.  The room was spacious, clean, no musty hotel odor. Bathroom clean and spacious. The bed linens were clean, pillows were very nice, bed was comfortable. The cleaning service is very honest.  I had a pouch with my vacation money (all cash) and thought I had lost it at a
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  We appreciate the great feedback you provided.  Thank you for commenting on our Housekeeping staff as well, that was very nice, and we will pass along your comment.  We hope to welcome you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Hotel was recommended by friend and it did not disappoint. Location is great as its very close to Disneyland, public transport and food outlets. The staff were also very helpful. The room was large, clean and beds were very comfortable. We were pleasantly surprised when we checked in and were told we were upgraded to a larger room as we were travelling with 2 teanagers and 2 adults. Although the room was located at the front of hotel we had no problems with outside noise. Having on site laundry also a plus. The only negative is the showerhead, it had low pressure and squirted water everywhere. Overall would stay there again.
Manager Response: We wanted to thank you for your recent comments from your stay with us in May.  It was nice to read all the great feedback you provided.  We wanted to let you know that we have recently upgraded all of the shower heads, so your situation you experienced has been fixed.    Thank you again for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  If your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort, we hope you will keep us in mind.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Booked four rooms for a family vacation and found them all to be very clean comfortable and quite spacious . Only a 5 minute walk to theme parks and next door to some 24 hour food outlets which as we arrived very late and hungry , was very convenient . Seems to have lots of parking ,we didn't need it but would be great if you did . Would happily stay here again .
Manager Response: We wanted to say thank you for taking the time to write your review on your recent stay with us.  It was nice to receive your valuable feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: We were very happy with our stay here.  Nice rooms, good size, clean. We stayed here so we could walk to Disneyland and it was perfect.  Whole family...we had two rooms...said they would stay again. Front desk very nice, knowledgeable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your valuable feedback from your visit with us last month.  We appreciate your time, and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Family room type set up is perfect.
Summary: We had a great stay at the Castle Inn and Suites.  We love the family room set up as the bathroom is between the two sleeping areas.  It is an easy walk to the Disneyland Park.  The service at the front desk was efficient and friendly.  The room was clean.  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your great feedback from you stay with us last month.  It was nice to read that our Family Suite worked well for you and your family.  We appreciate the feedback, and look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Have gone to Disneyland at least 50 times but have never stayed at Castle Inn before.  Booked it because 1) closer hotels were sold out 2) needed a reasonably priced room for 6 people.  The room was beautiful and large - we had one with 2 queens and a pull-out sofa bed and there was plenty of room.  A couple of evenings we stayed at the hotel and played cards on the "dining" table.  Distance-wise, it is a little further away than I prefer to stay from the entrance to Disneyland, but now that my kids are 10+ it was not a problem.  Even my 73-year-old dad was okay with the walk.  Wireless internet in the room was spotty.   Unlike other hotels on the strip, breakfast is NOT provided, but a fridge and microwave in the room made that okay.  The manager of the this hotel was AWESOME!
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for the review you provided on your recent stay with us.  Thank you for choosing our property this time, it looks like you and your family had a nice visit.  We recently upgraded our Wifi system, and currently in the process of upgrading it again.     We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We were very surprised and happy with the accommodations that were provided. We had a 1 bedroom suite which was perfect travelling with my mother! She had her own space and we had our own. Perfect for a family with children as well. Pool and hot tub was great. Service was great and the room was clean.  10 minutes walking distance to the main gate at Disneyland. Amenities near by including IHOP, Dennys, a skywalk mall and other fast food places. Did not encounter much staff but those we talked to were very nice! Only way exceeded expectations is if it included breakfast!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review from you stay with us last November.  We appreciate the nice comments.  We have never included breakfast, and we feel by all our guest feedback, that the free parking, free Wi-Fi and no resort fee is a much better saving's.  We hope with all the restaurants that surround the hotel you can find many options for breakfast each day.    We do hope you will consider returning to the Castle Inn when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great place for family. Within walking distance to Disneyland. Rooms were everything a family could ask for: refrig, coffee maker, ice, great parking. Stayed for three days, and staff maintained clean bathroom (towels, trash) and sleeping area. Would definitely stay again. Front desk employees very welcoming and nice.
Manager Response: A quick note to say thank you for your feedback from you stay with us this month.  It was nice to read that you and your family enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Convenient and great value family suites
Summary: We had eight in our party and stayed in two adjacent family suites.  They were nicely updated and roomy.  Eight had a room with a king sized bed and a room with two queen beds.  The property is located across the street from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites and booking our Family Suites.  It was nice to read that these rooms worked well for you and your family.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: A family of six makes getting hotels an issue. We originally had a reservation for 2 rooms in a different place for an expensive sum when I decided to try the Castle. We had been there before, but not recently. They have done some serious renovating and it shows. The Castle Inn and Suites was perfect for our family. We were able to get a room at the last minute and they gave us a cheaper rate because we were repeat customers. The executive suite was lovely - 2 queen beds and a sofa sleeper. Everything was clean and well kept. We were close to the elevator, but there was no residual noise. The kids enjoyed the pool, jacuzzi and the children's pool. The shower was also very high which is nice for my tall husband. There were 2 clocks so we were able to to let some of the group
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent stay in the Anaheim Resort.  We appreciate the great feedback, and yes, our Parlor Suites and Family Suites are lovely and perfect for families of 6.  We hope you will keep us in mind if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: 4th floor room at rear of property was quiet and private.  The room was very clean and comfortable.  We stayed in a suite with 2 bedrooms, a must with kids.  The water temperature did vary from hot to cold throughout shower without warning, but overall taking everything into account we were very satisfied.
Manager Response: We appreciate the recent comments you provided on your stay with us this month.  It was nice to read that you enjoyed the 4th floor room near the back of the property.    We hope if your plans bring you back to the Disneyland area, you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Enjoyed my stay at the Castle Inn and Suites. The room was very clean and spacious. It definitely was more than what I expected. I recommend the Castle Inn and Suites for a romantic getaway or even a family vacation. The bonus of the stay was how short the walk to Disneyland was.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent review on your stay with us this month.  We appreciate the great feedback and for the recommendation.  We look forward to you returning to the Castle Inn & Suites when your plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Hotel is a 5 - Service is a 10!
Summary: Overall, we highly recommend it for a Disney trip. Love the whimsical facade, it's especially nice all lit up at night. Very quiet outside despite being right on Harbor and the rooms seem well sound-proofed. The property is NOT luxury by any stretch (60's motor-lodge type place) but the rooms are spacious and acceptably clean (NO bedbugs in our room if that's something you obsess about).  The stairwells, elevators and walkways are a little grubby but no more than you'd expect. The grounds have been nicely kept and there are garbage receptacles everywhere - too bad they don't do the same with ash trays. Basic pool area in the parking lot with a 1' deep kiddie pool and a nice, warm hot tub (no sludgy foam on top either!). Parking is free and there is no resort fee.  Internet
Manager Response: Thank you, Thank you, for the fantastic review you posted recently.  We appreciate the attention to detail you provided and all the great feedback you shared.  We do pride ourselves on our guest service, so we very much appreciate you giving us a "10"  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Once again, thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I booked my room online. We spent the day at Ca Adventures. Which was great because we were 2 blocks from the entrance. When we got back from spending the entire day at Ca Adventure, we came to check in and the man behind the desk Angel was awesome! He has such a great attitude, and was so friendly ! We were upgraded to a suite. Which was BEAUTIFUL!! So happy with our stay! I would go back in a min! I highly recommend it!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate your review, and it was nice to read that our location worked well for you.  Thank you also for your comment regarding our staff member.  We do pride ourselves on our top-notch guest service, so thank you for acknowledging this.  We look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: We chose the least expensive option when booking flights and hotel for a week in California.
