Summary: We were very satisfied with the Castle Inn and Suites.  The rooms are large and the tables and chairs made it very family-friendly.  The pool was smallish but did the trick!  The laundry room was a bonus but there was an odor in there...Overall excellent value and just a short walk to the main gates of the happiest place on earth.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent review of your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and our property worked well for you.  We hope to see you again if your plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My husband and I, along with our 2 kids, stayed here the last week of April 2014. Upgraded to an Executive Suite, which was quite reasonably priced and totally worth it. Room was very clean and beds were comfortable. There was a sofa bed, microwave, mini fridge, shower, bath tub and 2 queen beds with lots of pillows. Check in went smoothly and the staff were friendly. Only a 10 min walk to Disneyland! The only downside of this motel was that at night you could really hear the traffic outside since we were facing Harbour Blvd. But after a long day at the park, we had no problem sleeping. We will defiantly stay here again.
Manager Response: We wanted to say thank you for taking the time to write your review from your April stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were glad to read that our Executive Suite worked well for you and your family.  We recently renovated and installed the double-pain window's to minimize the noise from Harbor Blvd., so it was nice to read that it did not affect your sleeping.  Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites, we hope you will return in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I booked this hotel for a one-night stay during a trip to Disneyland over the weekend. The room was clean and spacious (2 queen beds) and featured a nice-sized bathroom as well. It was a short 2-ish block walk to the Disney main gate which was fantastic. Free parking was a wonderful amenity - it was so nice to be able to park and not have to move the car the entire time we were there. Front desk staff was knowledgeable and friendly. I can't speak to pool/hot tub facilities as we did not use them. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your one night stay earlier this month.  It was nice to read that you enjoyed our rooms and would stay here again.    We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Not the best hotel and not the worst
Summary: Rooms were nice and clean, bathroom was not renovated still had an old hotel feel to it.  Outside of hotel very outdated.  No iron in rooms. Comforters gave an old feel to room, usually newly renovated hotels have down comforters.  Location was great for disneyland, lots of noise from upstairs kids running back and forth in their room after 11pm, called the front desk nothing got done about it.  Coffee machine didn't work and was filmy, told front staff never got a replacement.  Not the worst hotel but not near the best either
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback of our property from your recent stay in the Disneyland Resort.  We recently completed our room renovation's, which consists of all new bedding.  We did not go with the traditional "white" bedding that every other hotel uses in the Anaheim Resort, because we are a Castle-Themed Hotel, so we went with the darker rich fabric's and finishing's.  We also have an on-going enhancement project underway, where we are addressing some of the items you mentioned in your review.  We are sorry your single-cup coffee maker did not work upon your arrival, but we do have record that we replaced it for you upon your request.    Once again, thank you for providing your feedback, and we do hope you will keep us in mind if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Regards,

Summary: We booked this hotel after hearing that they had just remodeled all their rooms.  They were very nice and roomy.  Comfy beds, well lit large vanity with granite counter top, and a fabulous location walking distance to Disneyland!  The people were so nice and helpful giving us any info we needed, storing our luggage on our last day and directing us to the time and place for pickup for our bus to the airport to come back home.  We were taking pictures in their cute castle themed lobby and the manager came out and took some of both of us and gave us crowns to wear in the pictures. I felt like it was a very nice and convenient place to stay for the price paid. The pool area is small and basic but was much appreciated when the temperature in the unexpected May heatwave hit 99
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland trip.  We hope you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms.  We enjoy reading that our guest's love our castle-theme lobby, and especially when you can have memorable photo's from your visit.  Our guests enjoy the crowns we hand out on check in.  We look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Sincerely,

Summary: As a Travel Agent and Tour Operator, I must say, The Hotel Castle Inn & Suites went to an extensive renovation and oh Wow!! I was impressed how the rooms look now, very modern and nice! Good Job Castle Inn! This hotel is just across Disney's California Adventure so it is a excellent location! Family oriented.  Congratulations!  Joab Flores Dream Vacation Builders a RTO of SoCal
Manager Response: We would like to say a big thank you for your wonderful review of our property.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming many guests to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My daughter and I have stayed at Castle Inn and Suites on 3 separate occasions now. Each time, with the most recent being April 2024, we are impressed by the friendliness of the staff, the great location for a simple walk to Disneyland,and the value. The rooms are clean and tastefully decorated. I highly recommend this property!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for providing your comments on your recent stay with us.  We were happy to read that you and your daughter have stayed with us before, and that you would highly recommend us, so thank you again for that.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Once again Castle Inn and Suites has made us HAPPY!! We love to stay here. We always feel safe , the rooms are so clean , recently updated and the rooms look fantastic. The walk to the Disneyland resort is a breeze and that's pushing a double stroller!! All of the staff is so friendly and welcoming, very polite. Upon check out my little girls received a crown from the manager and it made their day!! We will be back for sure in June 2014!! We have stayed here over 15 times in 2 years so yeah we love this place!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the lovely review of your recent stay with us.  We appreciate your comments, and it was nice to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We do look forward to welcoming you back in June.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We spent 8 nights here recently and had a wonderful time.  The hotel is close to Disneyland - a 5 minute walk. Close to restaurants if you are sick of park food! The rooms were clean and large enough for us to spread out and make ourselves at home. Staff were friendly and helpful. We would stay here again.  Well done Castle Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write your review on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the nice feedback. It was nice to read that you enjoyed our property, location and nearby restaurants.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I booked this place through kayak.com and then looked at reviews on Yelp, etc. afterward. I was worried, based on some older bad reviews, that I would be in big trouble with my wife. I'm very happy to say we had a GREAT experience here. The room was pretty big (couch with a coffee table, queen bed, nightstands on each side), nice bathroom and shower, good size HDTV. The only negative was the slow WiFi, but we weren't here to sit on the computer, anyway, so it ended up to be not much of a problem.  We were in town for Wondercon. The location is super convenient for both the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland. Walking distance to each. It's nice to get a good parking spot and never have to lose it!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review you provided from your stay with us during Wondercon.  It was nice to read all the nice feedback you gave us.  We appreciate the time our guests take to post their review, so thank you again.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I have traveled to Disneyland a few times over the past few years. This was my first time staying at the Castle Inn and Suites. I was pleasantly surprised. Our room was very clean and large. We had plenty of space to move around and get ready in the morning. It was very quite. We slept great and did not hear anyone. It is close enough to walk (free parking), but just far enough away that we did not have to fight with a crowd to get back to our hotel at night. It is my new place to stay when I come.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland visit.  Thank you for the nice feedback during your stay.  We hope you will keep us in mind when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My self, and wife had a perfect weekend.......very clean.... Next to disneyland... Excellent for big family.... Nephews had a great time at the pool.. Has a grocery store for those morning snacks. Thank you friendly staff.....
Manager Response: Hello from the Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you so much for posting your review on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the time, and hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I stayed here for 2 nights while in Anaheim prior to my daughter's cheer competition.  I have stayed at various hotels in the area over the last few years and was pleasantly surprised.  I'm not typically a motel style room fan as they tend to be loud, however I didn't hear anything!  Our room was great (we had the executive suite), it was large and I loved that the bathroom had a large vanity plus there was a second one right outside the bathroom, so plenty of space for a group of girls to get ready!  The location is fantastic and for that alone I would recommend staying here!  We overlooked the Tower of Terror and it was a short walk to Disney Main Gates.  If you are looking for a great rate and great location without all the frills, this is a great choice.  The pool is small,
Manager Response: We wanted to say a big thank you for your recent comments on your stay with us.  It was so nice to read that you enjoyed your stay, and that the kids thought the Castle theme was "pretty cute".  Thank you also for commenting about our location and view of the Hollywood Tower of Terror building.  We hope if you have future cheer completion's to attend in the Anaheim Resort, you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My husband, mom, 4 & 2 year old, and I stayed at the Castle Inn in Feb. 2014.  We were all in a double queen room and there was plenty of space.  It was the perfect motel for us.  Clean, comfortable, in-expensive (sale on cheap rooms.com), and close enough to walk (10-15 mins.) to the parks and back midday for naps.  It was recently renovated and the rooms look great.  Our kids LOVED the pool area and I loved that they could splash around in the 1.5 ft kiddie pool while I relaxed 3 feet away in the hot tub.  The staff was very friendly and helpful with my questions.  If you are looking for a place to sleep that is close to DL, clean and comfortable- you'll be happy here, but it is not fancy, has doors that open into the parking lot, a pool that is in the middle of the parking
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for providing your comments from your stay with us this month.  We appreciate the review and great feedback.  We do hope you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  We would love to welcome you back any time.  Kind Regards,

Summary: So me and my girlfriend went to Disneyland for my birthday and needed a hotel. My family had stayed there in the past and said they loved it, so I figured now that i'm on my own I'd try it out. When we arrived at the hotel we were greeted by the most friendly staff and they were doing a little photoshoot and asked us to join in. The woman who checked us in was super nice and gave us info on the park and everything since we got there around 11:30am and check in is after 4:00pm. She gave us a parking pass and we parked there while going to Disney for the day, came back after 4 got our key and went to our room. We opened it and it was amazing not like most hotels where its bare minimum. We didnt use the maid service but from the rooms being cleaned when we passed by they said hi
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your lovely comments on your stay with us this month.  It was so nice to read all the lovely things you had to say.  We were very happy you were here on your Birthday, even though we did not know that.  We pride ourselves on our first-class guest service, so thank you so much for taking note of that, and then providing such a detailed review.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Love this hotel, this is the second time we have stayed here. The Castle Inn and Suites in Anaheim was the perfect place for my family to stay over spring break.  The fact that it is across the street from California Adventure and walking distance to the Disneyland Park was great!  The rooms are very comfortable and the staff was wonderful; we requested two rooms next to eachother and were able to get them.  The staff even printed boarding passes for our older kids that had to return home early.  I would definately refer families to stay at this location.  Great customer service, great price, nice rooms!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write your review on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate you being a repeat guest as well, and hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Situated across from Disney Park with choice of restaurants to hand, stayed in double en-suite which was clean and peaceful, nice shop on site. Also a car rental business is located within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your feedback from you stay with us last May.  We hope you will keep us in mind if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Enjoyed our stay, friendly staff and clean rooms!
Summary: After looking at some of reviews for this hotel, I had been skeptical! But it was great, very friendly staff, clean rooms, and definitely walking distance to Disneyland park entrance. There's a store where you can get any basic items that you may need(like sunburn cream, diaper rash cream, etc- things we had forgotten to pack). Will definitely stay here again on our next trip! Thanks Castle Inn and Suites for making our first vacation in USA a cozy and comfortable one!
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to provide a nice review from your stay with us this month.  We are very fortunate to receive such nice review's and feedback from our guest's, so thank you.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Castle Inn and Suites was a great place to stay!  Their rooms were clean (and they came and cleaned them everyday), they were very nice and helpful and it was within walking distance to Disneyland (which is awesome if you have little kids).  I would for sure stay here again!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide your comments on your recent stay with us.  Thank you so much.  It was nice to read that you enjoyed our property and your stay with us this month.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Love this hotel.  Extremely clean and lobby décor is in the Camelot Era.  The price was very reasonable even with a convention in town & this hotel still had available rooms.  Staff members very friendly and accommodating for anything that I needed.   Very quiet & will return to stay at this hotel in the near future.
Manager Response: We appreciate your lovely comments about your stay with us in March.  Thank you for commenting on our lobby décor, and our friendly staff and quiet accommodations.    We look forward to welcoming you back if your plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I stayed here while attending a conference. Although a bit pricy for a motel at $153/night, it was very clean and quiet.  Only issue was a broken showerhead the first day and this was promptly fixed.The only noise at night was from the fireworks at Disney, and it was not an issue.  I would stay here again.  My trip was extended to be a personal trip after the first four days, but I was unable to stay here because they could not accomodate the days I needed.  Other than that, I would have been happy to remain at the Castle Inn for the rest of my time in Anaheim.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for providing your feedback on your recent stay with us.  We understand you were here for a convention in addition to being spring break in Anaheim, so yes, rates vary on seasons in the Anaheim Resort, but it was nice to read you enjoyed your stay with us.    Thank you again,  Kind Regards,

Summary: This stay was to spend time with the grandkids. We went to Disneyland for 3 days. The motel rooms each have their own entrance, such as the motor lodge design. The price was reasonable given the location. It is only 2 blocks to the Disneyland entrance. The rooms were large enough, though we didn't spend too much time in them. The rooms were clean, and taken care on a daily basis.  Some shortfalls of this motel is there is no breakfast provided, no computer available in the lobby; however they do have wi-fi in the rooms. If you want to print out your boarding passes , for a fee, you can do so at the market next to the motel, and upon arriving, the bath tub would not hold water as there was no way to plug the drain. I brought it to the front desks attention, but still was not
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your recent comments on your stay with us in March, we are glad you enjoyed the rooms and our close location to the main entrance. We do provide complimentary boarding pass printing, so had you let us know you needed your boarding passes printed, we would have been happy to assist. We also provide complimentary parking for our guests which can be a huge savings, since most hotels in the area charge for parking.  We thank you again for staying with us, and providing your feedback.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Made a Disneyland vacation even better
Summary: We spent three nights at Castle Inn. Rooms where good size and clean. The staff even arranged our kids stuffed animals on the beds each day while we were off exploring Disneyland. The staff was very friendly and helpful. When we pulled in and the kids saw the pool, it only took them 10 minutes to unload their things and they were in their swimsuits making a mad dash for the pool. What a great hotel, we will definitely be staying there next year!
Manager Response: We appreciate your lovely review of your stay with us in March.  It was nice to read that the kids enjoyed the pool area.  We do hope you will keep us in mind if your plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We just got back from a week stay at Castle Inn. We had 8 rooms and the hotel made sure to have us all together as well Kelly ( so friendly! ) came out and greeted me by name when our group arrived and had all the rooms ready. The rooms are a good size. The wifi was a little slow bit since hotel was full that was understandable. Some rooms complained of shower pressure being a little low. Staff was very friendly and helpful. The walk to Disneyland isn't that long, seems longer after a day in the park. I would stay here again. We were able to arrange late check out for 1 room to allow all our bags and access to beds, fridge and washroom for us all. Great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you, Thank you for taking the time to write your review on your recent stay with us.  We enjoy taking care of our groups, so thank you for your comments.  We do hope when your group returns to the Anaheim Resort in the future, you will keep Castle Inn & Suites in mind.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: A great place to stay for our Disneyland vacation
Summary: We took our large family to Disneyland and the hotel was ready for us ! I had a few concerns before the trip whether or not our hotel would be available upon our arrival as some hotels dont guarantee a room but Castle Inn & Suites contacted me and put my worries to rest. They had our room ready and were very kind. When it was time to go back home I realized I hadnt made a mapquest route for our departure to get back home since we were driving.... so I called the front desk asking if I could use a printer , The lady took her customer service a step further and printed out our route home and brought it to our room. Thank you Castle Inn & Suites for being a memorable part in our vacation.
Manager Response: We thank you for your lovely comments about your stay with us in March.  It was so very nice to read that you enjoyed your stay and we took care of your needs while you were here.  We enjoy going up and above for guest service, so thank you for acknowledging that.  We do hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites when your plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: What a great hotel!  We had a two-room family suite last week while we went to Disneyland.  The room was amazing.  Even my teenage boys loved it.  We were very comfortable with lots of room, the suite was very clean, and the pricing was more than reasonable for the accommodations.  I shopped hotels on line for months before our trip, so I am quite familiar with other rates in the area.  The office staff was so helpful and very courteous.  We will most definitely recommend this hotel to family and friends, and even more definitely will make it the hotel we stay at EVERY time we are in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind words regarding your stay with us recently.  We were happy to read that even your teenage boys enjoyed the Family Suite. We know there are many options in the Anaheim Resort, so thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: Located super close to the Disneyland Parks with just a short walk to the gates. The property was clean and the room was very nice. The price was very reasonable and I like the fact there was free parking and free wifi.  A variety of restaurants are also very close by. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback from your stay with us recently.  Thank you for commenting on our Free Parking and Free Wi-Fi, and how we are surrounding by a variety of restaurants.  We do value our guest feedback, so thank you again.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We just got our annual passes about this time last year and we have been trying different hotels and this one is so far our favorite. It was a very nice hotel and we loved the decor and theme very much. I'm not sure if I had any complaints about the hotel. The bath was a little out dated, but very clean and hot water. Everything was updated and the beds were comfy. We liked that we were close to the elevator. Came back for a mid day break and it was quiet and the baby was able to nap just fine. We forgot water and thought to go down to the little store and the clerk was nice enough to get us an unchilled bottle of water from the back since we were making bottles and it didn't cost an arm and a leg like everything else in the area. The staff was nice and the clerk was nice enough
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to the Disneyland Resort.  As Annual Pass holders we realize there are many choices for hotels, so we appreciate you selecting our property.    We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time you plan to visit Disneyland.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Will not stay here again, will try candy cane or park vue or possibly go back to ramada maingate at the park!
Summary: Stayed here for 3nights in March 2014.  Room was okay, similar to Ramada Maingate  at the Park when we stayed in 2013.  Was very disappointed with the bathtub though, the strainer has lots of rust.   What I did was to clean it myself with a sponge and soap and cleaned it for 5 minutes and most of the rust were removed.    There's a guest laundry which is also very disappointing because the washers are also rusty and dirty, and there's only 3 stackable washers and dryers.  On our way to Disneyland, have noticed also that the fence on the walkway are very rusty, some are even broken already due to rust, it's very dangerous especially for children who love to touch things.  The staff at night are nice, but one staff in the morning, Alberta irritated me a bit cause she asked for the
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback from your stay with us in March.  We understand you will not stay here again, and we understand that.  We just wanted you to know that we appreciate the comments and are addressing each and every one of them.  Thank you again,  Regards,

Summary: This was our 3rd time at the Castle Inn & Suites, and each time just got better and better.  Our room this time was a suite on the 4th floor facing Harbor Blvd./Disneyland.  The room was super spacious, with 2 Queen beds, a sofa sleeper, desk area, frig, microwave, coffee maker, etc. There were 10 soft, fluffy pillows, and the beds were so comfortable.  The double sink was great accommodating 4 people.  All the employees were very pleasant and helpful, from the front desk clerk to the gentleman pushing the laundry cart.  We love the location right across from our favorite place...Disneyland.  Plus any restaurant you want within walking distance.  We highly recommend Castle Inn & Suites when visiting Anaheim.  CJ
Manager Response: We wanted to say a big thank you for writing your review on your recent stay with us.  Loved your tag line " 3rd time is a charm".  We appreciate the time our guests take when writing their reviews, so thank you again.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Kind Regards,

Summary: We chose this hotel for its location.  Within walking distance to Disneyland.   There is a gift shop on site, with all you really need.  Food is also nearby.    The rooms were really nice.  Very comfortable bed and pillows.  Very clean rooms.  Tea/coffee provided.    The team on site are awesome.  They were always helpful and accommodating, especially Angel who really looked after us during our stay.    They make you feel like you matter to their business.    My only small complaint, which I did raise with them was the internet was slow due to them being at max capacity.  Something they are looking at fixing also.   Fantastic stay and so happy with it all.  Would definitely book again and highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the wonderful comments, especially about our customer service.  This is very much appreciated.  We do hope you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed in an Executive Suite for 5 nights while in Anaheim.  We are a family of 6, and having the pull out sofa was perfect for my twin 4 year old boys.  The place was very nice for the rate and our room was pretty recently remodeled so no complaints at all.  From the outside, it looks a little older than it does once your in the room.  We were there over spring break, so the place was packed and parking was tight.  One night I couldn't find a spot and told the front desk.  The clerk told me to take his spot, and he pulled out and parked in the drive so that I could have a spot.  The location was awesome.  You are basically two blocks from the main entrance to Disneyland, Disney California Adventure and Downtown Disney.  My two 4 year old boys were able to walk to Disney each
Manager Response: Hello Family of 6, we are very happy you were "satisfied" with your recent visit to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you so much for providing your feedback and details of your stay, this feedback is always appreciated, and very helpful.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great location if going to Disneyland!!
Summary: Check in was efficient and the reception area nicely furnished and themed (like a castle).  Our room was on the 4th floor.  It had recently been renovated and had 2 very comfortable queen sized beds, cable flat screen TV, nice sized fridge (i.e. not a mini fridge) and nice vanity area.  The bathroom had a bath and shower and WC.  There was no window in the bathroom and it had poor ventilation so there was a little bit of a foisty smell (mainly from the shower curtain).  Always clean though and maid service every day.  There seemed to be a lot of smokers in the non smoking hotel but as they smoke outside their rooms, the smoke did get underneath the sizeable gap underneath the door.   As people pass the room directly in front of a large window, you have to keep the curtains
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for your very detailed review of your stay at the Castle Inn as well as your activity around the Anaheim Resort.  Your feedback is appreciated, and we hope you will keep us in mind if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Thank you again for booking the Castle Inn & Suites!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We have stayed at the Castle Inn before and we had no problem but this time was really great. We noticed right away that it had been upgraded.  The bed was very comfortable.  Each day upon our return from a day at Disneyland our room was all clean and tidy. The front desk help were all very friendly and efficient.  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent Disneyland Resort vacation.  We appreciate your comments and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This hotel is with in walking distance of Disneyland and restaurants.  The kids loved the castle theme.  Rooms are very nice.  The hotel has an outdoor pool, hot tub and kiddie pool. Near the pool is coin-op laundry. There is a gift shop that sales snacks and drinks.  We loved it and would stay again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent feedback from your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are happy your kids enjoyed our castle theme hotel, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: A fine place just to sleep and go to the park.
Summary: For the first time, I tried a "no frills" location that was in walking distance to Disney. I went with zero expectations and was not dissapointed for the price I paid. It was about a 10 minute walk which is 2 blocks and exactly 2 cross walks. The hotel is old and it shows, but seriously who cares as you literally are only there to sleep. Showers are very weak and more like a dribble however it does the job. Be sure to have a shower very early or late when you get back from the park as the water supply can get cold quickly. I wouldn't stay for an extended stay, but for a quick Disney only trip it did the job just fine.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to write your review on your recent stay with us.  We thank you for giving us a try.  We recently finished our room renovations with everything brand new inside, and we will be looking at further enhancements to the exterior throughout the year.  In the meantime, we thank you for choosing us, and hope you will keep us in mind for your next Disneyland trip.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We got this room from our Hotel Tonight app while spending the day at Disneyland. Great price, great location, clean,  well appointed rooms, but I could not believe how noisy it was. I mean I get it we are across the street from Disneyland and there are going to be kids, but the noise started at 6 a.m.....parents really need to teach their kids that there are other people in this world....noise banging screaming and not one parent telling the kids to quiet down ....this was from multiple guests...so if you have kids this is the place to go. If you go to Disney without kids, and go to Downtown Disney after the park closes for a bite and a beer and think you're going to sleep in a bit, forget about it.!!...noisy as hell!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review on your visit to the Disneyland Resort.  We appreciate the feedback, and hope you can return to the Disneyland Resort in a quieter season to experience everything the resort has to offer.  Once again, thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Been there many times, will go back
Summary: Have used the Castle Inn at least 8 times in the last 10 years.  Castle Inn is within walking distance of the Anaheim Convention Center (my reason for stay) and Disneyland.  The Castle Inn is a great "bang for the buck".  Place is clean, quiet, well run, pleasant staff, nice pool and jacuzzi, adequate parking, extremely convenient to much of the heart of Disney/Anaheim convention.  Rooms have recently been remodeled.  Nice clean touches.  If you are looking for a concierge, then choose another hotel and pay 2-3 times the price.  If you are looking for clean, quiet, nice, and affordable near all amenities, then choose the Castle Inn.  No fitness center, no restaurant, but plenty of similar nearby to keep you occupied.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your lovely comments regarding your stay with us recently.  We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to you returning to the Castle Inn & Suites when you come back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great Value & Perfect Location - Across from Disneyland!
Summary: This was our first time staying at the Castle Inn & Suites in Anaheim.  I don't know how we missed this place before!  We usually stay up the street at the Fairfield Inn.  But, it was just too expensive.  We discovered Castle Inn & Suites on-line and read mostly positive reviews.  The price was definitely a lot better than other hotels in the area with the accommodations we were looking lot.  So we thought we would give it a try.  The room was large and had 2 queen beds, microwave, frig, coffee pot and an sitting area.  The largest room of any of the other hotels we have stayed at on Harbor Blvd.  It was very quiet at night.  The staff was pleasant and helpful. Location was perfect!  There are several restaurants right next door - something for everyone in our family.  We will
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for your kind words from your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you for choosing us, and thank you for saying you will return to the hotel in the future.  We appreciate it when our guests take the time to provide their feedback, so thank you very much.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The location of the hotel was perfect for attending the Anaheim Convention Center and local restaurants.  The room (suite) was very spacious and comfortable and the staff was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for providing a review on your stay with us during the Religious Education Congress.  We hope you will keep us in mind next year if you are planning to attend the conference in 2015.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a Disneyland visit!
Summary: Just got back from spending 4 nights at the Castle Inn and Suites.  Were there for a birthday trip to Disneyland for my daughter.  The location was great!  It was so close that my 4 year old had no issues walking back after spending long days at the parks.  The room was basic, but comfortable.  My only issue was that we both got really stuffed up over night.  Not sure if they allow pets, but we do both have pet allergies, so that would explain it.  The beds were comfortable.  We didn't spend a whole lot of time at the hotel.  We did go into the pool the first night, and were happy with it. There is a larger pool, a kids pool, and a hot tub, which was nice.  We would definitely recommend this hotel for Disneyland trips!!  We will also most likely be staying here again on our next
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your feedback on your stay with us in March.  We were glad our property worked well for you and your families.  We do not allow pet's at our hotel, unless they are service animals, but we appreciate your feedback and time, and hope you will keep us in mind for future travel in the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Pros: -10 min walk to Disneyland. -Free parking -low cost -atmosphere for kids ( it's a castle with cute swan towels lol)  Cons: -No shuttle service from the hotel  -No complementary breakfast -outside looks pretty run down (i.e. Walkway to rooms sloped and had bumps up in odd places feeling unstable and kinda scary)  In conclusion: We stayed here because my husband gets discount from his work but i plan to find a different hotel for our next trip that has complimentary breakfast and/or shuttle service for close to the same price.  Overall, it was good enough.  Cleaning service was good!
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for taking the time to provide your pro's and con's on your visit with us in March.  We appreciate the feedback and are addressing some of the item's you mentioned.  We have never provided breakfast at our property, and most guest's enjoy the opportunity to choose their breakfast location and have this on their own.  The Hotels on Harbor Blvd. are considered "walking hotel's" so we are not part of the Anaheim Resort Transit. The majority of our guests do enjoy the short walk to the main entrance, but we understand this may not work for everyone.  Once again, we appreciate your time and feedback.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The outside of this hotel makes it look old and run down but in the room, I felt as if I was staying at the Hilton! The bathroom light was a bit "stressful" as it kept blinking which becomes annoying while taking a shower. I'm sure I just had to make a phone call but didn't want to bother with that. I wouldn't mind staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your informative feedback on your stay with us this past December.  We are looking to do further improvements to our exterior, as we just completed the room renovations, so thank you for your comments this is very appreciated.  We hope you will keep Castle Inn & Suites in mind if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: The hotel was in a great location. Two block walk to the main entrance of Disneyland. Also close to a convenience and small grocery store. The room was spacious and nicely decorated. The staff was friendly and we saved time buying our Disney tickets at the front desk. Would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for your feedback on your stay with us this past March.  We appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Gave this place another try after our previous experience where the rooms matched the tatty ancient exterior.  Rooms are now redone to a 3.5 star level. Clean, generally okay. The exterior is beat, run down and honestly most likely impossible to rehab as its trapped in an early 70's castle theme. As much as price minded adults hate it, kids do love it.   Staff is generally apathetic.  Front desk staff more or less useless, grumpy and have an attitude especially the night guy named Angel.  Remedy would be to fire all the staff and gut the exterior.  Since this probably wouldn't happen any time soon, lower your expectations and you won't face disappointment.   Proximity to disneyland is good. 5 minute walk.
Manager Response: We wanted to thank you for your candid review of your stay with us in January.  We do our best to accommodate our guest's and realize some times we may fall short.   We appreciate your comments, we read them and use feedback like yours to continue with our hotel improvements and guest service.  Thank you again,

Summary: I stayed at the Castle by myself. My family was down the street. The staff was very accommodating and friendly. I felt very at home. The rooms were very comfortable and great price. I bought a combo package with hotel and tickets for Disneyland. Would gladly stay there again. Thank you for the nice mini vacation!!!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your recent review.  We appreciate your comments and look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: What would be better than hotel, which looks like castle :)
Summary: We stayed in this hotel few nights on October 2013.   I have to say, that if you want to visit in Disney area, location can't be better.  if you want to go by foot, that doesn't take too long. We didn't use shuttles because we just dropped by the Disney downtown area.    In any case, hotel has good location. Main thing we stayed in Anaheim, was the Ducks NHL game. We asked from reception, that could they arrange ride / taxi for us before the game.  No fuss, everything got settled out in no time. Taxi picked us up and drove us to destination. If i remember correct , it was a quite cheap trip :)   Hotel rooms were clean and quite spacious. We were positively surprised about the overall quality.   One good thing was also the pool area at the inner yard. There were no big buildings
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write your review on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the detailed feedback and it was nice to read that we were able to assist you with your transportation to the hockey game.  It was also nice to read that you enjoyed the pool area and were able to get some sun while you were here.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The rooms were clean with the exception of lipstick on one of the pillows which we tossed on the floor- who knows it was probably stained.. However when I called I asked for a first floor room.. We got a third... I did have to redo our reservation which could be why... However the air conditioner in room 352 leaked on the floor and made It wet which got into a lot of our stuff we had in there.. The evelator closest to our room stopped working multiple times... So it was either walk to the one further away or up and down stairs with 4 young children... The staff was rude... Our room was not ready when we went to get the room key at 4 pm, had to wait for it and the staff member kept checking the computer and asking the manager about "that family suite" which leads me to believe it
Manager Response: We wanted to thank you for providing your feedback on your recent stay with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay.  We will share your comments with our staff, as we always strive to insure we are providing first-class service at all times.  We hope you will consider giving the Hotel another opportunity if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.   Sincerely,

Summary: Had a great one night stay in a suite here staff was very tentative always asked if anything was need and quick to respond to request quick check in and out and so close to Disney and ihop right next door
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent review.  We appreciate the feedback and hope to welcome you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great Hotel. Perfect for those going to Disneyland
Summary: We decided to stay at this hotel, due to the close proximity to Disneyland and because it was affordable. We arrived early, so that we could park there, and walk to DL.  The staff were very helpful and issued us our parking pass. (Cannot beat free parking) At the end of a long day at Disneyland, we arrived back at the hotel to pick up our keys.  We were told that they upgraded us to a suite.  How awesome was that. The rooms are newly remodeled, and very nice. The towels shaped like swans was just another nice touch.  We checked out the next morning before heading to California Adventure, and asked if we could keep our car there for the day. They checked their schedule, and granted us another day of free parking. This kind of customer service is rare these days.  We will stay
Manager Response: We wanted to say thank you so much for taking the time to write your review on your recent stay with us.  We thank you for the feedback. It was nice to read that you enjoyed our towel art as well.  We enjoy doing the extra touches our guests seem to appreciate.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hotel when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: What a great week thanks to Castle Inn and Suites!!
Summary: We just returned from a week long stay at this hotel, what a great choice we made to stay there!! The renovated rooms were spacious and very, very clean!! After a long day at the parks it was so nice to return to a clean, quiet and very comfortable room. The front desk staff were very friendly and so helpful when we wanted to book tours. I would definately recommend this hotel to others!
Manager Response: A quick note to thank you for posting your review on your week long stay with us.  We appreciate your kind words and feedback regarding our rooms and staff.    We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I had heard that we might be disappointed with this property because it was older. We were pleasantly surprised to find the rooms remodeled and overall really clean. We stayed for 3 nights and went to Disneyland every morning. When we returned at night (often very late with tired kids), we found that when housekeeping had serviced our room, they had arranged the toys our kids had left out in funny poses and/or in funny places in our room. The girls loved it! And they looked forward to coming back each day to see what the toys had been up to while we were gone. That alone added to our Disney experience, making it that much more magical for our girls - they literally enjoyed every minute.   My two negative thoughts would be 1. There was a very large gap from the bottom of the
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us, this was fantastic.  We so appreciate you taking the time to write your review.  Our housekeeping staff has been with us for many year's and they definitely take pride in their job, so thank you again for providing your experience you had,  this is very much appreciated.  We look forward to you returning to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Can't wait for our next Disneyland trip!!
Summary: I booked my stay in the castle Inn and suites weeks ago for our next visit to Disneyland.  We have had a great experience every time we have stayed at the castle.  We feel very safe, the short walk to the park is doable, the staff are courteous and efficient, and the rooms well priced and very nice.  We love the decor in the lobby and grounds.  We love this hotel!  Thanks Castle Inn for making our trip every more fun!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words about the Castle Inn & Suites. We are glad you enjoy the unique décor of the lobby and grounds. We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: I really enjoyed staying at this hotel so much we are making it our go-to hotel for Disney Vacations!!!  We loved the new rooms and feel to the upgrades they are making here. There is a kiddo pool and a hot tub and regular pool all next to each other and they were very clean.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to review the Castle Inn & Suites. We are happy to hear you will be a return guest on your next vacation to the Disney Parks. We 'LOVE LOVE LOVE' your kind words about our new upgraded rooms.

Summary: This room was a pleasant surprise. We usually stay in higher end hotels, so I was a little nervous about this place. But, the reviews were good so we decided we would take a chance since it was just a Short walk to the entrance for Disney. We had booked it last minute, so we had paid a little bit too much for flights and decided to save money on the room. We truly had a wonderful stay. The staff were so friendly, the cleaners did a great job with the rooms, we enjoyed the hot tub every night as our feet were very sore from all the walking every day. It was a very enjoyable time. Our room was on the fourth floor near the road and the office. The rooms were soundproofed very well. Rooms have been recently refurbished and were quite large we even had a couch, fridge, and microwave.
Manager Response: We would like to say a big thank you for taking the time to write your review on your stay with us in February.  It was nice to read you "took a chance" on us and that your stay was enjoyable.  We do hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites when you plan your next Disneyland trip.  Thank you again,  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We have stayed here multiple times when we go to Disneyland.  The staff is great and the rooms are clean.  We got a suite last time and the pull out bed was very uncomfortable but I saw the rooms were remodeled so thought we would try it again but still the same problem.  I will stay here again but next time if we have more than 3 people I will probably get 2 rooms. The staff that work here make it worth the cost of getting the additional room if needed.  My granddaughter loves staying in the castle and it is such a close walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review on your stay with us last month.  We also would like to thank you for becoming a repeat guest.  We were sorry to read you had some concerns with our Parlor Suite sofa beds.  They are brand new and may not be the perfect fit for everyone, so we totally understand.  Please let us know when you do plan on returning, as we enjoy welcoming our repeat guests back to the Hotel.  Once again, thank you for your feedback it is very helpful and appreciated.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The choice made by WestJet and a travel agent in Vancouver, BC provided us with a terrific place to stay when we went to  Disneyland at the beginning of February.  Clean, bright, modern, comfortable, and QUIET, well staffed by co-operative individuals made this holiday stop a real bonus to our visit.  A 20 minute walk to Disneyland, along with close-by restaurants, liquor and corner stores, added to the convenience of nearby bus stops and car parking.  "Going the extra mile" seemed to be the rule of the staff, with suggestions, helpful actions, and warm, friendly smiles, making us glad it was our home away from home - day or night.    .  .
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your wonderful review on your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your kind words and feedback and will share this with our team.   We are happy you will consider the Castle Inn & Suites your home away from home on any future visits to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect Place to Stay for Disneyland
Summary: Castle Inn and Suites was the perfect place to stay for our big family. The rooms have recently been redone and look great and were very clean. We stayed in a family suite and it was nice and big. The hotel  was a close walk to Disneyland and the parking is free which is hard to find in the area. The staff was very nice, we will stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for feedback on your stay with us in February.  We are happy you have made us the perfect place to stay for your family, and look forward to you returning to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here last week.  Staff were very friendly.  Room was very nice and clean.  Maids did a good job.  Good location.  Pool area was nice.  Parking was limited..  Free wi-fi.  Would definately stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for posting a very nice review on your recent stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: The Castle Inn is incredibly convenient across the street from the park entrance and a block down.  More than that, it looks like a castle and my girls (princesses) were particularly thrilled about that.  They have a nice shop with the essentials for hotel stays, soda, milk, toiletries, snacks, souvenirs, etc.  The hotel has undergone renovations and improvements and looks and feels great.  the front office staff were all very nice and helpful, even allowing us to store luggage in a secured room after we checked out so we could enjoy the afternoon in the park before getting our bags to go to the airport.  The owner greeted us and made us feel very welcome and appreciated.    We've stayed at several locations near Disney when we visit and we've been spoiled with the Castle Inn
Manager Response: We wanted to say a very big "Thank You" for your lovely review on your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We pride ourselves on our guest service and we appreciate you making note of that.  Thank you also for commenting on our rooms, we are happy they made you "feel great".  It was also nice to read that we have "spoiled you" and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Anaheim Castle Inn and Suites was perfect for our family. Hotel was mere minutes from Disneyland,very clean and comfortable,with cute little touches(towels folded to look like swans). The staff was super helpful and friendly. Read some other reviews and just have to say again that our room was very clean.It could be a bit noisy,being right by the street and all,but not so much that it actually bothered us. We will return on our next trip to Disneyland :-)
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for posting your feedback on your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you for noticing our swan towel art, our staff enjoy doing the "little extras".   We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hotel when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at Castle Inn and Suites during our trip to Disneyland in Dec 2013 and for the price we paid, we were quite satisfied. Mainly we were looking for a clean place to stay, with free Wi-Fi, and located very close to Disneyland (~10 min walk) and we were certainly not disappointed. The room has all the basic amenities you would need.  Cons - no safe in the room for valuables and the elevators are a bit slow
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for providing your comments on your stay with us last December.  We appreciate that our location, cleanliness and free wi fi worked well for you and your family.  Thank you for the comment regarding the in-room safes, we are looking at our options for this amenity.  Our elevators have been serviced and running well since your last visit.  We hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: I have stayed here probably 6 times over the last ten years.  While it has always been a good hotel at a good price, the room renovations just completed make it an even better way to visit Disneyland. Beds are very comfortable and staff is very courteous and responsive.  The short walk to the park and free parking make it the best value for your Disney stay.
Manager Response: We wanted to say thank you for your lovely review you recently posted from your visit in February.  It was nice to read our value and new rooms worked well for you and your family.   Thank you also for commenting on our courteous staff.  We hope you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind when booking your next Disneyland trip.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I got a package flight + hotel deal that included Castle Inn and Suites and it far exceeded my expectations. The hotel is just about as close to the enterance of Disneyland as you can get, as well as close to many restaurants and shops. The room had been newly remodelled and was spacious and clean and included a microwave, fridge, t.v, and coffee maker. We had a fourth floor room near the elevator, and it was very quiet throughout the day and night. There is also an outdoor pool, but we did not use it.  Above all else I must pay highest compliments to the staff. They were incredibly friendly and helpful, and had 24 hour service. The housekeeping also did a stellar job, leaving towels shaped as swans as well as other small touches that made the stay special.   All that being
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for the very detailed feedback on your recent stay with us.  Your comments were very much appreciated.  We will certainly pass along your feedback to our friendly staff.  We do pride ourselves on our Guest Service so thank you for mentioning this.  Our housekeeping staff enjoy providing the little extras like "towel art", so thank you for noticing.  We just completed installation of all new door locks, so we no longer have the "outdated" locks in place.  We were happy to read that you felt comfortable during your stay and that our value was important.  Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Ok for the money, Get What You Pay For
Summary: Old style rooms, The keys for the rooms are old school, we didn't feel we could leave anything of value in the rooms, The gift shop is a rip off 1.95 for a pack of gum, The rooms had a old musty smell had to go to target and buy room spray. Walls are paper thin you can hear everything above you and on both sides of you we were on the first floor. Parking also a problem can't park by your room unless you don't drive your car all day. also front desk upon check in we're not very nice. Would pay more money next time as the old saying goes you get what you pay for!!!!!!!!!! Beds were old and hard.
Manager Response: We wanted to thank you for your recent feedback on your stay with us in February.  We just completed a multi-million dollar renovation in October 2013,  which included all new furniture, fabrics, bedding, mattress, carpet, tile etc. We stayed with the darker rich fabrics and finishing's since we have the "castle theme" as the white fabric's, or more modern furniture would not blend well with our property.  We also just completed the installation of all new radio frequency door looks, so the "old school" door locks are now completely updated.   We are sorry we fell short in your guest experience. We appreciate we may not be the hotel for all guest's, but we would like you to consider giving us another opportunity if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Nice location, friendly staff, and a good value!
Summary: I'd always wanted to stay here; driving down Harbor to Disneyland it always looked so impressive and cool! The location is nice--just about two blocks from Disneyland, so no paying for parking if you're willing to walk back after the park. The desk was even nice enough to let us park a second car for free, though you're only supposed to get one free parked car per room (my friend was driving in from Arizona and they said it was fine for the first night, but they were fully booked the second night and other accommodations would need to be made--the GardenWalk around the corner does overnight parking for a fee if you need a second spot). The manager was incredibly nice and helpful; he was the one who checked us out and he apologized for the air conditioner unit we had that was
Manager Response: We wanted to say "thank you" for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites on your recent visit to the Disneyland Resort.  We liked your comment about " always wanting to stay here".  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Once again, thank you  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great value next to Disney Parks!
Summary: It's always difficult to find a quality hotel within short walking distance of the Disney Parks. After comparing all the hotels in the area, Castle Inn was the best choice based on price and walking distance. It was literally only a 10 minute walk to Disneyland. The rooms were renovated last year, and it shows. Very spacious, clean and comfortable. Never had to ask for extra towels, pillows or blankets. Plenty in the room. There is also a store that sells food, gifts, and miscellaneous items in case you forgot something. Dennys and IHOP are 5 minutes away. All in all, a great location with comfort and value.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for writing your recent review on your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your feedback, and it was nice to read you enjoyed your stay and our property.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We recently stayed at the castle inn the night before we ran the Tinkerbell Half Marathon. Here are the pros and cons: Pros- close walk to Disneyland/ starting line Clean room Decent size room  Cons- we told the women at front desk that we were running a race early in the morning and we were still placed right next to the ice machine, which kept us up all night The bath tub clogged when I took a shower When we told the man at checkout how unhappy we were with our room he didn't care
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites during the Tinker Bell Marathon.  We appreciate your feedback on your stay, and hope you will consider returning to the Castle Inn if you plan to run in the Tinker Bell Marathon again.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Really a wonderful place.  Great service, and the new rooms are nice!
Summary: I just stayed over at the Castle Inn last Saturday night.  I needed to be in Anaheim for business, and am familiar with this property as I have stayed there in the past.  I have to say, the staff is reall good.  As I checked in, Mark (front office manager) was super helpful, and also really friendly.  The rest of the front desk staff are also really good.  I have been there many times over the last few years, and it seems like many of the same folks have been there for a while, and the are all really customer focused.  The location was really convenient as I had a dinner meeting in Downtown Disney.  The hotel is just down the street from the main gate, and is an easy walk.  For me, for business or for getting to Disneyland, the location is really the best.  One last thing.  This
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent review on your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites in January.  Thank you for commenting on our friendly staff, we have many staff members that have been with us for many, many years, so thank you again for acknowledging that.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Great stay in a gorgeous, newly remodeled room. Mini-fridge, microwave, coffee maker, convenient parking made this a very enjoyable stay! Oh, and the bed and pillows made for a very sound sleep. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your January visit to the Anaheim Resort.  We appreciate the great feedback, and it was so nice to read that you had an enjoyable visit and you enjoyed our new "gorgeous" rooms.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Sincerely,

Summary: In the past I have bypassed this property due to poor reviews. The new remodel has made a huge difference in recent reviews, so we took a chance! This was a basic property--no frills--which is really all we needed for a good nights sleep after spending all day in the parks. Unexpectedly, this property was also ideally located for our early morning walk to the start of the Tinkerbell 1/2 Marathon! The rooms were clean and the remodel updated the bedding and overall look, based on earlier photos I have viewed. The only 'concern' I had was that there was a huge gap under the entry door, making me a bit concerned about easy access for critters. That being said, I never saw a single bug. We stayed in room 123 which was a perfect location, ground floor, and easy in and out. I would
Manager Response: We would like to say Thank You for posting your comments on your stay with us last month.  Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn for your Tinker Bell Marathon visit.  It was nice to read that our property and new renovations provided a positive stay.  We hope you will return to the Castle Inn when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed here in mid-December for a vacation to Disneyland. We needed a place to sleep, a refrigerator and a bathroom. This motel was great. Clean, new and convenient. A quick walk to the front gates of Disneyland.  Pros-close to DL, FREE parking and plenty of it, fridge and microwave in the room, reasonable price. The savings with free parking and no resort fee is a huge advantage.  Cons-slow elevators and only 2-3 of them for a large property, small coffee maker (only can use their bag of coffee each day), kind of small room. Not a big deal, we didn't spend a lot of time there.  For what we needed this motel worked out well. Employees were fine, nothing super warm or friendly, but pleasant and got the job done well. We would stay again . Thanks!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide your feedback on your stay with us this past December.  Thank you for providing your pro's and con's.  Feedback is always welcome and we share this with our team so we can always look to improve in areas where needed.  Thank you again,  Kind Regards,

Summary: Hotel room quite spacious and booked this hotel as was close to Disneyland, California Adventure Park and downtown Disney. Also the fact of a microwave and fridge as I brought quite a bit of food from Australia for the kids as we are touring round. 3 nights here. Beds are extremely comfy. Asked for a room at back of hotel so wasn't noisy from the street traffic. We had 4th floor back balcony. No traffic noise bit the first night there was a street person rummaging thru the bins which is just below us in carpark. He was very noisy throwing rubbish etc to collect bottles or cans. He was on a push bike and think he is a regular as he carefully closed the gate back etc. this was after midnight and woke me out of a sleep. The. The last morning a guy ran up from street onto our top
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for your recent review of your stay with us in January.  We appreciate your feedback, as well as recommending us.  We do hope to see you again if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We made a last minute decision to stay in the area for New Year's Eve with no prior planning and were able to get the final room in the hotel.  It had two double beds in the back and a living area with pullout couch in the front.  One bathroom was situated in the middle and each area had it's own television.  For larger parties, there was enough room where you would not be on top of each other, but the single bathroom may provide a problem, especially in the morning.  The decor was dark and dated.  It felt like we walked into the 70's.  The room keys are plastic hole-punched, so we did wonder if those were ever changed.  If you are there for Disney, the location is a short walk to the park.  There are ample restaurants of varying price ranges in the neighborhood, however, all
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for providing your feedback on your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We recently completed a multi-million dollar renovation of all guest rooms, which include rich fabrics and furnishings.  Our Castle theme we feel, does not warrant the sterile-white bedding most hotels use these days.  We appreciate the darker, warm finishing's to compliment the Castle décor.  All furniture in our guest rooms is top-of the line, 2013, Thomasville furniture all made in the USA.  Next month, we begin our door lock project which includes state of the art radio-frequency door locks.  In regards to our parking, most Hotel guests park their cars and walk around the Anaheim Resort, those that drive in/out may not find the same parking spot, but we have ample parking for all guests.  We hope you can appreciate the fact, that we are one of the few hotels in Anaheim that still provide complimentary parking.  We hope you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind when booking your next Disneyland holiday.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Fresh and clean and overall great!!
Summary: The hotel is newly remodeled and it's great !! Our family has enjoyed staying here for 6 separate Disneyland trips and each stay here has been wonderful ! We have never had any problems with any of the rooms everything has always been great and now that they're remodeled the prices didn't skyrocket and still no charge for parking . The best thing is that it's walking distance to the park and that's pushing a double stroller with no difficulty getting back to the hotel .
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent comments from your stay with us this month.  We thank you for being a valued repeat guest, and of course, look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  We are very happy we can continue to provide complimentary parking, and to insure our rates continue to be a good value.  Thank you again, we'll see you next time at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The room was clean, good size with amenities such as microwave, mini fridge and coffee maker. The hotel is a six minute walk from Disneyland. Perfect location. There are several restaurants within walking distance too. The only negative was a squeak in the bathroom door and it can be a bit loud with the kids coming and going. Overall a very good experience. The front desk manager Marc have great suggestions about Disneyland and California Adventure.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent review of your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites this month.  It was nice to read that our rooms and location worked well for you and your family.  We apologize about the squeaky bathroom door, so we do hope you reported this, as it would have been an easy fix.  We just completed a renovation of all guest rooms, which included all new door's.  We do hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites when your plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We were very impressed with our room.  We booked a family suite as we have two teenage boys and it was great that they had a separate room, each with their own queen sized bed.  They were able to shut the door to their room at the end of a long day and turn on their flat screen TV, while my husband and I could also relax and watch our TV late at night without disturbing the boys.  The room was kept very clean and tidy and well-serviced every day.   We found the reception staff extremely accommodating.  They were kind enough to give us a slightly later check-out time at no extra charge, as we weren't being picked up for our trip home until later in the evening, and once we had checked out in the afternoon they kindly stored all our luggage in a secure area so we could revisit
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent review on your stay with us this month.  We appreciate your great feedback and comments.  It was nice to read that our Family Suite worked well for you and your family, as well as our location, and our staff was very accommodating.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites if and when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We are a large family and need adjoining rooms to accommodate our family. We have tried many other places and this is the best! Very reasonable rates, clean, super close walking distance, great service, free parking, free wifi. The staff is super accommodating and wonderful to work with. One day we stayed back at the hotel later and one of the housekeepers came later and cleaned our room when we were gone. She was also super sweet about it!
Manager Response: We would like to take this time to thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your Disneyland trip this past December.  It was nice to read that you enjoyed our property and staff.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great spot for a family Disney vacation!
Summary: We took our chances booking as some reviews were not as great but we were pleasantly surprised and loved our room. They are large remodeled rooms in great condition. Beds were ok and rooms were clean and neat. We are actually staying there again in March for another Disney trip and look forward to it. Only about 8-10 mins to Disney. Not bad at all. Lots to eat around and you don't even have to move your car. Everything is walking distance :)
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for your recent review of your stay with us from November.  We have received many positive reviews over the past few months, and appreciate all of our guest's feedback.  We recently completed a multi-million dollar renovation of all our guest rooms, so everything inside our rooms is brand new, including top of the line Thomasville furniture all made in the USA.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in March.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Room was very clean.  Decor a bit dark, but bed comfortable.  Staff are friendly & accommodating.  As mentioned in previous review, the outside is nothing special, but if you're there for Disney, no problem.  Easy 2 block walk.  There are closer hotels, but I imagine also more money.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review on your stay with us from November.  Because we are a castle-theme hotel, we selected the rich, darker fabrics & finishing's to compliment our castle-theme.  We realize that all guest's may not like the darker colors, but everything is brand new and all furniture made in the USA.  The Castle Inn is a 4-storey property offering 2 elevators for your convenience.  We hope you will consider us again when booking your next Disneyland vacation.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Close to Disney, funky exterior, rooms okay
Summary: We loved being able to walk to Disney, but there are closer hotels.  The pool and and hotel exteriors and walkways are pretty funky.  I would give the exterior a one star and the room a two and a half to three star.  The beds are comfortable.  The room was nice looking, clean and newly redone.  The room was surprisingly nice after the poorly maintained exterior.  The hotel room has a fridge and the room was pretty quiet.  There is no restaurant on site but there are several very close.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking a moment to write your review on your stay with us this month. We thank you for your feedback and thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your Disneyland trip.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Love the changes. Disney Area Perfect.
Summary: We arrived on December 27th and checked out January 3rd.  Perfect stay.  We stayed 2 years ago and what a surprise to find it remodeled!! Check in was quick and easy.  We were told to check our room for our extra towel requests. The towels were there.  We had room 459.   This is a family suite.  Plenty of moving around space and storage space. 2 queens and a king bed.  The room came with a microwave and fridge. Perfect for morning breakfast.   The hotel is a 10 minute walk to Disney and 5 minute walk to Anaheim Garden Walk.  We were able to see fireworks from our room.   The only issues we had were parking.  Doesn't seem they have enough space per rooms offered.    The elevator closest to room 459 was messed up one day and my husband was stuck  inside briefly.  We used the
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you very much for selecting the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were thrilled to read that you enjoyed your Family Suite and found all of our services and amenities up to par.  We apologize for the inconvenience with the elevator.  Our elevator's since your visit have been serviced and working fine.  We do hope to welcome you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My family and I stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites in Anaheim in November.  We really enjoyed our stay there!  It was an easy walk to Disneyland (about 10 minutes with kids).  There is a Subway and a pizza place just steps away and the Gardenwalk is only 5 minutes away with more options for dining such as Bubba Gumps, Johnny Rockets and California Pizza Kitchen.  We stayed in a newly renovated junior suite and loved it!  There was lots of space for us.  The bathroom was big and there was a separate sink with lots of counter space for all the junk we bring with us.  The pool there is small but good and we enjoyed the hot-tub after a long day of walking at the parks.  The TV reception wasn’t great and there wasn’t a huge selection of channels but not really an issue when you are
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time recently to post your comments on your stay with us from last November.
