It was nice to read that our property worked well for you and your family and that you will consider returning to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My family stayed at the Castle Inn for our 3 day trip to Disneyland. We booked this hotel due to it's excellent price and proximity to the park. I must say that it was a pleasant surprise upon getting there. My daughter was so excited to stay in a hotel that looked like a castle, so that was a big plus! The rooms are remodeled and very clean. We stayed on the 4th floor and it was very quiet. The walk to Disneyland was about 10 mins and it felt safe too because of the other families always walking to and from the park. The staff is excellent, friendly, and professional. I know we will definitely be back to the hotel when we are in the area.  My dear daughter cried her eyes out when we left :(
Manager Response: We would like to take this time to thank you so much for your lovely review on your recent stay with us.  It was so nice to read that your family enjoyed our Castle Hotel, and was sorry to hear that your daughter cried when you left.  You are all welcome back at anytime when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for 4 nights while visiting the Disneyland Resort. Most of our time was spent in the parks so we really only used the hotel for sleeping and didn't use many amenities. We probably would have used the hot tub, but we got back after it was closed every night. The room was nice & clean, the renovations look great. The walk to Disney is an easy one and well worth saving a few bucks from the hotels that upcharge you for location right across Harbor. Our only complaint was the water pressure in our room... the shower was almost a slow drip and it took 30 minutes to fill the small bathtub. That was a small thing though, overall we enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for posting your comments on your stay with us this month.  It was nice to read that you enjoyed our new rooms and location.  We were sorry to hear you had an issue with the shower, so hopefully you called the front desk to report it so we could have fixed this for your while you were in-house.    We do look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Based on previous reviews I was hesitant but upon arrival I was very surprised with the large two queen rooms that are completely renovated and clean. I am picky with hotels and I would absolutely  recommend this hotel to anyone. We had stayed for 9 nights and slept soundly every night. Rooms were attended to daily by housekeeping and the on site laundry was a bonus and only 1.50 per wash and 1.00 to dry. Hot tub was also a bonus. Friendly staff with the exception of one girl that was working in the evening however all other staff made up for the one bad. 10 minute walk to gate at Disney. Would stay again without question.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites recently, and for taking the time to post your review on your stay.  It was nice to read you enjoyed the property and found our staff to be friendly.  We have been very fortunate to have many positive reviews from our guests, so we certainly appreciate your time.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: They have a very friendly staff. This hotel is within walking distance to the front entrance of Disneyland. Our room was clean and was newly remodeled. This is where we stay for all of our trips to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent review you posted.  We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This was our first time staying at this Hotel and we had a great time. The room was great and beds  were nice and clean. No parking fee. Close to Disney and places to get something to eat. We really enjoyed our stay here. We will definitely stay here again when we visit Anaheim again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent review you posted from your visit at the Castle Inn & Suites in Anaheim.  It was nice to read that everything worked well for you and your family, and that you will come back to see us when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Thank you again,  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We spent two enjoyable nights in a standard room that has 2 queen beds, room for a desk AND a table, plus a mini fridge and even a microwave. Everything you need for a Disney vacation, and the room was great!  Asked for and got a top floor room, beds very comfortable and the room was nice and quiet. Can't believe how late we slept in both days. Very easy walk to Disneyland. Found out when we were checking out that WIFI was available in all the rooms, that was just installed in October - PERFECT!  We'll definitely be back!
Manager Response: We wanted to take this time to thank you so much for your lovely review on your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites earlier this month.  It was nice to read that our rooms and location worked well for you and your family.  Our WIFI has been upgraded, so you will definitely be able to experience WIFI from your room on your next visit.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: A great place to stay when visiting the Anaheim area.  Close to all attractions, friendly staff, excellent rooms.  The staff at Castle Inn and Suites where very helpful and courteous and we would recommend that anyone visiting the Disneyland Resort Area to stay here.
Manager Response: We wanted to take this time to thank you for your nice words you posted from your stay with us recently.  We do hope to see you when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Stayed here with my wife and daughter in October 2013. No complaints at all. Staff were super friendly and extremely helpful. Rooms were very clean and spacious. Can honestly not think of anything bad to say about this establishment.
Manager Response: Hello from the Castle Inn & Suites,  thank you so much for your feedback on your stay with us this past October.  We truly appreciate you selecting the Castle Inn & Suites for your Disneyland visit, and hope to welcome you back if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Me and my partner stayed here for 6 nights while we visited Disneyland and other places in LA. We found the staff to be helpful in every way possible. We got to LA early in the morning so we assumed our room wouldnt be ready, but when we checked in it was ready so we could go straight up! Walking distance to Disneyland, Downtown Disney and there is plenty of spots to eat around the hotel. Found the rooms were huge, with 2 queen beds for 2 people. Would recommend - 10/10!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your Disneyland visit.  We thank you for taking the time to write your review on your stay.  We appreciate the fact that you commented about our staff, location, the surrounding restaurants, and how you were able to get right into your room when you arrived.  These comments go along way and we just wanted to make sure you knew this and that we appreciate it.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: RIGHT ACROSS THE STREET FROM DISNEYLAND!! SAVE 300.00 A NIGHT
Summary: This hotel is in an excellent spot for people on a budget that want to be right in the action. The rooms are clean and updated the deck leading to the rooms on the fourth floor have "hills" that can sometimes throw you off balance so walk slow haha. The staff here is incredible and they have safe deposit boxes. There are plently of options right beside hotel for food and cheap beer, and the hot tub is a god send after walking ten miles a day trust me. RIGHT ACROSS THE STREET FROM DISNEY LAND ENTRANCE. AWESOME HOTEL 8/10 WILL BE STAYING AGAIN :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us last month, and for taking the time to write a review on your stay.  It was so great to see that our location and rooms worked well for you and your family, and we helped you save money on our Disneyland vacation.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the Disneyland Resort in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This hotel worked for our needs because it had two separate sleeping areas and a fridge and microwave. The rooms are pretty small though and the bathroom tiny. Our room had a bad smell of mold in the bathroom but was otherwise clean and served it's purpose. The walls and floors are thin though and the parking is not sufficient so get there early if you want a space. Next time I will look for somewhere closer to the entrance as it was the maximum of what you want to walk after all day at Disneyland, or go somewhere further and catch a shuttle. The pictures are not particularly accurate. This is a motel with not a whole lot going for it other than fairly cheap and the family suites.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback on your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites in November.  We appreciate the feedback and realize we can not fulfill every guest's needs, however, we do appreciate all feedback, as it's always helpful to share this with our team and look to improve where we can.  Thank you again,  Sincerely,

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn during the Thanksgiving weekend and it was a great stay. The staff was very friendly, the room spacious and clean. And the location was great, just across from the theme parks entrance! We never had to move the car! We even received a coupon for a future stay which we hope to use soon.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying at the Castle Inn & Suites in Anaheim last month.  It was nice to read that our staff was friendly, and our property worked well for you and your family.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We found this hotel on a last minute trip.  We booked on the same night we arrived in town. We were given a great rate on the executive suite.  It was a large room, clean, good wifi access, oh so close to disney and local attractions.  Claudia and Marc are top notch!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for posting your feedback on your stay with us last month.  We appreciate your comments about our property and staff, and will certainly pass that along.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the Anaheim Resort in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Rooms so clean family suites are wonderful! Pool area is very clean. The staff is also friendly great place to stay! I accidentally booked wrong type of room and they quickly accommodated us. Very close to disneyland park  We were able to walk there
Manager Response: We wanted to say thank you for your recent review you posted.  We appreciate our guest's feedback and it was nice to read our rooms worked well for you, and that you found our staff friendly.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Stay # 5 At The Cstle Inn & Suites
Summary: Well , what can I say about the Castle Inn & Suites for this review . I can say the renovations look great , our room was the best and so comfortable , the staff was so good , but then again they are always the greatest . Donna , Kelley and the rest of the staff are better than a world class hotel . I give them 10 stars not just 5 . The wife and I stayed there again in Sept , for her birthday and my god the reception we got , and the smiles and the ALWAYS willing to help attitude .  I am a retired and combat disabled Vietnam Veteran stuck in a wheel chair   and our room was PERFECT and it was everything that we have expected form the Castle as always .  We had visit number 6 all set up for my birthday on November 9th , but unfortunately I was having severe cancer related
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the lovely review of your stay with us this past September.  We were sad to hear of your illness and hope you are recovering at home.  We look forward to seeing you in December and again, thank you for being a loyal guest of the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This is our second time that we've stayed here. We had the suite for 4 adults. Plenty of room. Ground floor which suits me just fine. Quiet and room was clean. Check-in was quick. About a block from Disneyland and a stone throw to a couple of 24 eateries.  Denny's and IHOP. car rental close by as well. Will definitely return on our next visit to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for being a guest at our Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your review and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great place to stay while visiting Disneyland!
Summary: My husband, 10 yr old daughter and I stayed Nov 19-23 and were very pleased. This is a no frills hotel but that does not mean it isn't clean or the staff isn't friendly! The rooms were large, the beds comfortable and plenty of pillows. It is about a 15 min walk to the parks so is not bad. The Tower of Terror is almost right across the street. Fireworks can be seen if you have a room at the front of the hotel. Room service did a terrific job in keeping us supplied with towels, shampoo, etc and the room was always made up nicely. There are several restaraunts to eat at along the same block varying in choice and price. There is a Scooter Villiage very close to the hotel as well if you need to rent an ECV for your stay at very reasonable prices. We will definitely stay there when we
Manager Response: We thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your Disneyland Vacation.  We appreciate your review and look forward to welcoming you back when your vacation plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My wife and I took our children and grandchildren to Disneyland and Stayed at the Castle Inn which is a seven minute walk to disneyland. We had one room with 2 double beds and one suite that had a double bed in one room and two doubles in the next room and each with their own t.v. The rooms were very clean and the grounds were also well kept. There is a mini mart across the street and an IHop a half block from the hotel which made it easy to get snacks or have breakfast before heading to Disneyland.  The wifi was a little slow but the staff (front desk and housekeeping) were wonderful. I would definitely recommend this hotel and it's a great value for the money. They allowed us to have 3 cars park for free since we had family driving from different parts of California.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently.  It was nice to read that you enjoyed our Family Suite offering a King bed in the front room, and 2 Queen beds in the back room.  Many of our guest's enjoy this Suite, so thank you for commenting on it.  Our Wi-Fi was recently upgraded, so hopefully on your next visit you will experience our new and updated Wi-Fi system.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My husband and 2 yr. old granddaughter and I did 4 nights at this hotel and we were very pleased with it.  The hotel is a little older, but the rooms were comfortable and clean.  Housekeeping did an excellent job of maintaining the clean standards.  We would leave in the a.m hours and return early afternoon to have our 2 year take her beauty rest and our room was already cleaned and inviting.  The front desk and maintenance personnel was effecient when I had to call about the handle on our toilet (and this was at 10:30 at night).  It took maintenance all of 15 minutes to take care of our problem.  We like and appreciate speedy service.  We would definetly return to Castle Inn....because of there service and not to mention the walk to Disneyland entrance is right there.  The
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to give us your feedback from your stay this month.  We were happy to read our hotel worked well for you and your family, and that you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites one day.  Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back.  Mahalo,

Summary: This hotel is a good value for the money. It's about 1/4 mile walk to the crosswalk in front of the main gates at Disneyland. There is not shuttle service to Disneyland. Aside from being a bit of a walk to the gates, the location is great. There are several take-out type restaurants right next door which can save you time and money compared to eating every meal in the park. Pizza, Asian, Subway, etc. The rooms are on the small side, but nicely decorated and were clean aside from a little sand in the bathtub. We didn't use the pool or hot tub but saw them and they looked very basic. If you plan on spending all day in the parks, then this hotel is a good choice. If you want to spend a good portion of your time relaxing at the hotel, I'd go with something else.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate your feedback, and hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Awesome hotel and a short walk to Disney.
Summary: We stayed at Castle Oct 25 - Nov4. I took a look at the reviews prior to making a selection and I am very satisfied with Castle. The family suites are great if you have a teenager. The suite has a seperate bedroom for the adults which was great. The hotel has been upgraded and was a great value. The wifi is still being worked on, but was not an issue for us. The staff are all very courteous and helpful. I have nothing but praise for this hotel and highly recommend it to anyone. Thank you and look forward to our next stay at Castle.  Ray T.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites recently.  We appreciate your review you posted and that were very satisfied with your visit, and enjoyed the Family Suite you reserved.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hotel if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We had a group of 10. Booked 4 rooms. I e-mailed a couple of days prior to arrival to ask for early check-in as we were arriving around 12:30. My e-mail was answered promptly saying that they couldn't guarantee it, however they would do their best. When we arrived all 4 rooms were ready for us. I couldn't have been more pleased. The rooms were newly renovated, and while not top of the line, certainly very clean and comfortable. The beds were excellent! We used the pool and Jacuzzi almost every day. It was a nice clean area. We were very pleased with the service provided and would certainly recommend the Castle Inn to anyone looking for great value.  Thanks again to the staff for a lovely stay
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were happy to accommodate your early check in request, and thank you for commenting on our newly renovated rooms furnished in Thomasville Furniture ( Made in the USA).    It was also nice to read that you were able to enjoy our pool and Jacuzzi every day.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: 1st stay value for your holiday dollar
Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights November 2013. I found this place to be great value, with very friendly staff that go that extra step to help. House keeping do an excellent job, very high standard of room cleaning and the same for the out side. The free internet helps to keep in touch with family in Aus, and also to plan trips. Very close to Disneyland, an easy walk no more than 5 mins. Will recommend this place to all. A laundry on site was also great. Thank you for a very pleasant stay. T Giddings & E Platt.
Manager Response: We wanted to take this time to thank you for your recent review on your stay with us this month.  It was very nice to read you had a great stay, you appreciated our friendly staff, free Wi-Fi, and cleanliness of our rooms.  We were also happy to read our guest laundry facility came in handy during your visit.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The room was great. It was clean and in good shape. However, parking was horrible. We reserved a suite because we had 4 adults and 2 children.  We came from different locations so we had 2 cars. At check in, I asked if we could get another parking pass. They told me that they needed to park at the garden walk structure for now but we could stop by later for parking pass after every one checked in. At 11pm, we attempted to get another pass but they told us that not everyone had checked in yet and they were very rude about it. Yet there were 17 parking spots available in the lot. At 6am there were 9 parking spots available yet my friends had to pay $25 to parking in a parkjng structure that is at least 1\4 of mile away. We will not stay here again.  Bad customer service!!!!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to post your comments on your recent stay with us.  We apologize there was confusion in regards to our parking situation. We offer complimentary parking for one vehicle per room.  We insure at the time a reservation is taken, all guests are made aware of our parking policy.  In addition to reviewing this on the phone, or  email, we also have it in writing posted at our front desk for guests to review upon check in.  It's never easy to determine what spaces are open and not open during the day/night, therefore, we have to make that call at some point to insure all guests holding a reservation have at least one parking spot when they arrive.   We understand you felt our customer service fell short, and we apologize for this.  We take all guest feedback, good, bad and indifferent, and always strive to improve on our services and facilities, so thank you for your feedback.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Cant complain about much here. Good value and close to DL.
Summary: My daughter wanted to go to Disneyland for Halloween and I wanted to save some money. We picked this hotel because of the closeness to DL and the price. I was pleasantly surprised. There is no continental breakfast so plan accordingly. But did I say the price was right. And they didn't even try and charge for parking like all the other close resorts do. Huge benefit of staying here is the parking alone. Our room was very clean and recently refurbished. Although the shower leaked like the Titanic the staff was very prompt to repair the problem.
Manager Response: We would like to say Thank You for posting your review on your recent stay with us.  Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were happy to read that our location and price worked well for you and your family, and that you were able to have a great time at Disneyland during the Halloween festivities.  Thank you also for commenting on our complimentary parking.  We hope if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort, you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind.  Sincerely,

Summary: I would highly recommend this hotel. We've stayed in various hotels near the park. Castle has great pricing (in comparison to gouging from places down the road), proximity to Disneyland, and super friendly staff. The rooms are remodeled with comfy beds, new furniture, microwave & fridge, and plenty of room.  We will be staying here again for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites recently, and for taking the time to post your review.  We appreciate the feedback, and look forward to welcoming you back to the Hotel in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: We highly recommend this hotel for your Disney vacation
Summary: This was our first stay with castle inn after several vacations to Disneyland. I have to say that this hotel's service and staff far exceeded our expectations. They went above and beyond to make our stay a pleasant and enjoyable one. The rooms are newly renovated and very spacious and clean.  We were held up an extra day due to the events at lax and they took the stress off of us and allowed us to check back into our room for the extra night, and upon checking out, didn't charge us. Now that's customer service. We will recommend this hotel for anyone planning a Disneyland vacation and will be sure to stay here again on our next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the review you gave us, and we were only to happy to help your family with the situation that was happening on your check out date at LAX.    Thank you so much for the kind words, and review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: The hotel was very nice and clean. The staff was friendly. We got a family suite because there were 6 of us and the room had 3 beds. It was very comfy. After checking out, we recieved a coupon for $20 off our next stay which will only make me want to come back and stay there again. The walk to Disneyland only took 5 minutes. It is also a close walk to the outdoor mall, and places to eat, which was great that we didn't have to worry about loosing our parking spot. I would say that the only downside to this hotel is really their parking. It is not made for larger vehicles and there are not very many stalls. Other than that I would reccommend them to anyone who is looking for a place to stay near the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites on your recent visit to the Disneyland Resort.  We appreciate the feedback on our staff, rooms and location.  We value our guest's feedback and look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel several times, and I was pleasantly surprised to find that the guest rooms have been remodeled with new beds, furnishings, etc. the rooms look great, and the rates are still very affordable. For a hotel within an easy walking distance to Disneyland there is no better value.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review you posted recently.  Thank you for your kind words regarding our newly remodeled guest rooms.  In addition, we thank you for being a valued repeat guest of the Castle Inn & Suites, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This is the third time I've stayed here and was not disappointed.  After a great first stay, and a not so great second stay, I was interested in seeing the remodeled rooms.  The room was great.  Quiet, we heard nothing from other rooms, and heard very little from people walking outside.  The beds were comfy, a little on the firmer side, but fine for us. The shower was amazing, great water pressure, which is hard to find in most hotels.  As usual, the staff was warm and friendly, even gave us our parking passes early so we could go exploring until our room was ready.  My only complaint would have to be the severely squeaking bathroom door.  When someone got up to use the bathroom in the middle of the night, opening that door would wake the whole room.  The refrigerator,
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent review of your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your feedback, and thank you for being a repeat guest.  We are happy you enjoyed our newly remodeled guest rooms.  Since all of the doors are brand new within the room, the squeaking you experienced could have been addressed during your stay, so we apologize for that little inconvenience.  Thank you for letting us know the shower was amazing, and that our staff was warm and friendly.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites the next time you are visiting the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We arrived late due to an unforeseen emergency, hotel even called to see if we were still coming! It was a nice touch, seeing in all the craziness I forgot to call! Our room was on the ground floor in the back and right in front of elevator. I thought that we were not going to get any rest, but it was quiet, clean, AC worked great, fridge and microwave was a nice touch. Sad to say that I too passed this place and thought "oh heck no!!" But I was sadly mistaken...staff very nice and speedy, housekeeping friendly as well! We will surely come back! Only wish is that they had shuttle service, but the walk is not too far, it just feels like it after a long day at Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to first say thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your recent visit to Mickey's Halloween Party.  We were very happy to hear that all worked out well with your family and that you were able to make the journey.  We recently completed our room renovations, so all guest rooms now are fully renovated, we are happy you enjoyed your room.  We realize we don't offer the shuttle to/from Disneyland, so thank you for commenting that it wasn't too far.    We hope to see you back at the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Arrived very late (around 1:30 AM) from around a 5 hour drive and found very close parking, a very comfortable room. The room was very well soundproofed as we heard no noise from the area. Housekeeping was very efficient and were in and out very quickly.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently, and for providing your feedback on your stay.  We hope you will keep us in mind if your future travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We were very leery about this hotel,  we had passed it previous trips and thought ummm no!  Well SURPRISE this place was awesome with a staff to match.  I hate that I did not get the team member that checked us in and upgraded us,  but you know who you are.  It was my self and 2 friends and instead of making us share a bed we got an UPGRADE.  It added that special treat to our trip.  The park is close distance to the park we walked all 3 days.  Close to food so you don't need a car.  The even called for a cab for us when were leaving.  The maid didn't get a chance to do our room between 9am and 4pm,  so when we left to the park at almost 5 they still had someone refresh for us,  so we came back after a long night at the park to a clean room.  I'm just staying don't judge a book
Manager Response: We want to thank you for staying with us recently, and for taking the time to write a review on your stay.  We appreciate the time our guests take to provide their feedback, so thank you again.  It was nice to read you enjoyed a room upgrade, and that our location worked well for you and your friends.  We wanted you to know we offer two elevator's on property. One is located towards the front of the hotel, and the 2nd one is located towards the back of the hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you back in December.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great place to sleep off Disney
Summary: Check in and out were a dream, no issues.  Rooms were fine, fridge and microwave were a nice addition.  We got a 'bad' room according to other hotel guests.... we slept like babies, no noise issues and our ac while a bit loud got the job done without waking us up.  I have horrible skin that reacts to anything and there were NO bugs or other unwelcome guests with us.  Had to use their fax service and front desk took care of printing our boarding passes and airline check in.  Our room was refurbished with granite like sink and flat screen tv.  Wi Fi took longer than dial up but I was able to check email.  Walk to the drop off area by subway is odd... not fun with all your luggage.  Do not use the services of the gift shop- go to the 7-11 across the street for fair prices.  PLEASE
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your feedback on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the attention to detail you provided.   Although we currently do not provide the "name brand" single cup coffee maker's, we do provide a very good brand for the single cup coffee maker's.  We will keep your suggestion in mind if we decide to change these out in the near future.  We hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: First we got to the hotel at 6:45am and they let us check in. It was great since we had been in the car for six hours and had two small munchkins with us. This is one of the few (if not only) non-Disney hotels within walking distance on Harbor Blvd. that will allow you to check in early if your room is ready.   Our room was clean and the staff friendly. It looked like they had remodeled since our last stay.   Also, if you keep an eye on Get Away Today there are times they offer buy two nights, get the third free.  We will be staying three nights in December 2013 for $210!  We have stayed quite a few times. A good place to stay and a bargain to boot!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for staying with us recently on your Disneyland vacation.  We appreciate your review and we were happy to see that you had a nice stay and appreciated our value.  We look forward to welcoming you back in December!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The first thing that I noticed was that the place smelled NICE when we walked in.  Not that hotel smell, but something NICE.  The beds were comfy.  The rooms were big.  It is located within walking distance of Disneyland.  The rooms were decorated nicely.  It was a fun vibe for the kids.  The pool was nice.  They have a smaller pool that the toddler could play in.  I would totally recommend this to anyone!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites recently, and for writing a review on your stay.  We were happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that your family felt we had a fun vibe.  We hope you will keep Castle Inn & Suites in mind when booking future trips to the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Great staff and a great place to crash for the Disney Dumbo Double Dare!
Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 2 nights when I did the Disneyland Dumbo Double Dare. I had requested on my reservation to have a quiet room, since I was nervous and needed good sleep. They upgraded us to the biggest suite since it was in the back, no charge! We had a great microwave and refrigerator, the AC worked nicely, and it was so cozy in the bed(s)! It was very helpful to get to come back and rest on Saturday in a quiet space and cool off (it was quite hot that day!) All in all, a terrific value and they've redone the rooms so it was nice! Oh, and the towel swans were great!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us for the Disney Half Marathon and Dumbo Double Dare.  We appreciate your feedback and it was nice to read that the suite worked well for you, and thank you for mentioning our towel art.  We hope to see you again next year if you are planning to participate in the marathon once again.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This hotel is a great place to stay for your trip to Disneyland because it is less than a ten minute walk from the park gates. You only have to cross two streets and walking there was no problem even for our 4 year old.  The hotel recently renovated the insides and the rooms are nicely decorated and clean. There's nothing fancy but for the price it's a good deal.  The one big drawback for us was there is no wifi. Rooms have small refrigerators, microwaves, and comfortable beds.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for taking the time to post your comments regarding your stay with us this month.  It was nice to read that our location worked well for you, and that you enjoyed our new rooms.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites, if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Spent 3 nights here recently on a weekend trip to Disneyland and was EXTREMELY impressed.  Rooms are VERY spacious with BIG comfy beds! They also keep the hotel very very clean.  The front desk staff were extremely friendly, quick and helpful!  For the price this hotel is a real steal.  Best of all, only 1.5 blocks (10-15minutes) to Disneyland. With IHOP, Denny's and Subway nearby.  Will DEFINITELY stay here again!
Manager Response: We wanted to thank you for staying with us this month, and providing your feedback on your stay.  It was nice to read you felt we were a great value, and you had a great stay.  We appreciate our guests feedback, and look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I planned a last minute trip to Disneyland with my teenage nephew and nieces and booked a family suite for the evening. The room was extremely clean and appear newly renovated. There were a lot of little touches in the room that made it comfortable. What I liked the most was the layout of the room. It allowed for plenty of privacy, plus there was a TV in each room. Compared to other hotels in the area, the price was extremely reasonable for that type of Suite. There was also an on-site market which made purchasing drinks and snacks easy and convenient.   As far as the location, it couldn't have been better. I've stayed at other hotels in the past where I had to take a shuttle, which was time consuming and an additional expense. But staying at Castle, we found it to be the
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently.  We appreciate the time you took to write your review on your stay.  It was nice to read you found our suites comfortable and a great value.  We were also happy to read that our location worked well for you and your family and that not having a shuttle did not affect your stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We were on a family holiday, going to  Disneyland and California Adventure.  The hotel was awesome.  We had a refrigerator, AND microwave.  There is a great swimming pool and tanning deck!!  Rooms were clean and very comfortable! The staff was helpful and friendly.  The room rates were really good!!!  I will definitely stay here again!!!
Manager Response: We wanted to take this time to say thank you for posting your comments on your recent stay with us.  It was nice to read we are the "perfect place to stay" and felt our rooms were great and our staff friendly and helpful.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: People were great staff freindly and even let us check in when we got there a lttle before 3pm.  Saved us a trip back.  Rooms were clean and newly redone and very nice. My son need to do some work for school wi-Fi was better in lobby, He was there till very late and were very nice about it.  Walk to park about 10 minutes but no problems and had a 7-11 and subway near by.  We would stay again and have also recomanded to friend at work.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review you posted from your stay with us this month.  It was nice to read that our staff was friendly.  We are in the process of upgrading our Wi-Fi system, so if your plans bring you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future, you will be able to access our free Wi-Fi from all guest rooms.  Thank you again,  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Wished we had booked our second night here!
Summary: I requested a room on the top floor which we got.  We dropped our car in before visiting Disneyland which saved us $16 and a big walk.  The rooms were newly renovated and were spotless and very quiet.  My son and husband had a swim in the pool after a long day at Disney and were perfectly happy even though it's in the carpark.  We stayed at a neighbouring hotel a couple of days later which was also good but cost a lot more than the Castle Inn.  I would definately recommend to those who aren't really doing anything other than sleeping in their hotel after visiting the parks.
Manager Response: We would like to say Thank You, for taking the time to write your review on your stay with us this month.  It was nice to read we were able to provide the room location you requested.  We do hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My daughter Joleen and I stayed at this hotel for ten days. Our rooms were renovated and very comfortable. I have to complement Marc the front desk manager as he was amazing in helping us with tours as well as any information we needed, I would definitely recomend this hotel. Marc thankyou for a fantastic vacation stay,
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback on your stay with us in September.  It was nice to read that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms and they were very comfortable for you and your daughter.  Thank you also for commenting on our front desk team member who assisted you with booking your tours.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: No...don't stay at this hidden gem. It's a secret for the select few who dare to try it.
Summary: Like another reviewer below, I, too am a bit of a hotel snob. I like to be very comfortable when I travel. But, with an extended vacation and two kids in tow (took a niece and nephew to Disneyland and Vegas), this vacation was going to be budget-friendly in areas where it could afford to be. While the reviews on Castle were not bad at all, it certainly wasn't Bellagio-standards...on paper.   When we pulled in, we were greeted by Vincent and his calm demeanor.  He checked us in quickly and had us on our way with all the instructions and tips we could need for a quick check in.  Later, we visited him again for more Q&A and he was ever so helpful, giving us the guidance of a true Anaheim native.   The hotel could use a nice fresh coat of paint, I'll give her that.  But otherwise, I
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your review from your stay with us this month.  It was nice to read you consider us a "hidden gem".  We truly appreciate the time our guests take to go into detail with their comments.  Thank you also for commenting on the numerous restaurants around the hotel as we do feel this is a truce asset when booking our property.  We hope if your travel plans bring you back to the mainland in the near future, you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind.    Mahalo,

Summary: Booked this as last minute deal not knowing quite what to expect, but saw pretty good reviews. The hotel has a nice look decor wise from the outside and the rooms have been updated a bit, but you can still tell certain things are a bit dated. The rooms are larger than standard rooms so that was a plus. Along with a fridge/microwave in the room which was nice. Be aware all rooms have 2 beds though, which was ok, but would have preferred a king with just 2 of us. Overall, if you're not looking for anything fancy, this will get the job done at a fair price and no hidden fees like the other hotels in the area which are across the street from Disneyland. I would stay again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent review from your stay this past September.  Thank you for staying with us, and we hope to see you again if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: What can I say about the Castle Inn & Suites? We stayed there 10-10-13 for 4 nights. This was not the first visit there. I have been driving over to Disneyland for over 8 years at least 2 times a year. We have stayed at many hotels over the years but I keep coming back to the Castle. They are close enough to walk to the park and close enough to take a break during the day. They have free parking that most other hotels do not offer. True they do not offer a breakfast but what do you get with other facilities? I would rather save on the price and purchase what I want to eat.   The rooms are very clean. I have never had any issues with that. Over the last year they have been working on a remodel and update in the rooms. Now they have marble counter tops – a nice touch. All new
Manager Response: We would like to send you a big "Thank You" for your recent review you provided from your stay with us this month. We appreciate the comment about "not having a breakfast on property and how you would rather choose where you eat and how much you spend".  Many of our guests have provided this feedback, so thank you for that.  In addition, we appreciate being compared to a 5 star hotel in regards to our service. Our guest service is "# 1" for us, so thank you acknowledging this.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely,

Summary: Truth be told, I am a Hotel snob. I like to stay in 4-5 star hotel. This is considered a 3 star and I have no idea why. The service is better than the service I recieved at the Wynn Hotel in Vegas. Claudia and Mari were VERY helpful and very friendly. They greeted me as if I were regular there and to me service is number one. Yes, the rooms are a little dated and older but I slept like a baby and so did my family. Easy walk to Disneyland and DCA. Great location. We went on 10-12-13 and had a great experience there. We had to park our car a little longer on day of departure and manager was absolutely cool with letting park there after check out. The staff is seriously a 5 star service. Thanks Castle Inn team!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate your feedback and comparing us to a 5 star Hotel. We do hope if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort, you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites, Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites from October 1st through October 3rd, 2013. Read the reviews and almost didn't stay there. But it was an awesome experience. Friendly staff. Our room was wonderful. CLEAN and RENOVATED. Lot's of space and clean floors, clean grout , tiles. Cleaning service always created swans with the towels and our kids stuffed animals  were always lined up in a fun way. On check out day we were allowed to leave the car there and store some of our items in their save storage room. Clean bathroom at the check in office. Elevator was a bit older but spacious and worked well. Ice machine at the elevator. Refrigerator in the room. Working TV. Only thing that was missing was a safe in the room. But honestly, not even the Residence in in San Diego we stayed in
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to post your review on your stay with us this month.  You were very detailed, so thank you for that.  All guest feedback is extremely appreciated.  It was nice to read you were "surprised".  Thank you for commenting on our "towel art", we love to share the feedback with our top-notch housekeeping team so they see how our guests do appreciate the little touches they provide.  We hope if you plan to return to the Anaheim Resort, the Castle Inn & Suites will be your home away from home.  Sincerely,

Summary: Stayed here whilst visiting Disneyland and going to an Angels game at Anaheim Stadium, Great location for both, close to the Gardenwalk (shops, restaurants and transport hub for the ART system). The pool was a must in July!
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for letting us know how your stay was this past July.  It was definitely a hot summer, so hopefully the pool kept you cool.  We also appreciate that you commented about the location and the surrounding shops, restaurants and more that are nearby.  We do feel our location is ideal, and thank you for commenting on that.  If you do return to the States in the near future, we hope you keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind as your home while visiting Disneyland.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I cannot say enough good things about this hotel.  The rooms are modern and comfortable, the staff could not have been nicer or more accommodating. The location was great, well within walking distance from Disneyland, which is what we were looking for. We arrived early, before 1 pm  and were allowed to check in, which saved parking fees at DL. They even let us park after we checked out, which saved us parking fees on our last day, although they said they were only able to do that because it was mid-week and they were not full.  The only detraction for us was the bed was harder than we like, but that is a personal preference. We had plenty of soft fluffy pillows. We recommended this hotel to our son and his wife when they took a trip to DL and they were happy too, and my 4 year
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for taking the time to post your review from your stay with us this past September.  It was so nice to read your comments, and that you enjoyed our location, and that our staff was very helpful and accommodating.  We so appreciate the time our guests take to let us know how their stay was, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Convinient Location, Good Price, Nice rooms!
Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn for 2 nights. It is very convinient, only a short walk away from Disneyland! Upon arriving, we were a little discouraged by the way we were greeted by the two staff members that we came into contact with. They were very bland, we weren't expecting a fanfare, but a nice cheerful hello would have been nice. Again at check out the girl at the front desk was very bland, no smiles. Nothing.  Once we were in the room I was very pleased by how clean it was. Two thumbs up!! It did have some minor details, and if you're a little picky these details might boher you: 1. You can hear the pipes in your room when someone is taking a shower in a different room. 2. There were no extra blankets in the room (I'm sure if we called, they would have provided us with some)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback on your recent stay with us.  It was nice to read that you enjoyed our new rooms, and how clean everything was.  Thank you for letting our front desk staff know about the concern you had with your bathtub, this allows us to get into that room and fix the problem, so thank you again for that.  We apologize for the way you were welcomed upon arrival and departure.  We have spoken to our front desk team and reviewed the importance of guest service, so again, thank you for bringing this to our attention.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed here for night in October. We were originally going to leave Anaheim on a Saturday and head home, but plans changed and we found ourselves looking for a room on a Saturday night. After calling all of our regular places we were left with the Castle Inn and Suites. They had a room! We were hesitant (why do they have a room left when everyone else is sold out??) but tired, so we booked it. I will admit- as many trips as we have taken to Anaheim the Castle Inn was never on my list of places to try. I walked by a million times. It looked kind of cheesy and I never heard much about it. As we pulled up I kept saying "Just for the night. We will be gone in 12 hours". We chuckled at the fake castle exterior. The parking lot was huge by Anaheim standards. No double parking
Manager Response: We wanted to take the time to say thank you for staying with us recently, and providing your review.  We appreciate the time our guests take to provide feedback, as this only helps us improve on our services and facilities.  We have recently completed the first phase of our renovation which included our guest rooms.  We will soon start phase 2 which will include some improvements to the outside entrance, walkways, elevators and more.    We listen to our guests, and the majority of the feedback we have received is that our guests appreciate the savings they receive with complimentary parking.  We are able to pass along a better value in our rates over those properties that provide a breakfast.  Since we are surrounded by numerous restaurants, we feel our guests enjoy having the options in the morning for Breakfast.    Once again, thank you again for your feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Just got home from spending a week in this hotel. The rooms are totally renovated and so nice and clean. Super comfortable beds. A great location, only 10 minutes and you are right in the parks. The hotel lobby and exterior of the building is in need of a facelift. My only complaint with our room was the air conditioner was so noisy!!!  Would I stay there again? Yes, wouldn't even think twice about it.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  Thank you for spending your Disneyland stay with us at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Very convenient location, good price, refurbished
Summary: One of the closest hotels to the Disneyland gate . It was recently refurbished and it is now grea value  for money.  No wifi in the room but you can get wifi in reception area . Laundry facilities on site was handy .
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your feedback on your stay with us in September.  It was nice to read our location and newly remodeled rooms worked well for you and your family.  We are currently upgrading our Wi-Fi system, so we will soon have complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.    We do hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Please keep us in mind if your plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort in the future.  Sincerely,

Summary: We are a family of 11 – ages 3 to 65 – and the location of this hotel was perfect for us. Only 10 minutes easy walk to gates of Disneyland, 3 minutes walk the other way to food outlets, bus stop for trips to Univeral Studios, Seaworld, Legoland, etc. Across road to 7 Eleven and ABC market. The family suites were comfortable with fridge, hairdryers, microwave, although cutlery and crockery would have been a good inclusion. Reception staff very friendly and helpful. The rooms were serviced daily and we have no complaints about the cleanliness. The pool and spa area was a big hit with everyone. We would definitely stay here again and recommend for families.
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for your recent review.  We appreciate your feedback regarding our location, and the convenience of numerous restaurants and shops nearby.  We do hope you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind when making your future travel plans to the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Peaceful Sanctuary Down the Road From Disneyland
Summary: This was the perfect place to take a break from the full-on excitement of Disneyland and recharge. Rooms are freshly redecorated - lots of space, really quiet and I loved the towels which were all folded into the shape of swans - hilarious! The pool is great and the outdoor spa beside it was perfect for soaking tired feet and shoulders. Cheap and efficient coin operated laundry. Wifi was tricky to pick up in the room but excellent when sitting on the deck above the pool. Really friendly helpful staff. A great sanctuary away from the craziness of Disneyland - which we love, but it is great to take a break.
Manager Response: We would like to say a big thank you for your recent review of the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciated the "Peaceful Sanctuary" comment.  We also thank you for pointing out our "towel art"  our housekeeping staff enjoy making towel art as they know our guests appreciate it, so thank you for commenting on that.    We are currently upgrading our Wi-Fi to a state of the art system, so hopefully on your next visit at the Castle Inn, you will have high speed internet right in the comfort of your room.  Thank you again,  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We arrived before check in time and checked into our room immediately.  The beds were clean and comfortable, air con working well, my only complaint is the carpet needs cleaning, walk around in bare feet or white socks and they will quickly change colour and the shower tended to change temperature whilst using. Our room was always clean and ready when we got back in the afternoon for a rest before returning to Disneyland. Thumbs up was how close it was to the main gates of Disneyland and just around the corner from The Garden Walk which has some good restaurants.  Will return as it was good value and close to Disneyland and the bus stop.  No noise at night as you are in a enclosed court yard so could not hear street traffic.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for your recent review of your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  It was nice to read that our location worked well for you and your family and you enjoyed our newly remodeled guest rooms.  It was also nice to read that you enjoyed having several choices for restaurants in the area.  We do hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great value! Rooms are recently remodeled and very comfortable and clean. Staff was super friendly at arrival and quite helpful when I needed an extra night. I really liked the close walk to Disney parks and free parking! Will definitely stay here again in the spring!
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for your recent review you provided.  We appreciate that your stay was enjoyable, and that you will definitely stay with us again.  We look forward to your next visit.  Kind Regards,

Summary: The Castle Inn & Suites is like a fairytale hotel structured like a Medieval castle.  Great atmosphere from the moment you enter the lobby like the times of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.  The front office staff (day and night), as well as the service staff,  are very friendly and always accommodating.  The rooms have all been completely renovated/updated and are bright, colorful, and beautiful.  We stayed in a King Suite which was so roomy and private for 3 people.  Beds/Pillows are wonderfully comfortable.  Large bathroom.  Family loved the towels/cloths shaped like swans.  Can't say enough good things about this hotel/staff.  Very reasonably priced.  Plus it is right across the street from Disneyland, and there are plenty of great restaurants just down the
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent review of the Castle Inn & Suites.  We loved reading how you appreciated our Castle themed property.  We really appreciate the time our guests take to write their review, and especially when the feedback regarding our staff, location, new rooms and more are highlighted.    We do hope you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I booked this hotel strictly from internet closenes to Disney.It was fantastic. all the new make overs are done and the place is great.Staff was wonderful.we got there at 8 am and was able to get in our room.How perfect for our first day at Disneyland.!! would reccomend to everyone.!
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent review on your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were happy to read our front desk staff was able to accommodate you for an early check in.  We pride ourselves on our Customer Service, so thank you for pointing this out.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Now we literally just booked this room for somewhere to sleep for the night after a day at Disney and a bit of fun being themed as a castle and all.   However everything about this place was perfect, the staff were very friendly and managed to get us checked in rite away even though we had arrived a little early. The rooms were large and spacious more than enough room for a family and very clean.   Parking rite outside the room was also a bonus, in addition there is a little shop and plenty of places around to get some food, inc. IHOP, & 7/11 over the road.  With regard to location from Disney, I'm pretty sure that some of the Disney car parks are further away. Literally just a 5-10 minute walk - depending on how excited you are, to the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your stay with us in September.  It was so nice to read that you were pleasantly surprised about our rooms, parking, and location.  Thank you also for mentioning how close several restaurants and stores are nearby, this is truly an asset to our property.  We do hope to see you again in the near future if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I was able to stay at the Castle Inn and Suites this past August and I found the property to be clean, the room was beyond what I was expecting.  There were two queen size beds in the bedroom with a nice size hide a bed in the living room.  There was a microwave, refrigerator as well.  The bathroom was far beyond what I had expected.  It had been updated with lighting that beat out 4 star resorts and granite counter top.  Fixtures were updated as was the carpet and bedding. Would I recommend this property to others?  Yes, indeed I would.  It is located across the street from Disneyland's main entrance, about one block down.  (A very short walk, worth it). Parking is secure and well lite also. There is an elevator as well.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback on your stay with us this past August.  It was nice to read that our location worked well for you, and that you appreciated our lighting in our bathroom, as well as our newly renovated Parlor Suite.  We hope if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort, you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind as your home away from home.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Its only a 5-7 minute walk to Disney land, clean rooms and plenty of parking. They were renovating some of the rooms so most of the rooms are modern and comfortable. I would recommend it if you're are looking for location and reasonable prices
Manager Response: Thank you so much for writing a review on your stay with us last month.  We appreciate your feedback, and hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Its location makes it go from "good enough" to "good."  It wasn't fancy, but it was affordable and exactly what we needed for our trip to Disneyland/California Adventure.  There is a shop right there that sells, gifts, snacks, food, sodas, and alcohol.    I would go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing your recent review from your stay with us this month. We appreciate our guests feedback, and look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Decent hotel, don't forget anything because you won't get it back
Summary: The location is great, just a couple of blocks from the entrance to Disneyland.   The rooms have been updated and are nice, but the bathroom in ours needed renovations as well.  The knobs in the shower were rusted and not very pleasant to look at.  It appears they put in new flooring and a new toilet, however the bathtub and surrounding tile looked older, as did the ceiling.  It kind of looked like they painted over the imperfections.  The shower was awful, it got hot and cold throughout our showers and had very low pressure.     Upon arrival we did not feel we were greeted with a friendly tone, and that was quite disappointing considering we were staying at a hotel close to the happiest place on Earth.  Eric, who checked us out was very friendly, so he redeemed the hotel a bit.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us feedback on your stay with us recently.  We were sorry to read of your concerns you experienced during your stay.  We have completely renovated our guest rooms from floor to ceiling, so hopefully you let the front desk know of your concerns with the bathroom on your check out as we are not provided this information via trip advisor.    In closing, we wanted you to know that we have a process in place whereas all items left behind by our guests are returned when located.  We return Iphones, IPads, Computers, Bedding, and even clothing.  It is not the practice of any of our employees to keep any lost and found item.  We are sorry you did not locate your item, as I do know you made several attempts by phone to see if your item had been found.  Again, thank you very much for our feedback, this is very much appreciated.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My husband and I stayed here in 2008. It was dated and run-down. They are in the middle of doing MAJOR renovations. We stayed in a renovated room and it was great! All new beds, furniture, counters, carpeting, appliances, drapes, EVERYTHING. The room was very nice and comfortable. The staff are very nice and welcoming. Check in/check out processes were smooth and very efficient. The hotel is close to Disneyland, restaurants, shopping and the convention center. It's a short drive to the Honda Center or Angel's Stadium. I highly recommend this hotel and plan to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us this month.  We appreciate your recent review you gave us.  It was so nice to read that you appreciated and enjoyed our new rooms.  Thank you for commenting on our location, and how we have numerous restaurants nearby, and how close we are to the Honda Center.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim/Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This hotel is located so close to the front gate of Disneyland that it is hard to believe this hotel is so affordable.  We stay here every trip we make to Disney.  And even the parking is free, which is amazing.  But a good hotel just got better.  They are in the process of updating all their rooms, lobby and exterior.  The renovated rooms offer attractive furniture, fresh paint and carpet, and bedding.  There is even a refrigerator and microwave now. The negative to this hotel in the past has been the internet service was spotty at best, but they up totally upgrading that too.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent review from your stay with us this month.  We are very happy that you found our new rooms attractive, and the new additions to the rooms worked well for you and your family.    We look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed at castle inn and suites in aug-sept.  fantastic room clean tidy and large enough for all our luggage.  Staff at front desk very helpful.  Definitely stay there again. Good size pool and grt having laundry facilities only thing wifi not grt but go down to the pool or front reception and it improves
Manager Response: We wanted to thank you for your comments on your stay with us in Aug/Sept.  It was nice to read that you found our rooms "fantastic, clean and large" enough for your family.  We do hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Other than my daughter LOVING to stay at a Castle... The rooms are beautiful. Pretty modern, not old fashion like most hotels. One bedroom with two queen beds includes a mini living room, which was perfect for me to go over and get ready without waking up my little one or my hubby. Looks and smells super clean! Walked over to Disneyland which was about a 5minute walk... (beware, if your extremely tired on your way back, those 5 minutes can turn into 25 minutes :/). One thing I LOVED about this hotel, is that they let us check in at 10am when check in says its at 3pm! How convenient is that!? You'll love this place!
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent review you gave us on your stay with us this month.  We are happy that your daughter loves staying in a "Castle", so we do hope to see you again in the near future.  Thank you for letting us know how you felt about our newly remodeled guests rooms.  Our guest feedback is extremely important to us.  Once again, thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: So impressed with our second stay at this hotel!
Summary: I booked online through a 3rd party and it said i would get a "newly renovated room."  I did not know what to expect. When we arrived, I was definitely not dissapointed!  We checked in an hour early because we arrived in Anaheim earlier than expected and that was not a problem with the front desk at all.  When we walked in the room we were so impressed with the renovation!  We stayed at this hotel a year ago almost to the day and it was nice and they were super helpful and everything but a bit outdated, there was no lie about that.  This time, brand new furniture, bedding, flat screen tv, updated vanity with (granite countertops!), updated decor, carpet, everything!  I already enjoyed having a fridge last time, and this time they added a microwave too, talk about convenient! We
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent comments you posted from your returning stay with us this month.  It was nice to read you enjoyed the new improvements we've made to the rooms, and thank you for the last review you gave us as well.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stay in the Disneyland area regularly, and choose the Castle Inn almost every single visit.  In my opinion, it's the best deal close to Disneyland.  The ambiance is unique and adds to the 'Magic,' the staff are incredibly kind and helpful, and the rooms are very classy and clean.  Castle Inn has been going through a major renovation this year, and we have been impressed with the changes.  My complaints from earlier in the year included older furniture and lack of fridge/microwave.  Now, there is brand new furniture, fridge, and microwave.  They do not charge for parking, which is unheard of.  The people who run and work for this place are unusually nice, especially for the area.  They have always gone out of their way to accommodate us, even anticipating needs we didnt know
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for taking the time to post your review on your stay with us recently.  It was so nice to read that you have been our guest several times, we really appreciate this.  We were happy to read you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms, and that you feel they are "classy & clean" this was very nice.  We also thank you for commenting on our staff, we will surely share this review with them.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future!!  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Purpose of our stay was in town for the Disneyland 5K/Half-Marathon.  Checked-In Friday evening was a Breeze and Checked-Out on Labor Day Monday again with ease.  Our Room #423, was Big and Clean, enjoyed the Very Comfortable Bed, Mini-Fridge, 32" Flat-Screen TV, Free In-Room WiFi, FREE Parking, work desk and the Great A/C in our room, temp's were in the 90's outside, so we stayed in a lot to cool off after our runs. Will return for the TinkerBell Half-Marathon in Jan 2014, already Reserved at the Castle Inn. Plenty of dining options, we ate at a Carrow's, North on Harbor Blvd, just North of Ball Rd on the West-side of street. We also ordered for Delivery with Haus of Pizza(Garden Grove) for our carbo-load,ie., rigatoni and spaghetti and also Mi Casa for Mexican, the Carne Asada
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for the Disney Half Marathon.  We appreciate the time you took to write a review on your stay with us.  It was great to see how you pointed out all the great features in our newly remodeled rooms. Even though our new Flat Screen TV's are 37", we love to see how thrilled our guests are with our new improvements.   Thank you also for pointing out all the restaurants that are close by and within walking distance. We know this is a big bonus for the guest that selects a property without a restaurant on site, so thank you again for pointing this out.  As you stated, you have already booked for January 2014, so we look forward to seeing you in the New Year.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My best friend and I love this place!  We stayed here for our second vacation in August (a budding tradition), and although we looked at other hotels, we decided to go back to Castle Inn and Suites.  August 2012, we stayed here before the renovations started and we thought it was a great place. Returning this August, we thought it was even better!!  - Comfy beds, not too soft- not too hard, just right :) - Nice big vanity and sink area for two young ladies who like to primp.  - Shower was adequate, nothing special. Super clean though! - Clean floors and clean beds and sheets! I love the fact that we always felt *safe* going to and from the hotel to the Disney Parks.  For two ladies in their early twenties, that's a big deal for us.   Very happy with this hotel, and we'll keep
Manager Response: A big thank you for your recent review you posted from your stay with us in August.  We appreciate our "repeat guests" and it was nice to read that you felt safe in our family-friendly environment, that is very important.  It was nice to read you enjoyed our newly remodeled rooms and felt the beds were very "comfy".  We hope you will consider making the Castle Inn & Suites your home every August!  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed the 1 st of September 2013. The room was nice and clean. Newly remodeled room for a great price. The only downside is that they didn't have coffee or breakfast available. And is is just around d the corner of Disney land
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your comments on your recent stay with us.  We were happy to read that you enjoyed our new rooms, and hope you enjoyed the complimentary in-room coffee.  We realize breakfast is a value added option, but since we have so many restaurants around the hotel, we feel our guests like to have the choice to select their own restaurant each morning before heading to Disneyland.    We do appreciate your feedback, and hope to see you again in the near future.  Regards,

Summary: We went to Disneyland at the end of May 2013. I am Disabled and I have problems walking up flights of stairs and use a wheel chair often to get around. The room was ready to go when we got there. I was please with how clean the room was. They Hotel was doing upgrades but the work crew was polite and courteous to us while we stayed there. They even put in an extra wheel chair ramp because the one was blocked by contruction items, we had a 10 day day and the room was ALWAYS clean and fresh when we came back. They always left extra towels do to the fact we went to the pool often and my kiddos used the towels from the bath room. We asked for a late check out at the end but I wanted to go home so we ended up checking out before we had to. Thanks to them we have already planed our
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your feedback on your stay with us this past May.  It was nice to read that you enjoyed your 10 day stay with us, and that you are planning to return in December, thank you for that, and we definitely look forward to seeing you again.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn for the Disney half marathon weekend. The hotel itself was a bit older- the type that has outside entry, but the parking lot and front desk area were well kept and tidy. The rooms were clearly recently re-done-new carpets, drapes, countertops, wallpaper, paint etc. It was plenty of room, safe, comfortable, and clean. Plus, it was two blocks from the entrance to Disney- no shuttle required to play in the park or on race day! The staff was friendly and helpful and the price was reasonable!  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback you provided on your recent stay with us during the Disney half marathon.  It was nice to read that you enjoyed our new rooms, and found our front desk staff friendly.    We hope to see you next year for the marathon, thank you again for posting your comments.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Last minute Birthday/Labor Day weekend trip to Disneyland. The service was excellent, everyone was very helpful and nice. The rooms were very nice, clean and very well kept. AC was excellent (Especially on a hot & humid summer day in So Cal). Excellent location, only 1.5 blocks from the park entrances. Would definitely come back during another getaway to Disneyland. Only downside is that check-in is at 3:00pm.  Overall great spot!
Manager Response: We wanted to take this time to thank you for writing your review on your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your feedback regarding the excellent service you received and that our staff was very helpful.  We look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Just remodeled and within walking distance
Summary: I have stayed at the Castle Inn for many years and on my most recent visit over the Labor Day holiday I was pleasantly surprised to see they have remodeled the rooms, our room had 2 queen beds, a sitting table, a dresser, a large flat screen TV.  The AC was quiet and working perfectly especially during the hot summer day.  Our room was located on the fourth floor, there are only 2 elevators at each end of the hotel, the elevator is quite slow although walking up four flights of stairs was not in the plans.  I would suggest asking for a room on the lower floors.  The hotel does offer free parking, although space is limited and on a first come space available, there may be times when your parking stall may end up being far away from your room.  The hotel staff is very friendly and
