Manager Response: We wanted to thank you for being a returning guest, and for posting your recent review.  We were so happy to read you enjoyed our new rooms.  Thank you again for the feedback, and we do hope to see you again in the near future.  Sincerely,  Castle Inn & Suites

Summary: Vincent was awesome! We decided literally the last minute that we were going to stop at Disneyland on our way home and made a reservation on our way to the hotel from the freeway and it wasn't even there when we arrived and Vincent went out of his way to get the confirmation and get us into our room quickly. We also got back to our room at 11pm and they got us a crip very quickly. Wonderful!
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for providing your feedback on your recent stay with us.  It was nice to see that our staff member assisted you with your booking, and was able to get you in to your room quickly.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: I just cansay i had excellent vacations thanks to Castle Inn
Summary: You can easily walk to Disneyland from this hotel, it is cheap, it is great value, it is just perfect! the people who works there are very kind, i had a talk with Jose and the other guy from the night shift, they were always willing to help, i really enjoyed my stay.  Pool is super clean. rooms have been just improved. Bed and pillows are great. LCD TV.  This was my first trip to Anaheim with familiy visiting Disneyland and we did just the perfect choice.  Thank you very much Castle Inn keep the great work!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review on your stay with us recently.  It was nice to read you enjoyed our new rooms, beds & pillows, and that are staff was helpful and friendly.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Our family of four stayed one night on Aug 20, 2013 to do Disneyland/CA Adventure over two days.  Castle Inn was perfect--reasonable price, clean rooms, friendly and accommodating staff, 15 minute walk to Disneyland.    The standard room was spacious and clean -- no dirt, trash, or signs of past guests anywhere.  There were no problems with parking or with the construction going on (no noise during the night or early morning).  While booking the room I added a few special instructions in the comment area, which the staff accommodated.  Alberta at the front desk was very friendly and sought to make sure that, even at check-out, we were comfortable.  When we were finished with Disneyland at the end of the trip, it was convenient to leave the wife and kids at the Disneyland Guest
Manager Response: Thank you so much for writing a review on your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  It was nice to read our location worked well for you and your family, and that our staff was helpful and friendly.  We appreciate reading that our renovation did not affect your stay at all.  We are almost done, and all very excited.  We were glad to read your kids enjoyed our Castle-theme.  We hope to see you again in the near future if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at this hotel. Newly refurbished rooms and very clean. The small walk to Disneyland made it an excellent place to stay and real value for money. The staff at reception could not be more helpful.
Manager Response: We wanted to say thank you for writing your review on your stay with us in July.  We appreciate the time our guests take to provide us their feedback.  It was nice to read that our new rooms and location worked well for you and your family.  We do offer 2 elevators on property, one in the front of the hotel, and another towards the back of the hotel, we apologize you may not have known this, but ground floor rooms are always a great choice. We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Cintinues to be the # 1 hotel in Anaheim
Summary: My wife and I again stayed at the Castle in & Suites this past June 8th for my 21st wedding Anniversary with my wife . This was our 4th visit to the Castle with also visiting Disneyland .   Again on a constant  basis the Castle is the # 1 in spot for your vacation , your stay over hotel for Disneyland or any attraction in Anaheim .  Relax , kick back and enjoy the great atmosphere and the  guest services , the staff and everyone was so cool .  My wife and I feel like the staff at the Castle is like family . The renovations they have done thus far is fantastic , and it gives the hotel a new era of any other hotel .   We have confirmed reservations at the Castle again for the 5th time in September for my wife's 71st Birthday and no better place to celebrate but the Castle Inn &
Manager Response: We appreciate the wonderful review you provided on your stay with us in June.  It was so nice to read your review, we really appreciate it.  We look forward to welcoming you back when you return to the Anaheim Resort in September.  We are thankful you think of us as family, and look forward to your return.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This is our second time staying here, and this time was even better than the last. The staff was so friendly and genuine. The girl that checked us in was so sweet! And the gentleman that works the night shift was always so helpful and kind! We lost our keys at the parks a few times and he always was willing to help us out! The room was so spacious and always clean! The location can't be beat! 2 blocks away from the Disney parks and great restaurants. Planning to stay here again next summer! Thanks to everyone who made our experience pleasurable.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you so much for taking the time to provide us your feedback on your stay with us this month.  We were so happy to read you had a great time, you enjoyed our location and our staff was friendly and helpful.    We look forward to welcoming you back next summer.  Have a great day,  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: "Great looking Rooms inside ,Dont be Discouraged by the Outer Look".
Summary: Good looking Rooms and Clean swimming pool for kids and adults.Short walk to Disney Parks.You can take a break from Disney then head back after you rest a while in your room.Great price and service.No free breakfast but you saved a good deal to have a good breakfast theres Ihop,Dennys and other restaurantson  a short walk.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for posting your review on your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Our grandkids loved that they were staying in a castle.  The rooms were very clean and updated.  The theme parks were very close, we walked every where.  The staff was very friendly and accommodating.  They had a small market gift shop that we could buy snacks late at night for the grandkids.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to provide your recent feedback on your stay with us.  It was nice to read that you enjoyed our property and new rooms, and that the location worked well for you and your family.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great Experience at  this close to Disneyland Hotel
Summary: We loved our rooms! My family of 9 stayed in 2 adjoining rooms.  The rooms were NICER than the pictures and they were nice and comfortable.  All staff was friendly.  Parking stalls are narrow but there were always plenty of spots, we stayed right next to a remodeling section and we were never disturbed by any noises.   I would definitely stay here again, we loved walking to and from the parks, and our great rooms.
Manager Response: We wanted to take this time to say thank you for writing your review on your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  It was nice to read that you had a great experience and that you will be back to stay with us.  Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We had a very pleasant stay at the Castle Inn and Suites.  The rooms we stayed in were newly remodeled and clean.  The location is perfect, as it only takes a 5 minute walk to go into Disneyland.  There were plenty of restaurants in the area also.  The staff, especially Mark, was very accommodating and were always happy to help.  We will definitely be back.  The only drawback was that their pool was small.  Other than that, we enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for providing us feedback on your recent stay.  We were happy to read that you enjoyed our new rooms, and that our front desk staff member was very accommodating.  We do hope to welcome you back to the Castle Inn & Suites on your next visit to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Let's talk about the Pros first.  The desk staff was very helpful and provided great service.  The room looked like it had just had one of the remodels. Nothing fancy, but we did not spend a lot of time in the room. Beds were comfortable, a bit on firm side. The price for a two room suite were very reasonable. The pricing was better than some of the other properties. The Cons were:  Lamps in room did not work well.  Parking is limited due to construction containers. If you find a parking stall, take it. You may not get another one. No breakfast included, but there is a Dennys and iHop on the way to the park. While it is close to the entrance of the two parks, it seems like it is so far away at the end of the day.  The last complaint is not one that the hotel could do anything
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to post your review on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the time our guests take to provide feedback.  It was nice to read that our staff was friendly and provided great service, and that you enjoyed our new rooms.    We are nearly completed with our renovation project.  We also thank you for the suggestion regarding consideration of non-smoking floors.  We hope if your plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort, you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind.  Once again, thank you,  Kind Regards,

Summary: This hotel has a perfect location. Very close to Disney Land, lots of restaurants and local shops close by.  Our welcome to the hotel was very welcoming and Alberto on the front desk was more than happy to assist in planning and booking day trips for us as well as recommending where we could go. The hotel is undergoing major refurbishment during our stay of which there was no mention when booking the hotel.  We were woken up early to building deliveries and builders walking and working up an down the corridors and nearby rooms. The builders were moving rubble in large trucks which were very noisy going past the room at all hours. Considering the number of tradesmen on site the shower that I reported as having no pressure every morning to the front desk was never resolved or
Manager Response: We would like to take this time to thank you for providing your feedback from your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the comments you provided on our Staff member, location and our rooms.  We do apologize for the inconveniences caused with our current renovation process.   The renovation detail team is on site from 9am - 4pm.  These are approved hours by the City of Anaheim, all efforts to minimize noise during these hours are provided.    We are sorry we fell short in some area's during your visit, and strive to improve with feedback such as yours, so thank you again.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Really no complaints, the parking was hard, no parking anywhere near my room. I have a foot injury so closer parking would have been nice, but it was ok. Room was large and clean, beds were comfortable, not much noise at all, they are remodeling, lighting in bathroom was BRIGHT, would have liked to dim it alittle but was not able to, but some people like that, This is a older hotel so you will deal with things like old air conditioning unit, but it worked, slight old building smell, so if your sensitive to smells you might not like that, I always bring frebrez so no problem,we liked our room, cozy, and as I said very clean. The staff was outstanding, Alberta call and got me a motorized cart, and stayed right there helping me every step of the way. She is a Gem...  If you want
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent review you wrote regarding your stay with us in July.  It was nice to read that your stay was comfortable and the location worked well for you and your family.    Thank you for your comment regarding one of our staff members, we will certainly pass this along.  We do hope if your plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort, you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind.  Once again, thank you for your review.  Kind Regards,

Summary: This is a very mix felling stay for us, in some cause they‘d get 5 stars but other they can only 2.  Location: Only 2 blocks way from the main walkway of Disneyland, easy to get to the park and came back for a rest few times per day, there are many restaurants in the Surrounding, ABC store and 7/11 across street, which you can get snacks, sandwiches, and bottles H2O bring to the Park.  Service: Amazing front desk, every time I came by, they always had a smile on the lovely face, especially thanks to Vincent who made extra time  to find out the transportation that we needed.  Housekeeping:  Most of them are not well spoken in English language, (We had fun by doing body sign together :), but doing their job well. At first I would leave the tips afters our stay but find out they
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for getting back with us so quickly.  We appreciate your feedback and we are looking into the situation you brought to our attention, so thank you again for that.  We also wanted to thank you for your comments you provided on your overall visit. It was nice to read that our family suite worked well for you and your family, and our front desk staff assisted you each time with a smile.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites, if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: It is walking distance to Disneyland. We opened and closed Disneyland for 2 days and had no trouble at all. We arrived real early in the morning and checked in but wasn't able to get our room at that time which was ok with us. We were able to park at the hotel and after making sure our items in the car were as secure as we could make them we went to Disney. When we showed up after closing Disney we found out we were parked in a perfect spot. We didn't move the car until we checked out. The gentleman behind the counter at checkin is also the same person I had called and set the room up with back in January 2013. He actually remembered talking to me and was very helpful. They gave us very good directions(take lane closest to hotel and stay in and you're on the interstate lol) on
Manager Response: We wanted to say thank you for taking the time to write your review on your stay with us recently.  We were happy to read that our location, services and room worked well for you and your family.  We are in the process of upgrading our Wi-Fi, so thank you for being patient with us on this.    We do hope when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort, you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind as your home away from home.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: If you are looking for a great value with excellent location, stay at this hotel.
Summary: Great location and good value. I would say that our family had a good stay. It would've been better if the construction was done. I had a suite very far from the elevator and handicap stalls. Essential for my handicap child. Other than that, the staff was nice and friendly. They attended to me right away. Even gave a coupon for our next stay for $20 off ea night. Valid Thru June 2014.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to provide us your feedback on your stay with us recently.  Thank you for staying at the Castle Inn & Suites, we do hope to see you again if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We visited Disneyland between July 16-23 and stayed at the Castle Inn & Suites. We have visited  DL a few times, staying at various hotels and this one did not disappoint.  Although they are currently under renovation, this did not disrupt our trip or stay what so ever.  This is a great hotel to stay at for a great value and is a  6 minute walk to the main Disney gates.  Very quick and easy to get to and nice and close if you want to come back to escape the afternoon heat and crowds...and enjoy the lovely clean pool & hot tub. The newly renovated rooms are very nice. Overall the hotel is kept clean. However, the rooms typically were not cleaned before 2 pm, so if you want it done sooner, just ask, they are very accommodating. The beds are super comfy as are the pillows. Probably
Manager Response: We would like to take this opportunity to say thank you for writing your review on your recent stay with us.  You provided some great feedback regarding our location, services and rooms, and we appreciate that very much.  In addition, we are currently in the process of upgrading our Wi-Fi system.  Thank you again, we look forward to seeing you back at the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Good hotel in a convenient location
Summary: We had a family room, recently renovated, and thought it was very good for the price.  The hotel is very close to the main Disney entrance and there are a variety of restaurants nearby.  We found the staff to be very helpful and any minor problems were quickly rectivied.  It is not the Waldorf but we thought it was good value for money - considering it was peak time. Main con is that the wifi is poor at the back of the hotel.  Also with ongoing renovations you have to be a bit patient as the workers can sometimes accidentally cut things such as water. The work is not a noise problem at all.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review on your recent stay with us.   We were happy to read our location worked well for you.  We are currently in the process of upgrading our Wi-Fi system, so we apologize you had some concerns with the Wi-Fi during your stay.  We appreciate the time our guests take in providing such valuable feedback, so once again, thank you.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort in the future.  Regards,

Summary Heading: Big change since last time I was here
Summary: I first stayed at the castle Inn about 2 years ago. It was ok, It seemed a little outdated. However, I just stayed there yesterday as I have an annual pass at Disneyland. I was told by a very friendly hotel agent (Wish I remembered her name) that the rooms had just been renovated. They gave me a room on the 4th floor which is fine being that they had an elevator and I provided a little view of the city. I was amazed at how the room looked. Everything was beautiful from the new carpet to the new bathroom/sink tile. The beds were new and the furniture was very nice. The TV was a new flat screen rather than the old Tube TV like last time. I had a very restful night and I would stay here again. My only issue was that being on the 4th floor you could not get a Wi-Fi signal. When you
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the time you took to write a review and we were happy to read you enjoyed the new updates we've made to our guest rooms.  We hope to see you back at the Castle Inn & Suites again in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I looked at other comments and cannot believe anyone had a good stay here! You name it, it was terrible, where do I start....checked in and not a smile or even a pretend smile from the guy at reception (Ange) with no information about facilities or the area.  I would be in the shower and the water would go to either freezing cold or boiling hot without warning.  The mattress and pillows were very lumpy and uncomfortable.  Broken and damaged things in the room that could be easily fixed.  The channels on the tv are limited and the tv itself was a model I had about 15yrs ago. It was in a solid cabinet, so could not watch tv without being on the bed. They only provided the very basics and the room itself was dingy, very dark (the lighting itself was pathetic) and overall terrible.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for feedback on your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We apologize we fell short in making your guest experience at the Castle Inn one to remember.   Our goal is to insure all guests at the Castle Inn & Suites have a very positive and memorable experience, and again, we are sorry you did not achieve this during your stay.  Now that we have renovated, we do hope that one day in the future, you would consider giving our property another chance, so you can experience our true first-class hospitality.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My husband, daughter, and I had an excellent stay here at the Castle Inn and Suites on our last minute trip to Anaheim.  Our room had been recently renovated and was it tip-top condition.  We had just stayed at the Hilton in Pasadena and was able to compare the two.  The Castle Inn rocked!  It was great having a microwave and fridge in our room.  Everyone was very nice and friendly.  It was an easy walk to Disneyland.  Definitely would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your feedback to us on your recent stay.  We were happy you selected the Castle Inn & Suites for your last minute trip to Disneyland.  We were also glad to hear you enjoyed our newly remodeled guest rooms.  Thank you again, we hope to see you again on a future trip to the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My wife and I took my Son and our 3 Grandsons to Disneyland recently and we stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites in Anaheim California, overall the trip was great! The Hotel wasn't perfect but it lived up to the 3 1/2 stars that they gave it on the site I booked it on, we had no problems and the staff were very helpful, the only draw back we could find was the room we stayed in and I believe most rooms in that hotel do not have closets in the rooms, had my wife known that we may have had to choose another place to stay. Overall it was a good place and fairly close to the Disneyland front gate. If you have trouble walking this may not be good for you, it's about 3/4's of a mile.I have bad feet so it was a challenge for me, I did walk though.Even at my age (64) Disneyland is still
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your feedback on your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the fact that you chose our property.  We are sorry we fell short with providing a closet in your guest room.  We had portable clothes racks available We just had our brand new custom-made Thomasville wardrobes delivered last week.  We have portable clothes racks available, so had you let us know this was a concern, we would have provided one for you during your stay.    If your plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort, we do hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Don't Expect Much and You Won't be Disappointed
Summary: This hotel has a great location, almost directly across the street from the entrance to Disneyland.  It is a basic, courtyard style 3 story motel.  Cleanliness was satisfactory.  Beds were comfortable.  No internet service of any kind, a big negative to me.  Also no business center, although they will let you print your boarding pass on an old laptop and rickety printer in the snack shop (for the outrageous fee of $2 per page!).  Renovations are currently under way.  No restaurant.  The room had no iron or ironing board, when we called they sent an iron and a mini board up to the room.  This was the lowest priced hotel on the street we could find.  While it wasn't bad, I  couldn't escape the cheap motel feel.  The final insult was getting stuck between floors in the rear
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to provide us your comments on your stay with us recently.  Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback, this was very helpful and we appreciate when our guests take the time to write us.  We apologize you experienced a few concerns during your stay.  These are being addressed, and again, thank you for your feedback.   If your plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort in the future, we hope you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind.  Thank you again,

Summary: They just renovated some of the rooms and we got one it was great the beds are so comfortable and rooms are big. Alberta at the front desk was fantastic always happy and ready to help. I have gone back several years now but this was the best the rooms are great I did not have any problems in are room and it is not far from Disneyland which is a plus and there are places to eat right next door and some even delivery to your room overall fantastic experince. Thanks Alberta and Castle inn.      Mercedes
Manager Response: We wanted to thank you very much for your recent review you provided on your stay with us the end of June.  We have passed along your comments regarding our staff and we thank you for that.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future, if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort in the future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel a few times a few years ago and was satisfied.  This time the hotel was even better. My room was newly renovated.  Brand new furniture, fresh paint, clean carpet, new bedding, comfortable beds, large size room.  It is super close to walk to Disneyland and the price is pretty cheap. They let me check in before regular check in time and I was able to park my car there before I actually got a room.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review you recently posted regarding your stay with us in June.  We appreciate your feedback and we were happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and enjoyed our newly remodeled rooms.   We hope to see you at the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We've stayed here on multiple occasions, usually booking through a third party travel site. We have always gotten friendly service from staff, and the rooms have been clean. In our experience, it took about 15 minutes to get to the park gates.   Overall, you get a good experience for what you pay. Our experiences were fitting of the price point and area.   Not our first choice travelling with a small child due to the walk, but we would definitely book again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for recently commenting on your stay with us last September.  We appreciate the fact you have become a repeat guest, and do hope to see you again in 2013.  Since your last visit, we began our remodel project, and are about a month away from completion on all new guest rooms and suites.  We hope you will be able to return to the Disneyland Resort, and the Castle Inn, so you can see our "new frills" and experience a whole new product.  Thank you again, and hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: We were 5 adults and 5 children and stayed in two suites side by side on the fourth  floor. The rooms had just been recently refurbished and were beautifully kitted out with 2 Queen size beds in one room and a King bed in the other spectacularly comfortable.  The attention to detail was amazing - the hand towels were folded to look like swans and the face cloths and towels folded to compliment. Even the toilet rolls were given attention and folded at the edges.  We found the location perfect (back and forth to Disneyland several times in a day) -  the price for such beautiful rooms so very very reasonable - the staff were very friendly and very helpful - we loved the pool and hot tub.  We also rented a couple of cars and drove to Universal Studios and into Hollywood and yes the
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to comment on your recent stay with us.  We are very happy you enjoyed our newly remodeled suites and thank you for commenting on our attention to detail.  It was also nice to read that our staff was friendly and helpful, and that our pool area came in handy for some relaxation and enjoyment.  We hope if your travel plans return you to the Disneyland Resort area, you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind for your home away from home.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Our entire family just returned from Disneyland, our two sons and their families. We stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites. The rooms were newly remodeled and very clean. We tipped the maids every day and they did a great job, one day we forgot to tip them and I found a bundle of money on the floor where it had fallen out of my pocket and it was still there. The pool, kids pool and hot tub were very clean and the kids enjoyed it very much. The walk to and from the park was short and sweet. The only thing I didn't like was the room had no closet. I could not hang up my clothes. Since we were spending a week I needed a closet. I would stay there again as the rates were very reasonable.
Manager Response: Dear Jeanette,  We wanted to thank you for taking the time to provide us your comments about your stay with us this month.  We were happy to read that your family enjoyed their time at the Castle Inn and that you found our newly remodeled rooms clean.  Our housekeepers do a great job at the hotel and really appreciate it when guests acknowledge them, so thank you for that.  You will be happy to know that just this past week, we received our wardrobes for the guest rooms.  They had been on back order and took longer than we thought to receive them at the Hotel, so we were sorry you did not have proper closet space for your clothes.  We hope one day you can return to the Anaheim Resort and the Castle Inn & Suites.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: While it is a lot darker than the photographs, it is fairly authentic.  The only problem is that the parking is very limited, especially during renovations.  The rooms are older but very clean.  The price is right being so close to Disney parks.  The check in staff is amazing, they really take care of their customers.  I would recommend short stays and would come there again. Need some type of breakfast to make this place even better.  Beds are somewhat hard , but still give good lumbar support.  Go there.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent comments on your stay with us this month.  We appreciate the comment regarding our front desk staff being "amazing", we have shared this with our team.  We are remodeling all guest rooms and providing all new Serta mattress',  we hope you are able to return to the Anaheim Resort in the near future to experience first hand our new rooms, and comfy mattress'.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The room was newly remodeled.  It was clean and very nice.  The only problem is that the hair dryer in the bathroom only worked if you held the "on" button down.  Also we left the room and 8:00 a.m. and returned at 5:00 p.m. to find the room was just being serviced.  We were tired and wanted to relax but had to wait.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review on your recent stay with us.  Thank you for commenting on our newly remodeled rooms.  We were sorry to read that you had an issue with the hair dryer. The hair dryers are brand new, so apparently we had one that did not work properly.   We spoke to our Executive Housekeeper regarding your room being cleaned so late in the day, we make all effort to insure all guest rooms are cleaned in a timely manner.    Once again, thank you for your valuable feedback, we do hope to see you back at the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Regards,

Summary: My husband and I decided to take a quick trip to Disneyland with our two kiddos 3 yrs and 1 yr, we live in San Diego so decided to go up the night before so we would miss the traffic.  We found a great deal at Castle Inn and Suites and although we had never stayed there we thought what the heck, its just one night and its inexpensive AND its a new room!  Upon arrival we were greeted by a nice guy who was to check us in, unfortunately our reservation was not there as I had only booked a couple hours before, the gentleman was kind enough to call the website we booked on and waited 15 mins for a fax to be sent over.  Once he got the confirmation her quickly got our room key and had housekeeping send a crib to our room.  The crib was a $6 extra charge.  So we got to our room and the
Manager Response: Dear Monica,  Thank you very much for your feedback you provided on your stay with us this month.  Thank you for choosing the Castle Inn & Suites for your quick getaway with the family.  We appreciate the fact that you enjoyed your room and felt we offered a great value.    We hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites if your plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed 7 nights on our Disneyland vacation and the hotel was fine for us. Rooms were very dated, we got great rates from a third party, at rack rates I would probably have given two stars. Rooms were clean enough though the carpets were dirty. Our phone never worked we told the front desk several times they said they would pass it along it still wasn't fixed on our last day. Not a big deal because the only time we would have used it was to call the front desk. The TV and cable service was downright terrible, probably the worst thing about our stay. Would I stay again? Only with good rates, if paying rack rates I would go somewhere else.
Manager Response: Dear Jake,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback on your stay with us in April.  We appreciate the time you took, and your valuable feedback is appreciated.  We are sorry you had concerns with your telephone and TV service.   We are in the middle of our renovation project, and both telephones and TV/Cable are being upgraded.  We hope you will be able to return to the Disneyland Resort, and consider staying at the Castle Inn & Suites again, so you can experience our new rooms and amenities.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at this hotel at the beginning of May.  Booked thru a 3rd party, but there was no problem at all during check-in or check -out, no hidden extra fees or charges, the clerk check our paperwork and handed us our rooms keys.  Things were a bit dated, for instance, the room keys were the old plastic cards with actual holes punched in them rather than the magnetic type, but there was no problem, everything worked fine.  The carpets left our white socks dirty, but everything else was nice and clean.  Upon entering the room I wasn't having good thoughts about the beds after seeing them, but actually they were fine, didn't care for the pillows though, they were just cheap foam rubber filled.  If you plan on charging a bunch of electronic devices, make sure you bring a power
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review on your stay with us in May.  We appreciate the feedback you provided during your stay.  As you commented, we are doing a renovation to all guest rooms, so once completed; all rooms will include state of the art electronic RFID locks. We hope if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort, you will consider visiting us again, so you can see first-hand the enhancements we are making to the property.

Summary Heading: Awesome if your going to Disneyland
Summary: This is the 4th time here and the newly renovated rooms were great. Location was good nice 10 min walk to Main gate. 5 min from IHOP, Dennys, Bubba Gumps and Cheesecake Factory. Room was clean there was some construction on 2nd level but no probems
Manager Response: Thank you so much for spending your 4th time with us.  We appreciate our repeat guests, and hope to see you back in the near future.  Thank you for your nice comment regarding our new rooms, and that the renovation did not affect your stay with us.  Hope to see you on your 5th visit back to the Disneyland Resort and the Castle Inn & Suites.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 1 week and had no problems whatsoever it is very quiet and the rooms are clean. It's a close walk to Disneyland which is a good thing because it saves you the $15 parking fee. It's also close to stores and eating establishments. We loved staying here this was our first time here and will definitely be staying here again!!!! Especially that they are renovating their rooms
Manager Response: We were happy to receive your feedback on your recent stay with us.  It was nice to read you had no problems with your stay, and that our location worked well for you, and our complimentary parking is a great savings!  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort in the near future.

Summary: This hotel was a very positive experience for our family.  Upon arrival, the front desk had no record of our reservation.  We had used a third party for making the reservation and had paid in advance.  Before I was able to locate my receipt, the desk manager had room keys and a place for us to stay.  He took the time to find the problems with our reservation after we were comfortably settled in our room.   The hotel is in the middle of a remodel, but we were not disturbed by the workmen or their equipment.  We were given a remodeled room which was nicely decorated and furnished.   This hotel is perfect walking distance to the Disney parks.  Our family was able to walk the distance in under 15 min.  Our experience was very positive and the hotel was a perfect place to crash after
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your comments on your “positive experience” you encountered on your recent stay with us.  We were happy we were able to sort out your booking with us, and glad to hear we got you into a room quickly and stress-free.  Thank you for letting us know that our renovation we are doing did not disrupt your stay with us, we really appreciate this feedback.  We hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.

Summary Heading: Big value for a small price
Summary: This hotel is sure to be a favourite for families.. it really does look like a castle...still suitable for all patrons though as we found it comfortable, clean and friendly. A gentle mention at the reception desk that the room next door occupied by a group of noisy young people who were in the party zone... resulted in the manager quickly moving us to another room, a suite no less, without any additional cost to us. We  were treated like we were at the Hilton. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Carol,  Thank you for providing your recent feedback on your stay with us the end of May.  You were here during Disneyland Grad Nights, so we were happy to read our staff accommodated you in a room away from the kids.  We strive on our guests receiving a first class experience, so we were very happy to read that we “treated you like you were at a Hilton”!  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: We booked our stay with this hotel specifically for our trip to Disney.  We had stayed before about three years ago and decided it was sufficient again.  Our stay last time was fine, but this time it was much better.  They recently renovated the rooms.  All the updates made it feel much more comfortable and clean.  Proximity to Disneyland is about two blocks, seriously a 5 min walk.  It was perfect for our family.  It is located near many affordable eating options and worked out great for our family as a much more affordable option for lodging for our Disney trip.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback you provided on your stay with us in May.  We were happy you returned to the Castle Inn, and that you enjoyed our new rooms.  It was nice to read that our location to nearby restaurants was convenient for you and your family.  We look forward to having you return to the Castle Inn on your next visit to the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: 6 of us stayed in a suite and it was a great experience. Staff were very friendly and the rooms were clean. Location is excellent for the price. Lots of restaurants near by. When we go back next year I will definitely stay at this hotel again :)
Manager Response: We would like to say Thank you for posting your feedback on your stay with us in April.  We really appreciate the time our guests take to sit down and provide us feedback on their stay.  It was nice to read that you had a great experience with the Suite you booked.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.

Summary: We stayed here for a couple of nights so that we could visit Disneyland and it was great.  It is right across the street from the parks so you don't have to drive or take the buses or worry about how long it will take to get home after the fireworks.  The staff were very helpful and it was quiet and clean. It is also round the corner from a choice of restaurants, e.g the Cheesecake factory.  A great place for your Disney trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review on your stay with us in May.  We were happy to read our location worked well for you and your family and that you enjoyed being near the Cheesecake Factory.  We hope to see you back at the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans return to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: We recently stayed two nights at Castle Inn and Suites in Anaheim.  Our ultimate destination was Disneyland and this hotel is perfectly located for families who are in Anaheim to visit the park.  Once arriving at Castle Inn and Suites we were happy to see that it is well located near many different restaurants as well as to Disney Village and the California Adventure.  The rooms are large and have been recently renovated.  They include refrigerators and microwave ovens.  The beds were very comfortable and the flat screen TV was updated and modern.  There is a great pool area with a nice large pool, a hot tub and a very shallow pool for children.  There is also a small market on site and several stores and shops within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent comments you posted on your stay with us in May.  We are glad our location worked well for you and your family, and the fact you enjoyed the adjacent market and nearby restaurants. We also appreciate the feedback you provided on our newly remodeled guest rooms.  We hope to see you return to the Castle Inn & Suites on a future visit to the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: Look , I don't know whats up with everybody when you stay at the castle because as for myself and my wife we think it is great . Everyone from the front desk , to upper management to hotel maid service was fantastic . Very helpful attitudes from all aspects of employees , I am a disabled combat Vietnam Veteran in a wheel chair and in use of portable oxygen  and the staff  ( I think ) went over board to see to it that we were comfortable .  As a matter of fact I am currently attempting to get a hold of the hotel tonight to make reservations for tomorrow but there line is busy constantly so that says something for their hotel and their hospitality.   I am a family member of  upper executive management staff at a world class major hotel chain in Honolulu , Hawaii and I would rather
Manager Response: Dear Bob,  Thank you! Thank you! For posting your feedback on your stay with us last June.  We really appreciate the time our guests take to sit down and provide us feedback on their stay.  We strive to provide first-class hospitality and we appreciate that you took notice of this.  We welcome you back anytime, so do not hesitate contacting us direct or via our website to book your future visit at the Castle Inn & Suites.

Summary: I stayed here because I could get a decent military rate.  I have been back twice.  Great location.  Fun castle theme for my kid.  Walking distance to Disneyland was great.  In my case, close enough that I could carry my boy back to the hotel after a long day at the park.  Crash in the room, get up have a bowl of cereal or stop at Denny's in the am and do it again.  Best vacation ever.  The hotel is not the ritz-carlton but I gotta say location is great, kid loved it, and the folks running the place were reasonable, flexible and very accomodating thru our  plan changes.  Great place to crash.
Manager Response: We would like to say thank you for being a returning military guest of ours.  Thank you for taking the time to write your review on your stay with us last December.  We are looking forward to having you return in the near future to experience first-hand our newly remodeled guest rooms.  We are expecting to be completed by early summer, so we look forward to seeing you again at the Castle Inn & Suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We just got back from a 3 day, 4 night vacation to Disneyland Resort and we stayed at Castle Inn & Suites. Our service was great upon arrival and the desk clerk gave us some suggestions of things to do that night. We had two rooms and they had no problem moving our rooms to be adjoining.  It was great going from room to room so easily.  The rooms were clean and pleasant smelling. We were concerned with some of the reviews we read before we left for our trip, but we were pleased with our overall stay.  We didn't hear any construction from the remodels (I don't know if they were working those days??) We would definitely be stay in this hotel again.  I'm intrigued to see what the rooms look like after the remodel.
Manager Response: Dear Natalie,  Thank you so much for your recent comments you posted on your stay with us in May.  We were happy to read that we provided great service to you upon arrival.   We were also glad to read that you were not disturbed by the renovation team.  You will be pleasantly surprised to see our finished product, so we cannot wait for you to return to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: A good hotel in a great location
Summary: We stayed here during our last trip to Disneyland and, overall, I was pleased with our experience at Castle Inn and Suites.  My son has constantly asked every time we go to Disney (we're SoCal locals) if we could PLEASE stay in the castle hotel, so this time, we decided to surprise him.  Overall, the hotel was clean, the staff was friendly, and the rooms were nice.  My only disappointment was that the rooms did not have a castle theme at all.  I know that can get pricey, but even just decorating the rooms with pictures of castles or princesses or knights would be a huge bonus.  From the outside, the hotel is great!  From inside the rooms, it's just...another hotel.  That's not a BAD thing, but it would be so easy to keep customers (and get more repeats) with just a few
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide us your feedback on your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites this past April.  Thank you for returning to the Hotel to surprise your son.  We appreciate the time our guests take to sit down and provide feedback, so this is very important to us.   We do hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.

Summary Heading: Good value for money and handy location
Summary: We booked this hotel on line based on price and location and were not disappointed.  Although the rooms were basic and the decor was a bit tired they were clean and adequate for our needs and I considered them good value for money.  The hotel is advising that they are undertaking a refurbishment of the rooms and this will definitely be a bonus.  It was close to Disneyland (10 mins walk at the most) and had a shop on the premises which was great for basic things.  It was also next door to a shopping centre that had a great Chinese Takeway, an Italian restaurant, Subway, a liquor outlet and a cafe/smoothie bar and was across the road from a 7/11.  There were also Dennys, Hop It, Tony Romas, McDonalds, Bubba Gumps, the Cheesecake Factory and other eating places within 10 mins walk.
Manager Response: Dear Janet,  We appreciate the time you took to write a review on your recent stay with us.  We were glad to read that our location and value for money worked well for you and your family, and we really appreciate this feedback.  We have started our remodel project and we do hope you can return to the Castle Inn to experience first-hand our fabulous new rooms.

Summary: We are Annual Passholders at D'Land and stay an average of 20 nights a year - and 99% at Castle Inn & Suties - and have stayed there the last 5+years. We did the trade off 'of low price' v. 'quality' all those years. The current REMODEL makes all the difference in the world ! Great comfortable beds and pillow and all other comforts. Two items that could still be improved - electrical plugs for all our devices and no wireless access from the rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your comments on your stay with us in April.  We were happy to read that you enjoyed our newly remodeled guest rooms.  We are addressing the electrical plug and Wi-Fi concerns, so thank you for bringing that to our attention.  Since you are annual pass holders we do hope to see you back at the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.

Summary: My wife stayed at this hotel and was so impressed by the standard of service. The rooms were also extremely clean and the service staff outstanding. I rang the hotel sometimes 3-4 times a day and was always well greeted, especially by Vincent. The hotel is perfectly located to Disneyland. One problem is the absence of any hanging space in the room for clothes. If you're going for an extended period this is necessary. I'm sure it can be fixed. We WILL stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are very glad you were impressed by our service and how clean our guest rooms are.  We appreciate when one of our staff members stands out, so thank you for your comment regarding Vincent. We have Wardrobes being installed in our new rooms, so this has been addressed.  We do hope to see you back at the Castle Inn & Suites one day if your plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: We are Annual Passholders at Disneyland and stay an average of 8 nights- 4 trips a year.  That's a lot of nights in a hotel!  We've tried a bunch of lower cost hotels- not the 1or 2*- but middle of the road.  This is one of the best we've tried.  The Location- this is the draw for us...  very close to Disneyland - 5 minutes to the entrance & 10 minutes to the gates.  This was EXTREMELY important to us.  The places that have shuttles do not meet our needs because we have a double stroller with "stuff" & don't want to unload, fold, reload, unfold every time we get on a shuttle.  What is also nice is that there are restaurants next door- quick & cheap.  We also walked to Garden Walk for restaurants there.  GREAT location.  The check-in process was smooth.  My 1 & 3 year old were
Manager Response: Dear Chele,   Thank you very much for your recent comments you posted on your stay with us this month. We are happy to know that our location works great for your family, and that our check in process was very smooth.  Since you are annual pass holders, we do hope to see you return to the Castle Inn & Suites on your next visit to Disneyland, so you can experience our newly renovated guest rooms.

Summary: YUCK! The carpet was stinky & dirty and next to the radiator it was soggy! Other than that the place was ok but not as wonderful as we had hoped.  The pool is in the middle of the parking lot and it was difficult to get any customer service unless you went to the front desk.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your stay with us last August.  We apologize we fell short with your experience at the Castle Inn.  We have started our room renovations so the concern you had with our carpets is now being addressed.  We hope you will consider returning to the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort in the near future, so you can experience our newly remodeled guest rooms.

Summary Heading: Horrible...everything about this place was horrible!!!
Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights and 6 days and it had to have been the worst hotel I have ever experienced. Beds were rock hard and lumpy...Pillows felt like they washed and dried them causing the filling to wad up. Front desk was the worst customer service I have ever seen. I've been to a lot of hotels and I have never been treated so badly!!! They had the entire hotel under construction and they started some days at 6am drilling and hammering over our room. Our shower was broken an it took two complaints before someone was sent to fix it. It literally dribbled water out so we were unable to even shower until they fixed it. Cable went out frequently. My biggest issue though was the front desk. I am still floored at the way I was treated. Even the manager was rude and basically told
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate your review as well.  Through the information you provided we were able to determine that the City of Anaheim Waste Disposal truck was arriving earlier than their regularly scheduled pick up time of after 9:00 a.m.  We have since rectified the problem with the city of Anaheim, arranging for them to pick up the trash no earlier than 9:00 a.m. which they were doing prior to your stay.  Our hotel is under renovation, however only a portion of the hotel is being renovated and day to day activity is not generally affected.  The work that is being done to improve the property is scheduled from approximately 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., we felt these hours would least affect our guests because most of our guests will be at the theme parks during that time.  Most importantly, we would like to apologize for the misunderstanding with the Front Desk.  We here at the Castle Inn & Suites pride ourselves on our customer service and try to provide each and every guest with a happy, helpful, and memorable experience.  Along with the improvements to the rooms we are striving to constantly improve our level of customer satisfaction as well.  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and for making us aware of your experience.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights while visiting Disneyland and were very pleased.  The check-in process was super smooth and we were able to get 2 smoking rooms (a rarity in this area) on the ground floor.  The rooms were clean and good sized with frig and coffee maker.  No microwave, at least not in the standard room.  They are in the midst of a remodel starting with the 4th floor so it can be a bit noisy during the day.  Not the closest to the entrance to Disneyland but close enough to walk easily.  Bed was firm but not hard and we all slept fine and had no issues.  Everything worked as it should and we had no issues with our stay.  Free parking was a nice plus since we had 2 cars.  We stayed here once before several years ago and would stay here again.
Manager Response: We wanted to take the time to thank you for your comments on your stay with us recently.  We were pleased to see that our check-in process went smoothly for you and that we provided you parking for 2 cars.    We apologize you experienced some noise during the day while our renovation is going on.  As you may know, it's never a good time to remodel a Hotel, but it has to be done.  We were happy to know it did not seem to impact your overall stay with us, so thank you for that.  We can't wait for you to return to the Castle Inn & Suites, so you can experience our newly completed rooms, we are sure you will be pleasantly surprised.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My wife and I always stay at Castle Inn whenever we come to Disneyland about every other month or so. The service is always superb and the staff is always great to work with!  On this particular trip we got there early and our room type was not yet available. We left to the park and came back about 2 hours later to find that we had been upgraded to an Executive Suite which was am AMAZING room! It had a large bathroom, 2 comfortable beds, and also a couch. The room was very clean and well stocked and had a great view of the back of Cars Land and Tower of Terror from the California Adventure park.  They are currently renovating but noise was NEVER an issue on any of the days of our 4 day trip. We are very excited to see the rooms when they are complete this summer.  On the last
Manager Response: Dear Steven,  Thank you so much for your comments you provided on your recent stay with us.  We were happy to read you had an "Amazing Stay as Always" and that you always stay with us when you are in the Disneyland Resort.  We are glad that our Executive Suite worked well for you and your family.    We appreciate your comments regarding the renovation noise and that it did not affect your stay.  It's never a good time to renovate, but it has to be done, so we make all effort to keep noise to a minimum when possible.  Thank you for your feedback on this, we have shared this with our staff.  We are excited to have you return to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future, so you can experience first-hand our newly remodeled guest rooms & suites.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Has to be one of the worst hotels I have ever stayed at. Bed were like sleeping on springs and wood..showers suck..floor where dirty. And the started construct early..lots of hammering.  Will not stay here again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us feedback regarding your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We apologize for your experience you had while being our guest.  We have addressed the concerns you had regarding our beds, and overall room quality.  As you know, we are in the process of remodeling all guest rooms.  We realize this is an inconvenience to our guests, and it's never a good time to renovate, but it had to be done.  We do hope you will reconsider staying with us in the near future.  Our remodel is due to be completed by end of June or early July.  We would enjoy having you return so you can experience first-hand our new rooms.  Thank you again for your feedback, it is always helpful to hear from our guests and we do appreciate your time.  Kind Regards,

Summary: My family of 3 stayed for 5 nights. The front desk staff were very friendly and were eager to help us out with anything we needed. Quite clean. Location is about 7 minutes from the park. Bad part, well the rooms are not the best. I could here neighbors for all 5 days. A word of advise to management, please replace the beds!!!!! So uncorfortable. If you update this hotel it would be great! Luckily Disneyland makes it all good no matter what.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback on your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were happy to read that our Front Desk Staff was friendly and they provided you prompt service.  I have passed this along to our team.   We apologize you had some noise concerns.  We are addressing the issue regarding the beds.  We have started the remodeling of all our guest rooms. The remodel is a complete renovation of the room, so all new beds, TV's, etc.  we do hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future so you can experience first-hand our newly remodeled guest rooms and suites.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We stayed at this hotel because it was close to Disneyland & it was one of the cheapest hotels we found online. Front desk staff were very friendly & the rooms were clean though a little out dated (TV was wicked old, remote rarely worked) but for being so close to the park & the fact that we just needed a place to sleep & shower (we were at the park all day!) it served its purpose. It's less than a 10 minute walk to Disneyland & to the left of the hotel is a little strip mall so we could get water & other necessities . There are PLENTY of good restaurants around the area as well. Our favorite was Alerto's (Mexican food) We're Disney Junkies, so when we return to Anaheim we will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Terry,  Thank you so much for your great feedback you provided regarding your recent stay with us.  We were happy to read that our Front Desk Staff was friendly and that you found our rooms were very clean.  Comments like this are very appreciated.  We are addressing the concern regarding our (outdated TV's) we are remodeling our guest rooms which include all new flat screen TV's so we are very excited to have you return so you can experience the New and Improved Castle Inn & Suites.  Thank you again,

Summary: Good: Very helpful staff, clean lobby bathroom, and close to Disneyland  Bad: Very tired room (old stained carpets, mold in the bathroom, old comforter, barely working tv, u-shaped beds), lack of parking, and loud air conditioner.  My family stayed here over Spring Break and had a great time at Disneyland minus the crowds. We arrived early Sunday morning way before check-in and though a room was not available but were willing to store refrigerated items and lock-up our valuables. We were staying with two other couples and requested rooms next to each other, which they accommodated.   Once we got into the room in the late evening, we first noticed the smell of staleness, like the room hadn't been opened in awhile. We then noticed the OLD stained green carpet and the lovely 80's
Manager Response: Wyatt,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write your review on your recent stay with us this past March.  Thank you for the nice comment regarding our Staff, lobby bathroom and distance to Disneyland.    The overall feedback regarding your room and parking is extremely helpful, and we use comments such as yours to share with our staff so we can work towards making improvements where needed.  We have started our revitalization of our guest rooms, as you may have witnessed while at the Hotel.  We recently communicated our remodel project to our in-house guests, so we apologize we did not have notices up during your visit.  We certainly hope you will give us another opportunity for a visit if your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort in the near future.  Once again, thank you very much for your time, your feedback and comments assist us in our overall goal of achieving excellent guest satisfaction.  Castle Inn & Suites Management Team

Summary Heading: Perfect for a visit to Disneyland!
Summary: My family of 4, two kids two adults, stayed for 3 nights the last week of March. The front desk crew were so nice and accommodating, allowing us to check in early. Our room was big and very clean with bright white fluffy towels, the maid had made swans out of the washcloths! Make no mistake, this property is old and the mattresses will never be mistaken for pillow top postrupedics, but it is well cared for and the location is fantastic. Less than ten minutes walk to Disneyland front gates.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for posting your recent comments on your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We were happy to read that our front desk staff was nice and accommodating, and that you enjoyed the fluffy towels in shape of swans.  We appreciate the feedback you provided on the overall property and our mattress', we are addressing these concerns and will soon have new features and amenities at our property.   We hope you will consider the Castle Inn & Suites if your travel arrangements bring you back to the Anaheim Resort in the near future.  Regards,  Castle Inn & Suites Management Team

Summary: We checked in 20 min early the room was ready no problem. Although any questions I asked were more of an irritation to the gentleman who checked us in especially asking to buy our park tickets seemed to put him out and irritate him. We stayed 4 days and were traveling back home on Easter so I brought Easter treats so the Easter bunny could visit Sunday morning, when we returned to our cleaned room all my treats were gone bag, basket all of it. The construction blocked the elevator a bit and we were on the 4th floor but this was not a huge problem we just folded stroller and walked stairs.  Overall I would stay again just not leave much in the room. The female who checked us out of our room did seem very courteous. I would recommend this for price and location beyond that I'm
Manager Response: We wanted to say thank you for providing us your feedback on your visit with us this past March. Thank you for your comments regarding the Front Office staff, this has been addressed with our team and we appreciate the feedback.   We are sorry we fell short in some of the areas that affected your stay with us.  We have addressed these concerns, and we do hope you will give us another opportunity in the near future if and when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Regards,  Castle Inn & Suites Management Team

Summary Heading: Excellent crash place for Parties of two or more!
Summary: Castle Inn and Suites has been a constant friend for my recent trips to Anaheim, CA. I have attended 4 Blizzcons and 1 Wondercon and been to Disneyland and every time they have had the same affordable prices for their basic room with two queen beds, friendly service, clean and welcoming rooms, and just a warm atmosphere.  They take care of your car and parking even past the point of your checkout when reasonable (which is awesome for Con-goers). They also just have great smiles when you get there at the front desk. The in house convenience shop is pretty good to albeit at convenience prices (if on a budget there is a 7 11 within walking distance ^_^b).  Btw ignore Trish M they are way too picky. The carpet is fine >_>. There was no line at the check in counter at 11 AM on a
Manager Response: Adam,   Thank you, Thank you for your recent comments you posted when you recently stayed with us in March.  It was nice to read that the Castle Inn has been your home away from home when you come to Anaheim for Blizzcon and Wondercon.  We appreciate the comment regarding our Front Desk Staff being friendly and welcomed you with a smile.  Guest Service is key to our success at the Castle Inn & Suites, so this feedback is very important to us, and we thank you again.  We do hope to see you again at the Castle Inn & Suites on your next visit to Blizzcon, Wondercon, or any reason you may have to return to the Disneyland Resort.  Warmest Regards,  Castle Inn & Suites Management Team

Summary Heading: Actually a good place to stay.
Summary: So after reading the reviews, I wasn’t sure if I should book or not. Being that I waited until the last minute, 3 days before arrival in Disneyland, I really wanted a place within walking distance. We have stayed at the Desert Inn and Jolly Roger in the last 7 years of going to Disneyland. So that being said I looked at the reviews and the prices in the area and chose the Castle Inn. I was pleasantly surprised. We got a Mini Suite at the last minute for what I thought was a great price, on Spring Break for both California and Oregon.  There were four of us, two teenagers and two adults. The mini-suite is located on the Harbor side of the road. Really a long room with a couch. Not a room that is divided and only one TV. But again wasn’t there to watch TV.  The Harbor side  was
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to post your comments regarding your visit with us in March during Spring Break.  We were happy to hear our Mini Suite worked well for your family.  Your feedback regarding the Room size, and location is very helpful to our team, so we appreciate the feedback.    We were also happy to read that the convenience stores and restaurants next door to the Hotel worked well during your stay.  We hope to see you at the Castle Inn & Suites on a future visit to the Anaheim Resort.  Thank you again for your time, we appreciate the feedback.  Castle Inn & Suites Management Team

Summary: We booked this room last minute 1 day before we arrived. I knew the rates would be high as we are in the middle of Spring Break, we were wanting to stay as near to the park as possible. This hotel had a room for $118 per night which I thought was good as we do Disney every year and satyed at many other area hotels. When we arrived the gentleman who checked us in was very curtious and made the process very simple and fast. When we opened the door to our room we were floored! A very clean comfortable room with with pleanty of space and towels that were sculpted into swans added that extra MAGIC touch! Will book this place from now on!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you very much for your review you posted on your stay with us recently.  We are so happy to hear our Front Desk Staff was courteous and helpful.  Thank you also for your nice comment regarding the cleanliness of your room and thank you also for noticing our swan shaped towels, we enjoy giving our guests the extra MAGIC they deserve.  Thank you again, and we hope to see you at the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Don't stay here! There are better choices for the same price.
Summary: Needs updating. Hotel is old and dirty! The carpet is the worst part or maybe the poor excuse for a shower! Talk about unfriendly at check in....and don't bother to ask for anything they'll either roll their eyes or make you wait 45 minutes. The one and only good thing is the location, but we soon found out about all of the better options for a similar price. We'll never stay here again. Worst night sleep we've ever had!
Manager Response: We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your feedback on your stay with us this past March.   We apologize we fell short on your guest experience at our property and we appreciate the feedback you provided.  We will share this with our staff to help us in our efforts to improve the guest service experience for our guests.  Thank you again, and we do hope that one day you may give the Castle Inn & Suites another chance.  Regards,  Castle Inn & Suites Management Team

Summary: We're Disneyland annual passholders and we frequently stay in hotels. We've stayed across the street at the Candy Cane Inn a few times and decided to experience the Castle on this trip.  We checked in at 11:00 am, but our room wasn't ready. Front staff looked tired and unapproachable. I asked if it was possible our room would be ready at an earlier time and I got a quick reply of "No." The staff at Howard Johnsons would have handed me a business card and nicely answered "No, but you're welcome to call us at noon to check if your room is ready." Oh well.  We stayed for one night in the parlor suite located near stairs. The noise didn't bother us, but make sure you close the curtains if you want privacy. The beds aren't comfortable but I expected that based on other reviews. Room
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent comments you provided on your stay with us in March.  We appreciate you giving us a try this time, and we do apologize we fell short on your overall guest experience of our property.   We have started our room revitalization program, and hope that sometime after summer 2013 you will give the Castle Inn & Suites another chance.  Feel free to contact us directly at anytime.  Once again, thank you for your feedback, we hope to welcome you back to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Regards,  Castle Inn & Suites Management Team

Summary Heading: It's all about location! location! location! Customer service really wows! Good rooms!
Summary: Thank you for saving our vacation! I booked through an online site.. I can't mention it, but the fact I used "booked" should say it all. I thought I'd booked the wrong hotel and inquired about what happened if I needed to cancel. Well, the site went ahead and cancelled without hearing from me. I walked into the hotel about 30 minutes after check in and panicked. I had a 2.5 year old, the next day was my birthday and there were several conventions in town. The manager gave me the site's customer service number and I went outside to call them, while my husband stayed inside. The site was useless and I hung up on them. The manager - a wonderful gentleman, was completely sold out, but did have one room without a working AC. We said we'd take it, we didn't care, we just needed some
Manager Response: Thank you!! Thank you!! for your nice review you recently posted on your stay with us.  We are happy to hear we were able to "save your vacation".  We truly appreciate the time it took to write your comments, and your feedback is extremely helpful when we are doing training with our staff.  We do hope you will return to the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future, and I'm sure you will be happy to hear we have started our room enhancement project due to be completed this summer. We hope you can come back and experience first-hand our newly remodeled Castle Inn & Suites.  Kind Regards,  Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: OK if want to be near the Disney parks and you only want the basic functions of a bed, toilet, and shower.
Summary: My family and I reserved this room at the last minute (as a last resort) due to the Alpine Inn canceling our reservation (see review). There happened to be a convention going on at the same time and all of the major hotel chains I called were sold out of rooms. We were not expecting much given the mixed reviews on several websites. Our own opinion is that the hotel is ok if you want to be near the Disney parks (i.e., within a short walking distance) and only want the basic functions of a hotel (like a bed, toilet, and shower). Do not expect much more. The biggest problem with this hotel is that it needs a major updating. Aesthetics meansa lot to the average consumer and there is no real way for this hotel to even score average without a major update. However, it was a place to
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to send us your comments regarding your stay with us in March.  We appreciate the feedback you have provided, and we are taking steps to update our guest rooms.  All guest feedback is very important to our future success, so thank you again for submitting your comments.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to show you are true hospitality on a future visit to the Disneyland Resort.  Thank you once again,  Castle Inn & Suites Management Team

Summary: Every time my wife and I come to Disneyland we stay here. I have a discount through the airline that I work for. Every stay has been great. Yes, the hotel is a little aged but they do the best they can and are always very kind. One stay we had a issue with our shower pressure and they promptly sent maintenance to repair it! I have NEVER had any issues with this hotel!   The rooms were fairly good size and everything was clean. Even though I knew there were families with kids on either side of us, I couldn't hear them at all unless they were outside. The WiFi left a little to be desired but lets face it, why be visiting Disneyland if you are gonna stay on the internet in your hotel room?!    The location is great! It really is just a very short walk from the parks. I never have
Manager Response: Steven,  We are so happy you and your wife stay with us every time you are in Anaheim.  Thank you for posting a review on your recent visit.    We hope you will return later this year, as you will be pleasantly surprised to see new enhancements made to our guest rooms, as well as the Wi Fi feature.  Once again, thank you for your continued support of the Castle Inn & Suites.  Castle Inn & Suites Management Team

Summary: We stayed at this hotel as part of our vacation package. Location was great for leaving the car and walking.  Staff was helpful, no hotel has no frills. Plan on paying $2 each for printing boarding passes. Internet service was too slow to ever connect. It was clean, but dated, but since we were just there to sleep, it worked for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recent review you posted regarding your stay with us.  We were happy to read the location of our property worked well for you and your family.  We are sorry you had issues printing your boarding passes in the gift shop, we would have been happy to print them free of charge for you at the Hotel.    If your plans in the near future bring you back to the Disneyland Resort, we hope you keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind, you will be pleasantly surprised to see our new enhancements we are currently making to the property.    Castle Inn & Suites Management Team

Summary: Stayed her the 1st part of March. Front desk helpful at times, day shift seemed a little burned out evening shift was so very helpful. We had a room on the 2nd floor, elevators were slow. My room looked the same as I remember it did in the mid 80's. Clean, but dated! I paid $256.00 for 4 nights Thursday thru Sunday, so the price was great. Close to the park, walking distance. Would I stay here again?  YES, if I was looking for just a place to crash or on a budget. I would never stay here if I was looking for a updated hotel. I was here for cheer comp, so I spent very little time in the room. Wifi was bad and I was in the middle of the property. Stay calm and travel on!
Manager Response: We wanted to take a minute to thank you for your recent review you posted on your stay with us the first part of March.  We apologize you did not receive top-notch guest service from our day shift.  We appreciate the feedback and can use these comments in our training programs.  We hope your future travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort , and if so, you will think of the Castle Inn & Suites, because we will no longer be that "dated hotel" you just experienced.  We have started a full enhancement project of our guest rooms, and hope you can come back to experience these first hand.  Once again, thank you for your comments.  Castle Inn & Suites Management Team

Summary: If Customer Service matters to you, this is the place to stay.    The travel agency we booked through cancelled our reservation by mistake... huge mistake, almost a nightmare.  This was a very busy weekend with multiple conventions and other happenings going on.  Donna (who I later found out was the manager) overheard me talking to the check in clerk (who was also very helpful) trying to get me a similar room at a similar price. Nothing was really available.  While I cant discuss what the price was, I can reveal that I received a great room at a great price.  My son went to sleep looking at the backside of Cars Land/California Adventure.
