Thank you Donna and thank you Castle Inn.   Rooms:  The hotel is older, but clean.  I have seen this hotel rated on various sites between 1 1/2
Manager Response: Hello Laura,  Thank you so much for your recent review regarding your stay with us.  We appreciate the time our guests take to write reviews, feedback is extremely important to us.  Our Manager, Donna was more than happy to assist you with your booking.  We were happy to read your comfort of our rooms and facilities were achieved during your stay, as well as pointing out our gargoyles that overlook the property at night.  We hope you will be able to return to the Disneyland Resort in the near future, and you will be happy to see some modern improvements to the hotel by Summer 2013.    Thank you once again,  The Management & Staff - Castle Inn & Suites

Summary: This hotel is the best I have ever stayed at the rooms were very clean and the staff was very nice made us feel at home,very helpful. Very close to Disneyland, I have been going to Disneyland for 30 years I don't know how I missed this hotel they have a very clean pool and 2 hot tubs, even have a lift for the handycaped to get into the pool.we will never stay anywhere else again. Rooms were cleaned early every day. Thank you castle inn& suites for making are vacation so much better. Everyone check this one out you will be so happy you did. Thank you Virginia spurbeck        EXCELLENT JOB TO EVERYBODY AT CASTLE INN &SUITES
Manager Response: Hi Virginia,  Thank you so much for the great review you recently posted regarding your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We enjoy hearing from our guests and your enthusiasm regarding your stay was fantastic!    We are happy to hear you enjoyed the Pool area, our friendly staff, as well as our great location to the main entrance to Disneyland.  Our proximity to Disneyland and California Adventure has always been a great benefit to our guests with the ease of walking back and forth.  We are glad you never have to miss staying with us again, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Castle Inn & Suites on a future visit to the Disneyland Resort.   Thank you again,  Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: The staff were so helpful and nice, the room was clean and perfect. We were upgraded and the kids loved having their own room. We would come back. Pool was nice. If you are on a budget and want to go to Disneyland, this is a good place to stay. Visited in spring 2011.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us last spring.  Thank you so much for the review you posted.  It was nice to hear that your room was clean and perfect, and that our staff was very helpful and nice.  We hope to see you at the Castle Inn on a future visit to the Disneyland Resort.  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: The Castle Inn & Suites in Anaheim is ideally located across the street from the California Adventure , Downtown Disneyland, and "the Magic Kingdom of Disneyland". They have a variety of extra large rooms, ranging from standard, to Jr. Suites, to Family Suites, & jacuzzi suites. There is a swimming pool, childs wading pool, & hot tub in the centre courtyard, which also features a mini two story castle where you have an overview of the pools & Harbor Blvd & part of the California Adventure. There are sunchairs & tables where you can play cards, whilst awaiting your clothes washing & drying on the pool deck. There are dozens of fast food & regular restaurants in every direction, plus a liquor store 1/2 block away, & a mini market store on site across from the lobby. Donna Hill has
Manager Response: Stephen,  THANK YOU!!! very much for the great review you recently posted regarding your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are happy you enjoyed our 2-Story Castle Sundeck; our guests really seem to enjoy it, so we are pleased you got to take advantage of that area, as well as all the conveniences the Castle Inn has in the immediate area.  We too cherish Donna, and yes, she is lovely.  Thank you again,  Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We have stayed at many of the Harbor Blvd hotels that are easy walking distance to Disneyland. Some we were not happy with at all. This was our first stay at the Castle Inn. The room was very clean and in great shape. The employees were very friendly and happy to give any information we needed. For the price, you can't beat it. After checking out, they allowed us to leave our luggage with them to allow us to go back to the park for a while. We will definately come back. Thank you Castle Inn!
Manager Response: We wanted to say Thank You for the review you posted regarding your stay with us recently.  We appreciate your feedback regarding our rooms, and more importantly our Friendly Staff.  Our luggage storage area is always a hit with our guests, so we are pleased you were able to utilize  this service.  We hope to see you at the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We are a family of three adults on this trip and all agree. The rooms are dated but the place was so clean and the price was incredible for what you got. The staff are very efficient and friendly..Would any or all of us stay there again when visiting Disneyland? You bet!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the comment you posted regarding your recent visit with us.  We are so glad to hear that our Front Desk Staff was very efficient and friendly, and also happy to hear that you would definitely stay with us again.  We look forward to seeing you at the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.  Thank you once again

Summary: Thinking with the name castle inn & suites this would be a very nice place to stay near Disney.  Well... It located right across the street and is an easy stroll into the park but that's it.   Rooms are in need of renovation.  Carpets worn and the beds are bowed but still serviceable.  Kids are in the jacuzzi and pool very late at night so if you are a light sleeper good luck!  Front desk does respond quickly when you call with a problem but they have the old RCA televisions.. Enough said.  Overall  all right for the money but ??
Manager Response: We wanted to say thank you for the review you posted regarding your stay with us earlier this month. We are pleased to hear that you were happy with our proximity to the Disneyland Parks and with the ease of which you were able to walk there.   We are also happy to hear that our staff was quick to assist when you needed help!   The pool hours are 8:00 a.m. – 10:00 p.m., with it then being locked as soon as it is closed. We have not received any complaints about there being anyone in the pool area during the off hours.   We hope you will come back and stay with us again in the future to experience the changes that we will be making in the next few months!  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Great staff but rooms are rather dated
Summary: Stayed last weekend for a quick Disneyland trip.  Pros:  *Great location across from park            *Wonderful front desk staff, very             professional and polite            *They let us check in early & leave               car, didn't have to pay and park at              Disneyland              *Our room was very clean   Cons:  *The rooms are very old looking, I             don't think they've seen an update in              20 years.             *Room was very dark and dingy            *Our room was next to a staff             workroom/breakroom and it was             Incredibly loud at 7am              *Very uncomfortable beds
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the comments regarding your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear that our front desk staff has once again lived up to our expectations of them and were polite as well as professional! Our staff is one of our main assets and we are always pleased when they are mentioned in a review!  We are sorry to hear that there might have been some noise near your room due to the housekeeping staff! We have notified the Housekeeping Supervisor of this so that if any changes need to be made, they will be made immediately.   Please come back and see us again as we are going to be going through some changes in the next few months and would like for you to see what we have done!  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We stayed here for one night and if we hadn't gotten a discounted military rate I would have been upset with the price.  The room felt dirty and old, the bed was terribly uncomfortable, and it seemed like the pool was open all night since there were children in there until the wee hours.  I only know this because we had a room right across from the pool.  It was within walking distance of the park and parking was free so that was a plus, but I wouldn't stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post comments regarding comments regarding your stay with us in November.  We are sorry to hear that you were unhappy with your stay but would have appreciated being notified of your issues while you were here, as this would have given us the opportunity to rectify the situation.   For future reference, the actual pool hours are 8:00 a.m. – 10:00 p.m. It is locked for the night at 10:00 p.m. so there would actually not be anyone the pool area after that time.   Thank you again for your time! We appreciate all reviews and use them to continually improve the hotel.  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Like a Castle in more ways than one...
Summary: First off the good news... this place is very close to Disneyland, and an easy walk to the park entrance.  And... well, that's about it.   We stayed there during a tradeshow, so we paid through the nose, and I have to say it was a very poor value.  The rooms are dark and drafty, just like a castle, with windows that might as well remain open since they offer little in the way of quiet.  The bed was as hard as a rock, and I slept very poorly from the involuntary tossing and turning that accompanied a mattress that was as hard as a rock.  My colleagues told me the queen size beds were far more comfortable, so avoid the Kings if you really have to stay here.   If you stay in the family suites, which are located in the rear of the complex, expect fairly dank and dingey rooms with
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review you posted on TripAdvisor regarding your stay last month! We are sorry that your stay was unsatisfactory and do wish that you had brought anything you were unhappy with to our attention while you were still here so that we could have made some changes for you.  We would like to let you know that we will going through a revitalization of the hotel so by the time the convention comes around next year, the hotel will be just like new. We do hope you will stay with us again so you can experience the changes!!  Thank you again!   The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We stayed here the first week of December and had a very pleasant stay. We arrived at the hotel before check in but they had two rooms available for us immediately. Check in was easy and quick and we were headed to the park in no time!  The room smelled very strongly of bleach when we first got in, but I was ok with that as I knew it had been recently cleaned. The towels were set up in different designs and it was very welcoming. My son enjoyed both the pool and jacuzzi during our 4 day stay. The rooms were cleaned daily and we never ran out of towels or toiletries. The front desk staff and housekeeping staff were very nice and accommodating!  All in all the trip was awesome and the Castle Inn served us well. It would be nice to see some upgrades as the comforters are shabby
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear that your stay with us in December was a pleasant experience!! We are happy to hear that the cleanliness of your room and the friendliness of our staff lived up to your expectations.   Thank you so much for taking the time to post your review! We appreciate all comments and utilize them to continuously improve upon our service.   We look forward to seeing you again when you return for another visit!  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We stayed here recently with a large group of disabled adults.  The staff was very friendly and we checked in within 5 minutes.  This was a motel, not a hotel and it was nice that they provided us rooms all next to each other on the bottom floor.  A very cute hotel on the outside, with the castle theme going on....the rooms were a bit dated and the bathroom counter was very small, I couldn't fit barely anything on it.  The rooms were clean though and I slept like a baby as the beds were very comfy.  No breakfast, but they did have a convenience mart on site and that was nice to have.  About 2 blocks from Disneyland, so location was good.  I would recommend this place to travelers that do NOT plan on spending much time in their room.  Our TV never did work, we did not address
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to comment on your stay with us earlier this month!! We are so glad to hear that you and your group have a good experience while here!!   We are sorry to hear that the television in your room did not work during your visit but appreciate your response to our private message to find out what room you were in, in order to make sure the television was repaired.   Thank you again for your time and honesty! We hope to see you back for another stay in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We recently stayed here for the Tinkerbell 1/2 marathon weekend.  The location was perfect - a short walk from the park.  The rooms are not the most modern but they are nice, clean & comfortable.  They also include a fridge which is great for theme park stays.  The price was also great.  An excellent value for the location.  Also of note, the parking was free.  Take that, big chain hotels.  The only negative we encountered was that the hot water for the shower lacked a little bit but that could have just been our room.  Overall - great stay and we would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Marcie,  Thank you so much for the review regarding your stay while you participated in the Tinkerbell 1 /2 Marathon! It sounds like everyone had a good time and that it was a great success!  I am so glad that our location, complimentary parking for one car per guest room, the cleanliness of our rooms, price and the fact that there was a refrigerator in your room, added to the satisfaction of your “great stay”!  Thank you again! We hope to see you on a future visit!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: It is what it is. Arrived with family at 3 in the morning with no hotel. First two were fully booked. This one wasn't. Greeted by an extremely nice and pleasant person working front desk. He checked us in immediately. Impressions: - room reeked of bleach - room was dated. Bedspreads didn't look clean - nice towel animals! - shower had great water pressure -close (read: in front) to Disney. At least close enough to walk.  All in all, not a place I would stay again. But an A+ for the cust. Svc..
Manager Response: We love that you arrived from San Francisco without a room and that our night auditor was able to accommodate you and your family at 3:00 in the morning!! Thank you for commenting on the auditor for being nice and pleasant, especially that early in the morning! We are glad to hear that our staff members are living up to our expectations!  We appreciate the time that you took to post your review and hope that you will give us another try on a future trip to Anaheim, based on your experience with our Customer Service.  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Not so heated pool, but OK overall
Summary: Not the closest to Disneyland, but still a fairly short walk. Not the best rooms, but OK for the price. My one complaint is the "heated pool". We visited in January and the pool was way too cold to swim in. The spa was plenty hot, and felt great after walking all day. However, if you have kids and swimming is a priority at least dip in your toe before getting the room.
Manager Response: Robin,  Thank you for taking the time to post comments regarding your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!   We are sorry to hear that the pool was a too cold for your liking but rest assured it is inspected and maintained by a local pool company, including the temperature. We do keep the pool heated year around but without knowing when you were here, exactly, we have had some unusually cold weather for Southern California which could have affected the pool.   As you mentioned, we are located a “fairly short walk”, approximately 7 minutes, to the Main Gate area of the Disney Parks. Being this close to the Parks, allows for the ease of getting back and forth to take a rest in the middle of the day, if necessary!  Thank you again for your time! We hope that you and your family will come back to stay with us again in the future!  -The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: The staff at Castle Inn and Suites was SUPERB! They went out of their way to make us feel like royalty - even with several special requests.  Our room was spacious, clean, up-to-date and lovely. We came to Anaheim for an annual event and we'll be staying here again next year (and every year!)
Manager Response: Holly,  THANK YOU! THANK YOU! THANK YOU for the “SUPERB” you gave our staff!! We are so pleased to hear that you and your family were “royally” taken care of while you were here!  As we always do when we see the staff noted, we have made sure that everyone  is aware that they have been mentioned and appreciated by our guests!  We are so glad to hear that you will be back for your annual event and look forward to seeing you when you return!!   Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: pros: good price and close to park, good central point if you have a rental vehicle, cons: desk staff were not very accommodating...double paid for crib but not a real biggy they credited us for it later also had an issue with the keys, had to wait to get the room re-keyed (there was 2 families) if your at the back (furthest away from office) no internet although advertised that they had!  a person at the desk said some people were able to connect to the motel behind us ??? what? The price was so good the small stuff didnt let us bother us but could be something people should know if they need internet connection.
Manager Response: John,  Thank you so much for your review, as well as taking the time to respond to my private message regarding the issues you had. We are sorry to hear that you felt the re-keying was a problem but also hope that you realize that we have to re-key in order to keep things secure.   We are happy to hear that you our location go the Disney Parks and that we are centrally located to many attractions, restaurants and shopping were a “Pro” in your stay!  Thank you again! We hope to see you again sometime in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Room and desk service ok.  Requested a 3rd key, as there was 4 of us, and was told it would take a while as they would have to rekey the lock.  Not happy, decided not gto wait.  Got to room. for price, it was fine.  Was told at desk they had wifi.  ations next tripDuring our four days there, could connect, but could never actually do anything, as response time was atroshish.  Never did even get to rad emails.  While in room, which was not much, focus was on Disneyland, TV stations extremely limited, and multiple stations had no sound.  Not as close to the Main Gate of DLand as expected.  Will look for better place next time
Manager Response: Jerry,  We wanted to say thank you for the time you took to post a review regarding your stay with us earlier this month. We are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your visit and were unhappy with having to wait to get new keys. I am sure you can appreciate that when we rekey the locks it is simply for security measures.   Thank you again for your time! We hope that you will give us another opportunity when you return to Anaheim in the future!  -The Castle Inn & Suites

Summary: Inexpensive motor-hotel directly accross street from Disney California Adventure.  Just a short 10 minute walk north down Harbor Blv takes you to the Disneyland Resort entrance. Very convenient to leave car at hotel and walk to Disney-saves money on parking.  Front desk staff was very nice and helpful. Room was clean, but average as was expected for the price. Walked to the strip-mall for drinks and food to go (Subway) and next morning walked to Denny's for breakfast before going to Disney. Very convenient location.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you were satisfied with your stay here earlier this month! Thank you so much for taking the time to post comments regarding your visit and our staff! We are always happy to hear from our guests regarding the Front Desk staff and always make sure to let them know that you appreciate them as much as we do!  As you are aware, our location is a great selling point since we are located within a 7 minute walk to the Disney main gate area and are also within a very close walk to numerous eating and shopping establishments.   Thank you again for your time! We look forward to you visiting us again in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn back in September for 8 nights and we weren't dissappointed. It is an older hotel but it was clean and an easy walk to both Disneyland and the Gardenwalk. We had a 4 and a 6 year old with us and they both did the walk easy enough. We stayed in a family suite and when researching, it was the most affordable accomodation of that size by far within walking distance to Disneyland. Also their family suites consist of 1 king bed in the front room & 2 queens in the back room so nobody has to suffer on a sofabed! We found the staff to be super friendly and helpful. We found Marc to be especially helpful with his knowledge of the area and his easy to follow instructions, that he made it that bit easier for us to navigate around.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us in September!! Thank you very much for the review you posted and for your really nice comments!  The fact that we are across the street from California Adventure and that the walk to the Disney main gate area only takes about 7 minutes, is one of our bestselling features!  Our Family Suites are really comfortable and have a refrigerator and microwave in them, which when you are here for a lengthy stay, are very helpful to have. They also allow you to have more room to move around in plus, as you mentioned, everyone has a bed of their own and not a sofa bed or!  Marc is one of our greatest assets and we appreciate you mentioning him by name. He has been with us for many years and is very knowledgeable about the hotel and the area so we are glad that he was helpful to you while you were here!  Thank you again for your comments!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Not the best place to stay
Summary: We stayed for 3 nights. The room was not clean. The floors were disgusting. The bathroom was very small, and the shower had hardly any water pressure. There was a huge hole in the shower. It was difficult to sleep at night because it is very loud, and the walls are paper thin. I would not recommend this to anybody! Don't waste your money on this hotel.
Manager Response: Sarah,  Thank you for taking the time to post comments regarding your stay with us earlier this month.  I did reach out to you, last week, by private message, in order to get more information regarding when you were here and what room you were in, in order to follow up on your comments but as of today, we have not heard back from you! While we are thankful for all comments, we would have appreciated the opportunity to talk to you in person, while you were here, so that we could have responded to your issues personally.   Without knowing what room you were in, we have not had any other guests mention about a “hole in the shower” in any of our rooms.  We do room inspections daily and this would have been caught if indeed these was a hole in one of the showers.   Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We've stayed at the Castle Inn about 4 times now and have never been disappointed. It's clean and close to Disneyland! The price is also very affordable, especially when you'll be spending very little time in the hotel. We have no complaints!
Manager Response: Renee,  We wanted to say thank you for being a 4 time returning guest and for the review regarding your stay last month. We are so glad to hear that you were happy with your latest and that you have never had a disappointing stay!  Please let us know when you will be back for your 5th visit! Until then, thank you again for your comments! We look forward to seeing you again in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Stayed for two nights. This is an older hotel that is in very good condition over all. The beds are very firm, but not rock hard. The pillows are horrible so bring your own. Thankfully we did, so no real issue there. The room was clean and well kept. Easy walking distance to the Disney resort. Our daughter loved the idea that we were staying in a "castle"! The office staff were all very nice and helpful. They even have a little store that has all kinds of things one might need. We would stay here again for the right price. Our a/c - heater worked great. We had to hunt a bit for outlets to charge our phones, but it all worked out fine.
Manager Response: Hi Minnie,  First, thank you so very much for taking the time to post a review regarding your recent stay with us. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your visit and could come back for another stay!  Second, thank you as well, for responding to my private message regarding the room you were in! We did send someone to check on the pillows and they were actually brand new ones. We apologize that they were not comfortable to you but appreciate that you brought it to our attention so that we had the opportunity to check them out!  We are happy to hear that your daughter loved staying in a castle and hope that you got some pictures of her with the knight and the King’s chair in the lobby!  Being that our front office staff is the ones that you, our guests deal with the most, it is nice that you mentioned them as being nice and helpful.  Thank you again for your time! We look forward to having you and your family return for another stay!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: A modest hotel with limited extras...
Summary: Time: Off-Season (mid-jan)   Us: Two adults and one Poquito (15 months) Californian nationals.   Pros:  7 minutes on foot to Disney entrance. Free parking (no 15$ parking + tax here).  Free wi-fi in the lobby only.  No resort fees. Off-license liquor open late right across the lobby.  3 minute walk to 1 star food and booze establishments on the corner. .   Cons: Beds need to be replaced they slump.   Perks/Notes: Rate: 64$/75$ inclusive all fees Booked online standard double queen/king and they upgraded us to executive suite room 114 two queen skimpy beds and a sofa bed, fridge, micro, coffee table, powder table, cafe table and a 32 inch CRT tee vee.  Hotel front very friendly and quick, checkin at 3pm instead at most place it's 4pm.   Tips: if you want to check disneyland out
Manager Response: Carlos,  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us earlier this month! Thank you for the review you posted on Trip Advisor and for pointing out some of our best attributes:  1)	Proximity and short walk to the Disney Parks 2)	Complimentary parking for one car per guest room (we would be happy if you actually wanted to come and do a pre check in, if the room is not ready, and leave your car here once it is registered and go to Disneyland, or to lunch) 3)	Complimentary Wi-Fi 4)	No resort fees 5)	Walking distance to numerous eating establishments, including Cheesecake   Factory, PF Chang’s, California Pizza Kitchen, Roy’s of Hawaii and Bubba Gump Shrimp 6)	The friendliness and speed of our Front Desk staff  We certainly appreciate the time you took to post your comments and hope you will come back and see us again in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Stayed at Castle Inn for 4 nights when we went to Disneyland. Arrived early at the hotel, i think around 11am. Went to check in expecting to just drop our bags and come back later but were told our rooms were ready which was fantastic. The rooms are basic but we werent planning on spending any time in the room anyway. Walk to Disneyland is about 10 minutes. There is no shuttle bus so you have to walk but its only about 2 blocks.  There is a convenience store on sight which is handy. Didnt get to use the pool-lots of kids in there all the time. Overall a basic hotel with a bed, tv, hot water. If you are planning on spending all day at disney then it has everything you need.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post comments regarding your visit to the Castle Inn & Suites in October of 2012.   Even though our check in time is any time after 3:00 p.m., we are always happy to check our guests in early, if we have the availability.   Not only do we have a gift shop on property but we are within a very short walk to some shopping and numerous eating establishments. You do have everything you need close by!  Thank you again for your review! We hope to see you again soon!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Great - A) Deal B) location C) service  Rate - $64 nt inclusive (Jan 2013) Location - 1.5 blks South of Disneyland Main Enterance (8 min walk) Service - Professional and courteous.  Will go beyond "the call....." to help Room - Basic, clean, roomy, coffee/tea, fridge, tube tv - who cares!  Bed - for me, comfy! (I find most hotel beds are to hard.) Parking - lots and free Breakfast - none  Wifi - yes Adult Pool - yes and nice temp. 3' - 5' deep (great for my kids 6 and 8 yrs) 8am - 10pm Kids Pool - yes Hot tub - yes Onsite laundry - yes ($2.00) Vending products available. Store - Covered all basics and souvenirs 9am -5pm and 7pm - 10pm Handy - Well stocked 7/11 store across the street at the next light.  (4 min walk)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review regarding your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. We are so happy to hear that your stay with us was “great” and that all aspects of the hotel met your needs!  Our proximity to Disneyland and California Adventure has always been a benefit to our guests with the ease of walking back and forth.  We may not have breakfast on site but we are located within a very short walk to numerous eating establishments that offer breakfast, including a place to get muffins, bagels and breakfast sandwiches.   We are proud of our staff and their professionalism. We are always pleased to have them mentioned and make sure they are aware of great comments!  Parking is complimentary for one car per guest room and we glad to say that we also do not charge a resort fee.  Thank you again for your comments! We appreciate all of our guests and their reviews and look forward to having you and your family back for another stay sometime in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We reserved a block of rooms for our family and friends to stay for our wedding. Everyone in our party had wonderful things to say about this hotel! The front desk staff were so helpful and accommodating of our needs. They did everything they could in the days leading up to our wedding weekend to make sure that everyone in my party had what they needed. They really made my life easier when it came to coordinating a large group of people.  We were there during the busiest time of the year but they never seemed stressed or gave us anything to worry about. The rooms were clean and we had a great view of Disneyland! We spent time in the hot tub which was also clean and very relaxing. It's an easy walk to Disneyland and were able to see the fireworks from our window! We also loved
Manager Response: Olivia,   Congratulations, first of all, to you and Alex on your marriage! We are thrilled for you and so glad that we were able to be a part of your wedding weekend!  We were very happy to see your review and appreciate the time you took to say such nice things about us! Thank you! It was our pleasure to help you get everything coordinated for your group to stay here. Our online group booking system was easy for everyone to use and to get their reservations made on their own time.  It was a pleasure to see you all coming in and out of the lobby while you were here and thank you from the front desk staff for mentioning them. It is always nice for us, and them, to be mentioned in a review. We really couldn’t do what we are doing without them!  Thank you, from me, for being such a laid back bride and for being so organized! You made our jobs easier and we look forward to seeing you both on your next trip to “your castle”!  See you soon!  Tina and the Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: My husband and I went on our first trip to Disneyland with-out children or grandchildren. the first week of October 2012. When we first arrived at the Castle Inn the front desk staff were very helpful and courteous. The rooms are average and very clean. Perfect place to stay with-in walking distance to Disneyland. Close by Dennys and IHOP. There was a great gift shop for snacks and souvenirs and a laundry room. I loved the pictures of alll the castles they had hanging in the rooms. As we were checking out I mentioned that one of the pictures in our room was a castle that I came across while doing my family tree. The gentleman who I believe was the owner or manager, stated that they were doing remodels on all the rooms and that he could contact me and if I paid shipping he would
Manager Response: We wanted to say thank you for taking the time to post comments regarding your stay in October. Thank you also for commenting on the helpfulness and courteousness of our staff. We, and they, are always appreciative when they are mentioned!  The owner remembers giving you the castle picture that you expressed interest in and is very happy to hear that you love it! We are glad to hear that it made it home in one piece!!  We look forward to you and your husband bringing your family for another stay sometime!! Thank you again for your time!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: I stayed here with 6 people in a suite and the front desk personnel were very friendly. They helped me find parking spots, and also provided good information of the local area.  The suite was very clean and had everything you needed for 6 people to stay.  This was my first visit and based off of that I will be going back.
Manager Response: Allen,  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay here earlier this month. Thank you for the comments you posted! We are so glad to hear that our staff, the parking and the room itself, lived up to your expectations.  Thank you again!  We look forward to having you return for another visit!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Everything was good about this stay - the location so close to Disneyland and plenty of food places, the swimming pool, the beds were comfy, the service was friendly, the place was clean.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for saying that “everything was good about this stay”! We are so glad to hear that everything was more than satisfactory and that you would highly recommend the Castle Inn & Suites to people you know.   We appreciate your time and hope that when you return to Anaheim from New Zealand, you will come back and stay with us!  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: VERY Nice Family Property... good value and nicely kept!
Summary: Stayed one night only on this holiday with a very late night check-in.  Late arrival of our flight meant we arrived at 1am and had to use the night window for check-in.  It was unseasonally cold and the check-in staff member was incredibly slow booking us in.  We stood shivering in the cold wind for 15 minutes while he mucked around with my credit card and sorted paperwork allocating our room, even though we had advised of our expected late arrival.  Nevertheless, I'd recommend this hotel.  Our room was fairly spacious with two queen beds,  a very clean bathroom, small table and tub chairs, and decent quality amenities.   It's right across the road from the main entrance to Disneyland, and although we didn't use the pool area, it looked very nice.  Breakfast room is small and
Manager Response: none

Summary: My girlfriend and I stayed at this hotel and it was perfect! EXTREMELY close to Disneyland and other attractions in the surrounding area. We were able to walk to each place, which is amazing considering all the traffic headed to Disneyland. The beds were very comfortable and the room was quite spacious. I would recommend this to anyone looking for affordable, comfortable, and clean place to stay in the Disney area.
Manager Response: Hi Dalton,  Thank you so much for the review regarding your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. We are so happy to hear that your stay was "perfect" and that you would recommend us to friends!  Our location is a big selling point and as you noted, the ease to walk everywhere is fantastic! We are centrally located  not only do the Disney Parks but to shopping and eating establishments as well!!  Thank you again for your time! We appreciate you comments and look forward to having you and your girlfriend return for another visit.   The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Stayed here in December going to Disneyland.  Rooms were just average beds a little hard and rooms a little worn.  The outside looks okay, the spa area was fine and the pool was clean.  No breakfast which is usually nice.  Reception was nice and the price was a good value.  We had a two room suite with 1 king bed and 2 queens, very n ice for a large family.  A bit of a walk to Disney but manageable.
Manager Response: Hello….Merry Christmas and thank you for taking the time to post comments regarding your recent stay with us! We are so happy to see that you have stayed with us before and while it has been a little while, you chose to come back and enjoyed your stay!  Our family suites are an excellent value for guests with larger families or simply who just want more room so we are glad that you took advantage of one of those suites while you were here!  We are sorry to hear that you felt the walk to Disneyland and California Adventure was a “bit of a walk” but we are really only about a 7 – 10 minute walk, each direction.   Thank you again for your review! We look forward to having you return for a 3rd visit sometime in the future!!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: This is a very old and run down hotel.  The outside looks so much better than inside.  The beds are sooooo hard and uncomfortable.  But it is a pretty short walk to Disneyland which is the only plus.  The rate is pretty reasonable until you get hit with the 18% tax!  No breakfast food either so it would probably be just as good to pay more for a nicer room with breakfast included.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review you posted on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us earlier this month. We are disappointed to hear that the hotel did not live up to your expectations but wanted to reconfirm that the tax rate here in Anaheim, is 17%, which we have no control over and I also wanted to touch on the fact that we do not charge any other fees, such as a resort fee or a parking fee, as a lot of our neighbors do.   Thank you again for your comments. We do hope that sometime in the future you will give us another opportunity for a stay.  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We had a great experience with this location.  The room was clean, sheets clean, and the room was large.  The front desk employees were wonderful!!!!  Would stay at this location again.  offered free parking and within walking distance to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Fun Disney Family….Your name really says it all!! Thank you very much for the comments regarding your recent stay. We are pleased that you had a “great Experience” and that everything added positively to you stay!  We love hearing that our employees are doing a good job for our guests and we appreciate when they are mentioned. As I always do, I have made a copy of the review and posted it for them to look at.   We look forward to having you return for another visit sometime in the future! Thank you again for your time.   The Castle inn & Suites Management

Summary: excellent location , 10 minutes walk to Disney Theme Park. We stayed in a 2 room apartment which was very well cleaned. Some of the rooms comes with a view of the disney fire works display which is out of the world. Lots of restaurants around catering for all taste buds. If you love and miss Indian food ( we did !)  there is an excellent Indian restaurant at the Ramada Hotel . All you can eat buffet lunch at $ 8.95 . They probably made a loss when a family of 5 Malaysian Indians starving for Indian food  helped them clear the buffet spread. The hotel has an excellent reception, very helpful staff  but  more eye to eye contact and genuine smile with the customer  will certainly improve their service. Book early . pay early and you get excellent rates on the rooms.Bring rain coat/
Manager Response: Raj….we wanted to say thank you so much for your recent review!! Overall, it sounds like you enjoyed your stay with us!   We are happy to see that our location and proximity to many restaurants and the Disney Parks added to your experience! As you noted, we are located within a very close walk to numerous eating establishments, as well as on outdoor mall, and of course, more importantly, Disneyland and Disney’s California Adventure.   It sounds like your family was really pleased with the buffet you found at the Indian Restaurant close by!   Thank you once again for your time! We hope to see you when you return to Anaheim in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Castle Inn and will definitely make it our 1st choice whenever we visit Disneyland!!  The price was a great value and included parking and resort fee which most of the good neighbor hotels do not include.  The room was very spacious, the beds were incredibly comfortable and the shower was excellent!  Short walk to Disneyland and the Garden Walk.
Manager Response: Hi Holly….thank you for saying that the Castle Inn & Suites will be your first choice when you return to Disneyland!! We are extremely glad to hear that you enjoyed your visit and that you will be returning!  We are pleased to be able to pass along complimentary parking and no resort fee to our guests and that you count that as a bonus to your stay!!  Please be sure to let us know when you are coming back! Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: My daughter and I stayed at the Castle in October 2012, for 5 nights. We really enjoyed our stay here. The staff were fabulous, all friendly and helpful and our rooms were cleaned spotless every day, while we were in the park. It took about 10 minutes to walk to the main entrance of the park. My daughter is 5 and I did bring a stroller for her though because by the end of the day she would fall asleep and I would do a bit of shopping and then walk back to the hotel. We only were in the hotel from 11pm or so until 730 every morning, so the outdated decor didn't really bother me as the only time I was in the room I was sleeping. The pool was not so great, small and a bit cold, but the only time we had to go in was the day we arrived, so it was not a big deal. The hot tub was
Manager Response: Hi Kylie....thank you, thank you, thank you for the glowing review regarding your stay with us in October. It sounds like, that as a whole, your trip was a blast and that your daughter enjoyed our castle atmosphere, as well as the crown that we were happy to give her to wear!  All the points you touched on: our friendly staff, the 10 minute walk to the Disney Parks, the cleanliness of our rooms and even our hot tub shows that you utilized all aspects of the hotel while you were here and that they just added to your experience!  We appreciate all of our guests and their comments and want to thank you again for the time you took to post yours! We hope you will come back and stay with us when you return to Anaheim in the future.  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Cheap and close. Wonderful front desk staff.
Summary: I wasn't expecting much from this hotel as they are "tourist mills" for D'land.  Nice location, good price, and close the the front gate when you have to carry kids back after a hard day! The room was average, but the was plenty of room for my family of six.  I was disappointed with the wi-fi as i had to keep logging off and on.  If that is the least of my complaints I shouldn't be to upset.  The front desk has a great staff who takes the time to look up directions for you, as well as is very attentive to whatever you may need.
Manager Response: We wanted to take a minute to say thank you for the comments you posted on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us earlier this month! We certainly are glad that our close proximity to Disneyland and California Adventure was a bonus at the end of your busy days!  We are always on the lookout for comments regarding our staff, in particular about our front desk staff, and as we always do, we have notified them that they have been mentioned! We are pleased that they lived up to not only our expectations but yours as well and that they were as attentive as we know they can be!  Thank you once again for your review! We look forward your family returning to stay with us on your next trip to Anaheim and Disneyland.  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Close to D'land, cheap and comfortable
Summary: The place is a little old, and the carpet worn, but the combination of location, service and price make it a great place to stay for a visit to Disneyland/California Adventure. While there are a few other hotels close to the crosswalk to the vacation spot, they were much higher in price for the days we wanted to visit so the walk of an extra 300 meters was not a big deal. We pre-paid the room with Getaroom.com at a great rate, and the hotel had no extra service add-ons.  Check-in was quick and Claudia's welcoming smile made it even friendly.  The basic room was spacious enough. and the old box-style tv in a nicely finished but cheap cabinet worked well, but we didn't spend much time in the room watching TV. Free WiFi with signal guaranteed in lobby, and in room if lucky - we
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post your comments regarding your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. It sounds like you were happy with your stay, our proximity to the Disney Parks and the fact that we don’t have and additional fees added on!  Thank you for your kind words regarding Claudia and Alberta! As we always do when anyone from our staff is mentioned, we always let them know they have received comments and commend them for a job well done!  Thank you again! We look forward to your return in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Excellent location to Disneyland, clean, friendly staff
Summary: Exactly 2 blocks walking distance to front gate of disneyland.  Staff were very nice, rooms were clean.  We had 2 "family suites" there is a room with 1 king and bathroom and a door that connects another room with 2 queen beds......there is a small fridge/freezer. The only draw backs were sharing the bathroom and the matresses were old school (springs).....everything was clean and daily maid service was very good......there was parking included for 1 free per room......there was also a small convenience store on site.  No breakfast included with this hotel.  For the price and location it was quite good.  It also had a small pool, kiddie pool, and 5 person jacquizzi tub which was awesome after a long day in the park.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to comment on your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time here and that everything lived up to your expectations.  Our Family Suites do add comfort for to your stay, especially when there are 3 beds between the 2 rooms. As I am sure you are aware, these suites will sleep up to 6.   We are happy to provide our guests with complimentary parking for one car per room and are so glad that we are able to continue to do so!  Thank you again for your time! We look forward to you returning to stay with us again in the future!!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: The room was nice, the beds were very comfortable, housekeeping was good but the outstanding part for us was the courtesy and professional attitude of the front desk.  They made sure that my scooter was fully charged every night, put it away every night and got it out for me every morning.  We were very pleased with the way we were treated.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments on TripAdvisor!! We are so happy to hear that your stay with us lived up to your expectations and that our front desk was "wonderful"!! We are always so grateful for our guests and appreciate the time that you took to let us know how everything was!! As we do each time our staff is mentioned, we have given them a copy of the review so that they can see that our guests also appreciate them!  Thank you again for your review! We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!  Regards,  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: I'll admit I had pretty low expectations of this place from some of the reviews that I had read, but we were booking our Disney trip last minute and I was having a hard time finding someplace close that still had rooms available.  We were pleasantly suprised.  We were located on the 4th floor (a stair climb that is not for the faint of heart!), but it was quiet, the room was clean and we slept well for the 4 nights we stayed there.  It was a convenient walk to Disneyland and a great value for the price. The staff was helpful in answering our questions and we have already recommended this place to family who are planning a Disney trip.
Manager Response: We wanted to take a minute to say thank you for the comments you posted regarding your stay with us earlier this month.  We are so glad to hear that you are free thinker and disregarded other reviews to form your own opinion and were happy with your decision.  We did want to mention that we do have elevators in the hotel and that you did utilize them while you were here and did not just use the stairs each time you went up and down.   We are so pleased to hear that our staff lived up to your, and our, expectations. We rely on our staff for so much and are so glad to hear that there were helpful to you!  Thank you for recommending the Castle Inn & Suites to your friends. We know they will also enjoy their stay!  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Staff was nice, location was good.  Beds were uncomfortable and rooms look as if they were last remodeled in 1978.  Green, stained carpet, yellow curtains, lumpy springy uncomfortable mattresses.  Housekeeping was great, front desk was great and for the hotels on Harbor next to entrance for the incredibly low price it's good but I would rather pay $20 more a night to actually be able to sleep comfortably.  If they remodeled these rooms, it would be a better place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind comments regarding our Housekeeping staff and front desk staff during your stay with us earlier this month! We are always happy to have our employees mentioned in reviews and do pass it on to them when this occurs.   We appreciate all of our guests and it’s with comments such as yours that we are able to better serve you all.  We hope that you will give us another try when you return to Anaheim for a future visit.   Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We arrived at different times on Nov 10th. My daughter and granddaughter had trouble checking in as the reservation was in my husband's name and they would not accept her married name at first because we booked through Expedia!  What a shame! I had let them know before that they would be checking in before us, but did not give their names., and I guess they did not check their e mail. The stay there was great and did provide for our needs..very clean, quiet, and the pool and hot tub were adequate. The walk to Disneyland was only 10 minutes and was so much fun! Our last visit there was 28 years ago..what a change!
Manager Response: LindyLou,  Thank you so much for the comments you posted on TripAdvisor regarding your recent stay. We do apologize for the miscommunication that your daughter had while trying to check in but unfortunately, we had not received any notification that someone else, other than your husband, would be checking in. Due to security reasons, we only let the person who is on the reservation check in, unless we are notified and it is noted on the reservation. I am sure you can appreciate this measure and am glad that you were satisfied with your stay anyway!  We are so glad all 5 Canadians thought their stay was "awesome"! We hope you won't wait another 28 years to come back!!   Thank you for your time! We look forward to having you return for another visit in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We stayed for 5 nights, the rooms were clean and tidy. Staff were very friendly and helpful.  It had a great famiily feel, and the kids and us made lots for friends at the pool. The pool closed a bit early. The internet access was very slow, which was a shame as we were trying to keep in contact with familty back home.
Manager Response: Judith,  We wanted to thank you for the time you took to post comments about your stay with us in October! We are pleased to hear that your enjoyed the cleanliness of our rooms, that our staff was friendly and helpful AND that the hotel gave you the “family feel” you were looking for!!   It is always fun to go on vacation and make friends at the pool and it sounds like you and your family did just that!!!  Thank you again for your time! We hope to see you again in the future!!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: From the Staff to the Awesome Rooms this Place Rocks !
Summary: From the Staff to the Awesome Rooms this Place Rocks !  We have stayed here several times, and everytime have such a wonderful experience !   The rooms are right ACROSS from the Main Gate at Disneyland --- so you can walk back and forth from Disneyland to your room, and don't have to deal with parking at Disneyland !     The rooms are always clean and awesome !    They get a 10+ plus from our Family !!!
Manager Response: Hi Bev,  We are so happy that you keep coming back to stay with us!!!! Thank you for your kind words and for making the effort to post your comments on Trip Advisor. We are thankful for guests, such as yourself, who trust us and keep returning with your family for your vacations!!  Thank you again!!! We look forward to your next visit! Please let us know when you will be back!!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: My family and I stayed here for the first time recently for 2 nights while we visited Disneyland. We had 2 adjoining rooms on the second floor right off of stairway, which was convienent. It is about 2 blocks from main enterance to Disneyland/California Adventure, which was a good 10-15 minute walk (on very tired Disney feet, seemed like 10 miles!). We walked past the few closer hotels and seriously wished we were staying there! My daughter and son-in-law and child stayed in one room, while myself , husband and teenage daughter stayed in the other. Both rooms had 2 double beds that were fairly hard (needed maybe a thicker matress cover) but No bed bugs (daughter checked thouroughly!). Motel standard sheets/blankets/bedspread. Decor also pretty plain and somewhat dated. Room size
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the review regarding your family’s stay with us earlier this month! We are so glad that you enjoyed your time here and that our Customer Service was "excellent".   Rest assured that we do have a nationally known pest control company that comes out and services the hotel regularly.  We do apologize that you feel that Jacuzzi closed too early for you but as I am sure you can understand, we do have guests who return from the parks earlier than some, to sleep, and we are simply looking out for every one!   Thank you again for your comments!! We hope you will come back and see us when you return to Anaheim!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Extremely pleasant stay, would definitely return when in the area again.
Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights during September 2012.  We weren't really sure what to expect with this hotel due to some negative reviews on here however we got an excellent price for the room from wotif.com and decided to go ahead with it.   We were pleasantly surprised.  Sure, as others have mentioned the decor etc is a little outdated but for us that isn't a concern and  cleanliness is of utmost importance and I found our room to be extremely clean.  We found the concierge to be very warm and professional.  They were very helpful with questions we had and one was particularly helpful in providing us detailed directions  with a map for using public transport to get to a number of destinations.  I have to say the highlight of our stay would be the housekeeping service we received.
Manager Response: Hi Misty,  Thank you, first of all, for responding to my private message! We are thrilled that the “highlight” of your stay was the designs of the towels and the origami of the toilet paper done by our Housekeepers. We love the fact that your kids didn’t want to use the toilet paper for fear of messing up the bow! As I mentioned in my note, we did commend the Housekeeper who worked on your room and thanked her for her hard work!  As we have said many times, we are always so thankful to see kudos to our Guest Services staff! We are pleased they were attentive to your needs and you were able to get to everywhere you need to go, based on their assistance!  Our rooms are cleaned daily and we appreciate you bringing attention to the fact that your room was extremely clean!  Thank you again for your time, honesty and candor!! We appreciate everything you said and look forward to having you and your family back for another visit sometime in the future.   The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: As a family of 10 sharing 2 rooms we found or stay very enjoyable.  Even though it is a older hotel the cleanliness was awesome, no dust or mould. The staff were great and ready to accomodate our every need.  And the location was perfect. We will be back again  :)
Manager Response: Jasmin,  Thank you so much for posting comments about your recent stay with us. We are pleased to hear that you were satisfied with your stay and that the hotel, as well as the staff lived up to your expectations!!  We appreciate all comments and are always thankful when guests, such as yourself, take the time to go to TripAdvisor and let others know about their stay!!  Thank you again! We look forward to having you return to stay with us in the future!  Regards,  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Was a lovely hotel, reception lovely, nice pool and spa, wifi not the best, but we got a good price, laundry only had one dryer going, and 2 washing machines, the others were broken, was hard to wash when everyone else wanted to, just over a five minute walk to Disney
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post comments regarding your stay last month. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay but are sorry to hear that there was some technical difficulty with our washers and dryers while you were here! Please note that these things have all been taken care of!  We hope that you will stay with us if you return Anaheim for a future visit!  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management  Was a lovely hotel, reception lovely, nice pool and spa, wifi not the best, but we got a good price, laundry only had one dryer going, and 2 washing machines, the others were broken, was hard to wash when everyone else wanted to, just over a five minute walk to Disney   Stayed October 2012, traveled with family

Summary: We stayed with this property two and a half years ago and were so impressed by its cleanliness  and close proximity to the Main Gate of DL. We didn't hesitate to come back...well it was just renovated back then so our room was spotless....sadly I don't think it has had a thorough cleaning since.  The room was a family suite with lots of beds that were nicely made for us every day, and of course the towels refreshed, but there was dust/mildew in the corners of the bathroom vanity area and what I think was a piece of rice...it was what I watched all week to see if it got cleaned...nope, in 7 days it never did.  We went to use out phone on the 5th day of our stay only to find out it wasn't working..the phone in the second room did thankfully.  The drawer set in the second room is
Manager Response: Shauna,  Thank you very much for the time you took to post comments regarding your stay with us last month. We are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your most recent stay and that you were unhappy with your whole trip!  I did send you a private message to get some more information regarding the room you were in and when you were here in order to check on the items you mentioned but have not heard from you. We do wish that you had reached out to one of us while you were here so that we could have actually rectified the situation immediately, rather than finding out about the issues after the fact.   We do hope that you will give us another chance sometime in the future!  Thank you again for you time.   The Castle Inn & Suites

Summary: Stayed here for four nights for Disney trip. The front desk was very pleasant to work with, and it's very helpful that they offer park hopper passes for purchase. Unfortunately, I just really didn't enjoy this hotel. On one hand, I understand that many people pass through on a daily basis to stay due to the close proximity to park. On the other hand, I would not stay here again until the rooms have been renovated. I regularly stay at hotels of this level, and I just felt like it wasn't very clean. But this could be changed with a renovation. New carpet, new tile in the bathroom, and losing the old fashioned gross bedspread would go a long way. I still cringe thinking about the carpet by the sink. Sound quality is also terrible.  My intention is to give a realistic review and
Manager Response: none

Summary: ROOM DESCRIPTION: ground floor room, 2 queen beds, fridge, microwave, table and chairs, big tv. No problems checking in-I arrived early AM. Bags were stored for me and I returned later to complete check in. stayed 3 nights. THE GOOD: room was clean with clean bathroom and linens.  THE NOT SO GOOD: 1)Too many kids in the spa in the evening after the parks closed! I counted 13 (mostly very young) along with a few parents in with them. Pool closed at 10, so I had to enjoy my spa time in the morning-Very young kids just dont belong in the spa-come on people, use some common sense! 2)The noise from people's luggage rolling was a bit louder than I am used to (but I usually dont ever end up on a ground floor at hotels) 3)The bed was a bit stiff, but was still ok for me.  I would
Manager Response: Becky,  Thank you so much for posting comments regarding your stay with us earlier this month. We are pleased that the cleanliness of your room and our location lived up to your satisfaction, and that you would stay with us again in the future.  While we are sorry to hear that you weren’t able to enjoy the spa in the evening as you would have liked, we are glad to hear that you got your “spa time” in in the morning!   Thank you again! We look forward to seeing you on a return visit!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: What should have been a great time in the Happiest Place in the world "Disneyland" turned out to be a horrible experience. I am a cargiver and was on a trip to take 2 of my disabled clients on  trip to disneyland. My clients parents booked this hotel via on line, no one we known had stayed here but it didnt look to bad and it said it was a good neighbor hotel. Well we arrived in our Family Suite room 356 to a big food crusted spot on our top comforter so we called down to get fresh blankets but we were brought up towels. After 3 calls we finally got a clean blanket. Upon waking up in the am one of my clients who was sleeping in the back room with 2 queen bed started yelling I went in to see what was wrong, and what I seen was a HUGE COCKROACH on the floor near the window. I
Manager Response: While we are surprised to get the review about your stay with us, we wanted to touch base on your complaints that seemed to start when we advised you that we would not be able to give you back any of the money that you had not actually paid:  Due to your apparent misleading claim to the Health Department, an inspector was sent here that morning, and arrived before the room was even cleaned. The other room had been blocked immediately after you reported that you had found one bug so the inspector got in there and checked the entire room, again, before it was re-rented: under the bed, behind the pictures, in the bathroom, everywhere. She was even on her hands and knees looking but found nothing. She also checked the housekeeping carts and the sheets on the beds in the room that you had been moved to and once again, found nothing. We do have a full report that the inspector was unable to find any of which you are claiming. We are extremely proactive in our pest control and have a nationally recognized pest control company who regularly services the property. We had them come out, as well, to check the room and they were unable to find anything.  We did upgrade you to a larger room but were unable to give you the money you requested back as it had not been paid by you, but by another party: this seems to be the source for all of your complaints. Along with the upgrade, we also accommodated you with a late checkout, at 6:00 p.m., complimentary, as compensation for the move.   The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: It's basic clean hotel across the street from Disneyland. The staff will assist as best they can. Wifi limited to the lobby and other common areas. Pool is basic and sits in car park. No restaurant but small shop selling basic items at the property. The theme of the hotel is basic but clean enough. Many like it to pick from on South Harbour - I'd try again based on location only.
Manager Response: Robert,  Thank you so much for the review you posted regarding your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear that our staff was helpful and that our location worked for you and your family.   We hope that you will stay with us in the future when you return to Anaheim!  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Great hotel for the price.    Plenty of room.
Summary: Great hotel.   The room was plenty large for the family and the price was excellent.  It is close to the entrance to disneyland.   We checked in early and the room was available.   The staff is very friendly and helpful.   We didn't have a car with us for the stay but the day we checked out we rented car that we left parked there for one more trip into disneyland that day and it was no problem.     I left a camera behind in the room and when I called they were very helpful.   It only took a few minutes to find out that they found it and would ship it to me.  They shipped it the next day and it saved my trip and my pictures.   Thank you.
Manager Response: Troy,  We are so pleased to hear that you think we are GREAT!! Thank you so much for your review and for the comments you posted recently.   We are also thrilled when our staff is noted and always let them know when they have been mentioned.   We are also so glad that we were able to return your camera to you in a timely fashion. I am sure you were eager to look at the photos from your trip!!  Thank you again! We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Mangement

Summary: First time at the castle inn. It was great. Clean room, close to Disneyland. The room was big. Staff friendly. There's a small store that's connected to the hotel. They have all kinds of goodies. Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review regarding your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay, that our staff was friendly, your room was clean and that our proximity to Disneyland would encourage you to stay with us another time!  Thank you again! We look forward to having you visit us on your next trip to Anaheim.  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We have just had 6 wonderful nights at this great Family Hotel.  We were lucky enough to get one of the Family suites - which consisted of three beds, king in the main room with pull out sofa, tv, chairs, table, fridge, microwave.  There is one bathroom in the middle and then a separate room with two queen beds, which suited the teenages nicely.  Also they had their own TV, so no fights! Perfect location, so close to Disneyland and loads of restaurants within walking distance. The laundry on sight was a life saver.  Thank you Kelly for a fantastic Anaheim Experience. Cheers from the Crowthers in New Zealand x
Manager Response: Crowthers,  Thank you so much for the wonderful comments you posted regarding your stay with us earlier this month. We are so pleased that the Family Suite worked well for your family and that there were no fights over the t.v.!   As we always do when our staff members are named in a review, we have notified Kelly that your comments included her and we wanted to let you know that we do appreciate your acknowledgement.  Thank you again! We hope that you will stay with us any future visits to Anaheim!   The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Checked in early, upgraded room, and a free night
Summary: My party called ahead and asked if it was ok to park since we'd be checking in later, we wanted to enjoy the Disneyland parks for the day, they didn't hesitate and said yes, I'm think that since it was a Thursday and not as busy they didn't care, either way they were nice enough to let us park early. Out of sheer curiosity on our way down there we called ahead and asked if we could possibly check in early and again they said yes gladly, we arrive about. 4 hours earlier than regular check in, and they greeted us with a smile. When me made reservations I had asked if my partys room could be in the same area and again a yes. I had a free night from reviews I have written on Tripadvisor in the past about this Hotel. Through the communication between them and I, The Castle Inn &
Manager Response: Evan,  Thank you so very much for yet another kind review regarding your most recent stay! As a loyal guest, we were thrilled to have provided you with a gift certificate to use and we are so pleased that you used it.   With our complimentary parking for one car per guest room, we are glad that you and our other guests are able to park your cars here when you go over to enjoy the Disney Parks.   Although check in time is at 3:00 p.m. and while we cannot guarantee it, we are pleased when we are able to check our guests into rooms if we have the availability when they arrive. I was happy to hear that your rooms were ready when you got here and we were able to get your rooms close together!  Thank you again for being such a loyal and regular guest of the Castle Inn & Suites! We look forward to your next visit!!!   The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: It was fine for our family!
Summary: First off I must say that I give this property 5 stars, but obviously it is not a "5 star luxury" property. We did not pay for 5 star luxury property. This hotel had everything we needed. Bed, coffee maker, swimming pool, and feeling of security. Check in was a breeze and everybody we encountered were very nice. It is a very short walk to Disneyland/Cal Adventure main gates. Bottom line is we would return to this hotel!
Manager Response: We wanted to say thank you for the really great review you posted regarding your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites! We are so happy that we lived up to your expectations and that you felt secure while you were here! We take Customer Service seriously and are glad that to see that you mentioned our staff was “very nice”.   Thank you again for your comments! We look forward to having you and your family, return for another visit sometime in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We were there in sept-oct and I did read the reviews and most were accurate....the short walk to Disney was a plus...there were a lot of convenient shops and restaurants near by which was nice...I have to say tho that the carpet was dingy and old, the beds were ok, not the best but weren't horrible either....the room was cleaned daily however I think the cleaning could improve as there were mildew stains in the tissue holder which made it kind of gross to look at...the pool was ok the whole time we were there but the last night we kept getting hair on us then found one huge hair clump floating around which was gross....and the hot tub was too hot making it hard to sit in there and enjoy....the laundry facility was clean and convenient....the staff was ok, not the most welcoming
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the time you took to post comments regarding your recent stay with us.  We are pleased to hear that you were satisfied with our location and that the very short walk to the Disney Parks, as well as the shopping and food establishments close by, added to your stay.   We did want to let you know that our pool and Jacuzzi are cleaned daily and that the temperature of the Jacuzzi is regulated for the comfort of our guests.   Thank you again for your review. We do appreciate all reviews and use them to continuously improve upon our service.   The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: For starters we had ants in our room!we found them in the tub and in sink area. The front desk wasnt very freindly. The cleaning staff was very nice.   Very aged furniture etc. also found old food on floor by a/c unit yuk!!  Never stay there again. Location was good
Manager Response: While we are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with your stay, we do appreciate the comments you posted on Trip Advisor.  We’ve been having the weirdest AND warmest weather here in Southern California this summer/fall and wanted to be sure to mention that we do utilize a nationally recognized pest control service that inspects and services the property on a regular basis.   Thank you again for your comments and the time it took to post them!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We were just there 9/27/2012 to 10/01/2012 and stayed in the family suite.  As many of the reviews I have read, rooms are not updated, but are clean and comfortable.  The microwave and fridge came in handy with a 12 year old and a 4 year old.  Staff were very helpful.  The only negative I had was internet access.  There really isn't any.  So if you do not have a smart phone you are out of luck.  We would book this room again though.  Had a great time.
Manager Response: Sharon…Thank you so much for the review regarding your stay last month. We are so happy that your family enjoyed your stay in the Family Suite and that everything was “clean and comfortable” for you.  Thank you again for your comments! We look forward to having your family return to stay with us in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: The hotel is getting older and worn down, but what one isn't around Disneyland? It is well within walking distance of the parks, and close to some convenient shops. The room was clean, although outdated. The service and staff were great, even allowing us to have a later check-out time due to a late night flight. All in all, I would probably stay a little bit closer to the main gates with a little bit less walking to do each day.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post comments regarding your stay with us last month! We are so happy to hear that you were satisfied with your stay and that our service and staff lived up to all expectations! As we always do, we have passed on to the staff that they were mentioned in a review and we appreciate your taking notice of them!  We are also pleased to hear that our proximity to the parks and shopping was a benefit during your stay! We are always happy to help our guests with late check outs, when possible, and we do hope that you had a good trip back home!!  Thank you again for your time and your comments!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: The hotel was acceptable when describing the lobby and room furnishings and price. The location is a very short distance to the main entrances of Disneyland and California Adventure which was a definite plus! The staff was friendly and our rooms were cleaned each day. Yes, there is a pool, however, its a bit small. It was a very nice feature to not have to pay a parking fee at this hotel. My family and I stayed in the executive and family suites. The rooms served there purposes, to sleep and shower. However, on our last night at this hotel, we sighted a few cockroaches in both rooms. This was very disappointing! When we checked out the next day, I brought this matter to the attention of the front lobby employee and was told, "We'll check into it". I hope they do for the sake of
Manager Response: Vanessa,  We wanted to say thank you for the review you took the time to post regarding your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites last month. We are pleased to hear that you were happy with your stay and that our staff lived up to all expectations.   The property is inspected and serviced, regularly, by a nationally recognized pest control company and we did want to confirm that the rooms you stayed in were inspected after you checked out.   Thank you again for your time and comments! We do take all reviews seriously and appreciate your honesty.  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Despite some negitive reviews read I was amazed at how good the castle inn and suites was for our recent family trip to disneyland.  I checked in a little skeptical after reading peoples reviews and was more then happy with what we discovered. The motel style family suite we stayed in was located in the far corner on the second floor, we had 3 beds that were all comfortable, rugs were recently cleaned and room was well cleaned and spacious.
