The walk to the parks was about 10 minutes which we expected thanks to reviews.  Coming from Canada toa very hot humidex like we had, the pool was a big blessing.  Small, but clean and well kept, the kids had 3-4 swims daily just to hang out and cool off.  We never rented a car, but Mark at the front desk was very helpful and set us up for a
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post comments regarding your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. We appreciate the fact that you overlooked, as you said, negative comments, and decided to stay with us anyway!   We are so pleased to hear that you were satisfied with your stay as a whole and acknowledge your kind remarks about Mark at the Front Desk. We have notified him that he was mentioned, as we do when any of our staff is recognized. We are also glad to hear that the short walk to the Disney Parks as well as the pool, and having a store on property added to the enjoyment of your stay!  Thank you again for your time! We look forward to having you return to stay with us again in the future!  Regards,  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Yes the location is great and the staff is friendly.  The pool is small but serves its purpose.  My main issue are the bedbugs we found in our bed.  I had been finding bites on my feet and arms and hands for the last few days before I found the bug crawling on my neck in the middle of the night.  We were moved to another room and the hotel did our laundry for us which was great but didn't make up for the stress and hassle. Totally ruined the last few days of our holiday and had to deal with another total cleaning of our luggage and clothing once we got home.  Time consuming.  Stressful.  And I still have itchy bites on my arms.  The manager downplayed the issue and assured me there were no worries about bringing unwelcome critters home with us and that there were only a few
Manager Response: We wanted to thank you for taking the time to post comments regarding your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. We are disappointed to hear that you were not satisfied with your stay but appreciate your kind words about our staff being friendly!  We also wanted to make you aware that we are proactive with our pest control and use a nationally recognized company to inspect and service the property regularly.  Upon your family being moved, the room was immediately blocked out of service and checked.   Thank you again for your time!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Stayed in family suite for seven nights with two daughters (9 & 6) the extra space was great meant we could all relax. Easy walking distance to Disneyland, clean facilities and pleasant staff. Decor dated but good value for money if you value location and space.
Manager Response: Hi Maryanne….thank you so much for the review you posted about your stay last month at the Castle Inn & Suites. We are so happy that you and your daughters enjoyed the comfort of the Family Suite and the ease of the walk back and forth to the Disney Parks.   Thank you again for your comments!! We hope you will get to come stay with us again sometime in the future!  Regards,  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Great deal within walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: If you just need a cheap place to sleep while visiting Disneyland this is great. It's not new or updated, but we didn't need anything other than a bed to sleep in. Our waking hours were spent at Disneyland which is in walking distance to the parks. The mattresses looked new, not brand name, but still new, and felt fine. We never heard noise from other guests. If you plan on spending more time in your room than we did, or you want to use a nice pool, you may want to consider a nicer hotel.  Pros: free parking very close to DL mini fridge courteous staff  Cons:  dated wifi signal was very poor loud plumbing
Manager Response: Thank you very much for posting your recent comments on your stay with us in September.  We appreciate the time it takes, and we use all helpful feedback to improve on our services and facilities.  We are happy to hear your stay was enjoyable, and we hope you will consider us again if your plans call for a future visit to the Disneyland Resort area.

Summary Heading: Awesome location with great facilities and helpful staff. Great for a Disney holiday!
Summary: Spent seven nights with my husband, one child and an infant. We had a wonderful time and loved the fact that Disneyland was just a short walk down the street about ten minutes. Along the street and around the hotel there is also a number of cheap meal options including Denny's, McDonalds, IHOP, Subway and others.  The room was comfortable enough for the four of us and was kept clean by the housekeeping staff. Also any questions we had for the staff at the front desk were answered for us.  The pool area was great to relax in after a day spent wandering the theme parks. There is a large pool, kiddie pool and spa. There was always room to hang out around the pool area but it was sometimes closed up early. The pools were always clean. There is also a handy laundry on the premises
Manager Response: We wanted to take the time to thank you very much for posting your recent comments on your stay with us in September.  We were happy to hear the location worked well for you, and that you had time to enjoy our pool area, and guest laundry facilities.  We hope when you have a future visit to the Anaheim Resort area, you will keep the Castle Inn & Suites in mind, we would love to have you return for another visit.

Summary Heading: Older property but if you want location for a good price it is worth considering.
Summary: The property is definitely in need of a make over, but if you want somewhere close to Disney it has merit. You will get a serviceable room, which is maintain by the staff daily, and if you are only going to sleep thereit is ok. If you struggle with tired facilities it is not the place for you, as you will be looking at the faults the whole time. Staff are courteous and do everything they can to make you stay pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in posting a review about your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We appreciate the fact you felt our staff was friendly and that your room was clean and maintained daily.  We also appreciate the feedback regarding the overall view of our property and we are currently looking into further enhancements to the property in the near future.  We hope to see you on a future visit to the Anaheim/Disneyland Resort area.

Summary: I booked a suite for 3 nights well we ended up having to change rooms 3 times because every room they put us in the air quit working.  It is very hard to get children to get up in the middle of the night to change rooms.  Management did not care at all.  I have video of my husband having to help the maintenance man fix the central air unit,  Totally unacceptable!  Sorry just doesnt get it.  They should have given me more than a $40 discount!
Manager Response: April,  Thank you very much for the comments you posted about your stay last month at the Castle Inn & Suites. We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with your visit and that you had some issues with the air conditioning. As I am sure you remember, Southern California had some record temperatures while you were here and the air conditioning system was on over load by all of our guests using it. Unfortunately, when the individual system in a guest room is put on the lowest temperature, it is possible that the system freezes up, which looks like it was the case in your room.   We did move your family each time there was an issue, and while we do apologize for the inconvenience, we did upgrade your room and provide you with a discount on your rate to compensate.   Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: I had a two day trip to disneyland park, i stayed at the castle in, omg had the time of my life, the staff very very helpful and super frindly, if you need a place to stay, i very much recommend this hotel, it isn't expensive and they will make your trip worth going to. my bed was very comfortable and a easy walk to disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent comments regarding your stay with us this month.  We are very happy to hear you had “the time of your life” and that our staff was extremely helpful and friendly.  We appreciate the time our guests take to write a review and we hope to see you at the Castle Inn & Suites in the near future.

Summary Heading: Great location, good price, beds need improvement
Summary: Easy walk to Disneyland, Convention Center and restaurants. The exterior has a castle feel but the rooms are just regular rooms.   The beds aren't very good. But fine for the price. You can feel the coils in the bed unless you put something between you and the bed.We always bring extra pillows and blankets and sleep fine.  easyclicktravel.com offers good deals on the rooms.   Easy to check in and out. A perfect place for sleeping before or after Disneyland.   We've stayed are many other hotels along Harbor Blvd. We've stayed at all the Disney Hotels too. If you can get a good price under $80 this is worth it!
Manager Response: We wanted to take the time to thank you for your recent comments regarding your visit this month.  We are happy to hear the location of our hotel worked well for you. We appreciate the comment regarding our beds and we are looking into this.  We hope you will consider the Castle Inn & Suites again on a future visit to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: I just returned from Castle Inn after a 3 night stay for a "Girls Road Trip" to Disneyland.  We were right near the elevator and the ice machine... it was VERY warm - - I was worried that it would effect our room.  Nope! Not at all.  We got no additional heat from the machine and we couldn't hear any people.  I was pleasantly surprised how exceptionally clean our room was everyday.  It is a short walk to Disneyland - 5-7 mins.  It is a simple no nonsense place to stay. The price was right.  The front desk help was very friendly and helpful.  I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments you recently posted regarding your “girls road trip” to Disneyland.  We were happy to hear the location of the room you stayed in worked well and that your room was cleaned to your satisfaction each day.  We appreciate your comments regarding our friendly front desk staff as well as we pride ourselves on our exceptional guest service.  We hope to see you on a future “girl’s road trip” to the Disneyland Resort in the near future.

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights, took my daughter who just turned 4 to Disneyland. Super close walk even with a toddler. Check in and out was quick and easy! The room was nice and clean. Fridge was a great convenience to keep our water and milk. Housekeeping was so nice and kept our room clean and brought fresh towels and toiletries every day. Didn't get in the pool, but it looked nice. I do wish they had continental breakfast but there's a Denny's on the way to Disneyland, no big deal. We will definitely stay here again for our next visit! We called it our castle every night we came back from the parks!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review regarding your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We enjoyed hearing you referred to the Hotel as “our Castle” – we appreciate your feedback and were happy to hear the location, the refrigerator and Housekeeping service and the ease of check in worked well for your family.  We hope you will consider returning to “your Castle” on a future visit to the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: We definitely will stay here again.  Our room was very clean. The beds were fairly comfortable. My brother found the pillow slightly too puffy and bought one down at Target for 4 dollars...not an issue at all. There was a fridge so we kept drinks and water bottles in the fridge and it kept all of our stuff nice and cold. We also called down to the front desk MANY times for towels and they were brought to us within minutes. Great friendly staff.  It would be nice if there was a continental breakfast, but you can't win them all, and thats ok. We were happy with how close it was to the park, and would simply NOT pay more money when it was a 7 minute walk.  The pool was FANTASTIC. The hot tub was super warm, and like usual we met lots of great people from around the USA and Canada
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and comments regarding your recent visit to our Hotel. We appreciate the time you took to write your review, it is very much appreciated.  We hope you will consider the Castle Inn & Suites on a future visit to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,  Guest Relations Manager Castle Inn & Suites

Summary: Very close to Disneyland, and very friendly front desk. We got a free upgrade for our room becuase I put on the reservation that it was my wife's birthday. Room was perfect for our visit. No issues at all.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post comments regarding your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay and are happy that we had the availability in order to upgrade the room for your wife’s birthday!   Thank you again! We look forward to having you return to stay with us again in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites

Summary Heading: dont stay here dont waste your money
Summary: Well this place was alright and the buliding looked nice but the customer sevice Ive got was very bad the frontdesk clerk was very very rude and mean my family was visiting from mexico and they dont speak any english so they went to the frontdesk just to be embarrased. When they went to the frontdesk for some pillows that gentelman said that he dont speak english really! he looks more hispanic than my uncle and then he was making fun of them like saying why dont you speak english and maybe they should learn english and he had this smile like hes more better than us really Ive paid over $300 to stay there and this is the treament my family gets never again will I stay here and trust me Iam going to tell everyone of this special treament my family got...
Manager Response: Kaddy,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post comments about your stay with us in July! While we are so sorry to hear that your experience did not live up to your expectations, we would have been happy to rectify the situation while you were here, having been given the opportunity.  I did send you  two private messages to see exactly when you were here and if you knew whom you spoke to but have not hear back from you on either so wanted to express our surprise at seeing your review about our Guest Service Agent. We are happy to have to have all of the international guests who come to stay with us on a regular basis and are happy to report more than half of our Guest Services staff does indeed speak Spanish. I am surprised to hear that you were taken aback by someone who may have looked like they spoke Spanish but actually did not, just as I am sure you would be taken aback by the blond haired blue eyed gentleman behind the desk who DOES speak Spanish fluently.  We do have each of these scenarios and am sorry that there seems to have been some miscommunication all the way around.  Thank you again for your time! We do take all comments seriously and appreciate your candor.  Regards,  The Castle Inn and Suites Management

Summary: Me and my family stayed at this hotel for only two nights but it was worth it. We arrived before check in but the staff was nice enough to give us are room. The room was very clean, not a lot of noise, and very nice. Only a couple of problems were that the Internet connection only worked in the lobby, the shower worked weird, and the air conditioner made the room very cold. But for the minimum the hotel was very nice. I would stay again
Manager Response: We wanted to say thank you for the comments you posted about your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. We welcome all feedback and certainly appreciate the time you took to post your comments! We are pleased to hear that you were satisfied with your stay and would stay with us again!  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Fortunately one night left (we booked four). The mattresses are lopsided and literally impossible to get a good night sleep on. My wife attempted to use the hair dryer and sparks came out of it. Television has no reception. I tried switching rooms to at least get a more comfortable Matress and was told I couldn't. Besides the location, I would not stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post your comments regarding your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites this week. We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with your stay and are disappointed that we were not given the opportunity to take care of the situation while you were still here!  I did send you a private message in order to get further information regarding your visit but have not heard back and wanted to touch base about a couple of items:  we do see that when you checked in, we were sold out and unfortunately, when you asked to be moved to another room, we did not have any rooms available to move you to.  We would have been happy to oblige had you still wanted to move once we had rooms available.  Thank you so much for notifying us that the hair dryer was having issues. If we had not received your comments, we would have not have been aware that there was a problem! We take all reviews seriously and it is because of comments such as yours that we are able to address these situations.  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Nice Clean rooms. Comfortable beds. Easy walk to Disneyland(very important as I have hip replacements and bad knee) and places to eat. Quiet even though our room was right by Ice and Soft Drink machines did not hear anything. No smoking room was great could tell no one smoked in it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind review you posted regarding your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. We are pleased that you were happy with your stay!  We are sorry to hear that you have had hip replacement surgery but are so glad that our location made the walk to Disneyland easy for you!!  We hope you will visit with us another time in the future!  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: This hotel was a great price in a convenient location to the Disney Parks.  The rooms were very clean and the swan towels were cute.  From our executive suite, we could see the Disney fireworks show.  The staff was very knowledgeable of the area and gave us good ideas and recommendations for lunch and dinner. Kelly, at the front desk, was very friendly and helpful. Overall, our experience with this hotel was a very positive one.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us and wanted to say thank you for the comments you posted on Trip Advisor!  We are thrilled when our staff is mentioned and we always make sure that they are aware of the comments made about them!   Thank you again! We look forward to you returning to stay with us again in the future.  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: There are much better hotels in the area
Summary: This hotel is very outdated.  The beds were not too comfortable and I did not feel comfortable with my kids playing on the dingy carpet.  The room was clean for the most part.  The refrigerator did not work very good, it took over 24 hours to get our drinks cold so the milk for the kids went bad.  The staff was not the friendliest but I guess you can't expect much from a place of this caliber.  I reserved here because I got a great deal online and wanted to save some$$ for the high expense for Disneyland tickets.  Next year I'll save more and make reservations at a Marriott or other place that actually cares about their reputation.  I recommend to everyone, especially those with young children, to spend the extra $$ for a nicer, more updated and cleaner hotel.  Our room was
Manager Response: Rick…  Thank you so much for the time you took to post comments regarding your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. While we are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay, we are also sorry that we were not made aware of the problems you were having while you were here. We would have been happy to discuss them with you, while having the opportunity to correct any issues, in person, rather than to receive notification after the fact, via Trip Advisor.  We wanted to acknowledge your response to our private message and to touch on a few points:  As I mentioned already, we would have been quite happy to work out the issues you were having while you were here. The room you were in, unfortunately, is located near the Housekeeping office and therefore is quite busy during the day. Had we been notified of the noise and the carts in the way, we could have communicated with the housekeepers or we would have actually moved you to another room.    Being that refrigerators are standard in all of our rooms, they are an easy fix and again, had we been notified that the one in your room was not working right, we would have gotten a new one to you as soon as possible.   We are surprised to hear that you were unhappy with our staff as they regularly receive accolades for their demeanor, attentiveness and attitude, as you can see in many of our previous reviews.   Regarding your comments about parking; our parking lot does have ample spaces for the amount of rooms that we have. The spaces are regulation size and we do not have compact spaces.   We appreciate all comments and take them all seriously. Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: I stayed here a total of four nights.  If I wouldn't have booked thru a hotel booking company I would have checked out after night one and made other arrangements.  I could not cancel my reservation.    I checked in fine staff was friendly.  The lobby bathroom had a clogged toilet and as soon as i entered to use the restroom the stench was unbearable.   This was a little unsettling.  Also I noticed that the entire place seemed to be stuck in the 80s it wasn't very clean, looked run down dirty and old.  The keys for my room were also older, defiantly not up to par with the times.     The first shower I took was dreadfull there was little to no water pressure and it took me about half hour to wash.  The carpet looked dirty and was wet in spots which grossed me out. There was hair
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post comments regarding your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with your stay and would have appreciated the opportunity to speak to you regarding the issues, and the rectifying them while you were here.  We sent a private message to you last week in order to follow up and to get some more information from you, but since we have not heard back, we wanted to acknowledge your review!  We are always so happy to hear our staff being praised for their friendly, helpful and accommodating attitudes.  Thank you for bringing that to our attention! If you had notified one of them about the lobby bathroom issue, they would have taken care of it immediately. That bathroom does get cleaned on a regular basis, daily.   We are thankful for all comments that we receive and do look at them all regularly!  Thank you again for your time!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: we traveled this past august the 13th..well i was a little skeptical about this place due to all these negative reviews but we went though with it anyways. It was me, my wife and 3 year old son.  first of all the staff was excellent and very nice and friendly. We ended up ugrading to a suite for only about $15 more than we originally booked which was sweet! well the room was what we needed, a very close spot to disneyland that we could walk to and avoid paying for parking and just leave our vehicle at the hotel, rest halfway through and shower up and head back to the park which worked out perfectly! The room was fine, beds were comfy and there was room chill.. My only thing was the shower did not have much pressure but it wasnt the end of the world.. Overall we had an excellent
Manager Response: First of all, we wanted to say thank you for being a free thinker and coming to stay with us earlier this month, after, as you said, you had read other reviews. We realize that it is not always possible to make everyone happy but we are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and that the Castle Inn & Suites worked for you!  Thank you, also, for your comments regarding our staff! Guest service is very important to us and we are so glad to hear that they lived up to our, and your, expectations.   Our location and the fact that we do have complimentary parking for our guests are indeed additional amenities to your stay. We are thrilled that you utilized both to your advantage!  Thank you for the time it took for you to post your comments!! We look forward to your return sometime in the future.  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Good pit stop and place to sleep
Summary: This hotel would be a good choice for you if: 1. You are looking for a hotel that is close to Disneyland. It's about a five-minute walk if you have older kids or teenagers, and about 10-15 if you have younger kids or babies in strollers. They do not charge for parking and they allow you to leave your car in the parking lot on the last day of your stay even after you check out. 2. You are mainly looking for a place to leave your stuff while you're at Disneyland, and a place to sleep at night. The hotel is built like a horseshoe with the entrances facing the inside of the horseshoe which is the parking lot and pool area. It was very quiet during the daytime, making it great for midday naps. 3. You would like a pool and hot tub, but you don't need it to have a fancy theme or
Manager Response: RTWFresno,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post the descriptive and intuitive comments regarding your recent stay with us! We acknowledge all of the comments we receive and are certainly appreciative that you took everything in stride and that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us!   As we have mentioned before, our location is really great for families who don’t want to have to deal with a shuttle. The 5 – 7 minute walk is easy and as you mention, you actually pass good restaurants en route to Disneyland.   We are so glad to hear that once again, our staff has lived up to the expectations we have set for them. Our friendly staff all has the “can do” attitude and we are pleased that this added to your experience!   To hear your son talk about staying in a Castle with a Jacuzzi is just great! I guess most Castle’s really DON’T have a Jacuzzi!!  We look forward to having you and your family return for another stay!  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: When we reached the inn, a man was hanging around outside our room and even asked "What is the name of this place?" After that he hang around at the staircase. Fortunately, we called the Frontdesk and they sent somebody to chase the intruder away. Another guy was always topless and standing along the corridor smoking. There is no place for breakfast too but there are many restaurants around though. It was not value for money.
Manager Response: We wanted to thank you for posting comments regarding your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. While we are sorry that you were not satisfied with your stay, we did want to make mention that we have never had any issues with safety. As you are aware, we were able to get someone up to your room as soon as we heard from you regarding the random man hanging around.  As I am sure you would agree, being that it is summer time, there is bound to be people wandering to and from the swimming pool area, in their bathing suits or without shirts on.  We are pleased, as always, with our location and the ease that our guests have when looking for somewhere to eat breakfast, lunch or dinner!  Thank you again for taking the time to post your comments!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Good value for the money. Within walking distance to Disney and in good location. The mattresses were obviously in need of replacement as you could plainly see the dips in it.  The staff were very friendly. I wish they offered a cont bkfst though.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the comments you recently posted on TripAdvisor.   We are pleased to hear that you felt we were a good value and were happy with your stay! We are always thrilled to hear when our staff has lived up to the expectations of the hotel and our guests!  While we do not have breakfast,  we hope you were able to enjoy the numerous eating establishments that we are located within a short walk from!  Thank you again! We look forward to seeing you again on a future visit!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Worst hotel I've ever stayed at by far.
Summary: I never write reviews on this site but felt compelled to write a review regarding this hotel because it was so awful.  I would like to express that I am a very easygoing guy and usually take things with a grain of salt.  In fact, I've stayed at the Castle Inn three times because I kept trying to give it a chance.  Each time was worse than the last.  I have vowed to never set foot on their property again.  The beds are uncomfortable and old... the place feels like it's falling apart and the bathrooms are gross.  On top of that, they seem to think that they can charge you more to stay there because their run down building looks like a castle so it's appealing to kids.  I've stayed at other hotels right down the street that were cheaper and about 1,000 times nicer.  I don't
Manager Response: We wanted to say thank you for taking the time to post comments regarding your recent stay on TripAdvisor. While we are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with your stay, we would have liked the opportunity to discuss and rectify the issues mentioned with you while you were actually here!   As we mentioned in the personal note we sent you, we appreciate ALL comments and do use them to further better the hotel. We are grateful for your honesty and candor regarding your visit.   Thank you again for your time and for your assistance!  Regards,  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Nasty spend the extra money and go somewhere else
Summary: Stayed 4 nights. The towel rack fell off on housekeeping and they didn't even bother haveing it fixed. And where it mounted to the wall you could see all the black mold in the walls. Even through I left them a tip the first day they continued to pour out there chunky mop water in our tub leaving all there floor water from hallways with black dirt chunks and stranger pubes in our shower would definetly avoid. My 7 year old daughter could barely tell it was suppose to be a castle.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay with us.  We have tried to reach you via private e-mail to get clarification on issues you had but since we have not heard from you, we wanted to let you know that we do take each comment seriously and would have liked the opportunity to discuss them with you while you were still here.  Once again, we are sorry that your visit did not live up to your expectations!  Thank you for your time!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Our stay at the Castle Inn was great, Eric at the front desk was extremelly helpful and very friendly. He was like a trip advisor aswell, he assisted us on info. I asked where the nearest grocery store is, and he sent us to a very affordable, 24hr grocery store. talk about being considerate.The whole staff was very friendly aswell.Our room was clean, I never once saw a piece of trash anywhere inside or outside. the staff is really good about keeping it clean. The walk to Disneyland and California Adventure was close. My 6 year old son really liked the castle theme, and our family agreed we really liked our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post comments regarding your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites! We take pride in our customer service and are thrilled to hear that Eric lived up to those standards!! As we always do, we have made sure that our staff has been made aware that they were mentioned in a review.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit and that our close proximity to the Disney Parks added to your stay!   We hope you and your family will come and stay with us again in the future.  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn &  Suites Management

Summary Heading: Castle Inn and Suites Gets a B
Summary: Requested first floor but they did not have our room ready for early check in so we waited and came back at 3:00. We were then told that they gave our room away and we had to have 2nd floor. Ok.  Room was nice and clean and noise level from the outside was low. We were discouraged that our other party had to find parking else where for they would not allow us to park a 2nd vehicle. We even offered to pay additional but were still denied. They suggested the parking lot at the mall which was 25 a day. Ok. We called around the next morning and the Hilton was very friendly and let her park there for 12 a day. Still high but better then 25. A pretty far walk to Disneyland even though it is across the street. I am sure I will book a different hotel our next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. We are very appreciative of your time and take all comments seriously.   We did want to note that we do offer complimentary parking for one car per guest room and hope you understand that we must strictly adhere to this when we are extremely busy, as we have been this summer. I can tell you that the majority of our neighbors do charge a parking fee and also strictly allow only one car per guest room.  Thank you again for your review!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: It's true, you get what you pay for.  And in this case, it's all about location to Disneyland.  2 blocks from the entrance? Perfect!  Unfortunately, the actual room was not worth the price.  The plumbing was awful, so bad in fact that even after snaking our drain at midnite the toilet still didn't work properly.  Not to mention the lack of water pressure in the shower.  And what did the hotel offer as compensation for our troubles?  $20 off for the night.  Are you kidding me?  Sure they were nice about it, but nice and $20 don't make up for the sewage smell or for lack of sleep.   There are many other hotels within walking distance to Disneyland, so there is absolutely no reason to return to this place.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the time you took to post a review regarding your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. While we are disappointed to hear that you were not satisfied with your stay, we appreciate your comments and take them seriously.   We are sorry to hear that you had problems with the toilet but we are sure that you realize that toilets do tend to back up once in a while.   Thank you again for your comments!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: The Castle Inn is a great place to stay, its simple, clean, pretty, quaint and a very short walk from the Disneyland Resort...their extremely professional staff will treat you iike royalty....As I planned this stay four our 5th Anniversary I accidentally booked a smoking room Claudia at the front desk didn't hesitate to switch us to a regular room the next day.....free parking is a great advantage....overall staying at the castle is a great experience....its now our tradition for years to come!!...thanks Castle inn for a neat experience!! Keep up the good work!!!...BOOK IT AND YOU WONT REGRET IT!!!
Manager Response: Hi Gustavo,  Thank you very much for the review you posted about your stay with us earlier this month. We are so happy to hear that you were pleased with your visit and we hope that your 5th Anniversary was wonderful!  We have made sure that Claudia was notified that you mentioned her. We are so thankful for our staff and are glad that they lived up to your expectations!  Please be sure to let us know when you return for your next visit!!  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Good location for Disneyland, otherwise a bit dated
Summary: We stayed here for three nights while visiting Disneyland in July 2012. Nice with free, on-site parking and about 10 minutes walking distance to the main entrance of Disneyland. The castle theme is only visible on the outside and in the reception area. Our kid did not pay too much attention to it, and neither did we during our stay.  The room we stayed in was quite spacoius, with two queen beds. A small table with three chairs, suitable for self-made breakfast. Fridge was working, but ours was a bit too cold, which resulted in frozen vegetables on our last day.  The beds was ok, not too hard or too soft. The bathroom was small, a bit dated and not perfectly clean. The carpet in our room was quite worn and a bit smelly, but seemed to be somewhat clean. A/C was working ok.  Pool
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you were satisfied with your recent stay here at the Castle Inn & Suites! Thank you for taking the time to post your thoughts! We take all comments seriously and appreciate yours!  We like to especially thank our guests who mention our free parking and 7 to10 minute walk to the Disney Main gate area as these are two most desired amenities.   Thank you again! We look forward to having you return for another stay sometime in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights in June 2012 specifically to visit Disneyland. We were not disappointed the location of this hotel is perfect, close to Disneyland and a variety of restaurants. There is free parking on site. The room was spacious and clean and the staff were helpful and friendly. Our main complaint would be that our room was right next to the elevator which made it very noisy, especially with children screaming for their parents to hurry up.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us last month! Thank you for taking the time to post your comments about our location, cleanliness and staff! We are always very pleased when our staff is mentioned as customer service is one of our main priorities! We are also really glad to be one of the few hotels on the street who still offer complimentary parking for our guests and are pleased that this added to the satisfaction of your stay.  We are sorry that there were some anxious children outside your room, near the elevator.  I am sure they were just very excited to go to Disneyland for the day!  Thank you again! We look hope you will visit us again sometime in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: old and in need of a face lift
Summary: the castle inn and suites was a place that my kids kept bugging to stay at because the outside looked cool.  Unfortunately it was the only cool thing about it.  I have a dough boy pool bigger then their pool.  There were no towels available pool side so we had to call housekeeping to bring us a batch.  The elevator was a death trap and the doors either didn't lock right or housekeeping felt comfortable just walking right in..who knows?!...The rooms were very clean but they were so outdated that it felt icky.  I would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the comments regarding your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. We are sorry to hear that your stay did not live up to your expectations and we appreciate your feedback.   Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: So close to Disneyland front gate...and it looks like a castle!
Summary: We stayed four nights.  The total bill was $404 for two queen sized beds.  Very close to a variety of food options and convenience stores.  We didn't use the pool but it was a nice option.  Rooms were okay not too bad.  Beds were comfy and clean which is a plus after slogging around Disneyland all day.  My son loved the castle theme and it added to the magic of the trip.  Right across from the front gates (7 minute walk).  Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear your son loved that we are a Castle and that you enjoyed your stay with us last month! We are happy to hear that the beds were comfortable for you and that we are indeed a 7 minute walk to the Disney front gates!  Thank you again! We look forward to your next visit!!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We stayed in this motel for 6 nights.  We stayed in a "suite" which had two BR's but only a single bathroom which meant there was a lot of traffic during the night for the ones sleeping in that room--inconvenient but doable.  It's within walking distance to Disneyland, shopping, and restaurants.  The best thing about this place is the service.  They would bring extra towels, etc. night and day.  VERY pleasant and helpful staff.  There is free wi-fi in the lobby and a pool and convenience store on the premises.  The only drawback is that it wasn't very quiet and we were on the top floor. Nevertheless, I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind comments you made regarding your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites! We are so pleased that our Staff is once again being recognized for their exemplary service! We take pride in our Customer Service and are very appreciative that our staff and service stood out to you while you were here!  Thank you for also mentioning our close proximity to numerous eating establishments as well as the short walk to Disneyland.   We hope you will come and stay with us again in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Great staff, Great Location OK rooms
Summary: We chose this hotel for its location and basic accommodation and that's exactly what we got.  Happy that the staff are quick and accommodating. That alone would make me a repeat customer.   We felt safe and area is quiet.
Manager Response: We are so appreciative of the comments you posted regarding your stay last month. Our thanks, especially, for mentioning our “happy staff” and location! Both are sources of pride to us and we are so happy when they are recognized.   Thank you again! We look forward to having you return to stay with us!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Very close to disneyland, plenty  of parking.  Staff was very friendly!  Great price and would definetly stay again.  Beds were comfy no noise or rowdy people!
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us! Thank you so much for taking the time to post your review on Trip Advisor. We are happy that your experience was a positive one!  Thank you again! We look forward to having you return for another stay!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We were able to get a room the night before Carsland opened which was amazing!  When we checked in, we were given an upgrade and allowed early check-in.  The room was great, the staff pleasant as always, and everything was quiet and peaceful.  This is really a great place to stay.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you were able to get a room here the night before Carsland opened and that you are a returning guest! I see you stayed with us in December and wanted to let you know that we value our loyal guests and are pleased that you enjoyed the upgrade.   Thank you for coming back and for the time you took to post your comments! We look forward to your next visit!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Great value for those on a budget
Summary: The hotel is very close to Disneyland (about a 10 minute walk) and great for the price.  The rooms are not all fancy but who cares, you're most likely going to be at Disneyland all day and only use the room to sleep in, which we did, and the beds are comfortable.  I would definitely stay here again next time I visit.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review of your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!! Our proximity to the Disney parks is one of our greatest attributes and we are glad to hear that the short walk was a breeze!    Thank you again for your comments! We hope you will return for another visit sometime soon!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: I want to commend the staff at Castle Inn and Suites.  Their customer service exceeded my expectations.  I needed to use the WIFI which was free to use in the lobby.  I needed to print and fax an important document for an upcoming job interview. I was having extreme difficulty with my laptop.  The front desk staff was most polite and helpful in assisting me with my dilemma .  The suite was clean, comfortable and close to Disney Land.  The room rate was very reasonable. I would highly recommend this facility when staying in the Anaheim area. Thanks again Deb
Manager Response: Deb,  Thank you so much for your kind comments regarding the staff and your stay here at the Castle Inn & Suites! We were very happy to help you yesterday and are sending good thoughts your way a successful job interview!!!  We look forward to having you return for another stay, perhaps to celebrate a new job?  Thank you again!!!   The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Worst Place to ever stay at!
Summary: This was the worst hotel (should I say Motel) we have ever stayed at. The rooms were terrible and dirty. Everything was so old and dingy. The pictures on the Internet were so deceiving. Their website falsely described the place. The ratings are false. This is not a 3 star hotel, more like a 1 to 2. Nothing in our room worked. The fridge spoiled my sons milk. The tub was clogged. The bathroom lock was not working. Carpet has never been cleaned. No shuttle to Disneyland. Every other hotel around us had shuttle service. The wifi was not strong enough for us to link into. For about $20 more per day, we could have stayed at a nicer 3 to 4 star hotel. WILL NEVER STAY HERE AGAIN!
Manager Response: Mr. Saephan,  Thank you for taking the time to post comments about your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites. We appreciate all comments and take them seriously.  While we are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay, we are also sorry that we were not made aware of the problems you were having while you were here. We would have been happy to discuss them with you, while having the opportunity to correct any issues, in person, rather than to receive notification after the fact, via Trip Advisor.  In reference to your quote regarding “Every other hotel around us had a shuttle service”, I must tell you that this is not actually the case. Being we are located where we are, as well as all of the neighboring hotels to the North of us, no one has shuttle service that runs to and from Disneyland.  To have a shuttle transfer from here to the Disney drop off area would take much longer than actually walking the 5 minute walk that it does take to get to the Maingate area!   Thank you again for your comments. We hope you will give us another opportunity for a future stay.   The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: THIS HOTEL IS ANCIEN!! right out of the stone age.  1. Inferior type key for the doors, not very secure, the key card has old style technology it looks like a long 2" wide credit card with holes in it and your room number is printed on the card. If you were to lose your key or if someone had the room before you they could easily duplicate the key for entry at another time. To prove this I was able to make a duplicate of my room key room 460 using a piece of disney gift card trimmed to the width of the room key and used a paper hole punch to punch out the holes in the plastic to unlock the door so if i can do it anyone can do it.  Then they could return to the room at anytime and steal from you or worse.  2.Poor TV reception on the prehistoric box they Call a television   3.Talk
Manager Response: Never Stay Here Again…6/18/12  Thank you for the comments that you posted on Trip Advisor regarding your stay this past weekend at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are disappointed to hear that you were not satisfied with your stay but we would have appreciated the opportunity to discuss any issues with you in person, while you were still here, rather than after you had already departed, through Trip Advisor.   I tried to reach you via e-mail to discuss your first point, regarding the key cards but have not heard back from you so wanted to clarify some things here: First, we feel that posting the instructions on how a duplicate key might be made, is not in the best interest of the general public. Second, we take lost or missing keys VERY seriously. If a key is reported lost or missing, we can easily rekey that room in a matter of minutes. Third, the key cards may have room numbers on them but do not actually have the hotel name on them anywhere. Last, all keys can easily be duplicated by someone with intent.   Thank you, also, for bringing your other issues to our attention. They have now been addressed.  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: The Castle Inn was a great place for my wife and I to stay for our 7th wedding anniversary while visiting Disneyland Park. The park entrance was only two short blocks away and took only about 3-5 minutes walking time to get to. The Hotel staff was very kind and willing to go above and beyond each day.  The rooms were clean each day after we returned from the park. The Hotel Management was gracious enough to upgrade our room for us at no charge. They even had a happy anniversary card waiting for us upon check in.  We will definitely look at the Castle Inn as an option for our next visit to Disneyland! Thanks again Castle Inn & Suites....
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are pleased to hear that your experience here was a pleasant one and we hope that you had a really wonderful anniversary!   As we always do when our staff is mentioned in a review, we have passed on your comments so that they can see that their hard work is paying off!!   Thank you again! We look forward to your next visit!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Five minute walk from disney main gate, so no parking , no buses ,close to takeaway breakfasts and good quality restaurants, the actually hotel is older and yeah but on a budget its great.beds were comfy and clean rooms. . Mark at reception is AMAZING , he wasn't on when we left so didnt get to tip him . As the rest of the staff was ok but Mark is super -conciege man lol. Thanks alot Mark .
Manager Response: We wanted to thank you for the comments you posted regarding your stay last month! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our location and proximity to Disneyland and to the numerous, great restaurants that we are right in the middle of!  On behalf of Marc, thank you for your wonderful comments!! We have made sure that he has seen your kind words!  Thank you again! We hope to see you again in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: finally got a good rate so i could stay here.  it was a room in the back, so it was darker and better for sleep.  after all that is all a hotel room is for.  quiet air conditioner for a hotel.  nice bed and good experience
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear that you were able to get a “good rate” and stay with us last month! Thank you very much for your comments!! We are pleased that you had a good experience during your stay and are very appreciate of the time you took to write the review!  Thank you again! We hope to see you on another visit to Anaheim!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: This is an economy option when visiting Disneyland.  There are PLENTY of options, and if you want newer digs (and higher prices) go for it.  This is probably your lowest price choice in the collection of "across the street" Harbor Blvd locations.  Make sure you check the map before booking an "across the street" location ... this can be true of hotels from which you have to circumvent the entire Disneyland Resort to get to the entrance.  Not so, here.  You're basically right across from California Adventure, and just need to walk down the block to the tram entrance between the two parks.  It's five minutes, easy, to the gate area.  There are a few closer options on Harbor, directly across from the tram entrance, but their prices are a bit higher too.  That's what you're here
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us last month. Thank you very much for taking the time to post about your experience!! We are grateful for your time and honesty regarding your visit!  Our location and short walk to the Disney Parks, as well as to numerous eating establishments and shopping definitely make the Castle Inn & Suites an ideal place to stay!   We hope that you will come back and stay with us again in the future!! Thank you again for your review!!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Stayed in room about midway down on the lot, 339, clean room fridge worked great, shower too. Updated t.v. was nice. All staff very helpful, cleaning ladys do a great job. They were nice enough to let us park the car after we checked out since it wasn't busy, THANKS Castle Inn, for an awesome stay again..
Manager Response: Evan,  As always, thank you for your review and for being such a loyal guest of the Castle Inn & Suites. We are so pleased to hear that you once again had a wonderful stay!! We so appreciate the time you take to write these reviews!!!  I did send you an e-mail through Trip Advisor and am hoping that you have seen it!!  Please be sure to let us know the next time you are coming down! We would love to say hello in person!  Thank you again for your comments and for trusting us whenever you come to Anaheim!!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: There is nothing fancy about this hotel, but it was perfect for what I needed. Value for money, easy access to transfer buses and most importantly a VERY short walk to Disneyland Theme Parks.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review you posted on Trip Advisor regarding your stay last month! We are so glad that you were happy with our proximity to Disneyland and California Adventure and to the ease with which you were able to get around.  Thank you again for your comments!! We look forward to having you stay with us again the next time you are in Anaheim!!   The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Not too shabby for the price!! =)
Summary: If your looking for an inexpensive hotel, Castle Inn is the place.I was a little concerned by some of the reviews, but went with it, anyways b/c of the price and just hoped for the best. I was more concerned w/ wanting $$ for DL that I was okay with getting a cheap hotel. I'll I wanted was somewhere I could lay my head, take a shower, not pay for parking, and that had a pool & spa. It had all of these. I had mention when I had reserved the hotel that I wanted a downstairs and no smoking and that's what I received. The rooms was basic.... but the shower worked well ,the hot water lasted, and yes, the beds were basic, but I brought my own pillow & blanket to make it more comfy and after a day/ night @ DL we were so exhausted the bed was great and I slept like a baby!!! When I
Manager Response: Thank you, first of all, for going with your gut and staying with us last month, regardless of what some of the reviews said. We love free thinkers and realize that we cannot always make everyone happy but are pleased that your stay surpassed your expectations!   Our complimentary guest parking is such an added amenity to our guests that we are so glad you mentioned it, especially when most of our neighbors have a parking rate!  We hope you will come and stay with us again sometime in the future!! Thank you again for your comments and time!!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights, just got back last night! From the second we walked in the staff was phenominal!  I cannot say enough about them, especially Alberta! Thanks you!  The hotel itself is older and could use some updating but is very clean and more than does the job!  I was a little worried after reading some reviews but once there didn't have a single problem... we normally stay at much higher end resorts but didn't have a problem with his place... the only thing that I was a little disappointed with was where it is.  As it is not very far from the main gates, only a block and a half, the MAIN reason I booked this hotel was because everywhere I looked it said it was right across from the main gate, and while it is right across from the park, it is not across from the
Manager Response: We wanted to thank you for the time you took to post a review regarding your stay with us last month especially because we saw that you did it the day after you returned from here! Thank you also, for being a free thinker and disregarding some of the other reviews and experience the hotel yourself!  We are pleased to hear that the staff lived up to your expectations and we have made mention to Alberta that you were extremely complimentary of her!  We are so sorry to hear that your son is going through chemotherapy but hope that your visit to Disneyland helped to raise his spirits!!  Thank you again for staying with us and for your comments!!  We hope that you will return to stay with us again in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel before and was a little let down the second time around. It was clean but the shower head sprayed the entire bathroom ceiling and the water shifted from hot to cold constantly. The matresses are very stiff so be prepared. But the location is very good being 10 minutes to the Disneyland main gate. If you are on a tight budget, it works.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review you posted about your stay with us last month! While we are sorry to hear that you were a little let down this time, we are so very appreciative that you had returned to stay after a previous visit. Please know that we take all comments seriously and they have all been addressed!  We hope that you will come back another time and let third time be the charm for your Castle Inn & Suites adventures!  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: The rooms are clean and spacious.  We stayed here for our Disneyland trip.  It's a 5 minute walk from the park.  Yes it is older but they make sure you have everything you need.  Staff is very courteous.  For people giving it bad reviews, they must want to be waited on hand and foot and expect people to bow down to them.  The place is quiet and doesn't have problems with rowdy guests.  We are a family of 6 and it worked well for us.  We would come back to stay here if we are lucky enough to afford another trip to Disneyland.  Very good price.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear that your experience at the Castle Inn & Suites was a great one and that you would come back on your next trip to Anaheim! Thank you very much for the review and your positive feedback! We appreciate all of the comments we receive and are thankful to those of you who post them!  As we always do, we want to thank you for such wonderful comments regarding the staff! Our staff is one of our biggest assets and we are thrilled to receive such kind reviews about them!  Thank you again! We hope to see you another time in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: This is by far the worst hotel that we have ever stayed in. We checked-in for 4 nights, but checked-out after the first night. I have seen some good reviews of this hotel, so perhaps all rooms are not same, and I guess people have different expectations from the hotel. We stayed in the family suite and the room was terrible. The hotel is dated and dirty. The mattress was really bad, and both my wife and I woke up witha stiff back the following morning. The closet rails were bad and the doors would not glide smoothly. Someone was sent to fix the problem, but he just used (WD40 - a lubricant), which didn't fix the problem. We couldn't even have a proper shower after the first morning, as the water just trickled from the shower-head. The WiFi is only available in the lobby, so I
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the time it took to write a review regarding your stay with us in May. We are so sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with your stay and checked out early. We appreciate your feedback and are always open for helpful suggestions to enhance the property or our customer service.    Thank you again for your comments! We have addressed the issues you touched based on.  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We have stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites 5 times over the past 3 years and each time was a pleasant experience.  The housekeeping staff are helpful and responsive.  The desk staff are courteous and efficient.  Our rooms are always clean and orderly and well maintained.  The hotel is quiet, peaceful, and perfectly located near Disneyland within an easy walk each day.  We fit 5 adults easily into a regular room.  On our most recent visit we were given one of the suites which included a nice couch/pull out bed, central air, and 2 sink areas.  We feel very safe and confident at the Castle Inn and have never had any problems with theft or misplaced items. The decorations add to the fun and festive feeling of the hotel The gift shop and internet area are also convenient.  In
Manager Response: Sheree,  We wanted to say thank you for being such a loyal guest and for continuing to return to the Castle Inn & Suites.  We are pleased to hear that each time you have been here you have had a really great experience!!  I have made sure that your comments were passed along to each department as we do appreciate all that you had to say!!   We hope that you will return again soon and as I mentioned in my note through TripAdvisor, please be sure to let us know when you are coming back!  Thank you again for the time you took to post your review!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay when dong Disney
Summary: We recently stayed 10 nights all up, great place if your doing Disney, 10 min walk to Disneyland. A 7 11 5 min down the road, heaps of restaraunts very close by.  The hotel could do with some up dating but we had no complaints. Stayed in the family suite which was great, the pool was nice, frieindly staff and very clean. Would recommend.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us last month! Thank you very much for taking the time to post your comments on Trip Advisor.   Our Family Suites are an excellent choice for families who are looking for some extra room during their stay and we appreciate the kind words about our staff!  As we always do, we have passed on your comments to them to see!  Thank you again for your time! We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: A great place to stay for your Disneyland vacation
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel 3 times in the past year, and I am always impressed with the way I am treated. There is no charge for parking, and they don't mind if you leave your car there while visiting the park on the last day of your stay. It is faster and easier to walk to Disneyland from this hotel than it is to park in the Disney lot and take the tram or bus. The rooms aren't fancy, but they are always clean. Overall, this is the best value I have found by far in the Disneyland area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being such a loyal guest and for continuing to choose the Castle Inn & Suites when you come to Anaheim! We appreciate the comments regarding your most recent stay and are so glad to hear that our service is up to your standards!!  Customer Service is our priority and it is a pleasure to know that our staff is living up to that.   We are pleased to be one of the few hotels left that does not charge guests parking during their stay or while they are over at the park on their last day.   Thank you again! We are looking forward to your next visit!!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: We stayed for 5 nights and that was 4 to many. The hotel is dirty, beds are awful and do not believe them when they say the have WIFI. They do, only in the lobby. If you have any issues you get very little help. The people at the front desk were rude and condescending. I would not go barefoot in these rooms, the carpets are disgusting and stained.  Spend a little more and stay some where else, trust me it will be worth it.
Manager Response: Jim,  Thank you so much for the comments you posted regarding your recent stay with us. I tried to reach you about a week ago, through TripAdvisor, to get clarification on some of things you had to say but have not heard back from you. I did want to let you know that we do take all comments seriously and appreciate you taking the time to let us know of your dissatisfaction.  Should you want to discuss your stay further, please don’t hesitate to contact us directly so that we may address the situation.   Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: I consider myself a "value traveler", so I don't expect to stay at the Four Seasons or anything, but I do have minimum cleanliness standards, and this hotel failed those standards dismally. The bathroom and mold and strands of hair that CLEARLY was NOT MINE (long and black) all over. Housekeeping did make our beds everyday, but did not replace the towels they took or clean the bathroom in any way. It was just gross.   The beds were saggy, and the ONE pillow per guest we received was so thin, it was laughable. When we asked for additional pillows, our request was met suspiciously. They brought 2 more, even though we requested 4, and acted like this was a ridiculous request.   When I booked, I was disappointed that they didn't offer a free breakfast. After looking at our room, I
Manager Response: Laura….  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a comment on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay. We value every comment and do appreciate what you have to say. I did try to contact you about a week ago, via TripAdvisor to get some information regarding your visit but unfortunately, I have not heard back from you.   We did want to make you aware that we do look at all reviews seriously and we do value your comments.   Please don’t hesitate to contact us directly to discuss the situation.  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: My husband, myself and our 2 boys (5 and 8) had our first trip to the States last year (Dec/Jan)  We booked the Castle Inn through their website which was a very easy and uncomplicated process.   Upon arrival we were greeted by the very friendly and helpful reception staff and made our way to our 'family suite'.  Having 2 young boys, it was fantastic to have the extra t.v in the 2nd bedroom so we weren't subjected to kids programming 24/7.  The beds were a little on the hard side, however I'm sure some people prefer a firm mattress.  The room was very clean and the cleaners always did a great job and always said hello when we passed them in the walkways.  The staff (especially the reception staff) were always so helpful and were the friendliest throughout our whole trip.  They
Manager Response: Mrs. Sorenson,   We are so thankful for the review you posted on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us in December. We appreciate all comments and are pleased to hear that your family enjoyed your time with us and that you have already booked a return stay for this December!  Our Family Suites are great for the additional privacy for children and as you mentioned, kid’s television programing. There are the two rooms which allows for extra space and comfort, especially when you are here extended periods of time!  As I have said in past responses, we are always so pleased when our staff is mentioned, especially when they are called “the friendliest” throughout your whole trip!!   We can’t wait to have you return for your next stay! Please don’t hesitate to contact any of us while you are here!  Thank you again for your time!  The Castle Inn & Suites

Summary Heading: Nothing special, but very close to Disneyland
Summary: The Hotel is older and really nothing special in terms of bathroom or fixtures.  The room was clean though and the beds were good, and that was all that matered to us since we had a very long day at Disneyland.  Parking was free, and there is a pool and a hot tub.  No breakfast. Disapppointing internet connection.  We never received a connection on the 4th floor.  Had to sit in the lobby to get some patchy connection going, not fun when booking your next hotel. Friendly front desk staff.   In all, good for a night or 2 when visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: We wanted to thank you for the review you posted on TripAdvisor regarding your stay earlier this month.  We are so appreciative of all comments and take them all into serious consideration.   Our front desk staff thanks you, also, for your nice compliment!!   Thank you again! We hope you will come back and stay with us again sometime soon!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: This was my second stay here.  This time we stayed in the two bedroom suite.  If you are looking for a family freindly hotel, close to the main gate of Disneyland, this one may work for you.  It is nothing fancy, but parking is free, and it is walking distance to the main gate.  And the room rates are affordable.
Manager Response: Ms. Johnson…  Thank you so very much for being such a loyal guest and for choosing to stay with us again! We so appreciate the comments about your stay this past weekend, as well as the review from your stay in October.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed the Family Suite and that once again our complimentary parking was an added bonus for you.  Thank you again! We look forward to your next visit!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Our family has stayed here 3 times and plan on many more stays!!
Summary: We just adore this hotel. We've stayed here 3 times with many family members and it's consistently great each time. We've never had any problems with the rooms,tvs, or service. We feel very safe when staying here and will be back for more nights very soon. Our 2 toddlers love staying in a castle and the walk is comfortable to Disneyland with a double stroller loaded up!!  You can also walk to subway, there's a little strip mall with food right next door. Our family loves this hotel!! And free parking!! That's such a bonus!! ;)
Manager Response: Thank you, once again, for your really wonderful review of your stay with us! We are so pleased that you and your family continue to come and see us and that we are able to surpass your expectations!! We appreciate all of our comments and especially appreciate when repeat guests, such as yourself, take the time to post their reviews!   We are so lucky to have a 24 hour Subway a half a block away, as well as numerous other eating establishments within a very easy walk. As I think I mentioned in my response to your last gracious review, it makes us so happy that your children love staying in a Castle and we look forward to having you all back to stay again soon!!!  Thank you again for your time and comments!    The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Great place to stay close to Disneyland
Summary: We have stayed at the Castle Inn & Suites several times, and we would defiantly stay again.  If you are looking for an affordable place to stay within walking distance of Disneyland, this is a great choice.  The rooms are clean, the staff is helpful and friendly, and being able to walk back and forth to Disney is so nice.  The rooms have a coffee maker and a fridge, and that all helps to make it affordable.  The pool is smaller, but it does the trick when you need to cool off.  Getting on and off the freeway is easy, and there are lots of restaurants within walking distance.  If you are looking for an affordable, clean, place to stay near Disneyland, I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: AnnaMarie,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post comments about your recent stay at the Castle Inn & Suites!!! We are so happy to hear that your family keeps returning to us when you come to Anaheim and so appreciate your kind remarks about the hotel and our staff! We pride ourselves in our customer service and have let our staff know that they have been mentioned in a review!  Thank you again and thank you for being such a loyal guest! We hope to see you back here soon!  The Castle Inn & Suites Managemenet

Summary Heading: Great Disneyland Suite for a family
Summary: We had a great stay here.  From check-in to check out four days later, we received exceptional service and had a terrific stay.  The front desk staff was always so helpful in answering our questions about the local area.  Room was a two bedroom suite, and was so perfect for the six of us.  One bedroom had two Q beds, one bedroom had one King I believe.  Nothing fancy, to be sure, but it was clean and very roomy.  There was a refrigerator and microwave, what a plus that was.  Restaurants nearby to walk to, and you can walk across the street to Disneyland much quicker than you could drive or take a shuttle.  The hot tub (ahhhhh, heaven after a day of walking) and pool was clean, and had a nice, large deck area.  No complaints, and our family will be back.  Exceptional value for
Manager Response: Ms. Kick….thank you so much for taking the time to write a review in regards to your stay with us in October. We are so pleased to hear that you had “exceptional service” while you were here and that our staff lived up to both your and our expectations!!   As we always say, we are so lucky to be in the location we are in what with being able to walk quickly over to the Disney Parks, without having to worry about a shuttle and also being in such close proximity to several really great restaurants! We are so glad that you were able to enjoy these things, as well as the comfort of one of our Family Suites, while you were here and we look forward to your return sometime in the future.  Thank you again for your time!! We certainly appreciate it!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: See further review below. No frills hotel establishment, stale air, old musty carpet, lighting very poor, decor was cheap and old. Closet and drawer space was sparse. No safe in room. Window would not open to let in any fresh air. Air conditioner and fan only circulated and recirculated stale air. Socks recommended as carpets do not get vacuumed often. Housekeeping was consistent but a vacuuming of the carpet floor would have been appreciated.
Manager Response: We wanted to say thank you for the time you took to post your review regarding your stay at the Castle Inn & Suites earlier this month.  While we are disappointed to hear that you were unhappy with your visit, we appreciate your comments and take them all seriously.  You mentioned not having a safe in the room but I wanted to let you know that we do have safety deposit boxes at the front desk which are available 24 hours a day: my apologies that you may not have been aware that although we do not have safes, we do have these boxes.   Thank you again for your time!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: Our stay was great.  We had three rooms and they were together! Didn't have remote for tv, but they sent someone to try and fix it. (never found one to work), but we weren't in rooms to watch!!! Would stay there again!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you had a great stay while you were here at the Castle Inn & Suites. Thank you for taking the time to put your thoughts in writing and for your comments.   We look forward to your return on your next visit to Anaheim!  Thank you again!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland, but very poor staff attitudes.
Summary: We stayed here for only one night, thankfully.   In our price, we were assured free Wi-Fi. There was none. No signal, nothing. So, we called the front desk. The guy who answered was rude and told us, "it must be out, oh well" and hung up. Our shower was broken, too, but when we told him about that he wasn't interested in the least.   When I'd originally asked about leaving our car parked there when we visited Disneyland for the day (upon check in) we'd been told that it wasn't a problem as long as we picked it up by 6pm on the day of our check out. The morning we checked out, though, they changed their minds and rudely told us to pay for parking at Disneyland, which I was happy enough to do, but would have preferred if they'd told me nicely that staying parked there wasn't an
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the time you took to post comments regarding your stay with us in November. While we are disappointed to hear that you were not satisfied with your stay, we take all comments seriously and use them to further better our service. I did send you a personal message on March 26, 2012 to get further information from you but have never heard back so we wanted to address what we are able:  We are sorry for any perception you may have in regards to our front desk staff. We pride ourselves in customer service and are quite surprised to hear of your issues with them. As you can see in many of our other reviews, our staff is a great asset to us and we regularly see very good comments about them.  To touch on the parking situation, we do offer complimentary parking for one car per guest room and are more than happy to allow guests to leave their cars upon check out when going over to the park for the day. While we would love to be able to let all of our checked out guests leave their cars here for the day on a regular basis, we do have some days when we know that it is going to be very busy and we know we will be in need of those parking spaces.  Some of the information I was looking to get from you were the dates that you were here so we could see what was going on the day you checked out but I am sure that whomever told you that the car would need to be moved, did so anticipating a large influx of check ins.  We do apologize for the change in plan but hope you can understand the reason behind it.  Thank you again for your time!  The Castle Inn & Suites Management

Summary: We stayed here for a week.  The front desk was very efficient and pleasant.  No frills but the money you save staying here can be spent for food and souvenirs at disney!!  The walk is about 12 minutes to the park entrance.  The restaurants are all very close by! =)  We were on the 4th floor and it was pretty quiet.  Unfortunately, internet was only available in the lobby; this was the only downturn to staying here; otherwise, it would have been great.
